[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/ci skad gsungs pa'i gzugs rnams la/_/me tog ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed na/_/dge ba'i brtul zhugs 'di dag dang /_/de 
[\[1b.2\]]bzhin sngon du bsnyen pa yang /_/dran pa tsam ni 'ba' zhig gis/_/nges par 'dod de de dag nyid/_/mchod pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur/_/rgyal srid sbyin pa'i gzugs 
[\[1b.3\]]la ni/_/tsan+dan gur gum a ka ru/_/ci rigs par ni byugs nas kyang /_/ut+pal puN+Da rI ka mdzes/_/tsam pa ka dang ma li ka/_/ke sa ra ni dri zhim pas/_/mchod nas 
[\[1b.4\]]bdug pa mar bcas pas/_/gu gul mkhas pas dbul bar bya/_/de ltar byas na khyim pas kyang /_/de la bsam zhing brgyad brjod de/_/ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa'i bshos/_/
[\[1b.5\]]de yi spyan sngar dbul bar bya/_/sngar bsnyen la sogs med kyang bla/_/de ltar sbyor bas zla drug gis/_/rkun po dang ni dgra med cing /_/the tsom med par rgyal srid thob/_/ma 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]bsgrubs na yang nyin gcig bzhin/_/mchod pa byas pas yul rnyed 'gyur/_/las 'di gdon mi za bar ni/_/des ni 'bum ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/longs spyod sbyin pa'i gzugs la ni/_/tsan+dan gur gum a ka rus/_/bdag gis 
[\[2a.2\]]legs par bskus nas ni/_/me tog phreng bas rab tu mchod/_/me tog dkar po'i phreng ba yis/_/nyin gcig bzhin du mchod byas nas/_/mar dang ldan pa'i gu gul lam/_/kun tu ru yi bdug pa'ang 'bul/_/me tog a ti mu ta ka/_/re re cho ga 
[\[2a.3\]]bzhin bzlas nas/_/mjug tu 'bum ni dbul bar bya/_/de nas longs spyod chen po rnams/_/de yi mjug tu 'byung 'gyur te/_/'di la spyad pa dogs pa med/_/nad sel ba yi gzugs la ni/_/tsan+dan dmar pos bskus nas kyang /_/sha ta shing 
[\[2a.4\]]gi bdag po dag_/phul nas me tog gtsang ma yis/_/mchod pa'i bshos ni dbul bar bya/_/mjug tu nad sel dang ldan pa/_/khro bo'i sngags ni de bzlas nas/_/bdag gam pha rol po dag gam/_/su yang rung ba'i gcong can yang /_/de ni za 
[\[2a.5\]]ma gcig gis 'joms/_/sngar bsnyen la sogs med kyang bla/_/'dod dgur sbyin pa'i gzugs la ni/_/de ltar yang ni mchod byas na/_/zhi ba rgyas pa dbang dang dgug_/dbye dang bskrad dang gsad pa dang /_/zlos pas mjug tu khyad par du/_/bskul 
[\[2a.6\]]ba'i tshig bcug bsgrub par bya/_/gzhan yang gang dag 'dod pa yis/_/yid dang mthun pa'i 'dod pa'i don/_/de yang de ltar yang dag bsgrub/_/sku gzugs rab tu mchod byas nas/_/gang du ci 'dra de lta bur/_/gus par zla ba drug bzlas te/_/sku 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]gzugs nyin gcig bzhin du ni/_/de ltar kun tu rab mchod nas/_/rtag tu de yi bzlas pa ni/_/blo dang ldan pas kun byas na/_/grub pa nyid ni ma thob kyang /_/dngos grub phra mo thob par 'gyur/_/yang na khro bo'am phyag rgya'ang rung /_/de tshe sgrub par nus na ni/_/
[\[2b.2\]]de yi ri mo gsungs pa dang /_/lha yi brtul zhugs des kyang 'grub/_/de nas gzhan yang brtul zhugs kyi/_/mchog gis dngos grub gang yin pa/_/cho ga bzhin du mdor bsdus te/_/rgyas par bdag gis bshad par bya/_/de nas khro bo gtso bo yi/_/rtse gsum 
[\[2b.3\]]shin tu gsal bsgrubs na/_/ur mo'i lcags las byas pa yi/_/rtse gsum sor ni sum cu pa/_/rno la bzang zhing rab legs pa/_/thog ma cho ga bzhin byas nas/_/ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas su/_/ri mo bzang po de bris nas/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po zhes pa yi/_/
[\[2b.4\]]dkyil 'khor thal bas tshul bzhin bri/_/de nas mchod pa rgya chen dang /_/nya dang sha rnams sna tshogs kyis/_/phyogs kyi gtor ma kun tu bya/_/tshes grangs nyi shu gsum gyi dgongs/_/rtse gsum dkyil 'khor me tog la/_/bzhag nas me tog dag gis mchod/_/
[\[2b.5\]]tsan+dan dmar pos kun bskus shing /_/me tog dag gis thams cad brgyan/_/cho ga bzhin du lag gis bzung /_/ri mo la ni mngon phyogs 'dug_/khro bo mchog gi sngags dag gis/_/rtse gsum pa la mkhas pas bzlas/_/de yi nyes pa sbyang ba'i phyir/_/brgya rtsa 
[\[2b.6\]]brgyad du bzlas nas su/_/khro bo mchog gi sngags dag gis/_/der ni me yang rab sbar nas/_/cho ga bzhin du rtse gsum la/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong byas nas/_/lag pas bsgreng ste bzung nas su/_/dpa' zhing brtan pa'i tshul du gnas/_/ji srid me ltar 
[\[2b.7\]]'bar gyur pa/_/de srid blo dang ldan pas bzlas/_/rtse gsum 'bar ba nyid kyis na/_/de nas gyen du 'bar bar gyur/_/sngags kyi mthu yis mig gsum las/_/'od kyang nyi ma bzhin du 'byung /_/rig 'dzin gzhan rnams thams cad kyang /_/de la mchod cing 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dga' bar byed/_/dbang phyug kun dang rab tu ldan/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can yid bzhin 'gyur/_/de ste rtse gsum du ba 'byung /_/de nas lus ni mi snang 'gyur/_/'on te de ni tsha gyur na/_/dpung dang lha ma yin gyi gnas/_/g.yul ngo chen po la 
[\[3a.2\]]sogs par/_/'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par byed/_/de ltar dang po sgrub pa'i mchog_/'di ni rab tu bshad pa yin/_/da ni ral gri bzang po yang /_/'dir ni bsgrub par rab tu bshad/_/ur mo'i lcags las byas pa yi/_/ral gri sor ni sum cu gnyis/_/legs par 
[\[3a.3\]]byas shing phan byed la/_/glang po'i so la dong byed la/_/ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas su/_/mchod pa la sogs sngon bzhin bya/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/_/ral gri lag par bzung ste bzlas/_/sngags pa'i chang pas bzung nas ni/_/rab tu snang ba 'bar ba 'byin/_/
[\[3a.4\]]'bar ba de ni mthong nas su/_/rig 'dzin mchog tu de 'gyur ro/_/de ste de las du ba 'byung /_/de nas de ni mi snang 'gyur/_/tsha bar gyur na de bzhin du/_/stobs chen rkang pa mgyogs par 'gyur/_/lo brgya rab tu tshang bar 'tsho/_/'di la rnam par dpyad mi dgos/_/gal 
[\[3a.5\]]te 'di la ma brten nas/_/grub pa thob par ma gyur na/_/ral gri brtson 'grus mchog ldan pas/_/g.yul ngor phyin nas thams cad du/_/myur zhing mi ngal nyon mi mongs/_/pham pa med par stong yang thub/_/ral gri bsgrub pa bshad zin te/_/da ni be con sgrub pa bshad/_/
[\[3a.6\]]go bi da ra'i be con nam/_/yang na seng ldeng dag las ni/_/gshin rje'i be con lta bu bzang /_/sor ni bzhi bcu gnyis pa bya/_/de nas blo can dur khrod du/_/gtor ma cho ga rgya chen bya/_/be con mchog la sngon bzhin du/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/_/
[\[3a.7\]]gos dmar bgos shing thal ba dang /_/me tog dmar pos brgyan nas su/_/bsreg gzhi der 'dug be con las/_/ji srid ha ha zhes pa dang /_/lag na be con 'gul pa'i bar/_/de srid cho ga bzhin du bzlas/_/de nas dang po khro bo'i bdag_/dbang phyug kun dang 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]rab ldan pa/_/de yi chibs pa ma he la/_/zhon nas mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/_/skra ni lcang lo 'khyil pa stug_/snum zhing mthing ga lta bur 'gyur/_/dus mtha'i sprin gyi kha dog 'dra/_/de yi lus mchog stobs kyang che/_/gal te khro bo de 'dod na/_/be con gyis ni lha 
[\[3b.2\]]rnams gsod/_/be con sgrub pa bshad pa yin/_/de bzhin legs par mdor bsdus nas/_/dgra sta bzang po bsgrub pa dag_/de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya/_/snga ma bzhin du ur mo las/_/dgra sta bzang po byas pa yang /_/yu ba sor ni bcu drug pa/_/dgra sta de ni sor 
[\[3b.3\]]drug pa/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin sgrub na/_/dngos grub de dag de yi 'thob/_/de nas gzhan yang lcags kyu'i mchog_/bsgrub pa bdag gis bshad par bya/_/ur mo lcags las byas pa yi/_/lcags kyu sor ni bzhi bar bya/_/de yi yu ba mnyam pa la/_/sor ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod par bya/_/
[\[3b.4\]]nyi shu dgu yi tshes grangs la/_/nub mo mchod pa gtor ma byas/_/ri yi rtse la 'dug nas su/_/lcags kyu go cha bsgrub par bya/_/ser skya las byung mar dag gis/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/_/ji srid sgron ma bzhin 'bar ba/_/de srid lag pas bzung ste bzlas/_/de nas 
[\[3b.5\]]de ni thogs pa yis/_/the tshom med par nam langs na/_/'od ni me bzhin kun tu snang /_/gyen du 'bar zhing 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten pa yi lha rnams ni/_/bran g.yog bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mchog bzhin/_/bka' yang rab tu nyan 
[\[3b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/'on te de yi lcags kyu'i mchog_/du ba 'byung bar gyur na ni/_/de tshe du ba byung ba yis/_/stobs chen grib ma'ang mi snang 'gyur/_/sngags pa bye ba gsum du gson/_/gnod sbyin rig 'dzin rnams kyis mchod/_/bde ba kun dang rab tu ldan/_/'dod 
[\[3b.7\]]par 'byor zhing stobs kyang che/_/khro bo sngags kyis mthu stobs nas/_/gal te de ni tsha gyur na/_/nang par bkra shis byas nas su/_/lcags kyu bzang po de thogs nas/_/bzlas na brgya byin la sogs pa'i/_/lha rnams 'gugs pa gdon mi za/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]rig 'dzin rnams dag dang /_/de bzhin lto 'phye mi'am ci/_/lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang /_/de bzhin dri za'i bu mo dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ro langs rigs rnams dang /_/de bzhin gzhan yang myos dregs rnams/_/bkug nas bdag gi las rnams ni/_/ji ltar 
[\[4a.2\]]'dod pa byed du gzhug_/gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len/_/grub pa yi ni rdzas rnams dang /_/gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa/_/de dag thams cad de la ni/_/lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs la sogs/_/ji snyed pa dag 'bul bar byed/_/de yi bka' ni thams 
[\[4a.3\]]cad kyang /_/'jigs pas nges par nyen par 'gyur/_/ngo mtshar kun gyis brgyan pa yi/_/rang gis gzhon pas yongs bskor cing /_/gnas dang skyed mos tshal mang po/_/ngo mtshar kun dang rab ldan pa/_/khyim dang slas kyi gnas rnams dang /_/'jig rten ma 
[\[4a.4\]]lus ston par byed/_/rdzu 'phrul yon tan longs spyod kyis/_/sgrub pa po ni dga' bar byed/_/ci srid lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mi/_/de yi bka' yis nges pa ru/_/gnod sbyin mo dag rang rang gi/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod nye bar spyod/_/de ste las kyi skyon dag gis/_/
[\[4a.5\]]tsha ba tsam du ma gyur na'ang /_/lcags kyu de nyid 'dir bzung ste/_/nang par dben par 'dug nas su/_/bu mo gang gis ming bcug ste/_/ci srid 'dod pa bzlas nas ni/_/dpag tshad brgyad brgyan gnas pa/_/de nas myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/bu mo'am yang na 
[\[4a.6\]]khye'u yang rung /_/ci ltar 'dug pa myur du 'grub/_/me tog 'bras bu de bzhin grub/_/shing rta dang ni ljon shing dag_/ma grub na yang rtag pa ru/_/de yis nges par khugs par 'gyur/_/de ltar lcags kyu dam pa 'di/_/bsgrub pa rab tu bshad pa yin/_/thod 
[\[4a.7\]]pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa/_/de yang 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/rtse gsum ral gri be con dang /_/de bzhin dgra sta lcags kyu yi/_/sgrub pa gang dag bshad pa yi/_/lag pa g.yas pas gzung bar bya/_/thod pa la sogs gzhan rnams ni/_/lag pa g.yon pas bzung 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]bsgrubs na/_/de nas de dag bshad pa bzhin/_/dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/_/shing las legs par byas pa yi/_/thod pa sor ni nyi shu pa/_/mnyam par rab tu legs byas la/_/nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/_/ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas su/_/mchod dang gtor 
[\[4b.2\]]ma'i rim par byas/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/_/sngags kyang bsrung ba mthu bskyed de/_/thod pa lag pa g.yon pas bzung /_/lag pa g.yas pas bsten nas ni/_/de yi kha yang dgab par bya/_/ji srid de la 'bar ba dang /_/du ba'am tsha ba byung gi bar/_/de srid [(]sngags [,]sbas [)]
[\[4b.3\]]ni bzlas par bya/_/'bar nas nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bshad/_/du ba 'byung bar gyur na yang /_/de bzhin nges par mi snang 'gyur/_/'on te tsha bar de gyur na/_/de yi tshe na gang bsams pa/_/thod pa de las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[4b.4\]]de la rnam pa dpyad mi dgos/_/'on te de ni ma grub na/_/de nas sa la mi bzhag par/_/de yi thod pa blangs nas su/_/shing gi khri la gzhag par bya/_/ras kyis g.yogs te bzhag nas su/_/yid la ci 'dod bsams pa yi/_/zan dang bza' dang bya na rnams/_/gang 
[\[4b.5\]]yang rung ba de dag nyid/_/ras g.yogs lag gis bzung nas su/_/stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na/_/grub pa la ni nyin re zhing /_/de nas gang yang rung ba'i zas/_/bya na bcangs pas nges pa ru/_/thod pa de nang gang bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams ni gang la yang /_/
[\[4b.6\]]bdud rtsi zas ni sbyin par bya/_/tshul bzhin pa yi 'og tu ni/_/gtsang sbra byas te tshul bzhin bza'/_/thod pa bsgrub pa bshad pa 'di/_/lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/_/mdung thung rnon po legs byas pa/_/bshol ba med par bsgrub par bya/_/ur mo lcags las byas 
[\[4b.7\]]pa mchog_/bkra shis sor ni sum cu gnyis/_/de nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/_/chu 'gram gtsang ma dag tu ni/_/sngon bzhin mtshan mo bsgrub par bya/_/dngos grub 'bras bu gsum du bshad/_/de ltar ji skad bshad pa bzhin/_/mda' bo che yang mkhas pas bsgrub/_/
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]ur mo lcags las byas pa mchog_/rab tu rno ba snga ma bzhin/_/bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/_/tsan+dan dmar pos gdab par bya/_/sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bzhin/_/ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas ni/_/snga ma bzhin du mtshan mo bsgrub/_/grub na 'bras 
[\[5a.2\]]bu snga ma bzhin/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni/_/lag pa g.yas pas g.yogs nas su/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin byas nas/_/zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/_/stan gcig pa la legs 'dug nas/_/blo dang ldan pas bzlas byas na/_/de nas mdzub mo de las ni/_/
[\[5a.3\]]gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur/_/yang na du ba rang 'byung ba'am/_/de nas tsha bar 'gyur yang srid/_/de nas nges par 'bar gyur na/_/rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/du ba 'byung bar gyur pa las/_/de bzhin mi snang 'gyur bar bshad/_/de tshe rab tu tshar gyur na/_/
[\[5a.4\]]rkang pa mgyogs pa rab tu 'thob/_/de ste lag pa g.yon pa yi/_/mdzub mo grub par ma gyur te/_/dngos grub nyams kyang nges par ni/_/las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/_/khros nas de yis bsdigs na ni/_/mi de ji ltar 'dod pa ru/_/de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 
[\[5a.5\]]'gyur/_/sngags mkhan dag gis bsad nas kyang /_/de nas shi bar gyur pa de/_/de nas lag pa g.yas pa yis/_/ci srid 'dod par slong bar byed/_/rab tu 'khrugs pa'i dpung chen yang /_/de nas de yis bsdigs par nus/_/glang po dang ni rta rnams dang /_/ljon shing dang ni 
[\[5a.6\]]nags tshal rnams/_/ring bor mi thogs 'jig par byed/_/ri rnams kun gyi rtse mo dag_/rab tu bzang zhing mtho ba yang /_/de nas de yi mdzub mo des/_/ring por mi thogs snyil bar byed/_/mdzub mo dngos grub kun sbyin pa'i/_/grub pa'i mchog ni bshad pa yin/_/de 
[\[5a.7\]]nas gzhan yang zhags pa yi/_/sgrub pa'ang 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/shi ba'i skra la zhags pa ni/_/sbom zhing yid du 'ong ba bya/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin bsgrubs na/_/de yi dngos grub de nyid 'thob/_/shing ni rab tu bzang po las/_/dbyug to sor ni bcu drug bya/_/legs par 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]bzhogs dang legs bris pa/_/bzang po yid du 'ong byas nas/_/de yi mgo bo dag la yang /_/rab tu bzang po'i gser gyis dkri/_/de yi rtse la nor bu ni/_/pad+ma rA gas spras par bya/_/de nas tshul bzhin ri rtse la/_/cho ga sngon du bshad pa bzhin/_/mngon du 'dug pa'i 
[\[5b.2\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/sgrub pa po yis nub mo bsgrub/_/'bar ba de ni blangs nas su/_/nam mkhar 'phags pa gdon mi za/_/snga ma bzhin du grub rnams kyi/_/gtso bor gyur cing 'dod gzugs can/_/du ba tsha la sogs pas kyang /_/de yis 'bras bu sngon bzhin 'thob/_/
[\[5b.3\]]mtshon cha mchog rnams bsgrub pa ni/_/de ltar mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/_/de nas cho ga las byung ba'i/_/dngos grub gzhan yang bshad bya ste/_/ci ltar khro bo mchog gis ni/_/nyid kyis mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po zhes bya ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[5b.4\]]thog mar bris nas su/_/rma med pa yi ro blangs nas/_/mkhas pas khrus byas legs par brgyan/_/me tog spos kyis mchod nas su/_/sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/_/las ni dur khrod dag tu bya/_/'di ni gzhan du yong mi bya/_/me tog bkram pa'i gnas mal du/_/
[\[5b.5\]]nub phyogs sgo phyogs mgo bstan gzhag_/thod pa bzang po zas mchog gis/_/rab tu gang ba blangs nas su/_/zas mchog dag gi nang du yang /_/tshil chen dag gis blug par bya/_/mkhas pas de dag de yi tshe/_/khro bo sngags kyis btab pa yi/_/sbyin blugs brgya ni 
[\[5b.6\]]tshang tshang du/_/gzar bus mi yi khar blugs na/_/de yi lce yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas mtshon gyis gcad par bya/_/lce ni rtsa bar bcad pa las/_/khro bo'i mthu yis myur ba ru/_/de nas de nyid ral gri'i gzugs/_/bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur/_/
[\[5b.7\]]de nas ral gri blangs nas su/_/grogs rnams la ni re re sbyin/_/sgrub pa po yis blangs nas ni/_/de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur/_/rig 'dzin de dag thams cad kyis/_/kun tu bkur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/grogs po de rnams dang bcas par/_/bskal pa bdun 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]du gnas par 'gyur/_/yang na mkhas pas dur khrod du/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po zhes bya ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor de nas bris nas su/_/mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya/_/skyes pa bud med shi ba yi/_/rma med pa yi ro blangs nas/_/legs par khrus byas 
[\[6a.2\]]rgyan gyis brgyan/_/dkyil 'khor de yi sgor bzhag ste/_/de yi snying gar de 'dug nas/_/stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/khro bo mchog tu gyur ba'i sngags/_/yi ge bcu bdun stong rtsa brgyad/_/de bzlas nas ni dngos grub thob/_/mi ro de nas ldang bar 'gyur/_/
[\[6a.3\]]mchod yon legs par dbul bar bya/_/de yi mgo la lag g.yon gyis/_/de ma thag du reg byas na/_/ldong ros me yi mdog 'dra ba/_/de bas bdag nyid can de yi/_/kha nas myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sgrub pa po yis de blangs te/_/yan lag thams cad bskus 
[\[6a.4\]]nas ni/_/btso ma'i gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/_/grogs rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin/_/de ma thag tu de dag kun/_/btso ma gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/_/ci ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can 'gyur/_/rig 'dzin rnams ni thams cad kyi/_/thog mar 'gro ba de 
[\[6a.5\]]dag 'gyur/_/rdzas rnams thams cad grub par ni/_/grub na de la de nas yang /_/dkon mchog gsum la cha gcig dbul/_/de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid bkur/_/grogs po rnams ni thams cad la'ang /_/byin nas 'di nas nam mkhar 'phur/_/rdzas gcig 
[\[6a.6\]]grub par gyur pa la/_/cho ga gzhan yang spyad bya ste/_/rdzas gcig grub par gyur na ni/_/thog mar phyag kyang byas nas su/_/dkon mchog gsum la cho ga bzhin/_/bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/_/de yi 'og tu rdzas de blangs/_/grogs po rnams la rim bzhin du/_/
[\[6a.7\]]rdzas de byin nas 'phur bar 'gyur/_/phyi nas cho ga 'di rnams spyad/_/de ltar ma byas grub na yang /_/de yi rdzas ni 'phrog par 'gyur/_/de bas dngos grub mchog rnams la/_/kun tu ci srid bshad bzhin bya/_/de nas gzhan yang any+dza na/_/bza' ba sgrub pa 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ci bzhin pa/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/_/dam pa 'di ni bshad par bya/_/zhag gsum smyung bar 'dug nas su/_/dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri/_/de nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/_/der ni gtor ma'i las bya'o/_/de nas mi ro bsregs pa yi/_/thal bas 
[\[6b.2\]]bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/_/de yis bdag nyid byugs nas su/_/grogs po'i mchog ldan dga' ba des/_/de yis bdag nyid byugs nas su/_/any+dza na yi snying po de/_/gsal shing gis bsad mgo la gzhag_/shi ba'i gos kyis g.yogs nas su/_/lag pas bzung 
[\[6b.3\]]ste bzlas byas te/_/dngos grub rnam gsum 'byung ba'i bar/_/blo can gyis ni de srid bzlas/_/tsha 'am yang na du ba 'byung /_/yang na me bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur/_/de yi mig dag bskus na ni/_/'bar bas nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/_/du bas lus ni mi snang bar/_/
[\[6b.4\]]gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar bshad/_/tsha bar gyur na bltas pa yi/_/'gro ba dag ni gsod par 'gyur/_/slar yang legs par gso ba ni/_/ring por mi thogs gdon mi za/_/'di la sgrub par ma gyur na'ang /_/mig dag legs par bskus na ni/_/bltas pas 
[\[6b.5\]]'gro ba dbang du 'gyur/_/pus mos btsugs shing mgo bos 'dud/_/any+dza na yi cho ga bzhin/_/mkhas pas gi wang bsgrub par bya/_/dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin bstan/_/ma grub 'gro bar dbang du 'gyur/_/li khri dang ni ba bla dang /_/ldong ros dag kyang de bzhin 
[\[6b.6\]]te/_/any+dza na yi dpyad bzhin du/_/mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya/_/shi ba'i gos kyang cho ga bzhin/_/bsgrub pa gzhan dag de bzhin du/_/khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa'i sngags/_/mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/_/dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri/_/mchod 
[\[6b.7\]]pa dang ni gtor ma bya/_/shi ba'i gos de bgos nas ni/_/cho ga shes pas mtshan mo bzlas/_/de nas gos de dang bcas par/_/mtshan mo rab tu 'bar 'gyur na/_/'bar zhing 'bar bas yongs bskor nas/_/nam mkha' dag la legs par 'phar/_/gad mo rab tu 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]dgod pa'i sgra/_/'jig rten skrag par byed par 'byin/_/rtag tu 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ldan/_/khro bo bzhin du de spyod 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ba byung na yang /_/gdon mi za bar mi snang ba'i/_/mchog tu 'gyur bar rab tu bshad/_/sgrub pa de yi gos de ni/_/de 
[\[7a.2\]]bzhin tsha bar gyur na yang /_/rkang pa mgyogs shing stobs cher 'gyur/_/sa steng rnams su khyab par 'gro/_/nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/de ste grub par ma gyur na'ang /_/'gro ba ma lus dbang du 'gyur/_/gang rnams mthong zhing de bzhin te/_/mthong ba de dag bran 
[\[7a.3\]]bzhin 'gyur/_/gal te 'di dag gnod sbyin mo/_/mi yis sgrub par 'dod na ni/_/ba ti shing drung nyams dga' ba/_/de tshe dkyil 'khor bris nas su/_/skra bshig gos kyang med byas la/_/zas mchog legs par btsos pa yis/_/lhung bzed bzang po yongs bkang 
[\[7a.4\]]nas/_/mar gyi nga yi mtshan mo bsgrub/_/de nas chang bu bdun phyung ste/_/sngags kyi lan bdun btab nas su/_/lha yi bzang po 'di bzhes shig_/byas nas de yi rgyab tu dor/_/de nas gzhan yang chang bu bdun/_/sngags kyis btab ste bza' bar bya/_/lha yi bzang mo zhes 
[\[7a.5\]]bya ba/_/grub pa gnod sbyin kun gyi rje/_/'khor rnams mang pos kun bskor nas/_/de nas de yi 'od 'bar 'gyur/_/de nas kha bkrus de la ni/_/spos dang me tog mchog ldan pa'i/_/mchod yon chu ni dbul bar bya/_/legs 'ongs me tog dag kyang dbul/_/de nas stan 
[\[7a.6\]]bzang nyams dga' bar/_/me tog ldan pa phul na ni/_/da ni khyod kyi bdag grub ste/_/bka' bzhin byed cing de bzhin du/_/gzhan du mi 'gyur bka' nyan gyis/_/bka' stsol cig ces de la smra/_/ma'am yang na sring mo'am/_/mdza' mo'am yang na chung mar 'gyur/_/mar 
[\[7a.7\]]brjod pas ni nges par yang /_/de yi ldong ros la sogs pa/_/grub pa'i rdzas ni mang po dag_/gdon mi za bar de la ster/_/sring mos me tog 'bras bu dang /_/bdud rtsi mchog dang gser 'gyur rtsi/_/rtag tu sgrub pa po de la/_/gdon mi za bar ster bar 'gyur/_/mdza' 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]mor gyur cig ces smras nas/_/mtshan mo lding khang mchog rnams dang /_/yid du 'ong ba gzhan rnams kyang /_/bdag nyid dga' ba ston par byed/_/myur du chung ma sdug pa dag_/dpag tshad brgya nas khrid de 'ong /_/gzhan yang sgrub pa po de la/_/des shing 'dod dang 
[\[7b.2\]]dga' ba ster/_/de ste de la chung mar smras/_/'dod pa'i gzugs can rnam par mdzes/_/dbang phyug longs spyod thams cad kyis/_/grub pa de ni dga' bar byed/_/des shing 'dod pa dga' ba ster/_/'dzum zhing sri zhu 'jo ma dang /_/dbang phyug longs spyod thams cad 
[\[7b.3\]]ni/_/sgrub pa ci srid 'dod pa spyod/_/gal te mngal nas skyes pa yi/_/sha za mo dag bsgrub 'dod na/_/sgrub pa po la de yi las/_/de dag 'di ni bshad par bya/_/sh+le sh+ma ka ta'i shing drung ni/_/gtsang mar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/_/mchod pa chen po byas nas su/_/
[\[7b.4\]]gtor ma'i las kyang sngon bzhin bya/_/der ni dur khrod shing dag gis/_/sngags pas me ni rab sbar nas/_/gos med skra yang hag byas te/_/de nas me yang 'bar ba la/_/der ni gzegs ma'i sbyin sreg rnams/_/sngags kyis stong rtsa brgyad bsreg na/_/de tshe gdon mi za bar 
[\[7b.5\]]yang /_/sha za mo ni 'bar ba'i gdong /_/'ong bar 'gyur te de yi tshe/_/sems ni dpa' bar byas nas su/_/mi 'jigs mdun du mchod yon dbul/_/de yi 'og tu de la ni/_/bdag nyid gzugs ni bzang por ston/_/de yi ming ni kang rang gi/_/rang ming sngags kyis 
[\[7b.6\]]sbyin sreg bya/_/gang bsam pa yi nor de rnams/_/'ongs nas ring por mi thogs par/_/gdon mi za bar rab tu dbul/_/kang rang gi ni zhes bya ba/_/sha za mo ni kun gyi mchog_/sgrub pa po ni sems dpa' zhing /_/gzi yang rab tu che ba la/_/gdon rnams thams 
[\[7b.7\]]cad rab tu bsgrub/_/de ltar min na myur bar ni/_/sgrub po yang ni gsod bar byed/_/de ste klu yi bu mo dag_/de la rig 'dzin dpal ldan pas/_/bsgrub pa dag tu 'dod pa la/_/de yi cho gar 'di bshad do/_/pad+mo dkar po'i mtsho 'gram du/_/song nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/_/
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po zhes bya ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor der ni bri bar bya/_/de nas der ni mkhas pa yis/_/gtor ma'i cho ga snga ma bzhin/_/u dum bA ra'i yam shing gis/_/thog mar me ni rab spar nas/_/nA ga ge sar phye ma dag_/mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg_/
[\[8a.2\]]sbyin sreg byed tshe myur bar ni/_/de nas klu yi bu mo dag_/'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur/_/gal te mtshan mo de bsreg na/_/sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa/_/gdon mi za bar rab tu ster/_/de ste sngags pa lha min gyi/_/phug sgor song nas ci dga' bar/_/lha ma yin mo thams 
[\[8a.3\]]cad ni/_/las 'di dag ni thams cad sgrub/_/dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bri nas/_/gtor ma'i cho ga rgya cher bya/_/pri yang ku yi shing dag gi/_/zhugs thab tu ni me spar nas/_/cho ga bzhin du sngags zlos shig_/yungs kar dkar po gur gum la/_/smyugs nas stong 
[\[8a.4\]]rtsa brgyad bzlas la/_/de nas nges par bsreg par bya/_/de nas sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe/_/lha min na chung 'byung bar byed/_/sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa/_/gdon mi za bar rab tu ster/_/lha ma yin gyi gnas dag tu/_/bde ba'i lam nas 'jug par byed/_/dbang 
[\[8a.5\]]phyug kun dang ldan par ni/_/de na de ni 'grub par byed/_/gal te 'dir ni sngags pa dag_/sha chen dag ni 'tshong 'dod na/_/dang por dur khrod 'dug nas su/_/dpa' ba'i sems kyis sha chen blang /_/blangs nas bsrung ba byas nas su/_/lag pa g.yon pas chu gri thogs/_/
[\[8a.6\]]g.yas pas sha chen skyon med gzung /_/mtshan mo dur khrod du zhugs nas/_/sems pa dpa' bas gshin rje'i gshed/_/khro bo yid la zlos byed cing /_/sha 'tshong ba yi sgra bsgrags so/_/bdag nyid chen po de yis tshig_/srin po dam tshig med pa dang /_/sems can phra mo kha cig 
[\[8a.7\]]gis/_/thos nas rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur/_/gang gzhan lhag pa'i sems yod cing /_/drag po'i dur khrod gnas skyong ba/_/sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che/_/de dag lus ni ston par byed/_/grub pa 'jigs par mi bya bar/_/de nas sems ni drag po des/_/
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]legs par 'ongs zhes smra bar bya/_/de nas gnas skyong bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/de nas any+dza na dag dang /_/rdzas ni gang rnams 'dod pa de/_/sha yis rab tu sbyin byos zhes/_/sgrub pa pos kyang smra bar bya/_/sgrub pa pos kyang gzhan mi smra/_/sems ni dpa' bar shes nas 
[\[8b.2\]]su/_/sbyin par byad kyis gzhan la min/_/de nas gzhan yang 'di yi las/_/dpung rnams mnan par bya ba gang /_/khro bo mchog gis gsungs pa ni/_/de dag 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/mi ro'i gos las byas pa yi/_/ba dan shin tu bzang po bya/_/de nas mthon 
[\[8b.3\]]ka las bya'o/_/sor bcu drug gi tshad du bya/_/smyug ma'i yu ba sdu gu dag_/khru gang tshad du byas pa la/_/btags te de nas bsgreng nas su/_/dur khrod du ni mtshan mo bsgrub/_/dkyil 'khor rgya chen bris nas kyang /_/der ni tsog pur gnas nas su/_/ba dan lag na 
[\[8b.4\]]thogs nas ni/_/mtshan mo thog thag bzlas par bya/_/de nas nam ni langs pa na/_/de yi lag na thogs pa yi/_/de tshe dgra yi dpung 'khrug pa/_/the tshom med par gnas par 'gyur/_/lag na thogs pa gzhan dag kyang /_/sgrub pa pos ni mthong ba yi/_/de dag 
[\[8b.5\]]thams cad mthong ma thag_/mnan te ri bzhin mi g.yor 'gyur/_/glang po rgyal po myos pa dang /_/shing rta rta dang glang por bcas/_/rkang thang 'khrugs pa mang bcas pa'i/_/dgra yi dpung rnams nges par ni/_/mthong ba tsam ni nyid kyis su/_/mnan pa bzhin du snang bar 
[\[8b.6\]]'gyur/_/de nas gzhan yang dur khrod kyi/_/sbyor ba bkra shis dge ba dang /_/khro bo mchog gis gsungs pa de/_/de ni nges par bshad par bya/_/des ni mi ro bsregs pa yi/_/mtshan mo me 'bar bltas nas su/_/skra bshig gos kyang med byas la/_/bzlas pa dag kyang 
[\[8b.7\]]bskor zhing bya/_/de nas der ni sngags pa yis/_/lan gcig thal ba spar ba gang /_/lag pa g.yon pas blangs nas su/_/mkhas pas khyim du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/yang na lha khang stong par 'gro/_/phyir yang lta bar yong mi bya/_/de nas der yang thal ba de/_/
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]nam langs bar du bzlas par bya/_/nam ni langs par gyur pa ni/_/thal ba de ni bsrungs nas su/_/sar pa'i snod du gzhag bya zhing /_/sa la gzhag par yong mi bya/_/dgra yi dpung dag mnan pa'i phyir/_/thal ba de ni gtor byas na/_/shing rta dang ni 
[\[9a.2\]]glang po dang /_/mtshon cha thams cad 'khrug pa dang /_/skye bo mang por ldan pa'i yul/_/thal be de yis thams cad du/_/lan cig gtor ba tsam gyis kyang /_/lus rnams mi 'gul gdon mi za/_/'di ni mtshon rnams gnon pa dang /_/dpung yang gnon byed dge 
[\[9a.3\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin gnyid kyis log bya dang /_/myos par byed par sbyor ba yang /_/rlung phyogs dag tu song ba'am/_/yang na bsnyen te byas na'ang rung /_/bgrod dka'i dgra ni mtshon 'khrugs la/_/byas nas 'gro ba mi 'gul 'gyur/_/dur khrod dag gis sbyor ba yis/_/dpung 
[\[9a.4\]]mnan de ltar bshad zin to/_/'gro ba dbang byed sbyor ba ni/_/rnam pa gzhan dag bshad par bya/_/dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri/_/mchod pa snga ma bzhin du bya/_/gtor ma rgya chen byas nas ni/_/mi yi tshil gyi snum dag las/_/mar me 'bar ba byas nas su/_/
[\[9a.5\]]de nas thod pa bzang po la/_/mkhas pa dag gis snag tsa sbyar/_/du ba'i snag tsa sbyar nas kyang /_/nam langs bar du bslab par bya/_/de nas nang bar nam langs te/_/du ba'i snag tsas mig bskus na/_/gang mthong de yi dbang du 'gyur/_/de ltar 'gro ba dbang byed 
[\[9a.6\]]pa'i/_/sbyor ba de ni bsgrags pa yin/_/btsag gi sbyor ba'i dngos grub kyang /_/dge bdag ni da bshad do/_/yug snam btsag ni dge ba dag_/mi ro'i khar ni bcug nas su/_/de nas de phyed tshig nas ni/_/grogs med par ni mtshan mo blang /_/blangs nas lha yi khang 
[\[9a.7\]]stong du/_/mkhas pa dag gis bzlas pa bya/_/bgegs kyang rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/ci srid nam langs bar du ni/_/de na 'dug cing de la bzlas/_/de nas nam langs gyur pa dang /_/ras ni dmar pos dkris nas ni/_/mchod cing bsrungs nas gzhag par bya/_/
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]de nas gang yang rung ba'i ming /_/btsag gi yug snam de yis su/_/ci 'dod par ni 'dri bar bya/_/sgrub pa po yi ming nas kyang /_/bskul nas dogs pa med par yang /_/bsgrub par bya ba myur du 'ong /_/btsag bsgrub kha ru gsungs pa dag_/mdor bsdus 
[\[9b.2\]]bshad pa de yin no/_/da ni ci ltar rig pa ru/_/sor gdub bsgrub pa sbyor bar bcas/_/cho ga bzhin du gsungs pa dag_/mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/mi yi ro khyer 'gro ba na/_/der song nas ni de yi khar/_/gser gyi sor gdub gzhag par bya/_/mkhas 
[\[9b.3\]]pas khro bo gcig pu'i sngags/_/zlos pas byed de 'dug pa na/_/me yis tshig par gyur pa ni/_/ro yi kha na 'dug pa yi/_/sor gdub lag pa g.yon pas blang /_/nam langs bar du bzlas par bya/_/de nas sor gdub bzang po de/_/lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo la/_/
[\[9b.4\]]mkhas pa dag gis gzhag par bya/_/de yi lag pa g.yon pa yi/_/gang dang gang dag reg 'gyur ba/_/de kun de yi las byed gyur/_/phyi bzhin du yang 'brang bar 'gyur/_/'di la dpyod par yong mi bya/_/de nas gzhan yang yungs kar dag_/shin tu ngo mtshar dang 
[\[9b.5\]]ldan pa/_/khro bo nyid kyi ji lta bar/_/bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba gsungs pa bshad/_/si ta'i shing las gab tshe yang /_/bzang po sor ni brgyad par bya/_/de yi nang du yungs kar dgang /_/dngos grub mchog ni der blugs la/_/zla ba gzas ni zin bar du/_/nyi ma re re bzlas 
[\[9b.6\]]brjod bya/_/dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin bris nas/_/gtor ma rgya chen dag kyang bya/_/gab tse nang gi yungs kar kun/_/sgra 'byung ba'am gas kyi bar/_/de srid yungs kar bzlas par bya/_/de nas yungs kar grub gyur pa/_/blangs nas gang yang rung bar ni/_/cho ga bzhin 
[\[9b.7\]]du sbyar byas nas/_/de yis mi nus ci yang med/_/des ni sa yang 'gas par byed/_/chu klung dag kyang skams par byed/_/ri mtho rnam pa mang po dag_/phye ma dag tu rlog par byed/_/de bzhin ri yi rtse mo yang /_/sbyar na rab tu snyil bar byed/_/khrag dang sol ba'i char dag kyang /_/
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'beb par byed de the tshom med/_/gnam lcags dang ni ser ba dag_/glo bur dag tu 'bab par byed/_/sa g.yo bdag sprin bsdu la/_/rig pa 'dzin pas sbyar byas nas/_/glo bur du yang thogs med 'gyur/_/mtsho dang rgya mtsho g.yo ba dang /_/shing 
[\[10a.2\]]rnams rab tu ldeg pa dang /_/sa yi 'og kyang g.yo byed kyang /_/de bzhin klu rnams bsdigs pa dang /_/mtsho chen dang ni ldeng ka dang /_/klu rnams tshar gcad bya ba dang /_/gzhan yang gang 'dod bya ba yi/_/las ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa/_/gsungs pa dang ni ma gsungs pa/_/
[\[10a.3\]]mkhas pas rang bzhin blos brtags la/_/yungs kar grub pas gtor tsam gyis/_/thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur/_/yungs kar dngos grub kun sbyin pa'i/_/sgrub pa dag ni bsgrubs zin to/_/dpa' bo'i brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/_/de dag la sogs sna tshogs dang /_/
[\[10a.4\]]snga ma bzhin du sna tshogs dang /_/'bring rnams la sogs bsgrub par bya/_/khro bo mchog gi cho ga 'di/_/las ni gang dag bshad pa rnams/_/de dag kun la brtul zhugs ni/_/med par byas na 'bras bu med/_/phyag rgya gnyis kyi las rnams ni/_/gang dag 'dir ni 
[\[10a.5\]]bshad pa rnams/_/brtul zhugs byed ni ma nus na/_/de ltar khro bo mchog 'di la/_/sngon bzhin mchod pa byed pa dang /_/ji skad bshad zin bzlas byas pas/_/las rnams ji skad bstan pa dang /_/dngos grub ji skad bstan pa thob/_/rtag tu bde gshegs sems 
[\[10a.6\]]pa des/_/brtul zhugs rtag tu mi rung na'ang /_/nyin gcig bzhin du bzlas brjod la/_/sbyor bas 'dod pas don rnams 'thob/_/de ltar brtul zhugs kyis bsgrubs dang /_/sgrub pa sna tshogs cho ga 'dir/_/khro bo mchog gis ci gsungs pa/_/ma lus 
[\[10a.7\]]par ni bshad pa yin/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas cho ga phyi mar ni/_/ji ltar brtul zhugs med kyang rung /_/de phyir 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]khro bo bdag nyid kyis/_/gsungs pa de yi cho ga brjod/_/sngags ni yi ge bcu bdun po/_/khro bo zhes ni gang brjod pa/_/de la thog mar ston bzhin du/_/ri mo bris la de mdun du/_/tshul bzhin du ni mchod pa bya/_/mkhas pas yang na sku gzugs kyang /_/byed 
[\[10b.2\]]du bcug ste de 'og tu/_/mkhas pas brgyad 'bum bzlas par bya/_/de yi mtha' mar dkon mchog ni/_/gsum po dag la mchod chen bya/_/de yi 'og tu khro mchog ni/_/ji skad gsungs bzhin mchod pa bya/_/'on kyang grub ste de yi tshe/_/'byung po'i gdon dang dug 
[\[10b.3\]]rnams dang /_/yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa/_/de yis bsam pa'i las kyang nus/_/nam yang dngos grub phran tshegs la/_/de ni sbyar bar mi bya'o/_/dug la sogs te gang brjod pa/_/las kyi rnams ni tshig gis bya/_/gzhan du yengs pa'i tshig gis kyang /_/
[\[10b.4\]]bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin no/_/de bzhin sems can sdang rnams la/_/tshar gcad pa dang phan 'dogs nus/_/gang zhig nag pos zin pa yi/_/las rnams kyang ni byed 'gyur te/_/chu yi nges par gtor ba dang /_/lcag gam yang na rkang pa yis/_/khro bos 
[\[10b.5\]]ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/_/the tshom med par sos par 'gyur/_/de ltar kun tu yid kyis sam/_/yang na tshig gis bskul bar bya/_/ji ltar khros pa med par yang /_/phran tshegs las ni grub 'gyur te/_/dran pa tsam ni 'ba' zhig gis/_/byed pa po yi 
[\[10b.6\]]las de 'grub/_/de nas snod la dbab pa yi/_/las gzhan 'di ni rab tu bya/_/gzhon nu mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/nyes pa'i skyon med yan lag tshang /_/shin tu bkrus te rgyan gyis brgyan/_/ba las byung ba'i lnga yang blud/_/de yi 'og tu smyung byas te/_/
[\[10b.7\]]nam langs pa dang bkrus byas la/_/dri zhim pa yi dris byugs shing /_/gos rnams dang ni rgyan gyis brgyan/_/de ltar mchod pa byas nas ni/_/shar gyi phyogs su kha bstan te/_/cho ga bzhin du ku sha yi/_/stan la bzhag ste de nas ni/_/de yi lag pa gnyis kar 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]yang /_/tsan+dan gtor ma'i me tog sbyin/_/a kar nag po'i bdug pa sbyin/_/des ni myur du sngags brjod de/_/sgrub pa cho ga 'di yis ni/_/snod la dbab pa'i las bya'o/_/snod la dbab 'gyur de yis ni/_/dge dang mi dge dri bar bya/_/de nas byung 
[\[11a.2\]]dang 'byung ba dang /_/byung ba gang yin bden par smra/_/sems can chen po 'di gyis la/_/'di ni min zhes zlog par byed/_/rig sngags chad dam lhag pa dag_/sngags kyang 'dir ni tshang bar byed/_/de nas khro bo mchog de la/_/me tog ldan pa'i mchod yon dbul/_/
[\[11a.3\]]de nas bde gshegs bstan pa yis/_/dam tshig dag kyang bstan par bya/_/snod kyis thos nas de nas su/_/btang nas de ni sa la 'gyel/_/rig pa khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/grub par de nas bzhud par 'gyur/_/de nas snod ni blangs nas su/_/phyis kyang rab tu 
[\[11a.4\]]khrus byas te/_/zan zar bcug la zos nas kyang /_/mchod pa byas te slar gtang ngo /_/ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams kyis/_/snod la dbab par byas nas ni/_/de nas cho ga phyi ma yi/_/cho ga las gsungs las rnams bya/_/de nas gal te sngags pa ni/_/rgyal 
[\[11a.5\]]po dbang du byed 'dod na/_/de tshe ri mo spyan snga ru/_/dur khrod thal bas gzugs bris te/_/de yi snying gar 'dug nas su/_/rtse gcig yid kyis khri bzlas te/_/che ge mo zhig dbang 'gyur nas/_/de yi ming ni snga ma bzhin/_/khro sngags ji skad gsungs pa'i mthar/_/
[\[11a.6\]]sbyar te mjug tu swA hA brjod/_/khro bos dbang du bya ba'i phyir/_/sbyor ba rtag tu bshad pa yin/_/de nas rgyal po dbang gyur nas/_/mdza' sdug skye bo btang nas su/_/bdag nyid dang ni nor dag gis/_/nges par bran bzhin legs par byed/_/de bzhin bzlas pa khri 
[\[11a.7\]]byas na/_/bram ze dag kyang dbang du 'gyur/_/rje'u rigs dmangs rigs ma lus par/_/drug stong dag gis nges par 'gyur/_/bud med rnams dang bu mo la/_/khri dag tu ni bzlas pa bya/_/de nas phan tshun mdza' bo gnyis/_/dbye bar bya bar 'dod na ni/_/de nas 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]gcig gis gzugs brnyan ni/_/de bzhin bris nas snying ga ru/_/rkang pa gcig bzhag tsog pur 'dug_/de yi ming ni mthar sbyar nas/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed bzlas pa/_/che ge mo zhig myur bar ru/_/'di dang dbye 'gyur phaT ces bya/_/de ltar dbye ba bya 'di 
[\[11b.2\]]la/_/stong phrag bcur ni bzlas pa bya/_/de nas sems can rab 'dug par/_/shes nas legs par gdul bya na/_/dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed la/_/khro bos bya yi gzhan du min/_/dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan ming smos nas/_/dur khrod thal bas bris 
[\[11b.3\]]nas su/_/de nas seng ldeng phur bu la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te/_/de yi snying gar btags nas su/_/de yi 'og tu khri bzlas so/_/de nas khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/sngags kyi tha mar ming bcug ste/_/che ge mo zhig sod cig ces/_/hU~M dang phaT 
[\[11b.4\]]kyis mtha' brten te/_/khri dag yongs su tshang bar ni/_/gal te de ltar bzlas byas na/_/las de yis ni 'chi 'gyur te/_/'di la rnam par dpyad mi dgos/_/rtag tu bde gshegs bsam bya yi/_/ngan pa'i sems kyis yong mi bya/_/de yi snying las sdug bsngal dag_/
[\[11b.5\]]bskyed nas 'dag pa ma gtogs so/_/zhi bdag gi cho ga yi/_/de nas zhi ba dge bar bya/_/ci ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi/_/mngon par spyod pa yong mi bya/_/sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/_/bde gshegs bsam pas bya bar bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[11b.6\]]ci gsungs pa'i/_/de bzhin dngos grub thogs med pa'i/_/dngos grub 'dod pas thob 'dod na/_/de ltar khro bo sems mi bya/_/bde gshegs bsam pa gang med pa/_/de nas dngos grub nyams par 'gyur/_/mdor na byang chub sems med pa/_/'jam dpal khro 
[\[11b.7\]]bo gtso bo yis/_/brtul zhugs bzlas pa dang bcas pa/_/rtog las cho ga bzhin gsungs pa'i/_/dngos grub mchog ni nyams par 'gyur/_/gang zhig bde gshegs bsam ldan nas/_/brtul zhugs bzang po med pa dang /_/de bzhin gzugs la sogs 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]med kyang /_/dngos grub mchog rnams des thob cing /_/nyon mongs med par ci 'dod par/_/'dod pa thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/_/gang zhig bde gshegs bsam ldan zhing /_/blo ni ma rmongs brtan pa yis/_/srid pa nyon mongs bgrod dka' rgol/_/
[\[12a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/_/phyag byas nas ni dngos grub mchog_/bde gshegs bsam pa ldan pas 'thob/_/de ltar shes nas de yi tshe/_/bde gshegs lam mchog bstan par bya/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'jig 'gyur ba/_/'jig rten lha ni yong mi bsnyen/_/
[\[12a.3\]]de ltar sems can gdug 'dul ba'i/_/las rnams ji skad gsungs pa yang /_/dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung phyir gyi/_/gzhan du gar yang yong mi sbyar/_/de nas gzhan yang bskrad pa'i las/_/'di dag gar yang rung bar ni/_/de bzhin byed par 'dod pa la/_/de 
[\[12a.4\]]bzhin bar ni bshad par bya/_/de bzhin dur khrod thal ba yis/_/mkhas pas dgra yi gzugs brnyan bri/_/de ste rkang gnyis 'dug nas su/_/'jam dpal khro bo'i spyan sngar ni/_/che ge mo zhig skrod cig ces/_/de yi ming ni mthar sbyar nas/_/de bzhin hU~M dang phaT dag 
[\[12a.5\]]dang /_/hU~M yang brjod de khri bzlas na/_/gdon mi za bar bskrad par 'gyur/_/yang na thal ba de nyid kyis/_/dgra yi gzugs brnyan bri nas ni/_/de yi snying gar rkang g.yon gyis/_/gdon mi za bar brdzis nas su/_/nyi ma la ni kha bltas nas/_/gshin rje'i gshed 
[\[12a.6\]]po bzlas na ni/_/skad cig gis ni dgra bo de/_/rab tu tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs/_/de nas zhi ba'i cho ga yis/_/bdag nyid kyis ni zhi bar bya/_/de ltar ma byas zhag bdun gyis/_/gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/_/bde gshegs 
[\[12a.7\]]sems pas yong mi bya/_/sems can rnams ni thams cad la/_/zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya/_/byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can/_/ring por mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur/_/de nas sems can thams cad ni/_/bde phyir zhi ba'i las rnams dang /_/de bzhin du ni rgyas pa'i 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]las/_/ji skad gsungs pa bshad par bya/_/mchod rten dag gam dkyil 'khor du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bya/_/dkon mchog gsum po dag la ni/_/yang dang yang du phyag kyang bya/_/nyin par dang ni mtshan mo yang /_/dge ba gang dag ci bsags pa/_/
[\[12b.2\]]dkon mchog gsum la de brten nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bsam pas bya/_/'di yis sems can thams cad ni/_/shin tu sdug bsngal bder gyur cig_/de yis dngos grub cung zad gang /_/phra mo dag kyang 'thob gyur pa/_/rtag tu sems can rnams la ni/_/
[\[12b.3\]]mkhas pa dag gis phan par bya/_/mkhas pas mchod rten las bya zhing /_/de bzhin dam pa'i chos kyang bklag_/dge ba cung zad gzhan dag kyang /_/chung ngu zin kyang 'di nyid la/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob 'dod pas/_/rtag tu sems can rnams la bsngo/_/de ltar 'di ni byang chub 
[\[12b.4\]]sems/_/chos kyi don du yul du 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyer bsnyen pa'i/_/mtshan nyid rnams kyang rab tu bstan/_/de ltar blo gros brtan byas nas/_/dge ba dag ni spel bar bya/_/dge ba dag kyang spel nas su/_/sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo/_/sngags 
[\[12b.5\]]pa bde gshegs sems ldan gang /_/de lta bur ni rtag pa ru/_/sems can rnams la phan byas nas/_/zhi ba dag dang rgyas pa 'phel/_/thog mar dkon mchog gsum po la/_/mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas su/_/de yi 'og tu khro bo mchog_/gshin rje gshed la me tog 
[\[12b.6\]]ni/_/dkar po mchog gis mchod pa bya/_/mchod pa byas nas 'di dag tu/_/cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/_/bde zhing stan la bder 'dug la/_/rab tu dang zhing bde gshegs sems/_/de yi ming smos zhi 'gyur zhes/_/khro bo'i tshig gis mthar sbyar te/_/gau ShaT dag 
[\[12b.7\]]kyang tha mar sbyar/_/gang yang rung ba zhig la ni/_/de ltar stong du bzlas pa bya/_/yul dang yul gyi phyogs rnams dang /_/rgyal po dag la nyis 'gyur bya/_/rta rnams dang ni glang po dang /_/ba lang dag la stong du bzlas/_/ra lug dang ni ma he la/_/rtag par stong du 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]bzlas par gsungs/_/yang na lus can thams cad la/_/bzlas pa dag ni byas nas kyang /_/byang chub sems dang ldan pa yi/_/zhi ba'i mchog tu nges par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du yang rgyas gyur pa/_/khyad par du ni me tog mchog_/dkar po tsan+dan gyis 
[\[13a.2\]]bskus pa/_/bzlas shing bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/'jam dpal khro bo'i spyan sngar ni/_/'o mas gang ba'i snod du dbul/_/stong gis rab tu rgyas par 'gyur/_/snying la rab tu dga' 'gyur ba'i/_/rgyas pa de dag bya 'dod na/_/gang yang rung ba de yi ming /_/cho ga 
[\[13a.3\]]bzhin du tha mar sbyar/_/mkhas pas rgyas par gyur cig ces/_/de mthar bshad pa sbyar nas su/_/me tog yid du 'ong ba rnams/_/'o mar blugs pas rgyas par bya/_/de nas gzhan yang dpal 'dod pa/_/der yang snga ma bzhin du ni/_/tsan+dan dkar pos bskus pa yi/_/me 
[\[13a.4\]]tog yid du 'ong bas mchod/_/a kar nag po bzang po yi/_/bdug pa dag kyang sngags kyis dbul/_/nyin re de ltar byas nas su/_/cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/_/dpal ni bdag la stsol cig ces/_/mtha' ma dag tu sbyar nas su/_/de nas na maHswA hAr ldan/_/
[\[13a.5\]]cho ga sngon bzhin khri bzlas te/_/de nas rgya mtsho rab 'gro ba'i/_/klung gi 'gram du song nas ni/_/lte ba nub par chur 'dug nas/_/me tog puN+Da rI ka ni/_/tsan+dan dkar pos bskus nas ni/_/bzlas shing bzlas shing chur 'bul ba/_/blo dang ldan pas 'bul byas na/_/de 
[\[13a.6\]]yi mjug tu dpal chen 'thob/_/yang na pad+ma dmar po ni/_/tsan+dan dmar pos bskus nas ni/_/gal te de ru phul na ni/_/de nas de yi mtha' ma ru/_/las 'di dag gis nges par ni/_/mi zad pa yi gter thob 'gyur/_/a ti muk+ta'i me tog rnams/_/bzlas shing 
[\[13a.7\]]bzlas shing snga ma bzhin/_/gal te chig 'bum phul na ni/_/cho gas gsungs pa bzhin gnas pa'i/_/sngags pas nges par de mthar ni/_/'di nor 'bum ni thob par 'gyur/_/'di la rnam par dpyad mi bya/_/de ste de yi snga ma bzhin/_/sum 'bum dbul bar byas na 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ni/_/gdon mi za bar gnod sbyin ma/_/de yi dbang du 'di 'gyur ro/_/cho ga 'di yis sgrub pa po/_/rin chen dag kyang thob par 'gyur/_/de ste sngags pas snga ma bzhin/_/me tog sna tshogs mang po ni/_/tsan+dan dag gis bskus pa rnams/_/de nas sngags pas chig 'bum du/_/
[\[13b.2\]]chu yi nang du phul na ni/_/sa yi steng na 'dod pa 'thob/_/yang na pad+mo dkar po ni/_/mngar gsum dag gis bskus pa rnams/_/me 'bar nang du legs bsregs na/_/de yis dpa' bo mngon sum mthong /_/de yi de la 'dod mchog dang /_/nor dag kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/
[\[13b.3\]]blo dang ldan pa zas kyi mchog_/mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba dag_/zhag bdun du ni gzar bu yis/_/de yi de la 'dod mchog dang /_/nor dag kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/_/'bar ba'i me la bsregs nas su/_/yul gru bdun rnams rab tu 'thob/_/'di la rnam par dpyad mi 
[\[13b.4\]]dgos/_/yang na 'bru rnams thams cad kyis/_/sbyin sreg don rnams thams cad sgrub/_/sbyin sreg chig 'bum byas pa yis/_/de dag nyid ni mi zad 'gyur/_/bil ba mar gyis bskus pa 'bum/_/me ni rab tu 'bar ba la/_/bsregs nas sa yi bdag po la/_/nor 
[\[13b.5\]]bcas dag ni thob par 'gyur/_/dur ba'i 'jag ma ma grug pa/_/na maHswA hA mthar ldan pas/_/'o ma las bsnyugs bsreg na ni/_/mi yi tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin mar dang sbrang rtsi dag_/'bar ba'i me la rtag tu bsreg_/gdon mi za bar myur ba ru/_/yid 
[\[13b.6\]]gzhungs par yang thob par 'gyur/_/rgya skyegs shing gi me dag la/_/de bzhin nyin re mar gyi hom/_/byas na tshe dang yid gzhungs grags/_/rgyas dang stobs dang gzi brjid dang /_/dran dang dga' dang mdangs bzang dang /_/dpal dang sems dpa'i dngos grub dag_/'thob par 
[\[13b.7\]]'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/de bzhin zas rnams kun bsregs pas/_/gzi dang rgyas dang stobs dang grags/_/'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/_/thob par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/ci ltar cho ga phyi ma las/_/phal cher 'jam dbyangs khro bo yi/_/pad+ma'i zhal nas nges 'byung 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ba/_/de dag mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo gshin rje'i gshed rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo kun gyi phyi ma las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi khro bo'i cho ga zhib mo phyi ma rim par phye ba ste dgu pa 
[\[14a.2\]]rtog pa phyi ma rdzogs so//_//de nas cho ga thams cad kyi/_/phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba/_/sbyor bar bcas shing rgyas pa yi/_/cho ga da ni bshad par bya/_/yi ge bcu bdun sngags kyis ni/_/dpa' bo brtul zhugs bzang po dang /_/de bzhin sngon du bsnyen 
[\[14a.3\]]la sogs/_/cho ga dag ni 'dir bshad zin/_/da ni yi ge 'bru gcig pa/_/sngags mchog dag ni gang gsungs pa/_/de yi las kyi cho ga bshad/_/dpa' bo brtul zhugs med par yang /_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo gang /_/ming ni gshin rje'i gshed ces bya/_/
[\[14a.4\]]de yi snying po mchog de ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i yi ge gcig_/thog mar o~M bzhag cho ga bzhin/_/ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su/_/'di ni 'bum phrag bcur bzlas na/_/de yi 'og tu sgrub la 'jug_/de nas de yi ri mo mchog_/don rnams thams cad sgrub pa 
[\[14a.5\]]gzhan/_/gang gis dngos grub rab thob pa/_/tshul bzhin du ni rab tu bshad/_/ras ni sar pa khru gang tsam/_/legs par bkrus shing dris bskus la/_/tshon rtsi bzang po sbyin med pas/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed bri bya/_/zhal ni bgrad cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/
[\[14a.6\]]smin ma ser zhing spu yang ser/_/char sprin nag po'i kha dog 'dra/_/thod pa dag gis brgyan du byas/_/spyan gsum dbu yang gyen du brdzes/_/zhal gcig pa la mdangs kyang gsal/_/phyag gnyis pa la be con bsnams/_/phyag g.yon pas ni bsdigs par 
[\[14a.7\]]mdzad/_/zhabs kyang rab tu bzang po gnyis/_/ma he la ni chibs par bya/_/stag lpags na bza' man bas par dgyes/_/'khrugs cing 'jigs pa'i gsung yang 'byin/_/yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/'od zer 'bar ba bcas pa'i sku/_/de nas 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]de la mkhas pa yis/_/mchod pa yan lag mchog gis mchod/_/sngags pa brtul zhugs brtan pa ni/_/de yi 'og tu brag phug zhugs/_/ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su/_/kha zas za ba dag spangs nas/_/ri dbang de ni ji tsam du/_/g.yo bar 'gyur gyi bar du 
[\[14b.2\]]bzlas/_/yang na khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/bzhad dam g.yos kyi bar du bzlas/_/yang na rab tu 'bar gyi bar/_/bzlas na de tshe dngos grub 'thob/_/de ltar lha ni bzlas pa yis/_/dngos grub ya mtshan de bzhin no/_/de nas rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan/_/grub 
[\[14b.3\]]par 'dod rnams kun bsgrubs pa/_/ci bsams pa ni de dag kun/_/ring por mi thogs 'byor par 'gyur/_/khros nas yang 'gas par 'gyur/_/chu dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/_/ri rnams thams cad [(]brnyil [,]bsnyil [)]bar nus/_/rgya mtsho dag kyang skems par byed/_/
[\[14b.4\]]de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/_/ya mtshan chen po thams cad dang /_/sems can rnams ni thams cad la/_/phan pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed/_/cho ga snga ma gsungs pa kun/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin du bsgrub/_/bsgrubs nas sems can thams cad la/_/'bras bu mchog 
[\[14b.5\]]rnams sbyin par bya/_/grub pa'i mthu ni gang yod pa/_/bde gshegs bsam na de dag kun/_/'jungs pa med pa'i bsam pa yis/_/skye bo phongs pa rnams la sbyin/_/snying rje can gyis bdag gi lus/_/phongs pa dag la rtag tu sbyin/_/de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/dri ma 
[\[14b.6\]]med par bsgrubs nas su/_/dge ba 'di yis sems can kun/_/bde bar gshegs ldan dge bar 'gyur/_/bde ba thams cad yongs rdzogs shing /_/dge ba kun kyi snod gyur ces/_/yid kyis yongs su bsngo bar bya/_/gang zhig de ltar sngags bsgrubs kyang /_/dri ma med 
[\[14b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems/_/bde ba rtag tu spyod pa de/_/dngos grub rtog las gang gsungs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung /_/thams cad de la nye bar gnas/_/sgrub pa po de rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/yon tan kun dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de ltar 'jam dpal khro bo yi/_/
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]zhal nas gsungs pa'i cho ga ni/_/khro bo rnam rgyal rgya cher bstan/_/cho ga thams cad bsdus pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyi cho ga zhib mo khro bo thams cad rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo bsdus pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi cho ga zhib mo phyi ma'i 
[\[15a.2\]]yang phyi ma rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o//_//'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo yi/_/yi ge gcig pa bshad zin te/_/de nas gzhan yang de yi ni/_/cho ga zhib tu rgya cher bshad/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa yi/_/zhal ni hU~M zhes bya bar bshad/_/de nas 'jam dpal khro 
[\[15a.3\]]bo ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba mchog rig bya/_/de yi dkyil 'khor gzhan yin te/_/'dod pa kun sbyin shes par bya/_/dur khrod gnas su bya ba ste/_/dur khrod gnas pa gang yin pa'o/_/khru brgyad las ni sgo bzhi pa/_/yang na khru bzhi pa yang rung /_/dur khrod gnas pa bzang po ste/_/
[\[15a.4\]]dur khrod thal bas bri bar bya/_/de yi dbus su [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ni/_/phreng ba dag gis brgyan pa bri/_/sgor ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ro smad gzhag_/mtha' ma dag tu mgo bo gzhag_/grwa bzhir shU la bzhi rnams dang /_/thod pa dag kyang bri bar bya/_/gal te bri bar nus na ni/_/mkhas pas 
[\[15a.5\]]de dag thal bas bri/_/de ste de dag ri mo ni/_/bri ba dag tu mi nus na/_/de tshes gzhi bzang po la/_/tsan+dan dmar pos bskus nas su/_/dur khrod gnas su dang por ni/_/sngags pas yi ge dgod par bya/_/de nas gshin rje rab 'joms pa/_/de ru spyan drangs mchod par 
[\[15a.6\]]bya/_/'jigs pa'i zhal ni 'bar ba drug_/de bzhin zhabs kyang drug dang ldan/_/spyan gsum char sprin sngon po'i mdog_/phyag kyang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag gis brgyan/_/khro bo gshin rje rab 'joms pa/_/gzig lpags na bzar gsol bar dgyes/_/mtshon cha bzang po du ma 
[\[15a.7\]]bsnams/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]steng du mchod pa bya/_/'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/cho ga bzhin du mchod nas kyang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/_/'o ma 'bras thug gtor mar dbul/_/a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul/_/mar me dag ni mar las bya/_/de nas 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]gshin rje rab 'joms pa'i/_/sa bon yi ge gcig pa 'di/_/khro bo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su/_/stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/de yi 'og tu mkhas pa yis/_/dur khrod gnas su slob ma bzung /_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed byed pa/_/hU~M gi zhal ni zlos 
[\[15b.2\]]shing gzung /_/btsud nas de yi snying gar ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba gzhag par bya/_/de nas shU la'i phyag rgya ni/_/ras kyis g.yogs te bcing bar bya/_/slob ma dag la legs bstan nas/_/de yang mchod pa byed du gzhug_/de nas gshin rje rab 'joms pa'i/_/khro bo 
[\[15b.3\]]mngon par dbang bskur nas/_/'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/de yi yi ge 'bru gcig sbyin/_/de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/_/khro bo de ni gshegs su gsol/_/shU la phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/de bzhin rtag par gshegs su gsol/_/khro bo spyan ni drang 
[\[15b.4\]]ba dag_/shU la'i phyag rgya ldan par bya/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas/_/shU la rab tu bstan par bya/_/mkhas pas lag pa gnyis dag gis/_/sor mo phan tshun bsnol nas su/_/gung mo'i sor mo mchog gnyis ni/_/dbus nas gyen du sgreng nas 
[\[15b.5\]]bzhag_/srin lag gnyis ni nang du bcug_/mdzub mo gnyis kyi nang du bzhag_/de ltar de gnyis bsgreng nas ni/_/lhag ma rnams ni legs par bya/_/gshin rje'i gshed kyi phyag rgya 'di/_/shU la'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'o/_/'di yi las rnams thams cad 
[\[15b.6\]]ni/_/rnam par dpyad pa med par bya/_/de nas gzhan yang rim pa bzhin/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/_/sngags rnams thams cad ma lus pa/_/dkyil 'khor 'dir ni smra bar bya/_/o~M hU~M triHdbus kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi'o/_/o~M hU~M la~M lA ha/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]phreng ba'o/_/o~M 
[\[15b.7\]]hU~M dzri traH_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ro smad de sgo bzhi car du'o/_/o~M hU~M hAH_/'og ste tha mar ro/_/o~M hU~M hrIHSh+T+rIHkha/_shU la bzhi car gyi'o/_/o~M hU~M hri haHthod pa rnams kyi'o/_/lho phyogs kyi ni sgo phye nas/_/lhag ma gzhan ni gcad par bya/_/dur khrod gnas su rtag pa ru/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]par ni/_/sngags rnams kyis ni rab brgyan na/_/dur khrod kyi ni gnas su 'gyur/_/tsan+dan dmar pos bskus pa yi/_/sa gzhi khru gang tsam la ni/_/ji lta bur yang gang yang rung /_/dkyil 'khor dag ni bris nas su/_/dkyil nas cho ga shes pa yis/_/
[\[16a.2\]]sngags kyis mchod pa rim bzhin bya/_/o~M hU~M hrIHSh+T+rIHA gats+tsha ya yaM phraM tha na swA hA/_spyan drang ba'o/_/o~M hU~M hri kA laM thA na hA/_mchod yon gyi sngags so/_/o~M hU~M hrIHSh+T+rIHkhuM kha/_dri'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ka ra la ra na ha haH/_me tog gi sngags so/_/o~M hU~M 
[\[16a.3\]]tri/_hU~M pa shi kha hA/_bdug pa'i sngags so/_/o~M dzraM dzri hAH/_mar me'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M khang ka kha/_gtor ma'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M swA hA/_khro bo'i snying po'o/_/o~M hU~M hrIHSh+T+rIHgadz+dza hU~M pu na rA ga ma nA ya swA hA/_slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/_/
[\[16a.4\]]'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yig 'bru gcig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas de yi ri mo'i mchog_/sgrub pa po yis bri 
[\[16a.5\]]bar bya/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'i/_/bzlas pa'i las ni rab tu bya/_/ras phran khru gang tsam po ni/_/bzang pos ra pa bkrus pa la/_/tshon rtsi dkar po spyin med pas/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa bri/_/zhal drug dbu yang gyen du brdzes/_/de yang spyan 
[\[16a.6\]]gsum 'jigs 'jigs ltar/_/khros pa'i phyag kyang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_/zhabs rnams rab tu gsal ba drug_/gzig gi pags pa na bzar gsol/_/tshul bzhin [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]steng na bzhugs/_/shU la ral gri 'khor lo dang /_/dgra sta mchog kyang sbyin pa'i phyag_/lcags 
[\[16a.7\]]mda' be con rdo rje dang /_/mda' bo che yang bsnams pa ni/_/g.yas pa'i phyag ste g.yon pa na/_/dbyug to zhags pa gshol dang gzhu/_/thod pa lcags kyu mdung thung dang /_/rtse gsum gdengs dang de bzhin bsdigs/_/de ltar ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs/_/bung ba dang 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ni sprin 'dra ba/_/bris nas de yang legs par sba/_/yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu/_/bzhag nas bzlas pa dag kyang bya/_/bzlas pa'i cho ga 'dir bshad do/_/rig pa 'dzin pas rtag pa ru/_/'bar ba'i sngags kyis khrus bya'o/_/bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngags 
[\[16b.2\]]kyis ni/_/thog mar tshul bzhin kha bkrus nas/_/bdag gi lus la sngags shes pas/_/de nas bsrung ba legs par bya/_/de yi 'og tu cho ga bzhin/_/mkhas pas khro bo'i khang par 'jug_/zhugs nas ku sha las byas pa'i/_/stan bzang de la 'dug nas 
[\[16b.3\]]su/_/de nas cho ga sngon gsungs pas/_/khro bo la ni mchod par bya/_/lag pa gnyis ni dris bskus pas/_/sngags kyi nor bu blangs nas su/_/nyes pa'i skyon dag sbyang ba'i phyir/_/khro bo bdud rtsi lan bdun bzlas/_/de nas sngags pa khro bo la/_/mngon par phyogs 
[\[16b.4\]]'dug bzlas par bya/_/rab tu dang zhing rtse gcig yid/_/yid ni mi skyo bar du bya/_/de nas mkhas pas bzlas pa'i mthar/_/khro bo gshin rje rab 'joms pa/_/shU la'i phyag rgya bcings gshegs gsol/_/de ltar legs par nyin re bzhin/_/yi ge gcig pa'i 
[\[16b.5\]]sngags 'di ni/_/rnam pa kun tu cho ga bzhin/_/gang zhig bye ba gcig zlos pa/_/de yis dngos grub dam pa thob/_/de nas gzhan yang ci bstan pa'i/_/khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/_/cho ga dag gi sngags rnams ni/_/bsgrub pa rnams la phan phyir bshad/_/o~M hU~M dIp+ta te dzA 
[\[16b.6\]]swA hA/_khrus kyi sngags so/_/o~M hU~M a mr-i ta pra b+ha baM ba/_kha bkru ba'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M sarba ho rak+Sha man ta thA ga tA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_bsrung ba'i sngags so/_/o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhU~M many+ju g+ho Sha dz+nyA yA sarba duSh+TaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/_gdug pa rnams bcing ba'o/_/na maH
[\[16b.7\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhU~M d+h+r-ika prA kAM raM phaT/_ra ba'i sngags so/_/o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ya ma pra ma tha na rak+Sha rak+Sha/_na maHsarba b+hu ta b+ha ye b+h+yaHta thA ga to dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_'di ni yan lag thams cad bsrung ba'o/_/o~M hU~M kA la ma tha na phaT/_khro bo'i 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]khang par 'jug pa'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M swA hA/_gdan gyi sngags so/_/o~M hU~M si t+ya de hU~M dzra~M dzra~M/_sngags kyi nor bu blang ba'i sngags so/_/o~M hU~M krod+ha a mr-i ta dza gad pra b+ha swA hA/_sngags kyi nor bu la gdab pa'i sngags so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[17a.2\]]gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ri mo dang mchod pa dang bzlas pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni/_/bye ba gcig tu nges par bshad/_/
[\[17a.3\]]khro bo brtul zhugs phyis spyad na/_/dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/_/shing las byas pa'i thod pa ni/_/nyi shu rtsa drug sor tshad byas/_/mkhas pas rtse gsum rnon po ni/_/lag pa g.yas dang g.yon du bzung /_/gzig lpags kyi ni gos bgos nas/_/lus ni 
[\[17a.4\]]thal ba dag gis bsku/_/rus pa dag gi phreng ba yis/_/rgyan du byas nas brtul zhugs spyad/_/'jig rten 'jig par byed pa yi/_/gad mo sgra chen dag kyang 'byin/_/dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam/_/ri 'am yang na tshal yang rung /_/mkhas pas zla ba drug tu 
[\[17a.5\]]ni/_/lci ba bza' zhing brtul zhugs spyad/_/blo ldan grong du yong mi 'jug_/mnyam par bzhag cing tshig mi smra/_/gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dul/_/rtag tu bde gshegs sems dang ldan/_/byang chub sems dang kun ldan zhing /_/khro bo'i brtul zhugs gang spyod cing /_/
[\[17a.6\]]rtag tu bzlas la brtson byed pa/_/de ni dngos grub mchog 'thob 'gyur/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/_/dngos grub gzhan du yong mi 'gyur/_/gang tshe 'di yi brtul zhugs ni/_/bsnyen par bya bar mi nus na/_/de tshe lci ba za zhing ni/_/tshul bzhin bye ba gsum du 
[\[17a.7\]]bzlas/_/bzlas pa byas pa'i tha mar yang /_/mkhas pas mchod pa rgya cher bya/_/de nas sna ma'i me tog stong /_/ri mo dag la phog par dbul/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i legs pa ru/_/de yi phog bar phul nas ni/_/gang tshe rab tu 'bar gyur pa/_/de tshe ri mo 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]de yis ni/_/nam mkhar 'phar bar gdon mi za/_/de nas rig 'dzin thams cad kyi/_/mchog tu 'gyur te thog mar 'gro/_/'on te phog par phul na ni/_/rab tu g.yo bar gyur na ni/_/cho ga zhib las bshad pa bzhin/_/de la dngos grub 'bring du 'gyur/_/de ste 
[\[17b.2\]]rab tu mi g.yo bar/_/ri mo rang bzhin du 'dug la/_/dngos grub tha ma thob par 'gyur/_/ci ltar 'bras bu rnam gsum bshad/_/lus ni nyon mongs spyad pa las/_/dngos grub rnam gsum 'thob par 'gyur/_/brtul zhugs smyung la rab tu 'bad/_/yang na chu 
[\[17b.3\]]yi klung dag bza'/_/ci la ma chags phyugs gcin btung /_/byang chub sems dang kun ldan na/_/de tshe dngos grub dam pa thob/_/rig pa'i mchog kun bsgrubs pa la/_/dngos grub mchog dang 'bring rnams dang /_/tha ma dag gis bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/
[\[17b.4\]]'di dag sbyin ni bsgrub bstan yin/_/gang tshe dngos grub mchog rnams dang /_/'bring yang gal te mi 'dod la/_/longs spyod rtag tu 'dod na ni/_/de tshe rtag par bzlas par bya/_/'di yi cho ga gzhan dag kyang /_/de nas mdor ni bshad par bya/_/sa gzhi rab 
[\[17b.5\]]tu mdangs dga' ba/_/lci ba bzang po bskus pa la/_/der ni tsan+dan dmar po yis/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni mkhas pas bya/_/de yang bzang po khru gang tsam/_/rab tu mnyam zhing yid du 'ong /_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i gang /_/dkyil 'khor dur khrod gnas 
[\[17b.6\]]gsungs pa/_/de nas der ni sngags dag ni/_/dkyil 'khor mchog de byas nas ni/_/de yi 'og tu sngags rig pas/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i las dag gis/_/ci 'byor pa dang ci nus kyis/_/khro bo la ni mchod par bya/_/nyi ma re re cho ga bzhin/_/bzlas pa 
[\[17b.7\]]dag kyang stong du bya/_/de ltar rtag tu byas pa yis/_/'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang /_/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/de yi dgra yang med par 'gyur/_/nad med 'gyur bar gdon mi za/_/de yi longs 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/_/gang zhig rtag par cho ga 'dis/_/gshin rje'i gshed ni zlos byed na/_/de las de yi dbang po dang /_/g.yo dang mi g.yo 'jig rten rnams/_/byang chub sems ldan de yi ni/_/dbang 
[\[18a.2\]]du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang brtul zhugs kyis/_/
[\[18a.3\]]bsgrub pa'i las rnams bshad par bya/_/dngos grub mchog rnams thams cad ni/_/gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/_/brtul zhugs dag ni 'di nyid kyis/_/rnam pa kun tu bsgrub par bya/_/phal cher dngos grub mchog rnams ni/_/brtul zhugs med pas mi 'grub 
[\[18a.4\]]ste/_/de bas gshin rje 'joms pa yi/_/brtul zhugs spyad pa byas nas su/_/dngos grub mchog rnams legs par bsgrub/_/mkhas pas gzhan la ma yin no/_/ji skad bstan pa'i mtshon cha rnams/_/rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/sngags rig sbyor 
[\[18a.5\]]ba snga ma bzhin/_/de dag rtag tu legs par bsgrub/_/de la 'dir ni rtog pa ru/_/dur khrod gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin pa/_/bye brag tu ni logs shig gsungs/_/ral gri sa 'og ro langs dang /_/mig 'phrul any+dza gi'u 
[\[18a.6\]]wang dang /_/yungs kar ba bla btsag rnams dang /_/gzhan yang las dag ci 'dod dang /_/mi snang ba dang rkang mgyogs dang /_/gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len/_/gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrub pa dang /_/klu yi bu mo la sogs bsgrub/_/dgug pa'i cho ga 
[\[18a.7\]]dam pa yi/_/bud med dam pa spyad bsgrub pa/_/rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga yis/_/tshul bzhin gnas nas bsgrub pa bya/_/de las 'di ni khro bo 'di/_/yi ge 'bru gcig khyad par bshad/_/de nas ji skad gsungs bstan kun/_/ma smos pa yang bsgrub par 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]bya/_/'jam dpal khro bo'i snying po 'di/_/hU~M zhes bya ba rgyas pa ste/_/'di ni rtsa ba'i cho ga yin/_/bsdu ba yongs su bsgrags pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las khro bo gshin rje'i gshed kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga 
[\[18b.2\]]zhib mo bsdus pa rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//rtog pa mdo ru bsdus pa dang /_/rgyas pa dag tu bshad pa dang /_/brtul zhugs dang ni nges pa yi/_/de nas khro bo gzi can gyi/_/zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags/_/bzlas pa tsam gyis grub pa ni/_/
[\[18b.3\]]gsang ba mdo ru bshad par bya/_/brtul zhugs spyad dang brtul zhugs dka'/_/de dag 'di la yong med de/_/lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang /_/las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/o~M na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/_ya ma bram tha 
[\[18b.4\]]rak+Sha rak+Sha/_mA~M sarba b+hU ta b+ha ye b+h+yaHta thA ga tAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gsum 'di/_/khro bo bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub/_/dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod/_/de ni rtag par bzlas na ni/_/dngos grub thams 
[\[18b.5\]]cad ster bar bshad/_/dur khrod gnas su rtag par ni/_/rtag tu zlos pa cho ga 'dis/_/lha dang lha min dri za dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po klu yi rigs/_/dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu/_/de yi gzis ni 'byer bar 'gyur/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed mdzad pa/_/
[\[18b.6\]]zhal drug hU~M gi sngags 'di ni/_/gang zhig zlos par byed pa ni/_/'gro dang mi 'gro 'jig rten na/_/de la dka' ba cung zad med/_/zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags/_/shU la phyag rgya ldan pa ni/_/khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud 'di la/_/de ni grub par rab tu bsgrags/_/dur 
[\[18b.7\]]khrod gnas su cho ga bzhin/_/de yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni/_/thog ma nyid du chig 'bum bya/_/de nas rtag pa'i cho gar spyad/_/rtag par spyod pa'i cho ga yis/_/de nas chig 'bum bzlas nas kyang /_/de 'og ji skad gsungs pa yis/_/las rnams kyi ni bsgrub la 'jug_/
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga yi/_/de nas thams cad las grub par/_/zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba yi/_/cho ga 'dir ni mdor bshad pa/_/'jam dpal las byung khro bo ni/_/hU~M zhes bya ba'i zhal nyid yin/_/gshin rje'i gshed ces bya bar grags/_/
[\[19a.2\]]'di la dka' ba ci yang med/_/khro bo'i zhal nas mdo ru ni/_/cho ga bzang po gcig gsungs pa'i/_/cho ga de bzhin bdag gis bshad/_/zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba 'dis/_/hU~M zhes bya ba drug du bsgrags/_/de bzhin gzhan yang rtog pa ru/_/hU~M gi mtha' ni bskul ba 
[\[19a.3\]]bya/_/hU~M tra~M shU la'i phyag rgyar ldan/_/ri rnams kun kyang 'gas par byed/_/hU~M tri rab tu sbyar na ni/_/myur du ras kyang gas par 'gyur/_/hU~M tshig rig sngags thams cad dang /_/mtshon cha rnams ni gcod par bshad/_/shU la'i phyag rgya dang ldan par/_/hU~M kha rtag 
[\[19a.4\]]par rab sbyar nas/_/sdang ba rnams ni za ba dang /_/dgra yi dpung dag rab tu 'jig_/hU~M ga rab tu sbyar na ni/_/glang po gnon pa rab tu bsgrags/_/hU~M tha mtshon cha kun 'phel tshe/_/lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed/_/hU~M ha dpung rnams 'jig pa dang /_/rmongs par byed 
[\[19a.5\]]pa yongs su bsgrags/_/hU~M gra rab tu sbyar na ni/_/phan tshun mtshon cha 'khrug par byed/_/hU~M a rab tu sbyar na ni/_/slar yang thar bar byed pa yin/_/hU~M ga glang po seng ge dang /_/rta dang mi dang bya rnams dang /_/gru dang shing rta'i bzhon pa dang /_/'bab chu dag kyang myur bar 
[\[19a.6\]]'dir/_/shU la'i phyag rgyar ldan byas na/_/gnod par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/hU~M ba rab tu sbyar na ni/_/mnan pa rtag tu thar bar byed/_/hU~M d+ha~M rab tu sbyar na ni/_/lha dang lha min gzhan yang 'grub/_/dngos grub phra mo thams cad la/_/bskul na de yi 'bras bur 
[\[19a.7\]]'gyur/_/hU~M ba~M kun tu dbang byed pa/_/tha mar ra bzhag dbye bar byed/_/ta dang sbyar na sdang bar byed/_/ma dang sbyar ba gsod par byed/_/ya dang sbyar na de bzhin gsod/_/la dang sbyar na mig 'phrul byed/_/zhi dang rgyas la 'ba' zhig go/_/de la sogs pa gzhan rnams 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]kyang /_/rtsa ba'i cho gas sbyar bar bya/_/de nas ji skad gsungs pa yi/_/las rnams kyis ni bsgrub par bya/_/de ltar gshin rje'i gshed 'di yi/_/dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/_/'di ni khro bo rnam rgyal gyi/_/rtog pa'i yi ge gcig pa gang /_/'jam 
[\[19b.2\]]dpal khro bo gtso bo yi/_/gsang ba gzhan dag bshad pa yin/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed zhal drug hU~M zhes bya ba las byung ba'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[19b.3\]]cho ga zhib rgyas pa/_/gshin rje'i gshed po gcig po yi/_/cho ga kun gyi mchog dang rab/_/don grub ces pa bshad par bya/_/de la rig 'dzin dpal ldan pas/_/las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/mnyam gzhag byang chub sems ldan pas/_/thog mar dkyil 
[\[19b.4\]]'khor bri bar bya/_/mtsho 'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/_/gcong rong dur khrod du yang rung /_/de dang der ni sa brtags nas/_/me tog sil ma dag gis brgyan/_/dpa' bo gcig pa'i sngags 'bar bas/_/me lce 'bar bas 'khrug byas te/_/sa dang skyu ru ra la 
[\[19b.5\]]sogs/_/bsangs nas khrus la brtsam par bya/_/rig 'dzin khrus byas gtsang ma yi/_/de nas sngags des thams cad ni/_/bdag gi lus la dgod par bya/_/khro mig dmar por gyur pa yi/_/de nas sa phyogs gtsang ma ni/_/phyag dar zang zing yongs spangs 
[\[19b.6\]]pa/_/bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_/gsang sngags zlos shing blta bar bya/_/de nas khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/dpa' bo gcig pu'i sngags zlos shing /_/dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi bar/_/dur khrod thal bas bri bar bya/_/nub phyogs sgo gdong sgo bzhi 
[\[19b.7\]]par/_/de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/_/be con phyag rgya rtse 'bar ba/_/grwa bzhi dag tu bri bar bya/_/'di ni be con mang po yin/_/shU la can gyi shU la mang /_/mdung thung rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/_/de bzhin mdung thung mang zhes bya/_/de bzhin thod pa mang po yin/_/
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]mi ro dang ldan mi ro mang /_/mi ro mi sdug mgo med pa/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'bar dang srin por ldan/_/phyogs bcu kun nas 'jigs pa can/_/de nas dur khrod mang zhes bya/_/gshin rje'i gshed po dpa' bo yi/_/dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug tu bshad/_/de la be con 
[\[20a.2\]]mang po ni/_/longs spyod thams cad 'phel bar bshad/_/shU la mang po srin rnams ni/_/'joms pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin/_/de bzhin mdung thung mang po ni/_/bgegs rnams thams cad tshar gcod pa'o/_/thod pa mang zhes bya ba rnams/_/'khrul 'khor thams cad rab tu 
[\[20a.3\]]'jig_/ri mo mang po zhes bya ba/_/ro langs thams cad bsgrub pa'o/_/dur khrod mang po rab grags pa/_/dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin pa'o/_/de la pad+ma'i dbus su ni/_/'jam pa'i dpal gyi khro bo'i mchog_/gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba de/_/cho ga bzhin du 
[\[20a.4\]]bzhugs par bsam/_/in+d+ra nI la bcag 'phro'i mdog_/zhal drug spyan yang 'jigs par gzigs/_/khros shing zhal yang bgrad pa ste/_/'jigs 'jigs blta la 'jigs par gnon/_/spyan gsum skra yang gyen du brdzes/_/tshems kyis sgros mnan 
[\[20a.5\]]'jigs 'jigs lta/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad phyag ni dran par bya/_/zhabs kyang rab tu 'bar ba drug_/mi ro mgo med phreng ba yis/_/se ral kha yi rgyan du byas/_/mdung thung tho ba zhags pa yi/_/ral gri lcags kyu mtshon cha thogs/_/shU la rdo rje dbyug to dang /_/be con mtshon cha 
[\[20a.6\]]rnams dang ni/_/de ltar g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams/_/g.yon pas bsdigs shing dril bu dang /_/thod pa bzang po kha T+wA~M ga/_/mi mgo rlon dang keng rus dang /_/'jigs pa'i mi ro dbyug to 'bar/_/de dag phyag na rtag tu thogs/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni/_/
[\[20a.7\]]shi ba'i ro yi steng na bzhugs/_/'jigs pa mtshon gdangs 'jigs 'jigs lta/_/dur khrod na ni rtag tu bzhugs/_/sbrul dang srin po thams cad 'joms/_/lha rnams kun gyis phyag byas shing /_/khro bo thams cad legs par 'dud/_/sku ni rab tu 'bar ba can/_/
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'khrug cing rab tu za ba rnams/_/stag lpags na bza' mnabs par dgyes/_/'jig rten lha ni khro bo rnams/_/mtshon cha dang ni mthu spangs nas/_/rjes su 'brang zhing phyag byas pa'i/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed dran bya/_/de ltar 'jigs med byas nas su/_/bdag 
[\[20b.2\]]gi sngags kyis dran byas nas/_/spyan drangs tsan+dan gyis bskus nas/_/me tog mang pos mchod par bya/_/rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa yis/_/tsan+dan dmar po dbul bar bya/_/bdug pa dang ni gtor ma yis/_/rim pa bzhin du mchod nas ni/_/slob ma khro bo'i sngags 
[\[20b.3\]]dag dang /_/sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dag gis/_/btsud nas me tog 'dor du gzhug_/de nas rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan/_/bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas nas su/_/phreng ba tsan+dan dkar la sogs/_/mchod pa byas nas slob ma la/_/de nas sangs rgyas spyan yang bzlas/_/
[\[20b.4\]]khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni/_/'jigs pa pha rol gnon pa sbyin/_/lha khyod bdag gis mnos so zhes/_/de skad slob mas lan gsum smras/_/de nas sngags rig cho ga bzhin/_/bla ma dag la phyag byas nas/_/cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur bas/_/khro bo gshin 
[\[20b.5\]]rje'i gshed po bzlas/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang gshin rje yi/_/gshed po'i sngags 'di mnos nas su/_/mi ro dag 
[\[20b.6\]]gi gos blangs nas/_/de la de yi gzugs kyang bri/_/de nas tshon rtsi spyin med pas/_/bzang pos snga ma bzhin du bya/_/bzang po khru gang tshad du bya/_/yang na khru bzhi'i tshad du bya/_/gang tshe sngags pa bdag nyid kyis/_/bri bar mi nus de yi tshe/_/bzo bo smyang ba byas pa ni/_/
[\[20b.7\]]khrims mnos pa dag 'dri ru gzhug_/shi ba'i ro yi steng du bzhugs/_/phyag ni [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams kyis brgyan/_/zhal drug zhabs kyang drug tu bstan/_/'jigs pa gnon pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/_/kha cig bzhad cing kha cig ni/_/ljags 'dril kha cig mche 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]ba gtsigs/_/kha cig zhal gdangs kha cig khros/_/kha cig 'jigs pa pha rol gnon/_/khro bo de 'dra'i zhal 'dra ba/_/smin mtshams ser la spyan yang ser/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams/_/phyag na bsnams pa bri bar bya/_/dben zhing 
[\[21a.2\]]'du 'dzi med pa ru/_/sngags pas de ltar 'drir gzhug go/_/de ltar bris nas sngags mkhan de/_/ri mo la ni bltas nas 'dug_/cho ga shes pas 'bum bzlas te/_/ri mo bris pas de nyid kyis/_/de nas bsgrub la 'jug par bya/_/gshin rje'i gshed po de yi sngags/_/
[\[21a.3\]]drag po gang yin de bshad do/_/oM ni de yi dbang po yin/_/a zhes bya ba gnyis pa yin/_/kro zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/_/d+he zhes bya ba bzhi pa yin/_/ka zhes bya ba lnga pa yin/_/ya zhes bya ba gsang ba drug_/mAn zhes bya ba bdun pa ste/_/ta ni brgyad par shes par 
[\[21a.4\]]bya/_/ka ni dgu ste hU~M dang bcu/_/de bzhin phaT bya lhag pa ste/_/mi mnyam sngags ni bcu gcig pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyi ni khro bo mchog_/gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba de/_/cho ga phyi ma'i phyi ma ste/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon bstod pa'i/_/sngags de de ltar mnos 
[\[21a.5\]]nas su/_/cho ga mnos nas bzlas byas na/_/rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur/_/o~M a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka hU~M phaT/_/gshin rje'i gshed po lha'i lha'o/_/o~M a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_/sarba big+ha nAn+ta krit+ta na hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/_bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi'o/_/o~M bud+d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA/_
[\[21a.6\]]sangs rgyas spyan gyi'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bzlas pa yi/_/gnas dag ji ltar yin par bshad/_/dur khrod yang na ri yang rung /_/tshang tshing pad+ma'i mtsho 'gram du/_/khro zhing gshin rje'i gshed po ni/_/bzlas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/ku sha'i rtswa yi stan la 'dug_/
[\[21a.7\]]ri mo la ni phyogs 'dug ste/_/lag pa gnyis ka dris bskus nas/_/ru drAk+Sha yi phreng thogs la/_/sngags pas rtag tu bzlas par bya/_/de bzhin bdug pa ar+g+ha dbul/_/myur ba dang ni bul ba dang /_/de bzhin yi ge 'dres par ni/_/nam yang smra bar yod mi bya/_/rtag tu 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rab tu gsal bar smras/_/cho ga bzhin du yid bsams nas/_/bu don la ni sems bzhag ste/_/skye ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/yi ge [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bzlas/_/'bum gcig bzlas pa'i tha ma ni/_/bsgrub par bya ba bshad kyis nyon/_/mtsho yi 'gram du dkyil 'khor ni/_/
[\[21b.2\]]dur khrod mang po bri bar bya/_/de yi nang du ri mo bkram/_/sems dpa' mtshan mo zhugs nas ni/_/grogs bzang sems kyang ma rmongs pa/_/gu gul bdug pa de bzhin bsreg_/zlos shing sna ma'i me tog stong /_/snying gar phog par bya zhing dbul/_/de nas khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/_/
[\[21b.3\]]ri mo la zhugs khro bo'i spyan/_/ri mo de ni nges pa ru/_/g.yo 'am yang na 'gul bar 'gyur/_/de nas lha de grub gyur nas/_/gang 'dod pa yi las rnams byed/_/de ste grub par ma gyur na/_/gzhan yang chig 'bum bzlas par bya/_/de nas de yi mtha' mar bsgrub/_/des 
[\[21b.4\]]kyang ma grub gsum po la/_/mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa yang /_/gdon mi za bar 'grub par byed/_/grub pa'i las rnams gang dag 'dir/_/byed par 'gyur ba bshad par bya/_/bsgrub par dka' ba'i las rnams kyang /_/yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa/_/de dag 
[\[21b.5\]]mthar phyin myur bar ni/_/rig sngags 'chang bas byas par 'gyur/_/ri rnams kyi ni rtse mo dang /_/gcong rong rnams ni bsnyil bar byed/_/sa yang rab tu 'gas par byed/_/chu dag kyang ni skams par nus/_/dpung rnams mi g.yo gnon par byed/_/khrag gi char yang 'bebs 
[\[21b.6\]]par byed/_/stong ngam yang na 'bum yang rung /_/de ma thag tu gsod par nus/_/gnod pa dang ni rmongs pa dang /_/de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed/_/shing rta'am yang na gru dag dang /_/glang po myos pa gnon par nus/_/pha rol dpung dag 'khrug par byed/_/yul phyogs 
[\[21b.7\]]myur tu rmongs par nus/_/khros nas sa yang g.yo bar byed/_/gling dang nags tshal sreg par nus/_/de ni gang gA'i mtsho yang skems/_/skams pa dag kyang 'gengs par nus/_/sprin yang legs par gnon par nus/_/char pa dag kyang 'bebs par byed/_/dus min 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]char yang 'bebs par nus/_/klu yi bdag po dag kyang 'gugs/_/de nas nag pos zin pa yang /_/mthong ba'am yang na sprin tsam gyis/_/'gugs par byed de the tshom med/_/ser ba dang ni sol ba'i char/_/de ma thag tu 'bebs par nus/_/'bras bu me 
[\[22a.2\]]tog mchog rnams dang /_/yal ga dag gis brgyan pa'i shing /_/bltas pa'am yang na rdo 'phangs pas/_/glo bur du yang 'gyel bar byed/_/de ni sbyar ba tsam gyis su/_/sa yi 'og kyang 'khrug par byed/_/de bzhin lha dang mi rnams la/_/gnod pa chen po 
[\[22a.3\]]'byung bar byed/_/khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/_/nges par dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i/_/dngos po 'das dang da ltar dang /_/phyi 'byung ba dag gang yang med/_/lha de grub par ma gyur kyang /_/mthong ba tsam mam tshig gis kyang /_/dug dang rims dang gdon rnams sogs/_/
[\[22a.4\]]zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/dbang du byed dang dbye ba dang /_/gsad dang bskrad par bya ba dang /_/mig 'phrul any+dza bsku ba rnams/_/bdug dang dris byug sbyor ba yi/_/las rnams 'di dag thams cad ni/_/bzlas pa brgya byas 'grub par byed/_/sngags pa 
[\[22a.5\]]gter chen yod par ni/_/song ste bsgrub par byas nas su/_/bgegs rnams kyi ni mi 'jigs par/_/nor de bzlas pa stong byas pas/_/bdag gis khyim nas len pa bzhin/_/phra mo rnams ni rgya yis 'thob/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg ma byas kyang /_/gshin rje'i gshed 
[\[22a.6\]]kyi ming tsam gyis/_/lha rnams skrag par 'gyur ba ni/_/ring por mi thogs gdon mi za/_/ma rungs par ni bya ba dang /_/byad dang stems dag bya ba dang /_/rmongs dang mnan pa'i dngos grub rnams/_/bltas pas rnam pa du ma yi/_/cho ga gzhan gyis cho ga yang /_/
[\[22a.7\]]ring por mi thogs 'grub par nus/_/yul dang yul phyogs dag tu yang /_/gnod pa dang ni nad kyang 'byin/_/rmugs pa dang ni gnod pa dang /_/rmongs dang mi mthong byed pa dang /_/'khrug pa dang ni skrag pa dang /_/skyo zhing slar yang g.yo ba dang /_/nor 'gugs pa dang 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]gnon pa dang /_/skye bo dag kyang 'gugs pa dang /_/yun du 'tshe zhing 'jigs pa dang /_/'khrug pa 'thab mo ser ba dang /_/bru ba gnyid kyis myos pa dang /_/gang yang gzhan dag de 'dod pa/_/sngags pas gshin rje'i gshed dran pas/_/de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[22b.2\]]de nas cho ga phyi ma 'di/_/ji ltar yin pa de bshad do/_/lha ma yin gyi phug sgor song /_/mkhas pas ri mo bkram nas su/_/kha zas mi za stan gcig 'dug_/khri yi grangs tshad bzlas byas nas/_/de nas bud med gzugs mchog ldan/_/bzang po rnams ni sgor phyung nas/_/
[\[22b.3\]]sgrub pa de yi mdun du ni/_/nang du gshegs zhes dga' bar byed/_/de nas grogs po yid gcugs dang /_/sgrub pa po ni lhan cig tu/_/nges par dam tshig dag gis ni/_/de yi gnas su 'jug par bya/_/de bzhin ji ltar 'dod pa ru/_/gnod sbyin ma yi ming rnams 
[\[22b.4\]]dang /_/sha za mo 'am dri za mo/_/yang na gang 'dod pa yi lha'i/_/ming bris de yi mdun bzhag nas/_/ri mo la ni nyin re zhing /_/de yi tshig ni mthar sbyar nas/_/ma skyo bar ni 'bum bzlas na/_/sgrub pa po des 'jigs gyur nas/_/de dag thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur/_/sgrub 
[\[22b.5\]]po ci srid 'dod par ni/_/'di ru las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyang /_/gnod sbyin la sogs bsgrub bshad zin/_/'di yi cho ga phyi ma yi/_/phyi ma dag kyang bshad par bya/_/ri mchog dag gi rtse mo la/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po'i dkyil 'khor bri/_/
[\[22b.6\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang /_/kun la sha yi gtor ma bya/_/grogs po sems ni dpa' ba dang /_/yon tan ldan zhing gzo ba dang /_/mi ro'i gos la bris pa yi/_/ri mo bzhag la de nas su/_/bdag gi yan lag thams cad las/_/rus pa dag gis khrag phyung ste/_/
[\[22b.7\]]mi yi thod pa'i nang du gzhag_/lus la khrag ni ci phyin pa/_/mi ro'i skra yi pir dag gis/_/de nas de yi lus dag dang /_/mig kyang rab tu gsal bar bya/_/de la bgegs kyang mang du 'gyur/_/de nas dpa' bos bshad par gsungs/_/dpa' bo dag gis las kyang bya/_/
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]de yi 'og tu bzo bo la/_/dpa' bo dag gis yon yang 'bul/_/de nyid yongs su rdzogs par ni/_/gyur gyi bar du tshul bzhin gyis/_/tha mar dpa' bo gcig pu de/_/ri mo mtshan mo rab 'bar ram/_/yang na dgod dam g.yo yang rung /_/de nas dngos 
[\[23a.2\]]grub thob par bshad/_/ri mo de ni blangs pa yis/_/nam mkhar 'phar ba gdon mi za/_/dpal ldan thogs pa med par 'gro/_/mtshan mo nyi ma bzhin du 'bar/_/dpa' bo dag gis bsgrub pa 'di/_/rig 'dzin kun gyi thog mar 'gro/_/grub pa de la lha rnams kyang /_/
[\[23a.3\]]gdon mi za bar phyag 'tshal 'gyur/_/rig 'dzin rnams ni thams cad kun/_/kun tu bkur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/yang na cho ga shes pa'i rgyal/_/ri mo zhi ba sngon bzhin du/_/blangs te bsregs pa'i steng du gzhag_/de nas bsregs pa der 'dug nas/_/gcig po
