[\[23a.4\]]ral gri blangs nas su/_/mtshan mo gshin rje'i gshed bzlas pa/_/'bar bar 'gyur gyi bar du 'am/_/du ba'am tsha ba'i bar du bzlas/_/'bar bar gyur ba dpal dang ldan/_/rig 'dzin du ni de 'gyur ro/_/du ba byung bas mi snang ba/_/nam mkhar 'gro ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/de tshe tsha 
[\[23a.5\]]bar gyur na ni/_/sa yi rgyal por nges par 'gyur/_/ral gri mchog de bya ba yang /_/sor ni sum cu rtsa gnyis shis/_/yan lag thams cad yongs rdzogs pa/_/bsgrub par bya ba so yi rdo/_/de ltar cho ga phyi ma yang /_/mdor ni legs par bshad pa yin/_/lag pa g.yas 
[\[23a.6\]]pa'i sor mo yis/_/mthe bong sbas nas gyen du ni/_/bsgreng bar byas pa'i phyag rgya yi/_/be con zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/_/ha nyid kyi ni sngags ldan bar/_/las rnams kun la bcing bar bya/_/spyan drang ba dang mchod pa dang /_/gshegs su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang /_/
[\[23a.7\]]las rnams bya ba'i tshe dag dang /_/gzhan yang dgos pa 'byung ba'i tshe/_/tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di bcings nas/_/gshin rje'i gshed kyi lha bzlas so/_/sngags pa rgyal po'i drung song nas/_/mgo btud pus mo btsugs nas su/_/bdag nyid dang ni nor bcas par/_/gdon 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]mi za bar myur du 'grub/_/'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi gsal shing khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba gsal 
[\[23b.2\]]shing rgyud de rim par phye ba bcu bdun pa'o//_//o~M A kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags gzhan no/_/o~M AHhU~M 'di yang de bzhin no/_/yi ge bcu gcig rgyal po yi/_/de nyid bzlas pas grub par 'gyur/_/khro bo 
[\[23b.3\]]rnam par rgyal ba yi/_/rtsa ba dang ni phyi ma dang /_/de bzhin phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di/_/rtog pa ma lus rgyas pa dag_/lha de rnams kyis legs thos nas/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa kun/_/thal mo rab tu sbyar nas su/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ni/_/gshin rje'i gshed 
[\[23b.4\]]la 'di skad smras/_/bcom ldan khyod kyis rtog pa 'di/_/bsgrub pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/rab tu ngo mtshar bshad lags te/_/bzlas dang hom dang mchod la sogs/_/khro bo chen po'i brtul zhugs dang /_/de bzhin dka' thub drag po dang /_/ji skad gsungs pa'i smyung 
[\[23b.5\]]ba yis/_/khro bo kI li kI la las/_/sogs pa'ang dus la bab na ni/_/sngags zlos pa la dngos grub ster/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa dang /_/khyad par gyur pa ci zhig mchis/_/de bas bzlas dang sbyin sreg dang /_/smyung dang brtul zhugs dka' thub dang /_/
[\[23b.6\]]med par rang dbang nyid du ni/_/dngos grub dam pa khyod kyis gsungs/_/lha mchog de dag thams cad kyis/_/phyag 'tshal de skad smras pa dang /_/khro bo drag tu bzhad pa yis/_/rab tu drag pa'i tshig tu gsungs/_/drag tu bzhad pa'i zhal 'dzum pas/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 
[\[23b.7\]]'jigs rmongs la/_/ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes gsungs pa'i/_/phan pa'i tshig gis dbugs phyungs nas/_/khyed rnams kyis ni gang smras pa/_/sgrub pa bdag ni med par yang /_/sbyor ba shes pas grub 'gyur ba/_/lha rnams kun gyis mnyan par gyis/_/bde gshegs 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]dngos grub gcig pu las/_/dgyes pa rnam pa tha dad 'gyur/_/de nas ting 'dzin tshul las ni/_/mtshan ma dang ni dngos grub de/_/thog mar byang chub rtsa la brten/_/shes rab de lta bu yang bsgom/_/sems kyang rnam par mi rtog pas/_/bde gshegs 
[\[24a.2\]]dngos grub de dag 'thob/_/de nga'i gzugs su gyur par byos/_/sa bon mtshon cha mang por ldan/_/khro bo de yi zhal drug bsgyur/_/dril bu gsil ba'i sgra yang 'byin/_/khro bo'i zhal ni bcas par ldan/_/de yi gzi dang mthu ldan byas/_/kun tu dga' ba'i snying por ldan/_/
[\[24a.3\]]gang gis yid la gang bsgoms pa/_/de la nga yi thugs g.yos pas/_/ji lta ba'am gar yang rung /_/mdun nam yang na rgyab nas kyang /_/las kun byed nus grub par 'gyur/_/gang dag nga ni phyag lnga bcu/_/be con gdengs pas bsdigs par mdzad/_/tri shUl ral gri 
[\[24a.4\]]dgra sta kyu/_/thod pa shag ti thod mar dbyug_/de dag las ni phyag gsum drug_/g.yas pa be con mda' ral gri/_/g.yon na 'khor lo rdo rje 'dzin/_/rdo rje rtse gcig mig drug pa/_/dpral ba'i gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang /_/khro gnyer bsnyer ba'i lta ba can/_/'jigs pa'i 
[\[24a.5\]]sbrul gyis ro stod dkris/_/thod pa dag gis rgyan du byas/_/char sprin sngon po'i kha dog 'dra/_/zhal gcig spyan yang mi mnyam pa/_/'brug gi sgra dbyangs sgra sgrogs pa/_/stag lpags na bza' gsol bar dgyes/_/mtshon cha mtshon rnams 'bar zhing 'dug_/spyan dang 
[\[24a.6\]]gtsug pud rtsa dmar ser/_/zhabs gnyis gdengs pa'i tsham ngam mdzad/_/sa yi steng na za za lta/_/mche ba dag kyang gtsigs pa'i zhal/_/bcibs pa ma he chibs pa de/_/sems pa'am ri mo la bris pa/_/sgrub po myur du mchod byed na/_/de la nga ni myur ba ru/_/dgyes nas 
[\[24a.7\]]mngon du phyogs par 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i don rnams ni/_/gdon mi za bar grub par byed/_/rnam par gnon pa'i gzugs 'di ni/_/bdud las rgyal ba yin par bsgrags/_/thog ma bdag gis dam tshig sbyin/_/bsrung mchog tshul bzhin byas nas su/_/ras ni sum cu 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]sor tshad la/_/sngags pa bzo bo yon tan can/_/yid ni bsten par bya ba'i phyir/_/dben pa'i gnas su mi mngon par/_/tshon rtsi dge ba bzang po yis/_/ri mo thog mar bri bar bya/_/zin nas kyang ni dben par gzhag_/su la'ang bstan par yong mi bya/_/nga yi gzugs 
[\[24b.2\]]su gyur par byas/_/sa bon mtshon cha bzang por ldan/_/nga yi zhal ni khro bor 'gyur/_/dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang ldan/_/khro bo'i zhal ni bsam bar bya/_/nga yi gzi dang mthur ldan byas/_/kun dga' yi ni snying por ldan/_/gal te dam tshig mi ldan pa'i/_/skye 
[\[24b.3\]]bos ri mo de mthong na/_/myur du rnam par myos par 'gyur/_/de bas rnam pa thams cad du/_/srung ba drag po kun tu bya/_/grong ngam yang na grong khyer du/_/rnam pa gzhan du gzhag gyur tam/_/gong du mchod pa ma byas na/_/myur du 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur/_/ri mo 
[\[24b.4\]]la ni gnas pa'i gzugs/_/de ltar rtag tu goms byas shing /_/der bsgyur da yi yid du 'gyur/_/ji srid gang dag goms gyur cing /_/kun du mdun na gnas pa ru/_/gang tshe mthong bar gyur ba na/_/de tshe ri mo med par yang /_/ji lta bu yi tshul nyid kyis/_/rtag tu 
[\[24b.5\]]sbyor ba byas nas ni/_/sbyor ba nyid kyi rtag pa ru/_/khro bo kun tu sbyor ba ni/_/de las las rnams thams cad byed/_/'di ni gsang ba bstan pa yin/_/yang na bdag nyid de 'dra bar/_/ji srid cig tu grub pa'i bar/_/yid la legs par bsgoms na ni/_/de nas de yi 
[\[24b.6\]]dngos gnas par/_/yid la cung zad gang bsams pa/_/dngos po goms par byas na ni/_/de nyid 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/_/gang phyir khro bo bsgoms pa yis/_/khro bo yong ye bsgoms na ni/_/bzlas pa la sogs med par yang /_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[24b.7\]]sgrub pa rnams la dam tshig gis/_/gal te sbyin par bya na yang /_/de tshe sa ni rab sbyangs nas/_/thog mar spos chus gdab par bya/_/kun du zlum po zhes bya ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor 'di ni logs shig tu/_/kun du zlum por bri bar bya/_/tshon rtsi nag por legs bris 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]te/_/nub phyogs sgo btod khru do tsam/_/de yi dbus su mchog bri ba/_/'gying zhing ldem bag can gyi lus/_/char sprin dang ni bung ba'i mdog_/'jam zhing mnyen pa dpal dang ldan/_/gser gyi dril bu'i sgra dang ldan/_/g.yag rnga'i bsil yab 
[\[25a.2\]]g.yob ba can/_any+dza na yi ri lta bu'i/_/ma he chen po dam pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa de bris te/_/bsrung ba cho ga bzhin byas nas/_/sngags shes pas ni mchod byas pa/_/cho ga bzhin du 'dir bshad do/_/spyan drangs gdan du bstab pa dang /_/ar+g+ha gtor mas 
[\[25a.3\]]mchod pa dang /_/mar me bdug pa bstan pa dang /_/tha mar slar gshegs bstan pa'o/_/gzugs dgod pa dag thog ma ru/_/lha dgod pa dag yig 'brus bskyed/_/sa bon gyis ni tshul bzhin bshad/_/de las dang por thams cad ni/_/sa bon khro bo'i gzugs 
[\[25a.4\]]yin te/_/de nyid phal cher rab tu grags/_/gcig pu mtshon cha du ma'i mchog_/de nyid der ni bsten bya ba'i/_/rtag tu mtshon cha 'bar byed pa/_/de yi gzugs 'dir gcig pu la/_/sa bon gyis ni bskul ba'i zhal/_/dril bu'i sa bon drug rnams kyis/_/sgra de 
[\[25a.5\]]rnams bzhin sgrogs par brtag_/'di ni khro bo'i zhal yin gsungs/_/'di ni thog ma nyid kyi gzugs/_/de yi mthu yang ci 'dra ba/_/tshul bzhin du yang 'dir bshad do/_/gang gis dran pa tsam gyis ni/_/bdud dpung gdug pa'i gdon la sogs/_/mthu rtsal 
[\[25a.6\]]gnod pas nyams nas su/_/'jigs shing spa bkong byed par 'gyur/_/zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis ldan/_/zhal yang gdangs shing 'bar ba can/_/snying po dag par rab tu gzhag_/mtshon cha 'debs pa'i mthu rtsal can/_/de ltar khro bo rgyal ba'i gzugs/_/sa 
[\[25a.7\]]bon zhes su bya ba yi/_/sngags kyi dngos po shes nas ni/_/sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/mtshon cha 'phangs pa tsam gyis ni/_/de yi kun tu bsrung bar bya/_/sa bon bkod pa'i tshul bzhin du/_/bdag gi lus la sbyar bar bya/_/gzugs 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ni gzugs la bzhag nas su/_/mtshon cha de nyid lag na thogs/_/sa bon rnams kyang khar bzhag ste/_/rkang pa gnyis kyang tsham dam bya/_/de nas kun du khros nas su/_/rang gi sa bon dgod par bya/_/thog ma bdag la ma g.yengs par/_/srung ba de ltar 
[\[25b.2\]]byas nas su/_/dkyil 'khor du ni spyan drangs te/_/de nas mdun du mchod pa bya/_/sngags kyi snying po tha ma la/_/tshul gshegs pa yi tshig gnyis dang /_/rtag tu ldan par byas nas su/_/spyan drangs ba dag bya bar bshad/_/me tog dag gis gdan 'di la/_/
[\[25b.3\]]bzhugs su gsol zhes rtag tu bya/_/de lta bur ni spyan drangs nas/_/me tog dag gis snga ma bzhin/_/bzhugs shig pa yi tshig gnyis kyis/_/cho ga bzhin du bzhugs su gsol/_/khro bo'i rgyal po de la ni/_/bzhugs par bya ba bstan pa yin/_/me 
[\[25b.4\]]tog sngags kyis btab pa yis/_/de ltar bzhugs par byas nas su/_/ar+g+ha 'di ni bzhes shig ces/_/tshig gi 'jug tu brjod nas su/_/spos chu me tog sbyar ba yis/_/ar+g+ha de la dbul bar bya/_/me tog bdag gis phul ba 'di/_/bzhes su 
[\[25b.5\]]gsol zhes brjod nas su/_/spos chu bzang po btab pa yi/_/me tog dag ni sngon bzhin dbul/_/sngags pas rtag tu tshig mjug la/_/gtor ma bdag gis phul ba 'di/_/bzhes su gsol zhes brjod nas su/_/gtor ma sna tshogs dbul bar bya/_/
[\[25b.6\]]mar me bdag gis phul ba 'di/_/bzhes su gsol zhes mjug tu brjod/_/mar gyis legs par gang ba yi/_/mar me dag ni dbul bar bya/_/bdug pa bdag gis phul ba 'di/_/bzhes su gsol zhes mjug tu brjod/_/bdug pa thang chu rnam pa lnga/_/
[\[25b.7\]]sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya/_/der ni mchod pa byas nas kyang /_/dkyil 'khor dag gam ri mo la/_/rang gi yan lag bkod pa dag_/dam tshig can la bstan nas ni/_/mthong ba tsam ni nyid kyis su/_/rig 'dzin dam tshig can du 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]rtog pa las gsungs pa'i/_/las rnams myur du byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar khro ba'i rgyal po yi/_/mchod pa legs par byas nas su/_/sgrub pa po ni ma yeng par/_/sngags rjod slar yang gshegs su gsol/_/slar yang gshegs par mdzad nas 
[\[26a.2\]]su/_/slar yang gshegs pa'i tshig gnyis brjod/_/me tog snyim pa bkang nas ni/_/phyag 'tshal slar yang gshegs su gsol/_/dkyil 'khor dag gam gsang sngags bzlas/_/de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya ni/_/rab tu 'bar ba gcig pu bshad/_/gshin rje'i 
[\[26a.3\]]gshed ces bya ba'i lha/_/gang gis grub par gyur pa'o/_/lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo yi/_/mthe bong sbas te gyen du ni/_/bsgreng bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/_/be con zhes ni grags pa yin/_/lha nyid kyis ni sngags ldan pas/_/las rnams kun la bcing bar bya/_/spyan drang 
[\[26a.4\]]pa dang mchod pa dang /_/gshegs su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang /_/las rnams bya ba'i tshe dag dang /_/gzhan yang rgol ba byung ba'i tshe/_/tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di bcings nas/_/gshin rje'i gshed kyang lha bzlas so/_/sngags pa rgyal po'i drung 'gro na/_/mgo 
[\[26a.5\]]btud pus mo btsugs nas su/_/gdon mi za bar dbang gyur pa/_/bdag nyid dang ni nor gyis so/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma las khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgyal po 
[\[26a.6\]]rtog pa phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba'i rim par phye ba ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o/_/rdzogs so//_//ma mai mA mi mu mU mu/_/mu mi mA mai ma yig zung /_/thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu/_/zung dang bsnol ba'i bye brag gis/_/sbyar bar bya ba 'dir bshad do/_/sa bon zhes 
[\[26a.7\]]bya dkyil du gzhag_/khro bo dag ni so so ru/_/zung ma'i zung min tshig 'di la/_/tha ma'i zung ni ma yin no/_/zung ma'i zung ma tshig 'di la/_/he he ha ha hi hi hi hi ha ha he he zhes gnyis sbyar ba/_khro chen tshig gis thog mar ces/_oM oM swA hA phyag 'tshal 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]gzhag_/rgyas par 'dod pas dga' bzhin du/_/mel tshe thun gcig rtag tu bzlas/_/ri mo cho ga bzhin du bsgrub pa yis/_/rtag par mchod pa'i cho ga 'di/_/mdo ru bsdus nas bshad pa yin/_/bzlas pa dang ni hom dag dang /_/brtul zhugs 
[\[26b.2\]]dka' thub ma byas kyang /_/sngags kyi dngos 'di shes nas ni/_/mchod pa 'ba' zhig dbul bar bya/_/'di la mchod pa bya ba nyid/_/khro bo'i rgyal po rtag pa ru/_/mnyes byas yin par gang shes pa/_/sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/_/rtag tu 
[\[26b.3\]]sngags pas sems pa dang /_/rtag tu sngags kyi bdag nyid 'gyur/_/rtag tu yid la zhen pa dang /_/rtag tu mchod la brtson pa dang /_/rtag tu khro bor 'du shes pa/_/las rnams thams cad grub pa'i phyir/_/cho ga mdor bsdus 'di bshad pa'o/_/khro bo rnam par 
[\[26b.4\]]rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste dang po'o//_//ma mai mA mi mu mU mu/_mU mI ma mai ma'i yi ge_/zung dang ya bral bye brag gis/_/thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu/_/'khor lo 'di ni ci rigs par/_/sbyar bar bya ba 
[\[26b.5\]]'di bshad do/_/sa bon zhes bya dkyil 'khor bzhag_/khro bo dag ni so so ru/_/dbang dang 'khon dang gsad pa dang /_/de bzhin bskrad dang zhi ba dang /_/yang na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_/zung dang bsnol bas myur du 'grub/_/khro bo zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/
[\[26b.6\]]dkyil du bzhag ste so so ru/_/zung shig tshig gnyis tha mar bzhag_/che ge mo zhig dbang du byos/_/mtshon cha med pa'i sa bon bzhag_/swA hA 'i tshig ni bar bar gzhug_/bsgrub par bya yi gzugs byas nas/_/de la rkang pas brdzi ba ni/_/sngags pas 
[\[26b.7\]]'greng ste 'dug pa ni/_/rkang skyo ba yi bar du bya/_/rgyal po dbang du ma gyur pa/_/de yi dbang du myur du 'gyur/_/gcig po de la spos nas su/_/myur du [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin bzhag pa'o/_/sa bon gnyis pa'i gnas la ni/_/gnas nas gdong yang bsgyur nas su/_/
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]zung gcig tshig gnyis mtha' mar bzhag_/che ge mo yi mdza' bo de/_/sdang bar gyur zhes mtha' mar bya/_/bsgrag par bya ba cung zad med/_/bsgrub par bya ba gnyis ka yi/_/gzugs ni 'jigs pa'i las byed de/_/gcig tu dpa' bar mnyam ldan par/_/gnyis pa la 
[\[27a.2\]]yang rkang pas mnan/_/sngags mkhan de la gnas pa yi/_/mel tshe thun ni phyed tsam gyis/_/de nas sgrub pa 'dod pa bzhin/_/de gnyis phan tshun dgrar gyur pa/_/khro bo rim bzhin bsgoms pas ni/_/lan cig byas pa tsam gyis 'gyur/_/sa bon 
[\[27a.3\]]gnyis pa de las kyang /_/drag po rtsal gyis spos nas de/_/khro bo chen po mig rtsa dmar/_/gnas ni gsum pa la gnas te/_/g.yon pa'i gnon pas mnan pas ni/_/drag po shugs can ma lus mnan/_/kha dang brla dang rgyab kyang bsgyur/_/dril bu dkrol 
[\[27a.4\]]ba'i sgra myur 'gyur/_/phyis kyang rim gyis 'di la gnas/_/logs shig khro bo'i 'khor lo'i bkas/_/rkang pa'i tsham ngam de bzhin byas/_/gdong yang dal bus bsgyur nas su/_/dang po'i sa bon gang yin pa'i/_/dbang du byed la rgyas par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[27a.5\]]yi mtha' yang lhan cig tu/_/me dang 'dra ba 'bar ba ste/_/kun gyi las ni grub 'dod na/_/shin tu legs par sbyar bar bya/_/de yi zung mas bskul ba yang /_/so so'am gcig tu'ang rung bar bshad/_/khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i mthu/_/brgyad pa dag las myur 
[\[27a.6\]]bar gnas/_/rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis ni/_/'khon pa'i sa bon dag gis bskul/_/sa bon zung mas bskul ba yang /_/brgyad pa 'byed par bsgrub pa la/_/mdza' ba myur du bzlog pa'i phyir/_/cho ga bzhin du rim par sbyar/_/rim pa snga ma'i tshul bzhin du/_/
[\[27a.7\]]myur du gsad par 'dod pa yis/_/khro bo yi ni 'khor lo gnas/_/dgu pa A bi tsa ra yi/_/cho ga 'di yis dgra bo dag_/myos par byas nas 'jigs par 'gyur/_/lha rnams kyis ni sbas pa yang /_/gshed po'i drung du khrid par 'gyur/_/rim pa snga ma'i 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]tshul gyis su/_/khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas/_/bcu pa dag la rim gyis gnas/_/drag shul can gyis drag tu gnon/_/de yi sa bon gyis kyang phye/_/sngon gyi sa bon rab 'bar ba/_/snga ma bzhin du rim gyis bzlas/_/sngar bshad pa yi las bsgrub po/_/
[\[27b.2\]]'khor lo rim pa bcu gcig po/_/gang yin pa ni de bzung nas/_/de nas zhi bar byed pa yi/_/sa bon de yis bskul bar bya/_/snga ma'i bzhin du bskul ba dang /_/snga ma'i las ni byed par 'gyur/_/zhi ba dag la gang gsungs pa/_/rgyas pa dag la sbyar bar bya/_/'khor 
[\[27b.3\]]lo'i gnas kyi mchog rim par/_/bcu gnyis pa la gnas nas su/_/de yi sa bon bskul bar byas/_/bdag gi mthul rtsal gnod brtags pas/_/sa bon zung ma sbyor ba yis/_/sa bon mthu ni 'bar ba can/_/'khor lo bkod pas las rnams ni/_/sngon gsungs 
[\[27b.4\]]pa dag grub par bya/_/de ltar khro bo'i 'khor lo ni/_/cho gar bcas pa rgyas pa dag_/gsang ba bskul mar bcas pa yi/_/sbyor ba ma lus bshad pa yin/_/sa bon zung mas bskul ba gang /_/gnyis pa rab tu grags pa yin/_/de 'dir sa bon gnyis pa yin/_/
[\[27b.5\]]myur du grub par 'gyur bar bshad/_/tha ma'i sa bon thams cad la/_/phul ba'i tshig gnyis rtag tu sbyar/_/zung ma'i zung ma'i tshig 'di la/_/ya mtha' dag dang ma mtha' ru'o/_/'khor lo bkod pa bstan pa 'di/_/ji ltar rim par shes na ni/_/sbyin sreg bzlas 
[\[27b.6\]]brjod ma byas kyang /_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub 'thob/_/khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang ba ni/_/'di mi shes par gang sbyor ba/_/de 'di dngos grub mi 'thob kyis/_/myur du smyo ba thob par 'gyur/_/ma mai ma mI mu mU yi/_/yi ge drug po rnams kyis ni/_/dbang 
[\[27b.7\]]dang 'khon dang gsad pa dang /_/bskrad dang zhi dang rgyas pa'i mthar/_/mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya/_/de dag nyid la bzlas pa yis/_/de bzhin du ni bskul bar bya/_/ji skad gsungs pa 'di rnams ni/_/ma grub na ste gzhan du med/_/mu mU mi ma mai 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]mI ni/_/ma ni rgyas mthar de bzhin du/_/'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas rnams ni/_/de dang de dag gnyis su sbyar/_/de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang /_/khro bo sku mchog sa bon yang /_/gzhag nas tshig gi mtha' mar yang /_/khro bo'i dril bu dkrol 
[\[28a.2\]]ba dgod/_/'khor lo'i mu ran nang dag tu/_/zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis brjod/_/mkhas pas 'khor lo'i mig gi nang /_/sa bon bkod pa rnams la gnas/_/khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa ni/_/shes na ji skad bshad pa yi/_/dngos grub rnams ni thob 
[\[28a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/dngos grub tshul bzhin thob 'gyur ba/_/de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya/_/thog mar phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/sku nas sku ni skur bsgyur te/_/las rnams tshul bzhin mthong ba yis/_/sbyor ba dag ni legs par bya/_/gdong dang kha mig rkang pa 
[\[28a.4\]]mnyam/_/rab tu dang zhing zhi ba'i sems/_/snying yang da bzhin rab tu dga'/_/dbang du bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/_/shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgrub/_/rkang pa ya gcig thung ngu bzhag_/gdong dang nu mjing gcus te gnon/_/kha dang mig ni 
[\[28a.5\]]ya gcig 'dzums/_/tsham ngam gnon pa chen po byas/_/be con la ni mig gis blta/_/bsgrub par bya ba sgrub la 'bad/_/gang dag dbye bar 'dod pa yis/_/de dag dbye ba brtsam par bya/_/rkang pa gnyis pa bteg pa yis/_/tsham ngam bya ba slar la gzhag_/
[\[28a.6\]]bzhin bsnyer phyag rgya bcings nas su/_/khro bar blta zhing yid kyang khros/_/rab tu dpa' ba sran dang bcas/_/rtsal gyis gnon par rab tu 'dud/_/sngags pa sngon bzhin sngags tshul gnas/_/gang 'dod pa ni gzhom par bya/_/de la rkang pa ya gcig kyang /_/
[\[28a.7\]]drag shul can du brkyang ste gzhag_/bzur te 'dug pa'i tshul tu gnas/_/gdong yang yon por bsnyer bar bya/_/mdzub mo bsgreng ste gdengs pa dang /_/be con phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs/_/dgra dag bskrad par 'dod na ni/_/myur du bskrad par bya bar 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]'gyur/_/de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag_/lag pa g.yas pa mtho bar bya/_/dpa' dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad/_/zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur/_/phyed ni dma' bar bkug ste gnas/_/rkang pa g.yas pas tsham ngam byed/_/sngags tshul gnas 
[\[28b.2\]]pas bsgrims na ni/_/rgyas par 'dod nas thob par 'gyur/_/slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba/_/bzlog ste bya ba gzhan du med/_/grub pa bdag nyid chen po yi/_/tsham ngam rim pa drug gsungs pa/_/dang po'i ming ni logs par phyogs/_/de yi 'og 
[\[28b.3\]]ma rgyab kyi phyogs/_/de bzhin tsham ngam gsum po ni/_/khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin/_/bzhi pa mdzub mo bsgreng ba yis/_/lnga pa la ni stobs zhes bya/_/drug pa stobs po che zhes bya/_/'di rnams tsham ngam drug tu bsgrags/_/tsham ngam gdangs pa byas pa 
[\[28b.4\]]yis/_/dgra yi 'khor rnams g.yen spyo ba/_/'khor lo'i mchog la goms byed pas/_/grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur/_/khro bo chen pos gsungs pa yi/_/rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'di/_/de bas yang ni shin tu 
[\[28b.5\]]dkon/_/gsang ba'i rtog pa bzang po 'di/_/kun tu dngos grub kun sbyin par/_/gsang ba'i rtog pa de bas kyang /_/'khor lo 'di ni shin tu dkon/_/hom dang bzlas pa yongs mi dgos/_/sngon du bsnyen pa bya mi dgos/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i brtul zhugs dang /_/
[\[28b.6\]]dka' thub drag po'ang bya mi dgos/_/bsam gtan sbyor ba'ang mi dgos te/_/gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod/_/gang gsungs pa yi dngos grub nas/_/de ma thag tu dngos grub thob/_/de bas 'di ni gsang byas nas/_/thams cad bsgrub pa'i sgrub pa po/_/bdag 
[\[28b.7\]]gis don mchog gang 'dod pa/_/shin tu legs par bsgrub par bya/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste gnyis pa'o//_//khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni/_/sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa/_/
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]sngags pa 'dod na cho ga mchog_/dang por byed na dngos grub 'thob/_/rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni/_/re zhig 'di yi mtshan nyid ni/_/gzhan dag 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/de yi las ni gang gsungs pa/_/gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur ba/_/
[\[29a.2\]]dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gi/_/thams cad nyid de gang gsungs pa/_/thams cad de ni bshad par bya'o/_/sngags de las rnams kun byas pa/_/rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa/_/dpa' bo gcig pu'i mthus kyang 'grub/_/oM ni de yi thog ma ste/_/bde bar 
[\[29a.3\]]gshegs pa'i dam tshig yin/_/thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang /_/drag po'i rtseg gis phul ba'i lugs/_/klad kyi 'khor gyis mnan pa'i rigs/_/sngags kyi yi ge phreng bkod la/_/sngags rnams thams cad gsal byed pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/_/gsum po de 
[\[29a.4\]]nas sbyar bar bya/_/de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi/_/sku ni de yi 'og tu bstan/_/sngags pas sngags rnams kun gyis mtshan/_/de dag rtag tu rig par bya/_/thogs pa med pa'i sngags rnams ni/_/bdag nyid chen po'i thams cad kyis/_/bsrung la sogs pa'i 
[\[29a.5\]]las rnams kun/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bshad pa bzhin du bya/_/thams cad bdag nyid chen po 'dis/_/srung ba dag gi byas nas su/_/sngon gyi tshul bzhin rab dben pa/_/sku gzugs don mchog gzhan nas ni/_/cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa/_/cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya/_/
[\[29a.6\]]nyin re me tog phreng ba la/_/lan bdun bzlas pa rnams kyis mchod/_/mchod nas ka ra bI ra yi/_/me tog dmar po kha 'bus pa'i/_/brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis/_/bu don la ni phog par dbul/_/cho ga 'di ni dus gsum du/_/zla ba gcig tu byas na ni/_/khro 
[\[29a.7\]]bo mngon sum nye gyur nas/_/rmi lam du ni dngos grub ster/_/cho ga 'di ltar sngar byas na/_/gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag_/de tshe gdon mi za bar 'grub/_/de yi cho ga mchog bshad pa/_/de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas na/_/mi yi las rnams gang bya ba/_/de yi cho ga 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]mdor bsdus nas/_/da ni legs par bshad par bya/_/de nas dang 'gro dang sbyar ba'i/_/dug ni rnam pa gsum dag dang /_/gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang /_/lto 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig_/bdag gis byas pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags/_/sbyor ba lan cig 
[\[29b.2\]]bdag gis bsrung /_/yid la bsams pa tsam gyis kyang /_/gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed/_/bzhi pa'i rims la sogs de yang /_/thos pas myur du med par byed/_/ma dang byis pa'i gdon rnams la/_/thal ba'am yang na sas kyang rung /_/bdag nyid dag par 
[\[29b.3\]]bsams nas ni/_/bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don/_/gang dang gang dag 'dod par ni/_/bsgoms pas de dang de dag byed/_/yid la bsams pas de dag thar/_/rdo la lan gsum bzlas pa yi/_/chu srin kum bi ra la sogs/_/mche ba can dag phyogs med par/_/chu bsal 
[\[29b.4\]]ba yi mchog tu 'byung /_/'gro tshe yid la bzlas na ni/_/lam na rkun po 'jigs pa med/_/seng ge stag dang dgra rnams dang /_/nad kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i drung du 'gro na yang /_/sngags kyis spyi gtsug bcings nas ni/_/rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu/_/brkyang 
[\[29b.5\]]nas thal mos sbyor bar byed/_/shags 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang /_/mtshon dang me yis 'jigs pa la/_/yid la dran zhing bzlas byas na/_/mi bde kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/'tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/_/mi bde nyam thag gyur pa la/_/sngags 'di myur dran brjod byas 
[\[29b.6\]]na/_/sprin dag mnan par bya ba dang /_/'dod bzhin myur du slar yang bzlog_/gnam lcags ser ba 'bab pa yang /_/dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed/_/phyag rgya bcings pa de nyid kyi/_/yid kyis sprin rnams dbab par bya/_/de ltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas ni/_/smin mtshams 
[\[29b.7\]]dag kyang bsgyur bar bya/_/rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/_/gnam lcags ser ba gcad par bya/_/sbyor ba mkhas pas ci 'dod pa/_/char pa dag kyang gcad par bya/_/gos ni sngon po bgos na ni/_/kho ra khor yug bsrung byas nas/_/mid pa nub par chur zhugs te/_/nyin 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gsum legs par bzlas byas na/_/brgya byin gyis ni sprin bsdus nas/_/'dod pa bzhin du char pa 'bebs/_/de nas sprin chen las byung ba/_/char pas sa steng khyab par 'gyur/_/nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs nas/_/nyin re rtag tu bzlas byas na/_/
[\[30a.2\]]bdag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyi/_/nad rnams de nas med par 'gyur/_/rgyal po dbang du bya yang rung /_/yungs kar dkar po bzang po las/_/gzugs brnyan legs par byas nas su/_/de yi gzugs kyi steng 'dug la/_/gang gi ming smos nyin bdun du/_/
[\[30a.3\]]bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni/_/de ni myur du cho ga 'dis/_/bran bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur/_/zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa yis/_/dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du 'gyur/_/zhag gnyis smyung ba de bzhin du/_/bzlas na rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin/_/zhag gsum 
[\[30a.4\]]byas pas rgyal rigs te/_/zhag bzhi dag gis bram ze dag_/bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin byas na/_/'dod pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/_/'bru dang phub ma thams cad las/_/bu dang bu mo gang yang rung /_/de bzhin gzugs brnyan byas na ni/_/dmangs rigs la 
[\[30a.5\]]ni mtshan gcig gis/_/rab tu sngang ba bya bar 'gyur/_/rje'u rigs la ni zhag gnyis kyis/_/de steng tsog pur 'dug nas ni/_/de bzhin mdza' dang bral bar byed/_/nyin zhag gsum dang bzhi dag gis/_/rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o/_/ji ltar ji skad gsungs pa 
[\[30a.6\]]yi/_/las kyis bya yi gzhan gyis min/_/gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/dur khrod sol bas legs pa ru/_/snga ma bzhin du legs par bri/_/de nas seng ldeng phur bu la/_/sngags kyis stong du bzlas byas na/_/de yi 'og tu lus la gdab/_/dgra bo de yi ming smos 
[\[30a.7\]]nas/_/de la khros par byas nas su/_/de nas de yi snying gar 'dug_/phur bu btab ste bzlas bya ba/_/de nyid lag pas bzung nas su/_/dus gsum nyi ma gsum byas na/_/dgra bo gang du btab pa der/_/gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su/_/'gul mi phod par 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]sa la ltung /_/zhag bdun lon nas 'chi bar 'gyur/_/ma mo'i gnas su song nas su/_/lag pas be con phyag rgya bcing /_/lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis/_/bsdigs shing nyi ma nub nas su/_/khros shing dgra yi ming smos bzlas/_/de nas dgra bo mo gdon gyis/_/zin nas 
[\[30b.2\]]spyod pa sna tshogs pas/_/'chi bar gyur ba dag ni byed/_/de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi/_/cho gas de las zhi bar bya/_/ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas/_/zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis/_/dbang po bsdams shing yid bde bas/_/nyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas/_/de nas 
[\[30b.3\]]de la las de yi/_/zhi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/_/nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs nas/_/lag pas dgra bo'i mgo byug cing /_/dgra yi ming smos mnan nas su/_/nyi ma nub tu bzlas byas na/_/de yi klad pa na 'gyur ba/_/tshabs chen shi la thug par 'gyur/_/de nas thal mo sbyar 
[\[30b.4\]]nas su/_/nyin par zlos shing zhi bar bya/_/sa steng rkang pa gcig gis 'dug_/nyin par lag pa gyen du brkyang /_/mi dga' khros shing bzlas byas pa/_/dgra yi ming smos ci 'dod par/_/nyi ma nub kar de nas dgra_/mi dga' ba dang myos 'gyur te/_/gnyen dang mdza' bo 
[\[30b.5\]]rnams bor te/_/de nas gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro/_/de la 'dir ni zhi ba'am/_/'on te rgyas par bya 'dod na/_/gtsang sbra byas te gos dkar bgos/_/bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos par/_/mchod pa bzang po byas nas su/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/'o ma 
[\[30b.6\]]btung zhing bzlas byas pa/_/zhi bar 'gyur gyis bar du'o/_/de ltar 'di ni sna tshogs pa/_/sbyor bcas rgyas par bshad pa yin/_/rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du ni/_/ma gsungs pa yang legs par bsgrub/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa gsang ba'i rtog 
[\[30b.7\]]par gtogs pa ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bzang po 'di/_/he la'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni/_/de las bzang po gzhan med pa/_/ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya/_/dang por he zhes gang gsungs pa/_/bskul ba'i sa bon thams cad pa'o/_/de ni len dang 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]'dzin pa ste/_/las la myur du bskul ba'o/_/de bas thog mar bskul ba dang /_/don bzhin du ni bzung ba la/_/khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi/_/he la'i 'khor lo rim bzhin bstan/_/he he ha ha hi hi hi/_/hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar ba/_/khro chen tshig gis 
[\[31a.2\]]thog mar sbyar/_/zung shig pa yi tshig gnyis pa'o/_/zung drug 'khor lo'i tha mar dgod/_/mu ran rtsibs kyi mig rnams su/_/sngags las 'byung ba'i re re'o/_/don rnams thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur/_/bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags/_/gnas su ji 
[\[31a.3\]]ltar bkod pa dang /_/ji ltar smos shing gang gnas pa/_/so so'i las la sbyar bar bya/_/de nas 'di dag bkod pa de/_/sngags rnams bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad/_/de'i nang mu ran gsum po dang /_/dbus kyi mu ran bzang por ldan/_/mtha' yi mu ran drug po dang /_/
[\[31a.4\]]rtsibs kyi zur drug rab bzang ba/_/rab dben 'du 'dzi med pa'i sar/_/cho ga bzhin du legs bris nas/_/de yi gnas su sbyar ba dang /_/de yi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du sbyar/_/de yi tsham ngam gsal ba yi/_/sngags rnams 'di ni bsdu bar bya/_/dbus su de bzhin 
[\[31a.5\]]gshegs pa yi/_/snying po mtshan ni brjod pa'i mchog_/bzhag nas de yi gnas dag la/_/sngags ni grub par byed pa gzhag_/mu ran gnyis la gnas nas su/_/khro bo'i snying po gzhag par bya/_/de ni khro bo'i zhabs kyis mnan/_/dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra yang 
[\[31a.6\]]bsgrags/_/khro bo zhabs kyis bcags byas pa/_/rtsibs rnams khro bo mthu dang ldan/_/dbus su snying po dag par ldan/_/rab tu 'bar zhing nges byas pa/_/mu ran gsum gyi bar du ste/_/thams cad don rnams kun grub pa'o/_/he he ha ha hi hi hi hi ha ha he he/_gnyis 
[\[31a.7\]]su sbyar/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig dbus nas/_/sa bon bzung ba'i phyi rol gzhag_/thog mar bskul ba'i tshig rnams dgod/_/khro bo du mas bskul ba ste/_/thams cad kun du don rnams kun/_/grub pa'i phyir ni de la gnas/_/de ltar 'khor lo byas pa yi/_/phyi nas 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzhag_/bskul ba'i tshig rnams bkod pa'i mthar/_/khro bo gzhan rnams bkod par bya/_/de nas gzhan yang rim bzhin du/_/khro bo chen po dgod pa'i phyir/_/skul bar byed pa bcu gnyis po/_/'di dag tshul bzhin bshad par bya/_/dang por khro bo rgyal 
[\[31b.2\]]pos gsungs/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba che zhes bya/_/rdo rje me yi rgyal por bzhag_/rab tu drag po'i shugs gzhag go/_/rab tu drag shul stobs po che/_/rgya chen khro bo lnga pa yin/_/drug pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba/_/khro bo bdun 
[\[31b.3\]]par byed pa yin/_/zur du khro bo brgyad po grags/_/phongs pa sgrol ba de bzhin dgu/_/rab tu 'joms pa bcu pa yin/_/de bzhin kI li kI li bzhag_/kI li kI li chen po dang /_/bcu gnyis su ni gsungs pa yin/_/khro bo rab tu snang byed pa/_/bcu gnyis 
[\[31b.4\]]bgrangs pa 'di dag ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal pos kun tu mnan/_/thams cad rim pa bzhin du gsungs/_/'khor lo'i phyi rol gnas pa 'khod/_/'bar zhing drag po'i mthu dang ldan/_/thams cad bstan nas 'khod pa ni/_/khro bo chen po snang byed pa/_/mthu rtsal chen 
[\[31b.5\]]po stobs su ldan/_/kun kyang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/_/sa bon snga ma mtha' yas rnams/_/gug skyed drug dang ldan par bya/_/steng du klad kyi 'khor gyis mtshan/_/sa bon bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'o/_/dang po dkyil 'khor na gnas gcig_/tsheg dang bcas pas don 
[\[31b.6\]]kun 'grub/_/rab tu 'bar ba'i sngags kyi mthar/_/'bar ba'i phreng ba can gyis bsgrags/_/sa bon gnyis pa gang yin pa/_/tsheg dang bcas par de bzhin gnas/_/rdo rje me rgyal zhes byas pa/_/khro bo don kun 'grub byed pa'o/_/dang po'i sa bon gsungs 
[\[31b.7\]]ba yang /_/snga ma bzhin du tsheg dang bcas/_/rab tu shugs drag cher grags pa/_/khro bo'i rgyal po khro bor snang /_/snang byed khro bo'i rim pa las/_/tsheg drag de bzhin khro bo che/_/de ni stobs po che zhes gsungs/_/gnyis par 'khor lo tsheg mtha' can/_/gang 
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]gsungs khro bo rgya chen ni/_/de ni snying por grags pa yang /_/mi thub gtso bo'i tsheg dang bcas/_/de yi gsum po tsheg bcas pa/_/de yang de bzhin bsgrags pa yin/_/'jigs pa zhes bya rab tu che/_/khro 'di khro bo snang byed pa/_/rgya chen gyi ni rim bzhin du/_/
[\[32a.2\]]bzhi pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/_/tsheg bcas rab tu drag po nyid/_/su ru khro bo de bzhin gzhag_/de yi sa bon lnga pa yin/_/'bar ba'i phreng chen zhes bya ba/_/tsheg dang bcas pa de bzhin du/_/khro bo phongs pa grol zhes bya'o/_/lnga po rgya chen nyid yin te/_/tsheg 
[\[32a.3\]]dang bcas par bsgrags pa'o/_/rab tu 'joms pa zhes bsgrags pa/_/khro bo'i khro bo snang byed pa'o/_/sa bon snga ma mtha' med las/_/snga ma tsheg bcas de bzhin gzhag_/kI li kI li bya ba yi/_/dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster/_/de bzhin de yi sa bon nyid/_/tsheg 
[\[32a.4\]]bcas de bzhin 'dir bshad do/_/kI li kI li chen po de/_/khro bo'i khro bo snang byed pa'o/_/khra bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/_/sa bon 'di dag rnams kyis bsgrags/_/khro bo'i rgyal po sbyor ba yi/_/rab tu snang bar byed ces bsgrags/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor los gnas/_/
[\[32a.5\]]gshin rje'i gshed po yin par gsungs/_/dang por de ni 'khor lo bstan/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang /_/khro bo'i rgyal po de las gzhan/_/khro bo'i bdag po snang byed pa'o/_/de ltar khro bo gsum po de/_/gang dang gang du rab sbyar ba/_/de dang de ru sngags rnams 
[\[32a.6\]]ni/_/skul bar byed pas de bzhin bskul/_/cho ga shes pas nan tan du/_/gang dang gang 'dod bsgrub par bya/_/khro bo sgom dang ldan pa yis/_/he la'i 'khor lo yongs bsgoms nas/_/dka' zhing bsgrub tu'ang mi rung ba/_/brtul zhugs hom dang bcas la sogs/_/
[\[32a.7\]]de yis dgod pa ma byas kyang /_/sngags dgod shes na bsgrub pa'o/_/he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pa/_/de yis dka' ba ma byas kyang /_/gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub/_/brtul zhugs hom dang bsam gtan dang /_/ji ltar gsungs pa'i dka' thub dang /_/mngon 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]par brtson zhing dad pa'i bdag_/lan grangs bcu gnyis gang bsnyen pa/_/rtog las gsungs pa'i las rnams byed/_/rab tu ya mtshan ston pa'o/_/he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pas/_/ring por mi thogs bde ba ni/_/khro bor bsgom pa dang ldan zhing /_/he la'i 'khor 
[\[32b.2\]]lo gnas 'dug na/_/khams gsum dag kyang lan cig gis/_/thogs med myur du g.yos par byed/_/de bas rab tu bsgrims nas su/_/khro bo bsgom pa goms byas te/_/he la'i 'khor lo las 'byung sngags/_/sbyor ba dag gis goms par bya/_/khro bo rnam 
[\[32b.3\]]par rgyal ba yi/_/rtog pa dang por gang bsgrags pa/_/de yi rtog pa gsang bshad pa/_/cho ga 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog_/khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di/_/cho ga de bas shin du gsang /_/khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang bshad pa/_/rab tu snang byed de bas kyang /_/
[\[32b.4\]]he la'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di/_/rab tu gsang ba'i mchog yin te/_/rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyis/_/rab tu gsang ba bshad pa yin/_/rtog pa rab tu gsang ba ni/_/'di dag rnam pa kun la yang /_/he la'i 'khor lo 'dra ba yi/_/'khor lo ma byung phyis mi 'byung /_/gang 
[\[32b.5\]]zhig 'di yi don thos nas/_/khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na/_/de yis 'bad pa ma byas kyang /_/'jig rten na ni bsgrub dka' med/_/he la'i 'khor lo'i gnas la ni/_/ji ltar 'dod par gnas nas su/_/khro bo bsgom dang rab ldan pas/_/khro bo'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/_/rtse 
[\[32b.6\]]gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog_/bsgrub pa mchog ni sbyin par byed/_/thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong /_/ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste bzhi pa'o//_//khro bo chen 
[\[32b.7\]]po'i tshig gi mthar/_/bskul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis gzhag_/bskul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/_/khro bo chen po phreng ba dang /_/bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'di yi mthar/_/kun tu dang po g.yo ba dang /_/sngags shes tsham ngam 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]mdzes pa yis/_/he la'i 'khor lo la gnas te/_/dang po gnas su 'dug nas su/_/be con phyag rgya lan cig bcing /_/de nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa/_/sngags pa 'greng ste 'dug pa ni/_/rkang pa gnyis ni bsgyur ba dang /_/khro bo bsgom pa 'di la ni/_/
[\[33a.2\]]sems ni rab tu zhen byas nas/_/sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa'am/_/ri dag g.yo ba'i bar du'o/_/de nas 'khor lo bsgrub pa yis/_/gnyis pa'i gnas la song nas su/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig mthar gnas/_/skoms shig ces par dbang bskur ro/_/de'i tshig thog 
[\[33a.3\]]mar bkod nas ni/_/de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/_/rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags/_/rab tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang /_/tsham ngam gsal ba dag la gnas/_/be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni/_/khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas so/_/
[\[33a.4\]]rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni/_/mtsho dang rdzing chen klung chen rnams/_/khros pas myur du skems par byed/_/'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'bebs/_/khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan gyi/_/sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya/_/rtsibs rnams rim pas kun mnan pa/_/gnyis 
[\[33a.5\]]po de las 'phos nas ni/_/de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug_/mthu rtsal ldan pas rim par gnon/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/bskrad par byos zhes tshig gnyis bskul/_/de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas/_/de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 
[\[33a.6\]]'khyil ba'i mthar/_/rab tu drag pa'i shugs bzhag go/_/rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yi/_/khro bo tsham ngam bsnyen par gnas/_/glang po myos ba'i shugs can dag_/mngon du 'ong bar gyur na yang /_/de ma thag tu skrag par byed/_/myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu 
[\[33a.7\]]dor/_/slad du log par phan tshun du/_/bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro/_/glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing /_/bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur/_/sgrub pa khro bo bsgom pa yi/_/cho ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no/_/he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i/_/bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]nas kyang /_/khro bo chen po'i chog gi mthar/_/non cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul/_/de nas cho ga sngar bshad pas/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa de yi mthar/_/khro bo chen po stobs chen bzhag_/kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa yi/_/tsham 
[\[33b.2\]]ngam gyis ni mi g.yor gnon/_/dpung ngam yang na glang po 'am/_/gru 'am yang na shing rta 'am/_/rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs/_/khro bo bsgoms pa'i tshul bzhin byas/_/sbyor ba de la gnas nas ni/_/rab tu mnan pa byas par 'gyur/_/de nas he la zhes bya ba'i/_/'khor 
[\[33b.3\]]lo lnga pa la gnas nas/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis bzhag_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang /_/mtha' yi tshig gi gnas su bzhag_/khro bo rgya chen zhes bya ba/_/rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang /_/
[\[33b.4\]]rab tu 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i/_/tsham ngam mchog gis myur du ni/_/dgra yi dpung rnams phan tshun du/_/rab tu rnam par dkrugs par bya/_/de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/_/rim pa drug la gnas nas ni/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/rmongs par gyur ces tshig 
[\[33b.5\]]gnyis bskul/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang /_/tshig gi tha mar kun du gzhag_/khro bo bzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin du bskul/_/rmongs par byed pa'i tsham ngam gyis/_/cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas/_/ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin/_/'gro ba 
[\[33b.6\]]myur du rmongs par 'gyur/_/de nas he la'i 'khor lo 'dir/_/rim bdun pa la gnas nas su/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis bzhag_/khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bar byed/_/'jigs par gyur pa'i 
[\[33b.7\]]sgra sgrogs pa/_/khro bo'i tsham ngam myur bar ni/_/dus min par yang sprin gyis khebs/_/de nas 'dod bzhin char pa 'bebs/_/de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/_/rtsibs kyi rim pa brgyad pa la/_/gnas nas 'dir ni snga ma bzhin/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/he he sa bon gnyis bzhag nas/_/de yi 'og tu 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]bdud rtsi 'khyil/_/khro bo zur du de bzhin du/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mtha' mar bzhag_/khro bo tsham ngam kha gdangs pa/_/mchog ces bya ba myur bar ni/_/rkang pa ya gcig gdangs pa'i stabs/_/sad dang ser ba rlung la sogs/_/dus sam yang na dus min par/_/sgrub 
[\[34a.2\]]po khro bo bsgoms pa yis/_/khro bo'i sngags kyis tshul bzhin du/_/sa yi steng du 'bebs par byed/_/he la'i 'khor la gnas brgyad po/_/bsgrub pa yi ni sar bor nas/_/khro bo'i sa bon tshig gsal ba/_/dgu pa bzang po la gnas te/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/
[\[34a.3\]]slong shig pa yi tshig gnyis bskul/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yi/_/tha mar phongs pa sgrol ba bzhag_/khro bo bsgom pas mdzes pa yi/_/tsham ngam gsal ba byas nas ni/_/khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bzlas/_/khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal/_/hU~M zhes bya ba bzang po yis/_/
[\[34a.4\]]khro bo dngos por bsgoms nas ni/_/shing gi rtse dang yal ga dgug_/yang na shing chen rtsa nas 'byin/_/me tog 'bras bu glog pa'am/_/yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed/_/ljon shing chen po rnams kyang ni/_/ji ltar 'dod par mi g.yor 'gyur/_/he la zhes bya'i 'khor 
[\[34a.5\]]lo yi/_/rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/chom shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul/_/khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa/_/khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/_/snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/_/'jigs par byed pa'i tsham ngam byed/_/
[\[34a.6\]]ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang /_/sgo dang lcags sgrog rnams kyi ni/_/khro bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du/_/bsgoms na rab mchog grub byed pa/_/he la yi ni 'khor lo yi/_/rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/_/brnyil cig ces pa'i 
[\[34a.7\]]tshig gis skul/_/khro bo kI li kI la yis/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bya ba/_/tshig gi mtha' mar gnas pa ste/_/cho ga bzhin du bshad pa bzhin/_/kI li kI la zhes bya ba/_/tsham ngam mchog la de bzhin gnas/_/be con gyi ni phyag rgya bcing /_/gshin 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]rje'i gshed po bsgom pa ni/_/rin chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang /_/rtse mo nas kyang [(]brnyil [,]bsnyil [)]bar byed/_/yang na ri khar skye ba yi/_/brtan pa'i shing rnams 'gyel bar byed/_/de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/_/bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas/_/khro bo chen po'i tshig 
[\[34b.2\]]gi mthar/_/zhugs shig ces pa'i tshig gis skul/_/bskul nas de yi tha mar ni/_/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag par bya/_/khro chen kI li kI la ya/_/de yi tha mar gzhag par bya/_/kI li kI la chen po zhes/_/bya ba'i tsham ngam de bzhin bya/_/be con phyag 
[\[34b.3\]]rgya bcings nas su/_/khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed/_/yid la rab tu goms byas na/_/rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs/_/'babs na phyung ste nam mkhar gnas/_/nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang /_/'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar byed/_/'di ni rang 'byung 
[\[34b.4\]]ngo mtshar la/_/'di ni dus gsum sngon du byung /_/spyod pa gzhan yang snga ma bzhin/_/khro bo sgom pas byed par gsungs/_/he la'i 'khor lo dgod pa ni/_/rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad/_/gsang dang bcas shing sbyor bcas pa/_/shes na dngos grub thob 
[\[34b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/de nas gzhan yang ci rigs pa/_/tsham ngam bcu gnyis sbyor ba dag_/mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul dag gis/_/da ni rab tu bshad par bya/_/kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin/_/de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad/_/skrag par byed pa gsum pa ste/_/
[\[34b.6\]]bzhi pa kun tu sdom par byed/_/rab tu 'khrug ces bya ba lnga/_/rmongs par byed pas de bzhin drug_/myur ba tsham ngam de la gnas/_/kha gdangs pa ni brgyad par bshad/_/mdzes zhes bya ba dgu pa ste/_/'jigs par byed pa bcu pa yin/_/
[\[34b.7\]]kI li kI la zhes bya dang /_/kI li kI la chen po yi/_/khro bo tsham dam bcu gnyis so/_/'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin/_/thog mar bsdigs pa'i rim pa yis/_/be con phyag rgya ldan par bya/_/phyi nas rang gzugs ji bzhin du/_/sngags 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa dag gis shes par bya/_/rang gi gzugs kyang rang gnas pa/_/bsdigs shang tsham ngam byed la sogs/_/skrag par byed pa'i kha ni zab/_/khro bo'i lta ba gdong 'gyur ba/_/rkang pa 'gyed par gzhag pa dag_/tsham ngam mtshan nyid 
[\[35a.2\]]bshad pa yin/_/rkang pa ya gcig myur du gzhag_/gdong dang nu mjing yon po byas/_/khro gnyer 'jigs par byed pa bsnyer/_/g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig gis bsdigs/_/tsham ngam byed cing be con gdengs/_/gdong dang brla dang rkang pa g.yon/_/kun 
[\[35a.3\]]du g.yo zhes bya ba ste/_/khro bo tsham ngam snyems dang bcas/_/kun du g.yo ba'i rim gsungs la/_/rab tu g.yo zhes bya ba ni/_/cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o/_/rab tu g.yo ba brtag par bya/_/de bzhin dpung pa brkyang pa dang /_/rkang pa g.yon 
[\[35a.4\]]pa gdangs pa dang /_/lag gnyis drag tu rdob pa ni/_/de bzhin skrag par byed par bshad/_/be con la ni blta bar gtad/_/rkang pa g.yas pa gsal bar phyar/_/de ni kun du sdom par bshad/_/g.yon pa'i 'dzub mos sdigs par byed/_/dpung pa gdengs 
[\[35a.5\]]pa g.yon bzhin du/_/mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gtad/_/rkang pa g.yas pa phyar ba ni/_/kun du 'khrug pa zhes bya'o/_/rkang pa g.yon pa gdengs byas te/_/g.yon phyogs su ni phyar zhing bskor/_/dpung pa brkyang ba'i be con gdengs/_/
[\[35a.6\]]bsdigs pa gcig tu rmongs par byed/_/myur du tsham ngam zhes bya ba/_/de nyid dpung brdabs bsdigs pa'o/_/de nyid las ni kha gdangs pa/_/kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin/_/sran dang bcas la bzhi ni bskor/_/mthu rtsal che ba'i stabs 
[\[35a.7\]]su stsol/_/mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan/_/lag pa phyar te sdigs par byed/_/bsnyems dang bcas shing sgra yang 'byin/_/'jigs par byed pa'i hU~M bsgrags pa'i/_/tsham ngam legs par bshad pa ni/_/mdzes pa'i khro bos gnon 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]pa'o/_/btsan thabs su ni bskor bar bya/_/rkang pa g.yas pa btsugs te mnan/_/lag pa gnyis ka drag rdob pa/_/byas nas 'jigs par bya ba ni/_/de bzhin snyems dang bcas bshad pa/_/tsham ngam bdag nyid chen po 'di/_/'jigs 
[\[35b.2\]]par byed pa zhes bya ste/_/rtag tu khro bo bsgom pa'o/_/rkang pa mnyam par bzhag te 'dug_/g.yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya/_/dpal dang ldan pas g.yon pa smad/_/g.yon pa sor mo gcig gis bsdigs/_/dpung pa bteg ste be con 'phyar/_/
[\[35b.3\]]rkang pa dag ni gdong bsgyur ba/_/rtag tu khro bo bsgom pa ni/_/kI li kI la zhes bya'o/_/kI li kI la chen po ni/_/de nyid las ni rgyab tu blta/_/khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums/_/myur du mchod stabs byed pa'o/_/'di ni tsham ngam sbyor ba ste/_/he la'i 'khor lo rtsibs rim 
[\[35b.4\]]las/_/mdor na ji ltar dgod pa dag_/legs par bshad pa 'di yin no/_/he la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngags dang /_/tsham ngam g.yas kyi mthu dga' yis/_/las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba/_/ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o/_/bsgrub pa de dag gsang rgyud dang /_/he la'i 
[\[35b.5\]]'khor lo 'di shes na/_/khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas/_/khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur/_/rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas/_/gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu bshad/_/khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las/_/mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do/_/khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/_/
[\[35b.6\]]rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di/_/rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba/_/thos nas gsang ba'i don bsgoms pas/_/lha de thams cad yi rangs nas/_/khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te/_/rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa lnga pa ste bcom ldan 'das 
[\[35b.7\]]'jam dpal gshin rje gshed po la rjes su yi rang ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]{D605}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya badzra b+hair ba d+hA ra NI nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma 
[\[36a.2\]]sel ba/_mtha' yas pa/_mu thug pa med pa/_dam pa sbyin pa/_shin tu rgya che ba/_thams cad bdag la mthun par rtag tu mtha' yas pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig_/de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/_/a ra ra/_a sa ma/_sa ma tA/_a nan+ta 
[\[36a.3\]]d+har+m+ma tre/_kha NA kha NA/_ma hA bi re/_tsa le sa ma ma/_A sa hA/_ma hA ba le/_ka Na ka Na/_ma hA ba la/_A gri he/_ha ha badzrA/_badzra hA ye/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_hU~M hU~M maN+Da la/_sa ma pa ra a kra bi kra me/_ku ru ku ru/_tu ru tu ru/_sarba thA/_sarba hi/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_
[\[36a.4\]]a kri Ni phaT swA hA/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro/_/las gzhan thams 
[\[36a.5\]]cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/_dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_snying po dang /_gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/_/rdo rje gtams 
[\[36a.6\]]pa 'dra ba ni/_/klu dang lha srin bcas pa yi/_/sum cu gsum lhas mi shigs pa/_/de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/_/brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/_/'byung po kun gyis ma smad pa/_/de ni bsrung bar byed pa'i mchog_/ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten 
[\[36a.7\]]na/_/sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/_/bden pa'i tshig ni de yis ni/_/skye bo kun la srung gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_oM badzra prA kA ra/_badzra prA kA ra/_badzra daM Sh+TA/_b+ha yA b+ha hA/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pa ri tsu ma bi ke/_/tsu lu te le/_na mo rat+na trA yA ya/_na mo badzra b+hai ra ba s+ya/_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]ma hA ga Na pa ti s+ya/_badzra shak+ti/_par shu/_pA sha_/hastA ya/_badzra kan ka_/badzra bai DUr+ya/_a lang kr-i ta/_sha rI rA ya/_badzra pA Ni ra nu pA lA ya/_tad+ya thA/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_A na yA/_A na yA/_ma hA ga na pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/_e hi e hi/_A kra ma A kra ma/_
[\[36b.2\]]sha rI raM/_gr-i hI ta ma/_graM hI ta ma/_daMSh+TA mA/_daM Sh+T+rI mA bA/_at+t+ra bi sha tu sha rI raM kiny+tsi rA ya si/_bi d+hu na/_ba d+ha na/_pa Ta pa Ta/_kaM pa kaM pa/_raM ga raM ga_/mo da mo da/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_bi dzr-i ma bA/_bi dzr-i ma bA/_pU ra pU ra/_g+hU r+N+Na g+hU r+N+Na/_A bi sha_/
[\[36b.3\]]A bi sha/_shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/_ma hA badzra b+hai ra b+he/_ga na pa ti rAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /_byad stems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/_sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod 
[\[36b.4\]]byas te/_sa la btsugs na de ma thag tu byad stems thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro/_/klu dbang du bya bar 'dod 
[\[36b.5\]]na khros te rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/_/ser ba bzlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na/_klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/_/chang bsrung 
[\[36b.6\]]bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs kar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/_/nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang mthun pa'i sman rnams chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/las gang byed pa thams cad 
[\[36b.7\]]la'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/_ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa rdzogs so//_//'phags pas gsungs pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang /_/rdo rje 'jigs 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/_/bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/_/kun gyi thun mong ma yin [(]rnam [,]rnal [)]'byor dam pa'i gzungs/_/rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/_bod kyi ban+de 
[\[37a.2\]]skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo //[ {D606}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA daN+Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[37a.3\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyal po'i khab 
[\[37a.4\]]kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/_/der 'di lta ste/_lha'i gdon rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang /_klu'i gdon rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /_srin po'i gdon rnams dang /_
[\[37a.5\]]mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang /_dri za'i gdon rnams dang /_mi'i gdon rnams dang /_rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon rnams dang /_'byung po'i gdon rnams dang /_sha za'i gdon rnams dang /_grul 
[\[37a.6\]]bum gyi gdon rnams dang /_gzig rnams dang /_bya rog rnams dang /_'ug pa rnams dang /_grog sbur rnams dang /_sdig sbrul rnams dang /_gzhan yang mi dang /_mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la shin du gtses so/_/de 
[\[37a.7\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/_sgra gcan zin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma 'byin/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 
[\[37b.2\]]zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/_der lha'i gdon rnams dang /_lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang /_klu'i gdon rnams dang /_
[\[37b.3\]]gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /_srin po'i gdon rnams dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon rnams dang /_dri za'i gdon rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang /_mi'i gdon rnams dang /_rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gdon rnams dang /_'byung 
[\[37b.4\]]po'i gdon rnams dang /_sha za'i gdon rnams dang /_grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang /_gzig rnams dang /_bya rog rnams dang /_'ug pa rnams dang /_grog sbur rnams dang /_sdig sbrul rnams dang /_gzhan yang mi dang /_mi ma lags pa'i sems 
[\[37b.5\]]can rnams kyis bdag la shin du gtses lags mod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/_sgra gcan zin khyod kyi be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_
[\[37b.6\]]dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba dang /_yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zungs shig_/tad+ya thA/_aM gA/_baM gA/_taM gA/_ta raM gA/_ta raM gA/_sa rA sa rA/_ta raM/_
[\[37b.7\]]gA swa/_sa dad sa/_dza d+ha rA/_ak+ka re/_a ra bI rA/_ta ra bI rA/_ka ra bI rA/_karka ra bI rA/_tsu ru bI rA/_tsu ru tsu ru bI rA/_in dra/_in dra ki/_sa ra ha na sa/_ha na sa ki sa ra/_me tsi re lA/_ma hA mits+tsha ba hi ShI kA/_ka lits+tsha ka_/aM ge dza ye/_
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]dza ye li kA/_A+elA/_tsin ta/_li le/_ti le ti le/_su ma ti/_pu su ma ti/_tsu lu naT+Te/_tsu lu tsu lu naT+Te/_tsu la na Te/_ku na Ti/_ha rI Ta ki/_na rI Ta ki ta/_gau ri/_gan+d+hA ri/_d+hA ra Ni/_d+hA ra Ne/_uSh+Ta/_pi pI li ka_/uSh+Ta/_pa pI la ke_/ka rA kar+Thi ke_/
[\[38a.2\]]kA ke le/_tsa la naT+Ti/_ka gi ma li/_la ma ti rak+Sha ma ti/_bA la ku li/_ba ta sa le/_un mi le/_ta ra bI re/_ta ra ta ra bI re/_ku ru bI re/_ku ru ku ru bI re/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru bI re/_ma hA bI re/_i ra ma ti/_bar ma ti/_rak+Sha ma ti/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/_a 
[\[38a.3\]]pra ti ha te/_rgyal po dbang po dang /_rgyal po zla ba'i dang /_rgyal po gshin rje dang /_rgyal po rlung lha dang /_rgyal po gzi can dang /_rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_rgyal po be con dang /_rgyal po be con med dang /_rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[38a.4\]]'das chos kyi rje/_chos kyi rgyal po/_'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la bsrung du gsol/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_
[\[38a.5\]]mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_mtshams gcad pa dang /_sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/_tad+ya thA/_i la mi le/_ta sa lA/_i ra ma ti/_bi ra ma ti/_tsa la ma ti/_phu ru ma ti/_phu ru phu ru/_phu ru phu ru/_pa ra khu ru ru/_khu ru 
[\[38a.6\]]ma ti/_b+hU mi maN+De/_ka li ke_/tsaN+Da li/_a ki sa rA li/_a yA sA/_sa la ma to/_ha le/_s+thu le/_sha le dza ya/_s+thu le/_tsa la nA Ti/_tsa la nA Ti/_nA gnan d+hA ra NI/_go ra hi Ni/_go le ti he/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_ke yU re/_ki tu ma ti/_b+hU taM ga me/_b+hU ta ba 
[\[38a.7\]]te/_d+har+ye/_ma hA ba le/_a tsuN+De/_a tsu run de/_d+ha ran d+ha ra/_dza ya li kA/_dza le go ro ha ni/_tsa ra/_hu ru hu ru/_ruM d+hu ruM d+hu/_hu ru/_d+hu ma ti/_d+ha ran d+ha re d+ha re/_bi shwa ma ti/_nA sha ni/_b+han+d+ha ni/_mo tsa ni/_bi mo tsa ni/_sA d+ha ni/_sho d+ha ni/_bi shod+ha ni/_saM gi 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ra Ni/_maM thI ra Ni/_a ts+tshid ta ni/_pA d+hu ta ra ma le/_ta ra ta ra ma Ni/_ha ra ha ra/_ban d+hu ma ti/_hi ri hi ri/_gi li gi le/_hu ru hu ru/_bing ga le swA hA/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya 
[\[38b.2\]]rtsa bcu pa 'di skud pa la mdud de/_lag pa la btags sam/_mgul du btags na kun nas dpag tshad bcu khor yug tu be con rnams dang /_me tog rnams dang /_phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi 
[\[38b.3\]]tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/mtshon dang /_dug dang /_nad dang /_rims nad dang /_rims drag po dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_ro langs dang /_khro gtum dang /_me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags 
[\[38b.4\]]sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyis ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par byed pa'o/_/grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa'o/_/pha rol gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o/_/pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/_/nad dang /_mya ngan dang /_bgegs rnam 
[\[38b.5\]]par 'jig par byed pa'o/_/'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/_/gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/_/gdon gang gis gtong ba de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 
[\[38b.6\]]'bar ba/_kun tu 'bar ba/_kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/_me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gems so/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten 
[\[38b.7\]]de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo/_/sgra gcan zin rgyal po dang /_mi rgod dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_mtshon cha dang /_'brog dang /_dgon pa dang /_ri dang /_mya ngam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod na/_sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/_
[\[39a.2\]]gsung ba/_gsung bar 'gyur ba mchog tu grub pa/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/_/bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur 
[\[39a.3\]]cig_/nad med pa dang /_'jigs pa med par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya 
[\[39a.4\]]ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[39a.5\]{D607}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya rat+na mA la nA ma a pa rA dzi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[39a.6\]]dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song 
[\[39a.7\]]ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gnod sbyin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dri za rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lto 'phye 
[\[39b.2\]]chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi'am ci rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srin po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rig pa'i bdag po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[39b.3\]]rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba'i snying po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu rnams kyis rjes su yi rang ba/_las thams cad byed pa/_gtsang ba brjod par bya ste/_dag cing de 
[\[39b.4\]]bzhin bkra shis pa/_/bsod nams byed gtsang dpal yon can/_/srin po 'joms pa lha rnams dang /_/sems can kun gyis mi thub pa/_/sdig pa thams cad rab 'jig pa/_/don kun sgrub pa dpal yon can/_/gdon kun rnam par 'jig byed pa/_/rig sngags 
[\[39b.5\]]'di ni brjod par bya/_/'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa/_/brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di/_/dug dang gshed byed 'jigs byed pa/_/me dgra rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang /_/gshed byed gdon dang ro langs dang /_/rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang /_/lha dang lha min dri 
[\[39b.6\]]za dang /_/gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las/_/kun nas dpag tshad brgya tshun cad/_/rtag tu bdag la bsrung bar mdzod/_/nyin gcig pa yi rims nad dang /_/nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum dang /_/nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang /_/mi bzad rims las 
[\[39b.7\]]'di srung byed/_/dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang /_/kha zas bzhin du 'ju bar 'gyur/_/gang gi mngal na mi 'chags dang /_/gang gi bu pho 'chi ba yang /_/rin po che yi phreng ba 'dis/_/de dag myur du 'tsho bar byed/_/nor 'dod pa ni nor rnams 'thob/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dpal 'dod pa yang dpal thob 'gyur/_/'thab cing 'gyed dang g.yul ngor yang /_/myur du rgyal bar byed pa yin/_/sems can rnams la gnod gzigs nas/_/'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa/_/rin chen phreng zhes bya ba yi/_/rig sngags 
[\[40a.2\]]'di ni brjod par bya/_/tad+ya thA/_oM d+ha na ka ri/_bi pu la ka ri/_dza ya ka ri/_yaSh+Ti ka ri/_br-id d+hi ka ri/_A yurda di/_pu N+ya dA ri/_a lak+Sh+mI pra sha ma ni/_d+ha na d+ha n+ya/_bi brta ni/_shrI ka ri/_sarba gra ha nak+Sha tra pra sha brti ni/_me d+hA dza na ni/_pu tra dza na ni/_pa ri ba rA bar+d+ha ni/_A yurda 
[\[40a.3\]]ni/_pri ti ka ri/_dzaM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_a mo g+ha shak+ti/_kany+tsa na mA le/_gra ha sau mya ka ra Ni/_sarba ka li ka la ha/_bi gra ha bi byA d+ha pra sha ma ni/_pa ra tsakra ni bA ra Ni/_pa ra sai n+ya/_staM b+ha ni/_tsit+ta nir ma lI ka ri NI/_sarba pA paM bra sha ma ni/_sarba kA la biSh+Ta nA sha ni 
[\[40a.4\]]swA hA/_tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/_tu ru tu ru swA hA/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_sarba de ba a nu dz+nyi te swA hA/_sarba nA ga saM rak+Shi te swA hA/_oM ni ri ni ri phaT/_ha na ha na phaT/_da ha da ha phaT/_pa tsa pa tsa phaT/_gang dag bdag la sdang bar sems pa dang /_/gnod par sems pa dang /_sbyin sreg 
[\[40a.5\]]byed pa dang /_byad byed pa dang /_byed du 'jug pa dang /_byed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad phaT phaT swA hA/_ag nIM staM b+ha yA mi/_bi ShAM sha trUM/_u da kA na/_tsau rA na/_sarba duSh+TA na/_sarba pra t+yar+thi ka/_pra t+ya man+t+rA na/_staM b+ha yA mi/_dzaM b+ha yA mi/_mo 
[\[40a.6\]]ha yA mi/_/phaT phaT swA hA/_gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ba/_/rin chen phreng gis rnam par brgyan/_/las kun byed dang de bzhin du/_/rtag tu srung ba byed pa 'di/_/'gro 'am yang na ci yang rung /_/de dag 'ga' zhig bris te 'chang /_/
[\[40a.7\]]srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog_/sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed/_/g.yul 'gyed pa dang 'thab par yang /_/kun du rgyal bar byed pa dge_/mi gang gtsang sbrar byas nas su/_/rig sngags 'di bris 'chang ba dang /_/bklags dran 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]shes rab can de la/_/'jigs pa kun tu mi 'byung ngo /_/cho ga bzhin du klog 'chang na/_/gsang ba po kun rtag tu bsrung /_/yongs su skyong bar byed par 'gyur/_/rtag tu rgyal bar byed pa ste/_/dper na rin chen phreng ba yis/_/mgo bo 
[\[40b.2\]]brgyan na mdzes pa ltar/_/de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes/_/gang zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang na/_/de yis gdon rnams rnam par 'jig_/nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel/_/de yi 'khor ni bzang por 
[\[40b.3\]]'gyur/_/sems can kun la phan phyir dang /_/bye brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs/_/lha yi dbang po rnams dang ni/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung /_/de la phyogs 
[\[40b.4\]]bcu rnams kyi ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad/_/dge ba dang ni nor rnams 'phel/_/sdig pa rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur/_/rmi lam ngan nyes byas pa yis/_/grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni mu ni mu ni 
[\[40b.5\]]ri/_ma ti ma ti ma ti/_/ma hA ma ti/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig_/srungs shig_/sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/_'phags pa 
[\[40b.6\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[40b.7\]{D608}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba an+ta rA yi ka bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs bram ze'i grong shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i byang phyogs na lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i 
[\[41a.2\]]dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i chos su gyur te/_tshe'i 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga ltas khong du chud nas skrag pa skyes te/_btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[41a.3\]]'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_yang de'i tshe don du gnyer ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de'i phyir khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad 
[\[41a.4\]]dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba/_bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams nyon cig_/tad+ya thA/_a b+ha ye/_b+ha ya bi ga te/_b+ha ya pa ri sho d+ha ne/_a b+ha ye/_a b+ha yaM da de/_ni ru 
[\[41a.5\]]pa kliSh+Ti/_a nA ku le/_a ku la pa ri sho d+ha ne/_a gwa te a bi kalpe/_a bi kalpa ne/_a ts+yu te/_shub+he shub+he/_te dza ste dzo ba ti/_sha me u pa sha me/_ma ho pa sha me/_mai tri mai t+r+yud d+hi te/_to She/_to Sha ya Ne sat+ye/_sa t+ya dar shi/_a bi rud d+he/_sa hi te/_sa hi ta twe/_ar+thi 
[\[41a.6\]]ar+tha sid d+hi/_a mr-i te/_a mr-i ta ba ti/_a b+hI te/_badzra sa t+ye/_a k+Sha ye/_ak+Sha ya pra b+he/_dran tra ba re/_shud+d+he shud+d+he pra b+he/_a ba b+hA se/_a ba b+hA sa ba ti/_u pa yo ge_/a nut+ta re/_sa ma tsit+ta/_bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne/_shI le bi sho d+ha ne/_/a saM hA r+ye/_su ni gr-i hI taM ma ra ba 
[\[41a.7\]]lA nAM/_ba ra dza yo dr-iSh+TA ga trA NAM/_dz+wa la naM d+harmolkA yai/_ud g+ha TA nA~M/_d+harma ni d+ha na s+ya/_saM gra hA NAM/_d+harma ko Sha s+ya/_kau shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi dag ni khyod kyi rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dag go/_/'di bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/_don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[41b.2\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_de'i tshe 'di skad du/_kho bo lha las ma gyur la/_/'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/_/kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/_/grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/_/zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/'di'i mthu 
[\[41b.3\]]thams cad kyis bdag gi bar du gcod pa dang /_bgegs dang /_log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyur cig_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig_/na mo a ke tu le na ge tsaN+Da na ye swA hA/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na ye swA hA/_d+harmA r+tha sA d+ha na ye swA hA/_sarba an+ta 
[\[41b.4\]]rA yi bi sho d+ha na ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon 
[\[41b.5\]]par bstod do/_/'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[41b.6\]{D609}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba a b+ha ya pra dA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa rab tu sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[41b.7\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/_a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni rab tu gnod pa bgyid pa ste/_bcom 
[\[42a.2\]]ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i dgra lags na/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i dbang bo khyod kyis 
[\[42a.3\]]thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags don thams cad byed pa/_'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_dug thams cad 'jil ba/_mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/_rkang med dang /_rkang gnyis dang /_rkang bzhi pa thams cad 
[\[42a.4\]]rengs par byed pa/_dgra thams cad phung bar byed pa/_lha dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_sbyin byed ma'i bu dang /_sha za dang /_brjed byed dang /_smyo byed dang /_bram ze'i srin po dang /_'byung po dang /_ro langs dang /_bya'i gdon dang /_srul po dang /_nam gru dang /_gnon po'i 
[\[42a.5\]]gdon dang /_gnon po dang /_brjed byed kyi gdon dang /_lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon dang /_gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang /_dri za'i gdon dang /_mi'am ci'i gdon dang /_log 'dren gyi gdon dang /_ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/_mdangs 'phrog pa dang /_zas su phreng ba za 
[\[42a.6\]]ba dang /_zas su spos za ba dang /_zas su me tog za ba dang /_zas su bdug pa za ba dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba dang /_zas su rnag 'thung ba dang /_zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/_rims nad thams cad dang /_rlung las gyur 
[\[42a.7\]]pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jigs par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zung shig_/thams 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a De ma De pra ma De/_pra baM ma di ri/_go le ma bo li bo se/_mod de bad de/_kha rad te/_kha ra ne/_gra Na gra Ne/_ga Na pra ga Ne mo Ne/_pra ti mo Ne/_kA lI pra kA lI/_tsaN De ma hA tsaN De/_pra ti tsaN De/_be ge a 
[\[42b.2\]]ti be ge so na/_go na/_mo hA/_pra mo hA/_mo ta tra mo TA/_nA shA ni/_pra nA shA ni/_d+ha ba nI/_pra d+ha ba nI/_ba la ga nI/_pra ba la nI/_nrid t+ya nI/_pra nrid t+ya nI/_kro d+ha ni/_pra ti kro d+ha ni/_ha na ha na bi ha na bi ha na/_sarba tuSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta na nA sha ya/_sarba a b+ha ya pra de/_bdag 'khor 
[\[42b.3\]]dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig_/srungs shig_/gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad grub par gyur cig_/de lta bas na/_khi di khi di/_tsum b+he/_sarba satwa hi te ra te/_na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM 
[\[42b.4\]]swA hA/_lha'i dbang po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig po 'di skud pa la mdud de bcings sam/_skra la mdud pa bor ram/_bzlas brjod byas sam/_yungs kar ram/_gi'u wang la lan cig sngags te bskus sam/_go cha la bsngags na 
[\[42b.5\]]mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_dug gis ma yin/_rims nad kyis ma yin/_nyin gcig pas ma yin/_nyin gnyis pas ma yin/_nyin gsum pas ma yin/_nyin bzhi pas ma yin/_mes ma yin/_gsang sngags kyis ma yin/_ro langs kyis ma yin/_dug gis ma yin/_nad kyis 
[\[42b.6\]]ma yin te/_chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sbyor ba sgrub pa thams cad sbyor ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par byed do/_/sbyar te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis mi tshugs par byed do/_/pha rol gyis bcings pa las 
[\[42b.7\]]grol bar byed do/_/gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed do/_/bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byed do/_/gdon thams cad phung bar byed do/_/gdon gang gis mi gtong na yang de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa thams cad la rab tu mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[43a.2\]]gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[43a.3\]{D610}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dra mi D+wa bi d+yA rA dza/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na 
[\[43a.4\]]smyig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khyams na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/_so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang 
[\[43a.5\]]de ltar 'chad kyis zung shig_/kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo lho phyogs na skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_/kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun 
[\[43a.6\]]gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod do/_/kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang /_phyogs rnam par gnas pa shes pa de la glog gis 'jigs pa thams cad du mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/_gnas 
[\[43a.7\]]gang dag tu gzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab po/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni ni mi ni ni mi ni ni min d+ha re/_'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/_lag 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[43b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/_'gro lding pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha te/_bi ha te/_ni ha te/_pra t+yar+thi ke/_pra t+ya mi tre/_shud d+he/_muk+te/_bi ma le/_pra b+hA swa re/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da 
[\[43b.3\]]re/_shwe te/_paN+Da ra bA si ni/_ha ri ka ra de/_pang+gi lA k+Shi dan+ti mu khi/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig_/srungs shig_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag gis dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar 
[\[43b.4\]]ma gyur cig swA hA/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams 
[\[43b.5\]]brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni mu ni re ri/_ma ti ma ti/_su ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_hA hA hA hA/_khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis/_dr-i D+ha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying 
[\[43b.6\]]la 'dzin tam/_yi ger bris nas de la bdag gis rtag par rgyun du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[43b.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li swA hA/_brah+ma swA re swA re swA hA/_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]brah+ma gar+b+he puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ba ste/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang 
[\[44a.2\]]po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das ga [p] de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ni ba ra 
[\[44a.3\]]NI/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mA dan d+he/_ma ti ma ti/_ti Ti/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma taM gi/_ba ra la ni/_hI na ma d+h+ya ma d+hA ra nI ma la ni/_da la ma t+te/_tsakra pa kri/_sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/_
[\[44a.4\]]'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar bgyid pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 
[\[44a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 
[\[44a.6\]]gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe puSh+pe/_d+harma ba ri ha ri/_Ar+ya pra sha ste/_nir mug+te/_mang+ga li/_stu te/_sta bi ste swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa 
[\[44a.7\]]zhes bya ste/_'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/_tshe skyong ba/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]lce dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bsrung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba glog thams cad zlog pa/_dus ma lags 
[\[44b.2\]]par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/_gdug pa rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/_gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang /_ser sna spang ba'i slad du
