[\[44b.3\]]thugs brtse bar dgongs te de bzhes su gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/_sems ser snas kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i slad du'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ra dze/_a ma re/_a mr-i te/_a k+Sha ye/_puN+ya par+ya 
[\[44b.4\]]pa te/_sarba pA paM pra sha ma nA ye swA hA/_Ar+ya puN+ya so pa kI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don tam/_yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig 
[\[44b.5\]]par bgyi'o/_/rtsa ba'i dug gam/_mche ba'i dug gam/_dbyig dug gam/_/gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las 
[\[44b.6\]]bde legs su gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_bzhin pa zangs dag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs

[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_klu'i dbang po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha mi yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 
[\[45a.2\]]mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[45a.3\]{D611}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_gA thA dwI ya d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang /_/le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin/_/'dod chags dang ni 
[\[45a.4\]]nga rgyal spyod pa dang /_/'gyod pa dang ni ma nges spyod pa rnams/_/sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur pa ste/_/de yi gnyen por theg pa mchog bstan pa/_/de yi bar du gcod pa de dag gi/_/nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/_/tad+ya thA/_oM badzra pra kA ra/_
[\[45a.5\]]badzra pra ka ra/_badzra tsakra/_daMSh+TA b+ha ya na ke/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_ni ra ma le/_tsu lu ke/_tsu lu tsu lu/_sarba bud+d+he swA hA/_tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni/_/tshig gam don gyi sgo nas gang sbyor ba/_/sems can dam pa blo dang ldan pa des/_/phan yon rnam 
[\[45a.6\]]pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur/_/khams rnams mtha' dag brtas par 'gyur ba dang /_/'chi ba'i tshe na mchog dga' dam pa 'thob/_/ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang /_/thams cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba 
[\[45a.7\]]dang /_/de bzhin de dag las ni theg mchog thos/_/mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang /_/sgo gnyis dang ni byang chub myur du 'thob/_/tshigs su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]{D612}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+ha dza a gra ke yU ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[45b.2\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na lwa ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs te/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pham/_rab tu pham nas de rtab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[45b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag 'di ltar lha ma yin dang g.yul bkye ba las/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris las pham/_rab tu pham ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum

[\[45b.7\]]bA hi ni/_shang ka ri shang ka ri/_pra b+haM ka ri/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/_sarba sha trUM/_dzaM b+ha ya dzaM b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_b+ha ga ba ti/_dza ya bA hi ni/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_gra sa gra sa/_ha sa ha sa/_hUM hUM/_la hUM la hUM/_la mA+o da ri/_

[\[46a.1\]]tri ne tre/_tsa tur bAk+t+re/_tsa tur daM Sh+the/_tsa tur b+hu dze/_a si mu sa la/_tsakra/_tri shU la/_badzra ka ba tsa d+hA ra Ni/_bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/oM b+ha ga ba ti/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_d+hu na d+hu na/_
[\[46a.2\]]bid+hu na bid+hu na/_hUM hUM/_phaT phaT/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_pa ra sai n+yaM/_bid+h+wan+sa ya/_sarba sha trUM nA sha ya/_d+h+wa dza a gra ke yU re/_tri Ta tri Ta tri Ta/_b+h+ri Ta b+h+ri Ta/_ulkA mu khi ulkA d+hA ra NI/_trai lo kya ma thA ni/_bid+h+wan+sa ya pa ra se n+yan/_bdag gnod pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/

[\[46a.4\]]d+harma sa t+ye na/_saM g+ha sa t+ye na/_sa t+ya bA di nAM/_sa t+ye na/_bud+d+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_d+harma sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_saM g+ha sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_sa t+ye bA di nAM/_sa t+ye mA ti kra ma/_lam+bo da ri/_lam+bo da ri/_ku Ta ku Ta/_kuT+Ta guT+Ta/_kuT+TA pa ya kuT+TA pa ya/_ru dra ma nA ya/_baSh+Ni ma nA ya/_tsan+d+ra 
[\[46a.5\]]sUr+ya prah+ma ma nA ya trai lokya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya sarba de ba a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/_sarba yak+Sha/_rak+Sha sa/_gan d+harba/_kuM b+haN+Da/_ma ho ra ga a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/_bi d+h+wan+sa ya ba ra sai n+yaM/_raM ga raM ga_/raM gA pa ya raM gA pa ya/_dz+wA la dz+wA la/_puSh+pa mA li ni/_run+d+ha run+d+ha/_ri ti ri ti/_tsi ti 
[\[46a.6\]]tsi ti/_d+h+ri ti d+h+ri ti/_b+h+r-i ku Ti/_mu kha pa ra se na gu lo ta sA da ni ka ri/_ha la ha la/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_he he/_ri ni ri ni/_ri ni ma ti/_dzaM b+ha d+h+wa dze/_sarba bud+d+ha/_a ba lo ki te/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/sarba ta thA ga ta a pa lo 
[\[46a.7\]]ki te swA hA/_gu Na rA dza pra b+ha sot+ta me swA hA/_sUr+ya arka bi ma le swA hA/_tsan+d+ra arka bi ma le swA hA/_sarba gra ha na k+Sha tra d+he mI ka ra Ne swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_lha'i rgyal po rgyal 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul sprod pa'am/_'thab pa'am/_rtsod pa'am/_'gyed pa'am/_gang du 'gro yang rung ste mi 'jigs shing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'am/_mgul du btags na

[\[46b.3\]]pa dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa kun tu gnas par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la

[\[46b.5\]{D613}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsun+da de bI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang 
[\[46b.6\]]mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/_rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi 
[\[46b.7\]]thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig_/na maHsap+tA nAM/_saM myak+sam bud d+ha ko TI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsa le tsu le/_tsun+de swA hA/_brtson 'grus chen po/_thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/_stobs che ba/_pha rol gnon pa che ba/_phyag na ral gri dang /_dgra sta dang /_lcags kyu dang /_
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]zhags pa bsnams pa/_khro mo chen mo/_khro mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/_drag po'i gzugs can ma/_zhal ras mtha' yas ma/_phyag stong mnga' ma/_/ma pham ma/_gzhan gyis mi thub ma/_don yod ma/_gdul bar dka' ma/_mig stong ma/_de bzhin 
[\[47a.2\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/_lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/_rdo rje sen mo can/_rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/_rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/_rdo rje'i sku can ma/_rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/_rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/_
[\[47a.3\]]drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/_sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma/_oM b+ha ga ba ti/_tsun+de hUM hUM/_krUM krUM/_mrUM mrUM/_srUM srUM/_rUM rUM/_A be sha ya/_gr-ih+Na grih+Na/_gr-ih+NA pa ya/_gr-ih+NA pa ya/_ha ra ha ra/_b+hany+dza 
[\[47a.4\]]b+hany+dza/_sa ra sa ra/_ma ra ma ra/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_pa tsa pa tsa/_da ha da ha/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_sdang ba'i gdon dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_zhag bdun pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_
[\[47a.5\]]'byung pa dang /_ro langs dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum gyi gdon dang /_mngal las skyes pa dang /_las las skyes pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas pa 'di dag dang /_sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang /_gdug pa de 
[\[47a.6\]]dag thams cad/_saM d+ha ya saM d+ha ya/_marda ya marda ya/_sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/_tA pa ya tA pa ya/_uta sA d+ha ya uta sA d+ha ya/_ha na ha na badzre Na/_sa ra sa ra daN+De na/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_khak+ke na/_hUM hUM hUM/_tsUM tsUM tsUM/_drUM drUM drUM/_oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/_bcom 
[\[47a.7\]]ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/_'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//_
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]{D614}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su mu khan nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das byang 
[\[47b.2\]]chub kyi shing drung na byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[47b.3\]]te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[47b.4\]]dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[47b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/_gang gis sems can rnams la snang ba bgyi bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyir rgol ba dang /_dgra thams cad kyis gnod pa mi bgya bar bsrung ba dang /_bskyab 
[\[47b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_'di lta ste/_lha'i dbang po rnams dang /_klu'i dbang po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_srin po'i dbang po rnams dang /_'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sdig pa dang /_mtshon dang /_dug dang /_byad kyis 
[\[47b.7\]]gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_phar mchi'am/_slar mchi'am/_nyal lam/_gnyid kyis log gam/_smyos sam/_rab tu smyos kyang rung /_thams cad du yang skyob par 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/_ji ltar bdag rtag tu de 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang /_rtag tu bsrung ba dang /_yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang /_mtshang 
[\[48a.2\]]'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_nad dang /_dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba 
[\[48a.3\]]btab pa thugs su chud nas/_de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_sgo 
[\[48a.4\]]bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o/_/u gu mu gu ba li ni/_ban d+ha ni/_ba la tsa ma na/_ba hu ba hu ba hu li brtA ya swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gzung bar 
[\[48a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_badzrI badzrI badzrI badzI d+ha ri/_badzra pA Ni/_badzrI d+ha ri/_tsakra badzri/_tsakra d+ha ri/_pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/_b+hi ri/_mu ri/_tsi ri/_a hu ri/_b+ha ga/_b+hi b+hi ri/_shi ri tra/_shi ri/_ru ru tse ru ru tse/_tsa ri tsa ri/_da ri tsa le/_tsu ri mu ri/_paN+Da re/_
[\[48a.6\]]sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/_tad+ya thA/_ban d+hi da/_ga ga ra Ni/_murta ni/_pra murta ni/_nA sha ni/_pra nA sha ni/_nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ni rmi lam ngan pa'i bar 
[\[48a.7\]]du 'gog par byed pa/_'di lta ste/_nA sha ni/_nA sha ni/_ban+d+ha ni/_ban+d+ha ni/_ts+tshin+da ni/_ts+tshin+da ni/_tsi re mi re/_ma he ha da ni/_ba ni ba re/_kha re be re/_bi ri bi ri/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_su Sha Ni/_shar Ni/_ba ru ba ri Ni/_par hUM ye/_brah+ma tsA ri Ni/_in+d+ra ba ti/_d+hi d+hi rI ya Ni/_na mo ma he shwa ra ya Ni/_r-i shi/_bany+dza ni 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pA pa dza ha ni/_kA la pa ti ni/_b+hu ta pa da ni/_sa t+ya ga the/_so ma bA di/_so ma pra b+he swA hA/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_tad+ya thA/_ha ra ha ra ha ra hA Ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_i Di ta ga Di ta ba di da/_a ye na/_a ri bany+dza ni ka kI rta ni/_pu tra dad hA ni/_marga a b+hi ro ha ni/_hu sa ba ti/_mu pa ba ti/_
[\[48b.2\]]hi li hi li/_ya thA pa dzu ya/_ya thA ag+Ni ya thA ba ra na tsa/_ya thA na la/_ya thA na la/_ya thA badzra Na/_ya thA hr-i da ya swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin 
[\[48b.3\]]gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par bzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer 
[\[48b.4\]]byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo /_/'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas chas te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_shAkya 
[\[48b.5\]]thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/_mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/_dran par byed pa/_bshad par byed pa legs so legs so/_/bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab bo/_/
[\[48b.6\]]legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[48b.7\]]thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang /_ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang /_ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang /_longs spyod dang ldan pa 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]dang /_stobs dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su chud par 'gyur ba dang /_lha thams cad kyis bsams par 
[\[49a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_dge bar spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang /_snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[49a.3\]]rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams gsungs shing /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin 
[\[49a.4\]]no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams 
[\[49a.5\]]bshad par bgyi'o/_/su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa de rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka/_tsi tsi tsi tsi/_b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/_ru ru ru ru/_
[\[49a.6\]]dzi dzi dzi dzi/_gra gra gra gra/_hri hri hri hri/_ha ha ha ha/_ma ma ma ma/_ha na ha na me/_sarba pra t+yar+tha kA/_da ha da ha me/_sarba sha tra ba/_pa tsa pa tsa me/_sarba a hi te Shi na swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes 
[\[49a.7\]]bya ba byin te/_lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams smras pa legs so legs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li tsi li swA hA/_bra h+ma swA re swA hA/_bra h+ma a ba su garbe/_a kalpe/_pu Sha saM sta re swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[49b.2\]]'das 'di ni gang nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[49b.3\]]'das bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[49b.4\]]tad+ya thA/_bo d+hi tsit+te/_ba ra Ni/_da mA ra Na De/_dit+ti dit+ti/_gau ri/_gan d+hA ri/_sar ma tan ta/_badzra tu la ni/_dz+wA la mA li ni/_tsakra bA ka/_sha ba re/_sha ba re/_sha ma re/_sha ma re swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 
[\[49b.5\]]'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi 
[\[49b.6\]]rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe su puSh+pe/_sho d+ha ni/_saM sho d+ha ni/_d+hu ma ba re ha re/_
[\[49b.7\]]Ar+ya pra shaste/_shAn+te/_nir muk+te/_maM ga l+ye/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he sta ra sta pa swA hA/_de nas 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa dang /_yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_pi li sib pi li/_si li/_ma hA 
[\[50a.2\]]pi pi li/_si me li si/_gu ru Ne/_gu ru gu Ne/_ma hA ku ru Ne phu swA hA/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo 
[\[50a.3\]]bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_aT+Te phu/_baT+Te phu/_naT+Te phu/_ku na T+Tephu/_ma naT+Ta phu/_muT+Ta ta ha ke phu/_shri phu/_b+haM ge phu/_maM ke phu swA hA/_de nas 
[\[50a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de 
[\[50a.5\]]la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyang ba dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/_/mtshams bcad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_he badzre/_he badzre/_hI hA/_bi si bi si/_
[\[50a.6\]]ma hA bi si phu swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[50a.7\]]kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu lu lu/_sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/_de nas sde dpon gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar 
[\[50b.2\]]bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_tu ru tu ru/_tu ru tu ru/_sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/_de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 
[\[50b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang 
[\[50b.4\]]bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_aM ge/_baM ge/_tsaM ge hi ni/_Di Di/_di di/_tsi tsi phu swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 
[\[50b.5\]]gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha te/_bi ha te/_ni ha te/_sarba pra t+ya/_rI kA pra t+yA/_mi tra shud d+he/_
[\[50b.6\]]muk+te/_bi muk+ti/_bi ma le/_nirma le pra b+ha swa re/_pra b+ha ka re phu swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[50b.7\]]tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+wa le dz+wa le/_ma hA dz+wa le/_dz+wa le ni/_uk+ke/_muk+ke/_sha me/_pra sha me/_ma hA pra sha me/_sha me sa mA d+he/_ma hA sa mA d+he/_sa mA ba d+he/_dz+wa le/_
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]ma hA dz+wa le/_dz+wa le ba me phu swA hA/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[51a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_u duM ba re/_u duM ba re/_duM be/_pra duM be/_byA brde/_A nag+he/_sa mA d+he/_ma hA sa mA d+he/_nI le 
[\[51a.3\]]nI le/_nI la ke she/_ke shi ni/_ku le ku le/_ma hA ku le/_nI la ku le/_sid+d+hi/_sid+d+he/_ma no hA re/_aT+Te/_baT+Te/_naT+Te/_ku naT+Te/_sa ma the/_ba ba la/_ku tse/_dAn+te/_nI la ka she/_ku le/_nI la/_d+han+te/_dzAM gu le/_hu she/_mU she/_ba laM ku she/_ha la ku she/_pha la mu tse swA hA/_de nas 
[\[51a.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 
[\[51a.5\]]'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_nir ma le/_maM ga le/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/_sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/_ka maSh+tsi ni/_yu bi ra dze/_ku Ta ku Ta/_kaM ba le/_brah+ma/_
[\[51a.6\]]brah+ma swa re/_brah+ma sid d+he/_sid d+hi ma no ra the phu swA hA/_de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[51a.7\]]chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]badzre/_badzre/_ma hA badzre/_badzra da ni/_bud+d+ha badzra/_bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badzre/_su bud+d+he/_ni bud+d+he/_ba hu bud+d+he/_bi shiSh+Ta bud+d+he/_shud+d+he/_bud+d+he/_bud+d+he/_nI shaM grA ma Ni/_dzaM ge le/_a la se/_te li me/_ti le/_ti li le/_marge/_shAn+ta/_shAn+ta/_gA mI ni phu swA hA/_de nas byang chub 
[\[51b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la 
[\[51b.3\]]bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi le badzre/_hi hi badzre/_he he badzra/_ya ba ki ri ki ri badzra swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_shwe te/_paN+Da ra ba si ni/_kin+nare/_ka rA de/_ke yU re/_i ha bud+d+he/_ta twa bud+d+he/_b+hU dze b+hU dze/_b+hU dzaM ga me/_b+hU dza pA pa te/_b+ha ye b+ha ye/_b+ha ya a gra ba te/_bi 
[\[51b.4\]]nI bi nI/_shi ri pa the/_shi ba pa the/_A di t+ya pa the/_te dze te dza ba to/_A kA sha pa the phu swA hA/_de nas rdo rje pho nya mos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po 
[\[51b.5\]]zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ku Te ku Te/_ku Ti ni/_ku Ta ku Ta re swA hA/_nI li nI le/_nI la ke 
[\[51b.6\]]she swA hA/_pI te pI te/_pI ta ke she swA hA/_lo hi te lo hi te/_lo hi ta ke she swA hA/_a ba dA de/_a ba dA de/_a ba dA ta ke ni swA hA/_many+dziSh+The many+dziSh+The/_many+dziSh+The ke she swA hA/_tsakre tsakre/_badzra tsakre swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang 
[\[51b.7\]]nas/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lha dang /_'jig rten skyong ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /_bsrung ba'i phyir 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos 
[\[52a.2\]]kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing /_nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/_lha'i dbang po dang /_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po 
[\[52a.3\]]dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 
[\[52a.4\]]de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen 
[\[52a.5\]]gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D615}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba hu pu tra pra ti sa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_
[\[52a.6\]]sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom 
[\[52a.7\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag deng 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thab rtsod mtshang brus te bkye bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]'das de la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/
[\[52b.2\]]lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_da De/_ba da De/_u pa da Da da De/_u pa da De da Da/_gam b+hi rI/_a brta ne/_ni brta ne/_d+ha hi d+ha hi/_a brta ni/_bdag gi/_sarbe shA na karmi/_kA nA~M/_pra t+yar+thi kA nA~M/_pra t+ya mo tri NA~M/_tsak+Shurmo hA nA~M/_ka ro mi/_shro tra mo hA nA~M ka ro mi/_
[\[52b.3\]]dzi hwA grA NAM ka ro mi/_dzi hwA ma hA dzaM b+hA nA~M/_sta~M b+hA nA~M/_mo hA nA~M/_pra mo hA nA~M/_khyim bdag gang la la zhig bu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar po la lan bdun sngags te/_lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na de'i lus la dug dang /_mtshon dang /_nad dang /_
[\[52b.4\]]rims nad dang /_rims drag pos mi tshugs so/_/'thab pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[52b.5\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[52b.6\]{D616}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sa p+ta be tA Da ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[52b.7\]]rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go/_/de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/_ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to/_/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/_dmigs pa ma rnyed do/_/de dag gis glags ma rnyed/_dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[53a.2\]]kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go/_/reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa tsha ba shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[53a.3\]]bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa tsha ba/_shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das des ma dgongs so/_/bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[53a.4\]]pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos thos so/_/de nas de gnyis tshe dang 
[\[53a.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa/_tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad ces smra'am/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[53a.6\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na sog les mgo bo gshags pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig_/bdag cag gis khyod khri'i 
[\[53a.7\]]steng du bzhag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bskur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob par mdzad par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/_
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_drag pa/_tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/_btsun pa 
[\[53b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/_gdul dka' ba/_mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/_bdun gang zhe na/_
[\[53b.3\]]'di lta ste/_phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang /_nor bu 'dzin dang /_gtum po dang /_gdol pa dang /_rma bya'i snying dang /_tshe zad dang /_la ba can te/_ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/_gdul dka' ba/_bsnyen par dka' ba/_rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che 
[\[53b.4\]]ba'o/_/kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to/_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go/_/steng du bltas na sa 'gas par byed do/_/phyogs su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs 
[\[53b.5\]]mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par byed do/_/de dag gis khyod la reg go/_/de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_chos thos pa'i gus pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yin no/_/kun dga' bos gsol 
[\[53b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol/_phyir bzlog tu gsol/_phyag rgya bcing du gsol/_skud pas bcing du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par 
[\[53b.7\]]bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha ra ma hA gA re/_g+ha sa ra ba ti/_d+ha ra d+ha ri/_d+ha ra Ni tsho ra tsho ra Ni/_ka ro ti ti/_kot+ta sa mA d+hi ni/_sa ma ra sa ra Ni/_sa ra na ko ta mi ti/_sam+b+ha be/_b+ha ba na/_nA ga re/_b+ha da nI/_sA dA niti swA hA/_kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bor na brjed byed thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/de ltar mdzod 
[\[54a.2\]]cig_/slar yang mi 'chi bar mdzad du gsol/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_bad tsa le ba le/_ma hA bad tsa le ba le/_b+hi li b+hi li/_ma hA b+hi ri NI/_ni mi ri ni/_ha na ha na ha ti ri/_ma tsa thA/_ma bi tsa ra thA/_ti re s+thi ra mu le/_ma tha ni rma ba ni/_tsA la ni/_
[\[54a.3\]]mA ka nI/_dzaM b+ha ni/_pI dA ni/_b+ha ya swa kr-i ni/_b+ha ga ba ti/_ta thA ga ta/_bi ta the/_ti bi g+ha d+ha re/_pa ra pra de/_ha re tiSh+Tha/_nI la ba sa ni swA hA/_kun dga' bo ro langs 'di dag ni 'tshog pa/_sdang ba/_gtum por gyur pa/_gsod par gyur pa'o/_/de la rig sngags 'dis ke mo ru ka'i 
[\[54a.4\]]skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ro/_/des na 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/_/'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/_'dzem par 'gyur/_zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur 
[\[54a.5\]]'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_da ra da ra da ra/_ka ra ka ra ka ra/_ma hA kak+kar/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa da tsa ra/_ma hA tsa da tsa ra/_ha la ha la ha la/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_hi re bi re/_ki ri bi ri/_bai rai bi tsi 
[\[54a.6\]]ni/_ka raM ka ri/_sarba b+hU tA nAn/_pra dzaM b+ha ni/_nI la ba ra ba sa ni/_tsa ts+tshu/_tsakra tsakra/_a yu d+he swA hA/_kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin thams cad dang /_srin po thams cad dang /_gsang sngags thams cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_byad dang /_sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 
[\[54a.7\]]byed pa'o/_/rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang /_la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do/_/de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gsang sngags 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig_/chongs shig_/legs par rab tu yid la zung shig_/rjes su sbyor bar gyis shig_/de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+ha d+ha ra/_kha ra kha ra/_ma hA kha ra/_ma hA ba le/_ba la nA sha ni/_goT+TA 
[\[54b.2\]]nI/_kuT+Ta nI/_saM hA re/_ku Ta daM Sh+Te/_ka kha kha re/_ma kuT+Ta d+ha re Ni/_mu luk+ka/_k+She ni ka kai nI ke_/sa mesma shA ni/_ki ni/_gi ri Ni/_b+ho gi si ri/_sa sA be tA Ta/_ku mA ra ka/_kr-i te swA si/_kin ni bi bud+d+ha si/_bi bud d+h+ya/_bi bud d+h+ya/_gr-i hAM b+hai/_kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/_bi kr-i ta 
[\[54b.3\]]b+hai ra ba/_ma hA ba ye/_kr-i twa na/_ha ri si/_kin na mA ra ya si/_ki na na sarba de ba/_nA ga/_yak+Sha/_gan+d+ha r+b+he/_a su ra/_sarba a su ra/_sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/_maM sa ra swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sreg gam/_skud pas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa 
[\[54b.4\]]thams cad 'jig par byed/_ltung bar byed/_za bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo ro langs thams cad rengs par byed pa'i rig sngags zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_se me le/_ma hA ha ha le/_ha ra d+ha re/_g+ho ra d+ha re/_d+ha rat+ti/_rit+ti/_bi rot+ti/_ku nat+ti/_ku ta ni/_saM go tsa ni/_ka tsa ri/_kha tsa ri/_ma 
[\[54b.5\]]ra ni/_hu hu/_ma re Na/_ma hA mA la d+ha re/_na yo na ma ti swA hA/_kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/_'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud 
[\[54b.6\]]pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bor na/_log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig_/legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig_/kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nus so/_/kun dga' 
[\[54b.7\]]bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig_/tad+ya thA/_tsa ts+tsha ra/_tsa ts+tsha ra/_ma hA tsa ts+tsha ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bu ru bu ru/_ma hA bu ru/_saM b+ha le/_ma hA saM b+ha le/_ma hA ba le swA hA/_kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang /_bram 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ze dang /_skye dgur bcas pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spro ba ni ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/_srung ba dang /_rjes su 'brang ba yin no/_/gsang sngags 'di ni mi bzad pa ste/_sreg par byed/_'tshed par byed/_'ching bar byed/_'joms par byed/_
[\[55a.2\]]'bar bar byed pa yin te/_rig sngags lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig por na sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/_rig sngags gcod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[55a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/legs par bzung lags so/_/mdud pa dor du gsol/_phyag rgya gzhag par mdzad du gsol/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_tad+ya thA/_b+ha b+ha re/_b+ha re/_b+ha ra Ni ha ra pra ha re/_ha ra ni/_ku tha ni ta Ti/_le ts+tsha dad ti/_tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags 
[\[55a.4\]]gcad do/_/dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i 
[\[55a.5\]]rig sngags gcad do/_/zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/phyogs mtshams nas byas 
[\[55a.6\]]pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/
[\[55a.7\]]grul bum gyis byas pa dang /_tshor ba pas byas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gdol pas byas pa dang /_kla klo dang /_ri khrod pas byas pa dang /_seng ge dang /_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]sbrul gyis byas pa dang /_'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang /_g.yung pos byas pa dang /_to sa la pas byas pa dang /_mud ga ri khrod pas byas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rig sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/_/tad+ya thA/_ga ga gA ra li phu/_
[\[55b.2\]]ma hA ga ga gA ra li phu/_bi she phu/_sha par sid d+hi phu/_tsaN+DA le phu/_ma hA tsaN+DA li phu/_tso gi phu/_tsi mi ri phu/_tsi tsi mi re phu/_tsakre phu/_tsakra d+ha re phu/_kr-iSh+Ne phu/_kriSh+Ne ru pe phu/_tsaN+De phu/_so ge phu/_pany+tsa Ta li phu/_pany+tsa li phu/_b+hi me phu/_b+hi pA pa le phu/_piM ge 
[\[55b.3\]]le phu/_piM ga la/_ak+She phu/_a nan+te phu/_sa min+te phu/_nA sha nI phu/_ts+tshe da ni phu/_bdi ts+tshe da ni phu swA hA/_kri sa ni/_bak+Sha ni/_mA ra ni/_pin+da ni/_bin d+ya naM/_bak+Sha ni/_nA shA ni/_khAd d+ya ka naM/_gA la b+hi nA shA nI/_dA hA ma si b+hasma b+hasma/_ma sa ni/_ban+d+ha ni swA hA/_
[\[55b.4\]]kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi brjid 'phrog par byed pa'o/_/kun dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/_ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/_de ston gyi dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs nas/_
[\[55b.5\]]gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te de yang bcad do/_/kun dga' bo ro langs kha gcig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o/_/klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu 
[\[55b.6\]]bar bya'o/_/klu thams cad dang /_grul bum thams cad dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/_nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/_nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/_rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/_sgyu 
[\[55b.7\]]ma len gyi bu pa ro pa Ti/_she ru dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/_phung po 'dzin dang mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus/_de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang /_'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus so/_/kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu/_/nga yis 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]chad pa dag byas pas/_/nga la 'byung pos byar ci yod/_/nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom/_/gsod par gyur pa stobs po che/_/ro langs dag gis byar ci yod/_/de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas/_/kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin/_/zhags pa 
[\[56a.2\]]kun gyis de dag kyang /_/rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas/_/'di yis bdag gis kun 'grub cing /_/gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig_/na maHsid d+hA nAn/_sid d+hu na tu man+t+ra pA da swa sti re me sarba sa twA nAny+tsa swA hA/_sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs 
[\[56a.3\]]gang dang /_/dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang /_/dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis/_/bde legs su ni rab gyur cig_/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA/_cho ga ni lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/_
[\[56a.4\]]kai me ru dang /_bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor ro/_/de bzhin du byab pa yang bya'o/_/'byung po thams cad dang /_brjed byed dang /_sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang /_dug byin pa dang /_dug byas pa dang /_rkang gnyis 
[\[56a.5\]]pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[56a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang /_ban+de ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang /_zhu 
[\[56a.7\]]chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D617}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha dra rA trI nA ma sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu ta la po ta'i 'gram na 'dug go/_/de nas 
[\[56b.2\]]lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chu ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag 
[\[56b.3\]]gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu 
[\[56b.4\]]su mchis/_des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/_khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung 
[\[56b.5\]]la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong de nang par langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[56b.6\]]gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mdang dgung rmongs nas bdag gi der lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba der mchis te/_chab ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pas 
[\[56b.7\]]snang bar bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/_bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so/_/lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/_lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/_de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/_/lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu su mchis/_des 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka 
[\[57a.2\]]gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyed la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di zung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi gda' bar gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di yongs su zhu'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[57a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/_dge slong des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma 'tshal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon te tsan+dan zhes bya'o/_/dge slong des gsol pa/_btsun pa bdag kyang 
[\[57a.4\]]mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/dge slong chos gsum dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/gsum 
[\[57a.5\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'das pa la rjes su phrad par mi byed pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/_chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[57a.6\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad du gsung ngo /_/'das pa rjes su phrad mi byed/_/ma 'ongs pa la re ba med/_/'das pa gang yin de 'gags te/_/ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o/_/gang dag da ltar byung 
[\[57a.7\]]ba'i chos/_/de dang de la rab bltas nas/_/rnam par rtog pas mi phrogs par/_/de dag mkhas pas khong du chud/_/sang tsam 'chi 'am su shes kyis/_/de ring nyid du rtun de bya/_/'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/_/bdag tu shes pa ma yin no/_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]po kun dang thams cad kyang /_/bde ba 'ba' zhig 'grub 'gyur te/_/thams cad nyon mongs med par shog_/thams cad bzang por mthong gyur te/_/gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig_/de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la/_/nyin mtshan snyom las med pas na/_/de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yi/_/
[\[57b.2\]]mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/_'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/_/tad+ya thA/_bi ni bi ra Ni/_pa ni pU ra ni/_bud+d+ha marte/_ma ni ni/_Ni Ni Ni Ni/_Ti Ti 
[\[57b.3\]]Ti Ti/_pa ra Ti/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma ta~M gi/_puk+ka si/_b+ha ma ni/_dra mi dri/_dra mi dri/_sha ba ri/_sa ra lam b+he/_hI na ma d+ha ma d+ha tra ra ni/_ma ho la na/_da la ba ni/_da la ba ni/_da la bad te/_ma hA da li ni/_tsa li ni/_muSh+Te tsakra pA ti/_ma hA tsakra pA ti/_sha ba ri sha ba ri/_ma hA sha ba ri/_
[\[57b.4\]]b+hu tsid gi ni/_b+hU tsi rang gi ni/_ni mi/_ni mong gi ri/_ni min d+hi ni/_b+hU b+ha ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_e Tu Tu Tu Tu/_na Tu mir+Ni/_kir+Ni/_eng ku/_sid da ta ri/_tsa la lu/_naM tu/_nar lam lu/_gal lu/_A ba tra no ne/_she ku ni ra ba rad sa le/_tar ke/_ta re/_ta rod tu/_nor tu/_ti la la lu/_b+hU ta ba ti ya/_
[\[57b.5\]]ba ta yi ye swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_a ra gar+De/_na ra gar+De/_pa~M su ka/_pA yi ye/_ka po ta ka pa yi ye ye ta bo d+ha ne swA hA/_dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo dang /_tshig dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_
[\[57b.6\]]'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'chang ngam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_yid la byed dam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/_de'i lus la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/_dug gis ma yin/_mtshon gyis ma yin/_chus ma yin/_rgyal po'i 
[\[57b.7\]]chad pas ma yin/_rkun po'i chad pas ma yin te/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing /_nges par mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na/_/skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang /_/
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dbang phyug tu yang nges par 'gyur/_/lan cig gis ni gnas kun du/_/dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor/_/bdag gis bdag la mi sbyor bar/_/dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin/_/sems can thams cad srung zhing sel/_/nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang /_/
[\[58a.2\]]rmi lam mi shes mya ngan du/_/brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur/_/gang gis bris te skyes pa dang /_/bud med lus la btags na ni/_/skal ba bzang dang gzi brjid dang /_/de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis su/_/mi dge cung zad gang byas pa/_/
[\[58a.3\]]de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos/_/dus ma yin par 'chi las skyob/_/rgyal po chu dang me dang glog_/chom po nad dang dgra dag dang /_/g.yul sprod pa dang 'thab par yang /_/bzang po dran na skyob par byed/_/rig pa bzang po 'di dang ni/_/gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na/_/
[\[58a.4\]]mi dag mi zhum gnas kun du/_/de bas 'di ni yid kyis brjod/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bya ste/_rig sngags 
[\[58a.5\]]'dis bdag 'byor par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni min d+hi re/_ti mi ti ming gi li/_trai lo ki ni/_a lo ki ni/_tri shU la d+ha ra Ni/_a ku pi Ni kri mi kri ti/_ko li ko li/_kud to kud to/_ku to ki si/_ku ti/_ku pi ti/_bdag dang sems can thams cad lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig tu 'jigs pa 
[\[58a.6\]]thams cad dang /_nad thams cad dang /_dug thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_gdug pas zin pa thams cad dang /_chom rkun thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang /_'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'thab pa dang /_
[\[58a.7\]]rnyog pa dang /_sdig pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba thams cad dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyis ngan par spyad pa thams cad dang /_thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li/_i li mi li/_bi shI tsa na/_par+Na 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]sha ba ri/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_

[\[58b.3\]]bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D618}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya o dzaHprat+yaM gi ra Ni sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[58b.4\]]mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis 
[\[58b.5\]]mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ngam/_ston tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed na/_de'i mdangs phyir mi 'phrogs shing /_'phrog

[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun tu g.yos/_kun tu rab tu g.yos pa nas/_'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs pa'i bar du gyur to/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyang /_kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/_/kye ma'o nyam thag 
[\[59a.2\]]go zhes ngu zhing skad chen po sgra chen po 'byin cing 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'di gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /_
[\[59a.3\]]bden pa'i tshig des ngas bsrung bar bya'o/_/bde legs su 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/_/de'i mdangs 'phrog par bya'o/_/phyir dbrog par bya'o/_/nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/_/gnod sbyin gyis zin tam/_mi dang mi ma yin pas zin na dus de dang /_tshod de dang /_yud tsam de la mdangs 'phrog go/_

[\[59a.6\]]rdzogs so//[ {D619}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bi d+yA man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[59a.7\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe sta du sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/_chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/_sangs rgyas la skyabs 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]su song /_chos la skyabs su song /_dge 'dun la skyabs su song /_sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/_chos la gcig tu phyogs/_dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/_sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_

[\[59b.5\]]bzhengs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung ba gyis shig_/yongs su bzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs

[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]hu du hu du hu du/_tsak+Shur me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni mig gi skyon dang /_rlung gi skyon dang /_mkhris pa'i skyon dang /_bad kan gyi skyon dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/_tshul khrims kyi bden 
[\[60a.2\]]pa dang /_brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang /_drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung gi bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa dang /_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /_
[\[60a.3\]]rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig_/mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig_/kun tu mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig_/bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par 
[\[60a.4\]]gyur cig swA hA/_kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o/_/nga yang da ltar 'chad de/_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes 
[\[60a.5\]]su yi rang ngo /_/kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la thibs por 'gyur ba'am/_rab rib bam/_ling tog gam/_mig nad sngon por mthong ba'am/_mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur ba rnams sam/_klu las gyur pa rnams sam/_dri za las 
[\[60a.6\]]gyur pa rnams sam/_gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/_srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/_sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/_byad las gyur pa rnams sam/_ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/_ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/_kun tu rgyu las gyur ba rnams 
[\[60a.7\]]sam/_kun tu rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]mthong ste de ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bzung ste/_kun chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/_bde ba mig rnam par 
[\[60b.2\]]sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/_/shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/_mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis 
[\[60b.3\]]thams cad mthong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_shAkya bde ba dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa mig rnam 
[\[60b.4\]]par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so//[ {D620}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ga pra sha ma ni sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[60b.5\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[60b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mig nad dag byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/_tad+ya thA/_ru d+hi re phuH/_ru d+hi ra ak+Shi phuH/_ru d+hi ra piM ga le phuH/_bA te 
[\[60b.7\]]phuH/_ba te le phuH/_han+te phuH/_mA~M sa dun+da b+hi phuH/_pad+ma ak+Shi phuH/_pad+ma daN+Da hi ra NI ye phuHswA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/cho ga 
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]ni 'di yin te/_srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun dor ro/_/chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas bya bas na mig nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[61a.2\]{D621}]@#/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ar+sha pra sha ma ni sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[61a.3\]]rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das bco lnga'i gso sbyong zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs 
[\[61a.4\]]so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga yab thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/_
[\[61a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi bro nad kyis gzir te/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba yid du 
[\[61a.6\]]mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di 
[\[61a.7\]]long shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo'i ming dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge shes na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_a lan+te/_a ma le/_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]shwa li tsi ni ku she sam+b+ha be swA hA/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba de na sA la'i shing rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/_gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/_gnyis pa ni 'jam pa zhes bya/_gsum pa ni skam po zhes bya ste/_ji ltar 
[\[61b.2\]]de bskams pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mkhris pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur 
[\[61b.3\]]cig_/'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams 
[\[61b.4\]]par gyur cig_/sna'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/'phyang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_sha me sha mA ne/_sha me sha mA ne swA hA/_na bar ma gyur cig_/rengs par ma gyur cig_/sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig_/'dzag par ma gyur cig_/sdug bsngal 
[\[61b.5\]]bar ma gyur cig_/rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig_/zag par ma gyur cig_/rab tu zag par ma gyur cig_/'di nyid du zad pa dang /_yongs su zad pa dang /_med par gyur cig_/sa'i 'og tu song shig_/na mo b+ha ga ba te/_bud+d+ha ya sa t+ya bA tI na~M/_sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa deHswA hA/_
[\[61b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/_bklags pas grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/_mdud pa bdun 
[\[61b.7\]]bor te mgul du gdags so/_/'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]{D622}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_
[\[62a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/
[\[62a.3\]]kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig_/tad+ya thA/_tsi le mi/_tsi le mi/_pa na ko ki li/_shrI ma ti/_kuN+Da li/_dun+du b+hi/_in+d+ra ni mu khe swA hA/_'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang /_sbos pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang /_
[\[62a.4\]]gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang /_gzhang nad can dang /_za khu dang /_lud pa can dang /_rims nad can dang /_klad pa na ba dang /_gzhogs phyed na ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/_kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag 
[\[62a.5\]]las 'gal bar byed pa de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo /_/tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so/_/gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/_'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can 
[\[62a.6\]]thams cad kyi mchog go/_/'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go/_/dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go/_/bden pa'i tshig dang /_bden pa'i ngag 'dis bdag gis zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde 
[\[62a.7\]]bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]{D623}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje bla ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_badzra badzra/_ma hA badzra sarba b+h+ya d+hi ha na ha na badzre na swA hA/_'phags pa nad thams cad 
[\[62b.2\]]rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D624}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi ti me li/_ha ne su ha ne/_che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban+d+hA mi/_e ka hi kaM_/tri hi kaM/_tsa turtsa ka~M_/
[\[62b.3\]]ni t+ya dz+wa raM swA hA/_cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims nad med par byed do/_/rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D625}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[62b.4\]]gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/_de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_
[\[62b.5\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa dag 
[\[62b.6\]]mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsrung du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su gzigs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce phreng ba zhes pa'i rims gnas te/_de sems can rnams la nyin gcig 
[\[62b.7\]]pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed de/_de bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no/_/tad+ya thA/_dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/_pra dz+wa la ni/_pra ti pa ni/_pra sha ma ni/_bdag gi rims nad song shig_/ma 'dug cig/
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]swA hA/_bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang /_'jig rten na chos dang /_dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song shig_/ma 'dug cig swA hA/_sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dai/_/
[\[63a.2\]]ta ra tu/_bid+ya taM brah+ma a nu mo te swA hA/_skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[63a.3\]]bstod do/_/'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shA la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[63a.4\]{D626}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_he b+ha ga bA na many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_ba la bi d+hi dz+nya/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_nA gai sti tiSh+Tha sarba satwA nAM swA hA/_'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D627}]@#/_/mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa 
[\[63a.5\]]zhes bya ba bai DUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM ma ma rak+Sha/_sA ga re ma hA sA ga re/_pu ru tse pu ru tsu ru/_sa ma ne me/_de ba be hu lu hu lu swA hA/_gla rtsi dang /_shu dag dang /_b+hi su nag po la lde gu byas te/_lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bzlas na/_'byung 
[\[63a.6\]]po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/_blta bar yang mi nus so rdzogs so//[ {D628}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU traM/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[63a.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/_yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong 
[\[63b.2\]]khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/_gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros 
[\[63b.3\]]shig_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_slob pa thams cad kyis 
[\[63b.4\]]bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_chos kyis bsams pa/_tshangs pas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas 
[\[63b.5\]]bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/muny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_
[\[63b.6\]]muny+tsa ta/_ma 'dug cig_/yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig_/nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/_lha'i bla ma/_gshegs shing /_dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_dbang bdag 
[\[63b.7\]]dang bcas pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /_lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/_de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ru 'ong gis/_/nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_myur du byed cig_/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar 
[\[64a.2\]]gyur cig_/gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas shig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/_su mu su mu/_su mu su mu/_su mu/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_
[\[64a.3\]]su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru 
[\[64a.4\]]mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu rU ri ti/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_rI rI rI rI rI rI/_ti mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri ti/_ha si mi ri/_mI rI ti/_mi ti/_si sI/_si mI/_ka~M ka ra/_ka ra ka ta/_ka~M ka ra/_ka~M ka tsa/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka 
[\[64a.5\]]rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka ro tI ti/_ku ri sha~M ka~M ka ra/_ka~M ka ri she/_ri ri ri ri ri ri/_ti re te phu swA/_ri pu ri pu/_ri pu ri pu/_ri pu ri pu/_ri pu/_nA thA nA nA thA tha/_ri pu/_ri pu/_nA thA tha/_nirgats+tsha ta/_ri pu/_ri pu/_nirgats+tsha ta/_pa yA tha/_ri pU/_ri pU/_pa lA ya ta/_
[\[64a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/_sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[64a.7\]]ye shes kyi mchog dang /_chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyis gzhi 'di 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/_/rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing /_/
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/_/sems 
[\[64b.2\]]can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 
[\[64b.3\]]'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/_/gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/
[\[64b.4\]]dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/_/nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing /_/sems can thams cad rab dga' des/_/khyed la 
[\[64b.5\]]bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/_sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/_/thub pa'i snyam pa gang 
[\[64b.6\]]byung des/_/khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/_/yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/_/thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing /_/tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya byin lhar bcas 
[\[64b.7\]]bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_/khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/_/khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de [{]di ring [,]de ring [}]grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed chag bde legs 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig 
[\[65a.2\]]par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khor/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig 
[\[65a.3\]]rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad rnams med par shog_/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang 
[\[65a.4\]]sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/_/sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de 
[\[65a.5\]]ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/_sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/_/bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten 
[\[65a.6\]]la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_rangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/_dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/_nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams 
[\[65a.7\]]cad kyis bsams pa/_chos kyis bsams pa/_tshangs bas bsams pa/_tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/_'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/_dbang pos bsams pa/_lhas bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/_lha ma yin thams cad kyis 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bsams pa/_lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/_'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_bi sa ra ta/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/_/muny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_muny+tsa ta/_ma 'dug 
[\[65b.2\]]shig/_yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig_/nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/_lha'i bla ma gshegs shing /_dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /_dbang bdag dang bcas 
[\[65b.3\]]pa rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong /_lha stong phrag du ma dag dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang /_lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong /_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya 
[\[65b.4\]]stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/_de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_nirgats+tsha ta/_myur du byer cig_/khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig_/
[\[65b.5\]]gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig_/lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/_su mu/_su mu/_su mu/_su mu/_su mu/_su mu ru/_
[\[65b.6\]]su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_su mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mu ru/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru
