[\[65b.7\]]mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu ru mi ri/_mu rU ri ti/_ri ri ri ri/_riri/_rI rI rI rI/_rI rI ti/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_mi ri mi rI ti/_ha si mi mi rI ti/_sI si ma/_ka~M ka rA/_ka ra ka ta/_ka ra ka ra ka ra/_ka tsa/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka ro tI ti ku ri sho ka~M ka rA/_ka~M ka rI she/_ri ri ri ri/_riri rI/_ta ra te pu swA/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_ri pu/_nA thA/_nA nA thA thA/_ri pu ri pu/_na thA thA/_nirgats+tsha ta/_ri pu ri 
[\[66a.2\]]pu/_nirgats+tsha ta/_pa la yA tra/_ri pu ri pu/_pa la yA tra/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_thugs rje dang ldan pa/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa/_
[\[66a.3\]]gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nirgats+tsha ta swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang /_chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/_/gang la ser sna rnam 
[\[66a.4\]]chags pa/_/rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing /_/thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/_/thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing /_/chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/_/khyed la bde legs 
[\[66a.5\]]mdzad par 'gyur/_/ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/_/thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/_/bu gcig bzhin du rtag 
[\[66a.6\]]bskyangs des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing /_/gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/_/gtsang zhing bslu 
[\[66a.7\]]ba mi mnga' la/_/gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/_/phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing /_/don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/_/nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing /_/sems can thams cad rab dga' des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/_/sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing /_/bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/_/
[\[66b.2\]]khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/_/'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/_/thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/_/thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing /_/
[\[66b.3\]]tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/_/khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/_/brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang /_/'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/_/khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang /_/
[\[66b.4\]]lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/_/khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/_/don de de ring grub gyur cig_/rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog_/rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog_/khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog_/phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs 
[\[66b.5\]]shog/_/nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/_/nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing /_/khyed cag kun du bde legs shog_/khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig_/sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/_/yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/_/sdang sems 
[\[66b.6\]]ldan pa rnams byer cig_/snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/_/'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/_/grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig_/sems can kun dang srog chags kun/_/
[\[66b.7\]]'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/_/bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig_/thams cad nad rnams med par shog_/kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig_/gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig_/'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de 
[\[67a.2\]]ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D629}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsau ra bi d+h+wa na sa na nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[67a.3\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ri la gshegs pa'i tshe/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag 
[\[67a.4\]]ste spu zing zhes byed nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag cig go/_/bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag cig go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/_gsol pa/_
[\[67a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms 
[\[67a.6\]]pa 'di bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_a nu lo me/_pra ti lo me/_a nu lo ma/_pra ti lo ma/_a tiM ke/_pra tiM ke/_pa~M ke/_a ti paM ke/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_ma taM gi/_pUk+ka si/_ri mi ri mi/_rid d+hi ma tsi baSh+Ti ti tsau ra pra dan du/_bis+tha han tu/_b+ha man tu/_mA mi yan tu/_yA 
[\[67a.7\]]bad+g+ran+thi na muny+tsa mi swA hA/_kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu bsrung ba dang /_mi rgod thams cad dang /_ri gseb kyi grong mi thams cad dang /_gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang /_gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so/_/rmugs 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]par byas so/_/rengs par byas so/_/ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/_ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig_/rengs par gyur cig_/mgo rmongs par gyur cig_/mdud pa ma grol ba'i bar du mchi bar 
[\[67b.2\]]ma gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/cho ga ni shing kun dang /_bong bu'i spu bsres te/_bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la 
[\[67b.3\]]lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/_/yang na gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa bor te/_bde bar phyin nas dgrol bar bya'o/_/'di ni grub pa'o/_/'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[67b.4\]{D630}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra sa~M grA sa d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[67b.5\]]sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang /_mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang /_ltogs pa dang /_mtshon brgyab pa dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang /_
[\[67b.6\]]mes tshig pa dang /_chur 'chi ba dang /_'go ba'i rims gzhan ya nga ba dang /_mdze'i nad dang /_gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya nga ba dang /_g.yang la lhung ba dang /_gzhan gyi byad dang /_zas kyis brnangs pa dang /_bdag rang gis gsod pa dang /_de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba 
[\[67b.7\]]bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_bzlas brjod byed pa de la las kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/_bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/oM badzra tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha 
[\[68a.2\]]Na hU~M phaT/_a pra ti ha ta ba la hU~M phaT/_sarba big+h+nAM an+ta rA ya bi nA sha ka ra mA ra ya hU~M phaT/_ces brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na 'grub pa'o/_/nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags rdzogs so//_//
[\[68a.3\]{D631}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi khang bu brtsegs pa 
[\[68a.4\]]na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'dus pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_'jam dpal dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_
[\[68a.5\]]byams pa la sogs pa sa bcu pa 'ba' zhig dang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dzam 
[\[68a.6\]]bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_sha za ma rungs pa dag gis mi nad dang /_phyugs nad dang /_yams nad dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba dang /_sdang ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang /_ser 
[\[68a.7\]]ba dang /_sa g.yos pa la sogs pa byung ste/_de dag zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_sku'i ba spu'i khung bu nas 'od zer me lce rab tu 'bar 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ba byung ste/_'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa la thug pa me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur to/_/de'i tshe nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'i 'od kyang lham me dang /_lhan ne dang /_lhang nge ma yin te/_lha rnams kyi 'od kyang lham me dang /_lhan ne dang /_lhang nge ma yin no/_/klu dang /_
[\[68b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_sha za la sogs pa rnams ni rlung drag pos bdas pa'i shing bzhin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_mnyam pa'i phyag rgya bshig nas zhabs kyi pus mo sa la brdabs pas thugs kyi 
[\[68b.3\]]bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can gyi khro bo zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa dag byung ste/_thabs las byung ba'i khro bo'i sprul pa dpag tu med pa dang bcas nas nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa'o/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag na bzhugs pa tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang 
[\[68b.4\]]phyug chen po dang /_drag po chen po bzhi po dag ha hU~M hriHzhes bya bas skrag par byed pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_ser sna dag 'joms pa/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_sha za [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sogs pa haM maM zhes brjod pas skrag par mdzad pa dag sprul to/_/gsung 
[\[68b.5\]]gi bdag nyid kyi brtan pa'i sku can zhabs phyed sa la pus mo dang mthe bo btsugs pa/_zhabs gcig langs te pus mo btsugs pas bzhugs pa'i khro bo brtan pa'i sku can/_shes rab kyi bdag nyid ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas 'od kyis 'gengs pa dag sprul to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[68b.6\]]'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i khro bo dag gi sngags smras pa/_na maH_sa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hU~M badzra d+h+r-ika khaD+ga/_hU~M maM hU~M maM zhes brjod de/_phyag rgya ni lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/_srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng 
[\[68b.7\]]ba ni ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/_g.yas skor du mtshams bcad do/_/na maHsa mat+na badzrA NAM/_a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya hU~M/_a mr-i ta hU~M hU~M zhes brjod do/_/phyag rgya ni lag pa sor mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya ste/_
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]g.yas nas bskor la bgegs bskrad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis srung ba gsungs pa ni/_dmar po'i yi ge ra~M spyi bor bsam ste/_rnam par dag pa'i yi ge 'dis brtan par byas nas/_rdo rje dang ral gris lus 
[\[69a.2\]]me 'od dang bcas par bsgoms te/_na maHsa mat+na badzrA NAM/_a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaH/_sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga ta hAM mAM rak+Sha/_zhes brjod de phyag rgya ni rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/_mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu sbyar te smin mtshams su bca' 
[\[69a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi sems rig pa chen po'i srung ba gsungs pa ni/_hU~M dang gzhi'i rnam pas bltas te/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsa la ka na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ka te b+h+yaH/_sarba bi ga te b+h+yo/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga ta hAM mAM rak+Sha ma hA 
[\[69a.4\]]ba le/_sarba ta thA ga ta pra me ni ra gardza hU~M hU~M phaT tra tha tra tha/_a pra ti ha te swA hA/_zhes brjod de phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis nang du bkug la gung mo rtse sprad de/_srin lag gnyis brkyang nas mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig bkug la snying khar bcas te srung ba ni 
[\[69a.5\]]yum gyi ste/_bgegs dang log 'dren dang ma rungs pa thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'byer par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_kha zas bye brag bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_gzhib pa dang /_btung 
[\[69a.6\]]ba dang /_bldag pa la sogs pa dang /_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro'i bye brag la byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/_oM sarba d+harma tA si ta hU~M zhes byas pas dag par byas te/_oM a mr-i ta oM hU~M hrIH/_zhes bya bas ni 'dod pa'i don du'o/_/oM na maHsarba 
[\[69a.7\]]ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM zhes bya bas lan bdun bdun btab ste bsngos pas tshim par 'gyur ro/_/phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_ldang bar 'dod na sngags 'di brjod par 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma sh+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/_na mo badzra krod+hA ya/_daM Sh+Tod+ka Ta b+hai ra wA ya/_a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_kha kha khA hi khA hi/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_gardza gardza/_bi s+pho Ta ya/_bi s+pho Ta ya/_
[\[69b.2\]]sarba big+ha naM bi nA ya kA nAM ma hA ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka ra Na swA hA/_zhes bya ba brjod do/_/lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la kha nang du bstan te/_mdzub mo bsgreng la brang du bsnol la phyag rgya bcings te/_gtor ma btang zhing 'chag pa'i dus su yang de bzhin no/_/nye reg bya ba dang /_
[\[69b.3\]]khrus bya ba ni rin po che'i bum par dri zhim po'i chu la/_na maH_sa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsa la ka na ya a mr-i ta zhes lan bdun bdun btab ste/_lag pa g.yon pas bum pa bzung nas g.yas pa'i gung mo dang srin lag cung zad tsam bkug la/_ri mo can gyi nang du a bsams la 
[\[69b.4\]]chu blugs te/_oM shud+d+ha dun te sho d+ha na ye swA hA/_zhes bya bas khrus bya'o/_/de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /_'thab bral 
[\[69b.5\]]dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis me tog dang /_rnga dang /_bdug spos dang /_lha'i zhal zas dang /_lha'i bu pho dang /_bu mo dag rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pas shing rta dpag tu med pa dang /_mchod pa'i yo byad dpag tu 
[\[69b.6\]]med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bskor ba rgya chen po dag byas te byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang thabs cig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa spro ba dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i bsam pa 
[\[69b.7\]]mkhyen nas bsam gtan dang po la mnyam par bzhag ste/_'dod pa'i bde ba spangs te dga' bar rtog pa tsam mo/_/de nas bsam gtan dang po nas gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/_rtse gcig pa'i rtog spyod spangs te dga' bde tsam mo/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa nas 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/_rtog pa dang dpyod pa spangs te bde ba tsam mo/_/de nas bsam gtan gsum pa nas bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag ste/_tshor ba nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba tsam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[70a.2\]]de dag dang ldan na rnam par dag pa'o/_/byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms kyis ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud spel ba'o/_/de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar mtha' bzhi las rnam par grol ba'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_d+harma d+hA tu swa 
[\[70a.3\]]b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_zhes brjod de phyag rgya ni 'di'o/_/lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs te/_mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba'o/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 
[\[70a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bcas te snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi sa bon 'od kyis nam mkha' kun khengs par bsams te/_sa bon de las chos thams cad tshig gi lam dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra dang bcas pas 'phel ba dang 'grib 
[\[70a.5\]]pa'i sgra 'od zer 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'o/_/de nas sna tshogs pa'i gdan 'dam nas skyes pa'i dri ma med cing yongs su rgyas pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i steng du rta bdun pa kun nas 'od 'phro ba 'dam skyes dang ldan pa dag gi steng du nam mkha'i mdog can gyi thugs kyis bon dang bdag nyid 
[\[70a.6\]]gcig pa'i nam mkha'i khams kun tu khyab par 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i shes rab kyi ral gri sngon po dag tu gyur te/_de dag las bdud dang ma rungs pa mtha' dag 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po rnam rtog thams cad yongs su bcom pa dri ma med cing gzhon nu'i sku'o/_/de yang gzhon 
[\[70a.7\]]zhing sku'i sha rgyas pa ni dper na bus pa gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa'i lus lta bu ste/_de'i sku mdog ni mthing nag tu gnas te/_dper na dbyar gyi char sprin nag po'i mdog bzhin du gnas pa'o/_/nam mkha' ma lus pa thams cad du 'od kyis 'gengs pa ni dper na rta bdun 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]pa'i 'od kyis gling kun tu khyab pa bzhin no/_/dbu skra gcig tu bcings shing 'phyar ba ni dper na shing a la ka'i 'bras bu bzhin no/_/sku cung zhig 'gying ba dang g.yo ba ni dper na dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol bzhin no/_/zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa 
[\[70b.2\]]ni dper na gyad kyi 'gros bzhin no/_/spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ni dper na pa la sha'i me tog bzhin no/_/spyan steng 'og tu blta ba ni steng 'og gi bgegs bsreg pa ste/_dper na lha ma yin gyi bya gtor ma za ba bzhin no/_/mche ba gtsigs pa ni dper na zla ba phyed pa bzhin no/_/
[\[70b.3\]]ljags shin tu 'khyug pa ni dper na nam mkha'i glog bzhin no/_/smin ma khro gnyer du bsdus pa ni dper na shing pa la k+Sha'i lo ma bzhin no/_/phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa ni dper na gza' chen po'i 'od lhung ba bzhin no/_/sbrul gyi zhags pa g.yon na bsnams pa ni dper 
[\[70b.4\]]na rgya mtsho'i mching bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i sku des ni tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag dang /_phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa rnams dbang du sdud pa/_lha dang /_klu ma rungs pa dang /_srin po dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_lto 'phye la sogs pa 
[\[70b.5\]]'joms par byed pa dag go/_/de'i sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM tra Ta/_a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra ma ya tra ma ya hAM/_tra ta hAM maM zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de ni 'tshe ba dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_sdang ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[70b.6\]]sdang ba dang /_log 'dren dang /_rnam par log 'dren dang /_srin po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_grul bum dang /_sha za la sogs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'bras dang /_shu ba dang /_
[\[70b.7\]]g.yan pa dang /_mdze dang /_'brum bu dang /_'brum bu phra mo dang /_rims nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_ldang dub pa dang /_yud tsam pa'i rims dang /_rtag pa'i rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dom dang /_
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]dred dang /_spyang ki dang /_sbrul dug can dang /_sbrang bu dang /_sha sbrang dang /_bung ba'i gnod pa las thar ro/_/rgyal po'i chad pa dang /_dmag dpung gi 'jigs pa las thar ro/_/rkun po dang /_bran dang /_bza' mi 'thab cing rtsod pa las thar ro/_/chu yis 'jigs pa 
[\[71a.2\]]dang /_me yis 'jigs pa dang /_sa g.yos pa'i 'jigs pa dang /_lce 'bab pa'i 'jigs pa las thar ro/_/ral gri dang /_shak+ti dang /_dgra sta dang /_mdung dang /_mda' dang /_mda' bo che dang /_'khor lo dang /_mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa las thar ro/_/'chi ba dang /_
[\[71a.3\]]dus ma yin par 'chi ba las thar ro/_/mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_yul mtha' 'khob dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba dang /_lha tshe ring po dang /_log par lta ba 
[\[71a.4\]]'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes pa med pa dag tu mi 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags 'di ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/_lan cig brjod pas kyang sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/'di brjod pa'i gang zag des ni chos 
[\[71a.5\]]nyid kyi lam rdo rje lta bu myur ba nyid du thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rta bdun pa'i steng du rnam par dag pa'i yi ge nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa bsams te/_byams pa'i lta bas lta ba'i phyir hAM ser po mig tu'o/_/srog gi lam du ni maM nag po bsam par bya'o/_/
[\[71a.6\]]spyi bor chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i yi ge bsams te/_sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzra pA Ni tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM zhes brjod de lag pa thal mo sbyar te/_gung mo bsgreng ba'i rgyab tu mdzub mo cung zad bkug la srin lag kyang de bzhin du byas te/_rdo rje'i phyag 
[\[71a.7\]]rgya'o/_/'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis ma rig pa 'joms shing ye shes kyi sku nyid du byin gyis brlab pa'o/_/gser la sogs pa'i snod du kha zas kyi bye brag nas dang /_'bras dang /_gro dang /_so ba dang /_til la sogs pa dang /_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_sbrang 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]rtsi dang /_kha ra dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_zangs dang /_mu tig dang /_byi ru dag blugs te/_'bru gsum pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta ta thA ga te b+h+yo/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH_sarba thA khaM ut+ga te/_s+pha ra Na i maM 
[\[71b.2\]]ga ga na khaM zhes brjod par bya'o/_/phyag rgya ni mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_oM saM b+hA ra saM b+hA ra hUM zhes bya bas 'byung po kun la mchod par bya'o/_/de nas gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_tsaN+Da 
[\[71b.3\]]ma hA ro Sha Na a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ya/_sarba pA paM swA hA/_phyag rgya thal mo sbyar la gsol ba gdab ste dam tshig gso ba'o/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas dam tshig ni 'di yin te/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 
[\[71b.4\]]'dun ni 'bras bu dang /_lam dang /_sgrub pa'i khyad par te/_gang nas brtsams te khyad par gyis mchod cing nam du yang mi 'bral bar bya'o/_/tshad med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyud rtag tu sgom zhing smon lam rgya chen po gdab par bya'o/_/sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_sngags dang 
[\[71b.5\]]phyag rgya'i rten rgyun du bcang zhing bral bar mi bya'o/_/lha dang /_bla ma dang /_byang chub kyi grogs la khong nas 'khrug pa'i sems spang ngo /_/srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /_snying rje sngon du song bas gnod pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba spangs te nam 
[\[71b.6\]]yang dor bar mi bya'o/_/ser sna spangs te sems can la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sems can la gnod pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims bsten pa'o/_/rang la rnam par 'tshe ba la bzod par bya'o/_/rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa la brtson pa dor bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[71b.7\]]rnam par g.yeng ba spangs te bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag go/_/nyal ba dang ldang ba kun tu rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i don la ma yengs par bya'o/_/dam tshig med cing mi gnas pa la bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya la sogs pa kun 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]bstan cing bshad par mi bya'o/_/srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pa la phyin ci log pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni tshangs par spyod pa dang /_spyad par 'dod pas spang bar bya'o/_/dge slong rnams dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_dam tshig dang 
[\[72a.2\]]ldan pa la gus par bya zhing brnyas par mi bya'o/_/thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/khro ba dang /_bab chol du smra ba dang /_lad lud dang /_bshang gci 'dor ba dang /_dri ma 'khru ba dang /_skra dang sen mo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang ba de dag dang /_/dri nga ba dang /_dri ma mi zhim pa dku zhing 
[\[72a.3\]]mnam pa dang ldan pa thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/khang pa ni spos kyi khang pa yid du 'ong ba gtsang zhing dri ma med pa dag bkra shis pa'i sgo shar du bstan pa/_gseng skar dang bcas pa'i khang pa'am/_bram ze'i khyim mam/_dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba'am/_lha khang ngam/_ri bo'i rtse'am/_
[\[72a.4\]]bya skad sgrogs pa'i sa'am/_dgon pa'am/_bas mtha' 'am/_spang ljongs dag tu dri zhim po'i chus skyong nul byas la/_rtswa'i stan bting ste gnas par bya'o/_/khri la 'dug pa spang bar bya'o/_/zho dang /_'o ma dang /_mar dang /_la du dang /_lag pan dang /_snum khur dang /_
[\[72a.5\]]khur skya dang /_'bras dang /_'bras zan la sogs pa dag smyung ba dang ldan pas bza' bar bya'o/_/sha dang /_chang dang /_sgog pa la sogs pa dku ba'i zas rnams kun tu spang bar bya'o/_/zla ba dang /_skar ma dang /_tshes grangs la sogs pa ni yar gyi ngo dag la dkon mchog la gsol 
[\[72a.6\]]ba btab la bsgrub par bya'o/_/re ba dang /_rnga ma dang /_rtsub pa dag ni ma yin no/_/'dod pa'i don du 'jam shing gnag pa la ni 'gal ba med do/_/dus rtag tu yi dam la dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir byams pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya'o/_/sprul pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs can 
[\[72a.7\]]ni kha dog shin tu gnag pa ste/_nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje chags chen ni mdog de mar po chags pa dang chags par byed pa'i bzhin gyi mda' gzhu'o/_/rdo rje rnon po ni ljang khu ste/_'dzin cing yongs su 'dzin pa'i bdag 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]nyid lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje 'bar ba ni mdog dmar po ste/_mi shes pa dang mi shes pa 'joms pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i brag 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje khro bo ni ser po ste/_khro ba dang khro bo'i bdag nyid kyi ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje gtum chen ni mdog ljang nag ste/_btang 
[\[72b.2\]]snyoms dang btang snyoms su gyur pa'i bdag nyid kyi sprin gyi zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje thab bdag ni du ba'i mdog can bya ba dang byed pa'i bdag nyid kyi rdza rnga bsnams pa'o/_/rdo rje stobs chen ni mthing ga ste/_dman pa dang /_dman pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gnam lcags kyi 'khor lo 
[\[72b.3\]]'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje rgyu'i stobs ni dmar nag ste/_rten 'brel dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyi be con 'dzin pa'o/_/rdo rje rab 'byed ni sna tshogs phrin las kyi mdog can mtha' dang mtha' las grol ba'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje rtse gcig pa bsnams pa'o/_/de dag ni 
[\[72b.4\]]bcu'i bdag nyid can gyi me 'bar ba'i sku las rab tu 'phro ba'o/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs las le'u gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la thun mong du de dag ba'i phyir de'i cho ga gsungs pa/_gnas khang yid du 'ong bar dri 
[\[72b.5\]]zhim po dang ldan pa'i sa la maN+Dal mda' gang ba byas te/_ba'i rnam lnga'i skyong nul byas la/_me tog sngon po dgram par bya'o/_/de nas bum pa gser ram/_dngul lam/_zangs las byas pa'i lhung bzed kyi tshad du bya ste/_der rin po che gser dang /_dngul dang /_zangs dang /_byi ru dang /_
[\[72b.6\]]mu tig dang /_rnam pa lnga gzhug par bya'o/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram dang /_kha ra dang /_zho dang /_'o ma dang /_mar rnams gzhug par bya'o/_/nas dang /_'bras dang /_so ba dang /_til dang /_gro dang /_cu rtse rnams gzhug par bya'o/_/cu gang dang /_gur kum dang /_dzA ti dang /_sug smel 
[\[72b.7\]]dang /_ka ko la dang /_li shi rnams gzhug par bya'o/_/tsan+dan dang /_a ka ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_gla rtsi dang /_rgya spos dang /_ga bur la sogs pa'i dri rnams kyang gzhug par bya'o/_/mtsho dang /_rdzing dang /_lteng ka dang /_'bab chu dang /_lu ma bkod ma rnams kyi chu yang blugs 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]la ba la'am ras la dri'i chus bsang bas mgul pa bcings te gzhag par bya'o/_/dri dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang bcas pa'i shing la kha rgyan byas te/_dri dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_byug pa dang /_lha bshos dang /_rol mo'i sgra dag kyang bsham par bya'o/_/'byung 
[\[73a.2\]]po thams cad pa'i gtor ma yang cha bdun nam lnga la sogs pa bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_a tsa la tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_sarba big+h+nan s+pho Ta ya/_badzra d+h+r-ika khaD+ga hUM zhes bya bas mtshams rnams bcing bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogs par bya ste/_bum pa la gzungs kyi thag pa 
[\[73a.3\]]btags nas rnam par dag pa'i yi ges yongs su bsgyur ba'i bum pa la b+h+ruM zhes bya ba'i sa bon las kha dog dang /_tshad dang ldan pa'i bum pa'o/_/thugs kyi sa bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das don de kho na nyid las mnyam par bzhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs 
[\[73a.4\]]rgyas dang /_'phags pa'i gang zag dang bcas pa gdan seng ge'i steng na sna tshogs pa'i gdan pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs pa'o/_/chos nyid dang ldan pa'i rnam pa drug gis bcom ldan 'das bsam par bya'o/_/chos nyid dang /_sems dang /_sems kyi rnam pa dang /_sgra dang /_
[\[73a.5\]]sgra brnyan dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa'i skur nyi ma'i gdan pad+ma dang tshogs kyi bdag po glang sna'i steng du bsams te/_thugs kyi sa bon las ral gri me 'od dang bcas pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa'o/_/de las bdud tshar gcod pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi skur 
[\[73a.6\]]bsams te/_mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/_oM AHhUM/_pra bar sad kar pra tIts+tsha hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_oM AHhUM/_sar+b+ba te ba tA a tsin t+ya a mr-i ta d+hA rA ya swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_A ha 
[\[73a.7\]]ra b+ha ga pA na/_sarba bid+yA d+ha ra pU dzi te swA hA dzi te swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_oM AHhUM/_d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga te d+hU pe hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_oM AHhUM/_ma hA mai tri b+h+yo ga te puSh+pe hUM zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_oM AHhUM/_sar+b+ba ta thA 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]ga ta a tsi prA na a b+hA ba ga ga na b+h+ya ni r+ya A lo ke hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bu d+d+hA nAM/_oM AHhUM/_ga ga na sa ma ya gan+d+he hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_A ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga te nai we d+ye pU dza na s+pha ra Na ye hUM swA hA zhes brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a bi sma ra 
[\[73b.2\]]ye/_s+pha ra Na hi maM ga ga na khaM/_d+harma d+hA tu/_A kA shAya/_sa man+t+ra ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+ha maN+Da le/_ma ma pra ni d+hi pu dza na ma be len d+harma d+hA tu/_a d+hiSh+ThA na pA tsa hUM swA hA zhes brjod do/_/rdo rje dang dril bu gsil bar bya'o/_/thal mo bkan la mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i rgyab tu cung zhig bkug la 
[\[73b.3\]]sbyar/_srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnol la mthe bo cung zhig bkug pa ni yon chab kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sor mo rnams gung mo la brten te cung zad bkug nas gung mo bsgreng ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/sor mo rnams phan tshun du bsnol te nang du bcug nas/_mdzub mo mthe bos mnan pa ni me 
[\[73b.4\]]tog gi phyag rgya'o/_/mthe bo dang gung mo'i sor mo rtse sprad de/_lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/_/mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya lag pa g.yon pas mkhrig ma bteg pa ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/_/thal mo bkan pa'i zur sbyar te/_mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs nas bsgreng ba ni lha bshos kyi 
[\[73b.5\]]phyag rgya'o/_/spyi por lag pa bskor te/_thal mo khong stong sbyar nas dgrol ba ni rgya chen po'i mchod pa ste/_mchod pa'i rdzas rnams rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i lha mos rdzas sbyangs pa'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a b+hA ba swab+hA ba mud ga tA nAM/_na maHpre t+ye ka bud+d+hA Ar+ya shra ba kA nAM/_na mo bo d+hi satwA nAM/_da sha 
[\[73b.6\]]b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi sha ra NAM/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/_duSh+Ta swA hA/_kA ma kra a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/_tsa tur b+hu dzA/_tsa tur mu kha Sha Ta tsa ra Na/_gats+tsha ya gats+tsha ya/_sarba big+h+nan g+hA ta bi kr-i tI nA na/_sarba b+hU ta b+ha yaM ka ra aT+Ta hA sa ni nI te byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa ni/_
[\[73b.7\]]ku ru ku ru sarba d+harmA NAM/_ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_sarba man+t+ra/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/_pa ra man+t+ra/_A kar+Sha ya/_A kar+Sha ya/_sarba b+hU ta/_ni ra ma tha ni ra ma tha/_sarba duSh+TaM/_pra be sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_maN+Da la ma d+h+ye b+hai bas twA dzI bi tin+ta/_ka ra ka ra/_ku ru ku ru/_ma ma sarba kAr+yaM/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]mA bi lam+ba/_sa ma yaM/_a nu sma ra hUM hUM s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_sarba ShaT pa ri pUr ka_/he b+ha ga bA na/_kany+tsi rA ya si/_ma ma sarbA r+thaM sA d+ha ya/_a mo g+ha/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra ma tra ma haM maM zhes pa bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bya ste/_sangs rgyas dang byang 
[\[74a.2\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs la/_las dang rnam par smin pa dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_nad la sogs pa zhi bar dmigs te bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas gtor bar 'dod pas zlos pa'i tshe gdams pa'i tshul gyis dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[74a.3\]]'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ras ris kyi cho ga gsungs pa/_shing bal shin tu dri ma med pa la bram ze'am gtsang sbra dang ldan pas khrus byas te/_dkon mchog gsum la gsol ba btab la brtag par bya'o/_/rigs ngan dmangs 
[\[74a.4\]]rigs la sogs pa'i ras dag ni spang bar bya'o/_/ras de gur kum dang /_gla rtsi dang /_a ka ru la sogs pa'i chus bkrus te dag par bya'o/_/de nas sngags 'di gro ga 'am ras la bris nas gdags par bya'o/_/a A/_i i/_u U/_r-i r-I/_l-i l-I/_e ai/_o au/_aM aH/_
[\[74a.5\]]ka kha ga g+ha nga /_tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/_Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/_ta tha da d+ha na/_pa pha ba b+ha ma/_/ya ra la wa/_sha Sha sa ha k+Sha zhes bya ba bris te dgod par bya'o/_/de nas sngags 'di lan bdun brjod par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra tha haM maM/_oM bA kye daM na maHzhes bya ba 
[\[74a.6\]]las thams cad 'grub pa ste/_gur kum dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gla rtsi'i chu la bsngags shing gtor bar bya'o/_/de nas ri mo mkhan khrus dag par bya ste/_bram ze'i rigs kyis bri bar bya'o/_/tshon ni gser dang /_dngul dang /_zangs dang /_lcags rang gis bri bar bya ba'am/_yang na 
[\[74a.7\]]dkar rtsi dang /_mtshal dang /_ldong ros dang /_ba bla dang /_spang ma dang /_mthing shun dang /_rgya skyegs dang /_rdo sol dang /_snag tsa dang /_de la sogs pa'i tshon rnams la a ka ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_tsan+dan dang /_gla rtsi dang /_rgya spos la sogs pa rnams dang sbyar la sngags 'di lan 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]bdun brjod de bri bar bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra thA haM maM/_bAkye hUM/_oM AHbi ra hUM/_khe tsa ra maM zhes brjod la bri bar bya ste/_khyad par bzang po 'dzom pa'i dus su tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dag pa la kha zas byin te spyan dbye bar bya'o/_/bri ba yang de 
[\[74b.2\]]bzhin te/_spyan 'byed pa'i dus su sngags 'di brjod do/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+b+hA nAM/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra thA hAM mAM/_ga ga na bar lak+Sha Na/_ka ru Na ma ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta tsak+ShuHoM AHhUM swA hA zhes sbrang rtsi gser gyi thur ma la byugs la lan gsum du byug par bya'o/_/bris sku tshad 
[\[74b.3\]]dang ldan pa yongs su zin pa dang /_'dri mkhan la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/_gser ram/_dngul lam/_zangs sam/_rwa'am/_rdo ba dag las byed na yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/gzugs dang sku'i khyad par gyi rang bzhin dang /_rang bzhin ma yin pas khyad par tha dad pa dag tu bya ste/_/
[\[74b.4\]]rang bzhin dang ldan pa la bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gzugs sku las ni yongs su bsgyur nas byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas khyad par bzang po'i dus su khang pa ba'i rnam lngas byug par byas te/_ras ris dang /_thang ka dang /_po ti dang /_glegs bam la sogs pa maN+Dal gyi steng du 
[\[74b.5\]]bzhugs su gsol te/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_dri dang /_lha bshos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa bshams te/_gtor ma yang de bzhin du'o/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_bla re la sogs pa yang bre 
[\[74b.6\]]bar bya'o/_/de nas khro bo'i sku dang ldan pas sngags brjod par bya ste/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a mo g+ha e hi a pra ti ha ta/_a tsa la tse ta e naM ta ka NaM/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ta di ta di/_ta Ta ta Ta/_big+hAn g+hA ta ya/_mA ra ya/_khA da ya/_s+pho Ta ya/_sa taM tsa me/_a nu ban+d+ha ya/_
[\[74b.7\]]A dz+nyi ku ru/_a d+ha ha d+ha ha naM kra/_ka ta ka ta/_ma ta ma ta/_haM haM maM maM/_e te ba la e te pa la/_e hi ma hA nu ni bi sha na/_naT+Ta naT+Ta/_A be sha ya/_A be sha ya/_a tsa le tse ha/_taT taT/_da ma da ma/_phaT phaT zhes 'bum brjod par bya ste/_lha'i sku gnyis la ni bye ba'o/_/zhi ba ni 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]sprul pa'i sku ste/_sngon du ni de bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/a ka ru dang /_du ru ska dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_gla rtsi dang /_rgya sbos kyi chu la/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHshAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_a ra ha ta b+h+yaH/_sa myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[75a.2\]]mu ni mu ni ma hA mu ni oM dza ye/_dza ye/_bAkye she swA hA/_oM bAkye baM dza ya/_oM bAkye niSh+Te ye/_oM bAkye na maH/_oM bAkye daM na maH/_oM AHhUM haM maM zhes bya bas sku khrus bya'o/_/de nas rol mo bsgrag par bya ste/_rdzas la sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_
[\[75a.3\]]haM maM/_oM Ad+yA nut+pan na twA ta pra b+ha swa ra su bi shud d+ha/_d+harma d+hAtu/_swab+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa dpag tu med pas mchod de/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig tu brjod pa'i gzungs sngags so/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga ta 
[\[75a.4\]]ni tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_ba la pa la/_ba ta ba tra/_shAn+te shAn+te/_ha la ha la/_pa ra ba ra/_ma rA Na ma rA Na/_badzra da la s+pho Ta ma/_li ti ta shi khang /_sa man+ta badzra Ni dz+wa la dz+wa la/_na mo stu te/_a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa saM ra Na ra Na/_haM hUM la badzra s+pho Ta maM swA hA/_na ma s+t+wai ya d+h+wi kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM sarba tra a pra ti ha 
[\[75a.5\]]tA bA p+ti d+harma tA ba lI nAM/_aM a/_/sa ma sa ma sa man+to a naM ta tA bAp+ti shA sa ni/_ha ra ha ra/_sma ra sma ra Na pi ga ta rA ga_/bud+d+ha d+harma te/_sa ra sa ra/_sa ma ba lA/_ha sa ha sa/_tra ya tra ya/_ga ga na ma tA ba ra lak+Sha Ne dz+wa la dzra la na sA ga re swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta bud+hA ya/_na maHsarba bud+d+hA bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_oM a ra dze bi re dze/_ma hA bi ra dze/_
[\[75a.6\]]ma hA bi ra dze/_swa ra te swa ra te/_tra yi tra yi/_bi d+ha ma ni/_saM b+haM dza ni ra ma ti/_sid d+ha a tre traM sA hA zhes brjod do/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par dag pa'i gzungs te/_lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang lha dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya thams cad rnam par dag par 
[\[75a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'dis lha dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya bcings ba rnams nus pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lha dang /_sngags dang /_phyag rgya rnams kyis ltas dang mtshan ma bar chad med par 'gyur ro/_/srod dang tho rangs la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi gzungs 'di rjes su brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i khrus 'di la brtson par bya'o/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM i ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/_maM ho shud+d+he shud+d+he/_raM ho aM shud+d+he shud+d+he/_a shu maM bi shud+d+he shud+d+he shud+d+he sa ma ya swA hA 
[\[75b.2\]]zhes brjod do/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i gzungs te/_chu la sngags bzlas nas khrus byas na sdig pa kun 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa dang /_mtshan ma ngan pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rims 
[\[75b.3\]]dang /_'brum bu dang /_lha gor dang /_'bras dang /_shu ba dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_'tshe ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs 
[\[75b.4\]]pa tshar gcod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa gsungs pa/_dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi e'i rnam pa can gyi nam mkha'o/_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu lta bu ba dan can ya~M las byung ba'o/_/chu'i dkyil 'khor gangs ltar dkar ba'i zlum po bum pa can ba~M las so/_/sa'i 
[\[75b.5\]]dkyil 'khor gser gyi mdog can gru bzhi rdo rje can la~M las byung ba'o/_/de'i steng du ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i tshad dang ldan pa oM las byung ba'o/_/me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum pa 'bar ba dang bcas pa ra~M las so/_/de'i nang du b+h+ru~M kha dog sna tshogs las byung ba'i khang bu 
[\[75b.6\]]brtsegs pa gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi dang bcas pa'i rin po che sna lnga las grub pa ni shel dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_byi ru dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_gser las grub pa'o/_/de'i nang sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i gdan no/_/shar gyi 'dab ma ni shel las grub pa'o/_/lho'i 'dab ma ni 
[\[75b.7\]]bai DUr+ya las grub pa'o/_/nub kyi 'dab ma ni byi ru las grub pa'o/_/byang gi 'dab ma ni in+d+ra nI la'o/_/mtshams rnams kyang shel dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_byi ru dang /_in+d+ra nI la las grub pa'o/_/dbus su ni tshogs bdag glang sna'i steng du sna tshogs pa'i 'dam skyes dang nyi ma'i gdan no/_/shar du brgya 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]byin/_lhor lha chen po/_/nub tu khyab 'jug_/byang du thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris so/_/shar lho mtshams su tshangs pa/_lho nub mtshams su gzhon nu/_nub byang du dga' byed/_byang shar du kun du rgyal ba ste/_lha chen po brgyad kyi steng du pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan no/_/yi ge ra~M las byung ba'i nyi ma dang 
[\[76a.2\]]ma~M las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma~M dang ldan pa las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi mi g.yo ba nam mkha'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa'o/_/rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs 
[\[76a.3\]]pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/_g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa/_phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/_/shar du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs yi ge tsa~M las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma tsa~M dang ldan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba 
[\[76a.4\]]shel gyi mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/_g.yon pa na klu nor rgyas bsnams pa phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/_/lhor bcom ldan 
[\[76a.5\]]'das rin po che'i rigs yi ge d+hI las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma d+hI dang ldan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rigs kyi bdag nyid mi g.yo ba bai DUr+ya'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/_rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus 
[\[76a.6\]]ba 'od kyis 'gengs pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/_g.yon na klu'i rgyal po'i zhags pa bsnams pa phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/_/nub tu bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i rigs yi ge ma~M las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ma~M dang ldan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 
[\[76a.7\]]rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba byi ru'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/_rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/_g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/_g.yon na klu chu lha bsnams pa phu phu zhes bya 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]ba'i sgra 'don pa'o/_/byang du bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs yi ge ha~M las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma ha~M dang ldan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das las kyi rigs kyi bdag nyid can gyi mi g.yo ba in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can nyi ma'i snying po la pus mo reg cing bzhugs pa/_rin po che'i rgyan 
[\[76b.2\]]dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ma lus pa 'od kyis 'gengs pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa/_g.yon na klu rigs ldan bsnams pa phu phu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'don pa/_shar lho mtshams su ra~M las byung ba'i tri shU la ra~M gyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi ba'i 
[\[76b.3\]]khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba g.yas kyi dang po na tri shU la/_g.yon gyi dang po na klu mtha' yas kyi bu/_g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa/_lho nub mtshams su Sha~M las byung ba'i dbyug tho Sha~M gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i gshin rje 
[\[76b.4\]]gshed po bai DUr+ya'i mdog can/_g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje'i dbyug tho/_g.yon gyi dang po na klu dga' bo bsnams pa'o/_/g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma gnyis na tho ba phur bu bsnams pa/_nub byang mtshams su Na las byung ba'i kha T+wAM ga Na'i mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i 
[\[76b.5\]]rta mgrin byi ru'i mdog can/_g.yas kyi dang po na kha T+wAM ga_/g.yon gyi dang po na klu pad+ma chen po bsnams pa/_g.yas g.yon gyi 'og ma na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o/_/byang shar mtshams su hU~M las byung ba'i be con hU~M gis mtshan pa dang ldan pa'i zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i bdud rtsi 
[\[76b.6\]]'khyil pa in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can/_g.yas dang po na be con/_g.yon gyi dang po na klu stobs kyis rgyu bsnams pa/_g.yas g.yon gyi tha ma gnyis bsnol nas bsdigs pa'o/_/shar lho'i gru chad la lha mo bdug pa ma mdog mthing ga pog phor 'dzin pa dang ldan pa/_lho nub tu lha 
[\[76b.7\]]mo me tog ma mdog dkar mo me tog 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'o/_/nub byang du lha mo mar me ma dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa/_byang shar du lha mo dri chab ma ljang gu dri chu bsnams pa'o/_/de dag ni gzhon nu lang tsho la bab pa mdzes pa'i tshul can hUM las bskyed par bya'o/_/shar 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]phyogs su lha mo rta'i gdong can kha dog dkar mo lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/_/lho phyogs su lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/nub phyogs su lha mo dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o/_/byang phyogs su lha mo ljang gu dril bu 'dzin pa'o/_/de dag ni cung zhig 
[\[77a.2\]]khros pa'i tshul can gyi phaT las bskyed par bya ste/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin la yongs su gnas par bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par brjod pa'i gzungs 'di gsungs so/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+h+ra nAM/_oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/_trai 
[\[77a.3\]]lo kya bi dza ya hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/_a kro te ka ya man+ta ka hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/_badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA nAM/_tra tha a mo g+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_tra tha badzra/_a tsa la tse ta da ha da ha hUM phaT/_na ma sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/_tra tha rat+na a tsa la pa tsa 
[\[77a.4\]]hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_tra tha pad+ma a tsa la tsa la ban+d+ha hUM phaT/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_tra tha a mo g+ha karma a tsa la ha na ha na hUM phaT zhes bya ba gsungs te/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_ma rungs pa dang sdang ba rnams zhi bar byed cing sdig pa dman pa'i las 
[\[77a.5\]]rnams 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi nang du gzungs sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na a tsa la ka na/_tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_na ta na ta/_ma ta Ta ma ta Ta/_mo Ta ta mo Ta ta/_sha ta sha ta/_Ta ta 
[\[77a.6\]]Ta ta/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_mo ha mo ha/_mo ha sarba pA paM ka ra/_ha sa ha sa/_badzra ha sa a mo g+ha ku ru/_ha sa ha sa/_ma rta ma rta/_gardza gardza/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_A bi sha ya/_A bi sha ya/_ma hA man+t+ra pa la ka_/du na du na/_ti ni ti ni/_khA ta khA ta/_sarba big+h+na na/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba duSh+TAM/_b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/_sarba big+h+nan/_ku ru ku ru/_
[\[77a.7\]]ma hA bi Sha/_sarba pA baM/_ma hA badzra/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/_hrIHba li ta ra g+ha na ta ka/_hUM hUM maM maM haM haM/_na maHsa man+ta bud+hA nAM/_ma hA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ya/_a mo g+ha e hi/_a pra ti ha ta e hi/_a tsa le tse ta a nan+ta kA nAM/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_tsa ru tsa ru/_ta di Ti ti/_ta Ta ta ta/_big+h+nan g+ha ta ya/_mA ra ya/_khA da ya/_s+pho Ta ya/_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]sa tsa me/_a nu ban+d+ha/_adz+nya ku ru ku ru/_a ha sa/_a da na/_kra ka ta ma Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_haM haM/_a ti pa la i ti ma hA gu Na ba shi na/_naT+Ta naT+Ta ta/_a bi sha ya/_a tsa la tse ta/_sarba tra a nut+ta re/_ka tse ta ta Ta ta Ta/_Da ma Da ma/_haM haM maM maM phaT phaT hUM/_na maHsa man+ta badzrA NAM/_tra a mo g+ha tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra ma 
[\[77b.2\]]ya tra ma hUM tra Ta/_haM maM/_oM ba liM ta te dzo ba liM swA hA/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_a tsa la tse ta/_s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM/_a sa man ti ka tra ta/_ma hA ba la/_ShaT+pA ra man+t+raM/_aM aM haM haM/_shud+hA trai lo kya tu Sh+ye tu badzra/_a pra ti ha ta bi li b+h+yaH/_na mo dza la ya tra ta/_aT+Ta ha sa na maM haM swA hA zhes gsungs ma thag tu 'dzam 
[\[77b.3\]]bu gling na gnas pa'i lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye la sogs pa thams cad sreg cing sa la 'gyel bar gyur to/_/de nas cho ga gsungs pa dang /_lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gri khru tshad gsum pa byas te/_sngags kyi phreng ba maM haM 
[\[77b.4\]]zhes bya ba bkod la/_khru do dang ldan pa'i spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/_mchod pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i dri bzhag ste/_gzungs sngags 'di khri phrag tu brjod cing bzlas na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas g.yul du zhugs na dpag bsam gyi shing yang dum bu dum bur gcod par 'gyur te/_
[\[77b.5\]]g.yul las rgyal bar byed do/_/lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i lhung bzed byas te haM maM zhes bya ba'i yi ge bkod de gser dang /_dngul dang /_zangs las byas pa'i bum par gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_dpal be'u dang /_me tog dang /_'khor lo dang /_nya dang /_dung g.yas su 'khyil ba rnams dang byi ru bcug 
[\[77b.6\]]pa'am/_yang na zangs la byi ru bcug pa byas la gzungs sngags 'di gro ga'am ras la bris te/_khong pa'am/_mgul du btags nas gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas la lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phags te gsol ba btab na 'dod pa'i yon tan ci 'dod pa 'byung ste/_ljon pa'i shing bzhin no/_/nam 
[\[77b.7\]]mkha'i tri ta'i lce dang /_'ug pa'i mig dang gnyis cha mnyam pa dang /_lcags sna gsum gyi phye ma la khwa ta'i khrag gis ri lu bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/_thod pa dum bu gcig par bcug la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes byas pas pad+ma la bskor te gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na pad+ma nam mkha' la 'phags te/_de 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]mi dbugs dang bral ma thag gi snying gi khrag rlangs dang sbyar te/_mig ni snang byed du bsam zhing ral gri'i phyag rgyas mig dang rna ba la bskus na thams cad mthong zhing thos la/_khar bcug na rang nyid sus kyang mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga ta bya bA lo ki te 
[\[78a.2\]]dza ya dza ya/_bA kye daM na wa ni tsak+Shur bi sho d+hA ya swA hA/_rnga lpags la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas mnyes te lham byas la/_haM dang maM rang gi rkang mthil la bris te/_gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas na lham nam mkha' la 'phags te/_rkang pa la bya rgod kyi tshil bu byugs nas gon na gar 'dod par phyin no/_/na maHsa 
[\[78a.3\]]man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_oM bruM ma hA ye gr-i ta swA hA zhes bya bas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'phags te bya rgod bzhin du'o/_/skye ba bdun pa'i sha dang /_bya rgod kyi sha dang /_rtsangs pa'i sha dang /_sbrang rtsi rnams sbyar la lde gu byas te/_gzungs sngags bye ba brjod de lus la byugs nas ram nye ba dang /_nye'u shing pa dang /_pra ma ka ra'i 
[\[78a.4\]]mar dang sbyar ba'i lde gu rnams nang re la srang re cha sbrang rtsi dang /_ba ser skya'i 'o ma rnams btang ste/_zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs na nam mkha' la thogs pa med do/_/rta nag po'i mig gnyis dkar po'am/_byi ba nag po rna ba gnyis dkar ba'am/_pha bang dkar po'am/_mi mngal nas skra dkar ba'i srog 
[\[78a.5\]]chags la rma bya'i chu khar phor du blugs pa la gzungs sngags bye ba bzlas te blud la/_de'i mig gnyis ma nor bar bton pa grib ma la skams nas ma rul ba'i phye ma la sngags 'di btab ste/_g.yas g.yon ma nor bar byugs na thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i spyan dang ldan par 
[\[78a.6\]]'gyur ro/_/mon spos dang /_gi'u wang dang /_stag ma'i shun pa dang /_nya mkhris dang /_ru rta dang /_phug ron gyi mig dang /_lce dang /_go ro tsa na dang /_rtug pa rnams la ri lu byas te/_kham pa'i ga'ur ri lu re re la gzungs sngags haM maM zhes bya ba brjod de/_ga'u nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_
[\[78a.7\]]na maHyaM na ma hA ri bi ni nA ta hrIHzhes lan bdun btab nas byin na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bya rgod dang /_bya gag dang /_khra dang /_stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_de rnams kyi mche ba dang /_sder mo dang /_bram ze'i rus pa'i thal ba la gzungs sngags bzlas te/_bsgrub pa byas nas dus ma yin pa'i sprin 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]dang ser ba dag la gtor na sprin rnams 'thor zhing ser ba dang /_'brug dang /_thog la sogs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gcan gzan thams cad dang /_sha za thams cad dang /_khyi dang /_phag dang /_rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /_gu gu la dang sbyar te/_dud pas bdugs na dom kun 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i 
[\[78b.2\]]gzungs las le'u bdun pa'o//_//oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/_gzungs sngags 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste/_lan cig brjod pas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa kun zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin gcig pa dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_zla ba gcig pa dang /_ldang dub 
[\[78b.3\]]pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_yud tsam pa las thar ro/_/'brum bu dang /_lha gor dang /_shu ba dang /_me dbal dang /_g.yan pa dag zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig brjod pas kyang mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rig byed kyi tshig gi dang po dang /_/gnyis pa'i dang por bcas pa ni/_/
[\[78b.4\]]gsum pa dag ni lnga par ldan/_/bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang /_/lnga pa dag gi lnga pa'o/_/uSh+ma'i rnams kyi bzhi pa dang /_/mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa ni/_/o yis mtshan pa bri bya ste/_/uSh+ma rnams kyi gnyis pa dang /_/bzhi pa'i yi ge lnga pa dang /_uSh+ma'i yi ge bzhi pa la/_/u yis brgyan cing thig ler 
[\[78b.5\]]bcas pa'o/_/sde tshan lnga pa dag gi ni/_/dang po'i yi ge spangs pa dang /_/bzhi pa dang por bcas pa ni/_/snying po'i yi ge bcu pa dag go/_/'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa bris te/_khyi nag po'i thod pa'i nang du bcug la/_gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te yungs kar gyis 
[\[78b.6\]]brab par bya'o/_/de nas klu yod pa'i gnas su khyer la rang gi lus la gla rtsis byugs te/_chu mig tu thod pa bcug la gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maSh+tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/_na mo b+ha ga ba te bud+d+ha bI rA ya/_tad+ya thA/_phu Ta phu Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_mi li mi li/_hUM hUM phaT phaT/_phyag rgya ni sor 
[\[78b.7\]]mo rnams brkyang ste mthe'u chung bkug la mthe bos mnan te bskor bar bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maSh+caN+Da badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba na mi mi li tsi li d+hoM/_ban+d+ha ya/_kro d+ha ya/_badzra la ma ya/_ma ka na ya/_oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/_pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_sarba nA ga ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_nA ga ni sa ra sa ra/_bi ser sarba duSh+TAM hra da ya/_
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]sho Sha Na hUM hUM phaT phaT/_phyag rgya ni lag pa'i zur gnyis gshibs te/_srin lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nas mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs bsgreng la gung mo dang mthe bo gnyis gshibs te spyi bor bzhag nas sngags lan bdun brjod de ldang bar bya'o/_/gu gul 
[\[79a.2\]]dang /_yungs kar dang /_shing kun dang /_dri chen dang /_nya'i mkhris pa dang /_sgog skya dang /_shu dag rnams sbyar te lus la byugs na rdzas kyi bsrung ba'o/_/rgya sol gyi me la bsregs te bdugs na ser ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i rlung rnams zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur ro/_/zho dang /_
[\[79a.3\]]'o ma dang /_mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram dang /_kha ra dang /_'bras yos dang /_dung dang /_mtshal dang /_rgya mtsho'i lbu ba la sogs pa dag 'khar gzhong du blugs te/_yungs kar la gzungs sngags 'di brjod cing klu mchod par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maSh+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya hUM hUM/_tad+ya thA/_oM A 
[\[79a.4\]]nan ta ka_/tak+Sha ka_/shaM kha pA la/_bA su ki/_ma hA pad+ma/_oM ga ta ba la wa ta/_karko Ta phu swA hA/_zhes brjod pas klu rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/char dbab par 'dod na dri zhim po'i chus maN+Dal byas te/_spra tshil la klu'i gzugs sor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa byas nas maN+Dal gyi steng du me tog gtor la gzungs 
[\[79a.5\]]thag btags te gzhag par bya'o/_/snying gar gong gi de gro ga la gi'u wang gis bris la gzhug par byas/_nyin mtshan du mchod cing bal po se'u'i lcug mas byab par byas nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/_/oM suM su pra ti badzra dun te mi li mi mi li ba ri shA ya ba ri shA ya swA hA/_zhes brjod de rang 
[\[79a.6\]]smyung bar gnas par bya'o/_/gal te klu rnams kyis char mi 'bebs na klu rnams kyi mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/spos kyi maN+Dal byas te/_rgya spos kyi me la gzugs bsro zhing gzungs sngags brjod pa ni spogs pa'i cho ga'o/_/dri zhim po'i me la bu ram dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_kha ra dang /_
[\[79a.7\]]til la sogs pa'i dgang blugs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ste/_oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/_zhes bya bas mchod par bya'o/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs las le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 'dam skyes pad+ma sna tshogs pa'i 'dab ma can gyi steng du a las byung ba'i chu'i dkyil 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]'khor/_de'i steng du mu~M gyi sa bon las byung ba'i shes rab kyi mtshan ma mu~M dang ldan pa las 'phags pa 'jam dpal mgon po'i sku byis pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu gser btso ma'am gur kum gyi kha dog 'dra ba/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag 
[\[79b.2\]]g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/_g.yon pa po ti thugs kar 'dzin pa'i/_shar gyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/_'jam dpal dpa' bo sku mdog kha ba la gur gum gyis gtor ba 'dra ba'i zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yas na ral gri nam 
[\[79b.3\]]mkha' la 'phyar ba/_g.yon pa na ut+pa la'i sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o/_/lho'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal gsung gi dbang phyug sku mdog mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yas pa na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/_
[\[79b.4\]]phyag g.yon pa na 'khor lo thugs ka na 'dzin pa'o/_/nub kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal rnon po sku mdog byi ru bcag pa lta bu/_zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/_sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag gnyis na ut+pa la gnyis bsnams pa'o/_/byang gi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la 'jam dpal 
[\[79b.5\]]shes rab ral gri sku mdog ljang khu zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/_sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_phyag g.yas kyi dang po na ral gri nam mkha' la 'phyar ba/_g.yon gyi dang po nu ut+pa la sdong bu dang bcas pa thugs kar 'dzin pa/_g.yas kyi 'og ma na mda' 'dzin pa/_g.yon gyi 'og ma 
[\[79b.6\]]na rin po che'i gzhu 'dzin pa'o/_/sku de dag ni ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal ba'i nam mkha' ma lus pa'i 'od kyis 'gengs pa'i sku'o/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu bA gI shwa ri muM zhes brjod pas shes rab dang ldan zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i bum pa cu 
[\[79b.7\]]gang dang /_gur gum dang /_a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_gla rtsi la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i chu blugs te/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar+ha te b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_oM ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/_d+hA ra NI/_bi shwa saM b+ha ba/_A gats+tsha ya/_A gats+tsha ya/_hu lu hu lu/_bruM bruM bruM/_hUM hUM dzi na dzika_/many+dzu shri ye/_su shri/_
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ye ta ra ya maM haM/_sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/_a mr-i tod b+ha ba sa ma ya sa ma ya/_ud b+ha be/_sarba pA paM me nA shA ya swA hA/_zhes gzungs sngags 'di bum pa'i chu la lan bdun brjod de khrus byas na sdig pa thams cad 'dag par 'gyur ro/_/dbang po rno zhing thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/na maHsarba ta thA 
[\[80a.2\]]ga tA ya/_ar+had te b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na mo many+dzu shri ye/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM many+dzu g+ho Sha/_ha na ha na/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma Ta ma Ta/_ma tha ma tha/_bi d+h+waM sa ya/_ka ra ka ra/_tu tra tu tra/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_A bi sha ya/_A bi sha ya/_tu tra tu tra/_tu Ta tu Ta/_s+phu Ta sa s+phu Ta sa/_hr-i da ya sA d+ha ni/_na maHsaM bo d+ha ni pra be sha ya/_lau hu ta lau hu 
[\[80a.3\]]ta/_krai te krai te/_pra ban+d+ha pra ban+d+ha/_A be sha ya/_A be sha ya/_haM maM sarba big+h+na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA zhes bya bas nad pa la 'bras kyi snye ma'am til la btab ste khrus bya'o/_/gzungs sngags bzlas pa'i khrus byas pas/_las dang nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[80a.4\]]ka ra'i shing gi me la sbyin sreg byas na yang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ral gri la btab nas g.yul du zhugs na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/smyung ba dang ldan pas sku gzugs kyi mdun du bsgrub par bya zhing 'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/gro ga'am ras la bris te sdug bsngal gyis 
[\[80a.5\]]nyen pa la gdags par bya'o/_/skud pa la gzungs sngags btab ste mdud pa byas la srid kyis gdungs pa la btags te/_'phags pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am bu mo dag smyung bas 'dug ste/_yi dam du 'don na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za la 
[\[80a.6\]]sogs pa'i gdon mi 'byung ngo /_/gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_lce 'bab pa dang /_dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/stag dang /_dom dang /_dred la sogs pa'i dud 'gro dag gi gnod pa dang /_rlung dang /_ser ba dang /_dus ma yin pa'i sa g.yo ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yid gzhungs shing thos 
[\[80a.7\]]pa 'dzin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i sku thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spyan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu dang bu mo dag gis 'di lan cig gam/_lan gsum mam/_bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_brgya rtsa brgyad du rjod par byed na de'i lus la 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_'bras dang /_shu ba dang /_g.yan pa dang /_lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang /_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_so na ba la sogs pa dag mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas 'jug pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_sems can 
[\[80b.2\]]dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro dang /_gling bzhi'i mi'i 'jig rten du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas man chad khyab par mdzad do/_/bsam gtan dang po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam 
[\[80b.3\]]par bzhag go/_/bsam gtan dang po nas langs te bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par bzhag go/_/gnyis pa las langs te bsam gtan gsum pa la mnyam par bzhag go/_/gsum pa nas langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la mnyam par bzhag go/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[80b.4\]]skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/_/ci yang med pa'i skye mched las langs nas yod min med 
[\[80b.5\]]min skye mched la mnyam par bzhag go/_/de las langs nas de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_sgrib pa rnam par sel 
[\[80b.6\]]ba dang /_'jam dpal dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_byams pa la sogs pa rnams mngon par dga'o/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[80b.7\]]kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i gzungs le'u dgu pa'o//_//'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI mi tra dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]{D632}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra kro d+ha rA dza kalpa la g+hu tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba/_dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan 'phrul 
[\[81a.2\]]dbang byed kyi nam mkha'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rdo rje snying por byin gyis brlabs pa'i steng du rin po che sna bdun las grub pa lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba phrag brgyad cus bskor ba'i dbus su dpag tshad 'bum phrag khyab pa'i khang pa brtsegs ma shin tu mtho ba/_kun kyang rin po che du ma'i khri pad+ma dang /_
[\[81a.3\]]seng ges ma tho ba/_dbu rtse rin po che'i zur [{]mangs kyi [,]mang gi [}]mchod rten pad+ma dang /_'khor lo dang /_gdugs mtho bar drangs pa la dar gyi dpyangs lding ba/_de'i grib ma sa gzhi la bkod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams lha'i bzhon pa las babs nas nang du gshegs pa/_sna tshogs 
[\[81a.4\]]pa'i dril bu dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba dang /_dra ba dang /_dra ba phyed pa dang /_rnga yab dang /_zla ba phyed pa dang /_rdo rje phyed pa dang /_chun 'phyang shar bu la sogs pa du mas mdzes pa/_sgo khyud khyams dang /_sgo glegs dang /_rin po che'i me long dang /_gdugs 
[\[81a.5\]]la sogs pa du mas khyab pa/_rin po che'i pha gu brtsegs te mdzes par byas pa du ma de thams cad kyi dbus su 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/_/de yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_
[\[81a.6\]]'jam dpal dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_byams pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_sna tshogs bkram pa dang /_mkha' 'od me tog 'chang dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_gzugs mdzes dag pa dang /_sa'i snying po dang /_
[\[81a.7\]]phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag bdun dang /_shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal dang /_rta thul dang /_'od srung le sogs pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang /_grags chen snyan pa chen po brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]dang /_lus ngan dang /_gshin rje dang /_dga' rab dbang phyug la sogs pa lha'i rigs sum brgya dang lhan cig tu chos kyi rnam grangs gsang sngags zhes bya ba la 'jug pa gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i 
[\[81b.2\]]'khor rnams la dgongs pa tha dad kyi bsam pa dang mthun pa'i bkod pa chen po bskyed pa dang /_cho 'phrul du ma bsgyur ba dang /_'od zer du ma 'gyed cing thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum bzhin du 'khor la gzigs nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/_byang 
[\[81b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_yi ge ming tshig ngag gi sgos/_/sngags dbyibs chos su byin brlabs kyis/_/yi ge sgra tsam phyed dam gcig_/mngon sum rjes 'jug ring thung dang /_/dbyangs dang gsal byed mtshan mas mtshon/_/sa bcu 
[\[81b.4\]]pha rol phyin bcu bdag_/dbang bcu don bcu rnam pa bcu/_/mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma 'dres chos/_/byams dang thugs rje chen po dag_/dbyangs gcig gi ni sngags kyis su/_/sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab zhi dang /_/yid 'phrog dpal 'byor dbang phyug dang /_/mthu stobs 
[\[81b.5\]]du ma bskyed pa dang /_/rtag gnas thob dang don nges thob/_/rdo rje bla na med sems bskyed/_/mdor na gang gis gang 'dod pa/_/bsam pas sems rnams rdzogs pa'i phyir/_/rdo rje bla na med pa gsor/_/chos sgra bla na med pa sgrogs/_'khor lo bla na med pa skor/_ral gri 
[\[81b.6\]]bla na med bzung /_/pad+ma bla na med pa chongs/_/rin chen bla med gsal bar gyis/_/dkyil 'khor tshul du spros nas kyang /_/mchod rten tshul du bsdu bar gyis/_/lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang /_/lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci/_/srin po sha za brjed byed tshogs/_/'jigs 
[\[81b.7\]]pa dag kyang 'jigs 'gyur ba'i/_/rnam 'phrul du ma 'di sgyur cig_/gsung mchog de skad thos ma thag_/lag na rdo rje mthu bo ches/_/dga' mgu thal mo rab sbyar te/_/snyan pa'i tshig gis 'di gsol to/_/gser dang rin chen lnga po las/_/rab mchog ri bor gyur 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]pa las/_/'gro rnams kun gyi rten gnas dang /_/rtags su yang dag 'dzin pa ltar/_/rnam par shes dang phung po bzhi/_/'byung ba rnam par dag bsgrubs pas/_/lha dang phyag rgya phrin las su/_/sngags shes rnams kyis bzung byas nas/_/brtul ba'i ye 
[\[82a.2\]]shes byang chub rim/_/khyad par de la ldan par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/kun mkhyen ye shes gtso bo ches/_/sku las sna tshogs mdangs 'od can/_/'od zer du ma byung nas kyang /_/gzhi dang snying po me tog gis/_/brgyan pa'i zhing rnams khyab byas 
[\[82a.3\]]tshe/_/sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_/'jig rten skyong dang bdud kyi tshogs/_/ma lus pa rnams brgyal bar 'gyur/_/nyan thos rang rgyal 'dar bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/_/tshogs rnams shin tu skrag par gyur/_/de tshe phyogs bcu'i zhing 
[\[82a.4\]]rnams nas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu nas/_/khro bo chen po'i tshogs byung ba/_/'od zer rtse mos drangs nas su/_/zhing dbus dkyil 'khor 'di ru lhags/_/'od zer tshogs kyang rab 'dus nas/_/dpal be'u nyid du thim par gyur/_/de tshe 'od de'i byin 
[\[82a.5\]]brlabs las/_/mkha' la sgra 'di grag par gyur/_/shAkya'i mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gang du gzi brjid che bzhugs slad/_/chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi/_/rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs/_/dri ma med pa'i dam chos mchog_/gsang sngags 
[\[82a.6\]]spyod pa'i tshul dge ba/_/thos nas byang chub 'dus ma byas/_/'jig rten mgon po brnyes par gyur/_/de nas lag na rdo rje tshogs/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang /_/snyim pa me tog bkang byas te/_/gtor nas phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas/_/dang zhing 
[\[82a.7\]]gus pa'i tshul gyis su/_/pus btsugs thal sbyar gsol ba 'debs/_/mi gnas ye shes che ba'i mchog_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gtso/_/mtshan nyid thams cad rab brgyan pa/_/mtshan min spangs pa'i thub pa che/_/dri med dge ba ji ltar lags/_/gsang 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]sngags tshul du spyod pa ci/_/'dus ma byas pa'i byang chub gang /_/'jig rten mgon po ci ltar 'gyur/_/bdag cag rnams la sman rab dang /_/'gro la thugs rje che mdzad phyir/_/mgon po bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/yang dang yang du bshad du gsol/_/de nas yang 
[\[82b.2\]]dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rkang gnyis gtso bos bka' stsal pa/_/gsang ba'i dbang phyug rdo rje 'dzin/_/shes rab chen po'i spyan ldan pas/_/bdag gzhan phan don la brtson phyir/_/legs par nyon la yid la zung /_/yang dag yang dag mtha' min tshul/_/
[\[82b.3\]]de ni nga yis bshad par bya/_/srog gcod ma byin len [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]'khrig_/tshig rtsub dbyen dang ngag kyal smra/_/brnab sems gnod sems log lta chang /_/dri ro ngan pa'i zas skom dang /_/srog can sha khrag log 'tshor bcas/_/slob dpon dge 'dun mchod rten sogs/_/
[\[82b.4\]]khyad par yul can yo byad dang /_/dman zhing nyam thag phrog dgu pa/_/glegs bam 'tshong dang chos kyi zong /_/g.yangs ral gri so dug sogs/_/me 'obs ltar mthong spangs nas kyang /_/rnam par dkar la sogs par bya/_/yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin stsol dang /_/
[\[82b.5\]]nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang /_/mchod pa dang ni kha ton dang /_/de dag sems dang sgom pa ste/_/dkar bcu lam la yun ring dang /_/nus bcas rgyun mi 'chad du 'bad/_/gtan pa med pa'i byang chub sems/_/shel ltar dri ma med pa'o/_/mchog 'di spyad pas sdug 
[\[82b.6\]]bsngal tshogs/_/myur du gcod pas dge ba'o/_/chos bdag med dang mnyam nyid dang /_/rang sems gdod nas dag pa gang /_/rgyu 'bras 'du byed med pa dang /_/zag bcas bde dang bral ba las/_/byang chub phyogs chos ma lus pa/_/chos nyid bdag med spyod 
[\[82b.7\]]pa ni/_/chos dbyings ye shes mngon byas nas/_/ma 'dres chos rnams rdzogs gsal ba/_/'dus ma byas kyi byang chub ste/_/chos rnams kun gyi gzhi lus so/_/'dod pa'i khams sogs yon tan la/_/shin tu bde rol spyad pa spyod/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]can rnams kyi/_/lkog tu gyur pa gsang ba ste/_/bskal pa bsam yas dpag med du/_/bslab dka' yangs zab rgya chen rnams/_/sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin du/_/lus ngag yid la gang gnas pa/_/dbyer med tshul du skyob pas na/_/sangs rgyas kun gyis 
[\[83a.2\]]sngags su brjod/_/mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'i sku/_/yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs pa ni/_/bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgon/_/la la 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs/_/la lar dge sbyong chen po'i gzugs/_/la lar srin po 
[\[83a.3\]]srin mo'i gzugs/_/la lar 'gro ba bzang po'i gzugs/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_/seng ge ltar gzigs mdzad la sogs/_/sna tshogs du ma mdzad pa ni/_/rkang gnyis lha min rnam gnyis sogs/_/'gro ba'i mgon por gyur pa'o/_/rtag dang 'dra 
[\[83a.4\]]dang nges med pa'i/_/gtso bo bsam pas gyur pa rnams/_/'jig rten phal pa'i mgon po ste/_/gzugs byad kha dog tha dad pa/_/yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gis/_/grangs ma byung ba mchod 'os so/_/thub pas gsungs pa'i de ma thag_/rdo rje can gyis bzhengs 
[\[83a.5\]]nas kyang /_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni/_/spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad gsol/_/'dren pa gtso bo bcom ldan 'das/_/sngags zhes pa ni gang gang yin/_/phyag rgya zhes ni ci lta bu/_/ting 'dzin zhes ni ji ltar bshad/_/lus ngag yid la ji ltar gnas/_/
[\[83a.6\]]dbyer med tshul du ji ltar skyob/_/bdag la phan pa'i don phyir dang /_/gzhan la brtse phyir bshad du gsol/_/de nas rgyal ba gtso mchog ni/_/ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas te/_/tshangs pa chen po'i gsung snyan gyis/_/rnam rtog zad phyir 'di gsungs so/_/snying po nye 
[\[83a.7\]]snying rtsa ba'i sngags/_/las kyi sngags su gyur pa ste/_/snying po brjod dang sa bon no/_/nye snying ye shes mchog dang ni/_/gsang ba'i snying po zhes grags so/_/las kyi sngags ni gnyis yin te/_/bdag nyid brtan byed las sngags dang /_/sbyor tshogs grub par byed 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa'o/_/phyag rgya lag pa'i 'du byed dang /_/rkang pa stabs kyi 'gyur ba'o/_/rtags su mtshon dang 'debs pa dang /_/'gyur ba med par byed pas na/_/phyag rgya zhes su bshad pa'o/_/rang gi rtse gcig sems bsdus na/_/sems la lhag pa'i chos 'bebs pa/_/
[\[83b.2\]]de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya/_/de ltar de dag la brten nas/_/snga ma'i gnas de yongs gyur nas/_/sgo nga bral ba'i 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ltar/_/lus 'di mkha' la cher song nas/_/rgyal ba'i zhing khams thams cad du/_/rgyal la dam chos mnyan nas kyang /_/rgyal sras 
[\[83b.3\]]kun la bshad pa dang /_/skad cig mkhyen pa'i shes pas kyang /_/shes bya ma lus phyogs khyab pa/_/lus ngag yid la gnas pa'o/_/sems dang yid ni 'dres pa'i tshe/_/ye shes bde bar shar ba ni/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/dbyer med 
[\[83b.4\]]tshul du skyob ces gsungs/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lhag par gnas pa'i don yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//zhi bas gdul dka' bgegs chen dang /_/log 'dren de rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/_/
[\[83b.5\]]sems kyi bye brag thugs chud nas/_/de dang gzugs 'dras gzhom pa'i phyir/_/rtog med nam mkha'i lam gnas te/_/rdzogs sangs gdul dka' 'dul mdzad sku/_/rab 'phags khro bo stobs chen dpal/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi sras kyi sras/_/
[\[83b.6\]]mi g.yo'i mtshan grags de la 'dir/_/rgyal dang rgyal sras rtag phyag 'tshal/_/tshangs sogs lha dang lus can kun/_/de la rtag tu mchod par byed/_/rgyal bas byas gzo rgyal sras kyi/_/smon rdzogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/ye shes rdzogs nas mi g.yo'i 
[\[83b.7\]]sa/_/thob pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya/_/phas kyi rgol 'joms dpa' bo ste/_/tshar gcod pa ni khro bo yin/_/sngags kyi bden tshig mi slu bas/_/nyan thos bdud tshogs gyis mi g.yo/_/rtog med bdud la khro bas rgyal/_/rdzu 'phrul bskyod med mi g.yo ba/_/de 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bzhin nyid kyi snying po mchog_/stong nyid las byung rgyal ba'i sku/_/chos dbyings bdag nyid la bzhugs nas/_/sprul 'dis srid pa'i khams sbyong mdzad/_/mkha' ltar dri med spros bral bas/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung /_/spros med nam mkha'i 
[\[84a.2\]]rang bzhin la/_/tha snyad tsam du gsang sngags zhes/_/brjod kyang ngag gi spyod yul 'das/_/skyob pas tha snyad rtogs phyir gsungs/_/sems med rang bzhin med stong nyid/_/sgyu 'drar yid kyis bsgom pa yin/_/dngos med mnyam mdzes 'dod don rnams/_/gsang sngags 
[\[84a.3\]]mgon 'di brjod pas stsal/_/mu stegs bdag dang srog gang zag_/gtso bo skyes bu khyab gnas pas/_/'khor ba rtag 'dod nga rgyal rmongs/_/log pa'i zhags bcings sdug bsngal bskyed/_/bdag med srog med sems can med/_/byed po med cing gtso bo med/_/khyab 
[\[84a.4\]]gnas med cing dngos po med/_/rdzas la rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin med/_/log rtog srid 'ching zhags bcad phyir/_/dngos med sna tshogs gzugs bsgoms pas/_/dngos grol stong nyid go 'phang 'thob/_/phyi nang khyad par der goms pa'o/_/dbu ba chu bur sgyu 'drar bsgom/_/
[\[84a.5\]]stong nyid las ldang ting 'dzin gyis/_/rnam rtog sdig bcings las grol nas/_/'chi med ye shes go 'phang 'thob/_/phung po khams dang skye mched med/_/kun gzhi med de gang zag med/_/gzung 'dzin med de bcings med par/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis rtag tu bshad/_/
[\[84a.6\]]kun med kun bral kun spangs pa'i/_/stong nyid byang sems sgyu 'dra bar/_/bag yod pas ni rtag bsgoms na/_/byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char/_/yid bzhin nor 'dra rdzu 'phrul che/_/mkha' ltar gos pa med pa'i sku/_/sngags spyod byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/byang 
[\[84a.7\]]chub sems kyi sgom pa 'thob/_/ngo mtshar gsungs te thos ma thag_/khro bo rnams kyi gtso la bstod/_/rtag tu dag cing dri med pa/_/rnam rtog rgyun 'gags kun rtog med/_/brtag rtog med la zhugs pa yi/_/dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/chos kun g.yo 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]ba med pa khyod/_/spyod yul kun tu legs sbyar bas/_/kun mkhyen g.yo ba med pa rtag_/rang bzhin spros bral khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sems can sna tshogs phan don du/_/mdzad spyod sna tshogs gsungs pa'o/_/dag pa'i lam rnams yang dag 'byung /_/rnam dag sems la 
[\[84b.2\]]phyag 'tshal bstod/_/mun pa phra rab rdul spangs pa'i/_/sprin bral nam mkha' dag pa ltar/_/mgon po khyod sku shel sgong ltar/_/kun rtog spangs la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/spros med nam mkha' lta bu la/_/dngos po thams cad dang bral bas/_/phung khams skye mched shin 
[\[84b.3\]]tu dag_/ye shes rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal bstod/_/mkha' la 'ja' shar sna tshogs ltar/_/gtso khyod dag pa'i sems can gzigs/_/ngan 'gro kun sgrol dpa' chen 'khrungs/_/go cha chen po phyag 'tshal bstod/_/chos nyid las byung snying po ni/_/yi ge gcig pa gzi brjid che/_/
[\[84b.4\]]sems can sdug bsngal sa gzhi la/_/mun 'khrigs sel la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sngags mchog gtso bo'i gsang ba 'dis/_/rgyal sras chos 'phel shes rab bskyed/_/bla med go 'phang myur 'gro gsungs/_/gtso bo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dngos kun gyur dang bcas 
[\[84b.5\]]pa yi/_/las dang skye las rnam par grol/_/rgyal ba rgyu med bdag nyid 'khrungs/_/gtso mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/dngos med ye shes me lce yis/_/'dus byas ri bo kun bsregs nas/_/chos dbyings rang bzhin gcig tu rgyal/_/bla med sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/
[\[84b.6\]]bstod pa'i don de thugs chud nas/_/'gro la phan phyir cho ga gsungs/_/gsang sngags log par spyod pa dang /_/ser sna log par goms pa las/_/'dod pas non pa'i sems rtog gis/_/sngags pa [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su skye/_/dang pos mar me me tog dang /_/zhal zas 
[\[84b.7\]]gtor ma phreng ba sogs/_/mchod pa'i rdzas dang yo byad dang /_/mi yi lus dang kha zas la/_/'tshe zhing sgrub pa'i bar du gcod/_/mi sdug nad bskyed lo tog 'tshe/_/gnyis pa gnod sbyin drag gyur nas/_/sha khrag chang la snom zhing rgyug_/thos bsam 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bsgrub pa'i bar gcod cing /_/nad bskyed tshe len log lta bskyed/_/rig sngags 'chang gi gdon gzhom phyir/_/sgrub pos 'bad de sngags brjod bya/_/sngags mthu bskyed pa gtor ma dang /_/sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bcas dang /_/mnan pa'i las kyis 
[\[85a.2\]]nags me ltar/_/thogs pa med par 'joms par 'gyur/_/de dag brtan byed lha yin te/_/de gsal byed par sa ris yin/_/de kun rnam dag gsol byed pa/_/byang chub sems mchog zhi ba ni/_/log rtog 'khor ba'i zo chun la/_/ral gri rnon po'i sta re ltar/_/
[\[85a.3\]]'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas sngags dang phyag rgya dag_/'byung bar rab tu bshad par bya/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hAM/_snying po dam pa'o/_/na maHsarbA
