[\[85a.4\]]sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_Ta ta haM maM snying po'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA hra ta a mo g+ha/_tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/_tra ma ya hUM/_Ta Ta haM maM nye ba'i snying po'o/_/na maHsarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_
[\[85a.5\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA a tsa lArka na/_naT+Ta naT+Ta/_moT+Ta moT+Ta/_saT+Ta saT+Ta/_taT+Ta taT+Ta/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_A be sha aH/_maT+Ta/_ma la ka_/d+ha Na d+ha Na/_ti Ni ti Ni/_khA da khA da/_big+h+nA na/_mA ra mA ra duSh+Tan/_rak+Sha rak+Sha sa traM/_ku ru ku ru/_ki ri ki ri/_ma hA bi dza ya badzra phaT hUM hUM hUM/_tri bi la ta ra 
[\[85a.6\]]ga/_/narta ka_/haM haM haM/_a tsa la/_te tse/_phaT phaT/_a hUM/_a sa man+ta ka_/Ta Ta/_ma hA ba la sa tA ma na ya/_traM maM haM/_shu r+ya du lo ka_/tu Sh+yan tu lo ka badzrI na maHswA pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yo/_/dza la ma tra ta/_a sa ta na maHswA hA/_gsang ba'i snying po'o/_/de nas phyag rgya stang stabs kyi/_/
[\[85a.7\]]sngags brjod pa ni 'dir gsungs so/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ha na ha na mA ra mA ra ya dz+nyA na/_khaD+ga hUM phaT/_ral gri'i phyag rgya'i sngags so/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_khA da khA da/_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]pA sha na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ma ha te/_d+harma te swA hA/_zhags pa'i 'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba tha/_oM rak+Sha rak+Sha/_ha na ha na/_kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/_mA ra ya duSh+Ta bi nA ya kaM hUM dza/_go cha'i'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_
[\[85b.2\]]oM d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra na li/_kha T+wAM ga pA sha d+ha ra swA hA/_gtsug tor gyi'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM b+hany+dza ban+d+ha da ha pa tsa b+ha smi ku ru ku ru ha na ha na badzra/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na phaT/_tho ba'i'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra keb+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_
[\[85b.3\]]sarba thA/_oM Sh+Ta na ta murti/_da ha da ha/_sAd+ha ya sAd+ha ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_bi dza ya kIrti sA hA/_mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+haH/_sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba tha/_oM b+hu d+ha ra d+ha ra/_a tsin d+ya ba la bi kra ma NaM/_bu ra bu sa la ya/_rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba swA hA/_
[\[85b.4\]]rdo ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pUr ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM badzra hr-i da ya/_badzra ma taM gi swA hA/_snying ga'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM hUM da ha da ha/_kin tsi rA ya si/_A na ya shI g+h+raM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha/_
[\[85b.5\]]ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_duSh+TaM/_da ma da ma swA hA/_phyogs bcing ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa ba ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM du na du na ma hA pA sha khaD+ha d+ha rA sa pa ri pU ra ke swA hA/_bka' rtags kyi'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ga ga na gan+d+hod 
[\[85b.6\]]b+ha ba/_ma hA sa ma ya/_pa ri pU ra ke swA hA/_dri'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM bi shud+hA dz+nyA na rA dzi saM b+ha be ga ga nA nAM hAHswA hA/_ma mo'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM shud+d+ha 
[\[85b.7\]]d+harma te/_shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_sarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/_gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM shud+d+ha ma hA dz+nyA na swa b+hA be/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ma hA na ye swA hA/_bdug pa'i 'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ga ga na bi krAn+ta gA ma ni ma hA shud+d+ha na ye swA hA/_me tog gi'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ha na ha na/_pa ra ma bi shud+d+he d+harma na ya pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/_zhal zas kyi'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU 
[\[86a.2\]]ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM a bra ti hi to nad+ya ta/_da ma da ma/_sarba thA/_sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaHswA hA/_dpa' bo spyan drang ba'i'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM pi shud+d+ha bi shud+d+ha/_sa kra swa b+hA be A na ya/_ma hA na ye swA hA/_
[\[86a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM bi shud+d+ha swA hA/_ha na ha na/_da ma da ma/_ma hA na ye swA hA/_nyan thos spyan drang ba'i 'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM badzrA kar+Sha ya/_
[\[86a.4\]]shIg+h+raM/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma hA pa ri wA ra swA hA/_pho nya pho mo spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ma thA ma thA/_A na ya A na ya/_pra be sha ya/_pra be sha ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta sarba de baM ta ma ta ma/_ma hA na ya pa ri wA ri hUM swA hA/_'jig 
[\[86a.5\]]rten pa rnams spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM sa t+ya sa t+ya/_ma hA sA d+h+ya ya/_da ma da ma/_ma hA da ma/_A kar+Sha ya A kar+Sha ya/_a d+ya ba ma hA na ya shud+d+he swA hA/_drang srong spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te 
[\[86a.6\]]b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM dza ya dza ya/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_ma hA sa t+ya pa di ni/_sarba hI te swA hA/_sring mo rnams spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM hri hA dA/_ma tha ma tha/_da ma da ma/_ha na ha na/_ma hA na ye/_ma ra ma ra/_ha swA hA/_ma mo 
[\[86a.7\]]rnams spyan drang ba'o/_/na maHsarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM ha na badzra hUM phaT/_sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/_ma tha ma tha/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_sarba gig+h+nAM/_da ma da ma/_sarba duSh+TaM oM hUM phaT swA hA/_rkang stabs tsham ngam gyi sngags so/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM AHhUM/_A kA sha ga ga na s+pha ra Na khaM swA hA/_'o thug khur ba 'bru sna tshogs/_/spos dang me tog la sogs pa/_/ci 'byor 'byor pa'i gtor ma ni/_/sngags des spro zhing spel bar bya/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_
[\[86b.2\]]oM swa b+hA ba sarba thA b+h+yo bAM swA hA/_na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM lan+d+he sarba ga ga na lab+d+ha ya swA hA/_na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM sarba sid+hi dwA d+ha mi haM swA hA/_byin brlabs bzhin du bsgyur ba dang /_/kun gyis 
[\[86b.3\]]thim par bya ba dang /_/'dod pa'i las rnams gang dang gang /_/grub par bya ba'i sngags yin no/_/gza' chen brgyad dang rgyu skar dang /_/nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams kyi sngags/_/na maHsarbA sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_A di d+ya/_so ma/_aM gA raHbud+haH
[\[86b.4\]]br-i haspa ti/_shu kraH/_sha naish+tsa raH/_rA huH/_ke tuH/_kr-it+ti kA/_rau hi NI/_mr-i ga shi rA/_ar dra pu na rba su/_puSh+ya/_a sh+le ShA/_ma g+hA purbA phalgu nI ut+ta ra phalgu NI/_hastA/_tsi trA swa sti/_bi shA khA/_a nu rA d+hA/_dz+yeSh+Tha mU la/_pUr+pA ShA D+hA/_ut+ta rA ShA D+hA shra ba NA a b+hi dzi ta/_shata b+hi 
[\[86b.5\]]ShA/_d+ha niSh+Tha/_pUrba b+ha dra pa dA/_ut+ta ra b+ha drA/_rai ba tI/_a shwa nI/_b+ha ra nI/_oM dang swA hAr bcas pa ni/_/rang rang snying po'i sngags yin te/_/gang 'dod las kyang sbyar bar bya/_/mchod pa'i rigs kyang tha dad bya/_/na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM a tsa la 
[\[86b.6\]]ka Na tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya tra ka kha haM maM/_na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAk+tsit+ta badzrA NAM/_oM badzra ka pa tsa duM baM/_oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba b+ha ya bi ga te b+h+yaH/_bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba thA khaM rak+Sha/_ma hA ba li/_sarba ta thA ga te pu N+ya ni rdza te hUM hUM tra thA a pra ti ha te swA hA/_khro bo spyan 
[\[86b.7\]]gcig drag shul can/_/srung dang bcas par mchod pa dang /_/sngags bzlas dngos grub blangs pas 'grub/_/ci 'dod las la cho gas sbyar/_/lag g.yas gung mdzub gshibs te brkyang /_/srin lag mthe chung mthe bos mnan/_/shugs drangs tshul phyung 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]mkha' la 'phyar/_/ral gri phyag rgyas bdud tshogs 'joms/_/g.yon pa khu tshur sdigs mdzub bsgreng /_/slar bsgyur byed pa zhags pa'i rgya/_/gung mo mthe'u chung so sor sprad/_/mdzub mo ming med nang du dgug_/mthe bo gshibs pa gung 'gram sbyar/_/snying 
[\[87a.2\]]ga bkod de go cha'i rgyan/_/sor 'khyud khu tshur nang du bsdam/_/mtheb gnyis cung bsgyur mgo thod rgya/_/g.yon pa'i khu tshur mthe ba ni/_/g.yas pa'i khu tshur nang bcug nas/_/mthe bong g.yas bsgreng tho ba'i rgya/_/phyogs bcur brdungs pa ltar bya'o/_/g.yas 
[\[87a.3\]]pa khu tshur gung mo bsgreng /_/spyi gtsug phyag rgya gtsug tu bzhag_/g.yon pa khu tshur gung mdzub bsgreng /_/bka' rtags phyag rgya rtag tu phyar/_/khu tshur gnyis gshibs lto sbyar ba/_/rdo ba lta bu'i phyag rgya'o/_/g.yas pa'i khu tshur snying gar bzhag_/snying ga 
[\[87a.4\]]brgyan pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis sor mo so sor brkyang /_/phyogs bcu bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag sbyar gung gnyis nang bcug pa/_/dri yi phyag rgyar bshad pa'o/_/khu tshur rgyab sprad gung mthe bong /_/mthe bong gung mdzub sprad dang 'khyud/_/gtor ma sbyin 
[\[87a.5\]]pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/thal mo khong stong shubs ltar gdon/_/bdug spos 'bul ba'i phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis so sor gung srin bkug_/mtheb mnan bzhag [{]brkyang ma[,]rkyang ma[}\u0f7a] tog rgya/_/thal sbyar gung srin mdzub mo bkug_/mthe'u chung mtheb brkyang zhal zas rgya/_/
[\[87a.6\]]skyil krung 'dug ste snyim pa zed/_/mthe bo gnyis ni nang du bkug_/sor gshibs nas g.yab byed pa ni/_/dpa' bo gtso bo spyan drang rgya/_/thal sbyar mdzub bkug mthe bos mnan/_/byang chub sems tshogs 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/snyim bskyed mthe'u chung gshibs te 
[\[87a.7\]]brkyang /_/lhag ma brgyad pa so sor dgug_/nyan thos rang rgyal rdzu 'phrul can/_/ma lus thams cad 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/khu tshur g.yas pa g.yon steng bzhag_/mdzub gnyis brkyang ste so sor dgug_/cung zad skyed par byed pa ni/_/pho nya pho mo 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/khu 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]tshur rgyab sprad gung mdzub ni/_/so sor drang por gshibs te brkyang /_/mtheb gnyis cung zad sprad de dgug_/'jig rten pa rnams 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/g.yon min g.yas pas de ltar bya/_/brtul zhugs drang srong 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/g.yon pa khu tshur gung mo bsgreng /_/dngos grub 
[\[87b.2\]]sring mo 'gugs pa'i rgya/_/lag g.yas bkan te brkyang nas kyang /_/mthe bos mdzub mnan gsum po g.yab/_/ma bdun la sogs ma mo rnams/_/las kyi dus su 'gugs par 'gyur/_/res kyis bteg cing drang po yi/_/pus mo dag la rkang mthil sbyar/_/spyi bor me tog 
[\[87b.3\]]thal sbyar yang /_/phyogs der g.yob cing 'bru tshugs blta/_/zlum pa'i stabs kyis 'di kun gyis/_/bgegs tshogs 'joms shing rnal 'byor bsrung /_/lag pa g.yas ni gyen du brkyang /_/g.yon pa snying gar sdigs mdzub ste/_/rkang gnyis sprad nas rting pa rdebs/_/hUM 
[\[87b.4\]]brjod drag skad mdun du lta/_/sa gsum g.yo byed zla gam stabs/_/rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni/_/ha ha brjod cing zhabs rgya bcing /_/phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun/_/'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya/_/rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[87b.5\]]thal mo mkha' la bsnun/_/khro gnyer mig can ma mchu mnan/_/yan lag gnyis gnyis me ltar sprad/_/rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can/_/lag gnyis sdigs mdzub phyag rgya'o/_/rkang gnyis mnyam du bzhag pa las/_/g.yas kyi g.yon bskor lte ba yin/_/
[\[87b.6\]]mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon/_/gya tshom gsum gsum mnan pa ni/_/rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya/_/lag pa steng brkyang dbyig bsgreng ltar/_/bgegs la bsnun zhing 'bru tshugs blta/_/g.yas su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg_/g.yon pa snying ga'i sdigs mdzub 
[\[87b.7\]]ste/_/gnyis ka bgrad pa 'khor lo bya/_/nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas/_/mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogs su/_/g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing /_/rim pas me dang ral gri dang /_/sdigs mdzub zhags pa phyogs bzhir bcing /_/ha hUM 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]drag brjod brjid gnon rgya/_/rkang gnyis pus 'khyud lag pa gnyis/_/gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan/_/bgegs bskrad phyir ni 'bru tshugs blta/_/rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad/_/rkang pa g.yas g.yon res kyis bskor/_/lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas/_/
[\[88a.2\]]brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya/_/rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang /_/rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya/_/phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs/_/phyag rgya dang ni stang stabs kyis/_/phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na/_/'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos/_/thams cad dbang 
[\[88a.3\]]du sdud par byed/_/de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi/_/rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya/_/shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis/_/rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg_/lhor ni rkang rting sprad de ga dang /_/hUM sgrogs thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar/_/nub tu rkang sprad lag pa gnyis/_/so sor sdigs 
[\[88a.4\]]mdzub gyen du brkyang /_/byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang /_/rkang pa ya gcig sa la bsgreng /_/khu tshur mdzub sbyar dpral bar bzlog_/rkang gnyis mnyam byas res kyis phyar/_/mche gtsigs hUM sgrags khro gnyer blta/_/byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya/_/khu tshur mthe'u 
[\[88a.5\]]chung mche ba'i rgya/_/rkang pa res bteg shar lhor phye/_/lho nub rkang gnyis res kyis brdab/_/zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris gcod/_/nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang /_/lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'khor lo bskor/_/yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab/_/
[\[88a.6\]]stang stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrogs/_/de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yi/_/phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya/_/khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprad/_/mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcang /_/sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyis/_/lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang /_/mkha' 
[\[88a.7\]]'gro 'byung po mi ma yin/_/gsod dang skrod de me ltar mdzad/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//bla na med pa'i ras ris sku/_/cho ga de nas bshad par bya/_/bris sku 'dod pas 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]thams cad du/_/dge ba'i ras [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]btsal nas kyang /_/bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la/_/ngur smrig tu ni bsgyur bar bya/_/rgyud [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dal zhing dul bag yod/_/chos thos ri mo mkhas la sgrin/_/sred chung yid gzhungs khro med pas/_/sen rtsi shun 
[\[88b.2\]]kan tsha la sbyar/_/spong dang mu zi kan ltar ljang /_/ba bla kra ni bla na ser/_/li khri sgo nga mtshal spags dmar/_/rams dang mthing shun bru nir sngo/_/sbyig dang any+dza nag po ste/_/she twa dag kyang dkar por 'gyur/_/sa snod so btang skags snyigs byug_/pir 
[\[88b.3\]]'jam rab 'bring tha ma bri/_/rgyal dang sa ri nam gru dang /_/snron snrubs smin drug lha mtshams shis/_/de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/_/thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la/_/dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung /_/gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chas/_/
[\[88b.4\]]chos 'chad phyag rgya ngur smrig mnabs/_/logs su 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal po gnyis/_/snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs/_/g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar/_/ngur smrig gyon pas thal mo sbyar/_/de yi zhabs su mi g.yo ba/_/spyan gsum 
[\[88b.5\]]khros pa klu yis brgyan/_/na ra'i stod g.yogs stag smad dkris/_/rin chen rgyan can do ker can/_/rdo ba dmar po'i khri steng na/_/ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang /_/g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs/_/gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs cha la/_/rdo rje 'dzin sngo 
[\[88b.6\]]ngur smrig can/_/rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang /_/de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni/_/pus btsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin/_/gtso bo'i zhabs su khro bo che/_/nag po khams gsum brtan pa yi/_/lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg_/gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste/_/
[\[88b.7\]]'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi/_/rdo rje 'dzin dang bsgrub pa'i sngo/_/yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig_/klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis/_/pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad/_/zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir/_/de nas bris sku yang dag bshad/_/dbus su shAkya thub 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]pa dang /_/g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te/_/g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o/_/bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni/_/shin tu blta dka' gsus po che/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis brgyan/_/kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba/_/mche gtsigs hriHsgra 
[\[89a.2\]]cher sgrogs pa/_/spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od/_/ngur smrig man bas pa char sprin mdog_/sku la thod rlon phreng ba can/_/dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis brgyan/_/g.yon du rin chen zur phud 'phyang /_/bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis/_/phyogs kyi bgegs 
[\[89a.3\]]tshogs sreg par mdzad/_/g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/_/gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang /_/g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags/_/gnyis pa sdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad/_/rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su/_/bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang /_/g.yon brkyang 
[\[89a.4\]]pa yi gar gyis gnas/_/de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byed/_/spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po bri/_/ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya/_/mngon spyod bsgrub pa'i ras ris ni/_/de nas yang dag bshad par bya/_/dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba/_/mdog nag spyan gsum zur mig lta/_/
[\[89a.5\]]ngur smrig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan/_/ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang /_/bris nas bdag gi khrag gis ni/_/spyan phye gsol ba btab par bya/_/ri mo 'di ni rig 'dzin kyang /_/sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos/_/yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir/_/mthing ga na ra'i 
[\[89a.6\]]rgyan can ni/_/brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/_/pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri/_/dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni/_/gser mdog khro bo mi g.yo ba/_/mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku/_/'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/_/zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste/_/
[\[89a.7\]]ral gri zhags pa dang por 'dzin/_/rin po che dang sdigs mdzub 'og_/zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying gar ro/_/de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi/_/ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad/_/mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa/_/mdangs bzang zar ma'i me tog mdog_/ral gri 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]zhags pa sdigs mdzub can/_/pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni/_/sa la cung zad btsugs par mdzad/_/mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis/_/dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga'i gzugs/_/g.yas su rnam snang mdzad bri ste/_/g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o/_/
[\[89b.2\]]de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang bri/_/gang yang rig ma thams cad la/_/mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang /_/spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te/_/rten 'brel sngags kyis rab gnas bya/_/de rjes smon lam gdab pa ni/_/oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi/_/bsod nams 
[\[89b.3\]]grangs med gzhal mi lang /_/des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/_/bla med go 'phang thob par shog_/sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang dag grangs med rnams/_/bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/_/thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig_/gang yang 
[\[89b.4\]]lha mi dbul phongs dang /_/mi nad mu ge dgra chom sogs/_/bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/_/de dag thams cad bral gyur shog_/ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams/_/de snyed sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun/_/sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas/_/'ga' yang sdug 
[\[89b.5\]]bsngal med par shog_/sems can gang dag lus ngag yid/_/mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas/_/dge ba phun tshogs spyod gyur te/_/kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog_/de nas rgyal sras kun btud de/_/lag na dri dang me tog sogs/_/mchod pa'i yo byad 
[\[89b.6\]]kun thogs nas/_/bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir/_/bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod/_/oM bde bar gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/_/skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams/_/bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir/_/rgyal ba sras bcas la mi 
[\[89b.7\]]mnga'/_/bdag don grub par 'gro ba la/_/brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod/_/de nas gtor ma me tog dri/_/dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams/_/dngos grub dam tshig gnod spang phyir/_/lag pas reg par mi bya ste/_/gos kyi phur ma la 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]sogs pa/_/ci bde pas ni phyags nas kyang /_/skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas/_/chu bo la ni dor bar bya/_/'bras dang 'o ma sha kha ra/_/mar dang bcas pa bskol byas te/_/'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu/_/dga' bskyed phyir du dge 'dun dang /_/
[\[90a.2\]]bram ze la ni ston mo bya/_/de nas bris sku brtan par ni/_/gsang ba'i gnas su mchod par bya/_/khyad par tshes brgyad dus su mchod/_/bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing /_/rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang /_/mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min/_/sems 
[\[90a.3\]]can ma mos spang bar bya/_/dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de/_/the tshom le lo spang bar bya'o/_/rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir/_/khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas/_/gos sbra dri ma med pa bgo/_/zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la/_/nyung du 
[\[90a.4\]]bza' zhing btung bar bya/_/[{]mangs [,]mang [}]pas gnyid dang le lo dang /_/dri nga ba ni bskyed par 'gyur/_/tho rangs dang por langs nas ni/_/srod thal bar du brtson par bya/_/nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe/_/'gro la phan bya'i sems kyis nyal/_/'phags 
[\[90a.5\]]pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las bris sku'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ste/_/lha bsgom pa yi rim pa ni/_/rang gzugs stong par byas nas su/_/yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las/_/sgra grags pa na rig 
[\[90a.6\]]pa che/_/zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang /_/der son pa ni rdo rje sogs/_/rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no/_/de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni/_/'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar/_/mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan/_/brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang 
[\[90a.7\]]ldan/_/sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni/_/byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra/_/rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni/_/gzugs mdzes lha yi ci lta ba/_/khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste/_/skra dang kha spu la sogs pa/_/spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khyil/_/sna 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni/_/rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu khros/_/na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni/_/steng gi khyams su yod par mdzad/_/ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi/_/ngar skad 'brug sgra spyugs glu ni/_/ri rab 'bum bsnyil chal chom ltar/_/lus rab ltos 'gros 
[\[90b.2\]]brgyan pa ni/_/gzi ldan 'khyud cing phuT sgra 'don/_/'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra/_/rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni/_/lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha/_/khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba/_/thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can/_/
[\[90b.3\]]ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams/_/b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can/_/thub pa yi ge mu~M las bskyed/_/rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang /_/'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM sarba saM ska ra 
[\[90b.4\]]pa ri shud+d+he/_d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba pa ri shud+d+he/_ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/_rang gi lus la sems bcug nas/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi/_/ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung /_/rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas/_/drang srong rdzu 'phrul 
[\[90b.5\]]can du 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na/_/rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos/_/rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi/_/gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog ni/_/dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las/_/gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya/_/de nas 
[\[90b.6\]]mi g.yo khro bo che/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas/_/dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis/_/tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das/_/gtum mo mtshan nyid rab ldan pa'i/_/nga yi mtshan nyid khyod bshad nas/_/de tshe rdo rje 
[\[90b.7\]]'dzin rgyal pos/_/gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas/_/rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis/_/gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to/_/dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje/_/mthing ga'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin/_/mthing ga brkyang bskum khro sems can/_/
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku/_/gyen skra kha spu gyon ser dmar/_/pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni/_/me yi nang bzhugs rdor dril 'chang /_/rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa/_/lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi/_/me 
[\[91a.2\]]yi sa bon dgug pas mnan/_/bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin/_/gsum pas bteg go hU~M phaT bcas/_/gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'di/_/dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /_/khyad par du ni 'byung po sel/_/klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che/_/nam mkha' 
[\[91a.3\]]lding gi cha byad che/_/grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni/_/ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi/_/dmar po dag ni ljang nag dag_/drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang /_/tshe ring ba la shis pa'o/_/lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni/_/'byung bar gyur pa de ma thag_/sa steng thams cad 
[\[91a.4\]]mun nag 'khrigs/_/bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig_/ye shes me 'od chen po 'di/_/bzod par sla la gcig ma mchis/_/bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnams/_/dogs pa'i sems kyi thag ring 'bros/_/gsang sngags yi ge hU~M sgra can/_/glog 
[\[91a.5\]]'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra/_/klad par yi ge ha~M gi gzugs/_/gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can/_/'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas/_/bgegs tshogs sreg cing bros par byed/_/bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs/_/ro langs ma lus 
[\[91a.6\]]thams cad kun/_/ha ha brjod cing bros par byed/_/rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs/_/gyen thur hU~M gi 'phro 'du dang /_/khro bcu sa bon yi ge hU~M/_/me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar/_/mngon sum rtswa la me bzhin du/_/snying gi hU~M gis 'das 
[\[91a.7\]]nas kyang /_/klad pa'i hU~M gis sreg par byed/_/'od dang phyag rgya lha yi sku/_/bskrad dang bcing dang myos byed bsam/_/seng ge dang ni glang chen 'brug_/drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar/_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni/_/bgegs dang log 'dren 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ma lus pa/_/sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog_/snying nang snying po bstan pa ni/_/'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs/_/du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad/_/lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags/_/oM dang AHdang hUM sbyor gyis/_/dpal 'phel dbang phyug bskyed pa dang /_/go cha chen po 
[\[91b.2\]]bskon par byed/_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+d+hI kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM haM/_go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'di/_/rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar 'gyur na/_/bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos/_/sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM gis/_/ye shes lha dang 'brel par bya/_/rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni/_/
[\[91b.3\]]ye shes dbu rgyan brtag par bya/_/gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can/_/'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya/_/bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su/_/me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni/_/mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya/_/sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i 
[\[91b.4\]]rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon/_/dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing /_/byang chub sems kyang ma bskyed de/_/dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thob la/_/sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi/_/
[\[91b.5\]]gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni/_/byis pa lcags bsregs mid pa 'dra/_/thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir/_/rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod/_/oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu/_/bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi/_/sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas/_/rang bzhin dag 
[\[91b.6\]]pa'i sems su byed/_/oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bA ka tsit+ta bi sho d+ha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_oM sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i/_/rin chen sngags las byung ba yi/_/dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis/_/dbang bskur rin chen mchog tu 'gyur/_/oM badzra d+ha ra shrI badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/_rat+na 
[\[91b.7\]]mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_rdo rje chen po bla na med/_/bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te/_/rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung /_/oM sarba badzra a b+hi Shany+tsi hUM/_dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med/_/sku yi rdo rje rab bskyed pas/_/khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung /_/khams 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/oM sa ma ya g+haN+Ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_oM snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya/_/gang gis thos pa nang gi su/_/de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur/_/rtag pa'i ngang gnas blang bar mdzod/_/oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/_thog mtha' med 
[\[92a.2\]]pa'i sems dpa' ni/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/_/kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/_/rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig_/sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya/_/shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/_/rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas na/_/byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas 
[\[92a.3\]]gsungs/_/oM shes rab ral gri bla na med/_/gang gis 'chang ba rgyal 'gyur te/_/bdud kyi dpung ni gshegs nas kyang /_/mkha' la ye shes 'od 'bar 'gyur/_/oM sarba ta thA ga tA badzra dz+nyA na khaD+ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_a rdo rje zhags pa thugs rje can/_/nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po 
[\[92a.4\]]rnams/_/thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang /_/srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzod/_/oM sarba ta thA ga tA badzra pA she na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/_dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing /_/dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la/_/bla ma mnyes par mi byed na/_/sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro/_/
[\[92a.5\]]log lta can gang bla ma 'tshe/_/dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges/_/'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang /_/dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tshe/_/dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba/_/chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang /_/'bras bu me tog skyed mos tshal/_/kun dga' ra ba khang 
[\[92a.6\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mchog_/bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig drung /_/phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres/_/gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang /_/chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gsing du/_/bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang /_/dur khrod sogs su las rnams bsgrub/_/las kyi dkyil 'khor khru 
[\[92a.7\]]gang ste/_/dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la/_/thub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/_/yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya/_/gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya/_/yang na lnga'am bdun du bya/_/gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te/_/yang na phyed dang gsum par bya/_/kun du bzhi cha pho brang 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ste/_/khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te/_/khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa/_/rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o/_/lha snam bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur/_/thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te/_/gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi sgo/_/chos ni nub sgo rdo rje lho/_/gza' dang 'jig rten skyong 
[\[92b.2\]]sogs shar/_/dbang sgyur lha yi gnas rnams su/_/bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa'am/_/sku'am rang rang phyag rgya gzhag_/thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/_/bad dkar steng du lhung bzed do/_/gtso bo'i sa ni sor drug ste/_/lhag ma rnams ni sor bzhi'o/_/rigs kyi mtshan mas 
[\[92b.3\]]yang yang bskor/_/byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni/_/pad dkar rdo rje gdengs por bcas/_/dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i'o/_/shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal sngo/_/mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin nor/_/lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/_/bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te/_/nub tu pad ser 
[\[92b.4\]]rdo rje chos/_/nub byang sa snying pad+ma dmar/_/gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char/_/gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing ngo /_/shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste/_/mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo/_/rdo rje rtse gcig gshin gshed lhor/_/bden bral ral gri stobs po che/_/nub tu rta 
[\[92b.5\]]mgrin pad+ma ste/_/byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje rgya/_/nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste/_/dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ba/_/de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni/_/shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang /_/maud gal bu dang 'od srung dang /_/rgyal mchog dang ni sa steng skyong /_/rta thul dang ni ba glang bdag_/
[\[92b.6\]]drag shul dbang chen changs bu can/_/b+ha ra d+h+wa dza lteng rgyas dang /_/dga' bo nye dga' sgra gcan no/_/de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o/_/pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi/_/dbus su ral gri 
[\[92b.7\]]me 'od can/_/rin chen rdo brag steng du bri/_/byang du rdo rjes mtshan pa yi/_/bum pa bri ba byams pa'o/_/shar du kun tu bzang po yi/_/rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya/_/lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi/_/lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri/_/nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste/_/
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]bad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri/_/yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can/_/rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri/_/mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi/_/bgrang phreng pad+ma la gnas bri/_/bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i/_/go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya/_/rlung du 
[\[93a.2\]]mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha/_/rin chen sgrom ni bri bar bya/_/steng du brtul phod ces khro bo'o/_/pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi/_/'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhug gi/_/rdo rje brag steng zhags pa bri/_/khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni/_/tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya/_/brtan pa 
[\[93a.3\]]zhes pa'i pho nya mo'i/_/chu gri byang du bri bar bya/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/_/mkha' sor ma ni shar du'o/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/_/rnam 'jigs ma ni lho ru'o/_/nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya/_/mdzod spu ma zhes rin phreng 'dzin/_/rin 
[\[93a.4\]]chen rdo steng shar lhor bri/_/shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa/_/'khor lo me 'bar rdo rje bri/_/'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du/_/'joms pa'i tho ba rlung du bri/_/thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug_/pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang /_/sngags 'dis dkyil 
[\[93a.5\]]'khor byin gyis brlab/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/_hUM hUM ba maM maM swA hA/_spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang /_/srung ba mchog gi sngags yin no/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/_he he he/_A dz+nyA pa ra ma ra ga ga na 
[\[93a.6\]]A gats+tshA gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na shI g+h+raM swA hA/_bsnyen pa 'bum la byin brlabs dang /_/lha bsgrub pa dang mchod pa'o/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni/_/dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid/_/pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o/_/shar du don 
[\[93a.7\]]yod zhags pa ni/_/bgrang phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o/_/lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de/_/rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o/_/nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma/_/byang du thugs rje shugs po che/_/rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri/_/sgrol ma khro gnyer ral gcig dang /_/yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma ni 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]mtshams su bri/_/khro bo dang ni pho nya mo/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rim pas dgod/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje yi/_/dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya/_/dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid/_/rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o/_/shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin/_/lhor ni pad 'dzin 
[\[93b.2\]]mA ma kI/_/nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar/_/byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang /_/phyogs bzhir nam mkha' dri med dang /_/shugs po che dang rdo rje tog_/snyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams/_/rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o/_/der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams/_/
[\[93b.3\]]rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya/_/de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor la/_/drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni/_/dpung [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs rdo rje can/_/brgyad po byang gi phyogs su bri/_/tshogs 'chang bshes gnyen 'gro skyong dang /_/mthong dkar rig byed bden bral med/_/ngan 
[\[93b.4\]]spong brgyad de drang srong shar/_/lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma/_/rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma/_/rta rna ma dang khro gnyer ma/_/ro langs ma dang lcags sgrog ma/_/mthong dkar ma ste brgyad po bri/_/dug sel rma bya 'od zer can/_/nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma/_/dbyangs 
[\[93b.5\]]ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs/_/kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can/_/sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba/_/thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/_/brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/_/tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o/_/rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub ma/_/gzhan mi thub 
[\[93b.6\]]ma spyan ras gzigs/_/nag mo che dag uts+tshuSh+ma/_gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin gyi/_/khro bo mi g.yo sgo bzhi la/_/nag po che dang dga' byed dang /_/ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go/_/mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi/_/dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i/_/ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o/_/phyogs 
[\[93b.7\]]bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad can/_/rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang /_/rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang /_/g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang /_/rin chen brag la sku bzhugs nas/_/zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o/_/mtshams su khro mo bzhi po yang /_/gtso bo dang 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams/_/de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu/_/sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri/_/dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni/_/'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can/_/khros pas rang rig 'khor bcas bri/_/bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/_/dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chus bkang lha grangs sam/_/
[\[94a.2\]]bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung /_/kha rgyan dang bcas gzhag par bya/_/bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan/_/yon chab bdug spos me tog dang /_/sgron ma byug chab zhal zas dang /_/gling bu sil snyan na bza'i tshogs/_/gtor ma'i dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]sman dang bcas/_/yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom 
[\[94a.3\]]tshogs/_/dkyil 'khor spros nas mchod par bya/_/sa la pus mo tshad brkos nas/_/'bu srin shing rdo dum bu sogs/_/skyon mang bral nas sa yis dgang /_/ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar/_/me tog gcal bkram mchod sogs bkod/_/lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang /_/dge mi 
[\[94a.4\]]dge ba'i rmi lam brtag_/rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas/_/sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab/_/khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod/_/bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi/_/tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas/_/gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams/_/khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/_/dus 
[\[94a.5\]]gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams/_/mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas/_/ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ges kyang /_/gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis/_/bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/_/dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom/_/'jig rten 
[\[94a.6\]]'dul phyir chos rnams kyi/_/'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/_/de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/_/bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig_/u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar/_/brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig_/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste/_/skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che/_/rnyed dka' 
[\[94a.7\]]rnyed par gyur na yang /_/gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba/_/shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir/_/sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las/_/myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las/_/sa steng gsang sngags nor bu 'dra/_/rga nad 'chi 'jigs 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]spong ba dang /_/nyes mdzad grogs gcugs mthun 'dod dang /_/mu ge dgra chom bral bde dang /_/zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod rtag_/bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang /_/myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yi/_/gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs/_/ji ltar dus 
[\[94b.2\]]gsum mgon po rnams/_/byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/_/byang chub sems ni bla med pa/_/dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya/_/sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang /_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/_/deng nas mchog tu brtan par bzung /_/'gro 
[\[94b.3\]]la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/bla ma la ni yon phul zhu/_/yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku/_/zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob/_/srog gcod rku [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi tshangs spyod/_/myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol/_/rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang /_/phyi dro kha zas spangs pa ste/_/brgyad dang bcu 
[\[94b.4\]]gcig bco lnga dang /_/khyad par du ni gnam stong la/_/dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon/_/sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du/_/g.yeng med bsdams te bsrung bar bya/_/gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya/_/lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas/_/dmyal ba dud 'gro yi 
[\[94b.5\]]dgas gnas/_/thob nas spang dka' de dag ni/_/nam yang thob par mi bya'o/_/bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang /_/gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas/_/bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams/_/dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur/_/slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni/_/bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu 
[\[94b.6\]]bskyed bya/_/longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma gtang /_/bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson/_/bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas/_/gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas/_/nad med bzod des snying rje che/_/sngags sgrub brtson dpa' shes rab can/_/brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun/_/dad brtson 
[\[94b.7\]]zhi dul bla ma bkur/_/sdig 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang /_/dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung /_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/rig 'dzin pa yi dngos grub che/_/gzhan du med 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]pa phul byung ba/_/rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos/_/mi ni rin chen dang po ste/_/gang gang bsgrub pa de dang de/_/'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/_/ral gri lcags sam shing nyid la/_/sor bzhi pa'am sor brgyad bya/_/yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri/_/ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim chus/_/bkrus 
[\[95a.2\]]te dri dang me tog mchod/_/zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo sgom/_/ral gri dud 'thul 'od du 'bar/_/blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur/_/tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste/_/lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur/_/gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa'am/_/
[\[95a.3\]]shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub/_/rgyal mtshan nor bu gi'u wang gdugs/_/lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin bsgrub/_/lha rnams bsgrub na thang shing la/_/gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te/_/sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong /_/ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra/_/klu la nA ga ge 
[\[95a.4\]]sar shing /_/gnod sbyin la ni gser las gzugs/_/dri za la ni 'o ma'i shing /_/mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so/_/srin po la ni dur khrod shing /_/gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni/_/g.yon pas de yi ske mnan te/_/sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong /_/ci 'dod smra tshe dgos pa blang /_/
[\[95a.5\]]shar du ras ris kha sprad drung /_/dus gsum khrus bya gos rlon gyon/_/sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo yi/_/brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin/_/maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas/_/rang nyid rin chen khri steng du/_/snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur/_/mi skrag kha yi nang du lce/_/pad+ma kha phye lte can mthong /_/
[\[95a.6\]]bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur/_/lha yi gzugs kyis tshangs pa yi/_/'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu/_/gi'u wang bdun bzlas thig les ni/_/skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo /_/mi g.yo pus mo btsugs pa'am/_/'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni/_/'jam dpal sngags 'di sa 
[\[95a.7\]]ya bzlas/_/nya la khyad par mchod pa bya/_/mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas/_/dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur/_/gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed/_/phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po/_/ha ha 'brug skad grag par 'gyur/_/gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams/_/me tog 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]char 'bebs chun 'phyang sgreng /_/de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang /_/'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas/_/khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis/_/ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur/_/rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs/_/ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya/_/'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can/_/
[\[95b.2\]]rgyan bzang lag na ral gri thogs/_/lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas/_/rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu/_/sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe/_/rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas/_/mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te/_/bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur/_/ut+pal sngon 
[\[95b.3\]]po lig bu mig_/ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag_/zla ba gzas zin par bzlas nas/_/mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur/_/bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo /_/gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug_/ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te/_/tsan+dan dmar dang dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[95b.4\]]byug_/cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar/_/mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni/_/mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de/_/ku sha khres kyi steng 'dug nas/_/rdo rje lag gnyis gzung ma thag_/dud 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang /_/'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi/_/'khor los sgyur 
[\[95b.5\]]ba thob par 'gyur/_/'khor lo bdun sogs mtshon cha dang /_/gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs/_/dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub/_/sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung /_/tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi/_/mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg_/stong phrag brgyad 
[\[95b.6\]]kyis mthe bo las/_/'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag_/dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas/_/'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po 'thob/_/sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur/_/tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas/_/sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri/_/bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri/_/tsan+dan gyis 
[\[95b.7\]]byugs dris kyang dgang /_/pad+ma'i steng bzhag pad steng 'dug_/stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhi gas/_/pad+mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang /_/chu des gtor la khru gang brko/_/blangs pas bskal ba'i tshe tshad 'thob/_/grog mkhar sa la seng ge bya/_/gi'u wang gis byugs dkyil 'khor 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]gzhag_/g.yo 'gul bar du mchod cing bzla/_/seng ger gyur nas rgyab zhon nas/_/'dod gzugs lha gnas kun du 'gro/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur/_/tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas/_/rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su 'gro/_/'dir gsungs pa'am 
[\[96a.2\]]ma gsungs pa/_/sngags dang lha 'di bsgrubs pa yis/_/rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams/_/ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/
[\[96a.3\]]phran tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso/_/gza' yi cho ga 'di yin te/_/gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad/_/ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma ni/_/kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtsegs kyi/_/dbus su sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor/_/chos ni rdo rje chos dkar 
[\[96a.4\]]po/_/shar du dge 'dun ljang gu'o/_/nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar/_/byang du phyag na rdo rje ste/_/byang shar du ni 'jam dpal ser/_/mer ni gshin rje'i gshed ngo gnag_/dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa'o/_/mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs/_/rta mgrin rlung gi phyogs su'o/_/dkon mchog 
[\[96a.5\]]gsum po chos 'chad rgya/_/sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so/_/kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs/_/de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te/_/shar du nyi ma dkar ser ni/_/rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang /_/nub tu zla ba dkar po ni/_/ku mu da 'chang ngang pa zhon/_/lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar/_/ril 
[\[96a.6\]]ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams/_/lag pa mdog ser ut+pal 'chang /_/byang du pad steng bzhugs pa yi/_/phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs/_/shar lho phyogs su klu la bcibs/_/pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang /_/lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs/_/byang shar spen pa 
[\[96a.7\]]mdog nag ni/_/tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs/_/nub byang sgra gcan dud ka ni/_/sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin/_/rnon po ljang gu ral gri 'chang /_/gtso bo'i drung du pad steng bzhugs/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM b+ha gi nAM swA hA/_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]nyi ma'i snying po'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM sarba tra yaM a swA hA/_zla ba'i 'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM a b+hir+ya ya swA hA/_rnon pa'i 'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM sub+hi shud+d+hA swA hA/_mig 
[\[96b.2\]]dmar gyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM bi su tra pa kA ya swA hA/_gza' lhag gi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM b+hi ka mya d+hA ya swA hA/_phur bu'i'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sardA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM su d+harmAr+Na 
[\[96b.3\]]ra ho swA hA/_/pa ba sangs kyi'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH_sarba thA/_oM kr-iSh+Na bar+Na pha ka swA hA/_sben pa'i 'o/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/_sarba thA/_oM bi kr-i ta la ku ru tsi swA hA/_sgra gcan gyi'o/_/sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas/_/ci 
[\[96b.4\]]'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab/_/longs spyod spel cing 'jigs pa sel/_/nad med bgegs rigs 'joms par 'gyur/_/rims sogs gzas zin nad la yang /_/sku yi drung du gsol btab sel/_/zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba/_/de dag thams cad 'grub 
[\[96b.5\]]par 'gyur/_/mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa/_/skabs su btums nas dgra khyim sba/_/dgra bo nad bskyed nor rnams brlag_/rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges/_/stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/_/dgra bo'i sgor sbas skrod par byed/_/ne'u le nag po wa sbal rus/_/
[\[96b.6\]]rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams/_/gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba/_/dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur/_/mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni/_/thod pa so can nang blugs nas/_/gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig_/ku sha'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan/_/
[\[96b.7\]]dbang sbyar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na/_/rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na/_/'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la/_/rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/_/rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla/_/gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub/_/
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/_/sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur/_/'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te/_/gdab cing brdungs na sel bar nges/_/phur bu gdab dang mtshon chas brab/_/rdo rje ri rab cog brgyad ldan/_/sa la byas pa'i them bar du/_/
[\[97a.2\]]gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan/_/gzas zin nub mo ba'i maN+Dal/_/dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]me tog sil ma bkram/_/pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs/_/zangs ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste/_/seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya/_/dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang /_/gter mthong 
[\[97a.3\]]bar yang 'di 'gyur ro/_/khros pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya/_/hUM mtha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod/_/dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa/_/gdon gyis 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur/_/de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i/_/sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya/_/ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum/_/
[\[97a.4\]]brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs/_/dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin/_/des na rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur/_/mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas/_/brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed/_/dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs brnyan la/_/rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gdab/_/bka' 
[\[97a.5\]]nyan 'gyur ro gtubs na shi/_/skud pa ser pos bcing nad dag_/spang leb mnan na mnan par 'gyur/_/ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur/_/srad bu yungs kar la bzlas te/_/'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga b+h+yaH/_/sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yoH/_sarba thA/_oM tsaN+Da 
[\[97a.6\]]ma hA ro Sha Na hUM traM thA ma hA tsaN+Da/_a tsa la ka na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta/_ta thA ga ta dz+nyA sma ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/_rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du/_/tsan+dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni/_/sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs/_/gser gyi dong tse rnyed par 'gyur/_/bram ze 'am ni dge 'dun 
[\[97a.7\]]ras/_/rgyal po ras sam gro ga la/_/pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri/_/lte bar oM hU~M ming dang bcas/_/tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/_/phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod/_/mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te/_/gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri/_/dri dang me tog sogs mchod 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]nas/_/skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcangs/_/gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel/_/g.yul du phyin na rgyal bar 'gyur/_/yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri/_/'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa/_/ye d+harmA la sogs kyis bskor/_/dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi/_/snying po sngags ni 
[\[97b.2\]]khrigs su bri/_/'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur/_/mtho lngas 'khor ba'i par bu ni/_/mtho gang 'phang du yod par bya/_/nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags/_/mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri/_/kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags/_/spra tshil las byas dgra yi 
[\[97b.3\]]gzugs/_/dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas/_ming yig bsod par bcas pa ni/_/ling ga'i snying gar bcug byas te/_/dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi/_/dbus su mtho gang brus byas te/_/nang bzhag steng du par bu sbub/_/ci srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas/_/
[\[97b.4\]]zla ba mi snang zhag bar du/_/nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te/_/mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i/_/sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya/_/mtshams dang ci srid mtshams bar du/_/g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags/_/drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su brjod/_/'jam 
[\[97b.5\]]dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung /_/bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni/_/mchod rten la ni gseg shang bsil/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang /_/sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe/_/log lta log par spyod byed cing /_/sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni/_/
[\[97b.6\]]rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi/_/ma tshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs/_/bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol/_/rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi/_/bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod/_/dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni/_/
[\[97b.7\]]nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i/_/srog shing nag po gru gsum la/_/bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri/_/gur kum li khris bris pa'o/_/mya ngan med shing gru gsum la/_/rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'/_/la~M dang staM b+ha ya nan brgyad/_/phyogs brgyad bri ba'i 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]rwa dbus la/_/nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri/_/de yi lte bar snying po ni/_/bsad pa ming bcas bri ba'o/_/tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod/_/ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras/_/sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod/_/ji srid gsum dang bdun bar du/_/le lo med 
[\[98a.2\]]par byas gyur na/_/dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang /_/sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te/_/sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/_/sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste/_/khyad par sbyor ba cung zad bshad/_/yungs kar 
[\[98a.3\]]bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros/_/ser ba bsrung na 'khor lo'am/_/rnga dang dung la bri bar bya/_/g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs/_/nad la 'khor lo chu yungs kar/_/thod lo kor gyis sa phor la/_/bris te sgor dbyangs sri'u bsrung /_/spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa/_/dur khrod 
[\[98a.4\]]thal bzlas sgo steng bzhag_/nad pa gdon las bsrung bar nges/_/snying gar ming sngags spel bcug nas/_/tsher ma khar btsugs ngag rengs byed/_/snying la btsugs na khros pa zhi/_/nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges/_/ling gas rtags kyi nus pa med/_/yang na rabs chad thod 
[\[98a.5\]]pa la/_/ming sngags bris te mi khrag bkang /_/rabs chad dur sbas rigs rgyud 'chad/_/khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas/_/dug bkang klu gnas sbas mdzes 'dzin/_/dgra yi sgor sbas 'byed par byed/_/zhing du sbas na lo nyis byed/_/phyugs gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed/_/chu dong 
[\[98a.6\]]sbas na chu skems 'gyur/_/me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin/_/yang na dgra ming khrag gis bri/_/spra tshil gzugs kyi snying gar bcug_/mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i/_/nang bcug dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub/_/bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing /_/nag po tshes nas phyis 
[\[98a.7\]]bskor zhing /_/bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan bsreg_/dgra bo shi 'gyur the tshom med/_/gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag_/ka ta yi lte ba la/_/ka ro ka yi dus su ni/_/gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bris/_/rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]no/_/mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la/_/sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri/_/lha yi gnas bcug de steng du/_/sngags bzlas phur pa snying gar gdab/_/gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te/_/mi rta ba lang khyi ma he/_/sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod/_/lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser 
[\[98b.2\]]phob/_/med na bskal bar khyod nyid sreg_/de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun/_/myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya/_/mngar 
[\[98b.3\]]gsum dUr ba bsregs pa yis/_/gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed/_/yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing /_/gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed/_/'o ma can gyi yam shing la/_/'o ma dUr ba til dang 'bras/_/snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na/_/gnod pa thams cad 
[\[98b.4\]]zhi bar 'gyur/_/ga bur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad/_/dUr ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams/_/'o ma can gyi shing la bsreg_/nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi/_/'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/_/phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur/_/dUr ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas/_/
[\[98b.5\]]bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed/_/shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni/_/dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub/_/khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab/_/sor bzhi kha khyer rim pas btang /_/sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang /_/gcig pus zhi rgyas dbang drag 'grub/_/de nas rgyas pa'i 
[\[98b.6\]]sbyin sreg ni/_/ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya/_/pad+ma'i chu la 'bum phrag gcig_/rgyal po 'thob ste blon po ni/_/ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum/_/zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o/_/a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang /_/mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob/_/rigs 
[\[98b.7\]]bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni/_/yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur/_/dUr ba til dang 'bras sogs bsreg_/bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur/_/nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi/_/lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas/_/mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni/_/nor 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]rnams myur du thob par 'gyur/_/yang na rgya yi pags pa la/_/gur gum gi'u wang yung bas ni/_/byi ba cher brjid ser po bri/_/shar na mdzod phugs bltas par gzhag_/zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing /_/gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur/_/pad+ma'i ze ba ka li ka/_/
[\[99a.2\]]pri yang ku ni nor rnyed do/_/'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen 'thob/_/ku mu da yi 'bras sogs bsregs/_/longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob/_/pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar/_/sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba/_/gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar 
[\[99a.3\]]gsum bcas/_/'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni/_/rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur/_/mar dang yungs kar dkar pos ni/_/nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na/_/snying po rnying pa rgyas par 'gyur/_/nas la sogs pa 'bru rigs rnams/_/gang bsregs gsol btab 
[\[99a.4\]]de rgyas 'gyur/_/gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can/_/me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur/_/spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel/_/zho mar seng ldeng me la stong /_/bsregs na nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur/_/de nas dbang gi bsreg lugs bshad/_/til dang 'bras 
[\[99a.5\]]sogs phub ma bsregs/_/bud med dbang du byed pa'o/_/pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis/_/byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i/_/shing la bsregs na lha dbang byed/_/gsum po de dang gu gul bsregs/_/gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/_/mya ngan 
[\[99a.6\]]med pa'i yam shing gis/_/gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas/_/bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/_/de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i/_/sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya/_/ming bcas tshad dang nim pa bsregs/_/bstan 
[\[99a.7\]]sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi/_/dgra ming dug gis nim pa la/_/bris te dug dang lhan cig tu/_/sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas/_/thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste/_/lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas/_/gsum ni sgyed pu gnyis brtseg la/_/khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]sngags brjod thal bar gyur par du/_/nyin phyed bsregs na dgra 'chi nges/_/'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun/_/ra khrag yungs mar tshwa rgya skyegs/_/tsha ba'i bud shing yam shing la/_/bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa bsregs/_/stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi/_/bzhis ni 
[\[99b.2\]]bu dang chung ma 'chi/_/drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun brlag_/brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chad/_/gal te skyabs su 'ong gyur na/_/'o ma stong bsregs rnal du sos/_/khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras/_/yungs mar la sbags brgya rtsa brgyad/_/myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi/_/
[\[99b.3\]]yang na rus phye nim pa'i lnga/_/rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sbag_/yang na ske che dug dang ni/_/nim ba'i 'bras bus gsad par bya/_/yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas/_/byad ma myur du gsod par 'gyur/_/nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag dug_/dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying 
[\[99b.4\]]gar/_/ming yig bcug nas phur bus gdab/_/rig sngags byad ma nyid ldog 'gyur/_/rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis/_/mi lpags rlon la dgra gzugs bri/_/dug dang ske tshe cung zad byugs/_/nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro/_/bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi/_/
[\[99b.5\]]dUr ba 'o mas sos par 'gyur/_/dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang /_/mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlag_/tsha gsum lan tshwa dUr rang skyur/_/yungs mar ro skra sbrul shun dang /_/nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye/_/skye tshe dug phye sgog btsong dang /_/sgog skya tsher ma'i me la 
[\[99b.6\]]bsregs/_/dgra bo khrag tu skyug ste 'chi/_/rgya skyegs lan tshwa ba lang mkhris/_/bsregs na mchin gas nad kyis 'chi/_/sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/_/gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/_/mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du bsregs/_/thig nag gis ni gsod 
[\[99b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/'o ma can gyi yam shing la/_/dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur/_/dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni/_/thab khung byas te dug gis byugs/_/nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming /_/ra khrag gis bris rgyus pas dkris/_/tsha gsum shing gi mer 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bsregs pas/_/rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges/_/dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/_/ming bcas gzugs brnyan ni ma pa'i mer/_/bsregs na dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam/_/mdze nad kyis ni gsod par 'gyur/_/tsha gsum ni ma pa dug dang dUr/_/khrag 
[\[100a.2\]]dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/lan tshwa ni ma pa tsha ba'i mar/_/byugs nas arga'i shing la bsregs/_/mdze nad chen pos bzung nas 'chi/_/ra khrag tsha gsum yungs mar spos/_/nim pa'i lo ma na le sham/_/yungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi/_/
[\[100a.3\]]na le sham mam dug dang tshwa/_/d+ha du ra lnga tsha ba gsum/_/sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya/_/yungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi/_/tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yis/_/nim pa'i 'dab ma dgra ming bri/_/thod par dug yungs lhan cig bzhag_/d+ha du ra lnga btsos 
[\[100a.4\]]nas 'ching /_/rig ma byang du bltas nas kyang /_/rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya/_/tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can/_/ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs/_/sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems/_/rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal 
[\[100a.5\]]po dang /_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson/_/sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro/_/chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom/_/bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tshe/_/mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol/_/rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis gsher/_/
[\[100a.6\]]mes gdung rdul tshub skam 'dir skye/_/seng ge mkha' lding stag khro bos/_/bcom zhing 'bu sbrang bung rgod kyis/_/khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer/_/mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no/_/de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa/_/mi rus phye ma tshe skye tshe/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[100a.7\]]'khrig pa dug shing la/_/tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni/_/bskrad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed/_/dUr ba 'o mar bcas pas sos/_/d+ha dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu/_/tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed/_/tsha gsum lan tshwas tsha rims bskyed/_/yang na shing skam 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]lta bur skams/_/dzam ba'i ra dang rang skyur bcas/_/dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs/_/khwa'i sgro e raN+Da'i mar khus/_/byugs pa d+ha dur ma la bsregs/_/lag stobs khwa ta lta bur ni/_/dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam/_/ske tshe mi rus lan tshwa dug_/yungs mar 
[\[100b.2\]]nim pa'i me la bsregs/_/dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang /_/nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur/_/dur khrod thal ba sol bar bcas/_/dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur gnon/_/tsham ngam phur bur 'debs pa ni/_/phol mig nad ngan skyed par byed/_/bya rgod 
[\[100b.3\]]'ug pa byi la sha/_/ne'u le'i spu rnams khyer ba'i mer/_/drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis/_/thun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges/_/khrag can ras la gzugs bris na/_/rkang g.yon sker mnan tsham ngam bcas/_/'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis/_/brgyal dang 
[\[100b.4\]]rims nad mcher nad bskyed/_/dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa/_/dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byugs/_/tsher mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur/_/dgra yi pha rus dug rang skyur/_/gzugs byad nim pa'i mer bsregs na/_/dgra bo gdon chen nad kyis 'debs/_/phag 
[\[100b.5\]]rtug snu ha arga'i shing /_/tsher mes bsregs na mgo 'khor 'gyur/_/ne'u le byi la byi tsher spu/_/bsregs na bud med bu brlag 'gyur/_/mi dang ne'u le khwa rus pa/_/yungs mar nim pa'i me la bsregs/_/grong dang grong khyer skrod par byed/_/stag spu thod rus 
[\[100b.6\]]'ug pa'i spu/_/sa ha me tog na le sham/_/nim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed/_/nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa/_d+ha dur 'bru bsregs nad skyed byed/_/dug khrag d+ha dur 'bras bu yis/_/nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri/_/tsha gsum lan tshwa khrag gis byugs/_/
[\[100b.7\]]lcags snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas/_/nim pa'i shing gi me yis btso/_/dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur/_/mi khyi bya rgod rus phye dug_/ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang /_/nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan tshwa/_/tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis 'debs/_/ske tshe dug 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]skegs sbrul shun tsha ba'i mar/_/gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung /_/char ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur/_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[101a.2\]]thams cad kyis/_/bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang /_/snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/_/e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/thabs dang shes rab bsam du med/_/thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/mtshungs med rgya che dam chos gsungs/_/dug gi 'jigs pas sa steng 'khrigs/_/
[\[101a.3\]]nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi/_/bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'dir gus na/_/ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong bar 'gyur/_/de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong /_/rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas/_/ngom zhing ched du brjod pa 'di/_/snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol/_/
[\[101a.4\]]e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag_/sems can kun la sman par dgyes/_/skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yi/_/mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs/_/gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sbyong /_/'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni/_/lhag pa'i 
[\[101a.5\]]bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su/_/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/gdod nas thugs su 'gro don chud/_/rtog med rang bzhin las grol 
[\[101a.6\]]nas/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs/_/'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod/_/gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed/_/de rjes 'jigs med nga yi med/_/dogs pa spangs na zad par gyi/_/sa la bzhugs nas sems can don/_/ma bsams thogs pa med par byed/_/gsang 
[\[101a.7\]]sngags rgyal po skyob kun la/_/sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste/_/nam mkha' chu gser dag pa ltar/_/bsgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed/_/de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs/_/ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang /_/gtso la me tog gtor byas te/_/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]do/_/e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i/_/cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang /_/snying rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas/_/mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi/_/'jigs rnams las brgal pad+ma ltar/_/rnal 'byor can de mdzes par 
[\[101b.2\]]spyod/_/de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/_/phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas/_/shin tu ngom pas snyan tshig gis/_/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang /_/dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab/_/'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni/_/bying bas blta dka' rtogs 
[\[101b.3\]]pa yis/_/sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/_/mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang /_/blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams/_/lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur/_/de nas rig pa'i lha mo che/_/spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/_/ngo mtshar gyur nas spyan gdangs te/_/snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/_/
[\[101b.4\]]e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung /_/e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che/_/e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab/_/chos rnams skye med 'gag pa med/_/sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol ba ltar/_/sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa/_/spros pa dang bral spros pa bral/_/sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i 
[\[101b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnams/_/stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khams/_/gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas/_/'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la/_/ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni/_/ched du brjod pa 'dis bstod do/_/oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa/_/ser sna rnam par dag nas yo 
[\[101b.6\]]byad dbang thob dang /_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/_/rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud/_/tsaN yig dri [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tsan+dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshe la dbang ba dang /_/las dang rnam par smin pa 
[\[101b.7\]]mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/_/dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo/_/Da yig nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang /_/bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang /_/mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes pa'i stobs dang ni/_/'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]'tshal lo/_/ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag_/brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang /_/khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/_/'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal lo/_/hA yig ma chags 
[\[102a.2\]]shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che/_/bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang /_/thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni/_/sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshal lo/_/ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob/_/bsam 
[\[102a.3\]]gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'i/_/kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs/_/mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/_/Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang phyug chen po rgyal/_/stobs chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang /_/
[\[102a.4\]]sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_/ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyil la 'dud/_/Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso/_/smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang /_/dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_/
[\[102a.5\]]mi g.yo ye shes khro bo stobs chen phyag 'tshal lo/_/hUM yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can/_/thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang /_/'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/_/legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad 'dud/_/
[\[102a.6\]]phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs/_/ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang /_/zag pa thams cad yang dag zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs/_/chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud/_/de nas chos rje thub pas ni/_/
[\[102a.7\]]ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas/_/'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus/_/lag na rdo rje mthu chen la/_/snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/_/mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa/_/rdo rje theg pa bla 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]na med/_/mi gang bsod nams dman pa'am/_/mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang /_/rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag_/gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du/_/log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang /_/rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste/_/rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin 
[\[102b.2\]]du/_/rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang snang /_/mu mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba'i mtsho/_/brgal ba'i gzings chen bla med 'di/_/chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni/_/khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/_/lag na rdo rje stobs po ches/_/ston pa la ni 'di gsol 
[\[102b.3\]]to/_/rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu ni/_/gdul dka' ba ni rab tu zhi/_/sa steng nad dang gdon mu ge_/bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral/_/slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir/_/brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/_/dpa' bo mkha' 'gro drag po rnams/_/yid kyis brtul zhugs 
[\[102b.4\]]phyung nas kyang /_/rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang /_/lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni/_/ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma/_/sha za gnod sbyin srin mo rnams/_/rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed/_/rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed/_/ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin/_/legs so 
[\[102b.5\]]shin tu cher legs so/_/rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de/_/rgyun du bsrung zhing blo 'phel mdzod/_/de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong /_/lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar bcas/_/thams cad 
[\[102b.6\]]ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams/_/dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i/_/mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/_/lha klu 'bum phrag 'tshe bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong sems/_/skye gnas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad 
[\[102b.7\]]byung mtshar/_/rgyal ba'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang /_/'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]{D633}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kAny+tsa ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das lhas 
[\[103a.2\]]ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig 
[\[103a.3\]]tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang rig sngags rnams dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen 
[\[103a.4\]]lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang /_bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rab tu gzhom pa dang /_rab tu gzhig pa'i smad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i 
[\[103a.5\]]gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin no/_/lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang /_gsang sngags rnams dang sman 
[\[103a.6\]]rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/_/kau shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir da 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/_sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/_rig sngags thams cad zlog pa/_gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_mtshang 
[\[103a.7\]]'dru ba dang /_'thab mo dang /_'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/_gsang sngags dang /_sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/_gang bskal 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu ba dang gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/_ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyis rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs 
[\[103b.2\]]par byas te gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dang /_bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas/_kau shi 
[\[103b.3\]]ka khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 
[\[103b.4\]]rig sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_oM hi ni hi ni/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_ni hi ni hi/_ni hi ra pi ni/_kAny+tsa nA pa ti/_lo kA mA te/_b+hu te/_b+hu ku ta man+t+ra/_a d+hi kr-i te/_be de be de be ta man+t+ra/_a d+hi kr-i te/_
[\[103b.5\]]ha na ha na/_ha sa ha sa/_tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/_b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/_b+ha ga ba ti/_dza ye bi dza ye/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_ban+d+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_a mo g+ha shag+ti d+hA ra Ni/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_kA Da ma mA na si/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/_mo 
[\[103b.6\]]ha ya mo ha ya/_lha'i sgyu dang /_klu'i sgyu dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang /_srin po'i sgyu dang /_nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang /_dri za'i sgyu dang /_lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang /_mi'am ci'i sgyu dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang /_rig sngags 
[\[103b.7\]]'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang /_drang srong gi sgyu dang /_sems can rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang /_'byung po'i sgyu dang /_sgyu thams cad ra la ra la/_radz+dza radz+dza/_d+hu ma d+hu ma/_d+hu d+hu ma/_rA ba rA ba/_rA ba na/_tsakrAn tan/_grAn tha ni/_ha na ha na/_
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]sarba bid+yA/_sha trU nAM/_stam+b+ha ya/_ba yuM stam+b+ha ya/_sUr+yAM stam+b+ha ya/_so maM stam+b+ha ya/_ba ru NAM stam+b+ha ya/_ag+Nin stam+b+ha ya/_ud da kaM d+hi ti d+hi ti/_d+hA ra NI pA sha ha ste/_beSh+Ta ya pA sha ne/_gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang /_dgra rnams dang /_sdang ba dang /_
[\[104a.2\]]rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang /_'thab pa dang /_rab tu 'thab pa dang /_mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_p+hany+dza ya p+hany+dza ya/_dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/_stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/_b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_ma hA mo ha ni/_
[\[104a.3\]]b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/_bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig phaT swA hA/_kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig_/gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes 
[\[104a.4\]]su dran par byed na de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so/_/lhas ma yin/_klus ma yin/_gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/_srin pos ma yin/_dri zas ma yin/_lha ma yin gyis ma yin/_nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/_
[\[104a.5\]]mi'am cis ma yin/_rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin/_mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/_pha rol 
[\[104a.6\]]gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/_lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_lus la me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang /_byed du bcug pa 
[\[104a.7\]]dang /_rjes su yi rang ba de nyid slar 'bab par 'gyur/_de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur/_kau shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_rig sngags thams cad dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman thams 
[\[104b.2\]]cad dang /_byad thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/_/rgyal po'am/_rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gdul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 
[\[104b.3\]]'di dran par bya'o/_/lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba'am/_chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te bcang bar bya/_mgul du 
[\[104b.4\]]gdags par bya'o/_/yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_sde dang bcas te dge ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur 
[\[104b.5\]]ro/_/ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/_mdud pa bdun bor na bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa 
[\[104b.6\]]la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na rgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/_/'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pa'i zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na smra ba thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/_/bklag par bya/_kha ton du bya/_brjod par bya ste/_brjod 
[\[104b.7\]]pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis byas par gyur pa dang /_gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/_/srad bu btags sam/_chus bdag bsrung ba byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i don thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[105a.2\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[105a.3\]{D634}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[105a.4\]]dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/namaH_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/_sa man+ta a mog+ha/_a pra ti ha ta/_shA sa nA nAM/_na ma Ar+ya a pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/_badzra satwA ya/_badzra bi pu lA ya/_pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/_pad+ma yon ye/_tad+ya thA/_oM 
[\[105a.5\]]hrIHka ra shrI ka ra/_pra b+hA ka ra/_badzra satwa/_badzra saM b+ha ba/_pad+ma saM b+ha ba/_pad+ma sA ga ra/_pad+ma go tsa ra/_ba ra da mahA kA ru Ni ka/_kA ru Na saM b+ha ba/_hUM hUM/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_da ra da ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/_de nas phyogs bcu'i 
[\[105a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams 
[\[105a.7\]]la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/_/'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o/_/gang la la nyan pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum 
[\[105b\]]
