[\[105b.1\]]tshogs pa thams cad dang /_dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/_'khor dang bcas pa dang /_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang 
[\[105b.2\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/_sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/_/srid gsum ma lus yon 
[\[105b.3\]]tan chen po'i bdag_/dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_/snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/_/rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa po/_/skal ba bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i mchog_/shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag_/rnam 
[\[105b.4\]]dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/_/rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/_/mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes/_/dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung /_/skabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing gsal bar mdzad/_/nor bu'i 
[\[105b.5\]]thod can rdo rje las byung ba/_/srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan/_/thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/_/'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog_/snyan cha mgul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams/_/dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs 
[\[105b.6\]]pa'i thor tshugs can/_/tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tsham pa'i gzugs/_/'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can/_/dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa rtsol ba'i rgyu/_/tshul gyis longs spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu/_/dkyil 'khor mchog gi 
[\[105b.7\]]spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/_/srid gsum sgrol ba'i zom pa gcig pu lags/_/dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/_/gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/_/sa brnyes 'od zer 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/_/chen po'i che ba thogs pa med pa ste/_/snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med/_/dge ba dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag_/tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag_/srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung 
[\[106a.2\]]ba/_/srid gsum bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/_/dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs/_/nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs/_/pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/_/dge snod yon tan chen 
[\[106a.3\]]po'i snod gcig pa/_/bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag_/smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/_/'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa/_/sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad/_/skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snang ba po/_/rdo rje mchog 
[\[106a.4\]]gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can/_/yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba/_/dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/_/de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/_/cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan/_/lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu 
[\[106a.5\]]gsum bdag dbang /_/lha dang lha min dbang byas rnams kyis btud/_/brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/_/bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/_/pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung /_/dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/_/chos 
[\[106a.6\]]brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa/_/bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/_/rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus 
[\[106a.7\]]na bzhugs/_/rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/_/na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa/_/thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las/_/cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/_/dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya mnga' ba/_/nor 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing /_/nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa/_/me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags/_/gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag_/btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/_/rang gi rigs gsal dbang 
[\[106b.2\]]chen dkyil 'khor pa/_/pad+ma bzang ba'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan/_/spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/_/gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/_/tshogs chen mdun na 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/_/spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor 
[\[106b.3\]]mdzes gyur pa/_/ka la ping ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/_/mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams/_/stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/_/rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/_/
[\[106b.4\]]tshogs mchod dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa/_/chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/_/gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa/_/lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/_/mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/_/
[\[106b.5\]]stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan/_/'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/_/sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes/_/nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/_/
[\[106b.6\]]mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste/_/rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can/_/don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/_/theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags/_/dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes/_/skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus 
[\[106b.7\]]bcom/_/blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/_/bde ldan gos brgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/_/bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad/_/rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/_/bde 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ba longs spyod cher 'gyur dri ma med/_/zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/_/mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog_/'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/_/stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[107a.2\]]mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs/_/dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/_/khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs/_/khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba/_/rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal 
[\[107a.3\]]lo/_/pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/_/thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/_/spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba/_/rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa/_/mchog chen rdo rje 
[\[107a.4\]]glu la bstod pa yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'/_/ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni stod byed pa/_/des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi/_/longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[107a.5\]]mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin par byed/_/sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/_/de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te/_/lam srang bzang por dmigs te 
[\[107a.6\]]'gro bar 'gyur/_/srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes/_/de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/_/de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing /_/gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis/_/'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs/_/
[\[107a.7\]]pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]{D635}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_/Ar+ya mai tri nA ma aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[107b.2\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po smras pa/_na ma s+t+rai yA d+h+wi kA nAM/_sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM sa ra sa ra/_su ru su ru/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_ma hA d+ha ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_ma hA tsa ra/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA b+ha ra/_kam+pa kam+pa/_ma hra 
[\[107b.3\]]kam+pa hUM/_ma hA s+pha ra Na d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba ste mtha' yas par khyab pa/_bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/_
[\[107b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/_sgrib pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_ltas ngan pa thams cad 
[\[107b.5\]]las thar bar byed pa/_sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med po yongs su thar bar byed pa ste shin tu dkon pa'o/_/de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/_nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/_rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis 
[\[107b.6\]]spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/_/rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/_/'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/_/dar ba chen po 
[\[107b.7\]]mngon par rgyas/_/tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste/_/de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral/_/dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa/_/sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/_/rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste/_/mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/_/yon tan 'od brgyas 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]bsgyings pa ste/_/nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/_/srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku/_/rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can/_/lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi/_/rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/_/dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/_/rab tu dga' 
[\[108a.2\]]ba de bzhin des/_/yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha/_/che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog_/sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing /_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/_/sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/_/
[\[108a.3\]]ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs/_/sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/_/pad+ma 'dab stong rtse mo can/_/rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes/_/chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/_/sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/_/snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po/_/srid gsum 
[\[108a.4\]]ye shes nyi ma lags/_/gtso bo chen po cher grags pa/_/seng ge chen po stobs po che/_/cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/_/skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/_/rdo rje byi ru bai DUr+ya/_/nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs/_/byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/_/
[\[108a.5\]]sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs/_/zhal mdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi/_/lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can/_/rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la btud/_/rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod/_/nor bu brgya 'gul 'od zer gyis/_/brang gi phyogs 
[\[108a.6\]]rnams dag par byas/_/cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/_/nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/_/rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing /_/dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro/_/rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/_/'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/_/'od zer mang 
[\[108a.7\]]pos phog pa yi/_/phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/_/brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi/_/'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod/_/dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/_/tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher/_/lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]ltar/_/ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs/_/rdo rje chen po rtse mo can/_/shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa/_/byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos/_/brtson pa kun las rnam par rgyal/_/snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/_/mtshon cha chen po shin tu 
[\[108b.2\]]'bar/_/byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/_/kun nas sba ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/_/ma pham thub med dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che/_/byams pa'i snying po snying po che/_/byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba/_/rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[108b.3\]]bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa/_/rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud/_/de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po/_/grub pa chen po rig sngags grub/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/_/thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/_/sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen 
[\[108b.4\]]lags/_/gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges/_/mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/_/nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/_/snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/_/'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba/_/dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste/_/gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos 
[\[108b.5\]]dbyings dang /_/nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/_/swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog_/'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad/_/stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa/_/nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/_/stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/_/
[\[108b.6\]]mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can/_/dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad/_/rdo rje chen po rab bsgrub pa/_/sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/_/dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston/_/rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yi/_/g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa/_/
[\[108b.7\]]sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/_/de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/_/mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/_/khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/_/byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/_/bstod nas kun mkhyen 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]gnod bral ba/_/thub pa nyi mas bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa/_/bde dang phun sum tshogs bsgrub pa/_/thabs chen bla na med pa ste/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/_/'jig rten kun gyi 
[\[109a.2\]]bde skyed pa/_/'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/_/sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/_/byams pa bstod pa'i gnas pa la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/_/mi ni la la gang bstod pa/_/de la lha la sogs kun dang /_/
[\[109a.3\]]lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams/_/rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/_/gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/_/sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te/_/'di la the tshom yong med do/_/nang par 
[\[109a.4\]]mal nas langs nas ni/_/gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/_/de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/_/byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing /_/sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang /_/de bzhin 'jig 
[\[109a.5\]]rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs/_/'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D636}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kha gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra 
[\[109a.6\]]sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha'i spyod 
[\[109a.7\]]yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM swa sti ka mA lAk+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/_d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/_gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/_sa yang g.yos par gyur/_rnga bo 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]che dag gi sgra yang grag par gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/_kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil 
[\[109b.2\]]'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/_bsod nams chen po sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/_rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang /_'di thos pas 
[\[109b.3\]]dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/_/nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/_/zla ba la bur 'gyur te sems 
[\[109b.4\]]can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do/_/nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/_/sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te mtho dman med do/_/lhun po lta bur 'gyur te sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/_/
[\[109b.5\]]thar pa lta bur 'gyur te bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/_/de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrang ba tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/_nyan pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_ston pa tsam dang /_bzlas brjod 
[\[109b.6\]]byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/_de'i 'dod pa dang /_smon pa dang /_re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_sdang bas dkrugs pa dang /_mi nad dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_
[\[109b.7\]]gnod pa 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa'i dus dang /_'chi ba dang /_chom rkun dang /_dgon pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_gcan gzan dang /_mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/_bde ba dang /_'byor pa dang /_ci 'dod 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]pa dang /_/ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha bton te/_sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang /_rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[110a.2\]]dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa/_'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/_nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog_/'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/_/
[\[110a.3\]]sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog_/thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/_/kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/_/thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/_/lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/_/
[\[110a.4\]]dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen/_/'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog_/lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog_/rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog_/dag mchog rtogs mchog 
[\[110a.5\]]mchog dang mchog min mchog_/zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/_/'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/_/rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/_/mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab/_/legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min 
[\[110a.6\]]sgron/_/thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/_/dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron/_/rgyu skar zla ba'i brgyan las shar ba'i sgron/_/mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/_/legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/_/'od chen gti mug rab tu 
[\[110a.7\]]'byed pa'i 'od/_/rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/_/rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang /_/rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brgyan dbang po/_/rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang /_/dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]gsum dbang /_/rdo rje bzang po rdor 'od rdo rje 'bar/_/rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/_/rdo rje 'od can rdor 'dzin rdo rje drag_/rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang /_/na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/_/sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/
[\[110b.2\]]ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/_/mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/_/lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar/_/rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/_/sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed phreng mchog can/_/glog gi stobs kyi 
[\[110b.3\]]snang bas sgeg la brtan/_/ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/_/rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/_/'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/_/gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms 
[\[110b.4\]]pa/_/bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug_/sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/_/grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/_/mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/_/sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[110b.5\]]brnyes/_/rab 'byam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/_/mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la/_/rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/_/bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/_/cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/_/
[\[110b.6\]]byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren/_/legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/_/dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/_/rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can/_/'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/_/longs 
[\[110b.7\]]spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug_/sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba/_/sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/_/sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/_/rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/_/gtsug gi nor bu gtsug 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]can cod pan mchog_/cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog_/dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog_/sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs/_/rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/_/srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu 
[\[111a.2\]]'od stong mnga'/_/ri rtse 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa/_/yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/_/nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/_/nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/_/yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu/_/nam mkha'i 
[\[111a.3\]]dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/_/sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags/_/srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog_/zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag_/skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+ma skyes/_/kun nas 'od bzang legs 
[\[111a.4\]]bshad chos mnga' ba/_/dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag_/blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang /_/mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/_/zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas/_/'od kyi 'byung gnas 
[\[111a.5\]]bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/_/legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa/_/snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad/_/rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/_/blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags/_/kun tu longs 
[\[111a.6\]]spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog_/blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/_/dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad/_/snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/_/
[\[111a.7\]]spyan zur mnga' ni rab tu gtang legs pa/_/'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/_/mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/_/drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/_/rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris par sla/_/rab tu drag 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/_/lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/_/spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel/_/'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'/_/na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/_/legs bris 
[\[111b.2\]]sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'/_/na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/_/zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/_/zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/_/bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/_/zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal 
[\[111b.3\]]mdzad lam me ba/_/dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra/_/rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/_/sgra brnyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/_/blo gros chen po blo gros rno ba'i mchog_/rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/_/rgyu dang mi 
[\[111b.4\]]rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang /_/stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/_/skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/_/mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris bskyed pa'i rgyu/_/sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang 
[\[111b.5\]]rdo rje can/_/mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan/_/ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/_/gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad/_/brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/_/dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/_/gcig 
[\[111b.6\]]pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/_/rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/_/dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/_/gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/_/skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang /_sdig 'joms 
[\[111b.7\]]mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/_/bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/_/'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang /_/nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/_/mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang /_/de ni srid gsum 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]sems can mchog 'gyur zhing /_/dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar bar 'gyur/_/g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang /_/mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/_/mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/_/nam mkha'i snying po la ni 
[\[112a.2\]]stod byed pa/_/de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang /_/sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol/_/de ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang /_/bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/_/bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am/_/
[\[112a.3\]]rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang /_/rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/_/bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun/_/'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/_/nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum 
[\[112a.4\]]mgon po la/_/rtag tu bsten cing sngags kyang bsten par bgyi/_/'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D637}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya 
[\[112a.5\]]sa man+ta b+ha dra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kun tu bzang po nam 
[\[112a.6\]]mkha'i dkyil kun tu rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/_sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[112a.7\]]sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang /_rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/_yon tan chen po'i sku sa kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra 
[\[112b.2\]]rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/_nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de 
[\[112b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig_/
[\[112b.4\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pa de'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/_/tad+ya thA/_oM na mo na ma s+t+ri b+hu ba ne shwa re/_ma hA b+ho gA ya/_a sa ma sa ma/_a mi 
[\[112b.5\]]ta sa ma/_a nan+ta sa ma/_ga ga na sa ma/_tri b+hu ba na sa ma/_a she Sha sa ma/_be Sha sa ma/_pa ra ma ar+tha sa ma/_swa b+hA ba sa ma/_ta thA tA sa ma/_a ra dzaHsa ma/_shud d+hi sa ma/_bud d+hi sa ma/_d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/_a b+hi Sha ma sa ma/_sa ma sa ma/_e kA 
[\[112b.6\]]nA ya/_sA ga ra/_bi shud+d+he/_A lo ka_/hI hI/_lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/_bi dza ya bi dza ya/_oM pra sa ga ta/_na ya na ya/_hi ni ra a d+hiSh+ThA na/_saM b+ho ga_/aM a na la ya la ya/_d+harma a gra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_dza ya dza ya/_hUM hUM/_d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/_de nas 
[\[112b.7\]]rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/_sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/_'jig 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so/_/de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog 
[\[113a.2\]]thod stan chen po las bskyod de/_dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/_kye ma snying rje chen po dang yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/_kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/_mtha' dang dbus med 
[\[113a.3\]]pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/_chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/_/kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon 
[\[113a.4\]]mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyis bon ma bsgrubs la/_
[\[113a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/_gzung ba'am/_bklag pa'am/_kun chub 
[\[113a.6\]]par bya ba lta ci smos/_gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/_/kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/_/'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/_/
[\[113a.7\]]mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/_/'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan 
[\[113b.2\]]rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[113b.3\]]'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/_/nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po 'thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa kun tu 
[\[113b.4\]]bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/_ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar 
[\[113b.5\]]'gyur te/_phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do/_/'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/_
[\[113b.6\]]khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo /_/de nas lus bde ba dang /_sems bde ba dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/_/mthu che ba dang /_dbang che bar 
[\[113b.7\]]grags par yang 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo /_/nang bar langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]bya'o/_/de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/_nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/_/lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang /_
[\[114a.2\]]bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags 
[\[114a.3\]]'chang chen po rnams dang /_spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang /_rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang /_rin chen 
[\[114a.4\]]dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang /_lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /_dar chen dang /_gzugs bzang dang /_shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams 
[\[114a.5\]]dang /_gzhon nu ma rnams dang /_bran rnams dang /_bran mo rnams dang /_mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang /_lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang /_ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang /_dbang 
[\[114a.6\]]phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang /_rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags 
[\[114a.7\]]pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/_kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog_/sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che/_/dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog_/sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]bdag_/rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/_/gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/_/gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/_/khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/_/rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad/_/bsgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/_/rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/_/
[\[114b.2\]]rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po/_/lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/_/btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag_/sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/_/de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/_/dul dang sbyin pa'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]thabs/_/rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/_/
[\[114b.3\]]shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes/_/brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/_/brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/_/stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/_/mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang /_/yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/_/rdul sel rgyal po chen po 
[\[114b.4\]]ste/_/rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho pa/_/rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/_/cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/_/mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang /_/shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/_/snying po chen po las byung ba/_/nyon mongs bral ba thub bar dka'/_/
[\[114b.5\]]sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/_/rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/_/gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/_/rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/_/rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/_/thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/_/g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes 
[\[114b.6\]]pa ste/_/g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/_/gsung bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad/_/dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/_/dbang po las lhag thub dang mnyam/_/chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/_/rab dga' bun long zhi mdzad pa/_/nyon 
[\[114b.7\]]mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad/_/dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/_/khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/_/gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang ldan/_/mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang /_/mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/_/sangs 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig_/byang chub snying por rgya cher rol/_/rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/_/spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge_/gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/_/dag mdzad bsreg sbyin mchog sbyin po/_/'joms byed bgegs 
[\[115a.2\]]rnams rnam par 'joms/_/'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/_/rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba/_/skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag_/nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/_/sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/_/brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/_/
[\[115a.3\]]kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po/_/kun tu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_/kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/_/kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags/_/mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs/_/de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/_/nyon 
[\[115a.4\]]mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/_/'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/_/rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/_/rdo rje chen po stobs skyed pa/_/sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/_/pha rol zhugs pa sdig sel ba/_/dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/_/
[\[115a.5\]]dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/_/'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/_/ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin/_/longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/_/dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la/_/nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/_/gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par 
[\[115a.6\]]rgyal/_/dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/_/bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/_/sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/_/dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/_/'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/_/rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/_/sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba 
[\[115a.7\]]can/_/yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/_/brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/_/gsung ba chen po shes rab che/_/sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/_/mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/_/theg pa bla na med par ldan/_/mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchog_/ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/_/zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/_/bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/_/kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa/_/snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/_/snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/snying 
[\[115b.2\]]rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/_/dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/_/mtshon mchog dang ba rab mtho ba/_/rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can/_/skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i dal 'byor can/_/kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba/_/dga' ba'i 
[\[115b.3\]]dam pa sbyin pa po/_/kun du yul kun mnga' ba ste/_/zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/_/dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags/_/zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs/_/mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/_/spyod yul 
[\[115b.4\]]gcig la gnas pa ste/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/_/dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/_/slob dpon chen po grags pa che/_/dam pa nyid de bla na med/_/gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/_/de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni/_/yon 
[\[115b.5\]]tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/_/dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/_/yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal/_/gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs/_/mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang /_/sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 
[\[115b.6\]]'di gsungs/_/kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/_/mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/_/sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la/_/snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/_/des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[115b.7\]]'don/_/mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing /_/de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/_/ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/_/de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spobs las nges par byung gyur cing /_/yon tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]gis yon tan rgyas rnams la/_/bstod pa chen po rnams byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/_/'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya 
[\[116a.2\]]rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D638}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya badzra pA Ni aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 
[\[116a.3\]]gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/_oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka_/ha na da ha/_pa tsa hUM phaT/_de nas gzungs sngags 
[\[116a.4\]]'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/_bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo /_/dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to/_/lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang 
[\[116a.5\]]rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig_/rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog 
[\[116a.6\]]tu gsang ba lags so/_/rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang /_bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang /_sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang /_dam pa stsol ba dang /_'byor pa stsol ba dang /_sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_thos na don mchis pa dang /_brjod 
[\[116a.7\]]na don mchis pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang /_stobs skyed pa dang /_gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang /_spobs pa skyed pa dang /_dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang /_nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang /_dbang bgyid pa dang /_sdang ba 'joms pa 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]dang /_sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang /_dug sel ba dang /_rgyal bar bgyid pa dang /_dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_dang bar bgyid pa dang /_nga rgyal 'joms pa dang /_pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang /_sdig pa zhi bar bgyid 
[\[116b.2\]]pa dang /_nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang /_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_dpal skyed pa dang /_skal ba 
[\[116b.3\]]bzang po ra bgyid pa dang /_sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang /_gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang /_ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang /_yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang /_char ches pa dang /_char mi 'bab pa dang /_dus kyi 
[\[116b.4\]]gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/_g.yul chen po dang /_mi nad chen po dang /_rtsod pa chen po dang /_mi ma lags pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa dang /_sdang ba dang /_byad stems dang /_ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang /_skrod pa dang /_srog 
[\[116b.5\]]'jig pa'i tshe dang /_'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/_gos dkar po 'tshal te/_kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/_brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad 
[\[116b.6\]]las thar bar 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/_thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/_sems can rnams la srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/_/de nas 'khor thams cad 
[\[116b.7\]]ngo mtshar du gyur nas rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/_/rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/_/rdo rje snying po stobs po che/_/rdo rje 'khrugs pa zhags pa che/_/
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]rdo rje chen po stobs po che/_/rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/_/rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te/_/rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po/_/chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/_/chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/_/phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/_/
[\[117a.2\]]spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/_/rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/_/mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags/_/ral gri sngon po ral gri che/_/dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/_/mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba/_/'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang 
[\[117a.3\]]ldan/_/rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/_/rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che/_/khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/_/sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel/_/khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu bstod/_/khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/_/gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams 
[\[117a.4\]]pa ste/_/rdo rje'i mdangs ni nges par 'gums/_/dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/_/rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/_/rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/_/'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro/_/sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/_/gzi brjid skyed 
[\[117a.5\]]pa grags mdzad pa/_/bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/_/sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/_/drag po chen po rdo rje khro/_/sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad/_/gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/_/rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/_/rgya 
[\[117a.6\]]mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/_/dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse/_/gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/_/spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/_/rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/_/rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags/_/na bza' lcang lo rtsa 
[\[117a.7\]]dmar gsol/_/mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/_/srin po srung po drag po ste/_/me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/_/nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/_/'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/_/grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/_/rab mchog rab mchog 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]rnams kyis mchod/_/mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba/_/mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/_/cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/_/phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/_/ye shes che ldan bsrung ba che/_/rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring /_/gtso bo 
[\[117b.2\]]sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/_/'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa/_/rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/_/mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/_/'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig_/gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum/_/'dod 
[\[117b.3\]]pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/_/za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/_/mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/_/tsham tshom med de srid las byung /_/rtag pa skar dgyes dus 'byor pa/_/rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/_/rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/_/
[\[117b.4\]]bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/_/bai DUr+ya ltar dri med sku/_/mdzes shing stobs bskyed sna tshogs stobs/_/dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad/_/dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog_/lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste/_/brtan po 
[\[117b.5\]]dpa' bo lham me ba/_/bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/_/dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/_/mtshon cha che tshogs cod pan can/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba/_/pad+ma chen po'i phyag ring ba/_/pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mchog_/nag po 
[\[117b.6\]]chen po 'byung po che/_/gtum chen thog thog chen po ste/_/rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang /_/rdo rje'i mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/_/rtul phod thub dga' brtson pa ste/_/'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje/_/zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon/_/brag gi rtse mo rnam par 
[\[117b.7\]]'gems/_/rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/_/rdo rje yis ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/rdo rje'i lcags mdas bsreg mdzad pa/_/rdo rje'i mdas ni rnam par sbyong /_/rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang /_/rdo rje dbang po rdo rje'i rtsal/_/ye shes dag pa theg pa che/_/thabs 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]brnyes snying rje chen po lags/_/rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/_/spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/_/rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/_/mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/_/rdo rje chen po mgon po pa/_/rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/_/
[\[118a.2\]]rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrogs/_/me tog chun po 'od gsal ba/_/dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/_/des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/_/sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog_/rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/_/rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can/_/rdo rje'i 
[\[118a.3\]]bkod pa rab tu mdzes/_/mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag_/bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags/_/dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang /_/rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/_/gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung /_/skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba/_/rdo rje 
[\[118a.4\]]thog thog sgra chen sgrogs/_/rdo rje'i sgra ste rnam par 'joms/_/rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/_/rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/_/nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol/_/spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/_/dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[118a.5\]]bstan pa ston pa po/_/rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/_/dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/_/sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/_/dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/_/sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/_/
[\[118a.6\]]de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/_/mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/_/de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa/_/rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/_/rdo rje mtshan rtsa brgyad pa 'di/_/ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung /_/sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/_/ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[118a.7\]]pa 'di/_/dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa/_/grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing /_/nyes pa kun las rnam par 'grol/_/lag na rdo rje stobs po che/_/rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/_/lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/_/de ni sdig pa 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]kun las 'grol/_/ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/_/su zhig nang par langs nas 'don/_/rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba/_/gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/_/'jig rten thams 
[\[118b.2\]]cad de dbang 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang /_/tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yi/_/bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nang par langs nas ni/_/lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/_/de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang /_/
[\[118b.3\]]ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang /_/zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/_/shes rab can ni gang zhig gis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton 
[\[118b.4\]]na/_/gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang /_/bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/_/nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don/_/mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/_/bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i 
[\[118b.5\]]mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D639}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU tA Sh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[118b.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[118b.7\]]nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/_yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/_zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa/_bi tsi tra/_muk+ta dA ma/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/_pa ra ma satwa mo tsa ka 
[\[119a.2\]]ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma/_ko Sha d+ha ra/_pra ba ra d+harma/_lab+d+ha/_bi dza ya/_su ra ta/_saM b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/_kle sha ga ra/_pra sha ma ka/_shUn+yatA swab+hA ba/_a nu swa ri/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/_bar ta/_ba ra Na da da/_oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/_a sa ma sa ma/_anan+ta sa ma/_sa man+ta b+ha 
[\[119a.3\]]dra/_sa man+ta san+d+ha ra/_sa man+ta A ka ra/_sa man+ta pra sa ra/_sa ras ra/_he he/_many+dzu ra ba/_ma hA badzra ma hA khaD+ha/_ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_bir dza bir dza/_karma a ba ga ma ka_/ku ru ku ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru/_d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/_d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/_ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/_
[\[119a.4\]]mo ha ya mo ha ya/_b+ho b+ho/_b+hI ma b+hI ma/_nA da nA da/_sa ra sa ra/_ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/_mo tsa ya/_ma ma nA tha ma nu sr-i ta/_a pA ya duHkhaM/_su khaM/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_a nA tho haM/_duHkhi to haM/_sa ra dzo haM/_u ba dru to haM/_a bi bik+to haM/_mA ra na d+harmo haM/_twa na b+ha 
[\[119a.5\]]ga bAM/_duHkhi tA nAM/_su khaM da dA/_a nA thA nAM/_sa nA tha ka ra/_sa ra dza sAM/_bi ra dza ska ra/_u pa dru hA nAM/_swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka/_a bi bi ka tA nAM/_ku sha la saM b+ha ra/_pa ri pU ra yi tA/_ku sid+hA nAM/_ma hA bir+ya d+ha tA/_mA ra Na/_d+harmi Na/_ma ma ti/_pa dA dA tA/_ma ma 
[\[119a.6\]]bi b+ha ga bA na/_nA tho b+ha ba/_sha ra NaM/_pa rA ya NaM/_tra tA/_sarba duHkhA ni/_me pra sha ma ya/_sarba kle sha ra dzIM si mi/_a ba na ya/_sarba saM sA ra u pa dra ba/_duHkhA ni me nA sha ya/_sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ram+me/_ku ru/_sarba karma/_A ba ra Na/_kle sha pa ra ba ta 
[\[119a.7\]]me bi ki ra/_ma hA bo b+hi satwa si bi d+hi/_bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/_yo ga m+me/_san+ni yo dza ya/_a ra Na d+harma/_bi rA ga bi ra dza/_sany+dza ha/_pra dza ha/_d+ha ri Ni/_sa ma/_kha sa ma/_dza la ni d+hi sa ma/_me ru sa ma/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa ra da swA hA/_rig sngags don kun sgrub pa 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'di/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/_/de ma thag tu sems can rnams/_/skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/_/ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/_/bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/_/lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/_/log 'dren rnams ni skrag par 
[\[119b.2\]]gyur/_/sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/_/gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang /_/grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/_/'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing /_/gang tshe rig sngags 
[\[119b.3\]]bshad pa na/_/brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/_/rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/_/sa gzhi de yi tsho na g.yos/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/_/sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/_/bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang /_/srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/_/
[\[119b.4\]]stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smras/_/lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/_/thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/_/gang na rdo rje ral gri che/_/de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/_/phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog_/
[\[119b.5\]]'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/_/shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/_/bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/_/sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang /_/sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag_/shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/_/drag 
[\[119b.6\]]po drag po rab 'joms pa/_/gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/_/dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/_/rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/_/mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/_/sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/_/skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/_/gzhu 
[\[119b.7\]]stobs can la phyag ring ba/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/_/mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/_/me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/_/spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/_/dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs de rab tu 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bzhad/_/dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/_/ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/_/rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/_/rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/_/rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/_/tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/_/sdang 
[\[120a.2\]]ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/_/cha lugs sngo la sa skyong ba/_/lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/_/'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/_/rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/_/brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/_/yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/_/btud 
[\[120a.3\]]pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/_/rtag tu mchod cing rjod pa lags/_/stobs po che la shugs che ba/_/phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po/_/sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/_/'dzem shes rab bsrung ngo tsha shes/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog_/dkyil 
[\[120a.4\]]'khor chen po ston pa po/_/dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/_/dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/_/dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/_/zhabs la rjed pa'i tshegs dang ldan/_/ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/_/mchod pa chen po sa dang 
[\[120a.5\]]mnyam/_/hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/_/'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/_/lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/_/de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid/_/zhabs 'bring gang rgyangs chen po can/_/rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/_/'jig rten 
[\[120a.6\]]gsum du snyan par grags/_/gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/_/drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/_/mda' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/_/'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu ston/_/spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/_/nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od 
[\[120a.7\]]mdzes pa/_/nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/_/nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin/_/tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/_/mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/_/nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/_/dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/_/
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/_/dpal ldan dpa' mdzad bgegs gnon ri/_/kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/_/'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/_/zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/_dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/_/nor bu'i 
[\[120b.2\]]rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/_/rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron/_/rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/_/ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/_dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog_/'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/_/'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/_/dkar ba 
[\[120b.3\]]sngo ba 'od bzang ba/_/mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/_/ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/_/shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/_/stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/_/byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/_/rnam par 
[\[120b.4\]]grags pa gsan pa nges/_/rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/_/rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/_/shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur/_/'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa/_/mgur [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'dul 
[\[120b.5\]]mdzad zhi ba ste/_/zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/_/lha dang lha yin bcas pas bkur/_/sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/_/sems can kun la rab ston pa/_/brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog_/sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas/_/
[\[120b.6\]]sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/_/me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/_/byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/_/rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/_/phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad/_/bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/_/mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas 
[\[120b.7\]]pa/_/bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/_/mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med/_/de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/_/brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/_/mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/_/'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang /_/dpa' 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/_/tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/_/'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/_/mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog_/gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu bsrung /_/las dang nyon mongs rab bsreg pa/_/ston mdzad 
[\[121a.2\]]nyon mongs sel ba lags/_/legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/_/brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing /_/dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/_/lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/_/bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang /_/gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang /_/mdangs 
[\[121a.3\]]'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/_/de ring legs par bstod par gyur/_/'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis rab/_/bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/_/de dag kun la bltas nas kyang /_/'di skad du ni shig smras pa/_/khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med 
[\[121a.4\]]cing /_/nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/_/'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog_/nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig_/de nas rab ta cher bzhang cing /_/'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/_/shar phyogs 
[\[121a.5\]]gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/_/kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/_/sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/_/sems can rnams kye bsod nams tshogs/_/shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/_/kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/_/sems can 
[\[121a.6\]]rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/_/dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/_/'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/_/la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/_/sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/_/grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/_/yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung /_/
[\[121a.7\]]de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing /_/sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/_/de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang /_/ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rnams kyi sa/_/rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/_/'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/_/sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/_/ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/_/legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/_/sa chen dam pa de dag kyang /_/gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yi/_/sems 
[\[121b.2\]]can chen pos mi thogs par/_che zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang /_/sems can kun la sdug pa dang /_/spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/_/byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/_/rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang /_/sdig pa 
[\[121b.3\]]thams cad zhi byed cing /_/bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di/_/sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/_/nang par langs nas su brjod pa/_/de la rig sngags 
[\[121b.4\]]'chang kun dang /_/de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/_/gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag_/rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang /_/de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/_/de la nges 
[\[121b.5\]]par srung bar byed/_/de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing /_/mnyam par gzhag par snang bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/_/bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag_/dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/_/rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/_/
[\[121b.6\]]de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/_/'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/_/lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang /_/bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/_/shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/_/nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/_/dri ma med cing 
[\[121b.7\]]rab dag la/_/rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang /_/sems can thams cad dga' ba yi/_/yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/_/mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang /_/'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing /_/yid 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi/_/gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//_
[\[122a.2\]{D640}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba ni ba ra Na bi skaM b+hi nI nA mA Sh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib 
[\[122a.3\]]pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM a mr-i ta bin+du dza ba ma hA su kha swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam 
[\[122a.4\]]par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/_yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin 
[\[122a.5\]]gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/_
[\[122a.6\]]tshes bco lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_mar me dang /_me tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa la sogs pas mchod la bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/_sdig pa 
[\[122a.7\]]thams cad dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/_bsam pa thams cad yongs 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]su rdzogs par byed cing /_nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad sel bar byed do/_/de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa 
[\[122b.2\]]thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul che ba/_/nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/_/chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgrib pa kun las nges 
[\[122b.3\]]par grol/_/nyon mongs ngas dri ma kun sel cing /_/nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/_/skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lam srang gcig bu'i tshul ston cing /_/theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/_/theg pa dag pa khyod phyag 
[\[122b.4\]]'tshal/_/snang ba chen po snang ba brnyes/_/yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag_/zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/_/'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/theg pa chen po dag pa che/_/sangs rgyas theg pa rtog gyur cing /_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa/_/
[\[122b.5\]]rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/_/dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/_/bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste/_/rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/_/zla ba chen po nyi ma che/_/lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/_/lha chen mgon po chen po ste/_/
[\[122b.6\]]'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing /_/sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/_/kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/_/rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste/_/chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa 
[\[122b.7\]]lags/_/ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/_/sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/_/rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/_/ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/bsten pa gnas pa 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]dbang dag po/_/bde mdzad thugs kyang zhib ste/_/yangs pa dri med shes rab can/_/snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/_/zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/_/ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/_/dpa' btsan 
[\[123a.2\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/_/'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/_/zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/_/chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/_/thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/_/bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med/_/rnam dag thugs mnga' 
[\[123a.3\]]zhi ba mkhyen/_/nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags/_/sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/_/snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog_/dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog_/
[\[123a.4\]]dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/_/rnam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag_/rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi/_/'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/_/bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/_/tshogs chen 
[\[123a.5\]]bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/_/sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/_/ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/_/nyes gsum spangs shing sdig pa sel/_/
[\[123a.6\]]ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/_/mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/_/mgon po chen po snang ba che/_/sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/_/zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/_/yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/_/chos 
[\[123a.7\]]kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/_/dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/_/rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rdo rje chen po dri med mchog_/rdo rje'i mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'/_/nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/_/ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/_/
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/_/sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong /_/shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/_/sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog_/rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/_/rdo rje snang ba khyod 
[\[123b.2\]]phyag 'tshal/_/rin chen chen po rin chen blo/_/rin chen rdo rje 'od che ba/_/rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung /_/rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/_/stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa/_/ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/_/stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/_/stong nyid 
[\[123b.3\]]mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/_/dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/_/chos gcig las byung snang pa po/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags/_/'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/_/'jig rten chos las rnam par 
[\[123b.4\]]'das/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/_/brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag_/nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/_/phal chen skye bo kun la phan/_/sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/_/kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dga' mkhyen dga' 
[\[123b.5\]]la longs spyod pa/_/dga' ba'i rig mchog rnams kyi mchog_/dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/_/dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/_/sgeg chen 'jom zhing dgongs par ldan/_/rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/_/rdo rje'i rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog_/sgeg 
[\[123b.6\]]chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog_/rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/_/theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/_/bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog_/sgrib pa thams cad sel 
[\[123b.7\]]mdzad la/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/_/rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/_/kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/_/dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/_/gang zhig ming 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_/'di dag so sor rjod byed na/_/nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing /_/rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang /_/nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/_/sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/_/blo ldan gang zhig stod byed pa/_/de yi sdig pa med par 
[\[124a.2\]]'gyur/_/gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog_/nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/_/sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/_/bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su gtong /_/sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang /_/de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang /_/ye shes rgya mtsho 
[\[124a.3\]]longs spyod cing /_/sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/_/des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/_/ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/_/gang zhig 
[\[124a.4\]]ming mchog 'don pa ni/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/_/ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[124a.5\]{D641}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya k+Shi ti gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/_dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i 
[\[124a.6\]]snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha/_ha ra tsa ra/_ma hA pA sha ma ru tA+e/_a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/_de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/_/gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang /_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/_/ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/_/
[\[124a.7\]]sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la/_/bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/_/skal ldan chen po legs so legs/_/sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/_/khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing /_/yon tan dpag med tshogs bskyed pa/_/sems can kun gyi sdug 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]bsngal dang /_/nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni/_/'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/_/nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/_/ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag_/'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin/_/lus can dag las su yang rung /_/khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/_/de dag las 
[\[124b.2\]]ni gcig tsam yang /_/byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/_/mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog_/thos nas mos par byed pa ni/_/nges par yon tan thams cad kyang /_/thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/_/de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/_/langs te 
[\[124b.3\]]sa yi dbang phyug po/_/sa yi snying po sa mchog la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/_/sa yi snying po gtso bo che/_/glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/_/cod pan can te sa bsnyes pa/_/phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog_/rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i 
[\[124b.4\]]gnas/_/gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/_/gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul/_/swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog_/snying po snying po mkhyen par grags/_/gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/_/sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs 
[\[124b.5\]]can/_/sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/_/'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po/_/rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/_/snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/_/mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/_/shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/_/'dod chags 
[\[124b.6\]]la sogs skyon bsal cing /_/gar thabs chen po ston pa po/_/ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/_/nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/_/nyi ma chen po nyid yin te/_/dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/_/yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/_/
[\[124b.7\]]sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/_/chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i gangs chen mtsho/_/yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog_/thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/_/theg pa chen po 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]'jigs pa med/_/mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/_/zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/_/rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya ba/_/rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog thod/_/blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/_/pad+ma chen po stobs po che/_/gsang sngags chen 
[\[125a.2\]]po tshogs chen po/_/sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/_/lag na rdo rje yon tan nges/_/nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/_/mnyam nyid 'byam la longs spyod pa/_/rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/_/rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/_/sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin/_/sa 
[\[125a.3\]]la longs spyod longs spyod bzang /_/mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs/_/rab 'byam snod ni rnam par grags/_/smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/_/spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/_/me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/_/spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/_/brtan po brtan 
[\[125a.4\]]la bde sbyin pa/_/ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/_/gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/_/dbang po gshin rje'i rgyal chen dang /_/btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug_/'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/_/de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/_/rin 
[\[125a.5\]]chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/_/dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/_/gzigs pa ring ba spyan yangs pa/_/nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/_/thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug_/srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/_/dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/_/
[\[125a.6\]]dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can/_/rnam par gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das/_/ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che/_/stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/_/bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/_/dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed/_/sdang ba rnams kyi snying 
[\[125a.7\]]'joms pa/_/mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/_/dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba/_/rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/_/rigs kun du ni mchod pa lags/_/rgyal po rigs mchog skyed pa'i rten/_/rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/_/rdo rje sa 'og 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]rab grags pa/_/rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/_/mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog_/mgrin bzang nad dang bral ba lags/_/skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/_/sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/_/grol ba smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad/_/dkyil 
[\[125b.2\]]'khor ma lus rnams kyis brgyan/_/rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/_/rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/_/grub pa sbyin ba rnam dag mchog_/tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/_/dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/_/'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang 
[\[125b.3\]]ldan/_/ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/_/dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan/_/spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/_/nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/_/rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/_/mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med/_/sku yang dag cing na bza' dag_/dag 
[\[125b.4\]]pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/_/dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/_/'byung ldan sred pa sel mdzad pa/_/'khor ba zad mdzad shes rab can/_/tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/_/rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/_/rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/_/'byung ldan 
[\[125b.5\]]rab 'byam shes rab can/_/ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/_/sa yi snying po snying po che/_/rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/_/dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/_/zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/_/zla 
[\[125b.6\]]ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/_/dga' dang dang ba skyed pa ste/_/ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/_/rlung gi drag shul lta bur drag_/drag po lags te drag sel gtsang /_/rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba zhi/_/rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad/_/
[\[125b.7\]]lhun po ti se ma la yas/_/spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/_/rin chen rdo rje snying po che/_/sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags/_/rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/_/de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa/_/
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/_/rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/_/phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/_/de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/_/rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni/_/rdo rje 
[\[126a.2\]]sa gsum dbang mchog smras/_/yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing /_/nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/_/sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong /_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/_/
[\[126a.3\]]sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /_/dri ma kun bral yon tan nges/_/de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/_/phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/_/rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/bsam 
[\[126a.4\]]pa kun dang 'byor pa yi/_/gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/_/dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin/_/yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/_/sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba/_/'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/_/yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang /_/dpal 
[\[126a.5\]]yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/_/mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa/_/sdug bsngal kun las myur du 'grol/_/'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[126a.6\]{D642}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/_/thub la mgo bos phyag 
[\[126a.7\]]'tshal te/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/_/mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/_/gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/_/gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med/_/mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs/_/'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]lags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral/_/mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung /_/sku gsung phrin las bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab/_/stong nyid bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/_/stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan/_/stong pa nyid la 
[\[126b.2\]]lhag par mos/_/srid pa gsum po stong par ston/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan/_/sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/_/sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du/_/mu stegs 
[\[126b.3\]]can rnams thams cad 'joms/_/phas kyi rgo la ba tshar gcod pa/_/smra ba'i seng ge mi yi mchog_/dul zhing nyon mongs rnams dang bral/_/sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'/_/sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/_/grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa/_/
[\[126b.4\]]ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs can/_/tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/_/bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams/_/dag cing dag la rnams dang ldan/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' dbang mdzad/_/pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i spyan/_/pad+ma'i ze 
[\[126b.5\]]ba'i kha dog 'dra/_/bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags/_/gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams/_/bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/_/khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/_/khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes/_/
[\[126b.6\]]bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po/_/'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'/_/khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag_/khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams/_/kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso/_/khyod ni khyu mchog skye dgu'i gtso/_/thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs/_/
[\[126b.7\]]rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/_/rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs/_/'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod/_/zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod/_/rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags/_/dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod/_/klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod/_/
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]de bzhin sde dpon skems byed lags/_/lha min dbang po thags zangs ris/_/mig dmar gza' lag pa ba sangs/_/spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags/_/lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/_/khyod ni 'jig 
[\[127a.2\]]rten gang zag mchog_/'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig_/ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa/_/dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs/_/bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi rdzi/_/kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags/_/khyod ni sman pa zug 
[\[127a.3\]]rngu 'byin/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog_/blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/_/blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags/_/khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing /_/byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/_/rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/_/lus 
[\[127a.4\]]can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/_/yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa/_/sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod/_/khyod ni mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]gza' mchog lags/_/khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog_/khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/_/sa bcu'i mnga' bdag gtso bo lags/_/
[\[127a.5\]]ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin/_/khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin/_/khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu/_/khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar/_/sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/_/'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/_/
[\[127a.6\]]rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa/_/oM bA kye da~M na maHswA hA/_ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang /_/rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni/_/sdig 'gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/_/brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan/_/
[\[127a.7\]]skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa/_/de 'dod bsam dgu yid bzhin du/_/gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/_/bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni/_/mtshams med skal ba mnyam pa yi/_/las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa/_/de dag thams cad myur du byang /_/
[\[127b\]]
