[\[127b.1\]]'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang /_/'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/_/sems can dag pas dran byas na/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pas dran byas te/_/nges par gnas nas su klog pa/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang /_/thob 'gyur 
[\[127b.2\]]'di la the tshom med/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so//[ {D643}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai tri pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i 
[\[127b.3\]]gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_shAkya mu na ye/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a dzi te/_a dzi te/_a pa rA dzi te/_a dzi tan dza ya/_ha 
[\[127b.4\]]ra ha ra/_mai tri a ba lo ki te/_ka ra ka ra/_ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+he/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da bI dze/_smar smar/_asma kaM sa ma ya bo d+hi bo d+hi/_ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/_rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so/_/oM mo hi mo hi/_ma hA mo hi swA hA/_snying po'o/_/oM mu ni mu ni sma ra 
[\[127b.5\]]swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'o/_/gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang /_bsgom pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 
[\[127b.6\]]gyur pa na/_bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrogs par byed na/_de dag kyang bla 
[\[127b.7\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/_/'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ngan song gi dri mas kyang mi gos so/_/ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/_/lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los sgyur 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/_/nges 
[\[128a.2\]]par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/_de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/_/'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni 
[\[128a.3\]]dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D644}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dkyil 'khor 
[\[128a.4\]]brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/_byang 
[\[128a.5\]]chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos 
[\[128a.6\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 
[\[128a.7\]]'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[128b.2\]]dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs 
[\[128b.3\]]kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir 
[\[128b.4\]]snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byung zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig_/oM ma hA hUM ma hA bI ra swA hA/_snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/_/oM hrI hUM pad+ma pri ya 
[\[128b.5\]]swA hA/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/_/oM mai hA rA Na swA hA/_byams pa'i snying po'o/_/oM A kA sha gar+b+nA ya swA hA/_nam mkha'i snying po'o/_/oM swA hri rA ya dz+wa swA hA/_kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o/_/oM ku ru b+ha na ra ha swA hA/_
[\[128b.6\]]lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/_/oM shrI aM raM ga swA hA/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/_/oM ni swA raM b+ha swA hA/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/_/oM k+Shi ti ha rA dzA swA hA/_sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi 
[\[128b.7\]]snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad 
[\[129a.2\]]pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[129a.3\]{D645}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i 
[\[129a.4\]]khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/_'khor rnam bzhi dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so/_/de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang /_rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la/_
[\[129a.5\]]spos dang /_sman dang /_zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang /_btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas 
[\[129a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ra~M dkar po la chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to/_/yang zla ba'i 
[\[129a.7\]]dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/_zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang /_yo byad du gyur to/_/yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/_oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]phyag rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gzungs so/_/oM sarba d+harma tA badzra sid+d+ha hUM/_oM a mr-i ta hUM/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM ut+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/_oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/_oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la 
[\[129b.2\]]tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/_zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/_'phags pa thams cad mnyes pa dang /_sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[129b.3\]]sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang /_chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang /_bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis/_'phags pa thams cad kyi 
[\[129b.4\]]pho brang dang /_sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa/_brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi 
[\[129b.5\]]bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang /_gsang sngags dang /_rig sngags dang /_phyag rgya dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang /_dga' bar 
[\[129b.6\]]gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so/_/dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs so/_/nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[129b.7\]]stsal nas/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to/_/bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]{D646}]@##/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na dge 'dun gyi gnas na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor pa la chos ston to/_/
[\[130a.2\]]de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na/_chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug la/_de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba gzugs byad mi sdug pa/_shin tu rid cing skems pa/_kha nas me 'bar ba/_
[\[130a.3\]]mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/_skra 'dzings pa/_sen mo dang mche ba ring ba rna ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/_dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/_
[\[130a.4\]]zhes smras so/_/dga' bos des smras pa de thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag tshe'i dus byas nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_de nas 
[\[130a.5\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]des dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/_bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchis pa 
[\[130a.6\]]phul te/_kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na tshe ring zhing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dga' bos [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba/_lus mi sdug pa/_shin tu rid cing skems pa dang /_kha nas me 
[\[130a.7\]]'bar ba dang /_mgrin pa mo khab tsam la skra 'dzings pa dang /_sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la/_yid du mi 'ong mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/_lus skyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te myur bar bcom ldan 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes bcom ldan 
[\[130b.2\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad mchi'o/_/khyod da ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams su skye bar 
[\[130b.3\]]'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyis na yi [(]dgas [,]dwags [)]kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhes dris na/_des bdag la khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/_bram ze dang drang srong la 
[\[130b.4\]]sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod 
[\[130b.5\]]'jigs par ma byed cig khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang /_bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang /_gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs nga la yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[130b.6\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/_gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang /_bram ze 
[\[130b.7\]]dang drang srong la sogs te mang po'i kha zas dang gtor ma mchog dam par 'gyur te/_de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo nga yang bram zer gyur pa na byang 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/_de'i dbang gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]tshad med pa snyed dang /_drang srong mang po la kha zas dang /_gtor ma byin byin par gyur te/_yi 
[\[131a.2\]]dgas kyi khams su skyes pa de dag sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to/_/dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung shig_/bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs 
[\[131a.3\]]sngags 'di bka' stsal to/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang /_
[\[131a.4\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na ni rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/_yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do/_/snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la/_chan nam/_phye'am/_khur ba la 
[\[131a.5\]]sogs pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig btab ste/_lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag la gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[131a.6\]]gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad kyi skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[131a.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byam klas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]gshegs pa sku 'byam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/_sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag 
[\[131b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal 
[\[131b.3\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod de/_byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/_gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/_sa gtsang mar blug par bya'o/_/de ltar gtor ma sbyin 
[\[131b.4\]]par byas na phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/_/kha zas de dag [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyis yid bzhin du za ba dang /_chog 
[\[131b.5\]]'grangs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi khams spangs pa dang /_mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gal te dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[131b.6\]]la sbyin pa byin na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med de/_tshe ring ba dang /_bsod nams dang /_mdangs dang /_stobs skye zhing 
[\[131b.7\]]'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus pa dang /_gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste/_gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/_de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas 
[\[132a.2\]]mchog dam par 'gyur te/_des na bram ze dang /_drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/_sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams yongs su 'gyur bas/_so so nas mthun par 
[\[132a.3\]]dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang /_mdangs dang stobs su ldan te bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong zhing thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa lha'i spyod pa mchog 
[\[132a.4\]]dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ro/_/gal 
[\[132a.5\]]te dge slong pha dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/_
[\[132a.6\]]dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang /_rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[132a.7\]]des na bstod pa dang /_gsol ba btab pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/_rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/lha mang pos rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo khyod kyis 'di'i rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te/_sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang /_bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kha 
[\[132b.2\]]nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D647}]@#/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya 
[\[132b.3\]]na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang /_sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/_/de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/_nang du yang dag 'jog 
[\[132b.4\]]cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/_mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/_kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bos 
[\[132b.5\]]smras pa/_brten pa'i thabs ci yod/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mos smras pa/_kun dga' bo gal te nang par [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang zas dang skom yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te/_bram ze'i drang 
[\[132b.6\]]srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/_bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/_de lta na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/_bdag kyang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas kun dga' bos 
[\[132b.7\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma rid cing mdog ngan la lus skem pa/_kha nas me lce 'bar ba/_lto dang kha skom pa/_ral ba'i phung po g.yengs pa/_spu dang sen mo ring ba mthong ste/_tshig mi snyan cing yid du mi 'ong ba de thos nas/_skrag cing dngangs te/_spu zing zhes 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]byed nas/_stan las langs te shin tu rings pa dang /_shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_'dar bzhin du 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[133a.2\]]skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa skyabs mdzad du gsol/_bdag ni gnangs srog 'gum par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma mthong ste/_khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_bdag gis 
[\[133a.3\]]thabs ci mchis zhes smras na/_de'i mchid nas gal te khyod kyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas te/_bram ze'i drang srong 'bum yang tshim par byas na/_de lta na khyod kyi tshe phyir nur bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na/_
[\[133a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo gang gis khyod [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams dang /_bram ze'i 
[\[133a.5\]]drang srong rnams tshim par byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod kyis ma 'jigs shig_/kun dga' bo thams cad du 'od dang ldan pa rgyal chen shugs ldan 'od ces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_des byin pa tsam gyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum 
[\[133a.6\]]gyi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_bram ze'i drang srong re re la zas dang skom yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 'gyur ro/_/de ni nga sngon bram zer gyur pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang 
[\[133a.7\]]phyug dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od las ngas bzung ste/_des [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang bram ze'i drang srong grangs su bgrang ba mang ba dang /_ches mang ba dag ngas zas dang skom gyis tshim par byas te/_de dag thams cad [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten nas 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]shi 'phos nas lha'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung la ngo lon gyis shig_/na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/_oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/_kun dga' bo 'dis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gtor ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas lag pa brkyangs te sgo drung du 
[\[133b.2\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/se gol yang brdab par bya'o/_/de ltar byas nas byin ma thag tu phyogs bzhi'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gi bye ma snyed dag tshim par byas par 'gyur te/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang yul ma gad+hA'i bre bo bdun bdun byin par 
[\[133b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag zos pa tsam gyis [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bor zug 
[\[133b.4\]]tu bsnyad par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_tshe yang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu mi ma yin pa rgyu ba 'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_
[\[133b.5\]]grul bum la sogs pa dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_gdon dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs dang ldan pa dang /_gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang /_dran pa dang 
[\[133b.6\]]ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i drang srong tshim par byed 'dod pa des ni mchod yon dang /_dbul bar bya ba dang /_snod bkang ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'bab chu ga la yod pa'i gnas der sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar byas nas bram ze'i drang srong gang gA'i 
[\[133b.7\]]klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i bye ma snyed dag lha'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba rnams kyis tshim par byas par 'gyur ro/_/bram ze'i drang srong de dag kyang dbang po tshim par 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis oM bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]par byed la/_sems can de dag kyang bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_bram ze'i gzi brjid dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag gi 
[\[134a.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu dgra thams cad shig par 'gyur ro/_/me tog gam/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_zas dang /_skom gyi yo byad la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la/_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dbul bar bya'o/_/
[\[134a.3\]]de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[134a.4\]]pa'i mchod pa'i mchog gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/bla mar byas/_ri mor byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs shing lung bstan pa dang /_lha thams cad kyis kun du bsrung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo song la ngo lon 
[\[134a.5\]]yang gyis shig_/sems can thams cad la yang yang dag par ston cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyang gyis shig ces nga smra'o/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga rdzogs so//_//
[\[134a.6\]{D648}]@#/_/bod skad du/_'jur 'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ser sna las cher lhag pa/_gzhan gyi la 'jur 'gegs byas pa'i nyes pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta ste/_'phags pa shwa ri'i bu dang /_
[\[134a.7\]]'phags pa maud gal gyi bu gnyis bas mtha' cig na/_so sor rtog pa'i shes rab yid la byed cing yod pa las/_nyi ma'i gung la gnyis pos khams seng du mchis pa'i sa na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo lus sngo la skam pa/_khog khog zer ba/_skra 'dzings pa/_mig dmar 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]la g.yon du yo ba/_ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/_ske dang rkang lag shin tu phra la rid ba/_lag pa khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sen mo sngo zang nge yod pa/_kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa ni 'di lta ste/_dgos na zhes bya ba dang /_med na 
[\[134b.2\]]zhes bya ba dang /_ma sbyin cig zhes bya ba dang /_ster na yang mche ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de tsam ches kyis phril byin zhes bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/_skyi zing byed pa cig dang phrad pa las/_der gang zag gnyis po des bsams pa/_dgon pa bas grong yul 
[\[134b.3\]]thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang /_mngar gsum dang /_'bras dang nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang /_btung ba mang du rnyed nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi drung du khyer te phyin nas bstabs pas mi len par gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga 
[\[134b.4\]]sgrogs shing bros so/_/der gang zag gnyis po des shin tu ma dga' nas/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i sems su song nas gzhan yid la ma dran te/_bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa can du de ma thag phyin te/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal bas 'khangs nas thang 
[\[134b.5\]]chad de dri ba ma spobs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed ci nyes/_dri ba yod na dbugs phyung la dris shig_/ces gsungs so/_bcom ldan 'das lags bdag cag ni shin tu ma dga' ste/_nyid la khong yus che nas 'khams pa 
[\[134b.6\]]lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ci las gyur/_smras pa/_bdag cag gnyis ni bas mtha' zhig na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas gsungs pa so sor rtog pa yid la byed pa las rgyang ring por 'chag tu phyin pa las [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo lus po sngo la skam pa/_khog khog zer ba/_
[\[134b.7\]]skra 'dzings pa/_mig dmar la g.yon du yo ba/_ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba/_ske dang rkang lag shin tu phra la rid pa/_lag pas khu tshur bsdams pa'i sen mos thad kar phug nas sngo zang nge ba/_kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa 'di lta ste/_dgos na zhes bya 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]ba dang /_med na zhes bya ba dang /_ma byin cig ces bya ba dang /_ster na yang mche ches par 'ong ngo zhes bya ba dang /_de tsam ches kyis phril byin zhes bya ba dang lnga brjod pa/_skyi zing byed pa cig dang phrad nas/_bdag cag gnyis kyis bsams pas dgon pa bas 
[\[135a.2\]]grong yul thag nye la zas mod pas grong khyer du phyin te bslangs pas dkar gsum dang /_mngar gsum dang /_'bras dang /_nas kyi zan la sogs pa bza' ba dang btung ba mang du rnyed nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de'i drung du khyer nas bstabs pas/_kha nas gong gi sgra rnam pa lnga brjod cing 
[\[135a.3\]]gang byin pa mi len par bros te thal na 'di ci las gyur pa dang /_'di la sman pa'i thabs ci mchis zhu ru mchis pa lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de ni shin tu legs so/_/ngas bshad kyis legs par nyon la yid la zung shig_/de ci las gyur na lus 
[\[135a.4\]]sngo la skams pa ni rang gis za ma phod pa las gyur pa'o/_/ske phra ba ni gzhan za zhing spyod pa la bdag gis ser sna byas pa las gyur to/_/yan lag phra la sor mos thad kar phug pa ni gzhan la sbyin pa dag la ches kyis phri la byin ces byas pa dang /_rang gis kyang spyod mi 
[\[135a.5\]]phod pa las gyur to/_/skra 'dzings pa ni kun gyi yid du mi 'ong ba byas pa las gyur to/_/mig dmar ba ni 'dod chags kyis yongs su rgyas pa las gyur to/_/g.yon du yo ba ni mig mi legs par gzhan la bltas pa las gyur to/_/ma mchu ring la g.yas su yo ba 
[\[135a.6\]]ni ster na yang ches par 'ong ngo zhes byas pa las gyur to/_/kha nas sgra rnam pa lnga sgrogs pa ni byed pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ste/_sngon brjod pa'i bag chags brtas pa las gyur to/_/de lta bu'i las kyi dbang gis gzhan ci byin yang phan par mi 'gyur te/_chu gcig pu 
[\[135a.7\]]las rang gis sbyin nus pa ma yin te/_gzhan gyi chu la 'jur 'gegs ma byas pas da lta yang chu gtsang ma rtsam pas ma reg pa la sngags lan cig btab ste/_se gol lan cig gtogs te byin na de'i rgyud grol zhing 'dod pa tshim par 'gyur ro/_/de 'di lta ste/_oM dz+wa la mi daM sarba 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]pre ta b+h+yaHswA hA/_gsol pa/_de'i 'bru don bshad du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_oM ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin te don dam pa'o/_/dz+wa la 'dod pa me ltar 'bar ba'o/_/mi daM ni mi'i rgyud kyis ser sna dang 'jur 'gegs byas pa'o/_/sarba ni de lta bu'i las las gyur pa thams 
[\[135b.2\]]cad do/_/pre ta ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi snying po ste/_las kyi rgyud smin pa'i don to/_/b+h+yaHni las dang sdug bsngal byang bar bya ba'i don to/_/swA hA ni las dang sdug bsngal bkres skom byang bar gyur cig pa'o/_/da myur du song la de ltar gsos cig ces gsungs pas/_de nas 
[\[135b.3\]]de gnyis kyis myur du phyin nas de bzhin du bgyis pas gzod dga' nas longs spyod cing lus bag rlan no/_/de nas chos ston la bab nas gnyis po re mos byas te/_shA ri'i bus bshos gsol nas/_gcig gsol du stsal te/_chab byin pas yang gong bzhin brjod de bros so/_/
[\[135b.4\]]yang gnyis kyis yid ma ches nas bcom ldan 'das la zhur mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das lags/_bdag cag gis gsungs pa bzhin bgyis lags pas/_gso ru gtub par gda' ba la chos ston yol du dogs nas 'tshal nas yang sngar bzhin brjod cing bros nas yang zhu ru mchis 
[\[135b.5\]]so/_/bka' stsal pa/_de ni khyod kyi san bar du rtsam pa las pas lan pa yin gyis/_lag pa khrus la gzod byin cig_/de'i drung du 'gro mi dgos te 'di nyid kyis btub po zhes gsungs so/_/de gnyis kyis khrus bgyis te/_chu sbyin stsal bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo de nyid du 'ongs 
[\[135b.6\]]nas cung zad na mdangs dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta bu'i chu sbyin 'di ni 'dir ma zad de dus thams cad du yang yi dam du gyis la thong shig_/gzhan la yang rgya cher spel cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di'i phan yon ni dpag tu med de 
[\[135b.7\]]tshad las 'das so/_/mdo tsam brjod na 'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi phyug po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas dbul po 'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye ste/_de ci ste zhe na/_phyug po rnams ni nga rgyal te dregs pa dang rgyags pas gnas ngan 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]len spro bar byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbul po rnams la sbyin pa byas pa bas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'ga' zhig la sbyin pa byas na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/_/de ci ste zhe na/_dbul po rnams la ni 'bad du yod/_btsal du yod/_bslang du yod do/_/yi 
[\[136a.2\]]dgas las kyis de lta bu dag ma yin gyi/_ma bsngos na kha ru chud kyang dug chen por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]la sbyin pa byin pa bas 'jur 'gegs kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gcig la chu byin na de'i bsod nams brgya'i char yang mi nye'o/_/de ci ste zhe na/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]de dag 
[\[136a.3\]]la ni dmigs pas tshim pa dang /_bshams pas tshim pa dang /_bsngos pas tshim pa dang /_reg pas tshim pa dang /_rjes kyis tshim pa dang /_bshal bas tshim pa yang yod de/_las kyi rim pa bzhin no/_/'jur 'gegs ni gzhan bkag pa'i las kyis sngags dang /_
[\[136a.4\]]phyag rgya dang /_dmigs pa gzhan gyis mi thob/_rdzas thams cad la 'thams te bkag pas rdzas gzhan mi myong /_gzhan gyi chu gcig pu ma bkag pas/_chu gtsang rtsam pas ma reg pa las dbang med/_rang gi rgyud zhi bar byed pa'i sngags dang /_phyag rgya se gol gcig min 
[\[136a.5\]]pa gzhan gang gis kyang thub par mi nus so/_/se gol gcig tu bzhag pa ci zhe na/_gnyis su gyur na gzhan gyi sgrar gyur nas mi thob des na rang gi go ba bskyed pa sgra gcig tu nges pa'o/_/'dis ni bar chad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /_nad nyung ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_longs spyod dang 
[\[136a.6\]]ldan pa dang /_yi ga 'chus pa rnams 'byed par byed pa dang /_mdangs nyams pa rnams gsal bar byed pa dang /_'di gzhan la spel na rgyud grol nas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyud chad de mthar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rigs kyi bu de dag gis 
[\[136a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'jur 'gegs zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa//[ {D649}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]oM dz+nyA nA ba lo ki te sa man+ta s+pha ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza la ni hUM/_'bab chu'am/_mtsho'i 'gram du 'dug ste/_lag pa g.yas pa'i khyor bar chu blugs la/_ye shes skar mda'i snying po 'di lan bdun bzlas te/_chu khyor ba bdun 'bab chu'am/_
[\[136b.2\]]chur gtor na sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lha'i kha zas kyi ro dang /_btung ba'i ro mchog dang ldan pa 'thob cing [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]re re la yang kha zas dang /_btung ba yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bdun bdun gyis tshim par byas par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[136b.3\]]chu de 'thungs pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas las thar cing /_bde 'gro mtho ris kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u'am/_bu mo'am/_gzhan yang byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sam/_bya'am/_
[\[136b.4\]]chu na gnas pa la sogs pa gang gis chu de 'thungs pa de dag thams cad sdig pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/ye shes skar mda'i snying po rdzogs so//_//[{D650}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[136b.5\]]bod skad du/_shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_na mo rat+na tra yA la/_na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM bi ba bi ba/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/_dza ra dza ra/_me d+hA bar+d+ha ni/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_rig 
[\[136b.6\]]sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_lo ts+tsha ba ban+de 
[\[136b.7\]]klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D651}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ta d+ya thA/_smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/_te dza bid+yA/_hu ru me hu ru hu ru me kr-iSh+Na ha ru me swA hA/_shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/thos 
[\[137a.2\]]pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D652}]@#/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[137a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa brgyad las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs thams cad du yang gnod sbyin de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar 
[\[137a.4\]]byed la de la nad thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do/_/s+yAd+ya the daM/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_dza yot+ta ra/_bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/_saM bo d+ha ni/_ma hA saM bo d+ha ni/_a d+hi sam+bo d+ha ni/_ha la ha la ha la/_hi li hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu hu lu/_sarba bud+d+ha/_d+harmA ba bo d+hi ni/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_sarba pA pa ni/_
[\[137a.5\]]bud+d+ha/_ad+hiSh+ThA ni na swA hA/_'phags pa rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D653}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA sa mA dza sU tra na nA ma hA sU tra/_bod skad du/_mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog 
[\[137a.6\]]gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/_dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don 
[\[137a.7\]]rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]mdzad de/_de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas/_dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed do/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi 
[\[137b.2\]]zhig 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/_dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid 
[\[137b.3\]]par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/_de'i tshe na 
[\[137b.4\]]phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la/_bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par 
[\[137b.5\]]bstod par bya ba gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/_brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing /_bcom 
[\[137b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/_tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi/_/lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur pas/_/gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/_/blta ba'i slad du bdag 
[\[137b.7\]]cag mchis/_/tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni/_/'di na dge sbyong rab brtson pa/_/kha lo pa ltar mig blangs shing /_/dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid/_/tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]su bcad de gsol pa/_dbang phur 'od pa 'obs 'dra ba'i/_/phur bu rab bcom bkrir mi tshugs/_/de dag sred bral dag spyod cing /_/'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/_/tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gang dag sangs 
[\[138a.2\]]rgyas skyabs mchi ba/_/de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing /_/mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang /_/lha yi lus ni thob par 'gyur/_/tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid na bag bcum ste 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 
[\[138a.3\]]'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no/_/dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[138a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[138a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/_dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du ba gyur ro/_/dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod 
[\[138a.6\]]par byas/_lha rnams kyi ming dag zung shig_/gang dag sa la gnas pa dang /_/gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/_/seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/_/sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni/_/spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/_/
[\[138a.7\]]gang dag sa la gnas ba dang /_/gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/_/seng ge bzhin du tha dad pa/_/sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing /_/kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes/_/byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya/_/yid byad dag cing rab dang la/_/rnyog med 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]'chi bdag spangs pa rnams/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i/_/lha dang mi yi bar na 'khod/_/slob ma lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang /_/gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang /_/stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi/_/lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag_/mtha' nas 
[\[138b.2\]]mtha' ma mi mthong zhing /_/phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/_/de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/_/nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag_/lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur 
[\[138b.3\]]kyis/_/nges par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/_/tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis/_/de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyi/_/rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/_/nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyi/_/gnod sbyin stong 
[\[138b.4\]]phrag bdun po dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la 
[\[138b.5\]]phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gser can stong phrag drug po kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par 
[\[138b.6\]]lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni/_/ri mnyam stong phrag gsum po dag_/ser skya'i gnas 
[\[138b.7\]]kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]du mngon par zhugs/_/de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul 
[\[139a.2\]]ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/_/yangs pa la ni rtag gnas shing /_/brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi/_/gnod 
[\[139a.3\]]sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/
[\[139a.4\]]kun gyi bshes gnyen lda brgya dang /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i 
[\[139a.5\]]tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus 
[\[139a.6\]]pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/
[\[139a.7\]]dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub par/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lho phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grub bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang 
[\[139b.2\]]dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni 
[\[139b.3\]]bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od 
[\[139b.4\]]dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang 
[\[139b.5\]]zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus 
[\[139b.6\]]pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams 
[\[139b.7\]]dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/_/rgyal chen grags 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/
[\[140a.2\]]kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/de la bu ni mang yod de/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min 
[\[140a.3\]]g.yul 'gyed par/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/dge dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i 
[\[140a.4\]]tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs 
[\[140a.5\]]po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par 
[\[140a.6\]]zhugs/_/de dag gi ni khol po rnams/_/mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa/_/slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can/_/sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang /_/ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/_/de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag 
[\[140a.7\]]kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gnod sbyin dang /_gnod sbyin chen po dang /_/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang /_dmag 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te/_/'di lta ste/_dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/dbang ldan tsan+da na 'dod gtso dang /_/mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang /_/stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang /_/sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang /_/ri mnyam gser can 
[\[140b.2\]]gang po dang /_/seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba'i khyu mchog mi rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang /_/tshigs lnga ser po yid dga' dang /_/gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/_/
[\[140b.3\]]'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/_/'gro gnas ji snyed yod pa yin/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal 
[\[140b.4\]]zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mgon par zhugs/_/lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni/_/'jog po dang ni yangs pa'ang 'ongs/_/la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag_/srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags/_/klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni/_/yul 'khor srung dang glang po che/_/
[\[140b.5\]]'jigs byed che dang sa srung bu/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus 
[\[140b.6\]]ba'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/gang zhig klu rgyal zim mnan len/_/stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya/_/de ming 'dab bzang khra bo yang /_/mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs/_/de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin/_/ston pas 'das bzang bde mdzad cing /_/
[\[140b.7\]]gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing /_/rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams/_/thams cad nor lhas sbag gyur cing /_/mtsho la skyabs su 'du shes pa/_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris dang rab bkra dang /_/rab sim byed dang btang bzung 
[\[141a.2\]]dang /_/stobs ldan bu ni brgyad po kun/_/rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang /_/stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang /_/dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags shes/_/dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/_/go cha bgos te lhags pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/
[\[141a.3\]]de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/chu lha mo dang bu mo dang /_/zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs/_/mdza' bshes 
[\[141a.4\]]ma dang chu lha can/_/lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs/_/sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang /_/me yi lha mo'ang 'ongs gyur te/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan bdag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/
[\[141a.5\]]gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can lha/_/
[\[141a.6\]]mtshem gnyis kyang lhags par gyur/_/zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar/_/nyi la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/_/nyi ma nyid kyang mdun bdar cing /_/char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag_/rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lags/_/thams 
[\[141a.7\]]cad bzang po rdo rje can/_/brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni/_/me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can/_/zhi ba mo dang dka' zlog 
[\[141b.2\]]ma/_/me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing /_/rgyu ba mo dang mtshan mchings bzang /_/'chi med rnam pa du ma dang /_/gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa/_/'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser 
[\[141b.3\]]skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dag/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing drag ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i 
[\[141b.4\]]tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang /_/mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang /_/rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du/_/yid rab 'khrug ma'ang 'ongs gyur cing /_/phag mo phag mo chen mo dang /_/slong ma nges ma lhan cig lhags/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu 
[\[141b.5\]]de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/
[\[141b.6\]]dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang /_/gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing /_/skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang /_/gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur/_/'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang /_/spel 
[\[141b.7\]]ma rnam pa du mdar/_/dag pa dang ni 'od can ma/_/lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags//rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang /_/nag 
[\[142a.2\]]po btab pa du ma dang /_/lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog_/skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang /_/'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du/_/dbang sgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur/_/bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags 
[\[142a.3\]]tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par 
[\[142a.4\]]zhugs/_/lha tshogs drug cu de dag kun/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag_/ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/_/snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang /_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan 
[\[142a.5\]]zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/_/tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba/_/kun 'ged gzhon nu skar rgyal de/_/so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan 
[\[142a.6\]]pa de dag dang /_/lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal 
[\[142a.7\]]du mngon par zhugs/_/dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo/_/kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang /_/bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/_/gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'od dang ldan/_/kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/_/dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/_/dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas/_/skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas pa yi/_/lha rnams de dag der lhags shing /_/dge slong 
[\[142b.2\]]rnams kyang der lhags so/_/nag pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/_/'dod chags kyis ni 'di bzung la/_/bcing bgyis dang khyod la legs/_/'di dag kun nas yongs bsdus la/_/'di dag gson por ma btang zhes/_/de na nag po sde bo che/_/sde rnams la ni skul byed 
[\[142b.3\]]cing /_/khros shing rang dbang ched gyur nas/_/rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te/_/lag pas la brdabs nas ni/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra phyung ste/_/de nas lha yis sprin phreng dang /_/glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/_/de bzhin 
[\[142b.4\]]gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/_/de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/_/nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag_/bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis/_/mngon par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/_/brtson par byed pa de dag gis/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni/_/de dag 
[\[142b.5\]]spu yang mi g.yo bas/_/de dag chags bral yin par rtogs/_/rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni/_/slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/_/de dag g.yul las rnam rgyal zhing /_/'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/_/bar gyi sdom ni/_bdun stong gser can ri mnyam 
[\[142b.6\]]dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin chu srin dang /_/kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams/_/de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang /_/klu dang 'dab bzang lha min dang /_/chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang /_/tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang /_/dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang /_/kun 'ged 
[\[142b.7\]]gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang /_/dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo /_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]tshig 'di dag gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_te dze te dza ba ti/_tsi tre tsi tra ba ti/_la te la ta ba ti/_kha me kha ma ba ti/_k+She me k+Sha ma pa ti/_
[\[143a.2\]]b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/_ya she ya sha ba ti/_dU te dU ta ba ti/_tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/_kha tse kha tsa ba ti/_bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[143a.3\]]dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na/_de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/gang du 
[\[143a.4\]]klog pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing de dag la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/_/ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyis dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur/_dgung ser 'beb par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur 
[\[143a.5\]]lags so/_/bro nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/_chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te stsal na/_des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma pa dag ma gtogs pa 
[\[143a.6\]]gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang 'di dag lags la/_gsang sngags kyi tshig zhib mo yang 'di dag lags so/_/'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_b+ha le b+ha la ma le/_dur du le/_hi me/_phub pi se/_
[\[143a.7\]]kA tsAk+Shi ku tse si/_ma mI Ni She re tho ra NI/_bam pi bam po Ti ste ke/_ta ra ke/_gu ru ga ro Te/_gug gu mi ti/_tA re rak+Sha/_sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/_'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/_gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]ma gyur par 'dzin tam/_klog par bgyid na de la mi dang /_mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing gdug pa yang mi mchi/_sbrul yang mi mchi/_dug kyang mi mchi la/_de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po thams cad kyang 
[\[143b.2\]]dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/_/gang klog par bgyid pa dang /_gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/chab la bzlas 
[\[143b.3\]]brjod bgyis te gtor tam/_'tshal du stsal na de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/_mdo sde 'di yongs su 
[\[143b.4\]]gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_lin+te li pe/_lo pe/_ba pe/_pad ke/_ka me/_kA tse kA tse k+Shi/_kA tsa pi ga le/_du me du me/_ta Te tra Te/_ta da tra/_Te tra TA k+Shi/_go lA/_ko li/_ki ka ko li ke sA d+hA/_sU tra ma nu pA la ya thA/_ud gr-ih+Na ya tse ti/_bcom ldan 
[\[143b.5\]]'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /_mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur ba dang /_mnyams par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[143b.6\]]lags so/_/ji tsam 'tshal bar de tsam gyi dgung char 'beb par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur/_dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/_'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/_/'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/dug 
[\[143b.7\]]'byin par yang 'gyur lags so/_/chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/_gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyis la/_'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_bI re bI re ba 
[\[144a.2\]]ti/_to Te to Ta ba ti/_b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/_go ne go na ba ti/_me g+he me g+ha ba ti/_dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/_b+hu ti b+hu ta ba ti/_kho ra te kho ra ta pa ti/_i dan sU tra ma nu gr-ih+Na Tha/_a nu pA la ya tha tse ti/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma 
[\[144a.3\]]gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so/_/sems 
[\[144a.4\]]can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/_/de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de yi lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/_/sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par yang 'gyur lags so/_/gang du klog 
[\[144a.5\]]par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so/_/bro nad thams cad sel bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/skud pa'am chab la bzlas brjod 
[\[144a.6\]]bgyis te bcings sam gtor na bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par 
[\[144a.7\]]bgyid pa lags so/_/rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/_tad+ya thA/_ku re ku ra NI/_mo re mo ra NI/_kA tse kA tsa nI/_kri mi kri mi NI/_yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/_pu re po re/_pu ra tI/_ho re ho ra NI/_pra ho re pra ho ra NI/_'phags skyes pos gsol pa/_ke she ke she 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa ti/_ke sha na/_mi ke sha/_The ti The ni ma ri ti/_mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/_tsakre tsakri NI/_tsakra ba gi Ni/_b+hi ti ri rmi ni/_shi mi shi mi/_shA ma ne ti/_bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang /_mdo sde 
[\[144b.2\]]'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang /_ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na/_de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/_/de la 'byung po thams cad dang /_bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/_/gdug pas zin pa 
[\[144b.3\]]dang /_dug thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so/_/skud pa'am/_chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/_bcings sam/_gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na/_cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin dang /_rlung lhas 
[\[144b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_ga le/_ga ga ga le/_ga le ga ni/_khi ni khi ni/_g+hu She g+hu She g+hu g+hu Sh+ya/_kha na kha kha ne/_kha na kha ni/_lu pe lu pi/_lu pa lu pi ti/_bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 
[\[144b.5\]]'di dag dang /_mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing /_ma bkol bar bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung bar 'gyur lags so/_/de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/_/lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[144b.6\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su gzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi 
[\[144b.7\]]tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing /_kun tu gzung ba dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/_de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/_nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang /_bsrung ba dang /_bsgrub pa dag bshad par bya ste/_de nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/_/gnas 
[\[145a.2\]]gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/_bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo sde chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang /_bsgrub pa dag bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[145a.3\]]bsrung ba dang /_bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/_de la rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/ta la ta la/_tan ta la/_ta to ta le me te/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/sa le sa sa li ti/_phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/la te 
[\[145a.4\]]la te lo la te/_dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/d+hu pu d+hu pu/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ka tsi bi ka tsi/_ka tsa bi ka tse ti/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/_/d+ha me d+ha me/_d+ha me d+ha me/_d+ha se d+ha se/_d+ha re d+ha re/_d+ha ro d+hi d+hi ti/_de la srung ba ni 'di yin no/_/ti na ti ri 
[\[145a.5\]]tsa ri Sha/_ping+ga la k+Shi rak+Sha/_mtshams bcad pa ni 'di yin no/_/bad+d+ha bad+d+ho ti/_bad+d+ha si ri mi ti/_bad+d+ha ku She bad+d+ha/_g+hu g+hu She bad+d+ha g+hu She g+hu She ya ma ba d+ha b+hi/_sgrub pa ni 'di yin no/_/pe She sA d+ha ya/_tu tu li sA d+ha ye ti/_zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas tshes bco lnga'i nyin par gsang sngags kyi tshig 
[\[145a.6\]]'di dag dang /_mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/_kha shar phyogs su bltas la srung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing /_bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la/_mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing /_lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 
[\[145a.7\]]'gyur te/_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams gcad par byas te/_lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/_
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro/_/lho phyogs nas ce spyang mos lan bsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na/_/de nas mtshams bcad par shes par bya'o/_/des de bzhin du smyur ba byas te/_tshes bco lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la/_bcom ldan 
[\[145b.2\]]'das la mchod pa byas te/_skud pa blangs la/_nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi cho gzhi mos lan bdun bzlas te/_bzlas brjod lan rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/_skud pa lag tu blangs te/_rig sngags thams cad lan cig 
[\[145b.3\]]bzlas brjod byas shing sgrub pa byas na char pa chen po dang /_rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/_mtshams kyi phyi rol du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la/_skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te/_lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lha'i bu sprin chen zhes bya ba dang /_sprin bzang 
[\[145b.4\]]zhes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/_de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing grub pa sbyin pa dang /_rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/_sprin ni ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o/_/sprin bzang [(]kyi [,]gi [)]ni 'di yin te/_ka ra ka ra kA ra ra zhes bya'o/_tshig 'di dag dang 
[\[145b.5\]]skud pa lag tu blangs pas mdo sde dang /_gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang /_rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu'am skud pa la bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur ba de med de las thams 
[\[145b.6\]]cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang /_gzhan dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'byung po gang 
[\[145b.7\]]dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing /_/sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams/_/skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byas cing /_/nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig_/mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D654}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya d+harma sA ga ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho 
[\[146a.2\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bA rA Na sI na drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 
[\[146a.3\]]bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag ngas ni chos zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/_rtogs par dka' ba/_cha 
[\[146a.4\]]phra ba/_brtags pa/_mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogs so/_/ngas ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/
[\[146a.5\]]ngas thogs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o/_/dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtsho'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_blo gros kyi blo dang ldan 
[\[146a.6\]]pa/_rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_brtan pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/_gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/_spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/_mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/_gang dag de shes pa dang /_gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni 
[\[146a.7\]]myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thos pa 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang ldan bar 'gyur ba dang /_brjed ngas pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba ste/_chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[146b.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bzhag go/_/da ltar nga yang 'jog go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos thams cad kyi sdoms kyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan par bya ste/_des na khyod kyis ma 
[\[146b.3\]]thos pa'i chos rnams thos par 'gyur ro/_/thos pa'i chos rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gzung ba'i chos rnams ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro/_/nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do/_/tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/_'du byed kyi tshig gi 
[\[146b.4\]]rab tu dbye ba dang /_de bzhin du ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_bla na med pa'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_sa nas sa brtags pa'i yi ge'i tshig gi rab tu dbye ba dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang brda sna tshogs kyi tshig gi rab tu dbye ba'o/_/de la 'di dag ni gzi byin 
[\[146b.5\]]rten par byed pa'i tshig rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags pa thams cad kyis gang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang /_sman rnams sbyin par 
[\[146b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba gzhan dag la mi gnod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za rnams kyis mnos pa/_bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/_kun dga' bo gsang 
[\[146b.7\]]sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig_/khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/_s+yAd ya the da na/_karma ke ta ma nuts+tshe/_ra te ru ta gran dra ma/_thu ma na/_nai la ta/_a saM ku la s+thA/_bu mi a nu sma ri/_i shaM ga ma i sha s+thA/_kle na a nu ga te/_yA mu la gum b+he/_pa b+he ma gur ba ya ba/_
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]a s+ya bAkya s+ya bi laM ga/_be la ma tha/_shrI ba ba rI pany+tsa ka/_pra sa te/_a ba be la/_a gra be la/_ni shi khu u tse dzu me/_u dze dzu me/_kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbab pa grub pa dang /_gnod sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[147a.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba la bsnyen bkur yang byed byed/_rim gro yang byed byed pa rnams 'ching ba ste/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis gnod sbyin dbab pa grub pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shig_/kun dga' bo gang la la 
[\[147a.3\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon med pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par byed pa de la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so/_/kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang 
[\[147a.4\]]bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin srid pa snang byed ces bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni gnod sbyin cher spyod ces bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na ni gnod sbyin rnam 
[\[147a.5\]]grags zhes bya ba gnas so/_/kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling na ni gnod sbyin grags thob ces bya ba gnas te/_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gzhan gzi brjid za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[147a.6\]]dad pa thob par gyur nas kyang dad pa mi phyed par thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do/_/kun dga' bo de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog gi tshig gi mchog srog chags 'byung 
[\[147a.7\]]po thams cad la rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/kun dga' bo de la nga'i phyir na 'brang ba'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa de dag gis kyang bar chad byed mi nus so/_/s+yad ya the dan/_dan d+ha ra ma hA ha ra ha ra ma ba ra na/_rud dra tra/_ku ma ti dri tra/_in+d+ra 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]man tu ke/_a ba te/_sa ha rA/_sa d+hu ma ti/_i la la ba ma ti/_a ba ti/_ta ra pa ra/_yi biSh+Ta/_sa da biSh+Ta/_a ba tiSh+Tha/_pa ri brta/_i sha brda/_sa da brta/_kra ma kra ma ti ran/_a si ba tsa ma la bi na ha thi/_Tha sha su re/_d+hu ra d+hu ra/_uk+g+ra muk+g+ra/_uk+g+ra pa ti/_bi sa ra gra ma ti/_
[\[147b.2\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_srul po dang /_klu dang /_dri za dang /_sha za gnas pa gang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang /_lam du zhugs pa rnams 
[\[147b.3\]]kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig_/phyis 'gyod ta re/_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[147b.4\]]grub pa 'di dag ni/_/gling bzhi dag na gtso zhes bya/_/gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba/_/de yi dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi/_/gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni/_/chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag_/nyams par 
[\[147b.5\]]gyur pa de la ston/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po yang /_/mthar gyis su ni song nas kyang /_/zab cing don dang ldan pa yi/_/tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya/_/'di dag chos kun rtsa ba ste/_/de dag mkhas rnams nyan par gyis/_/drag po dag gis thos na 
[\[147b.6\]]yang /_/phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba ste/_/gang la bde dang sdug bsngal med/_/de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/sa 'di chags pa med pa ste/_/sangs rgyas sa ni bsam mi khyab/_/chags pa med par bstan pa yi/_/bsam yas sa de thob gyur nas/_/nyi ma sprin 
[\[147b.7\]]las byung ba ltar/_/de nas sa steng de bzhin snang /_/'di la skye mched phung po rnams/_/dben dang byang chub yan lag dbang /_/dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams/_/sangs rgyas gsungs pa ci yang yod/_/de yi thos pa'i tshogs rnams gang /_/nams kyang chud 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]zar mi 'gyur te/_/ma thos chos rnams de dag thos/_/nyes dang nyes min rnams la mkhas/_/rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog_/mig bzad rnams kyang dag par 'gyur/_/'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa/_/de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bsngags/_/
