[\[148a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/_/the tshom mi mnga' bden pa gang /_/bden des bdag la lung mnos pa/_/ci yod thams cad gnas gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la/_/byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des/_/rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la/_/
[\[148a.3\]]ston pa rab tu gnas gyur cig_/gling bzhi'i gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag_/ma dad pa dang dad pa bstan/_/gang la rtog pa mi snang ba/_/de la de kun don ston 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin skar gdong gang yin dang /_/glang chen sna dang khyad par stobs/_/drag po dga' byed gsod byed 
[\[148a.4\]]dang /_/zla ba mgo med lug gsod pa/_/dpa' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang /_/srin po dang ni sa 'dzin pa/_/ljang gu kha dang rna bzang dang /_/ral gri'i sdu can bong bu rnams/_/thams cad grub par byed par shog_/gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin la/_/gnod sbyin 
[\[148a.5\]]srin po de dag ni/_/spro bar gyur nas 'dzud par byed/_/rtag tu de ni spobs pa dang /_/tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang /_/nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang /_/yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur/_/lung mnos pa yang chud mi za/_/rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phel bar 
[\[148a.6\]]'gyur/_/rtag tu don dang yi ge la/_/de yi shes pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang /_/mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa yang /_/de yi legs bshad nyan pa rnams/_/de yi mod la dran par byed/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_hu ku na/_mu ku na/_ha ra Na/_
[\[148a.7\]]bi ha ra Na/_i sha saM kra ma Na/_oM su mu kha/_ta ka Na/_a ga Na a pri ya/_u s+thA me/_ko ba ha re/_u ru pa/_pra ba Na tan/_saM pra me ba ha dza ga re/_pra shi ga re/_gu D+ha ba ne/_ut+ta na/_bi gu Na/_i sha ku na/_a tu la tu la/_aM Ti ba Ti/_ba ri tsa mo sha/_ha ra dza ga ta/_e ba 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]saM pra mu khe/_a ga ba re/_Tha hu sa hu/_i ti ya/_thA hu/_tsa tur dwI pi ka yan/_Tha hu ma hu/_uk+g+ra hu/_d+hA ra sa hu/_saM gra ha/_a bi na gra ha/_a bi na gra ha/_pradz+nyA br-id d+ha ye/_Tha hu sa hu/_ka ra ku ru/_d+ha sa hu/_de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_/gsang sngags kyi ni tshig 'di dag_/gang gis 
[\[148b.2\]]lag dang lus la yod/_/de ni thos la rmongs pa med/_/de ni shes rab med mi 'gyur/_/skar mda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin/_/zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin/_/de ltar thos dang don gyis kyang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bar la reg_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags 
[\[148b.3\]]'di dag bka' stsal to/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_tsa ra d+he bi tsa ra d+he/_a maM ku te/_a ti mi ti/_pa ra ha re/_g+ha Na b+he/_hi bar me/_ma hA pra ti bA hA ne/_dza ya dza ya/_a nu ke/_pa la pa le/_uk+g+ra ba ti/_swa ra swa ra/_a bi sa re/_gu gun de/_pra bi bar+d+he/_sa me/_a dzi te dza ye/_nu pa le su/_
[\[148b.4\]]khom su san d+hi ni ku ma no/_/sak+She/_tsA pi tsA pe/_tsu pe/_tsu lu tsu lu/_pu lu pu lu/_bya ba pra sa re/_ka ra ka b+hin d+he/_bi dzA bi dze/_a pra ti san d+hi/_nA nA nu ma ti/_pra na nu ma ti/_a ri da si/_dzeSh+Tha nu pa ni de/_a saM gra a ba ti/_rig sngags bsdus pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lus 
[\[148b.5\]]la thogs te 'chang na/_gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing /_dbang du ma gyur pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/_/don thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[148b.6\]]pas gnang ba bzhin du 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/_med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/_dgon par 'dug la gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod de/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du dran par bya'o/_/de nas zhag 
[\[148b.7\]]bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing 
[\[149a.2\]]zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//[{D655}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya big+h+na bi nA ya kA ra tA d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i gzungs/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod 
[\[149a.3\]]pa'i dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur 
[\[149a.4\]]ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_na mo stu te/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_da ra da ra/_Da ha Da ha/_grih+Na/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_na mo stu te/_ru ru tsa tsa ye swA hA/_a b+hu trA/_bi na duHkhan man tsed+d+ha pa ra sa ma gats+tsha ti/_ha ha ya/_ma hA ha stik+Sha ta na na/_pra go ba 
[\[149a.5\]]ye mo/_/ku ru ku ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_na mo na maHswA hA/_nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas la/_chu khyor ba gang steng dang /_'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la 
[\[149a.6\]]mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig por te/_lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/_/gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan cig bklags na yang bgegs rnams par chad mi byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad 
[\[149a.7\]]ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]gu gul ser po dang /_pha bang gi rtug pa kun la rku ba'i rtag pa sbyar ba'i du bas gdugs na/_'go ba'i nad pa'i gan du phyin yang mi tshugs/_gos pa la thug na myur du sel/_khyim du 'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so//_//
[\[149b.2\]{D656}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_A TA nA TI ya ma sU traM nA ma ma hA sU tra/_bod skad du/_mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan 
[\[149b.3\]]yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag tu 
[\[149b.4\]]ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus 
[\[149b.5\]]rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/lha rnams kyis 
[\[149b.6\]]ni de ma 'tshal/_/dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /_/da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/_/thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchis/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong 
[\[149b.7\]]dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang /_nags 'dab dag dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/_de la gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/_gnod sbyin 
[\[150a.2\]]dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_
[\[150a.3\]]dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar 
[\[150a.4\]]zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing /_kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[150a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar ri gnas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 
[\[150a.6\]]'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/_/skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing /_/phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/_/gang dag sangs rgyas 
[\[150a.7\]]skyabs mchis pas/_/mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/_/gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/_/des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po'i dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang 'char 'gyur ba yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang 
[\[150b.2\]]ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang 
[\[150b.3\]]shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad 
[\[150b.4\]]bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs 
[\[150b.5\]]de mngon bar skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zhes bgyi ba/_/rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/_/srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/_/'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal 
[\[150b.6\]]chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/grub bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu 
[\[150b.7\]]ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal 
[\[151a.2\]]pa/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba 
[\[151a.3\]]lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang zhig nub pa kho na las/_/des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/_/de na mtsho 
[\[151a.4\]]chen zab mo ni/_/shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/_/de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/_/skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/_/
[\[151a.5\]]de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs 
[\[151a.6\]]po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag 
[\[151a.7\]]bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]khyod la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid cing /_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na byang gi 
[\[151b.2\]]sgra mi snyan/_/dga' zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang /_/gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/_/brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/_/gshol yang 'cha' par mi bgyid cing /_/tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang /_/nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing /_/
[\[151b.3\]]zas su sA lu kha dog dang /_/dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang /_/dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing /_/lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/_/na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/_/tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/_/gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/_/sman dga' khrung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[151b.4\]]yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/gnod 
[\[151b.5\]]sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams 
[\[151b.6\]]kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su 
[\[151b.7\]]gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshal cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]te ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi 
[\[152a.2\]]bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/
[\[152a.3\]]de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing /_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/_/de dag ni chi bas rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs 
[\[152a.4\]]phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon 
[\[152a.5\]]nu dang /_gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag ni grong 
[\[152a.6\]]khyed dag_/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/_/'di lta ste/_kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang /_sbubs can dang grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/_/byang phyogs na 
[\[152a.7\]]mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/_/nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang /_gos can dang /_gos mchog can dang /_pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma bzang po can dang /_sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchi lags so/_/chab rgyun mang po'i 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]gnas gyur pa/_/'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/_/chab rgyun tha dad de las byung /_/de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/_/btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/_lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang /_/de bas gnas yang rgyun lugs can/_/
[\[152b.2\]]rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang /_/bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/_/btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/_der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/_/rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang /_/'jigs 
[\[152b.3\]]rung lto spu can dag mchis/_/de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang /_/khu byug sgra skad chen po dang /_/shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing /_/rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag kyang /_/gau kum b+ha dang chun lag dang /_/bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing /_/
[\[152b.4\]]me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/_/lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/_/pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/_/btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/_/bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi 
[\[152b.5\]]ste/_/bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li/_i li mi li/_kiT+Ti mU le/_hi li kiT+Ti mU le/_hu du me/_hu du ra du me/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_go do ha ni/_o ke mo ke swA hA/_btsun 
[\[152b.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang /_dri za chen po rnams dang /_dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang /_/glu yi myos pa spun dang ni/_/phreng bas 
[\[152b.7\]]myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/_/me tog myos pa spun rnams dang /_/rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/_/nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang /_/ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang /_/lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/_/tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang /_/gser spyod bu mo 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gser can dang /_/pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag_/'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/_/de dag bdag gi spun lags te/_/de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/
[\[153a.2\]]bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de yi mgo tshal bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya tha/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_
[\[153a.3\]]kun+tu phe/_e hi e hi/_sa dA mat+ti ke/_sa dA b+haN+Di ni ke/_tiSh+Tha tuSh+Ta/_bad+d+ho si swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa 
[\[153a.4\]]dang mthun pa'i mdo/_/rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_/dri za rgan po'am/_dri za rgan mo'am/_dri za'i bu pho'am/_dri za'i bu 
[\[153a.5\]]mo'am/_dri za'i 'khor pho'am/_dri za'i 'khor mo'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas 
[\[153a.6\]]mi rnyed la/_dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge 
[\[153a.7\]]slong ma'am/_/dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gal te sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_sha za rgan po'am/_sha za rgan mo'am/_sha za'i bu pho'am/_sha za'i bu mo'am/_sha za'i 'khor pho'am/_sha za'i 'khor mo'am/_sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing 
[\[153b.2\]]glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin 
[\[153b.3\]]tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hu me hu me/_hu me le/_hu mi la/_bA tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang /_grul bum chen po rnams dang /_grul bum gyi sde 
[\[153b.4\]]dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/_/rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/_/lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/_/g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang /_/sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang /_/rna ba ring dang 
[\[153b.5\]]'brug sgra sgrogs/_/ral ba can dang stobs bcu dang /_/srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/_/'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/_/la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang /_/tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchi ba lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags 
[\[153b.6\]]te/_de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/
[\[153b.7\]]a rdza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya tha/_si re bi si re/_si re bi sa re/_si re bi sa re/_kr-iSh+Na tsha ga le/_ka rA Da/_piM ga le swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 
[\[154a.2\]]'don par bgyid pa de la gal te grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_grul bum rgan po'am/_grul bum rgan mo'am/_grul bum gyi bu pho'am/_grul bum gyi bu rma'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/_grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/_
[\[154a.3\]]grul bum gyi mngag bzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_grul bum rnams kyi gru la bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi tshud cing /_rgyal 
[\[154a.4\]]po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu 
[\[154a.5\]]ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[154a.6\]]rgan po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing 
[\[154a.7\]]glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing /_rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_yu mi yu mi/_yu mi li/_yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang /_klu chen po rnams dang /_klu'i sde dpon 
[\[154b.2\]]rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang /_/nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang /_/ser po dang ni zho rna dang /_/dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang /_/mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/_/rab 
[\[154b.3\]]grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag_/ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang /_/yangs pa can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/_/gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang /_/nag po che dang lag 'gro dang /_/ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang /_/g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang /_/sngo bsangs 
[\[154b.4\]]dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe 'o/_/klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang /_/bdag 
[\[154b.5\]]mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi le bi tsi le/_tsi le bi tsi le/_gau ri/_gan+b+ha ri/_ma taM 
[\[154b.6\]]gi/_tsaN+Da li swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa 
[\[154b.7\]]rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te klu 'am/_klu mo'am/_klu rgan po'am/_klu rgan mo'am/_klu'i bu pho'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_klu'i 'khor pho'am/_klu'i 'khor mo'am/_klu'i mngag 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gzhug pa'am/_klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi tshud 
[\[155a.2\]]cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_
[\[155a.3\]]kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_lus srul rgan 
[\[155a.4\]]po'am/_lus srul rgan mo'am/_lus srul po'i bu pho'am/_lus srul po'i bu mo'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/_lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar 
[\[155a.5\]]bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo 
[\[155a.6\]]can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_a be ba ha na ba ti ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis 
[\[155a.7\]]gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gtso dang /_/mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang /_/stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang /_/sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang /_/ri mnyam gser can gang po dang /_/seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog mi 
[\[155b.2\]]rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang /_/tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang /_/gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/_/'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag 
[\[155b.3\]]gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/_/legs 
[\[155b.4\]]par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hi le mi le/_hi le mi le/_kIrti mU li/_hi li kIrti mU le/_o tum+be tum+be/_o tum+be/_tum+be/_
[\[155b.5\]]o g+he mo g+he/_go de hi/_b+h+riM gA re/_r-i Shi sat+ta me swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags 
[\[155b.6\]]dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_gnod sbyin rgan pho'am/_gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/_
[\[155b.7\]]gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal 
[\[156a.2\]]pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_
[\[156a.3\]]sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_srin po rgan po'am/_srin po rgan mo'am/_srin po'i bu pho'am/_srin po'i bu mo'am/_srin po'i 'khor pho'am/_srin 
[\[156a.4\]]po'i 'khor mo'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_srin po rnams 
[\[156a.5\]]kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_
[\[156a.6\]]yu me yu me le/_yu mi la ba tI ye swA hA/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 
[\[156a.7\]]'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang /_g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[156b.2\]]g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/_nam sros pa dang /_nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams 
[\[156b.3\]]cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/_/lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/_/dpa' 
[\[156b.4\]]chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang /_/da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/_/thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/_/khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge 
[\[156b.5\]]bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang /_nags 'dab dag dang /_bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/_de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad 
[\[156b.6\]]pa dag dang /_mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa 
[\[156b.7\]]gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang /_dge slong ma rnams dang /_dge bsnyen rnams dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]bskyab pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad phar bgyi ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_kun 
[\[157a.2\]]tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang /_dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi 
[\[157a.3\]]bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/_nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba 
[\[157a.4\]]dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/_/skye bo gang dag gtang phod cing /_/phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/_/mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/_/gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/_/des ni 
[\[157a.5\]]nyin mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu 
[\[157a.6\]]dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed 
[\[157a.7\]]pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag la 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs 
[\[157b.2\]]rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zhes bgyi ba/_/rgyab 
[\[157b.3\]]kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/_/srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/_/'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan 
[\[157b.4\]]cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing /_/grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/
[\[157b.5\]]lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/
[\[157b.6\]]rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs 
[\[157b.7\]]ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang zhig nub pa kho na las/_/de la mtshan mor brjod pa yi/_/nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/_/nyi gdugs 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]gang du nub 'gyur ba/_/de na mtsho chen zab mo 'di/_/shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/_/de ni chu mngon rgya mtsho zhes/_/skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes 
[\[158a.2\]]bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing /_/klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/
[\[158a.3\]]kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas 
[\[158a.4\]]gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar nub kyi phyogs 
[\[158a.5\]]de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/_/dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang /_/gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/_/brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing /_/de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/_/gshol 
[\[158a.6\]]yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing /_/tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang /_/nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing /_/zas su sA lu kha dog dang /_/dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang /_/dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing /_/lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/_/na li ke ra bskol bgyis na/_/tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/_/gang 
[\[158a.7\]]na me lce rtse 'dra ba'i/_/sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/_/phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/_/gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/_/ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/_/de ni nye du lhan cig tu/_/glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]cing /_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de la bu ni mang mchis te/_/brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig_/de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/_/dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/_/kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/_/de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs 
[\[158b.2\]]rgyas/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/_/skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/_/skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/_/mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/_/rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/_/bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/_/khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/_/de skad 
[\[158b.3\]]yang dang yang du thos/_/de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/_/'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig_/sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/_/mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/_/de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/_/bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/_/phyogs de mngon 
[\[158b.4\]]par skyong bgyid pa/_/rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag_/'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs 
[\[158b.5\]]po che/_/phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing /_/phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/_/de dag ni chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug dang /_sbrul dang /_
[\[158b.6\]]bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/chibs rta dang /_rnga mo dang /_khyu mchog dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug 
[\[158b.7\]]dang /_sbrul dang /_bya dang /_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_gzhon nu dang /_gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/_/gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/_/bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/_/phyogs bzhi dag 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]ni skyong bar bgyid/_/rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag_/sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/_/'di lta ste/_kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang /_gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang /_sbubs can dang /_grong khyer sbubs can zhes 
[\[159a.2\]]bgyi bdag lags so/_/byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi bdag mchis lags so/_/nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang /_gos can dang /_gos mchog can dang /_pad+ma can dang /_pad+ma bzang po can dang /_sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/_/chab rgyun 
[\[159a.3\]]mang po'i gnas gyur pa/_/'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/_/chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung /_/de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/_/btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/_lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang /_/de bas gnas yang rgyun lugs can/_/rgyun lugs 
[\[159a.4\]]mang dang de bas mang /_/bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/_/btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis te/_der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/_/rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang /_/'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/_/
[\[159a.5\]]de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang /_/khu byug sgra skad chen po dang /_/shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing /_/rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang /_/kau dum b+ha dang chun lag dang /_/bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing /_/me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/_/lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/_/
[\[159a.6\]]pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/_/btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/_/bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/_bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/_/de la gsang sngags 
[\[159a.7\]]kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_i li mi li i li mi li/_kiT+Ti mU le/_hi li kiT+Ti mU le/_hu du me/_hu du ra du me/_gau ri/_gan+b+ha ri/_go do ha ni/_o ke mo ke swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang /_dri za chen po rnams dang /_dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang /_/glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/_/phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/_/me tog myos pa spun rnams dang /_/rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/_/nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang /_/
[\[159b.2\]]ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang /_/rnga 'dzin dang ni khyu byug sgra/_/tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang /_/gser spyod bu mo gser can dang /_/pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag_/'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/
[\[159b.3\]]dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 
[\[159b.4\]]'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_kun+tu le/_e hi e hi/_sa dA mad ti ke/_sa dA b+haN+Di ni ke/_tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad+d+ho si swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu 
[\[159b.5\]]rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_/rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te dri za'am/_dri za mo'am/_dri za rgan po'am/_dri za rgan mo'am/_dri 
[\[159b.6\]]za'i bu pho'am/_dri za'i bu mo'am/_dri za'i 'khor pho'am/_dri za'i 'khor mo'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na 
[\[159b.7\]]glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_/rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung 
[\[160a.2\]]mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te sha za'am/_sha za mo'am/_sha za rgan po'am/_sha za rgan mo'am/_sha za'i bu pho'am/_sha za'i bu mo'am/_sha za'i 'khor pho'am/_sha za'i 'khor mo'am/_sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_sha za'i mngag gzhug 
[\[160a.3\]]ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 
[\[160a.4\]]'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hu me hu me/_hu mi le/_hu mi lA bA tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams 
[\[160a.5\]]dang /_grul bum chen po rnams dang /_grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/_/rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/_/lag bcu drang ni sa la rgyu/_/g.yon phyogs nag po 
[\[160a.6\]]dmar po dang /_/sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang /_/rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/_/ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang /_/srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/_/'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/_/la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang /_/tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po/_/'gro gnas ji snyed 
[\[160a.7\]]mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/_/
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]legs par smras pa 'di thos nas/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_si re bi si re/_si re bi sa re/_si re bi sa re/_kr-iSh+Na tsha ga le/_ka ra DI/_piM ga le swA hA/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[160b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 
[\[160b.3\]]'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te grul bum mam/_grul bum mo'am/_grul bum rgan po'am/_grul bum rgan mo'am/_grul bum gyi bu pho'am/_grul bum gyi bu mo'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/_grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/_grul bum gyi mngag gzhug 
[\[160b.4\]]pa'am/_grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing 
[\[160b.5\]]rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma 
[\[160b.6\]]lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_/rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/_gal te [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rgan mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[160b.7\]]kyi bu pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bu mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor pho'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'khor mo'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing /_nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchi bar 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]gyur na/_glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams kyi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi 
[\[161a.2\]]tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_yu me yu me/_yu mi le/_yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang /_klu chen po rnams dang /_klu'i sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dga' 
[\[161a.3\]]dang nye dga' kun dga' dang /_/nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang /_/ser po dang ni zho rna dang /_/dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang /_/mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/_/rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag_/ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang /_/yangs ba can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/_/gdengs ka che dang 
[\[161a.4\]]skar dga' dang /_/nag po che dang lag 'gro dang /_/ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang /_/g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang /_/sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_/de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_/klu 'di ni 
[\[161a.5\]]bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags 
[\[161a.6\]]so/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi le bi tsi le/_tsi le bi tsi le/_gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_ma tang+gi/_tsaN+Da li swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa 
[\[161a.7\]]rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te klu'am/_klu mo'am/_klu rgan po'am/_klu rgan mo'am/_klu'i bu pho'am/_klu'i bu mo'am/_klu'i 'khor pho'am/_klu'i 'khor mo'am/_klu'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags 
[\[161b.2\]]so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 
[\[161b.3\]]'don par bgyid pa de la gal te lus srul po'am/_lus srul mo'am/_lus srul rgan po'am/_lus srul rgan mo'am/_lus srul po'i bu pho'am/_lus srul po'i bu mo'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/_lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/_lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_lus srul po'i 
[\[161b.4\]]mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas 
[\[161b.5\]]mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_a be ba ha ne/_ba ha na ba tI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[161b.6\]]chen po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang /_dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/_/'di lta ste/_dbang po zla ba chu lha dang /_/b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang /_/mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang /_/stobs 
[\[161b.7\]]ldan nor bu nor spyod dang /_/sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang /_/ri mnyam gser can gang po dang /_/seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang /_/gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/lcags mdung 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]ring dang ma ldan dang /_/tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang /_/gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/_/'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/_/'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/_/de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/_de dag 
[\[162a.2\]]la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/_gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang /_/bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/_/legs par smras pa 'di thos na/_/a rdza 
[\[162a.3\]]ka yi dog pa bzhin/_/de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_hi le mi le/_kIrti mU le/_hi li kIrti mU le/_o tum+be/_tum+be/_o tum+pe/_tum+be/_o g+he mo g+he/_go de hi/_
[\[162a.4\]]b+h+riM gA re/_r-i Shi sat+ta me swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /_kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_/rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug 
[\[162a.5\]]pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/_gnod sbyin mo'am/_gnod sbyin rgan po'am/_gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/_gnod sbyin 
[\[162a.6\]]gyi 'khor mo'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/_gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/_gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod 
[\[162a.7\]]sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te srin po'am/_srin mo'am/_srin po rgan po'am/_srin po rgan mo'am/_srin po'i bu 
[\[162b.2\]]pho'am/_srin po'i bu mo'am/_srin po'i 'khor pho'am/_srin po'i 'khor mo'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/_srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/_nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed 
[\[162b.3\]]la/_srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/_de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/_/de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_hu lu hu lu/_yu me yu mi le/_
[\[162b.4\]]yu mi la ba tI ye swA hA/_zhes rgya cher smras nas/_nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang /_gnod sbyin dang mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon 
[\[162b.5\]]par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang /_mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/_rig sngags dang /_srung ba dang /_sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shig_/zung shig_/chong shig_/lhogs 
[\[162b.6\]]shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bar sdom ni/_i/_ku/_hu/_si/_yu/_tsi/_A/_hi/_hi/_gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos 
[\[162b.7\]]pa dang [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du sbyar ro/_/mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]{D657}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga'i gnas na nor 
[\[163a.2\]]bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_nye dga' dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_ma dros pa dang /_gzi 
[\[163a.3\]]can dang /_chu lha dang /_'jog po dang /_yul 'khor srung dang /_nor rgyas kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /_sa srung gi bu dang /_mdongs bu dang /_dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal bzang dang /_glog gi phreng ba dang /_gtsug na rin po che dang /_gtsug na nor bu thogs dang /_snang ldan 
[\[163a.4\]]gtsug phud can dang /_gtsug phud 'ja' can dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_dbang po'i mchod sdong dang /_'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_bkra shis ldan dang /_dkyil 'khor chen po dang /_lag gis 'gro chen po dang /_skar mdog dang /_zla ba'i gzi brjid dang /_dpal 
[\[163a.5\]]gyi blo gros dang /_zla mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /_shin tu brtan pa dang /_mgul na nor bu dang /_sprin byung dang /_char rgyun dang /_rab 'joms dang /_rnam par 'joms dang /_mthu bskyengs dang /_gdengs ka chen po dang /_dbyangs zab dang /_klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /_
[\[163a.6\]]rnam par sgru 'byin dang /_ut+pa la dang /_rtsal chen dang /_gshol mda' 'dzin dang /_sna tshogs sde dang /_zhags pa chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_kun tu snang dang /_rna rtsub dang /_dung dang /_dar dar dang /_klu'i rgyal po u pa dar dar dang /_bde byed dang /_lag 'gro dang /_
[\[163a.7\]]lag 'gro chen po dang /_dri ma chen po dang /_'phur lding dang /_sog ma med dang /_'phyang ba dang /_srin bu gnas dang /_nag po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang /_'dam bu dang /_nye ba'i 'dam bu dang /_dung thogs dang /_'gro lding dang /_rab mdzes dang /_glang chen sna dang /_rnon po dang /_
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ser skya dang /_glog 'bar dang /_glog 'od chen po dang /_stobs lha dang /_chu stobs dang /_klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang /_bdud rtsi can dang /_mu stegs can dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'od can dang /_gser mdog sgra dang /_gser 'od dang /_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang /_nyi 'od dang /_'char 
[\[163b.2\]]ba dang /_bal glang mgo dang /_klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /_nag po dang /_gshin rje dang /_dge tshul dang /_sbal pa dang /_ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang /_mu khyud 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_mgo stong can dang /_gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang /_sprin chen dang /_sde 
[\[163b.3\]]bzang dang /_sa skyong dang /_mis byin dang /_rnam par dul dang /_dga' ba 'byung dang /_chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang /_dug 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang /_pad+ma ka dang /_mjug ma dang /_rab 'phyang dang /_'jigs byed dang /_gzi brjid mdzes dang /_mgo lnga pa dang /_bal 
[\[163b.4\]]li ra dang /_shing rtas rgyal dang /_klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_mgo bo che dang /_pim bi ka dang /_bi ta ra dang /_mgyogs 'gro dang /_klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang /_klu sde dang /_gzi chen dang /_'dam bu byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang /_'od 'bar dang /_mgo bdun pa 
[\[163b.5\]]dang /_stong chen dang /_mthong dga' dang /_rab tu cher gtum dang /_dri med gzi brjid dang /_mig [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_drag po chen po dang /_'od 'phro phung po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang /_khro bo drag shul can dang /_rin chen chu sbyin dang /_chu sbyin sprin chen po dang /_dbang po'i 'od dang /_rkang pas 
[\[163b.6\]]'thung dang /_sprin zla dang /_rgya mtsho'i sprin dang /_me tog dri chen dang /_ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang /_klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang /_tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang /_sprin chen snying po dang /_kha ba can dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_sprin mthu can dang /_mtshan mo 'dzin dang /_chu sbyin dang /_
[\[163b.7\]]chu sbyin chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang /_sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_khro med dang sa'i bum pa dang /_klu dpal dang /_chu 'dzin dang /_sprin gdugs dang /_ang gi ra'i gdong dang /_gzi brjid can dang /_sprin las mngon byung dang /_klu'i rgyal mo gom stabs 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]mtha' yas dang /_cha byad mdzes dang /_lus chen dang /_spyad lto dang /_zhi ba dang /_dpa' ba dang /_gser ngad can dang /_mchog tu brtson dang /_dug can dang /_dbyangs snyan dang /_klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang /_rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang /_rnam par g.yo 
[\[164a.2\]]dang /_'brug sgra dang /_rnga sgra dang /_bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang /_dga' bar byed pa dang /_'brug sgrogs dang /_dpa' sde dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_rgya mtsho'i klong dang /_klu'i rgyal po yon po dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus 
[\[164a.3\]]te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bla ma la gus pa 
[\[164a.4\]]dang /_phu dud chen po byed pas/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_dar gyi lda ldi dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[164a.5\]]me tog dang /_rin po che'i lda ldi dang /_mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_klu'i me tog dang /_mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag_/bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 
[\[164a.6\]]smon lam rnams btab pa/_lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_
[\[164a.7\]]rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang /_gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_grangs med/_dpag tu med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang /_lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/_grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/_rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs 
[\[164b.2\]]kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/_kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa 
[\[164b.3\]]dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 
[\[164b.4\]]thams cad kyi phreng ba dang me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi snang pa chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_phye ma dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho 
[\[164b.5\]]sprin rnams dang /_sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/_de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis 
[\[164b.6\]]mi khyab/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa/_ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor 
[\[164b.7\]]bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun du sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal 
[\[165a.2\]]po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs 
[\[165a.3\]]rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs thams cad 
[\[165a.4\]]kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/_nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/
[\[165a.5\]]mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che dang /_spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i sgron ma 
[\[165a.6\]]dang /_spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i 
[\[165a.7\]]khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun du 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgo kun du me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs 
[\[165b.2\]]par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang phreng ba dang /_rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[165b.3\]]dang /_me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an+da rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[165b.4\]]nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an+da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi 
[\[165b.5\]]seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'bar ba mchog 
[\[165b.6\]]dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[165b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/spos dang /_nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]rnams dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang 
[\[166a.2\]]ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[166a.3\]]snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun du gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho 
[\[166a.4\]]sprin rnams dang /_rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun du mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying 
[\[166a.5\]]bo can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[166a.6\]]pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun du ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs 
[\[166a.7\]]stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos sna tshogs dang /_rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]nas brgyan pa nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/
[\[166b.2\]]yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_an+da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla 
[\[166b.3\]]re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i 
[\[166b.4\]]bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang 
[\[166b.5\]]ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen 
[\[166b.6\]]mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi/_gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/_rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod 
[\[166b.7\]]pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i rdul kun du snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma rnam 
[\[167a.2\]]par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa kun du bkod 
[\[167a.3\]]pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[167a.4\]]rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin 
[\[167a.5\]]rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_rin po che'i rigs dang /_nor bu rin 
[\[167a.6\]]po che'i rigs dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun du ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid 
[\[167a.7\]]du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 
[\[167b.2\]]'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od 
[\[167b.3\]]zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che mi 
[\[167b.4\]]zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun du ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar 
[\[167b.5\]]bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang /_kun du 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro
