[\[167b.6\]]ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_
[\[167b.7\]]gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/spos dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang /_rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad 
[\[168a.2\]]kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che dang /_spos dang /_tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin 
[\[168a.3\]]rnams dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /_rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams 
[\[168a.4\]]dang /_thams cad kun du bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/_
[\[168a.5\]]klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/_/de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can 
[\[168a.6\]]g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/_/de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' 
[\[168a.7\]]yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_
[\[168b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs 
[\[168b.3\]]par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams 
[\[168b.4\]]cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'phebs par 'gyur/_rtswa dang /_shing shel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad 'khrungs par 'gyur/_'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[168b.5\]]bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/_gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 
[\[168b.6\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_ngas khyod 
[\[168b.7\]]la bshad do/_/klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/_bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byams pa'o/_/klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tshig_/mtshon gyis mi tshugs/_chus mi khyer/_dug gis mi tshugs/_pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/_/bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/_bde bar sad par 'gyur/_rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/_bsod 
[\[169a.2\]]nams chen pos gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/_mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/_'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/_sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /_rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_
[\[169a.3\]]bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/_klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/_/klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang /_byams pa'i 
[\[169a.4\]]ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/_des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/_bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[169a.5\]]gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/_tad+ya thA/_d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/_ut+tA ra Ni/_saM pra 
[\[169a.6\]]tiSh+Thi te/_bi dza ya brna/_sat+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/_dz+nyA na ba ti/_ud de pA da ni bi nA ma ni/_a b+hi She tsa ni/_a b+hi bya hA ra/_shu b+ha ba ti/_a dzi ma tu/_e hi ku ma ba la ni/_ba ha hA ra kle sha na/_d+hu na pA paM/_sho d+ha ya marga Na/_ni ra ti ka_/d+harma ta shud+d+ha/_lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsa sa/_
[\[169a.7\]]duHkha sha ma na sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+Thi ti/_pradz+nyA dz+nyA na bi swA hA/_klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/_brjod par 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]bya'o/_/klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul par snang bar byed pa/_ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/_gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/_skra'i rtse mo'i cha 
[\[169b.2\]]shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang /_rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/_yid la bya'o/_/de dag gis klu thams cad dang /_klu'i rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i rus thams cad dang /_klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang /_klu'i 'byung ba thams 
[\[169b.3\]]cad dang /_klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang /_klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang /_klu'i bu mo thams cad dang /_klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/_/klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin 
[\[169b.4\]]gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal 
[\[169b.5\]]lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de

[\[169b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen

[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad 
[\[171a.2\]]rgyun chad pa dang /_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[171a.3\]]klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang /_
[\[171a.4\]]mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang /_skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_
[\[171a.5\]]'tshe ba dang /_gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /_de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/_gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang /_lha 
[\[171a.6\]]thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang /_
[\[171a.7\]]rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[171b.2\]]klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa 
[\[171b.3\]]legs so legs so/_/klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_snying rje chen po las byung ba/_'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 
[\[171b.4\]]thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_byin gyis brlabs pa/_rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/_de ni char med pa'i tshe char pa bab par byed/_char ches pa gcod/_'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/_klu thams cad skul bar byed/_/lha thams cad sim par byed/_bdud 
[\[171b.5\]]thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/_sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/_/tad+ya thA/_ma hA dz+nyA na/_a ba b+hA sa ni/_shrI te dzo lak+Sh+ma dr-iSh+Ta bi kra ma/_badzra sa~M ha ta ne/_pa ra ma bi rA dza/_nirma la gu Na ke tu sU r+ya pra b+he/_bi ma lAng+ga yaSh+Ti/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_sa~M b+ha ra 
[\[171b.6\]]sa~M b+ha ra/_du du~M bu/_ha na ha na/_ma hA pra b+he bi d+hA ta ma hA mo ha a~M d+ha ka re/_padz+nyA gra shud+d+he/_ba ri pU ra Na mai tre/_mai tri bi ra ma na skan+d+ha/_mai tre ma bud+d+ha re/_dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/_dz+wa lA~M bud+d+ha re/_dz+wa la~M bud+d+ha re/_dz+wa la~M bud+d+ha re/_bod+h+yaM ga ku su me da sha ba le/_tsa tu ra bai shA ra d+ye/_aSh+Ta da sha_/a be ni ka bud+d+ha d+harme/_
[\[171b.7\]]shu b+ha ma ti/_pu N+ya rA shi/_shu kla d+harma sa ma n+wi ti/_gaM b+hI re/_gaM b+hI re/_b+hi ra dza ske/_bi ma lo/_bi she Sha/_prA ba te/_ni rA pra b+ha d+harme/_sarba lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha dz+yeSh+Tha/_par pra ba re/_a nut+ta re/_a sa~M ge_/d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_shAn+ta ma te/_shAn+ta ma te/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_pa ra 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]ma bud+d+hA nu mi te/_ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab 
[\[172a.2\]]pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/_/s+yAd ya the dan/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_nA gA nAM/_dza ba dza ba/_dzi bi dzi bi/_dzu bu dzu bu/_klu 
[\[172a.3\]]chen po dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig_/tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg_/kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig_/ba ra ba ra/_
[\[172a.4\]]bi ri bi ri/_bu ru bu ru/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/_/byams pa'i sems dang /_snying rje'i sems dang /_dga' ba'i sems dang /_btang snyoms kyi sems dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis 
[\[172a.5\]]brlabs dang /_bden pa dang /_bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po dag tshur sheg_/sangs rgyas rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig_/b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_chu chen po'i chu dang /_sprin 
[\[172a.6\]]gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg_/ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig_/g+ha Da g+ha Da/_g+hi Di g+hi Di/_d+hu Du g+hu Du/_drag shul can/_khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/_dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams 
[\[172a.7\]]byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa tshur sheg_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/_ta Tata Ta/_ti Ti ti Ti/_tu Tu tu Tu/_nor bu rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/_sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis la/_rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur sheg_/byams 
[\[172b.2\]]pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/_ra la ra la/_ri li ri li/_ru lu ru lu/_lag gis 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par 
[\[172b.3\]]dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/_g+ha ma g+ha ma/_g+hi mi g+hi mi/_g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/_klu thams cad dgug go/_/byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/_na ra na ra/_ni ri ni ri/_nu ru nu ru swA hA/_yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mgo stong pa/_
[\[172b.4\]]mgo dang mig dmar ba/_stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o/_/kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/_bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa/_nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs

[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu chen po

[\[173a.6\]]cad ni tshim par gyis shig swA hA/_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che bas char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/_'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung shig swA hA/_mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad la yongs su srungs shig swA hA/_ka ra 
[\[173a.7\]]ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_da ra da ra/_di ri di ri/_du ru du ru/_na ta na ta/_ni ti ni ti/_nu tu nu tu/_shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/_sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/_sprin ldan ma/_sprin chen ldan ma/_sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/_sprin gsal ma/_sprin 'byung ma/_dus sprin 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ma/_sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/_sprin sgrogs ma/_sprin bzhugs ma/_sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/_sprin gyi phreng ba mnga' ma/_sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/_sprin bcibs ma/_sprin la gnas bcas ma/_sprin gyi snying po'i sprin gyi ral pa can/_sprin 'od ma/_sprin gyi 'khor ldan

[\[173b.7\]]bu bud+d+he/_bu bud+d+he/_ha ra pA paM/_sarba satwA nAM/_a g+hiSh+Thi ya pa N+ya ma/_sarba bud d+hA nAM/_d+ha ri ni d+ha re/_shu b+ha ma te gu NA gra prA pa Ne/_ma hA dz+nyA no/_la ge/_shu kla d+harme sat+ya pa ti dz+nye/_ma hA ya nA d+hu Sh+Thi trai lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha b+ha ga ba ti/_bud+d+ha mai tri A pU ra ya sarba k+She trA ni/_shukle shwe tA ma/_ba ra da 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]re/_pan+ta ra ba si ni/_d+hu d+hu re/_d+hu d+hu ru/_sha ma sha ma/_shAn+ta ma nA se/_char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul

[\[174b.5\]]bar+Sha bar+Sha/_dza lAm+bu da re/_sham+bu sham+bu/_ba ta tu Tu ma me/_d+huM d+huM/_d+huM d+huM be/_me g+ha pra b+he/_me g+ha g+ha hi ni/_D+ha ka D+ha ka_/D+ha ka D+hu D+hu m+be/_g+ha nA g+ha nA/_shi ki ni/_ka na ka na/_ga Na ga Na/_ma hA nA ga ga ne/_ni ra trU N+tu/_badzra dar ka ri ma hA nA d+hi da ye/_g+hu ma g+hu ma/_g+hu ma pa

[\[174b.7\]]char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_na maHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+h+yan+tu/_man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//cho ga ni char cher dbab par 'dod na bla 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre/_ba dan sngon po dpyang ngo /_chos smra ba lus bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing /_gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/_spos dri zhim pos bskus nas/_zas dkar gsum zos la/_stan sngon 
[\[175a.2\]]po'i steng du 'dug nas/_kha shar phyogs su bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sprin chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o/_/chu sngon pos bka' ba'i bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/_/gtor 
[\[175a.3\]]ma dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro/_/de la chos smra bas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/_shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/_klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa ba'i lci bas bri bar bya'o/_/lho 
[\[175a.4\]]phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po 
[\[175a.5\]]mgo dgu pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/_/chos smra ba rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te/_sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab 
[\[175a.6\]]la klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/_'di ni cho ga'o/_/gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/_nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad gdon mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho ni 
[\[175a.7\]]dus las yol yang srid kyi/_thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang /_yon tan la gnas te 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sha dang nya sha la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/'o thug dang /_zho dang /_'o ma 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dang /_'bras chen bu ram can la sogs pa dang /_mngar gsum za zhing bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar na 'grub par 'gyur te/_thub pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa bzhin du the tshom med par bya'o/_/'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 
[\[175b.2\]]'khor gyi le'u zhes bya ba drug cu rtsa bzhi pa cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_shI len dra b+ho d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[175b.3\]{D658}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha bA ta maN+Da la sarba nA ga hr-i da ya~M nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[175b.4\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa na klu stong du tshang ba'i klu'i tshogs chen po klu thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan 
[\[175b.5\]]pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po nye dga' bo dang /_klu'i rgyal po yang dag bskul dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog phreng can dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can chen po dang /_klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang /_klu'i rgyal po dung dang /_
[\[175b.6\]]klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtshams bzang dang /_klu'i rgyal po stobs kyi rgyu dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rnam par 'phrul dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin chen rgyas byed dang /_
[\[175b.7\]]klu'i rgyal po 'brug sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po skar mda' gtong dang /_klu'i rgyal po dus min sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'brug skad dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog rab tu gtong ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam par snang dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'brug chen sgrogs dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od chen lam lam dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang /_klu'i rgyal po mdongs 
[\[176a.2\]]bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnga sgra rnam par sgrogs pa'i skad dang /_klu'i rgyal po la ba dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'dren byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal mgrin dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po sha sho'i sgra chen 
[\[176a.3\]]dang /_klu'i rgyal po [{]ding [,]deng [}{]ding [,]deng [}]sgra dang /_klu'i rgyal po rab 'joms dang /_klu'i rgyal po char 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung chen rnam par 'phrul dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung rab tu gtong dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal ldan dang /_klu'i rgyal po dpal 
[\[176a.4\]]dkrigs dang /_klu'i rgyal po bkra shis dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin rgyas byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis dga' byed dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyis 'gebs pa'i rigs dang /_klu'i rgyal po legs par 'gebs pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rnam par rtse dang /_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas 
[\[176a.5\]]kyi bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_klu'i rgyal po mthong dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po don yod dga' dang /_klu'i rgyal po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyis legs par 'gebs dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_klu'i rgyal 
[\[176a.6\]]po sprin las chu 'byin dang /_klu'i rgyal po bde mthong dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung 'byung dang /_klu'i rgyal po rlung 'khrug par byed pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag dang /_gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po chen po stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs 
[\[176a.7\]]te/_de dag thams cad kyang klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos nam mkha' la di ri di ri sgrogs shing /_/rdzi char chen po rab tu 'bebs te/_bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so/_/kye klu chen po dang klu dag tshur 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]sheg_/mu lu mu lu/_tsa Ta tsa Ta/_pa Ta pa Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta swA hA/_glog 'bar ba rab tu phyung zhing /_rdzi char chen po'i rgyun thong la char phob cig_/kye kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dran par gyis shig_/
[\[176b.2\]]kye klu chen po dag tshur sheg tshur sheg_/'dzam bu'i gling du char rab tu phob cig_/gu Du gu Du/_mu Du mu Du/_hi hi hi hi/_tsu Da tsu Da/_ma hA nA ga hr-i da ya/_sarba nA ga nA/_A kaD+D+ha ya/_sany+tso da ya/_shI g+h+rAn da ra swA hA/_sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan bkod pa dag 
[\[176b.3\]]gser snam gyi mtha' rin po che thams cad kyi tshon gyi lda ldi mdzes pa/_mu tig gi rgyan phreng rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_lha'i rin po ches mdzes par byas pa'i gzhal med khang me tog rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du 
[\[176b.4\]]khebs par byin gyis rlobs la/_rin po che'i sprin rab tu 'phyang zhing /_lha'i ras bcos bu mang po mu tig gi rgyan phreng rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa zab mo sna tshogs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_
[\[176b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa rin po che bkod pa chen po'i rgya mtsho'i sprin dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis rlobs te/_sprin chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgra sgrogs pa rgya mtsho 
[\[176b.6\]]chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi lha'i bla re'i dril bu'i sgra snyan par sgrogs pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_bya'i tshogs thams cad skad 'byin cing me tog gi char chen po rab tu 'bebs pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rgya mtsho sprin chen po sgra cher sgrogs shing 
[\[176b.7\]]lha'i rin po che rab tu 'phyang la mu tig gi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu 'phyang ba rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_gser skud kyis brgyan pa'i snang ba chen po can gyi rtse mos nam mkha' kun du khebs par byed pa rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng pa'i 'od kyi 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyis nam mkha' kun du khebs par byed pa la mkhas pa rgya mtsho'i sprin dag dang /_snang ba dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgras kun du khebs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sprin dag gis nam mkha' mngon par khebs par gyis shig_/klu dang klu'i rgyal po thams 
[\[177a.2\]]cad tshur sheg_/sa'i steng 'dir 'brug sgra sgrogs shing char phob cig_/char rab tu phob cig_/char kun du rab tu phob cig_/di ri rir sgrogs shig_/glog chen po snang ba rab tu phyung shig_/'du zhing kun du 'du la tog yar dar dir zhing 'dug ste/_klu'i skad chen po yid 
[\[177a.3\]]du 'ong ba'i sgra chen po 'byin cing dbyangs chen po rab tu sgrogs pa dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig_/g+ha Da g+ha Da/_g+hi Di g+hi Di/_hu Du hu Du/_g+hu Du g+hu Du/_ga Ta ga Ta/_gi Ti gi Ti/_ma Ta ma Ta/_tsa Ta tsa Ta/_pa Ta pa Ta/_kye kye klu dang /_klu chen po dag tshur tshur tshur sheg tshur sheg_/
[\[177a.4\]]d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/_hA hA hA hA/_hI hI/_hUM hUM/_'brug sgra chen po sgrogs shing /_rlung chen po rab tu gtong bdag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_kye kye klu dang /_klu'i rgyal po dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul gyis 'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[177a.5\]]char phob cig_/g+hu Du g+hu Du/_phaT phaT/_ha ha/_he he/_klu chen po dag 'dus shig sa'i steng du char rab tu phob cig_/g+hu Du g+hu Du/_ki ri ki ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_di ri di ri/_ki li ki li/_zhing thams cad yongs su gang bar gyis shig_/'bru dang /_shing ljon pa dang /_

[\[177a.7\]]sheg tshur sheg swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po mdongs bu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo/_/chos kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la yang dag par bskul lo/_/dge 'dun gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/_/lag na rdo rje'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal

[\[177b.3\]]dag par bskul lo/_/khyab 'jug gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po phreng ba can la yang dag par bskul lo/_/drag po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bskul lo/_/

[\[177b.6\]]bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/_klu gong ma gong ma thams cad kyi bden pas char rab tu phob cig_/char phob cig_/ma 'phyi bar tshur sheg tshur sheg_/kye kye klu chen po dag klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag par bskul lo/_/kun nas drang ngo /_/sa ras ra/_hA hA/_
[\[177b.7\]]d+hu ma d+hu ma/_hA hA hA hA/_hi hi hi hi/_e h+ye hi/_tha tha tha/_tsa tsa tsa ra ta/_zhing thams cad kun gang bar gyis shig_/'bru thams cad kyi char phob cig_/rlung chen po rab tu thong shig_/dru~M dru~M/_g+hu~M g+hu~M/_pum pum/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_ni pA ra Ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_dzA~M gu li/_puk+ka si/_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]pra hA nI/_ma ta~M gi/_dza ye bi dza ye/_ha ha swAhA/_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen snying po dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rab 'joms pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po dang /_de bzhin 
[\[178a.2\]]gshegs pa sprin chen kun du 'gebs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgrogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgyas mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen rnam par sgrogs pa sgra'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs mdzad dang /_
[\[178a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen srung dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rnga sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug chen sgra dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbyangs snyan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 
[\[178a.4\]]chen skar ma'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen tshub ma'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen shin du brtan pa'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sprin bstan pas dga' ba mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'ur 'ur sgra 
[\[178a.5\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'jigs pas 'jigs mdzad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen thog tog char 'bebs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bkra shis kyi ched dang /_sangs 
[\[178a.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po sprin chen snying po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/_/klu thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad kyi snying po la yang dag 
[\[178a.7\]]par bskul lo/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' lung gis myur du sheg shig_/kye kye klu dang klu chen po dag tshur sheg tshur sheg_/hu lu hu lu/_su ru su ru/_d+ha pa d+ha pa/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ma 'phyi bar sangs rgyas kyi bden pas tshur sheg_/chos kyi bden pas tshur 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]sheg_/dge 'dun gyi bden pas tshur sheg_/klu thams cad dang /_klu chen po gong ma gong ma dag gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling du char phob cig_/a la la zhes gar byed cing /_a la la zhes glu len pa dang /_a la la zhes klu'i rnam par 'phrul ba chen po byed

[\[178b.3\]]ta ra Ni/_ta re/_ta ra ta ra/_tA re/_kA bi la ke shi/_bi kr-i ta da~MSh+T+ri/_b+ha yA nA ge/_A kaD+D+ha/_mA bi la m+pa tha/_bid+yud dz+wa re/_g+ho rA rU pi Ni/_kA le/_a kA le/_gardzi ta/_sarba me g+ha bi kurba Ni/_sany+tso da ni/_sarba k+She tra na/_a pU ra Ni tsakra_/tsakra brti/_hi ri hi ri/_b+he g+he b+he g+he/_sma ra 
[\[178b.4\]]sma ra/_kA li kA li/_ma hA kA li/_hr-i da ya~M/_pra bi sha aSh+Te/_mat+te/_sarba nA ga_/A ka r+Sha Ni/_pU ra ya hU~M hU~M/_rat+na tra ya/_bi kurbi te/_badzri Ni/_badzre badzra pA Ni/_kA la sho d+hi re/_nA ga rU pi ni/_su rU be/_b+ho gi b+ho gi/_ma hA b+ho gi/_b+ho ga rU ba ta ya/_ba le/_bar+Sha ni/_sarba nA ga sany+tso 
[\[178b.5\]]da ni swA hA/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maSh+tsa N+Da badzra pA Na ye/_b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/_su rU pe/_kA la rU pi Ni swA hA/_chos smra bas thog ma kho nar bsrung ba'i cho ga byas la/_chos gos kyi grwar lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/_mdud pa bdun bor nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad 
[\[178b.6\]]kyi snying po zhes bya ba 'di zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgyun ma chad par bklag par bya'o/_/shar phyogs su ni ba lang gi lci bas klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa zhes bya ba 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/_/lho phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po rab tu rgyas byed ces bya ba mgo lnga pa 
[\[178b.7\]]'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/_/nub phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can zhes bya ba mgo bdun pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/_/byang phyogs su ni klu'i rgyal po sprin sku la zhes bya ba mgo dgu pa 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya'o/_/bla re dang /_gos sngon po dang /_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]rgyal mtshan sngon po dang /_lha bshos thams cad kyang sngon por bya'o/_/klu gnad la dbab pa ni mngar gsum gyis bya'o/_/mngar gsum gyis dgang blugs bdun yang klu'i snying pos sbyin sreg bya'o/_/sprin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang bris te char gyi rgyun 'bebs 
[\[179a.2\]]la phan tshun thug cing mthar glog 'gyu bar bya'o/_/'dir dbab pa ni khur ba bkra shis ldan dang /_pen rtse dang /_sha dang /_nya sha dang /_sbrang rtsi las byas pa'i zas mchog rgyas par bya'o/_/de nas chos smra ba gtsang zhing gos gtsang ma bgos pas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi 
[\[179a.3\]]le'u klu thams cad kyi snying po bklag par bya'o/_/de nas klu rnams dang po'i nyin mo nas brtsams te/_di ri rir sgra sgrogs par byed cing /_sgra yid du 'ong bdag 'byin par 'gyur te/_le'u 'di la the tshom dang brnyas par mi bya'o/_/gal te rgya mtsho dus las yol na 'di yang 
[\[179a.4\]]char las yol bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[179a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga sgra sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gdal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[179a.6\]]sangs rgyas 'brug sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[179a.7\]]sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin rnam par rgyas mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]yan lag mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin lta bu'i na bza' man bas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i cho ga 'di grub par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_s+phu Ta swA hA/_char mi 'bab pa'i tshe 
[\[180a.2\]]dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis mgo bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgos la/_byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag yi ger bris nas/_gdan gtsang ma la bzhag ste/_pog phor bdun 
[\[180a.3\]]gyi nam mkha' la gyen du 'dug cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams lan lnga bcu'i bar du brjod la mchod pa chen po byas te/_zhag bdun gyi bar du rgyun ma chad par byas na char 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa sprin chen po rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u klu thams cad 
[\[180a.4\]]kyi snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D659}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta pa swI 
[\[180a.5\]]nA ga rA dzA pa ri prits+tshA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma 
[\[180a.6\]]ga d+hA na lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhugs te/_de nas klu'i rgyal po gzi can kha dog shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[180a.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri 'di ni ring po dag dge slong rnams la 'tshe na/_de la bdag gis ji ltar mi 'tshe bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po gzi can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/klu'i rgyal 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]po legs so legs so/_/'di lta bur khyod kyis bya ba yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de'i phyir dug dang /_sman chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag gi ming zung shig_/tad+ya thA/_paN+Da re/_ka ra Te/_ke yU re/_bo d+h+yaM ga ma 
[\[180b.2\]]te/_bin+du ma te/_a ra Da/_ta ra Da/_ta ru Da/_da ha da ha na/_e ta da ha/_dze le dze la/_pha le/_sha ta sha ta/_ku le na ku li/_e kar Shi ta rad+ga priSh+Ti/_dge slong dag su zhig dug dang /_sman chen po [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa de'i lus la rims kyis mi tshugs/_dug dang /_
[\[180b.3\]]mtshon dang /_byad dang /_ro langs dang /_nyin gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pas mi tshugs/_de la ring po dag 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'di dag 'dzin pa de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[180b.4\]]stsal nas/_klu'i rgyal po gzi can yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[180b.5\]{D660}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA gra ha mA tr-i kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags ma gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_'phags ma bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom 
[\[180b.6\]]ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_bdud dang /_gshin rje dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig dmar dang /_gza' lhag 
[\[180b.7\]]dang /_phur bu dang /_pa ba sangs dang /_spen pa dang /_sgra gcan dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa du mas bstod cing /_rdo rje chen po dam tshig gi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]cig pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[181a.2\]]rdo rje gzhu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan 
[\[181a.3\]]ras gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[181a.4\]]zhal ras rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[181a.5\]]byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar la chos ston te/_bkod pa chen po'i rgyan yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 
[\[181a.6\]]'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i chos ston par mdzad do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes 'khor de rnams la bltas nas langs te/_bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 
[\[181a.7\]]'das la lan stong phrag du ma bskor ba byas te/_phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/_snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas pas 'khor de rnams la bltas te/_rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]ldan 'das gza' rnams ni gtum zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can/_drag cing drag pa'i gzugs can/_khro zhing khro ba'i sems kyi sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod par bgyid la mdangs 'phrog par bgyid de/_kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog par bgyid/_kha cig ni 
[\[181b.2\]]srog 'phrog par bgyid/_sems can tshe ring po kha cig ni tshe thung bar bgyid/_de ltar sems can rnams la gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pas na/_de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_
[\[181b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du snying rje bskyed nas/_gsang ba chen po shin du gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so/_/de dag ngas bshad kyis nyon la 
[\[181b.4\]]legs par rab tu zungs la yid la gyis shig_/gza' rnams gtum pa'i gzugs la shin tu khro zhing 'jigs pa rnams la mchod pa bzang po mchod yon dang bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba las ches gsang ba ngas bshad par bya'o/_/de dag mchod pas 
[\[181b.5\]]mchod 'gyur zhing /_/gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/_/gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang /_/ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni lha min dang /_/mi'am ci dang klu dag dang /_/gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang /_/srul po dang ni mi rnams dang /_/drag 
[\[181b.6\]]po gzi brjid chen po dag_/khros pa zhi bar byed pa yi/_/gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dag_/rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba phyung nas/_gza' 
[\[181b.7\]]rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de nyid kyi skad cig nyid la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' rnams langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]rnams la sman yon btags par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag rnams 'tshogs nas yo byad du gyur par byed pa'i chos smra ba rnams la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa 
[\[182a.2\]]dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang rim gro dang chad pa bzlog pa dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_sa bcing bar 'gyur ba rnams bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[182a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi mchod pa dang gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/_ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas phyogs rnams su dri'i dkyil 'khor byas la pad+ma sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du 
[\[182a.4\]]byas pa'i 'dab ma bris te/_lte ba yang sor bcu gnyis pa la sgo bzhis mdzes pa rim bzhin du byas pa la pad+ma rgyas pa'i steng du lha nyi ma bsam par bya ba ni lus gzi brjid kyi phung po li khri nye bar 'bar ba lta bu nyi ma stong dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer can no/_/oM mai g+ho lkA ya 
[\[182a.5\]]swA hA/_shar du zla ba dkar po/_o~M shi tA~M sha be swA hA/_me'i mtshams su mig dmar po/_oM rak+tA~M ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/_gshin rje'i phyogs su rgyal rigs gza' lhag mdog ser po/_o~M bud+hA ya swA hA/_bden bral du phur bu dmar ser/_oM pr-i ha spa ta ye 
[\[182a.6\]]swA hA/_nub kyi phyogs su pa ba sangs dkar po/_oM a su rot+ta mA ya swA hA/_rlung du spen pa mig sman ltar shin tu gnag pa/_oM kr-iSh+Na war+N+Na ya swA hA/_lus ngan po'i phyogs su sgra gcan dmar nag_/oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/_dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dud 
[\[182a.7\]]sprin gyi mdog lta bu'i mjug rengs/_oM dz+yo ti ke ta be swA hA/_shar gyi sgor rje btsun sangs rgyas/_lho sgor phyag na rdo rje/_nub sgor 'jig rten mgon po/_byang gi sgor 'jam dpal lo/_/dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi byang shar du gza' thams cad do/_/shar lho'i 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]mtshams su khyim rnams dang rgyu skar rnams so/_/lho nub du gnod pa thams cad do/_/nub byang du rje btsun rigs pa chen mo'o/_/dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi shar du yul 'khor srung /_lhor 'phags skyes po/_nub tu mig mi bzang /_byang du lus ngan po'o/_
[\[182b.2\]]nyi ma'i 'o thug dang /_zla ba'i zho zan dang /_mig dmar gyi sran ma ma sha'i bza' ba dang /_lhag pa'i mar gyi khur ba dang /_phur bu'i 'o ma dang /_pa ba sangs kyi khur ba dang /_spen pa'i sran ma ma sha dang /_mud ga bsres pa dang /_sgra gcan gyi til gyi 
[\[182b.3\]]thug pa dang /_mjug [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]til kyi thug pa dang /_bu ram gyi tshod ma'o/_/gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma ni yul 'khor srung gi zho zan no/_/'phags skyes po'i zho dang sran ma ma sha'i bza' ba'o/_/mig mi bzang gi 'o thug gi bza' ba'o/_/lus ngan po'i zho dang sran 
[\[182b.4\]]ma ma sha'i bza' ba dang bu ram chang dang sbyar ba'o/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi me tog dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi bdug spos dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi ba dan dbul lo/_/so so la mar me dbul lo/_/ji lta ba'i rim pa'i mchod pa bya'o/_/
[\[182b.5\]]mar dang sbrang rtsis dung phor bkang ste/_rin chen sna lnga bcug la mchod yon dbul zhing gdong la yang dar bcing bar bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje gza' 'di rnams kyi snying po'i sngags bklags pas 'grub pa rnams yin te/_ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 
[\[182b.6\]]'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/_/kham pa'am zangs la sogs pa'am/_gser dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas/_re re la yang bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje de nas yang de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum 
[\[182b.7\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams lan bdun brjod par bya'o/_/de nas gza' nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad kyis srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbul ba'i gdon las grol bar byed do/_/tshe zad pa rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje yang gang zhig dge 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams sam/_sems can gzhan sems can gyi skye bar gtogs pa gang dag gi rna lam du thos na/_de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje yang gang 
[\[183a.2\]]zhig gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod cing /_nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra bar byed pa de la gza' rnams thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/de'i rigs rgyud kyi 
[\[183a.3\]]dbul ba yang nyams par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/_na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo badzra d+ha rA ya/_na mo pad+ma d+ha rA ya/_na mo ku mA rA ya/_na mo gra hA NAM/_sarbA sha pa ri pU 
[\[183a.4\]]ra kA nA~M/_na mo na k+Sha trA NA~M/_na mo dwA da sha rA shi nA~M/_tad+ya thA/_o~M bud+d+he bud+d+he/_badzre badzre/_pad+me pad+me/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sma ra sma ra/_krI Da ya krI Da ya/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_mAr+d+ha ya mAr+d+ha ya/_g+hA Ta ya g+hA Ta ya/_sarba big+h+nA~M/_ku ru ku ru/_ma ma kAr+yAM/_ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_
[\[183a.5\]]sarba duSh+TAM/_k+ShA pa ya k+ShA pa ya/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_dA ma ya dA ma ya swA hA/_dru tAn dar+sha ya/_At+ma naM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/_sarba satwAMsh+tsa/_sarba gra hA na k+Sha tra/_bi d+h+waM sa ni bar+t+ta ya/_b+ha ga ba ti ma hA mA ye/_pra sA da ya/_sarba duSh+TaM/_sho d+ha ya sarba pA pa~M tsaN+De tsaN+De/_tu ru 
[\[183a.6\]]tu ru/_tsaN+De ni tsaN+De ni/_mu yu mu yu/_mu tsu mu tsu/_ba ha ba ha/_u gre u gra ta me/_pU ra ya me/_ma nor thaM pa ri pU ra ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/_oM swA hA/_hU~M swA hA/_hr-i swA hA/_d+h+ru~M swA hA/_d+h+riM swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_A di t+yA ya swA hA/_sau mA ya swA hA/_
[\[183a.7\]]d+hA ra NI su tA ya swA hA/_bu d+hA ya swA hA/_pr-i haspa ta ye swA hA/_shu krA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na war+N+NA ya swA hA/_rA ha be swA hA/_ke ta be swA hA/_bur+d+hAya swA hA/_badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ku mA rA ya swA hA/_sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba dA da sha rA shi ni b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba u 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/_oM sarba pid+ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]smin drug gi zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te/_gso sbyong blangs nas tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin 
[\[183b.2\]]du mchod cing brjod par byas nas de nas nya la nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de la lo dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skar mda' ltung ba dang /_gza' dang rgyu skar gyis gdungs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skye ba dran 
[\[183b.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gza' rnams kyis de la ci 'dod pa'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas gza' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/'phags ma gza' rnams kyi yum 
[\[183b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgyal blon byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku ring la bsgyur ba las/_dus phyis dge bsnyen grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i dben gnas su rgya dpe la gtugs nas shin tu dag par byas pa'o//_//
[\[183b.5\]{D661}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_gra ha mA tr-i kA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das 'brog 
[\[183b.6\]]gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_bdud dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_mig dmar dang /_pa ba sangs dang /_phur bu dang /_
[\[183b.7\]]gza' lhag dang /_spen pa dang /_sgra gcan 'dzin dang /_mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]rnams dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod pa/_rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gis byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]thabs cig ste/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[184a.2\]]phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[184a.3\]]gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[184a.4\]]dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i spyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[184a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to/_/bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang /_bar du dge ba dang /_tha mar dge ba dang /_don bzang po dang /_
[\[184a.6\]]tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te/_langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/_bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal 
[\[184a.7\]]nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/_snyems pa dang bcas pas skyil mo krung legs par bcas nas/_'khor de dag la 'gying bag tu bltas te/_rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying gar bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzad pa/_
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]mi bzad pa'i gzugs can/_drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/_khro ba khro ba'i gzugs can dag sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa/_tho 'tsham par bgyid pa/_mdangs kyang 'phrog par bgyid cing /_kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/_kha 
[\[184b.2\]]cig ni srog 'phrog par bgyid/_sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni tshe thung ngur bgyid do/_/de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[184b.3\]]bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen bas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir legs 
[\[184b.4\]]par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin tu khro ba dang /_shin tu 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_mchod yon dang /_bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do/_/de dag mchod pas 
[\[184b.5\]]mchod gyur cing /_/gnod pa byas na gnod byed dang /_/gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang /_/ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang /_/lha rnams dang ni lha min dang /_/mi'am ci dang klu dag dang /_/gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang /_/mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin/_/drag po gzi 
[\[184b.6\]]brjid chen po dang /_/khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i/_/gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dang /_/rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye 
[\[184b.7\]]ste/_/gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so/_/de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te/_phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/_bcom 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag 
[\[185a.2\]]rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la bsrung bar 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba dang /_mtshon cha spang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_dug gzhil ba dang /_dug gsad pa dang /_mtshams bcad pa dang /_sa bcing 
[\[185a.3\]]ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang /_gsang sngags bka' stsal to/_/oM mai g+ho lkA ya swA hA/_o~M shi tAM sha be swA hA/_oM ra k+tAM ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/_oM bu d+hA 
[\[185a.4\]]ya swA hA/_oM br-i ha spa ta ye swA hA/_/oM a su rot+ta mA ya swA hA/_o~M kr-iSh+Na bar+N+NA ya swA hA/_oM a mr-i ta pri yA ya swA hA/_oM dz+yo tiSh+ke ta pai swA hA/_lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas grub pa yin te/_kha dog dang mthun par spos kyis 
[\[185a.5\]]dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/_/kham pa'am/_zangs la sogs pa'am/_gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas/_re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes 
[\[185a.6\]]bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o/_/de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbul ba'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje dge slong dang /_dge 
[\[185a.7\]]slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang /_gang dag gi rna lam du grags pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/phyag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]par bya ste/_nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de dang rigs gcig pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do/_/de nas bcom 
[\[185b.2\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i 
[\[185b.3\]]gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gza' khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ta d+ya thA/_bud+d+he bud+d+he/_badzre badzre/_pad+me pad+me/_sa ra sa ra/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_sma ra sma ra/_krI Da ya krI Da ya/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_
[\[185b.4\]]mAr+d+ha ya mAr+d+ha ya/_g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_sarba big+h+nA na/_ku ru ku ru/_ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/_b+hin+da b+hin+da/_k+ShA pa ya k+ShA pa ya/_shAn+te shAn+te/_dAn+te dAn+te/_dA ma ya dA ma ya/_bcom ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol/_bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_sems can 
[\[185b.5\]]thams cad la bsrung du gsol/_bsrung du gsol/_gza' thams cad dang /_rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/_bcom ldan 'das ma rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol/_bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du 
[\[185b.6\]]gsol/_/tsaN+De tsaN+De/_tu ru tu ru/_tsaN+De ni tsaN+De ni/_mu yu mu yu/_mu tsu mu tsu/_ba ha ba ha/_u gre u gra ta me/_pU ra ya me/_ma nor thaM pa ri pU ra ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/_o~M swA hA/_hU~M swA hA/_hrI swA hA/_d+h+ra~M swA hA/_d+h+r-iM swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA swA hA/_
[\[185b.7\]]A di t+yA ya swA hA/_sau mA ya swA hA/_d+hA ra NI su tA ya swA hA/_bud+hA ya swA hA/_br-i haspa ta ye swA hA/_shu krA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na ya swA hA/_rA ha be swA hA/_ke ta be swA hA/_bud+d+ha ya swA hA/_badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/_ku mA rA ya swA hA/_sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/_
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba dwA da sha rA shi ni b+h+yaHswA hA/_sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/_oM sarba bid+ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/_/phyag 
[\[186a.2\]]na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/_tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas zla ba nya'i nyin 
[\[186a.3\]]mtshan thog thag bklags na de dag la lo dgu'i bar 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/gza'i 'jigs pa dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad la mchod pa 
[\[186a.4\]]byas par 'gyur ro/_/gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te/_legs so legs so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to/_gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs 
[\[186a.5\]]so//[ {D662}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ba su d+hA rA nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[186a.6\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das kau shAm+bI na tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nags mchog chen po na/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 
[\[186a.7\]]thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe kau shAm+bI'i grong khyer chen po na/_khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba/_dbang po nye bar zhi ba/_yid nye bar zhi ba/_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_gza' mi mang po dang ldan pa/_dad cing 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]che ru dad pa zhig gnas pa de/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag zla 
[\[186b.2\]]ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag 
[\[186b.3\]]phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /_khyod kyis ji skad dris pa'i dri ba lung bstan pas ngas khyod 
[\[186b.4\]]kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[186b.5\]]rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur zhing /_bro nad kyis thebs na yang bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim 
[\[186b.6\]]bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'dri/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba mang ba dang /_gso ba mang ba dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo mang ba dang /_
[\[186b.7\]]gza' mi mang po dang ldan pa lags te/_de'i slad du gang gis sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_bro nad kyis thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_bang mdzod mang po dang ldan 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_sdug pa dang /_yid du mchi ba dang /_mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang /_dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin bdag mdzod pas mi 'tshal zhing /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_nor dang /_'bru'i mdzod dang /_bang mdzod rnams 
[\[187a.2\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dbul bas ma 'tshal cing 'byor bar 'gyur ba dang /_khyim gyi bu smad dang /_bza' mi rnams brtan par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bcom ldan 
[\[187a.3\]]'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/_bcom 
[\[187a.4\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs 
[\[187a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te/_bzung zhing bcangs bklags/_kun chub par byas/_rjes su yi rang bar byas 
[\[187a.6\]]shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/_rigs kyi bu da yang ngas de bshad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/
[\[187a.7\]]gnod sbyin rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/srin po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/sha za rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/'byung po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]grul bum rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/brjed byed rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/gnon po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/lus srul po rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/lha rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par 
[\[187b.2\]]mi byed do/_/lha ma yin rnams rnam par tho 'tsham par mi byed do/_/zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang /_zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su sha za ba rnams dang /_zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang /_
[\[187b.3\]]zas su zhag za ba rnams dang /_zas su rkang za ba rnams dang /_zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang /_zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang /_zas su dbugs rngub pa dang /_'byung ba za ba'i bar rnams rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs 
[\[187b.4\]]kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/_snying la yod dam/_lag na yod dam/_glegs bam du chud dam/_thos par gyur tam/_kun chub par byas sam/_bklags sam/_bzung ngam/_rjes 
[\[187b.5\]]su yi rang bar byas sam/_gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_dge ba dang /_grub pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur ro/_/su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[187b.6\]]rnams la mchod pa byas te/_nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/_lan gsum mam/_lan bzhi bton na de'i lha yi rangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang /_chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang /_dge 
[\[187b.7\]]'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang /_chos smra ba la dga' ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid 'ongs te/_'bru'i char 'bes so/_/na mo badzra d+ha ra sA ga ra ni r+g+ho ShA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM su rU pe/_b+ha dre/_b+ha dra ba ti/_ang+ga le/_
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]mang+ga le/_mang+ga la ba ti/_a le/_a tsa le/_a tsa la ba le/_ud+g+ha ta ni/_ud b+he da ni/_pa s+ya ba ti/_dA na pa ti/_d+ha n+ya pa ti/_shrI ma ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_nirma le/_ru ru/_su rU be/_su rU pa ma le/_bi ma le/_tsa le/_a tsa na ste/_an 
[\[188a.2\]]na ste/_bin na ste/_bi shwa ke shi/_bi shwa ni shi/_ang+ku re/_mang+ku re/_pra bang+ku re/_bI ra me/_bi d+ha me/_ri ri me/_di di me/_du du me/_kha kha me/_ta ta re/_ta ra ta ra/_tA ra tA ra/_badzre badzre badzre ba me/_Ta ke Ta ke/_Tha ke Tha ke/_ug+ke bug+ke/_Tha ke Tha ra ke/_a 
[\[188a.3\]]brta ni ba ra sha na/_Sha da ni badzra d+hA ra sA ga ra nir+g+ha ShA na/_ta thA ga ta ma nu sma ra/_sma ra sma ra/_sarba ta thA ga ta sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_d+harma sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_sang+g+g+ha sat+ya ma nu sma ra/_da ta da ta/_pU ra pU ra/_pU ra ya pU ra ya/_pU ra Ni/_b+ha ra b+ha ra Ni/_a ma le/_su 
[\[188a.4\]]mang+ga la/_shAn+ta ma ti/_shu b+ha ma ti/_mang+ga la b+ha ni/_ma hA ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_b+ha dra ba ti/_pra b+ha ba ti/_su tsan+d+ra ma ti/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_A ba ra Ni ma nu sma ra swA hA/_pra b+ha ba ma nu sma ra swA hA/_dI dI ma nu smar swA hA/_te dzo ma nu s+a ra 
[\[188a.5\]]swA hA/_bi dza ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_hr-i da ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_sarba satwa bi na ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/_oM ba su d+hA re swA hA/_oM pa su shri ye swA hA/_oM shri ba su swA hA/_oM ba su swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/_gzungs sngags 'di'i 
[\[188a.6\]]mthus mu ge dang /_nad dang /_'chi ngas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/_nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub 
[\[188a.7\]]gcig bton na/_de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim mam/_gzhan gyi khyim mam/_gnas gtsang ma bang mdzod dam/_gnas gang du yang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan+dan gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te/_nub gcig bton na/_rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor bu dang /_'bru dang /_gser dngul dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i tshang tsam gyis 
[\[188b.2\]]gang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod rab tu bsgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di zung zhing /_chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston cig_/gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston cig 
[\[188b.3\]]dang /_de khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/_khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te/_
[\[188b.4\]]rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags/_gzungs su zin lags/_
[\[188b.5\]]bzung lags/_bklags lags/_kun chub par bgyis lags/_rjes su yi rang bar bgyis lags te/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/_/de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i bang mdzo rnams yongs 
[\[188b.6\]]su gang bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[188b.7\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang /_'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas kau shwam+bI'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /_khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas nang du zhugs pa dang /_nor dang /_'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rin po che phun sum 
[\[189a.2\]]tshogs pa dang /_yo byed thams cad kyi mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo /_/de 
[\[189a.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du 'dzin cing /_dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang ba mdzod chen po dang /_bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru 
[\[189a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags/_rkyen gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad cing dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di bzung zhing rab tu bton te/_
[\[189a.5\]]blangs shing /_bklags/_kun chub par byas/_rjes su yi rang bar byas shing /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi gzungs 'di long zhig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/ston 
[\[189a.6\]]cig_/zung shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang /_de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi 
[\[189a.7\]]don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo /_/lan gnyis su bton tam/_lan gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni gnas med do/_/kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no/_/kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[189b.2\]]ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur na glegs bam la yi ger bri ba dang /_yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal te/_gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can dbul po dang /_nad sna 
[\[189b.3\]]tshogs kyis gzir ba dang /_'jigs pa dang /_sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang /_bshad pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rab tu phye ba dang /_bsngags pa dang /_bkrol 
[\[189b.4\]]ba dang /_gsal bar mdzad pa dang /_bskyed pa dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_snyan par brjod pa dang /_go bar mdzad pa dang /_bsnyad pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_
[\[189b.5\]]de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyis/_/rnam par 
[\[189b.6\]]smin pa 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/_/zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/_/chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/_/ye shes pha rol bgrod par phyin gyur pa/_/sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshim 
[\[189b.7\]]zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 
[\[190a.2\]]zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[190a.3\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D663}]de nas bcom ldan 'das nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste/_dang po re 
[\[190a.4\]]zhig dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste/_de nas nu ma'i bar chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug la nyi ma la mngon du phyogs par yongs su brtags la ji snyed gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o/_/bza' ba thams cad 
[\[190a.5\]]spangs te/_nyon mongs shing smra bcad byas te/_nub bdun du bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku yang dbu skra ma gtogs pa gur gum dang /_tsan+dan gyis byug par bya ba ni nub mo snga bar langs te/_chur khru bdun zheng du khru gsum ste/_khru bcu 
[\[190a.6\]]dang bcas pa la tshon sna ma lus pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog ljang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_phyag g.yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog mu tig 
[\[190a.7\]]dang /_rdo rje pha lam dang /_bai DUr+ya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan pa bya'o/_/steng du lha'i bu rin po che'i char mngon du 'bebs bzhin pa bya'o/_/g.yas logs su dpal chen mo pad+ma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas bzhin pa bya'o/_/g.yon logs 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]su pad+ma'i dpal rin po che yis snyim pa gang ba bya'o/_/'og tu sgrub pa po pad+ma'i lag pa can bya'o/_/de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogs su kha bstan la bkram ste/_de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa yang dbul 
[\[190b.2\]]zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la tsan+dan dang a ga ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o/_/zhun mar gyi mar me brgya dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas stan gcig la gnas te bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na/_de nas skya 
[\[190b.3\]]rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang pa gang bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang du zhu gsal brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/zla ba gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te/_mi shes 
[\[190b.4\]]par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing mtshan mo'i phyed na til gyi sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po thob bo/_/yungs kar mar las bsres nas sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po dbang du 
[\[190b.5\]]byed do/_/kun du ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed do/_/kha cig gis sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i gdan can dran par byas na sbyin bdag chen por 'gyur ro/_/yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste/_cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i 
[\[190b.6\]]phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/_zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du thang ka nub phyogs su bstan la dgram zhing /_nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag cing mtshan mo stan gcig la gnas pas nub yal gyis bzlas pa byas na nor 
[\[190b.7\]]gyi phung po chen po rnyed de/_'thor gnod byas kyang 'dzad par mi 'gyur te/_lha khang chen po bya'o/_/cho ga 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na 'khor los sgyur ba thob cing /_bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]dpar 'gyur ro/_/ci ltar de ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang /_nya sha la sogs pa spang zhing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na dbul por mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang /_zla ba bzang po yongs 
[\[191a.2\]]su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so//_//[{D664}]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM ba sud+ha re swA hA/_snying po'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM ba su shrI swA hA/_
[\[191a.3\]]nye ba'i snying po'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM ba su swA hA/_nye ba'i snying po'i yang nye ba'i snying po'o/_/thal mo sbyar te gung mo gnyis dang de nas srin lag gnyis dang /_mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs te/_sdigs mdzub phan tshun gnyis sgrel la/_mthe'u chung gnyis cung zhig 
[\[191a.4\]]bsnol te/_rtse mo gnyis rgyab sprad de khab lta bu byas la/_gung mo sprad pa la mtheb mo zung cig de'i 'og tu sbyar te/_rig pa bcas pa ni rab tu bzung ba'i rtog pa las gsungs pa ste/_las thams cad sgrub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs ni thub pas gsungs 
[\[191a.5\]]pa'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_oM shrI ye shrI ye ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri/_d+ha na ka ri swA hA/_bsgrub par bya ba'i sngags so/_/rig pa 'di'i dang po re shig dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sor mo rnams thal mo sbyar la mtheb chen dbus su bcug pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i dam tshig gi phyag 
[\[191a.6\]]rgya'o/_/oM sa ma ye/_sa me sa ma ya ka ri/_ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/_dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang sngags so/_/phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang sdigs mdzub kyi tshigs gsum pa bskul zhing mtheb chung gnyis cung zad phyir phyung ba ni/_bcom ldan 'das ma'i phyag rgya'o/_/'di ni dbab 
[\[191a.7\]]pa dang /_bsdu ba dang /_bsgrub bya'i sngags kyis bya'o/_/phyag rgya de nyid la sdigs mdzub gnyis brkyang ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya yin te/_oM ba sun d+he swA hA/_me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ba ni bdug spos kyi phyag rgya yin te/_sngags ni/_oM ba su 
[\[191b\]]
