[\[191b.1\]]d+ha ri swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di ni ming med brkyang ba'i phyag rgya yin te/_sngags ni/_oM ba su d+ha ma ti shrI ye swA hA/_phyag rgya 'di nyid la mtheb chung gi sen mo mtheb chen gyis bkab ste/_sor mo gzhan rnams ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya ste/_sngags ni/_
[\[191b.2\]]oM ba su d+hA ri Ni swA hA/_sen mo gan rkyal du byas la mthe bong gnyis logs su sbyar ba ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya ste/_sngags ni/_oM ba sud+hA ri Ni swA hA/_lhag ma nye bar spyod pa nyi shu rtsa ba'i sngags kyi thun mong gi phyag rgya'am/_sngags kyis bsgrub par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[191b.3\]]ma'i thang ka'i cho ga ni nyams pa med cing /_skra'i nyams pa med pa skud pa ma chad pa'i ras zheng du mtho gang gi tshad nyid la ring du mtho do byas te steng du bcom ldan 'das bri/_g.yas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bya/_g.yon du rdo rje 'chang bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[191b.4\]]'og thang ka'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma bri ste/_gser gyi mdog can/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_gos srab mo'i sham kag mnabs pa/_de bzhin du gos srab mo'i stod g.yogs can kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos kyi sham thabs dang ldan pa'o/_/de nas 
[\[191b.5\]]'og phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos gtsang sbra byas gos gtsang ma gyon te/_gso sbyong yan lag brgyad bya'o/_/de'i mdun du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig byas la ji ltar 'byor pas mchod pas cho ga bya'o/_/de nas sgrub po dang ldan 
[\[191b.6\]]pas smyung ba byas te/_zhing gi dbus su thang sku bzhugs su gsol te/_dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/thang ka'i 'og tu lan brgya rtsa gcig gis bsngags byas pa'i bum pa chus yongs su gang ba 
[\[191b.7\]]gzhag par bya'o/_/bum pa'i chus gtor ma btang zhing /_glang bu dang thong 'dzin gnyis la gtor bar bya'o/_/glang bu'i mgul pa dang /_thong 'dzin gyi mgul bar me tog gi phreng ba gdags par bya'o/_/de rnams kyi mdun du sngags pas chu yi rgyun zhing la lan g.yas 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]logs su bskor bar bya ba ni sngags pas mdun du 'gro zhing sngags pa'i steng ni zhing rmor 'gro bar bya'o/_/phyis sa bon 'debs pa'i dus su cho ga 'dis brgyad brgya sngags la sa bon spar ba gang la lan bdun bzlas te zhing la gtor bar bya'o/_/sa bon gdabs 
[\[192a.2\]]pa'i cho ga'o/_/da ni zhing rnga ba'i dus su yang cho ga 'dis bya'o/_/cho ga lhag pa ni 'dir dge slong bzhi la zhing gi mtshams bzhir ci 'dod ston mo byas te/_de nas sngags pas chad pa bdun bzlas pa byed cing rnga ba ni lo tog rtsa ba byas pa'i cho ga'o/_/da ni g.yul 'chag pa bya'i 
[\[192a.3\]]cho ga bshad par bya ste/_g.yul 'chag pa'i dus su sngags pas rang nyid gtsang sbra byas la gos gtsang ma gon la shar du zhal bstan te/_sku gzugs bzhugs su gsol la dri dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_yang na nye bar longs spyod pa'i gtor ma byas la bzlas 
[\[192a.4\]]pa byas te/_'bru'i phung po'i mtshams bzhir gzhon nu ma gsar du bag ma byas shing khyo yod pa'i bud med bzhi la ston mo byas la/_de snyed kyi mthar zad pa med par gnas so/_/de nas skyes bus 'bru 'jal zhing grangs byed pa'i dpral ba la sngags dgod par bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[192a.5\]]ldan 'das ma'i sngags de snyed du smra bcad byas la bzlas pa bya'o/_/ji snyed du sngo la bltas na gnyis 'gyur du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de snyed bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas 'bru'i lhag ma de mi 'jal bar 'chings pa'i mi la sogs pa bos shing sbyin pa'am/_dge 'dun la sbyin par 
[\[192a.6\]]bya'o/_/g.yul 'chag pa'i cho ga'o/_/da ni 'bru bang mdzod du 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/_dang po re zhig mdzod kyi sgo g.yas g.yon du 'byung po gnyis gcer bu gsus pa 'phyang ba/_dbang po 'phyang ba/_g.yon pa'i lag na 'bru'i snod bzung zhing 'bru skyug bzhin 
[\[192a.7\]]pa/_gser gyi mdog_/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gnyis bri bar bya'o/_/mdzod kyi khang par yang dri dang /_byug pa dang /_mchod yon sbyin zhing gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang ka'i mdzod kyi nang du bzhugs par bya'o//
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]de nas 'o ma'i chu rgyun gtor bzhin pa'i sngags pas 'gro bar bya zhing /_de'i rgyab nas de nas bri bar khyim du gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la 'bru'i mdzod khang du phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas mdzod kyi khang pa'i sgo ru dge 'dun gyi ston mo byas la dri dang /_me tog dang /_
[\[192b.2\]]bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do/_/nor rgyun ma'i gzungs rdzogs par bklag par bya'o/_/gtor ma rgya chen po byas la thang ka'i mdun du de nas skyes bus 'bru phyir 'byin par byed de/_bcom ldan 'das ma dang 'dra bar bsam la gur gum gyis gro ga la sngags bris 
[\[192b.3\]]la spyi bor bcings la kha gos kyis bkab la nyi ma re re zhing 'bru phyir dbyung bar bya'o/_/mdzod khang gi sgo ru nyin re nor rgyun ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi mdo bklag par bya'o/_/sngags pas bsgrub bya'i sngags bltas la dus gsum du brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o/_/ji ltar rnyed 
[\[192b.4\]]pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so//[ {D665}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ga Na pa ti hr-i da ya/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[192b.5\]]cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs cig tu 
[\[192b.6\]]bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin na de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzung bas dgos pa 'grub cing gsang sngags thams 
[\[192b.7\]]cad kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_na mo stu te ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/_oM ka Ta ka Ta/_ma Ta ma Ta/_da ra da ra/_bi da ra bi da ra/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_d+hA ba d+hA ba/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_sta~M b+ha sta~M b+ha/_dza~M b+ha dzaM b+ha/_mo ha mo ha/_de hi de hi/_dA pa ya dA pa ya/_d+hA na d+hA n+ya sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ma hA ru dra ba tsa nI ye swA hA/_oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/_oM su ru su ru swA hA/_oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/_oM pA pa shA~M ti ba su puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/_ang+g+gu ta bin+du k+Shu b+hi ta tsit+ta ma hA bi dA raHsamA gats+tsha ti/_ma hA b+ha ya/_ma hA ba la/_ma hA pa ra kra ma/_ma hA ha sti/_ma hA 
[\[193a.2\]]dak+Shi Ni ya pra tsi da ya mi swA hA/_ta d+ya thA/_oM ku ru ku ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_oM gaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaHgaH/_oM na mo na maHswA hA/_kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la 
[\[193a.3\]]zhig tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom zhing gsang sngags sgrub pa/_dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan du 'gro'am/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang /_bdug pas mchod pa byas te/_
[\[193a.4\]]tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na las thams cad 'grub kyis 'di la the tshom ma za shig_/'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_khrag khrug dang /_yul 'khrugs pa thams cad kyi nang du yang dran par byas na thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin gcig bzhin du nang 
[\[193a.5\]]bar langs nas tshig tu bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_thams 
[\[193a.6\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs so//_//
[\[193a.7\]{D666}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA ga na pa ti tan+t+ra nA ma/_bod skad du/_tshogs kyi bdag po chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che/_/phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes/_/gzugs brnyan 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]maN+Dal gru bzhir bzhag_/zla ba drug tu mchod par bya/_/lha yi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_/tshe 'di nyid la skal ba mnyam/_/bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur/_/longs spyod lha dang mnyam pa dang /_/tshe yang ring ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/mi la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur/_/
[\[193b.2\]]lha yi bu yang bran bzhin 'gyur/_/bdag gi bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/_/klu yang de yi bsgo ba nyan/_/bran bzhin las rnams byed par 'gyur/_/lha yi longs spyod mnga' ris las/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ba can/_/
[\[193b.3\]]gdul bya'i dbang gi sku sprul pa/_/lha chen tshogs bdag chen pos bya/_/dngos grub dam pa mchog sgrub na/_/mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing /_/longs spyod yid bzhin 'phel bar byed/_/'jig rten phan mdzad lha yi lha/_/gang gis mchod pa dngos grub 
[\[193b.4\]]yin/_/lha chen tshogs kyi bdag po'i rgyud las dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dag bya ste/_/ba yi lci bas legs par byug_/'jam zhing mnyen la dbus mtho ba'i/_/
[\[193b.5\]]dbus su tshogs bdag sku gzugs bzhugs/_/me tog dkar pos de la gtor/_/bdag nyid gcer bur byung byas te/_/log 'dren gzugs kyis yang dag mchod/_/ba ra ta ka zla ba drug_/nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du/_/gsang sngags brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/_/
[\[193b.6\]]yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs/_/bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/oM ni bkra shis dpal dang ldan/_/gsang sngags mgo la gzhag par bya/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bu yi/_/dngos grub ster byed yi ge yang /_/de 'og gral la gzhag par bya/_/nyi ma 
[\[193b.7\]]lta bu'i yi ge yang /_/de yi rjes la bklag par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/_/yi ge mchog ni blang bar bya/_/gsal byed yi ge dang po yang /_/de yi mjug tu brjod par bya/_/rin chen yi ge swA zhes bya/_/las kyi yi ge hA zhes bya/_/dngos grub 'dod 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]pas gsang sngags bzlas/_/lha chen dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las lha'i dngos grub kyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis po'o//_//de nas tshogs kyi bdag po bshad/_/tshogs kyi bdag po sku mdog dkar/_/glang po che yi mgo bo can/_/
[\[194a.2\]]mche ba ya gcig chag pa dang /_/phyag g.yas la phug bsnams pa/_byi ba'i gdan la bcibs pa/_rin po ches sku brgyan pa/_zla ba tshes pas dbu brgyan pa/_'od gsal ba/_'od zer 'phro ba/_mdog bzang ba/_kha dog bzang ba/_gsus pa che ba/_rgyan gyis 
[\[194a.3\]]spud pa'o/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud las tshogs kyi bdag po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par me tog dkar po blangs te/_tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs bris te/_kha dog dkar po glang po che'i dbu can/_phyag g.yas 
[\[194a.4\]]na la phug bsnams pa/_g.yon na rin po che'i nor bu bsnams pa/_gsus pa che ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_zla ba dang byi ba'i khri la bzhugs pa mkhas pas bya'o/_/de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bdag la zhal phyogs par bzhag la/_bdag nyid log 
[\[194a.5\]]'dren gyi gzugs kyis yang dag par mchod do/_/tshogs kyi bdag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su tshogs kyi bdag po dkar po glang po che'i mgo can/_byi ba la zhon pa/_mig gsum pa/_zla ba phyed pa 
[\[194a.6\]]'dzin pa/_g.yas na la phug dang dgra sta 'dzin pa/_g.yon pa tri shUl dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o/_/lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang la mdzub mo bkug la gung mo'i tshigs su bzung bar bya ba ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o/_/tshogs 
[\[194a.7\]]kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas gsang sngags bstan pa ni/_/oM ni dpal ldan mgo la bzhag_/de nas yid bzhin nor bu ni/_/rin po che yi yi ge bri/_/sde tshan gsal byed dang po yang /_/de yi rjes su bri bar bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]mtshan dang po/_/dbyangs yig brgyad pas mdzes par bya/_/gsal byed dang po'i yi ge yang /_/blo yis blangs te yid kyis bri/_/sde tshan gsum pas gsum pa la/_/dang po'i bzhi pa sbyar bar bya/_/sde tshan bdun pa'i gsum pa la/_/gsum pa'i dang pos 
[\[194b.2\]]'og tu sbyar/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa zla la bzhag_/dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan par bya/_/bzhi pa'i gsum pas de nas brjod/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa'i yi ge ni/_/de yi rjes la bri bar bya/_/gsang sngags drag po'i yi ge yang /_/
[\[194b.3\]]kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya/_/gsang sngags 'di yi dngos grub ni/_/'jig rten dbang phyug nyid kyis byin/_/dgos pa thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u sta drug pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang gsungs 
[\[194b.4\]]pa ni/_/dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi/_/mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba'i/_/dngos grub bsgrub pa'i snying po ni/_/dpal dang yaM gi yi ge ste/_/oM zhes bya ba mgo la bzhag_/yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge las/_/nyi ma'i yi ge 'og tu spras/_/dbyangs 
[\[194b.5\]]yig drug pa'i 'og tu sbyar/_/thig le nA das brgyan par bya/_/mtshan gyi dang po'i yi ge ni/_/de yi rjes la brjod par bya/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas sbyar/_/lnga pa'i dang po bri bar bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/_/'byung ba rlung gi yi ge yang /_/dbyangs 
[\[194b.6\]]yig brgyad pas brgyan pa ni/_/de yi rjes la bri bar bya/_/zhi ba'i yig 'bru gnyis pa yang /_/kun gyi mthar ni brjod par bya/_/mtshan gyi gsang sngags zhes bya ba/_/'dod pa thams cad grub byed yin/_/mtshan gyi gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun 
[\[194b.7\]]pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni/_/me tog dkar po'i rtsa ba blang /_/tsan+dan dkar po dag las ni/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs ni/_/mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya/_/gsus pa chel phyag bzhi pa/_/mkhas 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]pas byas te legs par bya/_/rin po che yi snod du gzhug_/dkar chen mngon par gsal ba'i tshe/_/nang gi cha ris sku khrus gsol/_/gsal zhing dang sa la yid du 'ong /_/dri dang ldan pa'i bum pa yi/_/me tog dkar po'i dri yi ni/_/'dag 
[\[195a.2\]]chal ldan pas khrus bya'o/_/de nas de ma thag tu ni/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su spyan drangs la/_/me tog dkar po dbul bar bya/_/la phug la dur bcas pa yi/_/gtor ma chen po'ang de nas dbul/_/spos dang dri dang mar me dang /_/lha bshos dag gis mchod 
[\[195a.3\]]par bya/_/gsang sngags 'di la phug dang /_/la du dang /_chu dang /_dkar gsum gyi gtor mas tshogs kyi bdag po la phul te/_spos dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/_de ltar byas na phyis bgegs byed par mi nus so/_/tshogs kyi bdag po mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad 
[\[195a.4\]]pa'o//_//de nas la phug ces bya ba/_/ro brgyad ldan pa'i yungs ma ste/_/zas rnams kun gyi mchog kyang yin/_/ro mchog brgyad dang ldan pa yin/_/kha dang skyur dang bska ba dang /_/mngar dang tsha dang lan tshwa'i ro/_/bzhun dang bro mchog che ba yin/_/nad sna 
[\[195a.5\]]brgyad kyi gnyen po yin/_/mkhris pa bad kan 'dus pa dang /_/khrag dang chu ser ma zhu ba/_/rlung dang rims nad kun la phan/_/'di 'dra byung ba'i kha zas med/_/lha rnams kun gyi mchu yang 'gul/_/dngos grub 'grub pa'i zhal zas yin/_/tshogs kyi 
[\[195a.6\]]bdag po mchod par bya/_/la du zhes bya'i zhal zas ni/_/mngar gsum 'bras bu gsum pa ni/_/de bzhin zhim pa'i spos kyis bran/_/bag zan gyi ni ril bu bya/_/'o ma mar du btsos byas la/_/tshogs pa'i gtor ma chen po bya/_/mar dang khur ba mngar gsum 
[\[195a.7\]]dang /_/mthun pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs kyis/_/tshogs bdag chen po mchod par bya/_/de ltar tshogs kyi bdag po la'o/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhugs la/_sems gzhan du ma yengs par bzlas brjod 'bum byas 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]la/_la phug la sngags kyis btab ste tshogs kyi bdag po mchod na tshe 'di nyid la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang bsod nams mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/me tog dkar pos mchod na rgyal po la sogs pas pham par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po la sogs pa sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[195b.2\]]rgyal po dang blon po la sogs pa bdag gi dbang du 'dus par 'gyur ro/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i zhal zas bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas cho ga bshad par bya/_/dngul zhes bya ba'i rin chen la/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i gzugs byas te/_/yid bzhin 
[\[195b.3\]]nor bu lag na thogs/_/dkyil 'khor chen po khru gang tshad/_/rin chen me tog dkar po dgram/_/gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas byas pas/_/nad dang sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur/_/shel dang dung las chogs bdag sku/_/mkhas pas ji ltar 'byor par bya/_/sdug 
[\[195b.4\]]bsngal thams cad sel bar 'gyur/_/rin chen shel las tshogs bdag sku/_/mthe bong gi ni tshad tsam bya/_/se na pra zhes bya ba'i sngags/_/rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas te/_/shel gyi sku de khrus byas nas/_/skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par ni/_/bdag nyid shar du kha bltas 
[\[195b.5\]]nas/_/gos dkar gyon te khrus byas la/_/thal sbyar yid kyis gsol ba gdab/_/bdag la gnod pa'i bgegs gang yin/_/shel gyi sku de me long steng /_/mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu bzhugs/_/bdag nyid khrus byas shar du blta/_/dza ra pa dang rkun ma ni/_/gang 
[\[195b.6\]]yin me long nang du 'byung /_/de tshe de yi ngos zin 'gyur/_/tshogs bdag shel gyi sku de ni/_/mchod pa rab gsal legs byas la/_/nA ga ku ru zhes bya ba'i/_/rig pa 'bum du bzlas byas na/_/nad dang sdug bsngal gyis nyen la/_/sku de bstan pa tsam gyis 
[\[195b.7\]]ni/_/nad rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal las kyang thar bar 'gyur/_/zhi ba chen po'i cho ga yin/_/rin chen gser zhes bya ba la/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i sku byas te/_/rgyal gyi nyin par mig phye nas/_/mchod pa rab tu gnas pa bya/_/ba 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]ra zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni/_/'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yis/_/sku gzugs bzhugs pa'i khyim der ni/_/nor rnams thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gser gyi tshogs bdag mthong ba yis/_/bgegs rnams thams cad nor 'bul 
[\[196a.2\]]'gyur/_/bgegs kyis gnod pa mi nus te/_/rgyal po bzhin du mchod par 'gyur/_/gser gyi tshogs bdag gnas pa yi/_/sa phyogs rin chen char pa 'bebs/_/gser gyi tshogs kyi bdag po la/_/bgegs kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis/_/nor rnams 
[\[196a.3\]]thams cad 'bul ba yin/_/bdag nyid phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku gzugs mchog_/byas pa'i yon tan rnams la ni/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyis gter kha 'byed/_/skye ba 'di dang phyi ma la/_/rtag tu yo byad 'phel bar 'gyur/_/
[\[196a.4\]]nor gyi bdag po rnam thos bus/_/rgyal po bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed/_/de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag gi/_/sku gzugs dkyil 'khor gru bzhir gzhag_/b+ha ga zhes bya'i gsang sngags ni/_/bzlas pa 'bum du byas pa yis/_/tshe de nyid la dngos grub 
[\[196a.5\]]ni/_/ci 'dod pa ni sbyin par mdzad/_/lha yi rgyal po'i mnga' thang ni/_/sgrub pa po la stsol bar mdzad/_/shin tu thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas/_/dpal ldan tshogs bdag thugs rje can/_/thugs rje'i phung pos dbul ba skyob/_/nor lha chen po'i bdag nyid 
[\[196a.6\]]'di/_/dar ram ras la legs bris te/_/rgyal gyi nyin par spyan phye nas/_/gang gi khyim du bzhugs pa de'i/_/sa phyogs de ni bkra shis 'gyur/_/zangs la tshogs bdag chen po'i sku/_/mkhas pas legs par bzo byas te/_/tsan+dan dmar pos byugs 
[\[196a.7\]]pa'i sar/_/maN+Dal steng du legs par bzhag_/ban+du ka yi me tog dang /_/pad+ma rA ga rin chen dang /_/me tog dmar po kun gyis mchod/_/braM zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bzlas/_/rgyal po'i bu mo dbang du 'gyur/_/lha yi bu mo klu mo dang /_/mi'am ci yi bu mo dang /_/
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]bram ze'i bu mo mtshan ldan mo/_/mchog tu gzugs bzang gus par 'gyur/_/bran mo bzhin du bsgo ba nyan/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog_/sku gzugs dag la brten te 'grub/_/mchod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin/_/gzhan yang tshogs bdag chen po'i 
[\[196b.2\]]sku/_/rin po che yi rgyu las byas/_/dkyil 'khor steng du bzhugs byas te/_/rat+na sid+d+hi zhes bya ba'i/_/rig pa 'bum du bzlas par bya/_/sa 'og gter rnams ston par 'gyur/_/ci dga' bar yang spyod par 'gyur/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i rgyud las rgyal po la 
[\[196b.3\]]sogs pa sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas dpal ldan tshogs bdag che/_/drag po chen po drag shul can/_/sangs rgyas thugs la byol song dbu/_/glang chen gzhon nus zhal brgyan pa/_/spyan gsum mche ba bzhi dang ldan/_/phyag bzhi zhabs bzhi 
[\[196b.4\]]klu chen ldan/_/dang po mche ba dkar po 'dzin/_/de 'og zhags pa g.yon pa na/_/dgra sta kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin/_/mthing ga gsus pa che ba'o/_/de lta bu yi tshogs bdag sku/_/khar ba khro chu dag la bya/_/rgyal gyi nyin par rab tu gnas/_/de nas bsgom zhing 
[\[196b.5\]]bsgrub pa ni/_/dkyil 'khor bya ba'i sa brtag pa/_/le'u tshe dgu pa'i dkyil 'khor bri/_/sgo dang sgo khyud ldan par bya/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/_/tshogs bdag chen pos bsgrub bya mnan/_/zla ba'i gdan la yum dang ni/_/gnyis su med pa dgod par bya/_/
[\[196b.6\]]de'i ming artsi ka ri ste/_/rdo rje phag gdong ma zhes bya/_/dgra sta ban+da lag na thogs/_/khrag gis bkang ba gtso la stobs/_/shar gyi le'u tshe ser po la/_khams gsum gyi bdag po la phug dang gri 'dzin pa'o/_/lho phyogs kyi le'u tshe sngon po la/_gnod 
[\[196b.7\]]sbyin chen po rdo rje mchu/_ma he de ba'i gdong can dbyug to dang tho ba 'dzin pa nag po'o/_/nub phyogs kyi le'u tshe dmar po la/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po sprin gyi bdag ces bya ba dmar po chus gang ba'i sprin phung dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/_/byang phyogs kyi le'u tshe ljang 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]gu la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po nor gnas zhes bya ba ljang gu dbyug tho dang rin po che'i kha T+wA~M ga thogs pa'o/_/byang shar gyi le'u tshe dkar po la bgegs kyi rgyal po byi na ya ka glang po'i gdong mdung rtse gsum pa dang la phug thogs pa nag po'o/_/shar lho'i le'u 
[\[197a.2\]]tshe dmar po la [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi bdag po drag po zhes bya ba dgra sta dang /_thod pa'i ril po thogs pa nag po'o/_/lho nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la sprin gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba sprin phung dang glog gi 'od du bcas pa lag gnyis kyis thogs pa'o/_/byang nub kyi le'u tshe nag po la bgegs 
[\[197a.3\]]kyi rgyal po log 'dren sna yon zhes bya ba glang po che'i sna tsan rtse gsum dang thod pa skam po'i nang du la phug dang shas bkang ba thogs pa'o/_/lha rnams la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bka' nyan pa ni klu'i rgyal po a ba la dang /_ba ru Na dang /_dung skyong dang /_'jog po dang /_
[\[197a.4\]]rigs ldan dang /_mtha' yas dang /_pad+ma dang /_pad+ma chen po rnams so/_/shar gyi sgor rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung /_lho sgor 'phags skyes po/_/nub sgor spyan mi bzang /_byang sgor rnam thos sras rnams sku mdog dkar ba dang /_sngo ba dang /_dmar 
[\[197a.5\]]ba dang /_ljang gur shes par bya'o/_/lag na nor bu rin po che re re ral gri re re'o/_/'di rnams kyi chung ma ni mi bri'o/_/'di ltar bris pa'i byang shar du gsad pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum la/_de'i nang du dgra bo'i gzugs sbra tshil las byas pa rid pa/_
[\[197a.6\]]gnag pa/_skra zeng ba/_til mar gyis byugs te/_snying gar ming rus bris la gzhug go/_/de'i sker ro skra las byas pa'i thag pa gdags so/_/de ltar byas nas gnod sbyin chen po brgyad la/_la du dang /_la phug dang bcas pa'i gtor ma dang /_gnod sbyin chen po 
[\[197a.7\]]brgyad la nya sha dang sgog btsong du sbyar ba'i dmar gyi gtor ma re re bsham/_klu chen po brgyad la gtor ma che ba gcig dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la re re bya/_gal te ma 'byor na che ba gcig bya/_lha bshos re re dbul bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang drag po'i rdzas 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]spyang ki'i thod pa dang /_zi ra nag po dang /_ske tshe dang /_yungs kar dang /_yungs nag gzhag par bya'o/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya/_/bsgom pa'i rim pa 'di lta bu/_/ma 
[\[197b.2\]]byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/_/shin tu gsang ste bsgrub par bya/_/ya yi rang bzhin stong pa las/_/snang ba rang bzhin hU~M dang ni/_/ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon 'byung /_/ming gi sngags las rab tu bskyed/_/khro bo'i sprul pas stong gsum bkang /_/
[\[197b.3\]]'od bsdus thog ma'i hUM la 'dus/_/tshogs kyi bdag po chen po de/_/'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pa ni/_/khro bo chen po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/yum dang 'khor yang rdzogs par bskyed/_/phuHbrgyad klu brgyad sems dpa'i tshul/_/rgyal po de bzhin khro 
[\[197b.4\]]bo'i tshul/_/yi ge b+hai dang ming las bskyed/_/'od zer tshul gyis spyan drangs la/_/dzaHdang dzaHyi 'phro 'du dang /_/hU~M dang hUM gi gsang sngags dang /_/lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs la/_/nus pa'i mthu dang ldan par bya/_/mchod dang gtor ma bstab 
[\[197b.5\]]par bya/_/ba liM gr-ih+Na kha yi sngags/_/snying po dag dang spel bar bya/_/bsgom pa'i rim pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas gsang sngags rgyal po ni/_/dbyangs yig gsal byed dag la btu/_/dang po bzhi pa de rjes bri/_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa gral la 
[\[197b.6\]]bzhag_/yid bzhin nor bu yi ge dang /_de yi rjes su bsam par bya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang po/_/de yi rjes su brjod par bya/_/de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan/_/dgug pa'i yi ge dag dang ni/_/'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la/_/
[\[197b.7\]]dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar ba yis/_/rgyal ba'i rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i yi ge la/_/dbyangs yig gnyis pa sbyar bar bya/_/nyi ma yi ni yi ge dang /_/bzhi pa'i lnga pa de nas bri/_/de la dbyangs yig brgyad pas brgyan/_/gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'i 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]yi ge la/_/dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya/_/lnga pa'i bzhi pa'i yi ge la/_/gsum pa'i lnga pa sbyar bar bya/_/bzhi pa'i dang po'i yi ge las/_/dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya/_/'byung ba rlung gi yi ge la/_/de yi 'og tu sbyar 
[\[198a.2\]]bar bya/_/rin po che yi yi ge dang /_/las kyi yi ge mtha' mar brjod/_/tshogs bdag chen po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/_/'dod pa thams cad sgrub byed yin/_/gnod sbyin brgyad kyis gsang sngags ni/_/ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa/_/ya ya zhes bya la sogs 
[\[198a.3\]]dang /_/ba~M zhes bya ba la sogs dang /_/bi na ya ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_b+hai ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_/hU~M zhes bya ba dang /_tri zhes bya ba ste brgyad la hUM dang phaT kyis mtha' brten pas srog gi snying po'o/_/klu yi sngags ni ming las bskyed/_/o~M dang 
[\[198a.4\]]hU~M phaT ldan par bya/_/rgyal po chen po'i gsang sngags ni/_/b+hai zhes bya ba dang /_b+hi zhes bya ba dang /_b+ha zhes bya ba'i sngags su 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyi gsang sngags 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//bsgrub bya dgug pa'i sngags 
[\[198a.5\]]ni/_/ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la/_/ma dang hA dang b+hai ra b+he/_/tri dang rA dang tsa dag gis/_/sha trU~M nr-i dza ni dza zhes/_/lan grangs mang du bzlas par bya'o/_/gnod sbyin brgyad kyi gsang sngags kyis/_/dgra bo'i bla rdo blang bar bya/_/de nas bla rdo bsreg par bya/_/de nas bla rdo mnan 
[\[198a.6\]]par bya/_/sbad pa'i gsang sngags rgyal po ni/_/ya dang k+Sha dang ka dang la/_/ma dang hA dang b+he ra b+he/_/de ba yak+Sha ya ma dang /_nA ga nA ga thum ril yang /_/che ge dgra bo thum ril ya/_/ya ya zhes kyang bskul bar bya/_/de nas bsad pa'i gsang sngags ni/_/ma 
[\[198a.7\]]dang hA dang b+he ra b+he/_/yak+Sha la sogs gong dang mthun/_/de rjes 'di skad brjod par bya/_/nA sha ya na lan gnyis so/_/sha ya tsUr na tsU ra ya/_/nA ga ya ka tra mA ra ya/_/ha na tsa kra rim pa gnyis/_/bi na ya ga dza b+hin+d+hi/_/tan+ta ka ra de nas brjod/_/che ge 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mo mA ra ya zhes pa/_/hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_drag pos bsad pa sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang ni drag po'i sngags/_/oM b+hi g+hA b+hi ba b+h+yi sarba bid+yA bi sha ya hr-i da mi ta ya/_hU~M tsi tu ba tu/_tra~M pra ma ru tA ya/_ha na ha na/_gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/_pa tsa pa tsa/_b+h+rah+ma b+h+rah+ma/_
[\[198b.2\]]b+h+rah+ma ya b+h+rah+ma ya/_hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/_khar pa'am yang na zangs dag la/_/log 'dren chen po'i gzugs byas la/_/de la rab gnas mchod pa bya/_/dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan 'og tu gzhug_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i stan du bya/_/dgra de 'chi bar the tshom med/_/yang ni 
[\[198b.3\]]sbyor ba'i las rnams ni/_/dgos pa chen po 'di gsungs so/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku tsan+dan nam rin po che las byas te/_rab gnas byas la mchod pa phul te/_/ser ba gcod par 'dod na ser ba'i bdag po rlung lha dang chu lha'i gzugs byas te/_sprin gyi 
[\[198b.4\]]gzugs dang /_'brug gi gzugs byas la tshogs kyi bdag po'i gdan du mnan par bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang mnan par bsams te/_hi ka tsan+d+ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bzlas na ser ba chod par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar yang phyogs su 
[\[198b.5\]]gtor bar bya'o/_/ser ba 'bebs par 'dod na/_chu dang sprin gyi maN+Dal mngon par bris te/_tshogs bdag chen po 'brug la zhon par bsgoms te/_bdag gi bka' nyan par bsam/_gsang ba'i rdzas su bya ba la/_lcags phye gser phye zangs phye rnams/_
[\[198b.6\]]gnam chu 'bras kyi phye sbrus te/_ser ba ci tsam 'dod pa'i dbyibs che chung byas la khrag gis byugs la bdun dang bdun phrag mang du byas te/_ka ka ki ku'i thod pa'i nang du blugs te/_sprin gyis dgab par bya'o/_/ka ka'i thod pa la sngags bri bar bya'o/_/rim 
[\[198b.7\]]pa gsum mo/_/rten gyi rdzas kyang gzhag par bya'o/_/bru~M bru~M b+ha ri sha ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa dang /_ka ka'i thod pa'i nang du ser ba dngos su gsum mam bdun nam brgyad byung ba dang /_dgra'i yul du bskyal te sngags 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bzlog nas bzlas pas 'bab bo/_/gal te ma babs na tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku dbu thur la bstan/_zhabs gyen la bstan pa dgra bo'i yul gyi dbus su sba'o/_/mod la ser ba 'bab ste/_bya ka lan+da ka'i sgo nga tsam dang /_dbyibs dmar po 
[\[199a.2\]]sha ba'i rlig 'bras tsam pa yun ring por 'bab bo/_/lo tog 'joms pa'i sngags ni bru~M zhes pas bya'o/_/de gcod par 'dod na ni sku dang ka ki ma phyung ba la nyi ma re rer 'bab pas dbyung bar bya'o/_/tshogs kyi bdag po'i sku la mchod pa 'bul bar bya'o/_/
[\[199a.3\]]gsang sngags kyang dbu zhabs ma nor bar rin po che'i phreng ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/sku khrus gsol ba bdag gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog_/tshogs kyi bdag pos byed pa yin/_/
[\[199a.4\]]phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag dgyes/_/phyag 'tshal dpal ldan tshogs bdag che/_/phyag 'tshal dpal ldan zhi khro che/_/dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las tshogs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//tshogs kyi bdag po'i 
[\[199a.5\]]rgyud dngos grub 'byung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrIdz+nyA nas/_'jig rten dngos grub ched du ni/_/rgya gar yul nas bsnams nas byon/_/rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas gtad pa yin/_/rgyud 'di bsam pa 'grub pa yin//_//
[\[199a.6\]{D667}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI ma hA kA la tan+t+ra/_bod skad du/_dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud/_dbang gi rta mchog sku la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_shar lho'i dur khrod chen po ha ha drag tu rgod pa'i gnas shing tsan+dan gyi 
[\[199a.7\]]nags tshal rab tu dga' ba'i ming zhes bya ba mi ma yin pho mo mang po 'dus pa'i pho brang du/_dpal nag po chen po zhes bya ba bi nA ya ka la sogs te/_de'i tshe 'khor gdug pa can rnams kyi dbus na/_skye 'gro sems can rnams kyi srog dbugs la dbang byed pa'i 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]nag po chen po zhes bya ba cig yod de/_de'i tshe de'i dus na nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/_mthar byed rta'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor te/_dregs pa can 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[199b.2\]]nas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcas nas/_oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M ba~M zhes brjod pas dur khrod ha ha drag tu rgod pa'i gnas nag po chen po/_rang dbang med par mthar byed rta'i rgyal po'i mngon du byung ste las ci bya zer zhing rang rtags srog gi snying po 'di 
[\[199b.3\]]mdongs gsol du phul ba/_o~M badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+na na bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT ces phul lo/_/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas rgyal po mig mi bzang gis mthar byed rta'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[199b.4\]]to/_/e ma pad+ma khros pa'i bdag_/nag po chen po drag shul can/_/gsang ba'i sgrub pa bshad du gsol/_/mgon po sgrub par bya ba gang /_/bsad cing lus srog dbye ba dang /_/ma grub shi sa bstan pa dang /_/mgon po'i rtags dang ser ba rnams/_/rta 
[\[199b.5\]]mchog chen pos bdag la stsol/_/zhes zhus pas/_de nas pad+ma khros pa yis/_nag po'i sgrub thabs ched du brjod/_/dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung slad du/_/gza' skar tshes grangs shis pa la/_/dur khrod la sogs 
[\[199b.6\]]shing gcig tu/_/bsod nams tshogs ni bsags byas la/_/nag po chen po bsgrub par bya/_/phungs 'am sa nag dag la ni/_/stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas ni/_/dri spos khrag gis chag chag bya/_/dbus su gru gsum zla gam ldan/_/phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad 
[\[199b.7\]]bri/_/de dbus thod chen nang du ni/_/sha lnga snying snas brgyan pa yis/_/gtor ma bshos bu khru gang tshad/_/de la mda' gzugs dmar nag dar/_/gri snying tsa ka li yang gzugs/_/de nyid mgon po'i rten du bzhag_/Da ma ru yi pags pa'i nang /_/mgon po'i 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]srog sngags bri bar bya/_/ldo yi nang du bla rdos dril/_/spos dang rgyun gtor gtang bar bya/_/dkon mchog spyi la mchod pa bsham/_/de nas pad+mar bdag bsgoms la/_/thugs ka'i hrIHlas 'od 'phros pas/_/bla ma sangs rgyas la sogs pa/_/
[\[200a.2\]]rang gi mdun du bsam byas la/_/mchod pa rnam lnga dbul bar bya/_/rnam dag bdun gyi 'og tu ni/_/tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya/_/btang snyoms la sogs pa~M ra~M tri/_/pad stengs yi ge hUM las ni/_/nag po zhal gcig phyag drug pa/_/gri gug phreng ba DA ma ru/_/
[\[200a.3\]]thod pa mdung dang zhags pa bsnams/_/g.yas g.yon rim pas bsnams pa'o/_/sbrul dang rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan/_/sku smad ba ti khra bo gsol/_/stag lpags zhing gi sham thabs can/_/gtum po spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs/_/dpral bar 
[\[200a.4\]]dri yi thig les brgyan/_/spyi gtsug mi bskyod sprul sku brtan/_/de ltar bdag mdun gsal bsgoms nas/_/spyan drangs mchod dang bzlas pa bya/_/gtor ma pU dza la sogs pas/_/nag po che la sbyin par bya/_/mgon po'i thugs ka'i hU~M las ni/_/srog gi yi 
[\[200a.5\]]ges g.yas nas bskor/_/khor yug dag gis bzlas par bya/_/oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT/_de skad ces ni rab brjod pas/_/nag po grub pa'i rtags rnams 'byung /_/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i le'u 
[\[200a.6\]]ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa bshig pa dang /_/rnal 'byor bar chad byed pa rnams/_/nag po chen pos bsgral 'dod na/_/stegs bu gru bzhi byas nas kyang /_/drag po e yi nang du ni/_/pho mo rabs chad 
[\[200a.7\]]thod pa'i nang /_/gzugs ni spra tshil dag la bya/_/ming rus dag ni bkod nas kyang /_/bsad dang na ba skabs dang sbyar/_/mgon po'i sku dang dam rdzas rnams/_/kha dang kha la dgod par bya/_/phag thod nang du thun rdzas blugs/_/rta gtor rgyun gtor 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]g.yas dang g.yon/_/gsang sngags 'di yis gsad par bya/_/oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra ya big+h+nA na bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT/_oM ma hA kA la ya shA sa na u pa ka ri Ni e Sha a baSh+tsi ma kA lo a yang i da~M rat+na tra yA ya a pa kA ri Na~M ya di pra ti dz+nyA smar si ta dA i da~M duSh+Tan 
[\[200b.2\]]kha kha khA hi khA hi/_mA ra mA ra/_g+h+r-ih+Na g+h+r-ih+Na/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_di na me ke na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/_hUM bi nA ya ka pi las tra~M bi tri hU~M dza si ma bu bi nA ya ka a mu ka bri srog hur thum dza mA ra ya rbad/_drag sngags bzlas shing thun gyis 
[\[200b.3\]]brab/_/zhag bdun bar du smra mi bya/_/de la rtags rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/_/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las lus srog dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/las mtha' sbyin sreg dag gis brtul/_/gru gsum 
[\[200b.4\]]dbus su gdug pa'i shing /_/dbus su nag po 'khor bcas bskyed/_/ling ga gtor ma dam rdzas rnams/_/nag po'i zhal du dbul bar bya/_/sngags 'di bzlas shing bsreg par bya/_/ag+ne dz+wa la ra~M las rdzogs/_/thal ba rlung dmar dag la bskur/_/
[\[200b.5\]]a mu ka ni myur du rlog_/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las mtha' brtul ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/de ltar bsgrubs kyang ma grub na/_/gcig dang gnyis la nan tan bskyed/_/de ltar byas kyang ma grub na/_/sa gsum 
[\[200b.6\]]khrag gsum dug gsum la/_/khru gang pa yi gzugs kyi tshad/_/gru gsum dbus su nag po'i gzugs/_/spyi tshar dag tu lding du gzhug_/bris sku dam rdzas bla rdo rnams/_/rang gi gru gsum mal gyi 'og_/dug dang tsher mas steng nas dgab/_/
[\[200b.7\]]thun rdzas brab cing sngags 'di bzlas/_/o~M badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hU~M hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/_phaT hU~M hU~M ka ya nA bi nAn g+ha bi tra k+She k+ShiM la kA hA ma badzra oM/_de skad brjod cing thun gyis brab/_/de la rtags rnams rdzogs pa dang /_/de nas gso ba'i cho ga bya/_/bris sku 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bla rdo dam rdzas rnams/_/spos chus bkru zhing sngags 'di bzlas/_/oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nAn bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT sos sos swA hA/_de skad byas la gnas su ni/_/mgon po'i gzugs kyang spos chus bkru/_/gru gsum dbus su blangs 
[\[201a.2\]]byas la/_/dgra bo'i ming rus snying gar gzhug_/zhag bdun bsgrubs la dgra la bskyal/_/a mu ka ni myur du brlag_/dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las ma grub na spogs pa'i cho ga dang gso ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/
[\[201a.3\]]bya nag 'phur zhing lding ba dang /_/mon pa a tsa ra dang ni/_/dge bshes ban+de slob dpon dang /_/'od dang sgra dang khang pa 'tsheg_/mgon po'i sku dag dngos su mthong /_/dgra la dmag drangs sems can bsad/_/mi nag bdag la snying stobs dang /_/
[\[201a.4\]]mdze po dang ni sprang po dang /_/bya nag thang la lhung ba 'byung /_/dpal mgon po nag po nag po'i rgyud las rtags kyi rim pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/ser ba dbab pa'i las bya na/_/mon nam mdze can thod pa ru/_/
[\[201a.5\]]'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris nas kyang /_/rigs lnga klu yi sa bon dgod/_/rtsibs chen ser srung ming rus dang /_/yul du phob cis bya ba bris/_/de mthar 'khor lo rtsibs dgu la/_/dregs pa'i sngags dag bri bar bya/_/rgyab tu gang yin yul ming dang /_/rlung 
[\[201a.6\]]gi snying po bri bar bya/_/bdag nyid pad+ma khros par bsgom/_/gsang sngags 'di yis gnad la bor/_/oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+She tra big+h+nA~M bi nA ya ka hU~M hU~M phaT/_nA ga snying gzir/_phu hur thum dza khro shar hril b+h+yo/_/de skad ces ni rab brjod la/_/yungs kar 
[\[201a.7\]]yungs nag ske tshe dang /_/khrag dang dug gis thod par brab/_/lo 'bras rlung khyer rtags byung na/_/dgra yi yul du dbab par bya/_/gal te 'jig rten phung ba'o/_/dpal mgon po nag po'i rgyud las ser ba dbab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa/_/e ma 'khor 'dus ngo mtshar can/_/ma 'ongs dam can sgrub byed na/_/dam tshig la gnas sdom pa gzung /_/gtor ma dag la brtson par bya/_/dam rdzas bla rdo lus la bsrel/_/zhes gsungs pas rgyal po mig 
[\[201b.2\]]mi bzang la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams yi rangs nas/_nag po chen pos bstan pa srung bar khas blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to/_/dpal nag po chen po'i rgyud las le'u brgyad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang /_bod kyi 
[\[201b.3\]]lo ts+tsha ba phur bu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D668}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_/shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[201b.4\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[201b.5\]]la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po tshogs kyi bdag po ma hA kA la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang skur ba dpal mgon po nag po chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad 
[\[201b.6\]]ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/_/oM shrI ma hA kA la ga Na gu ti swA hA/_na maHshrI ma hA kA la ga Ne gu ti shA ya/_na mo yo gi na NI na/_tad+ya thA/_oM hi li hi le/_ki te ki te ni/_tsi de tsi de ni swA hA/_'di bton 
[\[201b.7\]]pas nad thams cad dang /_rims thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_mi ngas thams cad dang /_'byung po thams cad dang /_nyes par bgoms pa thams cad dang /_nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo /_/
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo /_/thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo /_/gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/_dug gsum nad kyi sman pa/_rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing /_
[\[202a.2\]]rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra bla/_bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug_/srin po lang ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma srin rdul du rlog pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas ba'o/_/
[\[202a.3\]]'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D669}]@##/_/'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[202a.4\]]lo/_/nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/_mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa brjod par bya ste/_phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ha na ha na rA dza d+hU 
[\[202a.5\]]te na/_da ha da ha rA dza d+hU te na/_pa tsa pa tsa pa rA dza d+hU te na/_ba hu shra be/_ba hu pa ri pA ri/_ba hu pa ri sho d+ha ne/_i ma~M dzA ra tsaN+Da la~M/_ha na ha na/_o~M suM b+ha ni suM b+ha shi ra muny+tsa/_tsak+Shu muny+tsa/_shro tra muny+tsa/_g+h+rA Na muny+tsa/_dzi hwA muny+tsa/_kaN Tha muny+tsa/_grI ba 
[\[202a.6\]]muny+tsa/_preSh+Tha muny+tsa/_kA Ti kA muny+tsa/_ku k+Sha muny+tsa/_U ru muny+tsa/_dza nau muny+tsa/_hasta muny+tsa/_pA dau muny+tsa/_aM gu li muny+tsa/_a~M ga pra t+ya~M ga muny+tsa/_a pa sa ra a N+ya sI muny+tsa/_gats+tshaH/_dz+wa ra mu to si bdag la swA hA/_oM dz+wa la mA aM gu li hU~M/_sarba dz+wa rA nan phaT/_
[\[202a.7\]]'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]{D670}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_de bI ma hA kA lI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mngon par 
[\[202b.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/_/de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_bdud kyi yum/_gshin rje'i lcam mo/_lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs 
[\[202b.3\]]gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'bul na/_bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan kyis bka' stsal 
[\[202b.4\]]pa/_bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o/_/'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/_/thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad 
[\[202b.5\]]bcing bar bya'o/_/de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/_tad+ya thA/_oM ru ru bi tiSh+Tha ba d+hot+si ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha ba d+hot+si swA hA/_'di bton pas rims dang /_nad dang /_mi ngas dang /_nyes pa thams cad dang /_mdze dang /_phol mig dang /_g.yan 
[\[202b.6\]]pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro swA hA/_lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D671}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI de bI kA li pra ma rA dza tan+t+ra kA li/_bod skad du/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i bstod pa rgyal po'i rgyud[(,]/[ )]
[\[202b.7\]]rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi mnga' bdag dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_ri rab kyi rtse mo rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal chen po na bcom ldan 'das dpal drag po chen po phyag na rdo rje lus bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]ba/_srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba/_nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid dang ldan nas bzhugs so/_/'khor ni brgya byin dang /_sha za dang /_srin po dang /_ma mo'i tshogs bye ba dung phyur gyis bskor te bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na dpal phyag na rdo rje pad+ma'i gdan 
[\[203a.2\]]la bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/_nga'i 'khor du gtogs pa'i lha ma srin sde brgyad nyon cig_/'dod pa'i khams 'di na bdud kyi ma gshin rje'i sring mo zhes bya ba rgyal tshab chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa cig yod kyis/_khyed kyis de la mchod pa 
[\[203a.3\]]gyis shig_/bstod pa gyis shig_/ngas kyang khyod la byin gyis brlab po zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor gyi nang nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te dpal lha mo nag mo la dge ba bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa/_sngon 'das bskal pa dang po'i pha rol 
[\[203a.4\]]na/_/dge bcu'i las la sems rab cher sbyangs nas/_/lam gyi khyad par gong ma rab rdzogs kyang /_/mtho ris skyes pa rnams la dge ba bcu'i/_/tshul gyis don mdzad phyi rol bsgyur ba yi/_/dpal ldan lha mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'das 
[\[203a.5\]]pa'i dus na srog gcod rab spangs pas/_/sku tshe ring zhing gzugs byad phun sum tshogs/_/gzhan gyi lan chags gnod pa'i rkyen dang ldan/_/'chi bdag 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ma byin len spangs tshul la rab spangs pas/_/bsod 
[\[203a.6\]]nams tshogs kyis longs spyod phun sum tshogs/_/gter gyi longs spyod mi 'grib rab brtan brnyes/_/sbyin pa'i gter 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/mi tshangs spyod pa'i bka' rnams bsrung ba dang /_/mngal gyi grong khyer dman las rnam par 
[\[203a.7\]]'phags/_/srid pa'i 'dod chags ring du spangs pa ste/_/dge sbyong chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/nyon mongs [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig spangs pa'i rnam smin gyis/_/gsung gi dngos grub 'jig rten 'dul ba'i gtso/_/gsung mchog rnam dag brnyes pa'i rang bzhin te//
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]bden par gsung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/phra ma'i skyon spangs mi phyed 'khor dang ldan/_/nyid la rnam par dul ba'i 'khor gyis bskor/_/lha dang lha min bden pas 'dul mdzad ma/_/dkar mo'i 'khor tshogs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/ngag 'khyal spangs 
[\[203b.2\]]pa'i yon tan sbyin pa yis/_/ting 'dzin rtse gcig mi g.yo bar chad spangs/_/dgos 'brel tshul gyis bstan pa skyong mdzad ma/_/byis pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/nga rgyal khengs sems spangs pa'i yon tan gyis/_/zhi ba'i tshig 'jam lha mo dbyangs 
[\[203b.3\]]snyan ma/_/tshig rtsub gshe ba'i gnyen po byed pa ste/_/ngag rtsub 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rang sems brnab sems spangs pa'i khyad par ni/_/'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnam par spangs pa'i rtags/_/bdag med rtags su seng ges rna ba brgyan/_/
[\[203b.4\]]brnab sems spangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/gzung ba'i yul la gnod sems rnam par spangs/_/phyi rol yul 'di gnyis med chos su gzigs/_/gang la gnod sems yang dag spangs pa'i rtags/_/sbrul gyi rna rgyan can la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/log 
[\[203b.5\]]par lta ba'i chos phyogs rnam spangs te/_/sangs rgyas chos las 'khrungs pa'i gzugs brnyan khyod/_/lta ba rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/_/spros bral don dam ston la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'jig rten 'di na las gnyis dag ma dag_/ma dag mi dge bcu las ngan 
[\[203b.6\]]song grub/_/dag pa'i dge ba bcu las mtho ris grub/_/las 'di dge ba dang por rab sbyangs pas/_/gong nas gong ma'i sa la rab gnas kyang /_/dge bcu'i rtags ni dman pa'i zhing 'dir bstan/_/gdug pa'i tshul can 'gro ba 'dren mdzan ma/_/bstod par 
[\[203b.7\]]'os pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos sras kyis lam rnam pa lnga'i tshul gyis bstod pa/_dam pa rnams kyis bgrod pa'i khyad par ni/_/tshogs kyis sbyangs nas don dam mthong ba yi/_/gnyen po ye shes 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rim par sgom pa la/_/mthar phyin pa la gshegs pa'i don mchog lags/_/de bas lha mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni/_/'di ltar rab ldan khyod kyi khyad par te/_/dang po'i tshogs las yang dag rab bsags pas/_/dang po'i sa las sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin 
[\[204a.2\]]brnyes/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sa la don dam ni/_/rnam par mi rtog skye med tshul gyis gzigs/_/dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa'i khyad par ni/_/rang sems sa gnyis dag la rab brten nas/_/de bzhin sa gsum dag pa'i pha rol son/_/rang sems bzhi ba'i sa 
[\[204a.3\]]la cher bsgoms pas/_/lnga pa'i sa la bsam gtan pha rol son/_/rang sems drug pa'i sa la cher sbyangs pas/_/bdun pa la ni thabs kyi pha rol son/_/rang sems brgyad pa nyid la cher bsgoms pas/_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo smon lam nyid/_/dgu pa la 
[\[204a.4\]]yang stobs kyi yon tan sgrub/_/de yi stobs kyis ye shes 'phen par 'grub/_/'di dag rnam par rdzogs par byas nas ni/_/sangs rgyas sa la smin pa'i smon lam can/_/sa brgyad non pas gzhon nu'i tshul 'chang ma/_/'gro ba 'dul phyir drag mo'i tshul ston 
[\[204a.5\]]cing /_/gdug pa 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag kyang khyod kyi lam ltar myur 'grub shog_/de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa rta mgo can gyis dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/_dpal ldan lha mo gnyis 
[\[204a.6\]]su med pa ste/_/don dam spros bral chos nyid 'di las btsal/_/don dam kun rdzob gnyis su med pas bden/_/'khor ba myang 'das gnyis su med pas zab/_/sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su med pas 'phags/_/las dang rnam smin gnyis su med 
[\[204a.7\]]pas bstod/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis su med pas smin/_/yul dang yul can gnyis med gcig gi dang /_/spros dang spros med don dam dbyings kyis bsdus/_/bsod nams ye shes gnyis med tshogs chen te/_/mthong dang dam pa gnyis med dag pas bstod/_/
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]bdag dang gzhan gyi chos ni ngang tshul gcig_/gzung dang 'dzin pa gnyis med zab mo'i mthu/_/mtho ris ngan song gnyis bral dag pa'i zhing /_/bzang ngan gnyis med rang bzhin gcig gis bstod/_/bskyed med rdzogs pa gnyis med lhun grub mchog_/
[\[204b.2\]]sems dang phung po gnyis med sems nyid de/_/sgrub dang bsgrub bya gnyis med grub pa'i ngang /_/bdag gzhan gnyis med tshul mchog gcig gis bskyod/_/yab dang yum mkha' gnyis med byang chub sems/_/thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i 
[\[204b.3\]]don/_/stong dang mi stong gnyis med zhi ba'i ngang /_/gyur dang 'gyur med rtsol bral phyag 'tshal bstod/_/sgra tshig gnyis med brjod pa med pa'i ngang /_/lus ngag gnyis med sems nyid gcig gi tshul/_/rtsol byed rtsol bya gnyis med don gcig pas/_/
[\[204b.4\]]rnam par spros med don dam dbyings kyis bstod/_/mu stegs sangs rgyas gnyis med tshul gcig pas/_/dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don rtogs te/_/srid dang rnam grol yang dag don gcig pas/_/thams cad gnyis med sku la phyag 'tshal 
[\[204b.5\]]bstod/_/phyi dang nang med gnyis med gcig gi ngang /_/sems ldan sems med rnam dag zhi ba'i tshul/_/snang dang mi snang gnyis med gcig gis mthong /_/gnyis med don mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/'di dag rnams ni don dam zab mo'i tshul/_/spros 
[\[204b.6\]]pa med pa'i don dang 'brel pa ste/_/'di rnams lha mo khyod kyi thugs la gsal/_/'di ltar bstod pas bdag kyang khyod ltar shog_/de'i tshe de'i dus na dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pas dpal lha mo la phrin las kyi sgo nas bstod pa/_sems nyid phrin las rnam 
[\[204b.7\]]bzhi'i khyad par ni/_/sems nyid gud na med cing sems kyang med/_/don dam spros bral kha dog gzugs kyang med/_/kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du rang gi sems/_/mthun par bstan pa'i zhi ba'i dpal lha mo/_/zhi mdzad zhi 'gyur zhi ba'i ngang tshul can/_/zhi ba'i 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/_/rtags kyi sku mdog dkar mo shin tu dngas/_/kun du zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gi dgra dang nad rnams zhi bar mdzod/_/mthun par bstan pa'i rgyas pa'i dpal lha mo/_/rgyas mdzad rgyas 
[\[205a.2\]]'gyur rgyas pa'i ngang tshul can/_/rgyas pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/_/rtags kyi sku mdog ser mo shin tu brjid/_/kun du rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gi bsod nams ye shes rgyas par mdzod/_/mthun par bstan pa'i dbang 
[\[205a.3\]]mo dpal lha mo/_/dbang mdzad dbang bsgyur dbang gi ngang tshul can/_/dbang gi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/_/rtags kyi sku mdog dmar mo shin tu brjid/_/kun du dbang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gi nad dang dgra rnams dbang du mdzod/_/
[\[205a.4\]]mthun par bstan pa'i drag mo dpal lha mo/_/drag mdzad drag 'gyur drag mo'i ngang tshul can/_/drag mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba'i gtso mo ni/_/rtags kyi sku mdog nag mo shin tu brjid/_/kun du drag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gi nad dang dgra 
[\[205a.5\]]rnams drag mos sod/_/khyod kyi rang bzhin cir yang ma grub la/_/'di ltar 'dzin nyid cir yang snang ba ni/_/phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don mdzad pa lags/_/bdag kyang las bzhi rang bzhin lhun grub nas/_/khyod ltar gzhan gyi don la brtson par shog_/
[\[205a.6\]]de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la klu'i rgyal po dga' bos sku'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/_gsang sngags rnal 'byor grub pa'i bdag nyid ma/_/yon tan rnams kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/_/don du snang ba med kyang gdul bya'i phyir/_/rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar 
[\[205a.7\]]bstan pa'o/_/khams gsum gdul phyir gdan du bong bu zhon/_/mya ngan mi 'da'i rtags su lcags sgrog mnga'/_/bdag don lhun grub glang chen ko bas brgyan/_/gzhan don phun sum tshogs phyir re ldes dkris/_/byang chub sems ldan spyi gtsug zla rgyas 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]gsal/_/shes rab rtogs phyir lte ba nyi mas brgyan/_/dug gsum sdong po gcod pa'i ral gri dang /_/bsod nams gter gyi phyag mtshan ne'u le bsnams/_/dbang drag rdzogs phyir ral pa kham nag sprug_/nyon mongs 'dren phyir rno dpal mche ba gtsigs/_/
[\[205b.2\]]'khor ba ljags la gtar phyir rkan sgra brdeb/_/gdug pa zhe la gnod phyir sdang mig bgrad/_/thams cad dbang du sdud phyir spyan rtsa dmar/_/snyoms pa'i tshogs mchog mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag_/ma mo 'dul phyir dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan/_/sku gsung 
[\[205b.3\]]thugs rtags phyag rgya kha T+wA~M gsor/_/sku gsum rdzogs byed thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/_/drag po myur mgyogs bstan phyir tshub mas brgyan/_/nyon mongs sreg phyir me dpung nang na bzhugs/_/'dod khams skyong phyir yongs 'du'i shing la brten/_/lha min 'dul 
[\[205b.4\]]phyir rdzong gi dka' zlog ma/_/dpa' brtan bstan phyir stag gi sham thabs bsnams/_/bstan pa bsrung phyir drag mo'i cha lugs rdzogs/_/nga rgyal dbang bsdud bdag med sgra sgrogs phyir/_/thabs kyi snyan cha g.yas pa seng ges brgyan/_/zhe sdang dbang 'dul 
[\[205b.5\]]dug chen 'dul ba'i phyir/_/shes rab snyan cha g.yon pa sbrul gyis brgyan/_/'du byed mi rtag rtags su dril bu sgrogs/_/chags phyir rngam mdzad rak+ta'i rba klong 'thung /_/dam tshig bsrung phyir zhing lpags rgyan du mdzad/_/tha dad las rnams 'dul phyir rma bya'i 'phru/_/
[\[205b.6\]]nyon mongs sgrib pa'i tshogs rnams rab sbyangs nas/_/ye shes rig pa'i tshogs rnams shar ba'i phyir/_/rang bzhin gnas mchog byang shar mtshams na brten/_/dbu ma'i sa la gnas phyir dre'u la zhon/_/nyon mongs gdug pa 'dul phyir ma yi tshul/_/mkha' 
[\[205b.7\]]'gro ma mo khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po sbrul mgo dgu pas dpal lha mo nag mo la sku gsung thugs kyi sgo nas bstod pa/_don dam gnyis med byang chub sems yin yang /_/srid gsum gdul phyir rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/_/rang sems 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]rnam dag drag po'i gzhal yas khang /_/rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil pa las/_/keng rus thod phreng zhing gi pags pas brgyan/_/sku mdog gnag la rab 'jigs khro mo rgyal/_/sngon mo ral pa 'dzings ma'i sprul pa 'gyed/_/sku yi sprul pa 
[\[206a.2\]]dpal ldan re ma dzu/_/gru gsum ser nag zhal gyi dbyings su bzhengs/_/yon tan rgyas mdzad ser mo mkha' la bzhad/_/phrin las rgyas pa thams cad nye bar mdzod/_/gsung gi sprul pa dpal ldan re ma ti/_/gru gsum dmar nag zhal gyi dbyings nas bzhengs/_/
[\[206a.3\]]dmar mo chen mo dmar chen gtum ma ste/_/dbang gi phrin las thams cad grub par mdzod/_/sku gsung thugs ldan sprul pa rgya mtsho ma/_/drag po 'joms mdzad bdud dpung zil gyis gnon/_/'gro drug sgrol mdzad sems can kun gyi ma/_/bstan pa 
[\[206a.4\]]rgyas mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis rlobs/_/de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thags zangs ris kyis don dam pa'i sgo nas bstod pa/_spros bral 'od gsal yang dag zhi ba'i ngang /_/thugs kyi 
[\[206a.5\]]thugs mchog rnam dag bden pa'i yum/_/gdod nas gnyis med nam mkha'i snying po ni/_/dpal ldan khyod kyi rang bzhin khyad par gsal/_/'di ltar rnam dag brjod med ngo bo la/_/byis pa rnams kyis bstod pa byed pa ltung /_/blun po rnams kyis dngos por 
[\[206a.6\]]rab brtags nas/_/gzugs can tshul du gang zhig bstod pa'i tshig_/rgyal ba'i don yang thugs chud khyod nyid la/_/tshig dang yi ge'i sgo nas bstod pa rnams/_/nams kyang grol bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid min/_/gdod nas gnyis med bde chen ma rtogs 
[\[206a.7\]]par/_/khyod kyi smon lam rtags kyi cho 'phrul la/_/don du bzung nas gang zhig bstod pa rnams/_/khyod la brten nas thams cad ltung bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig skye ba med par shes pa dang /_/gdod nas gnyis med snying po bsgoms nus na/_/gang zag des 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]ni khyod nyid bstod pa yin/_/khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dzin pa yis/_/bskal pa grangs med 'das par rab bltas kyang /_/khyod kyi gzugs dang kha dog mthong mi nus/_/gang zhig gzugs su mi 'dzin rnams kyis mthong /_/sgra dang tshig dang brjod pa 
[\[206b.2\]]thams cad kyis/_/khyod ni bos kyang bskal par mi thos te/_/'di dag spangs pa'i rnal 'byor de yis ni/_/khyod kyang bos la de yang khyod kyis thos/_/gang zhig lus ngag dge bas khyod bsgrubs pa'i/_/blun po de yis nams kyang khyod nyid spangs/_/
[\[206b.3\]]lus ngag spangs pa'i sems kyis khyod mchod nas/_/mchod na dngos grub de yis gter thob 'gyur/_/khyod ni rgyal po mang po'i yon tan sdud/_/chos kyi dbyings na rgyal ba rnams dang mjal/_/zab mo dbu ma'i rang bzhin ston pa'i phyir/_/mi mjed 
[\[206b.4\]]'jig rten shin tu rtsub pa 'dir/_/phyi rol tshul gyis thams cad 'dren mdzad ma/_/khyod kyi sku ni 'di ltar rab brtags pa/_/sgrib pa mang po stong nyid ngang du gshegs/_/stong nyid dam pa stong pa yang dag khyod/_/stong pa gnyis med shes pa rnams kyis bstod/_/
[\[206b.5\]]'di ltar bstod na bstod par 'gyur grang bas/_/khyod ni bstod pa'i yul can ma yin yang /_/byis pa drang phyir don la 'di ltar bstod/_/de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje gser mig can gyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa/_dpal ldan lha mo dpag par 
[\[206b.6\]]dka' ba'i don/_/thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha'i mkha' la spyod/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa khyod nyid la/_/sgo gsum rdul snyed dbyangs kyis phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gis khyod ni mchod pas ma bsgribs kyang /_/dpal ldan dngos grub 
[\[206b.7\]]dam pa thob bya'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i yon tan mkha' la char 'bab pas/_/mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyal gyur cig_/dpal ldan khyod ni dge sdig bdag po ste/_/bdag gi lus ngag yid kyi sdig pa'i tshogs/_/khyod kyi thad du 'gyod pas rab 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bshags na/_/thugs rje'i shugs kyis sgrib pa byang bar mdzod/_/khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags pa ni/_/'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs/_/dga' mthun phrag dog med pa'i spros pa ni/_/rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud 
[\[207a.2\]]la 'bul/_/'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mchog ni/_/nag mo bzang po 'jigs pa'i mthu stobs kyis/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum kun du 'gro don la/_/sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul gyis bskul bar spobs/_/yang dag khyod kyi yon tan sku mchog ni/_/
[\[207a.3\]]gdug pa 'dul zhing bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/sems can zad par ma gyur bar du ni/_/mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba gdab/_/'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod nas bshags pa dang /_/rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol btab nas/_/dge ba 'di 
[\[207a.4\]]yis ngan song stongs gyur te/_/thams cad tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo/_/de nas dpal ldan lha mo la nam mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis bstod pa/_bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/_/rlung nag dgu pa'i klong 'khyil pho brang nas/_/ma gcig 
[\[207a.5\]]'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/_/bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam gcig ma/_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo re ma ti/_/nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can/_/mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can/_/khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bzhugs pa ni/_/don 
[\[207a.6\]]dam dbyings kyis bskyod pa med pa'i rtags/_/dbu skra g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil pa ni/_/yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa 'gyed pa'i rtags/_/dbu gtsug ral pa gcig tu 'khyil pa ni/_/don dam dgongs spyod gcig tu mdzad pa'i rtags/_/ral pa'i 
[\[207a.7\]]gseb nas me stag 'phro ba ni/_/thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i rtags/_/dbu la thod rlon phreng ba bcings pa ni/_/thugs rjes sprul skus 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags/_/snyan cha g.yas na seng ge mchong ba ni/_/sman mo thams cad zil 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]gyis gnon pa'i rtags/_/g.yon na sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka 'phyar ba ni/_/zhe sdang ma spangs dbyings su dag pa'i rtags/_/snyan cha gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba ni/_/sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i rtags/_/spyan rtsa dmar la sdang mig 
[\[207b.2\]]bgrad pa ni/_/srid gsum rnal 'byor dam tshig gzigs pa'i rtags/_/zhal gyi drag po hom khung gdengs pa ni/_/bstan pa 'jig pa'i ru dra sgrol ba'i rtags/_/rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni/_/bsgral ba'i zhing bcu sa la sgrol ba'i 
[\[207b.3\]]rtags/_/sku la zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba ni/_/yang dag chos dang don dang ldan pa'i rtags/_/glang chen ko rlon snam phyed dkris pa ni/_/theg pa mchog gi don dang ldan pa'i rtags/_/re lde nag po snam phyed dkris pa ni/_/'jig rten 'di na che btsan 
[\[207b.4\]]ldan pa'i rtags/_/lte ba'i khung nas nyi ma 'char ba ni/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags/_/spyi bo gtsug nas zla ba 'char ba ni/_/dug gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags/_/zhabs la dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khril ba ni/_/thabs 
[\[207b.5\]]dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i rtags/_/phyag g.yas shang lang nag po bsnams pa ni/_/sdug bsngal skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags/_/phyag g.yon thod rlon dmar chen 'thung ba ni/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khrag ltar 'thung ba'i rtags/_/bong bu gwa 
[\[207b.6\]]pa phyin phyogs zhon pa ni/_/log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags/_/srin po'i og mas snga ru byas pa ni/_/srin yul lang ka pu ra 'dul ba'i rtags/_/sbrul nag chun pos gong smed byas pa ni/_/zhe sdang dbang gis bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i 
[\[207b.7\]]rtags/_/ru sbal nag po'i phog bu btang ba ni/_/klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags/_/snga sha g.yas pa bdud kyi khram bam ni/_/dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags/_/phyi shar nad kyi rkyal pa btags pa ni/_/bstan pa 'di la gnod 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa'i dgra bo la/_/nad ka 'bebs shing dal kha sgyur ba'i rtags/_/don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zor ris btang /_/thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su rak+ta'i thig les brgyan/_/'dul byed phrin las rtags su thal ba'i mtshan mas btab/_/ma mo 
[\[208a.2\]]'bum phrag bran du 'khol ba ni/_/khams gsum khyab par phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags/_/ma gcig kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skems/_/rdo rje 'phyar bas ri rab tshogs bor 'phen/_/bdag gis brtson par lha mo khyod la bstod/_/de nas yang gshin rje nag 
[\[208a.3\]]pos dpal lha mo la che ba'i yon tan gyi sgo nas bstod pa/_lha mo dpal ldan mkha' 'gro nag mo khyod la ni/_/rgyun du til mar gyis byugs lan bu gcig ma ste/_/ro nye rna chas bsgyings shing cha lugs mang po 'chang byed ma/_/rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags la byas pa 
[\[208a.4\]]gcig gis rkang la mdzes par brgyan pa ste/_/mtshan mo bong bu zhon nas 'gro ba de ni nag mo khyod nyid yin par shes/_/ral pas bdag nyid mdzes par brgyan te khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su yis shes/_/'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag la khrag 
[\[208a.5\]]dang zhag 'dzag du ba thul ba na/_/nag mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam du zhugs par 'gyur/_/lha mo lag na mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can du dur khrod dgyes/_khyod ni g.yog bcas mya ngan med cing 'chi 
[\[208a.6\]]ba'i 'jigs pa med par dril bu'i sgra yang sgrogs/_/khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bcad g.yul du mtshon gyis bsad pa yi/_/mgo phreng lag na thogs shing gar stabs skor zhing lag pa brkyang bskum che/_/rkub tshos che la klu dbang gshibs pa'i ska rags bcings 
[\[208a.7\]]shing lag na mdung dang ba dan thogs/_/khrag gi chang gis ra ro myos te mig rtsa dmar por byas nas mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu ba 'byung po phal chen kun gyis mthong /_/rkang pa'i gos ni ko rlon mtshan pas drangs pas snam gyi phyed ni re ldes dkris/_/mi yi rgyu ma sar 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing khrag dang zhag gi tshom bus thig ler brgyan/_/mi yi sha la so sor chem chem za yin mi ro dag gi cod pan mgo la brgyan pa ste/_/bdag la skyob pa'i drag mo mi sha thogs pa khyod ni snga nas ma mthong gzod mthong 
[\[208b.2\]]na/_/bdud dang srin mo ma mo rnams kyang mig rtsa rig rig dngang zhing khyod la 'dud/_/lha mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs pas/_/bstod pa byed pa'i gshin rje'i rgyal po nyid kyang rtag tu 'dud/_/lha rnams 
[\[208b.3\]]dang ni 'gro ba ma lus 'jug brtul bas na rna ba ya gcig la/_/brang gis 'gro ba sbrul mgo gdengs ka stong dang ldan zhing gcig gis rgyab nas rgyan du byas/_/ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtsho bskor zhing sa gzhi gnon pa sa steng gi/_/phyogs 
[\[208b.4\]]nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma zla ba lha mo khyod kyi lte nas 'char zhing srid gsum zil gyis gnon/_/rgya mtsho klong nas me 'bar chu rnams skems par byed par nus pa'i bud med thams cad zhi mdzad ma/_/lha chen sku dang 'tsham par bzhugs pa'i dka' zlog nag mo mi nad phyugs 
[\[208b.5\]]nad kun la 'jigs pa med/_/ma gcig khyod nyid la ni bdag ni gus par phyag 'tshal mchod cing bstod par bgyi/_/de nas dpal lha mo nag mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis kun rdzob kyi bden pa brten par bstod pa/_ma gcig lha mo dpal lha mo/_/
[\[208b.6\]]rdo rje lha mo nag mo che/_/mthu chen khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/bdag gis btsun par khyod bstod kyis/_/bkra shis mchog grub sems gter gnas/_/yid myur gzugs chen kun du grags/_/ma mor grags shing 'jig rten skyong /_/dpa' brtul drag 
[\[208b.7\]]spyod brtson 'grus che/_/'thab mo g.yul las rtag tu rgyal/_/gshin rje'i sring mo yin par bstod/_/gos su dar gos sngon po gsol/_/sdug dang mi sdug cha lugs 'chang /_/spyan mig mthong na mi sdug kun du sdang /_/dad cid tshogs pa'i mi rnams sdud/_/
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]res 'ga' ri brag zab mor gnas/_/res 'ga' tshal dang shing la gnas/_/res 'ga' dur khrod dbus na gnas/_/lha mo'i gnas rten de ru 'cha'/_/gnas de ri dang tshal dgon du/_/rtag tu lha mo khyod 
[\[209a.2\]]bstod na/_/de yis dgongs pa skong bar byed/_/bdag gis rtag tu bstod byas na/_/bdag gi bsam pa 'grub par mdzod/_/rma bya'i sgro la rgyal mtshan byas/_/gang zhig rtag bsten srung bar byed/_/gnag lug phyugs rnams 'phel bar byed/_/seng ge 
[\[209a.3\]]stag dang spyang ki yis/_/rtag tu kun nas bskor nas kyang /_/rdo rje dril chen snyan par sgrogs/_/byin te dril chen snyan par sgrogs/_/lan 'ga' lag na tri shU la thogs/_/lan 'ga' nyi zla'i ru mtshon phyar/_/mar gyi tshes dgu bcu gcig na/_/de yi dus 
[\[209a.4\]]su mchod byas na/_/lha mo khyod las lhag pa med/_/bdud 'dul lha min srin mor ston/_/dgra dang 'thab tshe rgyal bar byed/_/bud med nang na mchog yin te/_/tshig dbang 'jig rten mgon po 'dra/_/rgyal po'i khab na pad+ma 'dra/_/zhal bzang zla ba nya ba 
[\[209a.5\]]'dra/_/chu la rgal na gru zam 'dra/_/phongs pa rnams kyi gnyen bshes 'dra/_/lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/lha mo khyod kyi lte ba la/_/lha rnams kun gyi rdzong bcas nas/_/lha dmag dkar po rgyal bar byas/_/lha ma yin rnams pham par byed/_/
[\[209a.6\]]lag na mdung dmar chems se chems/_/ru mtshon ba dan me ltar 'bar/_/dgra 'dul g.yul bzlog khyed la bstod/_/de nas drang srong chen po ko'u di n+yas dpal lha mo la dpe byad kyi sgo nas bstod pa/_'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal/_/ma rnams 
[\[209a.7\]]nang na khyod ni rtag tu mchog yin te/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/_/byad bzhin sdug mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan/_/mig yangs 'dam skyes sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/_/bsod nams ye 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]shes snang ba grags pas brgyan/_/dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu 'dra/_/deng bdag pad+mo khyod la bsngags pas kyang /_/sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis pa/_/pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam par dag_/
[\[209b.2\]]lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis lta bar mos/_/mtshan ma yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan/_/dri med ye shes kun tu rab mdzes pa/_/dran pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur/_/ci ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur bzhin/_/bsngags bstod tshig ni 'di 
[\[209b.3\]]las 'byung ba yis/_/bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad grub par shog_/ces bstod do/_/de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis dpal lha mo la bstod pa legs so/_/nga yang bstod pa 'di dag gi don sgoms shig_/
[\[209b.4\]]yid la rtag tu zlos cig_/lha mo 'di la bstod pa ni nga la bstod pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la bstod pa yin no/_/lha mo des kyang mi 'di srung bar byed do/_/skyob par byed do/_/ci 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor de rnams 
[\[209b.5\]]rab tu dga' nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rgyan gyi char chen po phab nas so so'i gnas su 'khod do/_/bstod pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so//[ {D672}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_shrI de bI kA lI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka/_
[\[209b.6\]]bod skad du/_dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa du gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/_rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang 
[\[209b.7\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/_/de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]dpa' seng ge'i brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[210a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la dgongs nas dpal lha mo nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/_/thos bsam sgom la cher gnas pa'i/_/rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/_/'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog_/
[\[210a.3\]]dpal ldan lha mo nag mo 'phags/_/byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste/_/sa ltar brtan pa'i gzhir gyur pa/_/yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra/_/byang chub smin byed me lta bu/_/dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo/_/shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste/_/khyod ni 
[\[210a.4\]]'byung ba chen po 'dra/_/'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/_/bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i/_/las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas/_/nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba goms/_/shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro/_/khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu/_/
[\[210a.5\]]dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu/_/kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing /_/nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal/_/zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing /_/ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra/_/rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo 'dra/_/u dum bAr ltar khyod dkon yang /_/bdud rtsi lta bur 
[\[210a.6\]]yongs tshim mdzad/_/'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags/_/rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang ston/_/chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar/_/gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul/_/dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong /_/dam pa rnams dang yang dag gcig_/dam 
[\[210a.7\]]pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/_/lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo/_/srin mo klu mo sha za mo/_/gdug mo 'byung mo grul bum mo/_/drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu ma/_/rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/_/mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul/_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston/_/rnam pa brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung /_/'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston/_/phung po lnga yang brjod par nus/_/dbang po tshim byed yul lnga'ang ston/_/rten cing 'brel ba'i spyod pa mkhas/_/yul can rnams ni gsod la mkhas/_/de 
[\[210b.2\]]bzhin ngag rnams gsod pa dang /_/lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson/_/sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas/_/'khor ba las ni ring du song /_/de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang /_/'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal 
[\[210b.3\]]ldan ma/_/dam chos 'dzin pa rnams la byams/_/oM AHhU~M shrI de bi kA li sa ma ya dzaHDA gi nA+e DA ya sa ma ya swA hA/_ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/_/yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang 'thob/_/dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gnas su mi skye zhing /_/
[\[210b.4\]]byol song skye bas thogs mi 'gyur/_/lus 'phags gnas su skyes pa na/_/thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing /_/sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min/_/de bzhin ba lang spyod du yang /_/chu dang rlabs kyis khyer mi nus/_/'dzam bu'i gling du gang skyes pa/_/sna tshogs 
[\[210b.5\]]gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang /_/skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur/_/bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su/_/tshad med bzhi ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang /_/don med na ni mi skye ste/_/'du 
[\[210b.6\]]shes med par nams kyang min/_/'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/_/khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod/_/rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/_/sems la 'dzin par mi byed de/_/nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang /_/de bzhin nye ba nyi shu 
[\[210b.7\]]dang /_/mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa grangs med mang por yang /_/mi khom brgyad du skye mi 'gyur/_/mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang /_/mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing /_/tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan/_/sdug med bskal pa mang 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]por yang /_/nams kyang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing /_/mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/_/nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang /_/rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni/_/rab dga' dri med 'od byed 'phro/_/sbyang dka' mngon 
[\[211a.2\]]'gyur ring du song /_/mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin/_/sangs rgyas sa chen bla na med/_/bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te/_/kun du 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/_/nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od/_/rin chen 'od dang pad+ma'i 'od/_/las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa/_/dpal 
[\[211a.3\]]ldan sa dang shes rab 'od/_/thams cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste/_/bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang /_/'di tshe byung na myur du thob/_/sa rnams ma thob par du yang /_/'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang /_/shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing /_/chos la dga' ba 
[\[211a.4\]]rnams kyis bsrung /_/dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs/_/rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur/_/dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/_/ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/_/yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste/_/
[\[211a.5\]]sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang /_/khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang /_dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang 
[\[211a.6\]]zhing mngon par bstod do//_//dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa rdzogs so//[ {D673}]@#/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/_/dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang 
[\[211a.7\]]gti mug gsum gyi rgyus/_/sdig smin las grub lha dang lha ma yin/_/dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di ru/_/sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod/_/lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la/_/lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]ces bstod do rdzogs so//[ {D673a}]@##/_/oM badzra A yu she hU~M a/_'phags pa tshe dpag med kyi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas sam/_sngags chab kyis dbang bskur na tshe nur bar 'gyur ro/_/oM pu N+ye pu n+ye ma hA pu n+ye/_a pa ri mi twa A yur pu n+ya 
[\[211b.2\]]dz+nyA na sa~M b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/[ {D674}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 
[\[211b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_/dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[211b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de 
[\[211b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te tshe 'dzin cing mthar phyin par gzhes te sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/_/'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[211b.6\]]nur gyur pa nyon cig_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi rnams ni tshe thung ba las tshe lo brgya thub pa sha stag ste/_de dag las kyang phal cher dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa 
[\[211b.7\]]yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_ming tsam yang nyan tam klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang bar byed dam/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba de dag gi 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par nges pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[212a.2\]]can gang dag tshe zad kar mtshan 'chang bar 'gyur ba de dag gi tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring bar 'dod pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam yi ger 'dri'am/_
[\[212a.3\]]yi ge 'drir 'jug na de dag gi yon tan dang legs par 'gyur ba ni 'di dag go/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu n+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M 
[\[212a.4\]]sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+ha r+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri pA re swA hA/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/_klog par gyur pa de'i tshe 
[\[212a.5\]]zad pa las tshe lo brgya thob par 'gyur te 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA 
[\[212a.6\]]ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+yadz+nyA na saMb+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig 
[\[212a.7\]]dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swab+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_na mo b+ha ga ba 
[\[212b.2\]]te a pa ri mi ta a yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA nA saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_
[\[212b.3\]]yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud 
[\[212b.4\]]d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmA te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig 
[\[212b.5\]]gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na sa~M b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba sa~M skA ra pa
