[\[212b.6\]]ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su 
[\[212b.7\]]bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myaskaM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA 
[\[213a.2\]]pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug gis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo 
[\[213a.3\]]sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA 
[\[213a.4\]]ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[213a.5\]]ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya ba ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs 
[\[213a.6\]]pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA 
[\[213a.7\]]na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na de tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur te tshe yang rnam par 'phel 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa 
[\[213b.2\]]mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur de nam du yang mi khom par skye 
[\[213b.3\]]par mi 'gyur te/_gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA 
[\[213b.4\]]ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga gnas mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha 
[\[213b.5\]]ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re 
[\[213b.6\]]swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyAn su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_
[\[213b.7\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na sa~M b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga gnas mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye 
[\[214a.2\]]a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga gnas mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang 
[\[214a.3\]]yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga 
[\[214a.4\]]na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyin dang srin pos glags bltas kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha 
[\[214a.5\]]ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa 
[\[214a.6\]]ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug na de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[214a.7\]]kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang yid gnyis ma za shig_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i 
[\[214b.2\]]phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na 
[\[214b.3\]]saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+ha r+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na de de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[214b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra 
[\[214b.5\]]pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sa phyogs gang dang gang du mdo sde dkon mchog 'di 'dri ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/_phyag bya bar yang 'os par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[214b.6\]]gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud 
[\[214b.7\]]d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]'drir 'jug na de bud med kyi lus su nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/o na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na 
[\[215a.2\]]saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kAr+ShA pa Na gcig sbyin pa byin na/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po sna bdun gyis yongs 
[\[215a.3\]]su bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha 
[\[215a.4\]]d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des dam pa'i chos mtha' dag mchod par 'gyur ro/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_
[\[215a.5\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs 
[\[215a.6\]]dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_shAkya thub pa la sogs pa la rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag 
[\[215a.7\]]tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste/_dper na rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam spungs te sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i 
[\[215b.2\]]bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA 
[\[215b.3\]]ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang par mi 
[\[215b.4\]]nus so/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA 
[\[215b.5\]]ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_bsti stang du byas te mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[215b.6\]]la phyag byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa yin no/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa 
[\[215b.7\]]ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/tshul 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 
[\[216a.2\]]'phags/_/mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs te/_/
[\[216a.3\]]snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/bsam gtan 
[\[216a.4\]]stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/shes rab stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs te/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/oM na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa 
[\[216a.5\]]ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pu N+ye pu N+ye ma hA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ya dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi te/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_
[\[216a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[216a.7\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D675}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshe dang ye 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi 
[\[216b.2\]]kun dga' rab na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang bo de dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[216b.3\]]pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal steng gi phyogs na/_'jig rten gyi khams yon tan dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i 
[\[216b.4\]]rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/_/tshe 'dzin cing tshe mthar phyin par bzhed de/_sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i sems can rnams ni tshe thung ba lo brgya pa sha stag ste/_de dag las 
[\[216b.5\]]kyang phal cher ni dus ma yin par 'chi bar bstan to/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i yon tan dang bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug 
[\[216b.6\]]gam/_ming tsam nyan tam/_klog pa nas glegs bam la bris te/_khyim na 'chang gi bar du byed dam/_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma rnams kyis mchod par gyur pa de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/'jam 
[\[216b.7\]]dpal sems can gang dag tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos pa de dag tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag tshe yongs su zad kar mtshan 'chang bar gyur pa de dag gi tshe yang rnam 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo tshe ring por 'dod pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa de'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan tam/_yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug 
[\[217a.2\]]na/_de dag gi yon tan dang legs par gyur pa ni 'di dag go/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi 
[\[217a.3\]]shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag gang la la zhig gis yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_glegs bam la bris te khyim na 'chang ngam/_klog par gyur na/_tshe zad pa las 
[\[217a.4\]]tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/de shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can yon tan dpag tu med pa la sogs par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi 
[\[217a.5\]]ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs 
[\[217a.6\]]gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA 
[\[217a.7\]]ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med 
[\[217b.2\]]pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe 
[\[217b.3\]]sangs rgyas bye ba drug cu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba 
[\[217b.4\]]saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A 
[\[217b.5\]]yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs 
[\[217b.6\]]gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi 
[\[217b.7\]]shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa lngas dgongs ba gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu 
[\[218a.2\]]med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_yang 
[\[218a.3\]]de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis dgongs pa gcig dang dbyangs gcig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di gsungs so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_
[\[218a.4\]]saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_'chang na de tshe zad pa las tshe lo brgya thub par 
[\[218a.5\]]'gyur te/_tshe yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM mya k+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re 
[\[218a.6\]]swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na de sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur te/_nam du yang mi khom par skye bar mi 
[\[218a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang la la zhig gis tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri 'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_des chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'drir bcug par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi 
[\[218b.2\]]ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_des chos 
[\[218b.3\]]kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong byed du bcug pa dang /_rab tu gnas par byas pa yin no/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he 
[\[218b.4\]]ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo ste 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi gir 'drir 'jug na/_de'i mtshams med pa lnga yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_
[\[218b.5\]]saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs 
[\[218b.6\]]su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu 
[\[218b.7\]]med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyin dang /_srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs 
[\[219a.2\]]rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/_sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/_'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang /_yid gnyis ma byed cig_/o~M na mo b+ha 
[\[219a.3\]]ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 
[\[219a.4\]]'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra 
[\[219a.5\]]pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye 
[\[219a.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri 
[\[219a.7\]]ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/_phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag 
[\[219b.2\]]tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug na/_de bud med kyi dngos por nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri 
[\[219b.3\]]shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kA r+ShA pa Na gcig sbyin pa byin na/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su 
[\[219b.4\]]bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig chos kyi 
[\[219b.5\]]rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa 
[\[219b.6\]]mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste dper na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang /_gtsug tor can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log par dad sel dang /_'khor ba 'jig dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna 
[\[219b.7\]]bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te/_sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus 
[\[220a.2\]]kyi/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi 
[\[220a.3\]]shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/_tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na 
[\[220a.4\]]su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/_yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/_gus 
[\[220a.5\]]par byas te/_mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang /_mchod pa byas pa yin no/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud 
[\[220a.6\]]d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni 
[\[220a.7\]]grag par 'gyur/_/tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/
[\[220b.2\]]brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/shes rab stobs kyis 
[\[220b.3\]]sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/_/mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs nas/_/snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/_/shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/_/o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_
[\[220b.4\]]tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar 
[\[220b.5\]]bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D676}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/_
[\[220b.6\]]bod skad du/_'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das gang gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/_dge 
[\[220b.7\]]slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/_/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/_/de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/_/su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/_/de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/_/'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/_/
[\[221a.2\]]dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong /_/de na bud med yod ma yin/_/mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/_/rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang /_/chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/_/sems kyis bsam ma thag 
[\[221a.3\]]tu ni/_/de dag mod las 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/_/bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/_/bsam mi khyab la dad byas 
[\[221a.4\]]na/_/rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/_/rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/_rgyal rigs su skyes so/_/
[\[221a.5\]]dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i btsun mo rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[221a.6\]]dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rim gro ba ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul dang 
[\[221a.7\]]ldan pa'i mchog dang /_/brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/lhas byin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/_/dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/_zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par sgom zhing 
[\[221b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/_/dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/_/nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas la sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[221b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bsams na/_zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi 
[\[221b.4\]]khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/_de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/_
[\[221b.5\]]tad+ya thA/_sha ba le/_a ba le/_sa ma dza le/_nirde she/_nir dzA te/_ni ru k+te/_nir mu khe/_dz+wa la ba ri ts+tshe da ni/_su kha ba ti nirde she/_a mr-i te/_A yur gar+b+ha ni ra hA ni/_a mr-i te/_A yuHpra sA d+ha ni/_nir bud d+hi/_A kA sha ni rdzAte/_A kA sha ni rde she/_A kA sha nir ku sha ye/_A kA sha nir dar+sha ne/_A kA sha a 
[\[221b.6\]]d+hi Sh+ThAne/_su kha ba ti a d+hiSh+ShA ne/_rU pa ni rde she/_tsa twA ri d+harma pra sA d+ha ne/_tsa twA ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/_tsa twA ni mA rga b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha ne/_ba la bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ne/_d+harmA ts+tshe da ne/_ku sha le/_ku sha la ni rde she/_ku sha la pra tiSh+ThA ne/_bud d+ha ku sha le/_bi shud d+ha pra b+hA sa/_d+harma ka ra Ne/_ni rdza te/_ni ra bud d+he/_bi ma le/_bi ra dze/_rA 
[\[221b.7\]]dza se/_ra sA gre/_ra sA gra ba la/_ra sA gra/_a d+hiSh+Thi te/_ku le pra ti ku le/_bi ku le/_dan+te su dan+ta tsit+te/_su pra shAn+ta tsit+te/_su pra tiSh+Thi te/_su le su mu khI/_d+harme tsa d+harme/_ba le tsa ba le/_a nu sha a ba le/_bud d+ha A kA sha gu Ne/_bud d+ha A kA sha ni ra gu Ne/_a mr-i ta dun du b+hiHswa re swA hA/_dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des/_gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par/_de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod par bya'o/_/byang 
[\[222a.2\]]chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang /_byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o/_/de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te/_'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe 
[\[222a.3\]]dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/pad+ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/_rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med 
[\[222a.4\]]bzhugs so/_/g.yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/_/g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to/_/dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang /_dad pa dang /_
[\[222a.5\]]gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/_gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen pha'am/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag 
[\[222a.6\]]med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /_sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma 
[\[222a.7\]]gtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bu N+ya saM b+ha wa dang /_lots+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o//[ {D677}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga bA na a mi tA b+ha d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/_bod skad du/_
[\[222b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a mi te/_a mi tod+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+ta kA re/_a mi ta ga ga na 
[\[222b.3\]]kIrti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te/_
[\[222b.4\]]sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_ma hI du hi ke swA hA/_lus la nad byung ba dang /_nad khong skams su gyur kyang 
[\[222b.5\]]rung ste/_lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/_bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/_/gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs 
[\[222b.6\]]rdzogs so//[ {D678}]@#/_/bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_a mi te/_a mi tod+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/_ga ga na kIrti ka re/_sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri 
[\[222b.7\]]swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/_rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]par yang 'gyur ro/_/snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so//[ {D679}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA pa ri mi ta gu NA nu shAn+sa nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog 
[\[223a.2\]]gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_a mi ta b+ha ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a mi te/_a mi tod+b+ha be/_a mi ta saM b+ha be/_a mi ta bi krAn+te/_a mi ta ga mi ni/_ga ga na kIrti ka ri/_sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/_
[\[223a.3\]]gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/_lan cig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[223a.4\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltung ba bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/lan 
[\[223a.5\]]sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no/_/'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//[ {D680}]@#/_/sangs 
[\[223a.6\]]rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis/_rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig_/
[\[223a.7\]]tad+ya thA/_ha na ha na sA ni/_na ba sA ni/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/_tsa la tsa la ne/_purba yo gam nu smar phaT/_ma hA ha ta ya swA hA/_gang gi rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs so//_//
[\[223b\]]
[\[224a\]]
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]{D681}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dzA la mU la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs 
[\[224b.2\]]rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das hi ma la ya'i tshal chen po tsan+dan sdong po dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[224b.3\]]pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun 'ged gzhon nu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 
[\[224b.4\]]'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/_pad+ma dkar po dang /_nyi 'od dang /_gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_pad+ma'i spyan dang /_ye shes dbang phyug dang /_pad+ma'i dbang phyug dang /_rdo 
[\[224b.5\]]rje snying po dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_kun tu bzang po dang /_sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal dang /_'jig rten dbang phyug dang /_phyag na rdo rje dang /_blo gros mi zad pa dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_blo 
[\[224b.6\]]gros rgya mtsho dang /_mthu chen po thob pa dang /_zla 'od dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang /_gzhan yang gtsor byams pa la 
[\[224b.7\]]gnas pa'i dge slong mang po dang /_dge slong ma mang po dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma mang po dang /_lha'i tshogs dang /_klu'i tshogs dang /_de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]grul bum dang /_sha za dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang /_khro bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang /_rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang /_rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_rdo rje rta mgrin dang /_rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang /_rdo rje gtsug tor dang /_rdo 
[\[225a.2\]]rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun cu dang /_spyan ma dang /_mA ma kI dang /_gos dkar mo dang /_sgrol ma dang /_'od zer can dang /_dbyangs can ma dang /_phag zhal ma dang /_khro gnyer can dang /_ri khrod ma dang /_dug sel ma dang /_nor rgyun ma dang /_dkar mo 
[\[225a.3\]]dang /_yid bzang ma dang /_rnam par rgyal ma dang /_dpal phreng mo dang /_sa 'dzin bzang mo dang /_rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang /_bkur sti dang /_rim 
[\[225a.4\]]gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas stod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po thugs rje chen po yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing 
[\[225a.5\]]ltas bco brgyad du gyur to/_/de'i ltas de mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgra sgrogs kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba 
[\[225a.6\]]phrag du ma byung ngo /_/'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe sgra sgrogs snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par 'tshe ba de thugs kyis 
[\[225a.7\]]yongs su dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu gcig pa drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_g.yas phyogs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]su bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad 
[\[225b.2\]]ces smras so/_/kye ma mgon po thugs rje can/_/rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcas/_/che ba'i byin brlabs ldan pa rnams/_/sgra sgrogs snyems pa gzhom pa dang /_/nyon mongs rtsad nas gdon pa dang /_/sems can rnams la phan pa dang /_/bdag la shin tu 
[\[225b.3\]]sman pa'i phyir/_/sku dang rjes su mthun pa yi/_/rig sngags sbyor ba khyad par can/_/snying po dam pa bshad du gsol/_/de tshe 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/_/mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang /_/bcom ldan thub pa'i dbu la ni/_/rin chen me tog gdugs su 
[\[225b.4\]]gyur/_/lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/_/yon chab bdug spos dri dang bshos/_/ci 'byor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul/_/thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod du brlabs/_/lha yi bu mo du ma yis/_/rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang /_/bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang /_/lda ldi 
[\[225b.5\]]na bza' du mas mchod/_/de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/pad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/_/bzhengs 'dzum thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/_/sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyems pa dang /_/mda' dang rtsal gyis dregs pa ste/_/'di ni legs 
[\[225b.6\]]brtsams las byung min/_/shin tu log pa las kyang min/_/sngon dus sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyi/_/bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i/_/bsod nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/_/lag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni/_/zas dang snod dang gos nor rgyan/_/bskal pa bzhi bcu'i 
[\[225b.7\]]mchod sbyin te/_/de nas rtsal dang shugs kyang yin/_/mda' ni b+h+ring gi ri ti yi/_/byin brlabs sngon du byed mod kyang /_/grangs med tshul khrims bral bas ni/_/srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang /_/'khor bcas gzhan la gnod gyur yin/_/ngas ni ngang tshul rmad byung 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]ba'i/_/lus kyis bde gshegs sbyin pa dang /_/sgrub brtson legs byas mtha' yas pa/_/spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs/_/gang gA klung gi rdul dang mtshungs/_/de skad 'bras bu de tsam ste/_/dang po'i las can ci snyed la/_/phan gdags gzhi 
[\[226a.2\]]ni bya ba'i phyir/_/cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste/_/legs par nyon la yid la zung /_/sngon tshe 'das dus bskal pa ni/_/gang gA klung bcu'i snga rol gyi/_/cher 'das ba yi snga rol na/_/bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/_/man dA ra yi dri zhes bya/_/'jig 
[\[226a.3\]]rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe/_/bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur/_/thub pa de la rig sngags mnos/_/thob ma thag tu bskal pa'i grangs/_/bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba snyil/_/de rjes bskal pa gang gA klung /_/bye ba snyed gcig snga rol na/_/bde gshegs rdzogs 
[\[226a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/_/thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan/_/gtsug tor yon tan rab rgyas pa'i/_/'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur/_/rig sngags 'di mnos bsgrubs pa yis/_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[226a.5\]]sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing /_/skye med chos la bzod pa thob/_/de rjes 'das dus bskal ba ni/_/bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na/_/bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/_/tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/_/ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos/_/de tshe phyogs 
[\[226a.6\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/bdag la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad/_/khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs/_/brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir/_/yang dag stong phrag stong snyed kyang /_/dang po'i mchod sbyin chen po byas/_/bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu/_/phyogs 
[\[226a.7\]]bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs/_/de dang de yi rnam smin mchog_/sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam du/_/yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes/_/mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe/_/mi yul las kyang khyad par du/_/
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]gling du skyes pa 'ga'/_/gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir/_/mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum du/_/skad cig glog 'gyu ci lta bar/_/rig sngags 'chang ba gdong bcu gcig_/yan lag stong dang ldan pa la/_/spyan ni chig stong sum cu pa'i/_/mtshan dang 
[\[226b.2\]]ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur/_/de tshe skal ldan la la zhig_/mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos/_/rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig_/'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing /_/phyi nas ye shes nyis 'gyur ro/_/lung bstan de skad thos pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas bye 
[\[226b.3\]]ba phrag bcu gcig_/grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi/_/rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig_/mthu chen thogs pa med pa ste/_/'gro la sman cing bde ba dang /_/nad kun sel byed sdig kun sbyong /_/bkra shis med pa kun zlog cing /_/rmi lam mtshan 
[\[226b.4\]]ma ngan kun sel/_/dus min 'chi dang ngan sems zlog_/rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob/_/mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal ba sel/_/rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang /_/bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten smon pa kun grub cing /_/bdud dang 
[\[226b.5\]]bar chad mtshon cha'i nad/_/dbyig pa brdeg dang bcing ba dang /_/btson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal/_/gsod sar khrid dang yan lag bcad/_/mig 'bru mtshon gyis btsab pa dang /_/chu dang me dang rlungs g.yos/_/dug dang byad stems ro langs dang /_/chom 
[\[226b.6\]]rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon/_/rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs pa dang /_/len dang 'dzin dang 'dri ba dang /_/klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams/_/brtson la 'jig rten lhar bcas dang /_/bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang /_/bram zer bcas pas gnod pa med/_/
[\[226b.7\]]sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang /_/byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur/_/nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas/_/rig nas mngon sum yid ches par/_/rnam par rtog med sems kyis blang /_/de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang /_/srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang /_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin/_/nye ring sa phyogs ci srid par/_/mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang /_/'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med/_/gang gis sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod/_/skyabs su 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags/_/mngon par dga' zhing 
[\[227a.2\]]gzungs sngags 'dis/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa/_/mtshungs par yi rang legs par sbyin/_/rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/_/ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang /_/bzung nas byams 
[\[227a.3\]]pa snying rje'i sems/_/dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi/_/byang chub sems mchog sa la dgod/_/gang gA klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi/_/mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas/_/rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo gang /_/bdag gi ming brjod dran byed cing /_/rig sngags rgyun du brjod na de/_/
[\[227a.4\]]myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob cing /_/lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar/_/bla med byang chub myur du 'byung /_/rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te/_/rtag tu nang par sngar langs nas/_/chos bzhin du ni dge bgyis te/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod pa/_/tshe 'dir phan 
[\[227a.5\]]yon bcu thob 'gyur/_/rtag par lus la nad med dang /_/lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis bsrung /_/nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang /_/dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang /_/bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun thob/_/dug dang 'dre gshin gdon bral dang /_/lus la dri 
[\[227a.6\]]zhim kun dga' dang /_/bsam ngan mi snyan rjod byed dang /_/rims nad bral zhing dgang sla dang /_/dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang yon tan bzhi thob ste/_/'chi khar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang /_/mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang /_/nam yang ngan 'gror 
[\[227a.7\]]mi 'gro zhing /_/bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye/_/rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi/_/ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la/_/byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi/_/rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob/_/bskal pa du mar dge bsags dang /_/rig sngags 'di rnyed 'gyur ba ste/_/dad 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]ldan khrel yod ngo tsha shes/_/blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che/_/mdog dkar ngang bzang gsong por smra/_/sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod/_/bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che/_/sred pa chung zhing sbyin la dga'/_/sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pas/_/nyin mtshan 
[\[227b.2\]]rgyun du rig sngags 'don/_/bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang /_/khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/_/gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blang /_/skyon med tsan+dan dkar sogs shing /_/rigs bzang las byas sku gzugs sam/_/yang na sa rdo rin chen sogs/_/bzang las bde bar gshegs 
[\[227b.3\]]gzugs bya/_/yang na ris su bris kyang rung /_/sku gcig po 'am lha tshogs kyi/_/dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la/_/mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na/_/myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/_/yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi/_/bum pa chu dang bcas pa 
[\[227b.4\]]la/_/sngags brjod pas ni 'dod don kun/_/'grub 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/_/nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la/_/sngags bzlas bza' 'am byugs pas sam/_/bdugs pa tsam yang gnod pa sel/_/srad bu 'am ni gos dag dang /_/phyag rgyas gdags kyang de bzhin 
[\[227b.5\]]no/_/'dod pa gang dang gang la yang /_/me yi las kyi sbyor ba bya/_/gsang sngags 'dod 'dzin yid byed pa/_/bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya/_/de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag_/byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis/_/sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/_/ched du brjod 
[\[227b.6\]]pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos/_/sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba la/_/brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni/_/zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no/_/srid pa dngos po med pa la/_/dmigs par byed pa bsgom pa'o/_/dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba/_/de 
[\[227b.7\]]ni bsgom pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/kun tu bzang pos gsang sngags kyi/_/don la ched du 'di ltar brjod/_/e ma sku gsum tha dad par/_/lus ngag yid kyi don las byung /_/don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/_/sku gcig tu ni nges par gzung /_/gang la gang 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]phan bskyed pa la/_/'ja' tshon bzhin du snang mod kyang /_/tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste/_/ye shes sku la dbye ba med/_/sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni/_/ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod/_/e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid/_/ma byung ma skyes ma 
[\[228a.2\]]'gags pa/_/skye 'gag lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni/_/sku des phyag rgya sngags su snang /_/yon tan chu yi rlabs bzhin du/_/skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed/_/nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang /_/rgyu ba med cing khong du chud/_/byang chub sems dpa' sa snying gis/_/rgyu la ched 
[\[228a.3\]]du 'di brjod do/_/e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la/_/thog med blo yi mun pa'i dbyings/_/rnam rtog bag chags kyis dkrugs nas/_/blo bur dkar nag las su snang /_/dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/_/de la sgro btags byang chub sems/_/de las byung ba'i phrin 
[\[228a.4\]]las kyis/_/nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pa sbyong /_/mgon po byams pas sngags sgrub kyi/_/lam la ched du 'di ltar brjod/_/e ma gdod nas grol zhi'i sems/_/chu ltar dang bar snang mod kyang /_/sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzugs byung bas/_/mun pa thibs pos rnam par 
[\[228a.5\]]bsgyur/_/de nyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir/_/'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyis grol/_/rtsol ba sems kyi dri mas ni/_/dri ma med pa'i sems 'ching 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i snying pos sngags ming la/_/ched du 'di ltar brjod par mdzad/_/e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral/_/kha 
[\[228a.6\]]dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag_/dga' ba'i sems chen gsal byed pa/_/shes rab chen po'i yi ge min/_/mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku/_/gang gang don du de snang ba/_/snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis/_/'byung 'gyur yi ge ta yi don/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad 
[\[228a.7\]]mos ni/_/gnas lam 'di ltar ched du brjod/_/e ma rgyu rkyen nam mkha' la/_/nyi zla skar rgyun 'khor ba yis/_/gsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod/_/nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis/_/'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te/_/rnam shes ming gzugs skye mched drug_/reg 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal/_/gsal byed dag pa gnyis kyis dag_/phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la/_/ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/_/e ma zab cing rgya che ba/_/sngags mthu bla na med pa ni/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/_/shes pa nyid kyang rdzas med la/_/
[\[228b.2\]]shes bya rdzas su ga la yod/_/shes pa yul gyi rnam par ni/_/rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis bsgos pa/_/de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur/_/de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/_/spos dang me tog 'thor byed cing /_/snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu yis ni/_/mgon po 
[\[228b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs la bstod/_/o~M bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs/_/zhal grangs mdog dbyibs du ma cir yang snang /_/stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig_/byams pa'i zhal bzang mnga' ba'i mgon la 'dud/_/spyan ma'i'o/_/o~M 
[\[228b.4\]]rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cir yang 'gyur/_/la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal/_/la la 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal/_/khro sdang gtum chags lta ldan phyag 'tshal lo/_/mA ma kI'i'o/_/o~M phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogs pa'i zhal/_/
[\[228b.5\]]bstan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag_/mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/_/gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na bza' dkar mo'i'o/_o~M mdzad pa thugs rje'i dbyings la thug med kyang /_/rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi chad 
[\[228b.6\]]mdzad pas/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa yi/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sgrol ma'i'o/_/o~M nyi ma gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed pa ltar/_/'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun rtog mun bral yang /_/bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i/_/
[\[228b.7\]]mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od zer can ma'i'o/_/o~M sems kyi rgyud 'gags mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/_/'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste/_/nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbyangs 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]can ma'i'o/_/o~M nyon mongs bdag tu bzung na 'khor bar skye/_/de la yang yang brtags na ngan 'gror skye/_/rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phag gdong ma'i'o/_/o~M chos rnams dag 
[\[229a.2\]]par mthong na mtho ris thob/_/gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'da'/_/sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung /_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khro gnyer can ma'i'o/_/o~M rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul/_/gzhan tshul dman par brjod 
[\[229a.3\]]pas zhing sa tshig_/lus ngag gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub rig_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sa 'dzin ma'i'o/_/o~M bdag lta mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la/_/bdag med phyogs bral ye shes bdud rtsi sman/_/pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtogs 
[\[229a.4\]]stsol mdzad/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dug sel ma'i'o/_/oM ngang tshul bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med/_/gzhan spyod btang snyoms byas nas rang sems spyod/_/sred med bzod ldan ngang gis rgol ba lags/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la 
[\[229a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/ri khrod ma'i'o/_/o~M khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dga'/_/dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang /_/chog shes 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du phyug_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nor rgyun ma'i'o/_/o~M yi ge 
[\[229a.6\]]'dri mchod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad/_/kha don 'dzin sems bsgom brtson de la chu'i/_/khrus sogs smyung gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkar mo'i'o/_/o~M rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod/_/
[\[229a.7\]]'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin/_/thos bsam bsgom brtson de ni dgra las rgyal/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o/_/o~M tha dad kyis 'ching dbyer med grol ba yi/_/thabs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam/_/rnam 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal phreng ma'i glu'o/_/o~M bsam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la/_/byang chub phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs/_/ye shes thugs rje rgyun chu rlan mdzad pa'i/_/
[\[229b.2\]]mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yid bzang ma'i glu'o/_/sgra sgrogs 'khor bcas 'dar gyur te/_/rlung gis btab pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs/_/thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/_/ched du brjod pas 'di gsol to/_/o~M mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das/_/
[\[229b.3\]]gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lha/_/bsod nams du mas skyed pa'i sku/_/ye shes mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba/_/blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po/_/tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad/_/gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che/_/mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[229b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/'khor la legs so legs so zhes/_/o~M AHhrIHhU~M swA hA bcas/_/yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs/_/lcags kyu can gyis nya ra nas/_/klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar/_/dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni/_/byang chub 
[\[229b.5\]]rin chen gling 'jog mdzad/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya 
[\[229b.6\]]ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs nas/_/yan lag cha shas thams cad las/_/'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag_/drug cu drug cu'i mtha' gzhal ba/_/grangs med dag ni bkye bar mdzad/_/zhing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'/_/phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du/_/
[\[229b.7\]]'od kyis gang nas 'od de las/_/snyan pa'i tshigs bcad 'di snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa spang /_/le lo che dang spyod pa chog 'dzin spang /_/'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spang /_/nga rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spang /_/'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]do/_/'gro la brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur/_/byang chub che lam thugs rje chen po ste/_/'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur/_/de skad grags pa'i de ma thag_/phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras/_/brjod kyis mi lang gtso bo mchog_/
[\[230a.2\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang grangs med gtso/_/thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/_/mi mjed zhing 'dir lhags par gyur/_/'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni/_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas/_/zhing khams seng ge spungs par ni/_/sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa 
[\[230a.3\]]yi/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/_/mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub 
[\[230a.4\]]pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/dngul gyi me tog du mas gtor/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 
[\[230a.5\]]'gyur/_/'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom/_/shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad/_/bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M hrIHsiM ha nA da hU~M phaT/_/snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/
[\[230a.6\]]'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/lho yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/_/zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na/_/sangs rgyas rin chen dpal bzhugs pa'i/_/drung du byang 
[\[230a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi/_/nor bu 'khor los skyur ba byed/_/gser gyi ri bo mdog 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/rin chen gser gyi me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung che ba'i tshigs bcad 
[\[230b.2\]]kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad/_/sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol/_/bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M pad+ma d+hA ra d+ha ke hU~M phaT/_snying po de skad phul nas 
[\[230b.3\]]kyang /_thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/_/zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'byung 
[\[230b.4\]]gnas bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/_/pad+ma nir te shwa ri gtso/_/pad+ma rA ga'i ri 'dra ba/_/byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/
[\[230b.5\]]bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/pad+ma rA ga'i me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad 
[\[230b.6\]]kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dam rdzab bskams/_/tshul khrims byug spos char du phab/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M pad+ma nir te shwA ra hrIHhU~M phaT/_snying po de skad phul 
[\[230b.7\]]nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/_/zhing khams rdo rje bkod pa na/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]med bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/thugs rje chen po mi gshol ba/_/rin chen mar gad ri bo 'dra/_/byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/
[\[231a.2\]]glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/mar ga ta yi me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar 
[\[231a.3\]]ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i le lo'i nags tshal bsregs/_/brtson 'grus bskul ba'i me phungasbar/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M 
[\[231a.4\]]rat+na a gra a pra ti ha ta hU~M phaT/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi 
[\[231a.5\]]mtha' nyid kyi/_/zhing khams gter chen brtsegs pa na/_/sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/rje btsun don yod zhags pa can/_/shel gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba/_/byang 
[\[231a.6\]]chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/rin chen shel gyi me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 
[\[231a.7\]]'thor bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom/_/bzod pa'i nyi ma lhang nger mdzad/_/bdag 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hU~M phaT swA hA/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs 
[\[231b.2\]]thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/_/zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na/_/sangs rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po 
[\[231b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/rje btsun ha la ha la che/_/pu sha ra ka'i ri bo 'dra/_/byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal 
[\[231b.4\]]bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/pu sha ra ka'i me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam 
[\[231b.5\]]par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sprul/_/bsam gtan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rlabs/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M ha la ha la hrI pad+ma gar+b+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub 
[\[231b.6\]]pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/_/zhing khams pad+mas brgyan pa na/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po 
[\[231b.7\]]bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/rje btsun pad+ma spyan gyi lung /_/zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra/_/byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/zangs ma zhun gyi me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad 
[\[232a.2\]]byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom/_/sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M pad+ma a laM kA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/_
[\[232a.3\]]snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/_/zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar/_/
[\[232a.4\]]sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug_/nor bu spug gi kha dog 'dra/_/byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/
[\[232a.5\]]glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/spug gi snying po'i me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan 
[\[232a.6\]]pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal/_/mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M badzra d+harma d+hA tu 
[\[232a.7\]]hU~M swA hA/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/_/zhing khams gtsug tor 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]brtsegs pa na/_/sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/ha ri ha ri ha ri la/_/zhen zhes rab tu grags pa yi/_/rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor de/_/in+d+ra nI la'i ri bo mdog_/
[\[232b.2\]]byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni/_/rgya che du ma 
[\[232b.3\]]'thor bar mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel/_/dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo 
[\[232b.4\]]bskor/_/bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/oM b+h+rU~M hrIHha hU~M swA hA/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/'og gi 
[\[232b.5\]]phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog_/grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/_/zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na/_/sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so/_/drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/_/rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal/_/an+da 
[\[232b.6\]]rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra/_/byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag_/bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/_/glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/_/bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/_/an+da rnyil gyi me tog ni/_/
[\[232b.7\]]rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/_/bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang /_/rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/_/zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel/_/ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs/_/
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/_/phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/_/o~M ma Ni pad+me hU~M/_snying po de skad phul nas kyang /_/thub pa'i ga la de logs su/_/'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/_/spyan ras 
[\[233a.2\]]gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas/_/rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang /_/gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i/_/shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/_/phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so 
[\[233a.3\]]byin/_/nam mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang /_/de tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/_/khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams/_/sa steng thams cad gar gyis bkang /_/g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang /_/zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros/_/mchong dang gyed mchongs hril 
[\[233a.4\]]po dang /_/rdebs dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su/_/bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad/_/lag pa thal sbyar phye btsum bskyed/_/sor mo gcig bsnol gcig 'khyud dang /_/kun bsnol kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang /_/rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud
