[\[233a.5\]]dang /_/re mos 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang /_/mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya/_/sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs/_/phyag rgya du ma bgegs sel mdzad/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/_/ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/_/gdong bcu gcig 
[\[233a.6\]]pa zhes bya ba'i/_/snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad/_/ngo mtshar 'byung zhes thos ma thag_/lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas/_/rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te/_/phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni/_/spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/_/gang zhig gdong ni bcu gcig 
[\[233a.7\]]pa'i/_/rig sngags lan cing 'dzin pa dang /_/rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed/_/'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs/_/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams/_/gang gis yid la byed pa'am/_/yang na ji tsam dran yang rung /_/dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni/_/phyogs 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bcu rgyal ba rnams kyi sras/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes/_/rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab/_/byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin no/_/bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs/_/skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste/_/bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing /_/de yi tshul 
[\[233b.2\]]khrims ral ba med/_/mi de skye ba don yod de/_/lha gnas dag nas spu gseb tu/_/ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud/_/'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang /_/gdon rigs ci snyed yod pa 'am/_/rig sngags byad stems ma lus pas/_/de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[233b.3\]]cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis/_/tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang /_/shi ba sems brgyal med par ni/_/gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ras 'jug_/rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang /_/rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing /_/rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu/_/
[\[233b.4\]]stobs dang mi 'jigs pa brnyes te/_/mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas/_/skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du/_/'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing /_/zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las lha byung ba'i 
[\[233b.5\]]le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin/_/bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la/_/phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni/_/gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun/_/
[\[233b.6\]]rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon/_/'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis/_/snying po byin brlabs ldan la gsol/_/rmad du byung ba'i snying po la/_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang /_/rig pa 'dzin rnams mthun par dgyes/_/'on kyang 'gro rnams bzung ba dang /_/
[\[233b.7\]]dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang /_/snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir/_/mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi/_/byin brlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags/_/'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/_/rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed/_/'gro la thugs 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]brtse mdzad pa dang /_/bdag la phan pa'i don slad du/_/rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral ba/_/rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/sdig pa kun myur sgrol bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku 
[\[234a.2\]]gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA_/o~M a ka Te bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_Ti 
[\[234a.3\]]ka Te/_ka TaM ka Te/_ka ro Te bI r+ya swA hA/_yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun/_/rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed/_/khyad par du ni mdzen dal/_/rtswa las byung ba'i me bzhin no/_/rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi/_/sbyor phyir maN+Dal lha ma pa brgyad/_/ba ser 
[\[234a.4\]]skya yi bdud rtsis byugs/_/yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i/_/sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas/_/lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya/_/cung zad lce la myang bas ni/_/dus dus sum brgya drug cu'i tshad/_/nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni/_/lo gcig dus su 
[\[234a.5\]]rtogs ldan 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/dpal bskyed 'tshe ba bzlog pa yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA 
[\[234a.6\]]ya/_na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rwa ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M tsakra warti bad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dzA la ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+tha dz+wA la A kar+Sha ya hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/_'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/_/bdun phrag 
[\[234a.7\]]sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i/_/yungs kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad/_/rang gi lus sam yan lag la/_/mchod dang bcas pas gdags par bya/_/de la yang yang gsol ba btab/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/mgon po pad+ma gar dbang gi/_/rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba satwA bA sa nA gA d+hi pa 
[\[234b.2\]]ti ni/_/na maHsarba satwA bi sa na/_A ha ra Ni/_na maHsarba satwA ba yo d+ha ra NA ya/_na maHstaM b+ha pra sha ma nA ya/_na maHsarba satwA bo d+hi tsit+ta tsi ka ti sa na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba satwA ba na d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba satwA duHkha bi mo k+Sha Na ka rA ya/_na maHsarba an+ta kA ra ba'i d+ha nA ma kA ra/_
[\[234b.3\]]na maHsarba bid+yA d+ha ra rA dzA pra sha pra sta ye/_ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/_ha sa ha s+ya nA ya/_na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong gir+N+Na ri shi bi ri dA/_nA ga yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/_shAkya brah+ma lo ka pA lA ya/_biSh+Na ma he shwa ra/_nA rA ya Na skan d+ha/_ku ber/_a su re n+d+ra/_ma tr-i ga Na/_
[\[234b.4\]]na ma skr-i twA/_badzra badzra khu Na sa hr-i da ya/_ha ya grI ba nA ma ya ma hr-i da ya m+nga/_war+t+ya Sh+yA mi/_a ba pra me yo ta sA d+ha ka na a ba ha na/_sarba pi nA ya kaM a mo g+haM/_sarba karmA b+hi Shiny+tsa/_bi nA ya kaM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M ta ru la/_ta nu ta la/_bi ta ru la/_sarba bi Sha ka ka/_sarba bud+d+ha bid ni/_
[\[234b.5\]]pra dzA ba ti ta/_a na la bi s+phu li ka/_aT+Ta hA sa ke shwa rA ya/_a to pa pra bi tA ya/_badzra khu ra ni rge ti ta/_tsa li ta pra pu da ta la/_badzrod shIn+taM ta ti/_si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na pa kA ra ba ra duSh+TaM/_bid+yA ka ma ga saM b+ha k+Sha na kA ra/_sarba bid+yau ba twa he sha kA ra/_pa ra ma shAn+tiM kA ra/_bud+d+ha bo d+hA 
[\[234b.6\]]ya ma ti/_b+ha ga bA na ha ya grI ba sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/_mA par ta yi Sh+ya mi/_kha tra kha dra/_ma hA ro Ta/_ma na traM rak+Sha rak+Sha At+ma swa sti taM man+taM/_sid+d+ha sA d+ha/_sarba karma su me/_sid+d+he sid+d+he/_de hi de hi/_A be sha a be sha/_pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/_sarba gra he Shu a pra te ha ta/_d+hu na d+hu na/_bi d+hu na 
[\[234b.7\]]bi d+hu na/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_sarba pa ra kra ma kr-i tA n+t+ra gra/_ka khor da du ra laM g+hi ta hi ba shi ka bi shi ka ta/_sA sha diSh+TA/_bi Sha tsUr+Na yo ga a b+hi tsa ra/_ba shI/_ka ra NaHsid+d+ha any+dza na/_tsa ku mo ha na tsin+ta/_piM she sa na kA ra/_nir+ya a pa ra br-i Sha ka ra na/_trA sa ya trA sa ya/_ma 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]hA bo d+hi sa twa/_rin d+ha di sha na~M/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba satwA nAM/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mA ma nu twa d+harma saM b+ha a nu dz+nyA taM me karma shI g+h+raM/_ku ru ku ru phaT/_ha ya grI ba phaT/_badzra daM Sh+T+ro ta ka Ta b+hA ya pa ra se nA phaT/_ye ke tsita mA ma e hid shi go pa kA ya kra min to/_man+t+ra yan+t+ra sa man 
[\[235a.2\]]ti/_dza pa ya ri dzu hu ti/_ka khor da ku rban di nAM/_sarba dza mu khen+d+ra pra ta na tA ya phaT/_na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra ho ta sA da nA ya ha ya grI ba sid d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_o~M a mr-i tod b+ha bA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/_na maHsarba sa twAM sh+tsa sid d+h+ya na tu/_me man+t+ra pa dA Ni swA hA/_gang zhig klus non 
[\[235a.3\]]spyi la ni/_/dung gi me tog sngags stong gis/_/byin gyis brlabs nas gu gul bdug_/lus la thogs na legs par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 
[\[235a.4\]]las/_/mgon po thugs rje mi bshol ba'i/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na maHA r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na maHsarba b+hi ma tsa ka raM/_sarba rog pra sha ma na ka raM/_/sarba byA 
[\[235a.5\]]da na b+ha da ka ra~M/_uSh+T+rak+Sha Na pa dis sa twe b+h+yaHtA rA saM mya ka tA rA NaM/_da sha di ka bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHsaM myak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI NAM/_a he na ma s+t+ri da Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra shud+d+ha d+hA ra Ni/_ma hA ru Ni kA ya a gra bI sh+ya ti/_mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a gra nA ma dz+wa la sa ti kA ra/_ma hA kA ru NA byu pa sa man+ta ha ra na 
[\[235a.6\]]tu/_tad+ya thA/_oM dza Ta dza Ta/_dzi Ti dzi Ti/_dzu Tu dzu Tu/_ra ra ra ra/_ri ri ri ri/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sarba ta thA ga ta/_ma hA saMgra ha/_a nu ha raM tu/_e h+ye hi sa na d+hA ya/_e h+ye hi/_tsa ta tsa ta/_tsi ti tsi ti/_tsu tu tsu tu/_sarba 
[\[235a.7\]]bo d+hi satwa/_pra Ni d+ha na gr-ih+Na/_kA ra a nu sa na d+hA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sa b+hu ba e h+ye hi/_ra la ra la/_ru lu ru lu/_d+h+ya na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi/_sa ma ba tI b+hish+tsa ra/_a d+hi tiSh+Tha/_tsa la tsa la/_tsi li tsi li/_tsu lu tsu lu/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_e h+ye e h+ye/_bud+d+ho bud+d+ho/_bud+d+ha sat+yen/_
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]d+harma sat+yen/_saM ga sat+yen/_o~M Te/_s+thA Te s+thA sarba ma hA mai tri b+hu ni pa ran tu/_ma hA kA ru Na me g+haM mA ma sarba rA ga ni ba ra yan+tu/_bu na bu na/_bi bu na bi bu na/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pram tha/_o~M Ta s+tho Ta s+tha/_e h+ye e h+ye/_mA ma sarba sha pu yan+tu/_karma bi sho d+ha ya/_ma hA kA 
[\[235b.2\]]ru ni kA ya/_ma hA pad+ma nA dA ya/_pad+ma a pA ya swA hA/_shwe ta Adz+nyA u pa bi d+hA ya swA hA/_ka ru ri ni swA hA/_shu ba dz+nyA+e swA hA/_tsakra NAM swA hA/_ya me ye swA hA/_oM da tse bi bud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/_saM s+phe tshe b+h+yoHbud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/_a du pa du ke b+h+yoHbyA d+hi de swA hA/_bi de ke b+h+yo byA te b+h+yaHswA hA/_bai d+ha de b+h+yoH
[\[235b.3\]]byA de b+h+yaHswA hA/_swa na ni pradz+nyA+e ke b+h+yoHbyA de b+h+yaHswA hA/_b+hU mi aM ti ri ka sha tsa re b+h+yo byA d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/_tad+ya thA/_o~M na tra Ta ta T+ra/_tri ti tri ti/_tu tu tu tu/_nA ma ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsa a pa tra be b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/_gra sa gra sa swA hA/_ma tha ma tha/_pra ma tha pra ma tha/_ha na ha na/_da 
[\[235b.4\]]ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_na maHAr+yA pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_sha ra ka ri'i sa bon las/_/stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang /_/lhan cig skrangs la byugs pas ni/_/lhog nad drag po 'joms par byed/_/
[\[235b.5\]]de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/rig sngags sbod gtong gzhom pa yi/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/mgon po don yod zhags pa yi/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na ma s+t+rai yad+h+ra a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+hA bo d+hi 
[\[235b.6\]]satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shrA pa ka saM g+he b+h+yo a tI ta anA ga ta pra t+yAta pan ne b+h+yaHna maHsaM myak+ga tA nAM/_na maHsaM myaka pra ti pan+na nAM/_na maHshA ra dA tI pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/_na maHArgya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaHna maHsu pra tiSh+Tha ta shai len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba 
[\[235b.7\]]ta thA ga te b+h+yaHa ra ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bang b+h+yaHna maHsu par+Na par+Na su pra ti b+hA sa bi na rti he shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsiM ha bi krI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHAr+ya a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta/_ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsa man+ta ra smyud 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]ga ta shrI Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi pa sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi shwa b+hu je ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHka na ka mun ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maH
[\[236a.2\]]shAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mun ye swA hA/_o~M sa se ma me ma hA sa me rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/_na maHsu pa ri kI rti nA ma d+he yA ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsa man+ta a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma

[\[236b.1\]]bo d+ha ya/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la bi tsa la/_pra tsa la pra tsa la/_e Ta Ta/_e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_

[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]sa/_/d+ha ma d+ha ma/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA/_ma hA ta mo an d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na/_Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/ma la ma la/_mi li mi li/_mu lu mu lu/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ke ra/_e h+ye

[\[237b.4\]]sa twa/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_bri ya bo d+hi satwa/_he hA lo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_ba ra ma mai tri tsit+ti ta/_tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka_/ku ru ku ru/_k+Sha ma ga ma bi haM ga ma bi ya ti/_bi dza yan+ti ma hA bi dza yan+ti/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_tsa yan+t+ra man+t+ra/_na mo me h+ya d+hi/_sarba satwA pA

[\[238a.1\]]bzlas nas byug par bya/_/lhag mas nad rnams thams cad la/_/byugs pa tsam gyis sos par nges/_/zla ba drug gis bdud rnams zhi/_/'dod pa thams cad skongs gyur te/_/mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub/_/gal te grub par ma gyur na/_/

[\[238a.6\]]hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo bi pu la bi ma la/_su pra ti pu la/_sUr+ya sha ta yaM/_a saM khe ya/_sU r+ya sha ta sa ha sra/_a d+hi ke ra/_e b+ha pa te mUrta ye/_ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kaN+Da la/_a laM kA ra d+hA ra NI/_b+ha ga ba te pad+ma mA le/_sarba lo ka a pA ya sha ma na ye/_bi bi d+ha 
[\[238a.7\]]mu khas ma be sha_/A bi sha sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/_b+hu ra b+hU ba swA hA/_ma hA lo ki shwa rA ya/_na ma s+tha mi ra ba tra bi nA sha ka_/rA ga be sha mo hA dz+wa la sha ma ka sha ma sha na kA ra/_rak+Sha ka sarba a b+ha ya durga ti pra sha ma na kA ra/_sarba sa ma sha na kA ra/_sarba A shA 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]pa ri pU ru ka_/sarba ta thA ga tA sarbaM d+ha na kA ra e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma a ba lo ka saM bud+d+ho/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_dza Ta mu ku Ta/_a laM kr-i ta shi ro ma Ni/_ka na kA rA dza ta/_badzra bai DUr+ya a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra a ma ta ta dza na ka ma a laM kr-i te pra b+hA ra Na sha ta sa ha sra a bi 
[\[238b.2\]]la sha ta kA ya/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/_bi daM kha da ma/_bi nA sha ya/_bi nA sha ya/_ma ha yan+t+ra ma kle sha ka pa ta/_a ba bo d+hi b+ha/_bo d+hi yaM tra/_g+ha ra tsa ra/_ka pra ma tha na ka ra/_pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha/_saM pra ra Na/_pu ru Sha siM ha/_bi ra bi ra/_dza su ta na ta Da ba ri 
[\[238b.3\]]br-i ta/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_sa ma sa ma/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_pra sha sa ma ya/_pra sha sa ma ya/_ki ri ki ri/_b+hi bi ri/_b+hi bi ri/_tsi ri tsi ri/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+dza muny+dza/_d+yu nu d+yu nu/_bi d+yu 
[\[238b.4\]]bi d+yu/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ga ya ga ya/_g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/_ha sa ha sa/_pra hA sa pra hA sa/_nA ga bi bi d+ha ke sha se sa na/_ha ra ha ra/_saM ha ra saM ha ra/_du ru du ru/_ma hA maM g+ha la sha ra Ni/_sha ta pra se/_ka ba a pa b+hA sa te bi bi d+ha pA sa na sha ma ka sha sa ka_/rA ga kA ma hA bo d+hi 
[\[238b.5\]]satwa/_b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/_thub po she dang shu dge la/_/khri phrag bzlas nas 'thungs bas ni/_/shes rab chen po 'phel bar byed/_/nad la mthun pa'i sman dang sbyar/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka rar bcas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig yang na bdun/_/sngags brjod snga bar mid par bya/_/
[\[238b.6\]]de yang dbyangs snyan shes rab 'phel/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/dgongs pa bla med ces bya ba'i/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/mgon po rdo rje chen po yi/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_

[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]sid+d+hi/_sid+d+he d+hA ra/_b+ha ga ba te/_pa raM pa ra/_kle sha da mi na/_a dz+nyA she Sha ma Ni sha ma ya/_sarba pA pa bi shud+d+he/_d+harma ni d+ha ma ni/_mA la dz+nyA go tsa re a paM go tsa ri ni sA shaM mur+d+hi/_su kha ra pra te/_sarba kle sha da ba ni/_bi d+ha ma ni/_bi d+ha ma ni/_bi d+ha ma ni/_bi nA sha bi nA sha_/bi nA sha 
[\[239a.2\]]ya bi nA sha ya/_b+ha ga ba te/_bu ra sa bi ma la ba d+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_pra sa ra pra sa ra/_bi sa ra bi sa ra/_A dz+nyAM ma i hi sa hA srA NAM/_tsit+ta na kA rA ma/_a ba ra na k+ShA ba yak+ShA ba yA mi ta su b+hU ta bi shA ya/_pA sha bi da ni pA ra mi tA b+hA dz+nyA na go tsa re/_pA sha sha ba ti/_
[\[239a.3\]]sha sha mA le ni kA ra Na go tsa re/_ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka ma ti su bi ni sh+tsi ta da d+ha/_he he b+ha ga ba te ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/_ku ru ku ru/_bi shi d+ha ma ba na/_mA ma sarba satwA b+ho ma hA kA ru No ta sA d+ha ke na/_sany+tsa sany+tsa saM brta ya/_sam+b+ha la pra ro ha ya me/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_bi dza ya ba ri shud+d+ha ya/_
[\[239a.4\]]a mu ka bi ku ru bi/_dza ya na/_sa ra sa ra/_me g+ha ga te/_mA mA mA/_bo d+hi tsit+taM sa ma bud+d+he ma na san+tu She/_bo d+hi mi ri kA ra ni/_bud+d+ha bo d+hi prA de/_nA ra ka pre ta ti r+ya ka ga ti duHkha gu la ni/_de ba ma nu Sh+ya ga ti saM bi da ni pa ga to kle sha sarbA nurda d+harma/_pa ri pU ra Ni badzra d+harma sid+d+ha n+tu me man+ta pa dA ni swA hA/_

[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]li/_tu le tu le/_ku ru me ku ru me/_si ri si ri/_bi si ri/_tsa ra ya/_be sha re/_gau re/_g+ha na d+ha re/_tra mi Ni/_ma taM gi_/puk+ka si/_ka Ta ya/_mA la tsaN+DA li/_hu ru mA li ni/_tsi li tsi li/_gra na sau mad r+sha ne ku ru/_tsan+d+ra mu khi/_la g+hu ma Na ya ma ti/_Ar+ya dak+Shi Na bud+d+he/_sarba 
[\[239b.2\]]bid+yA nAM/_mA ma pra sA d+ha ni/_sarba bid+yA nAM/_I shwa ri swA hA/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_sarba a pa ri pU ra ka na/_tad+ya thA/_oM ha ha ha/_ma ma ma/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_hi ri hi ri/_shAn+te pra shAt+ne/_sarba bA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/_a ba lo kA ya kA ru Ni ka_/bod+hi tsit+ta ma na si ku ru ba ya lo kA ya/_
[\[239b.3\]]mA ma sma ra sma ra/_sa man+ta ya pUrbe/_sat+t+ya a d+hi Sh+ThA na kri taM te na sat+ya na/_sa tsi ba tsi nA/_sarba ak+Sha mi/_pa ri pU ra ya/_bud+d+ho k+She tra me/_ba ri sho d+ha ya/_ma me kash+tsa/_pi he tha nor+tha bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ShA naM swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_o~M dze te dze te/_ma hA dze te yaM/_ma hA dze te yaM/_mA ma kA ya/_dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/_b+ha ga 
[\[239b.4\]]dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/_ma no dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/_d+ha ri ta tra staM b+ha/_ta ta sarbaM k+ShA pA ya/_A lo ka ya/_sarba ta thA ga tA/_d+ha ri ShA nAM tsi ma hA biSh+kaM k+Sha mid pod sed d+ha ri ShA NAM/_ma d+hu ma d+hu/_a ba b+hA/_sa me d+ha ri ShA NAM/_sarba ma ku sha la a b+hi ba ra daM da na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_
[\[239b.5\]]na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma hA satwa sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra ba deHswA hA/_sngags 'di gur gum tshan+dan gyis/_/gro ga la bris sku'i mchod rten/_/sku gdung bcas par gzhug par bya/_/yang na sku gdung dang bcas

[\[240a.1\]]skam po ser drug ste/_/dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa/_/seng ldeng yu ba khru gang pa/_/de yi rten yang sor drug ste/_/de ni zur brgyad ldan pa la/_/rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/_/pad+ma ral gri lcags kyu mda'/_/mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor bar dgod/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig

[\[240a.3\]]ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_sarba ban+d+ha ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/_sarba pA pa sa mu dro ts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma Na ka rA ya/_sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/_sarba b+ha ye Shu trA NA ya ta s+ya na ma skr-i taM/_i maM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ba nI 
[\[240a.4\]]la kaN+Tha nA ma hr-i da ya mA brta yiSh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha naM shu b+ha tse ta naM/_sarba satwA nAM/_pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha kaM/_ta d+ya thA/_a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/_lo ka ga ti/_e h+ye hi/_ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he bo d+hi sa twa/_he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/_he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/_he ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sma ra hr-i da yi/_e h+ye hi/_Ar+yA

[\[240a.6\]]lo ki te shwa ra kr-iSh+NA dzi na mu ku Ta a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra lam+ba pra lam+ba pi lam+ba/_ma hA sid+d+ha shud+d+ha d+ha ra/_ba la ba la/_ma hA ba la/_ma la ma la ma hA ma la/_dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/_kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na kr-iSh+Na pA sha ni r+g+hA ta na/_he pad+ma ha sta/_dza ya kA ra/_ni shA tsa re shwa ra/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI

[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]la/_ma hA pad+ma na b+hi/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_tawa nI la kaN+Tha/_e h+ye hi/_bA ma s+thi ta saM ha mu kha/_ha sa ha sa/_muny+dza muny+dza/_ma hA aT+TA T+Ta ni/_r+NA di ne/_e h+ye hi/_b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/_yo gI shwa ra/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bA tsaM/_sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/_
[\[240b.2\]]bi d+yAM sma ra s+t+waM he b+ha ga bAn/_lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/_ta thA ga tAM/_da dA hi me dar+Sha NAM/_pra sAd+ha ya me swA hA/_sid d+hA ya swA hA/_ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/_si haM mu khA ya swA hA/_ma hA na ra siM haM mu khA ya swA hA/_sid+d+ha 
[\[240b.3\]]bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/_pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/_badzra ha stA ya swA hA/_ma hA badzra hastA ya swA hA/_kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo ba bI tA ya swA hA/_ma hA kA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/_tsakra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/_shaM kha shab+da nir+NA da na ka rA ya swA hA/_bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/_bA ma

[\[240b.5\]]Ni kA ya/_sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa deHswA hA/_smug bu me len sbur len dang /_/shel dang bai DUr+ya ka ra ma/_/gser gyi snod du khur bcas ba/_/maN+Dal dbus bzhag sngags khri brjod/_/mug khri rdo yi kong bur ni/_/chur bcas snga dro sngar byas nas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod

[\[240b.7\]]tan rtse gcig tu brjod na/_/de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang /_/blo yi ra bar ldan pa la/_/lha klu 'bum phrag mthus skyob cing /_/dkar po dge ba kun slong sems/_/byang chub rin chen gter thob par/_/sngags kyi mthus ni 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]mdzad pa ste/_/sngags la nyes dad med pa la/_/bstan na rang nyid nyams par 'gyur/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[241a.2\]]yang dag bshad bya ba/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos/_/'jig rten mgon po sa bcu'i dbang /_/stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can/_/pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub pa/_/sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang /_/phyogs bcu kun du khyab mdzad pa'i/_/bcu gcig 
[\[241a.3\]]pa yi mtshan nyid nyid/_/bsod nams skal bar ldan pa'i mis/_/rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya/_/sngags dang bcas pa'i lus la ni/_/sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na/_/'jig rten gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/byad dang sha za ro langs dang /_/'byung po mtshon dang grib gnon 
[\[241a.4\]]dang /_/ltas ngan rnams ni myur du sel/_/bla ma las byung rim pas ni/_/myur du bla med byang chub 'gyur/_/bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni/_/nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/spyi bor yi ge o~M dkar po/_/nan tan du ni bsam par bya/_/dpral bar yi ge AHljang gu/_/de bzhin 
[\[241a.5\]]du ni bsam par bya/_/lce yi steng du yi ge mchog_/hrIHyig dmar po 'od ldan bsam/_/snying gi phyogs su hU~M sngon po/_/lte bar ha yig ser po ste/_/de bzhin gsang bar ho ljang gu/_/bshang ba'i gnas su ho sngon po/_/pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya/_/rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang 
[\[241a.6\]]ser/_/lag mthil gnyis la hU~M dkar po/_/lag ngar la ni hrIHsngon te/_/dpung par yi ge hraM dgod bya/_/yi ge tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas/_/gang dang gang yang rung ba yi/_/rtsol ba rnams la 'jug par bya/_/stsol ba de dang de dag kyang /_/sngags kyi byin brlabs las byung 
[\[241a.7\]]zhing /_/lus kyang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid/_/sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus nyid ni/_/sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur/_/sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams kyi/_/zhing khams du ma sbyangs nas kyang /_/'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni/_/'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa ni/_/kun bzang mchog 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]dang mtshungs pa ste/_/'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur/_/don de ma lus thob pa'i thabs/_/ngag gis rig par gyur ba yis/_/rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste/_/de la gang gnas de yi ming /_/rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/_/sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes/_/lhag dang 
[\[241b.2\]]bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni/_/shin tu ngal ba nyid yin te/_/ngal ba nyid kyis gol ba'i lam/_/bgrod par dka' ba de spangs nas/_/shin tu bag yangs bde ba'i lam/_/skal dman yang dag sgrub 'di la/_/nan tan du ni 'jug par bya/_/ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe/_/'khor 
[\[241b.3\]]rnams dga' nas thal sbyar te/_/mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang /_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso/_/thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te/_/bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang /_/gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i/_/zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la/_/'dzum bzhin du ni bltas 
[\[241b.4\]]nas kyang /_/gsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag_/pus btsugs thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/phyogs bcu rang rang bde bar 'khod/_/de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/_/'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs phyir/_/las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha dad do/_/
[\[241b.5\]]na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH_ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaMmyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu 
[\[241b.6\]]ru d+hu ru/_iT+Te baT+Te/_tsa le tsa le/_pra tsa le pra tsa le/_ku su me ku su ma/_ba re/_i li mi li/_tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/_shud d+hA ya swA hA/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/_'di gsungs tshe na sa chen yang /_/rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/_/rtsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas/_/
[\[241b.7\]]dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub/_/gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur/_/sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ha ra ha ra/_i li mi li/_tsi li tsi li/_khe le ha la swA hA/_dkyil 'khor nang du 'dug pa'i sa/_/chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod/_/khrus byas gos gon 
[\[242a.2\]]nang du 'jug_/snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang bsam/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yeH/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[242a.3\]]ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ha ra ha ra swA hA/_bdun phrag re re btab pa yis/_/spos bsregs pa dang mar me sbar/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maH
[\[242a.4\]]sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_si ri si ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_si d+hi ri si d+hi ri swA hA/_me tog byug spos me tog phreng /_/bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la/_/gtor 
[\[242a.5\]]dang byug dang gdags par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni 
[\[242a.6\]]kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sA d+he sA d+he/_so hi so hi/_so du so du/_bshos gtsang me tog 'bras bur bcas/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni/_/zhal zas dag gis rnam par mchod/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te 
[\[242a.7\]]saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sA mA d+hi si/_tsa le tsa le/_tsu ru tsu ru/_su ru su ru/_mu ru mu ru swA hA/_me tog dkar po'i shing dum bu/_/sum 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]cu bzhi mar sbrang rtsir ni/_/zhag gcig sbangs nas nyin gcig gam/_/nang re nub par re re la/_/sngags re btab nas bsregs nas gzod/_/ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na 'grub/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te 
[\[242b.2\]]saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaMmyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M i li mi li/_pi li ti li/_tsi li ti li swA hA/_chu 'am thal ba yungs kar la/_/lan bdun sngags nas phyogs 
[\[242b.3\]]bzhir gtor/_/sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang /_/mtshams gcod pa yi mchog lags so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba 
[\[242b.4\]]lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M bi ti bi ti/_ti Te ti Te/_pe de pe de/_ka tsa ka tsa/_b+ha ga bA na/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_sarba sA d+ha naM swA hA/_sku sogs slar yang spyan drang dang /_/rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir/_/
[\[242b.5\]]chu la lan bdun btab pa yis/_/bkrus nas dgongs pa de dag 'grub/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA 
[\[242b.6\]]ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M badzra hU~M hriHhoH/_'jig rten 'pho la rab dga' bas/_/zas skom byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/_/mgon po zhal 
[\[242b.7\]]ni bcu gcig pa/_/rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na maHsarba byU ha bi hi sarba a haM bud+d+ha shra ba ke saM g+he b+h+yaH/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te/_saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te 
[\[243a.2\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_a b+ha ya dA na/_sarba pa ta g+ha ra twA na ka raM/_sarba Ar+yA ya g+ha ba pany+tsa pra sha ma na ka raM/_sarba bi shud+d+ha/_kA la hi g+hA ba hA/_bi gra hA/_bra ma Na ka raM/_sarba pA paM nA sha ya ka raM/_sarba b+h+ya da be ta la/_pi sha mar+d+he na/_dur swa 
[\[243a.3\]]pa na/_durni mit+taM/_sarba big+h+NAM bi nA ya kAM/_bo d+hi satwA ka raM/_pa ra tsakra/_dur b+he k+sha/_sha ki b+ha ya ni sa ra ka raM/_sA de ba/_nA ga_/yak+sha/_gaM d+harba/_a su ra/_ga ru Da/_kin+na ra/_ma ho ra ga_/sarba ts+tshe da na ka raM/_sarba pi shA tse ke Ta b+ha/_su k+Sha d+ha g+ha d+ha/_krats+tsha ka li ra/_be Ta li/_
[\[243a.4\]]a maM ga la/_bi nA sha kA rA ya/_na mo nA tha ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/e ka da sha mu khaM/_sa ha sra b+hu dzaM/_sa ha sra ne traM/_tad+ya thA/_o~M dza ka ri/_yu di ta hA ra Na/_bi tsi tra mu khi/_e ka su mu kha/_sarba saM g+ha ma hA ra Ni dza muN+he/_sa ha sra b+hu dza ma hA ne traM/_ma hA shrI ni na laM kA ra/_ma Ni 
[\[243a.5\]]kuN+Da ya sa na d+ha hA sa nat+te/_bi tsi tra mU la d+ha re/_tsan+d+ra sUr+ya/_a ti re ka_/A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/_maM ga la sha ri dzI mu te be pit+ta pi na maM ga le/_b+hu ri mi tra kA ra ne/_tsu ru tsu ru shwe ta pA de/_mu ru mu ru/_shat+ta a ba nat+te/_hu ru hu ru/_pa bIt+t+ra mu khi/_ku ru ku ru/_tsi tra mu khi/_A di d+ya pA 
[\[243a.6\]]shA pa ra Ni ni/_dzaM b+ha ni/_maM ga d+ha ni/_sarba pA Ni ni/_sarba bIr+ya ram+b+he/_ma hA ni/_a mo g+ha pA sha ha sta/_sarba b+ha ya pi tsa yo ni ra tsa ri/_ag+ni bi shwa/_u da ka/_bA ya/_pra sha ma ni/_ka khorda ni/_bA na/_oM hi ri hi ri/_dza ya ka ri/_ba la ka ri/_da na ka ri/_te dzaska ka 
[\[243a.7\]]ri/_b+hi ba b+hi/_pra sha ma Ni/_yud d+hA ni par tsakra sha ma Ni ni ba ra s+ya/_bi na ni/_mu dot+te ra ni pra b+hu na b+he la/_ma Ni ma Ni/_ma hA ma Ni/_ma Ni d+ha re/_trai lo ka_/a laM ka ka ri ti bUrna ka ri/_bi daM sa ni/_ba ra b+he na/_pit+t+ra pA Ni ni/_sarba bIr+ya karma Ni/_su da ni/_sarba byA d+hi ni/_pra 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]sha ma Ni swA hA/_o~M tsi li mi le swA hA/_tsi li tsi li swA hA/_mi li mi li swA hA/_si li si li swA hA/_tsi li li tsi li li swA hA/_tsin+d+ha li ma ti ni swA hA/_Ur+d+ha ke sha piM ga la ke to d+he ma nu mu khaM swA hA/_o~M ka ra ka ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_muny+tsa muny+tsa 
[\[243b.2\]]muny+tsa ya/_muny+tsa ya/_pra shA ma ya/_pra shA ma ya/_yu d+ho da d+hA ra Ni phaT/_tsit+ta ni ra mA la ka ri phaT/_a su ra nA ri ki ti ha phaT/_dza ya ka ri phaT/_ska ti ri phaT/_sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/_sa ha sra ne tre phaT/_sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na ma sa kr-i te phaT/_sarba b+ha ya bi mok+Sha Ni phaT/_ma ra tsa kra na 
[\[243b.3\]]pa ra ra Ni phaT/_pa ra sai n+ya si gru pa Ni phaT/_sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/_sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/_sarba byA d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/_sarba gra hota ts+tshin+d+ha ni phaT/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/_sa pa ra sa pa ra/_naM te tsa ri sa ma nAM/_sarba bra ya pra te b+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaH
[\[243b.4\]]dus kr-i te b+h+yaHsarba kr-i ta kA khorda/_sarba bi She b+h+yaHsarba kA ya bAk+tsit+ta si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/_sa ha sra b+hu dze/_sa ha sra ne tra/_e ka da sha mu khi/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_sid+d+h+ya na tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_rje btsun zhal 
[\[243b.5\]]ni bcu gcig pa'i/_/sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te/_/gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du/_/yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs/_/'chang dang klog par byed pa des/_/mtha' yas yon tan rnyed par 'gyur/_/nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang /_/khyad par du ni sdig kun 
[\[243b.6\]]'byang /_/ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas/_/maN+Da la 'jam po lnga byugs la/_/gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus su ni/_/shing sku ring bsrel ldan pa bzhag_/gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi/_/sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te/_/tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni/_/lnga po dbus dang 
[\[243b.7\]]mtshams su ste/_/rigs lnga'i mdog dang phyag rgya can/_/sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang /_/srad bu tha dad bre bar bya/_/ci 'dod phyag rgya bri byas te/_/tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/_/'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de/_/bzhi khri rdzogs nas bco lnga la/_/
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas/_/ci 'dod myur du 'grub pa dang /_/bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang /_/rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa/_/khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur/_/sngags brjod yon tan mtha' yas rnams/_/bsdus nas sgrub 
[\[244a.2\]]po bla ldan 'gyur/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/_/sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang /_/gshis ngan shi ba bco lnga med/_/skye bzang bco lnga thob par 'gyur/_/mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang /_/dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang /_/stag sogs 
[\[244a.3\]]sbrul sogs gcan gzan gdug_/dug can zas dang me chus 'chi/_/srog chags mdun du nyal nyes dang /_/g.yeng byed dang ni lha 'dres gtses/_/gsor mi rung dang bdag lceb rnams/_/de la nam yang mi 'jigs so/_/rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing /_/'phags 
[\[244a.4\]]pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul/_/bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang po tshang /_/dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan/_/bran khol bzang zhing nor mang rtag_/gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor/_/sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas bsrung /_/sangs rgyas zhal mthong 
[\[244a.5\]]don zab brtags/_/gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed/_/snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang /_/yon tan dran nas spro ba dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang /_/phul du byung ba'i blo yis 'phel/_/tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang /_/bka' lung sde snod dad pa 
[\[244a.6\]]rnams/_/yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na/_/sngags 'dis rang bzhin med par byas/_/o~M swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/_'dzin pa drag po'i blo byung tshe/_/sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya/_/o~M shU n+yatA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 
[\[244a.7\]]haM/_gang gis lus ngag yid g.yo na/_/sngags 'dis brtan par byin gyis brlabs/_/o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/_gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang /_/ngang gis sa gzhi bgegs yod pa/_/bsal phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni/_/brag la skyes 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]shing gzhon pa las/_/sor drug tshad ldan phur bu ni/_/brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can/_/mgo bo rked pa rgya mdud tshul/_/sor tshad phyed phyed ldan pa la/_/zur ni bcu drug rked pa la/_/sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o/_/sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba/_/dpal mtho cung zad par reg 
[\[244b.2\]]pa/_/ngos dang skabs ni zab pa ste/_/sngags kyi byin brlabs ldan pa brgyad/_/khang ba'i zur dang phyogs bzhi por/_/g.yas su phyogs par gzugs par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/_na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ar+ha te b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_
[\[244b.3\]]na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/_hu lu hu lu/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_ha na ha na/_da ha da ha/_pa tsa pa tsa/_a mr-i te hU~M phaT/_ltas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang /_/gnas khang byin gyis 
[\[244b.4\]]brlab pa dang /_/tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang /_/dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/dang po thal mo sbyar byas te/_/phyis ni lag g.yon sdigs mdzub bcas/_/o~M dang a la la la ho/_/zhes brjod rngam cing khang pa yi/_/nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas/_/de nas hU~M sgras 
[\[244b.5\]]se gol gtogs/_/de nas o~M AHbadzra dang /_/s+thA na pA Ni b+h+yaHa haM/_/rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT brjod/_/shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la ni/_/rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas/_/bsrangs te mig ni sna rtser phab/_/dal ba'i rlung ldan rkan la ni/_/lce ni cung zad reg par bya/_/lte ba cung 
[\[244b.6\]]zad 'khum pa yis/_/sems ni bag yod gnas par bya/_/rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min/_/gtsang ma ma yin mi gtsang min/_/bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal min/_/bdag dang ngar min bdag med min/_/blang dang dor ba'i 'jig tshogs min/_/sems ma yin zhing sems 
[\[244b.7\]]byung min/_/phung khams skye mched med ma yin/_/yid min rtag min mi rtag min/_/mun pa ma yin shes rab min/_/'gro min 'ong min gnas ma yin/_/sna tshogs sprin glog du ma ni/_/'dod gzugs du ma sgyur byed pa/_/mkha' byung nam mkha' la ni thim/_/
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba/_/med mod na yang de ltar spyod/_/yul gyis ma skyes dbang po min/_/dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min/_/rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min/_/gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med/_/de la sems pa'i sems nyid 
[\[245a.2\]]kyang /_gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi gnas/_/gar yang ma song brtags na stong /_/brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam/_/dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste/_/kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la/_/brten nas rang gi sems bzung na/_/drod kyi bzhi pa dang por bzung /_/phyung ba'i 
[\[245a.3\]]gnyis pa de la brten/_/de la dang po gnyis pas bskor/_/dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste/_/bcu drug pa ni grogs su bzhag_/yi ge drug la grub pa ni/_/sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te/_/'od zer rnam pa drug tu bcas/_/rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas/_/
[\[245a.4\]]yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug_/yul drug dag gis dbang byas nas/_/nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas/_/nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin/_/phung po rnam pa drug dang ldan/_/phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni/_/yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur/_/yan lag rdzogs 
[\[245a.5\]]pa'i grib mar ni/_/rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed/_/sgrib gnyis go bas mthug po ni/_/bsal dka'i ri bo dang bcas pa/_/rtag chad gnas su zhugs pa'o/_/srog rtsol bsdam pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur/_/rtsol dang bral nas dga' 
[\[245a.6\]]skye ste/_/yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur/_/yi ge gsal ba'i 'od zer ni/_/ba spu khung rnams thams cad nas/_/sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste/_/slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni/_/yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigs so/_/'dzin pa de las thos nas kyang /_/sgyu 
[\[245a.7\]]ma'i rnam pa rjes dran bya/_/de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni/_/nyams pa med par thob par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin de brtan gyur nas ni/_/lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa 'thob/_/rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni/_/bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur/_/skad cig de la dngos rnams 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang /_/mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod/_/rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste/_/lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo/_/yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste/_/mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa/_/gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid/_/nyi 
[\[245b.2\]]zla kun tu bzang po ste/_/sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang /_/rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o/_/thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste/_/bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir/_/stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya/_/sems glong bas ni nges par 'grub/_/'das dang ma 'ongs da 
[\[245b.3\]]ltar gyi/_/dus ni rtag pa ma yin te/_/mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas/_/dus la tha dad mi rtog go/_/nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang /_/nam mkha'i phyogs na ji lta bar/_/sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya/_/gzhan ni go skabs mi byed do/_/'phags pa 
[\[245b.4\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/_thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas drang srong gnas nas ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba/_/bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[245b.5\]]rig 'dzin zhig_/rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la/_/dkyil 'khor drung du lhags nas ni/_/rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni/_/ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/_/o~M mtha' yas spros pa 
[\[245b.6\]]nyer zhi zhing /_/zhi mdzad dul zhi rab spyod mdzad/_/rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs/_/ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi las zhi gyur mtha' 'byung ba/_/chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che/_/spros med las spros dkar bcu bya/_/mtha' yas chos la 
[\[245b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/grol 'gyur grol mdzad dag pa che/_/dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon/_/tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal/_/tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo/_/rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan/_/'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o/_/rtag 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]pa don chen rtag zhugs la/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/_/khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa/_/thibs po'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams/_/mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang /_/sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'/_/mngon sum 
[\[246a.2\]]med la brjod bral yang /_/lkog tu gyur pa smos kyi dgos/_/lkog don mngon du byed pa la/_/phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog_/mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang /_/don la sems kyis gsal ba skye/_/don gang yang yang goms pa las/_/sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste/_/
[\[246a.3\]]de bsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu/_/sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o/_/blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang /_/'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang /_/rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyir/_/gzugs brnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol/_/myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang /_/myur du byang chub 
[\[246a.4\]]cher 'gyur cing /_/gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can/_/'dren pas de ring bshad du gsol/_/mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la/_/mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar/_/rnam rtog gis dkrugs sems la ni/_/su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur/_/dmigs pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[246a.5\]]gsal byed pa/_/gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste/_/legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing /_/byin brlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtsos/_/ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas/_/gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba/_/nga las 
[\[246a.6\]]nyan par brtson pa ni/_/legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog_/rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs/_/rtse gcig sems kyis nyan nas kyang /_/legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog_/khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba/_/byin brlabs dgye ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/_/tshon 
[\[246a.7\]]gyis ris su bris pa'am/_/rin chen rigs sam sa rdo 'am/_/shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags/_/dang po'i las can sems can la/_/dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_/byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/tsan+dan dkar po gsal zhing drang /_/gzhon 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]zhing chag gas med pa la/_/bsang zhing dud bas bdugs nas ni/_/dad ldan ngang tshul bzang pos bzhag_/'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku/_/bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la/_/gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste/_/rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis bskyed/_/bzhengs te 
[\[246b.2\]]ldem bag nyams dga' ba/_/rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan/_/g.yas kyi dang po bgrang phreng ste/_/gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag_/g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar/_/gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs/_/zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la/_/mdun 
[\[246b.3\]]gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can/_/byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs/_/dkar po dkar ser dmar skya bo/_/g.yon gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal/_/sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste/_/dmar dang dmar ser le brgan no/_/g.yas su gtum po'i khro zhal 
[\[246b.4\]]gsum/_/sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/_/rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar ba/_/rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal/_/khro bo'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs/_/mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni/_/gyen du thor tshugs bcings pa'o/_/steng du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal/_/
[\[246b.5\]]byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i/_/dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su/_/'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams/_/re re bzhin du gzhug par bya/_/dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang /_/rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang /_/lag rgyan se mo dor bcas pa/_/do shal 
[\[246b.6\]]rkang gdub ske rags can/_/rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/ri mo dag la dga' 'gyur nas/_/yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med/_/sred chung shes rab snying rje che/_/thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas/_/bsam pa bzang 
[\[246b.7\]]ldan tshul khrims bsrung /_/'dri chos gzob la gzhungs pa yis/_/dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri/_/gzugs bzang yid dal gtsang ldan pa'i/_/bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni/_/tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o/_/'thas par bcags te 'jam por 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]bya/_/thig pir phyogs su bshad nas kyang /_/ser skya tshon gyi gzugs brnyan ni/_/tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa'i/_/nan tan du ni bri bar bya/_/dkar po wa yi shel yin te/_/dmar po sems rtso li khri'o/_/sngon po rams dang mthing shing 
[\[247a.2\]]ste/_/ser po ba bla dag pa yin/_/nag po snag tsha nyid yin te/_/ljang gu rams dang ldong ros sbyar/_/yang na spong ma nyid kyis bya/_/smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te/_/gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/_/sbyin dang bral na grugs par 'gyur/_/shing spyin 
[\[247a.3\]]ser dang ka bi ta/_/lo mi ta dang than dza ra/_/de dag so sor sbyar ba yis/_/gsal zhing dkrugs med dag par byed/_/a ta pas ni snum par byed/_/gan to has ni rtag par 'gyur/_/rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/_/yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung /_/dkyil 
[\[247a.4\]]'khor cha rim gsum pa'am/_/yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung /_/dbus su gdong bcu gcig pa ni/_/mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri/_/shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/_/dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can/_/de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi/_/phyag bzhi 
[\[247a.5\]]pa dang bcas pa'o/_/lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/_/dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtso bo can/_/lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o/_/nub tu rigs ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/sems dpa' bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o/_/dbus 
[\[247a.6\]]su rdo rje dbang mo yang /_mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste/_/g.yas su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo /_/rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med de/_/g.yon du rdo rje don grub po/_/shar du lha mo spyan ma ni/_/mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'o/_/g.yas su rdo rje rgyal bo'o/_/rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste/_/
[\[247a.7\]]g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o/_/lhor ni lha mo mA ma kI/_/mdun du rdo rje rin chen no/_/g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste/_/rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no/_/g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yin/_/nub tu na bza' dkar mo yang /_/mdun du rdo rje chos yin te/_/g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin/_/rgyab tu 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]rdo rje rgyu zhes pa/_/g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o/_/byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang /_/mdun du rdo rje las yin no/_/g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o/_/rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te/_/g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro/_/'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste/_/g.yas 
[\[247b.2\]]kyi dang po rang rigs rtags/_/gnyis pa thams cad skyabs sbyin te/_/g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang /_/phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o/_/gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i/_/sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o/_/'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun/_/zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi 
[\[247b.3\]]pa/_/g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang /_/lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya/_/byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang /_/khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o/_/dbus su rdo rje hU~M byed de/_/sngon po ut+pa la yi mdog_/mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste/_/g.yas su rdo rje drag mo'o/_/rgyab 
[\[247b.4\]]tu rdo rje brjed byed pa'o/_/g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo/_/shar gyi 'khor lo'i cha rtsibs la/_/khro bo gshin rje gshed po gnag_/mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma/_/g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo/_/rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma/_/g.yon du rdo rje skul byed ma/_/'khor lo rtsibs ni 
[\[247b.5\]]mnyam pa la/_/khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser/_/mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo/_/g.yas su rdo rje me chen mo/_/rgyab du rdo rje zla ba mo/_g.yon du rdo rje rnon po ma/_/rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor ser/_/rdo rje khro mo khrag 'thung mo/_/rdo rje rlung 'dzin chen mo dang /_/rdo rje sdang 
[\[247b.6\]]byed mor bcas pa'o/_/nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin dmar/_/mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed ma/_/g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo/_/g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma/_/lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du/_/khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ljang /_/mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma/_/g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo 
[\[247b.7\]]ste/_/rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs ma/_/g.yon du rdo rje rengs byed ma/_/rtsibs drug 'khor lor bri ba ni/_/rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ljang sngo/_/mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo/_/g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ba mo/_/rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dag_/g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug_/de 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams/_/kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/_/khro bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu bkang /_/g.yas na be con kha T+wAM dang /_/tho ba rdo rje rgya gram dang /_/'khor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams/_/rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o/_/g.yon na 
[\[248a.2\]]sdigs mdzub zhags pa'o/_/kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can/_/khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/_/g.yas na gri gug cang te'u ste/_/g.yon na thod khrag kha T+wAM ngo /_/zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te/_/gzig gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/_/khro bo'i 
[\[248a.3\]]g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs/_/de rgyab cha yi snam bu la/_/phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang /_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi/_/phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul/_/de bzhin bskor bzhin sems ma mchog_/
[\[248a.4\]]lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang /_/'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas/_/gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/_/g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang /_/gnyis pa dar gyi chos gos so/_/kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan pa'o/_/de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni/_/
[\[248a.5\]]shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon/_/g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/_/gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can/_/g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste/_/gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri/_/de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser/_/ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la/_/g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma 
[\[248a.6\]]'chang /_/me phyogs su ni me lha ste/_/mdog dmar ra zhon me phung 'dzin/_/lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo/_/thod dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon/_/bden bral du ni srin po gnag_/rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon/_/nub tu chu lha dkar po ni/_/klu yi khri la sbrul 
[\[248a.7\]]zhags bzung /_/de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar/_/bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon/_/lha min phyogs su rlung lha ljang /_/ba dan bzung ste sha ba zhon/_/byang du gnod sbyin mi la zhon/_/ljang nag phyag na gter sgrom mo/_/byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni/_/rtse 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon/_/sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi/_/phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can/_/pi wang ral gri zhags pa can/_/rin chen dbyug tho g.yas kyis 'chang /_/gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste/_/g.yon pa ma la bgrang phreng ni/_/phyogs kyi kha 
[\[248b.2\]]dog ldan pa'o/_/kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog_/rim bzhin stag gzig dom seng ge'i/_/khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can/_/rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni/_/bsrung brtson shin tu 'grus pa'o/_/dkyil 'khor cha brgyad 'khor yug tu/_/bza' 
[\[248b.3\]]shing me tog spos shing dang /_/mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu/_/mdzes pa'i bya sogs dud 'gro dang /_/lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs/_/de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za grul bum bu mo'o/_/rol mo byed pa du ma bri/_/'di ltar dad na la las ni/_/
[\[248b.4\]]'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol du/_/gza' dang rgyu skar sum cu drug_/rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri/_/smin drug pad+ma dmar po 'chang /_/snar ma mgo ni ut+pa la/_/nab so pad dkar lag tri shul/_/rgyal ni bgrang phreng skag sbrul nag_/mchu ni pad ser bre mnyam gzhag_/
[\[248b.5\]]me bzhi pad dkar dbo dbyug pa/_/nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras/_/sa ga po ti lha mtshams bum/_/snron ni rdo rje snubs dbyug ste/_/chu stod ril ba chu smad pad/_/byi bzhin gser gyi 'khor lo ste/_/gro bzhin chu skyogs mon gru dang /_/mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis/_/ral 
[\[248b.6\]]gri khrums smad ku mu da/_/nam gru ba dan tha skar gyis/_/shing lo bra nye dbyug sran to/_/zla ba ku mud dkar po ste/_/nyi ma pad+ma dmar po'o/_/mig dmar me yi phung po ste/_/gza' lag ut+pal sngon po'o/_/phur bus chos kyi glegs bam mo/_/pa ba sangs ni bgrang phreng bzung /_/
[\[248b.7\]]spen pa lag na ral gri 'chang /_/sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gzhong bu'o/_/nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa/_/bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te/_/rtag dga' ma dang rgyal ma shar/_/don grub ma dang mi pham lhor/_/nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma/_/myur grub ma dang gtan ma byad/_/rtse lnga 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]rtse gsum rdo rje dang /_/sngon po ser po rin chen dang /_/dkar dang dmar dang ut+pal dang /_/ut+pal sngo dang ku mu da/_/dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang /_/skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang phreng ni/_/lhag ma rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang /_/de dag thams 
[\[249a.2\]]cad phyogs mdog go/_/rgyas pa'i spros pas skyo na yang /_/lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cu bdun/_/nyi shu dgu 'am nyi shu lnga/_/bco lnga dgu 'am lnga 'am gcig_/yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs/_/sprul pa sku yi cho 'phrul te/_/rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa yi/_/sems 
[\[249a.3\]]kyi byin brlab nyid du 'gyur/_/bde gshegs sku dang po ti dang /_/phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya/_/nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni/_/bkrus dang bshig nas dag byed la/_/rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su/_/de la bsod nams dpag tu med/_/gzugs sogs sngon 
[\[249a.4\]]bas dman gyur kyang /_/de yis bsod nams mtha' yas 'thob/_/phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de/_/de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid/_/byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang /_/mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste/_/sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o/_/
[\[249a.5\]]sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni/_/yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku/_/longs sku bsod nams rgyu mthun 'bras/_/sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'bras/_/kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan/_/dag dang ma dag skal ldan la/_/bde gshegs phrin las gzugs sku gnyis/_/tshogs 
[\[249a.6\]]gnyis la ni sku gsum byung /_/rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong /_/lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min/_/dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtogs pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku'o/_/rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni/_/skye 'gag med par thugs chud pa/_/yid 
[\[249a.7\]]kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis/_/bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya/_/dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can/_/lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba/_/kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor/_/thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung /_/sems kyi 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]dbus gces de phyir spyod spyad pas/_/dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du/_/pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan par/_/myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams/_/bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya/_/bla ma'i lung yod snying rje gang ldan pa/_/rgyal dang 
[\[249b.2\]]rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas/_/'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas dga' ldan gnas 
[\[249b.3\]]'khrungs pa/_/bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa/_/rig pa gsum ldan lha yi bu/_/mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol pa/_/spyan ras gzigs la cher dad nas/_/bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing /_/'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas/_/mgrin gcig 
[\[249b.4\]]tu ni 'di skad gsol/_/o~M khams gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso/_/'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/sa gsum ye shes 'od po che/_/bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog_/rig sngags bde ldan byin brlabs can/_/
[\[249b.5\]]g.yung drung rtag pa dam chos gtso/_/kun rtog sel skyob phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs/_/byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal/_/bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas/_/bad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bskal pa du mar 
[\[249b.6\]]bsags pa yi/_/thugs rje ye shes las byung ba/_/rig sngags phreng ba byin brlabs can/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/_/sems can rnams la phan don phyir/_/phyag rgya phrin las ldan par gsungs/_/las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing /_/nyon mongs 
[\[249b.7\]]bdag rgyal kyis bcings nas/_/le lo ser sna'i 'dab rdzab can/_/khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/_/myur du grol bar bya ba dang /_/thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te/_/srid 'dab stug po skems pa dang /_/myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir/_/lha dang gsang sngags 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]blang ba dang /_/phrin las sbyor ba ldan ba dang /_/brgyud ba rgyun gzhan med pa yi/_/sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol/_/rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni/_/bsgrubs kyang 'bras med ngal pa ste/_/'dren pa med pa'i shing rta ni/_/'khor 
[\[250a.2\]]lo bzang yang gang du phyin/_/nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir/_/rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs/_/bdag 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung /_/sdug bsngal mtsho skems nyi ma che/_/kun rtog rdul phung bsregs pa'i me/_/shes rab me tog 'khrungs pa'i rlan/_/
[\[250a.3\]]nad ngan kun sel sman mchog ste/_/bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu/_/bag chags bkrus pa'i chu rgyun yin/_/longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid/_/'khor ba las brgal gru gzings te/_/nyes pa kun sel rlung dang ma[{]chungs[,]chung[}]/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/
[\[250a.4\]]mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis/_/srab 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas/_/tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsungs/_/'gro la thugs rje chen po yi/_/sngags 'byung brgyud pa'i rim 'byung ba'i/_/cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa/_/shin tu legs so lha yi 
[\[250a.5\]]bu/_/nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su/_/sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar/_/pad+ma gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/tshon sna ma lus rnams kyis bris/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rig pa'i lha mo 
[\[250a.6\]]khro mor bcas/_/'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i/_/sku 'am phyag rgya bkod pa dang /_/mchod pa'i tshogs kyang bkram par bya/_/mar me yon chab byug spos dri/_/zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang /_/gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang /_/rgyan dang na bza' lhab 
[\[250a.7\]]lhub dang /_/sil snyan me tog phreng du ma/_/yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis brgyan/_/slob ma gus pas bla ma le/_/yon phul brtson byas 'di skad gsol/_/sems can kun gyi sems kyi gnyen/_/dmus long lam log las 'dren pa/_/rab rib sel ba'i thur ma can/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bdag la 'dren pa'i sgrol ma sogs/_/shes rab snying rje'i skya ba can/_/thos bsam bsgom pa'i gru gzings can/_/las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i/_/thabs brtson nyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal/_/byang chub lam mthong dpag yas thugs/_/'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs 
[\[250b.2\]]pa/_/dge brtson dge la bskul ba'o/_/dge bcu med pa dag la stsol/_/dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang /_/bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med/_/chos don gnyer ba'i don skyabs po/_/skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol/_/dpa' brtan zhi dul spyad pa 
[\[250b.3\]]yi/_/dga' slad slob dpon 'di skad brjod/_/o~M gti mug rnam dag bder gshegs thugs/_/rnam par snang mdzad skyabs su mchi/_/zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs/_/mi bskyod pa la skyabs su mchi/_/ser sna rnam dag longs spyod gter/_/rin chen 'byung ldan skyabs 
[\[250b.4\]]su mchi/_/'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i gsung /_/'od dpag med la skyabs su mchi/_/phrag dog rnam dag phrin las rgyal/_/don yod rdo rje skyabs su mchi/_/AHgnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa/_/chos dbyings chos la skyabs su mchi/_/skye med skye snang ltar 
[\[250b.5\]]grub chos/_/'phags lam brgyad la skyabs su mchi/_/don gcig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs/_/gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi/_/rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtog_/nyan thos dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/_/gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che/_/rang 
[\[250b.6\]]rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/_/snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel/_/sems chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi/_/gsod dang rku rdzun 'khrig spyod dang /_/tshig rtsub phra ma ngag 'khyal dang /_/brnab sems gnod sems log lta spyod/_/thar ba'i srog gcod bcu po spong /_/
[\[250b.7\]]chang 'thung til mar tshir las dang /_/mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod/_/srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum tshong /_/mtho ris lus kyi gags chen spong /_/rtags dang phyag rgya 'dra 'bag dang /_/rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/_/bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i yo byad sogs/_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]'gom dang bshig pa gtan du spong /_/mchod pa rnying dang sgog pa dang /_/'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang /_/sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas/_/srog chags yod pa'i chu rnams spong /_/deng nas bzung ste ji srid pa/_/byang chub snying po thug bar du/_/
[\[251a.2\]]sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang /_/dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang /_/sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs/_/nam du mi dor brtan por gzung /_/lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing /_/rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gzung /_/'gro la zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs/_/chos kyi sbyin 
[\[251a.3\]]ba ci 'byor stsal/_/theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams/_/mi 'gal sbyor bas rgyun du spyod/_/lus ngag yid dang longs spyod bcas/_/ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod/_/lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i/_/rig 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya/_/des spyod dam tshig 
[\[251a.4\]]dam pa rnams/_/sdom tshul brtan por gzung bar bya/_/'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la gtor ma sbyin/_/'dzam b+ha la ni chu yis mchod/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dag kyang chus mnyes bya/_/rdo rje slob ma rab dga' nas/_/ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod/_/
[\[251a.5\]]dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs/_/snying rje bdag la gzigs nas kyang /_/lha dang sngags dang byin brlabs thabs/_/de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol/_/rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs pa'i/_/nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che/_/yid bzhin longs 
[\[251a.6\]]sbyod char du 'bab/_/khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/spros bral dmigs su med pa'i don/_/lam chen bdag la stsal du gsol/_/de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa/_/de nyid bcu sbyar 
[\[251a.7\]]mkhas pa bos/_/g.yon pas chos gos rtse bzung ste/_/lag pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can/_/gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'od rgyas/_/dad dang ldan pa 'di skad brjod/_/o~M bu shog theg pa chen po yi/_/khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir/_/gsang sngags spyod 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]tshul cho ga rnams/_/khyod la nges par bstan par bya/_/sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/_/rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/_/mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes rnams/_/shAkya seng ge dpa' bos kyang /_/gsang 
[\[251b.2\]]sngags sbyor ba mnyam med kyis/_/bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/dbung chen dag kyang 'dis bcom mo/_/'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/_/de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir/_/bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig_/
[\[251b.3\]]sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba dang /_/lha yi rten mig de la mchod/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar/_/'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag_/brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig_/'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo /_/sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni/_/de bas kyang ni ches dkon 
[\[251b.4\]]te/_/gang gis mtshungs med sems can don/_/mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/_/bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig_/gang la sdig khur ci yod pa/_/lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang /_/byin brlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas/_/blo gros dri ma med pa yis/_/spyod 
[\[251b.5\]]tshul brlabs bzhugs nas lha/_/ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcas nas/_/mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don spyod/_/bdag nyid chen po khyer rnams kyis/_/rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring rnyed/_/gang phyir rgyal bsras bcas pas/_/bdag nyid chen po khyer rnams ni/_/gang 
[\[251b.6\]]du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir/_/deng nas khyed rnams theg chen rigs/_/sha stag tu ni skye nges te/_/theg pa chen por cher 'byung ba/_/dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di/_/gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang /_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/_/de bas spro la 
[\[251b.7\]]brtson par gyis/_/slob ma ku sha dge ba yi/_/stan la nyal nas rmi lam dri/_/bsang dang sbyang ba byas nas kyang /_/chus bkrus 'di rnams bklag pa dang /_/bkra shis du ma bklag byas te/_/gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang /_/'bras kyi me tog phreng ba ni/_/lha yi 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dkyil 'khor dbus su dor/_/slar blangs mgo la bcing bya ste/_/pad+ma ldan rigs mtshan gyis brgyan/_/mig phye de la lha rnams dang /_/byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi/_/yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba/_/mchod rten lha tshogs bcas 
[\[252a.2\]]ba bstan/_/yid ches dad ba mngon byas la/_/ci 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/_/de nas dag pa'i sras de la/_/mar me la ni mar me ltar/_/'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya/_/brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa yis/_/rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs/_/sngags kyang gsal 
[\[252a.3\]]bar sbyin par bya/_/zhi ba shel gyi phreng ba ste/_/rgyas pa la ni a ru ra/_/dpar la lung thang dmar po shis/_/drag po rwa 'am ru drAk+Sha/_/po de tses ni las kun byed/_/sngags bcas stsal nas mgo la bcing /_/hU~M dang bcas ba'i rdo rje yang /_/lag pa g.yas su 
[\[252a.4\]]gzhag par bya/_/stod g.yogs kriSh+Na sa ri ste/_/smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o/_/dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/_/zhal zas snod ni pad+mas brgyan/_/sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas/_/thub pa'i bkra shis bzhes pa'i rtags/_/gdugs nya bum pa 
[\[252a.5\]]dpal be'u dang /_/rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma stsal/_/nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir/_/'dod yon phyogs ris grub pa'i rdzas/_/gi'u wang dU ra pa li khri zho/_/bil ba sbrang rtsi a rur/_/ka ra bI ra'i 'bras bu rnams/_/hrIHzhes dag bas stsal bar bya/_/gur kum 
[\[252a.6\]]ga pur gla rtsi dang /_/ba yi 'o mas sbyar byas nas/_/tshig 'dis lce la gzhag par bya/_/o~M yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang /_/ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang /_/dri ba lan ldon spobs pa rig_/phyi nang mtshan nyid don rig shog_/badzra d+harma pra be sha/_/o~M bcas 
[\[252a.7\]]brjod cing lce la ni/_/lan gsum rdo rje gzhag par bya/_/hIHyig dmar po me 'bar bsam/_/gang la goms pa de 'byung zhing /_/goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na/_/rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad ba'i phyir/_/kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad/_/dmigs pa'i rten 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]gyi sngags la yang /_byin brlab tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas/_/phyag na 'khor lo 'chang la dmigs/_/ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste/_/dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs/_/gzugs bzang 'od pas pad+ma ste/_/spobs pa 
[\[252b.2\]]'dongs pas ral gri'o/_/gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste/_/rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur/_/shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo/_/khang bzang gis ni mi'i rgyal po'o/_/thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam/_/thal sbyar ba ni 'gro bas bkur/_/
[\[252b.3\]]'khar gsil byams dang snying rje skye/_/lcags kyu 'jig rten skyong bas bsrung /_/rin chen ze'u 'bru lce bder 'gyur/_/dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur/_/bgrang phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob/_/khri rkang gis ni nyed bang 'gyur/_/lha sogs bdug pa dung yin te/_/mdung 
[\[252b.4\]]rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal/_/pad+ma dmar pos lha ru skye/_/ril pa spri blugs tshangs ris skye/_/sprin mdog lnga ni drang srong skye/_/me long gis ni lha zhal mthong /_/pad+ma rA gas ye shes skye/_/pad+ma sngon pos dag ba'i zhing /_/pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel/_/
[\[252b.5\]]ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phel/_/dgra stas bdud kyi bar chad sel/_/'khor dang sems mthun 'bring g+ha ras/_/phub kyis dgra dang gcan gzan 'joms/_/rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag_/me tog snye mas nad sel byed/_/rin chen mdas ni yid 'ong grogs/_/gzhus 
[\[252b.6\]]ni nor dang go 'phang rnyed/_/chu shes dug dang tshad rims sel/_/mi 'jigs phyag gis 'jigs skrag 'joms/_/dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste/_/rdo rje nag po bdud 'dul 'gyur/_/rin chen ral gris rig sngags bzlog_/lto ba na las lhung bzed de/_/rims nad sel 
[\[252b.7\]]byed zhags pa'o/_/'bru 'dod pas ni 'phru'i snye ma/_/nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug_/yang na lung bstan 'dod pas na/_/mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya/_/mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na/_/sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya/_/de nas mgon po spyan ras 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]gzigs/_/'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i zhal/_/sa yi snying po la gzigs nas/_/sa yi [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]'di gsungs so/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni/_/gsang sngags thams cad sa bdun te/_/gsang sngags sa dang sngags sbyar sa/_/rig 
[\[253a.2\]]'chang sa dang rig gsal sa/_/rig mchog sa dang rin chen sa/_/phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so/_/gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa/_/gnas skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs/_/kun tu 'od dang pad+ma'i spyan/_/yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa/_/rdor 'chang 
[\[253a.3\]]ye shes bla ma'i sa/_/rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa/_/sa'i snying pos gsol pa/_mgon po 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/byin brlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/_/klu phyugs 'bum phrag drangs ltar dge ba kun 
[\[253a.4\]]slong gi/_/byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/_/rab dga'i 
[\[253a.5\]]tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha/_/ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba/_/rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig_/'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te/_/me tog rin chen rigs byung ba/_/ston pa'i phyogs su char bzhin phab/_/mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkang /_/'khor dang 
[\[253a.6\]]bcas pas mgrin gcig tu/_/gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/_/lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang /_/rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i/_/rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa/_/rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir/_/bdag dang sems can kun tu yang /_/dngos grub 'byung rim bshad 
[\[253a.7\]]du gsol/_/la la sems ni g.yengs pa yis/_/bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyang /_/sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'byung /_/snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye/_/gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslu/_/dngos grub med pas bstan pa gzhig_/sred pas lan cig 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]sogs par 'gyur/_/gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro/_/la la las kyi skye mched sgo/_/dbang po rten khang dmar myur la/_/gdams ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi/_/chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing /_/gang la dbang du bzung ba yi/_/bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur 
[\[253b.2\]]nas/_/sdang ba 'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur/_/des kyang gnyis kar dmyal sogs 'gro/_/la la thos chung shes rab dman/_/rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can/_/bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la/_/skyon smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro/_/la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen 
[\[253b.3\]]gyis/_/log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can/_/yang dag lam smod brtson pa dor/_/log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro/_/la la bsam med sngags brjod med/_/mar me bdug spos gtor ma sogs/_/'byung pos brlams te bdag nyid dang /_/'khor bcas tshe thung longs 
[\[253b.4\]]spyod 'grib/_/la la 'dod sred gtum rdeb che/_/mkhas gzhan dag la phrag dog gis/_/sgro skur tshul 'chos chos la dmod/_/rang nyid lta ngan bsgrub la rtsod/_/ther zug blo yi mun pa can/_/'byung po drag po'i rigs su skye/_/la la ser sna rab 'jug pas/_/lha dang bla ma 
[\[253b.5\]]tshig gis bstod/_/zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang /_/me tog bdug spos gtor ma sogs/_/nyung du mug tshul rgyun stsal na/_/zas skom dag gis gdungs pa yi/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dman pa'i rigs su ni/_/yang nas yang du skye bar nges/_/de phyir de dag spangs nas ni/_/
[\[253b.6\]]ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas/_/tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis/_/gtan la phab don ma 'khrul bar/_/brjod cing yid la byed pa dang /_/the tshom med par brtson byed pas/_/'gro tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob na/_/rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos/_/de nas 
[\[253b.7\]]lag na rdo rje gtso/_/ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus/_/'gro la snying brtser rab gzigs nas/_/gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsung /_/nga la nyan par brtson byed pa/_/shin tu legs so lha yi bu/_/lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i/_/ting 'dzin nga yis bshad 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]par bya/_/khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis ni/_/legs par nyon la yid la zung /_/shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i/_/dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'/_/rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje can/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso/_/rang gi sems la bskyed 
[\[254a.2\]]par bya/_/shin tu gsal na dngos grub 'gyur/_/dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems/_/gnyis pa yi ge byang chub sems/_/gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sems/_/bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems/_/lnga pa byin brlab rgyas 'debs sems/_/sgra dang brag 
[\[254a.3\]]cha'i tshul 'byung bar/_/gtso bo'i 'khor gyis khyad par gsol/_/dbus su yi ge o~M la ste/_/shar du hU~M ste lhor ni swA/_/nub tu hrIHyig byang du hA/_/rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed/_/lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas/_/dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin/_/rigs 
[\[254a.4\]]kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi/_/rig pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing /_/rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams/_/nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su/_/phan tshun du ni bltas nas gnas/_/ldem bag na bza' 'phyang 'phrul dang /_/'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs/_/du 
[\[254a.5\]]ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste/_/la la ldem bzhengs 'gying dang bcas/_/la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas/_/la la pad+ma'i skyil krung ste/_/la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can/_/la la khro thabs brkyang bskum can/_/la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang /_/la la zhabs ni gnyis 
[\[254a.6\]]yin te/_/la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis/_/la la pad sdong pad+ma can/_/la la pad+ma mi 'jigs phyag_/gun d+he bum pa 'khar gsil dang /_/rnga yab legs so skyabs sbyin phyag_/rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang /_/'khar rnga shing rnga rdza rnga dung /_/zangs lcags rdo dang rus pa'i 
[\[254a.7\]]rnga/_/ring zlum rked nyag leb phyal che/_/chung phra sbom yangs dog pa dang /_/ral gri chu gri gri [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang /_/sta zur sta leb phyal sta dang /_/sta chung gzhog sta 'bigs sta dang /_/zlum sta 'phreng sta gzhar sta dang /_/mdung dang mdung rtse gsum 'phen 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mdung /_/'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing skyogs/_/snye ma tig bu me tog dang /_/sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang /_/ba dan bad gdugs rgyal mtshan spungs/_/rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom/_/'khor lo glegs bam ut+pal lo/_/de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas/_/
[\[254b.2\]]phyag rgya stong snyed tshang pa'am/_/brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug_/nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug_/bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung /_/phyag rgya bcing ldan phyag rgya ste/_/des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed/_/goms pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che/_/seng 
[\[254b.3\]]ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhon/_/rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can/_/rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag_/pad+ma sdong bcas ral gri 'bar/_/dpa' bo'i lcags kyu thod pa ni/_/nang ma bdun gyi cha gnas pa/_/gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma/_/g.yon du klu yi dbang 
[\[254b.4\]]phyug mo/_/pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng /_/phyogs mdog sems dpa'i skyil krung can/_/yid bzhin nor bu rta la bcibs/_/zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang /_/rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag_/skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can/_/'khor ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste/_/
[\[254b.5\]]mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni/_/yid myur rin chen bzang mo dang /_/pad rgyal mo dang rta rna mo/_/rin chen pad+ma zla nyi la/_/'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o/_/pad+mo 'byung gnas rma bya zhon/_/zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldem bag can/_/pad+ma skyabs sbyin lcags kyu dang /_/
[\[254b.6\]]ril ba spyi blugs phyag na 'chang /_/sgeg mo phreng ma glu gar ma/_/pad zla sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo /_/mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bcibs/_/ral gri pad+ma mda' gzhu dang /_/skyabs sbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs/_/bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma/_/sa srung mo dang rab 
[\[254b.7\]]brtan mo/_/de dag gang gi cha byad mtshungs/_/don yod zhags pa klu steng bzhugs/_/rin po che dang zhags pa dang /_/skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o/_/seng ge mo dang glang po ma/_/stag gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan ma/_/pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la'o/_/ha la ha la ru sbal 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]steng /_/rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin dang /_/chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o/_/nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma/_/chu dbang mo dang nor phreng mo/_/dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o/_/mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che/_/chu srin steng du rol pa'i tshul/_/Da ma ru dang bgrang 
[\[255a.2\]]phreng dang /_/mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go/_/lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma/_/gsang ba mo dang ring bsrel mo/_/glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug_/chos kyi 'khor lo chos 'chad rgya/_/skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas/_/dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma/_/sil snyan 
[\[255a.3\]]ma rnams pad zlar ni/_/phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o/_/rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni/_/ha ri ha ri ha ri zhon/_/zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la/_/'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang /_/pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang /_/bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'chang /_/
[\[255a.4\]]mkha' lding gdong ma shA ri'i gdong /_/nyi zhal zla zhal lha mo'o/_/mgrin sngo dga' bo nye dga'i steng /_/zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang /_/po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang phreng phyag_/seng ge gdong mo klu zhal mo/_/dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo/_/pad zlar sems dpa'i skyil 
[\[255a.5\]]krung ngo /_/dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig_/gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo/_/sngags srung ba dang grub srung ma/_/gong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go/_/phyogs bzhi 'khor lo'i cha la ni/_/gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas/_/shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni/_/
[\[255a.6\]]thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug_/rdo rje phyag rgya gter sgrom can/_/kun kyang pad+ma zla ba la'o/_/lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste/_/grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal/_/grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang /_/gru 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/nub tu pad+ma'i dbang 
[\[255a.7\]]phyug ni/_/skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni/_/pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag_/rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang /_/'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags 'chang /_/kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel/_/phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can no/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang /_/rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po/_/kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams/_/bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du/_/rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di 'byung ba'i/_/sangs 
[\[255b.2\]]rgyas stong yang dgod par bya/_/de ltar rgyas par spros pa ni/_/lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar/_/chig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha/_/mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi/_/lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o/_/spyan ras 
[\[255b.3\]]gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu/_/'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga/_/rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga/_/rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun/_/dkyil 'khor de dag re re la/_/sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste/_/rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga/_/rgyu 'bras 
[\[255b.4\]]tshul du rnam pa dgu/_/ye shes cha la lnga yin te/_/chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal/_/gang gang mos pa de dang de'i/_/dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am/_/gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas/_/khams gsum rgyal por longs
