[\[255b.5\]]spyod che/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/_/gtsang sbra che zhing dad sems can/_/rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan stsol/_/blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod/_/ngag snyan ngang gis khro ba med/_/g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med/_/lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang /_/
[\[255b.6\]]nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med/_/gtong phod snying rje drag ldan pas/_/spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas/_/de yi snying po rtsa sngags la/_/bar chod med pas rab brjod nas/_/gzhan la phan phyir smon lam brjod/_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal 
[\[255b.7\]]lo/_/gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe/_/khro bo chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/_/de dag myur du sel byed shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la nad rims gang byung tshe/_/gso dpyad sman dang sman par ni/_/bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/mu ge'i nang du byung gyur tshe/_/phyogs gcig nas ni rnam g.yos nas/_/zas skom rgyun chad med par shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang du 'khrug pa che byung tshe/_/
[\[256a.2\]]rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas/_/bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/byol song gcig la gcig za dang /_/zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe/_/de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig_/spyan ras 
[\[256a.3\]]gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]zas skom gdungs pa dang /_/log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe/_/nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang /_/shes rab gru 
[\[256a.4\]]dang ldan nas kyang /_/thabs kyis sdug bsngal las grol shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag_/mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzeg_/'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 
[\[256a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang /_/der phyin de rnams zad pa yi/_/gnyen po sa sar 'byung bar shog_/spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/_/dmyal rnams tsha grang gcad gtubs tshe/_/go cha che dang bsil grib dang /_/drod kyi 
[\[256a.6\]]'od du gyur par shog_/rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis/_/yang dag lam nyid rtogs par shog_/kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni/_/sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog_/mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas/_/'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags 
[\[256a.7\]]'gyur/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas/_/dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir/_/bsgrub pa la ni brtson par bya/_/zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig nas/_/khrus byas gos sar gyon byas nas/_/sku gzugs 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas/_/smyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la/_/dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad/_/brjod cing ci 'byor mchod par bya/_/chos brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni/_/dben par gdan khri bzang po la/_/sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas 
[\[256b.2\]]gzhag_/bza' btung dang ra bas sbags pas mchod/_/a ka ru dang du ru ska/_/bdug pa rgyun du bsreg par bya/_/'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing /_/zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya/_/de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag_/'o ma zho dang 'bras chan 'tshal/_/
[\[256b.3\]]lha la mchod pa cher bskyed nas/_/byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad/_/du ru ska yi mar du sbang /_/dum bu re re sngags re dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsreg_/sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo/_/steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra/_/legs so 
[\[256b.4\]]legs so rigs kyi bu/_/khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can/_/'dod sman don gnyer gang yin pa/_/mkha' la 'bur ram rkang mgyogs sam/_/drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la/_/bdag dang skal ba mnyam 'dod na/_/de ring nyid du stsal bar bgyi/_/bco 
[\[256b.5\]]lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs de/_/bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi/_/mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs/_/gso sbyong blangs nas smyung ba yis/_/skya snar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad/_/sngags re brjod pas sku la brdeg_/de tshe mdun zhal rtsa ba nas/_/'brug 
[\[256b.6\]]sgra chen po lta bu 'byung /_/sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_/de cho bdag nyid ma skrag par/_/sngags bsgrub rjes su dran bya ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/thugs rje che dang ldan pa la/_/bdag nyid 
[\[256b.7\]]gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang /_/'gro ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams/_/tshul bzhin du ni skong bar shog_/de tshe 'dod pa stsol ba la/_/lha klu tshogs kyi bar chad med/_/sngags kyi 'dod don 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]kun grub yin/_/bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo/_/phyag 'tshal rten la bskor ba dang /_/mchod rten brtsig dang dkyil 'khor ni/_/rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/_/rgyun chad med par brtson pa na/_/
[\[257a.2\]]dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni/_/de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad/_/gang la dge spyod g.yel ba yi/_/le lo can ni bdud bzung nas/_/gya tshom smra zhing chos la smod/_/bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur/_/de phyir dmangs 
[\[257a.3\]]rigs gdol pa can/_/log spyod can ni ring du song /_/ser sna le lo nga rgyal can/_/bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni/_/bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa/_/zhugs dang spar la gtang bar bya/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 
[\[257a.4\]]rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs/_/sngags brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bshad/_/nad gdon gang dang gang la yang /_/sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la/_/rang gis rtse 
[\[257a.5\]]gcig sems kyis bzla/_/dang por snying rjer bcas pa yi/_/sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol/_/de tshe mchod la brtson par bya/_/smyo nad nyin re ldang ba dang /_/nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa/_/nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims/_/'byung po mkha' 
[\[257a.6\]]'gro sha za 'am/_/smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po/_/'dre gdon drag pos bgyid mod kyang /_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur/_/yang na srad bu kha dog lnga/_/mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/_/mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags/_/kha na ma 
[\[257a.7\]]tho bsags pa yi/_/sgrib kun zhi zhing byang 'gyur na/_/bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos/_/bde rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/skrangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_/shu ba phol mig rma mdze dang /_/me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs/_/ma rungs 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa yi nad rnams dang /_/ral gri mda' mdung la sogs pas/_/myos sam de yis nyen pa dang /_/sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang /_/bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa/_/gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang /_/brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod/_/yang na sa ser 
[\[257b.2\]]'jim pas byugs/_/de yis nad las grol bar nges/_/bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi/_/gzhogs gcig phyogs su nad langs sam/_/rna ba 'on nam sna sub na/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'am/_/'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang /_/lan bdun brjod nas 
[\[257b.3\]]sku byug dang /_/zos shing rna ba snar byugs nas/_/sos par 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/_/nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang /_/bsrung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir/_/byin brlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs/_/na mo 
[\[257b.4\]]bud d+hA ya gu ra be/_na mo d+harmA ya twa yi ni/_/na maHsang g+hA ya ma hA te/_tri b+h+yo pi swA hA nA ma/_nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas/_/sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhi/_/lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing /_/rtag tu sems dga' dam pas 'thob/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[257b.5\]]zla 'od kyang /_/bsrung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs/_/sha ma ta he ru sha ho/_/Adz+nyA pa te/_su ru te/_shaM ke Te/_ba ra ma bya te/_su ru Te/_kA la Ta te/_khi ma te swA hA/_tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/_/bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig_/na sar btags na nad sel 
[\[257b.6\]]'gyur/_/gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob/_/sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la/_/bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos/_/seng ge stag gzig dom dred kyi/_/pags la nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags/_/brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon/_/de ma thag tu rims sel 
[\[257b.7\]]'gyur/_/blo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la/_/lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug_/ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar/_/sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/_/nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na/_/'byung po 'bros te nad las grol/_/til mar nang du ru rta btsos/_/
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang /_/zha grum myur du sel bar byed/_/yang na rtsi mar nyid la bya/_/til mar lte bar bskus pa yis/_/myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges/_/lcim rtsas sha ma thon par nges/_/du ru ka dang sbyi mong sbyar/_/snying nad drag po 
[\[258a.2\]]sel bar 'gyur/_/ba rog mo yi lci dron gyis/_/rma khar bslan na mes tshig sos/_/srin bu ring mo snying la za/_/rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung /_/des ni srog chags bud par 'gyur/_/'bras la rams kyi lo ma yi/_/khu ba bskol bas byug par 
[\[258a.3\]]bya/_/bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa bcir/_/nyal kar mig tu blugs na sos/_/mtshan ma skrangs la skud dkar ro/_/de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/_/brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/_/dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal/_/phug ron ril ma nyi shu 
[\[258a.4\]]brgyad/_/bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang /_/shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges/_/thal ba'am phye ma la ni sngags/_/stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol/_/gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la/_/dri bzang chu la bzlas nas bkrus/_/bu med 
[\[258a.5\]]bu 'dod don du ni/_/stong bzlas ba mar btung bar bya/_/byi ba sbrul dang ru sbal sha/_/phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rengs/_/mar ga ni dang shu dag dang /_/lga dang go snyod sbrang rtsi sbyar/_/sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+yA 
[\[258a.6\]]ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_khA hi khA hi/_ba li te swA hA/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M pad+me phu/_ma hA pad+me phu/_pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/_
[\[258a.7\]]a mo g+ha be te/_na mo a do ta ku tA ya/_sa ra sa ra/_gats+tsha gats+tsha/_i maM ma k+Shi ro gaM nA sha ya swA hA/_nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang /_/thal bas mig ni phyi rol bsku/_/mig nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/_/skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun/_/sngags bdun 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]bzlas pas rna ba yi/_/nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/_/gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas/_/sna yi nad ni sel bar byed/_/a ru ra yi phye ma dang /_/sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pas ni/_/so yi nad dang lce yi nad/_/thams cad 'joms par shes par bya/_/
[\[258b.2\]]o~M hU~M shrI hU~M shu k+She phu/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla/_/'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M rat+na she/_ma hA tsaN+Da a su ra marta ka_/dz+wA la dz+wA la/_ts+tshin da 
[\[258b.3\]]ts+tshin da/_hu ru hu ru/_ki ri ki ri/_ha na ha na/_sarba dz+wa reM ru dra ka_/ban d+he na/_mA ra ya mA ra ya/_sarba gra ha~M swA hA/_sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang /_/mgul du btags na nad rnams sel/_/gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis/_/las rnams de dang de la sbyar/_/
[\[258b.4\]]sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa/_/g.yen pa shu ba ske nad la/_/sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug_/gang zhig brtson du zhugs pa la/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la/_/tsan+dan lde gu snying gar byug_/gang gis mig nad sel ba la/_/shing dngar chu 'am spos chu 'am/_/la la 
[\[258b.5\]]sha yi khu yis bya/_/rna ba la ni til mar gyis/_/gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang /_/'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru/_/gang yang byis pa bsrung ba ni/_/seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa/_/pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /_/don 
[\[258b.6\]]yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag_/stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na/_/tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod/_/ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha'/_/shing kun dung sbrul pags pa dang /_/ras ba las bon drung po dang /_/de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis/_/nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i 
[\[258b.7\]]skra/_/byi la'i rtug pa bri ha ti/_/shug pa bya rog sgong dang /_/ba lang rmig pa na le sham/_/da da ra dang lhan cig sbyar/_/de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis/_/bgegs rnams sel phyir du dra yi/_/dud pa bcu drug zhes bya ba'o/_/pu shel tse dang ba bla dang /_/btsan 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]dug gi ni sbrul shun gyis/_/bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel/_/nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed/_/ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni/_/so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab/_/yi ge hrIHyis byin brlabs nas/_/mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/_/brgya rtsa 
[\[259a.2\]]brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni/_/dug dang rims nad sel bar byed/_/skyer pa bskol ba'i khu bar ni/_/so mar dza'i phye mar sbyar/_/ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas/_/zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams/_/zos kyang 
[\[259a.3\]]lus la gnod pa med/_/'o mar yungs pa srang gcig bskol/_/so ma ra dza blugs te blud/_/so so 'chang la ha la'i sngags/_/brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ba/_/brjod de blud na skyugs nas ni/_/dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim gyi dud pa rgyam tshwa dang /_/
[\[259a.4\]]skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas/_/phye ma mar sar sbrang rtsi bcas/_/ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya/_/sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/shu dag ru rta a ga ru/_/yung ba bong dang dkar po rnams/_/don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye/_/
[\[259a.5\]]byugs pas dug rnams thams cad sel/_/rgyam tsha srang gang mar srang gnyis/_/gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol/_/rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs/_/dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/rgyam tsha tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi/_/sbyar te mi shol sngags 
[\[259a.6\]]brjod nas/_/byugs na reg pa tsam gyis ni/_/sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/_/ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis/_/lcim rtsa myang tshwa spar bcas la/_/gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung /_/dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/ser po gnyis dang ldong 
[\[259a.7\]]ros dang /_/go thal gur gum le brgan rtsi/_/pad+ma rgyan lung bsngags kyi btung /_/dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed/_/gang la gza' dang rgya skar gyi/_/'tshe ba byung na de bsal phyir/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyi/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]rnams su/_/mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni/_/mkha' lding gzugs su 'gyur ba la/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis/_/gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod/_/nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i/_/khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs/_/mnan pa'i 
[\[259b.2\]]mkha' lding mig sman mdog_/nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs/_/mig gsum ldan pa brjid pa'i lus/_/rin chen lnga yi sder gshog can/_/rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas/_/nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i 'od/_/snying gar nyi ma 'od 'bar la/_/gaM yig nag po 
[\[259b.3\]]sngags kyis bskul/_/sbu rnams zings kyis gyur nas kyang /_/phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro/_/gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te/_/gdon dang klu rnams sreg par byed/_/thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags/_/'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod/_/gang yang 
[\[259b.4\]]grangs med stong phrag ni/_/las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub/_/mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus/_/klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya/_/de la mgrin pa sngon po yi/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas ni/_/sa steng gtum po klu yi gdon/_/du ma nges par 
[\[259b.5\]]sel bar byed/_/klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsreg_/'gro la mdze nad gtong bar byed/_/mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma/_/me tog thod pa kha T+wAM ga/_/g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na/_/ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang /_/mgon po seng ge'i sgras bskul nas/_/dpa' 
[\[259b.6\]]rlabs bskal ba'i me dang mnyam/_/sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can/_/mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni/_/mgon po ha ra'i sngags kyis bskul/_/mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni/_/ljang gu ral gri phur pa 'chang /_/pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul/_/las 
[\[259b.7\]]rnams gang dang gang la yang /_/sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o/_/ci ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas/_/lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya/_/ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yi/_/sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur/_/da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya/_/sku yi mdun du langs nas 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]kyang /_/rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam bskul/_/lag gnyis so sor thur du brkyang /_/gung srin so sor mthil du bkug_/mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang /_/gru khug lag mthil mdun du bstan/_/'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las/_/rgyal 
[\[260a.2\]]phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M a ba te pa ra te/_e h+ye hi swA hA/_yang na sngon ltar lus bsrang ste/_/snying gar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol/_/mdzub mo gnyis 
[\[260a.3\]]sbrengs rtse mo sprad/_/mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug_/lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa/_/gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag bya'o/_/bgegs kyi 'tshe ba 'byung ba'i tshe/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te 
[\[260a.4\]]shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi sa twA ya_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da lA ya/_e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/_yang na sgom la 'jug pas ni/_/thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo /_/bus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar/_/mdzub gnyis bkug la 
[\[260a.5\]]rtse sprad nas/_/de la mtheb gnyis sbyar bar bya/_/'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges/_/yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas/_/sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya/_/mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub nang sbyar/_/smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_nam 
[\[260a.6\]]Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba duSh+Ta na mo badzrA ya me swA hA/_khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur/_/yang na 'greng ste mnyam gzhag rgya/_/snying gar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na ma Ar+yA ba 
[\[260a.7\]]lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M sarba de ba a na le swA hA/_glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin/_/yang ni 'greng ste rting pa sprad/_/lag gnyis 'jigs byed tshul du bya/_/rtsa sngags gang rung brjod pas ni/_/ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]'gyur/_/yang na pad+ma rgyan lung gi/_/rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis/_/mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te/_/mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo sprang /_/gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/_/dgug na mdzub rtse bskul zhing dgug_/
[\[260b.2\]]yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug_/g.yon pa slar btang bya ba'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M brah+ma e h+ye hi swA hA/_yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na/_/mdzub mo g.yab la lha chen 
[\[260b.3\]]rnams/_/yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la/_/nyi zla gza' bzung dus su ni/_/gzungs sngags ba mar la bzlas na/_/phyag rgya btab nas zos pas ni/_/shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel 'gyur/_/nad med gzugs bzang 'thob par nges/_/'grang ste rkang gshibs thal 
[\[260b.4\]]sbyar nas/_/mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa/_/snying gar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya/_/mchod sogs las kyi sdon 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo /_/mdzub bkug mthe bo sen mor bcas/_/lag gnyis 
[\[260b.5\]]rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya/_/thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang /_/mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang /_/mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o/_/lag gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang /_/bdug pa bzang la sngags 'di bzlas/_/na mo 
[\[260b.6\]]rat+na tra yA ya/_nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na mo rat+na sha ri tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsa ka bi sha rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M rat+ne rat+ne/_ta ta sha rat+na/_ta ta sha rat+na pri te ma he rat+ne pra b+ha te/_rat+na gar+b+he swA hA/_snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[260b.7\]]brjod do/_/nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur/_/'gro gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na/_/so shing la ni nyi shu gcig_/ldob skyen 'dod pa shu dag la/_/stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying gar bsku/_/gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas/_/gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]kyang 'bros/_/na maHsarba bud d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M hu pi hu pi/_ka pa du pi/_pra gA ya ni swA hA/_rnam grangs bdug 
[\[261a.2\]]pas sangs rgyas bdug_/lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya/_/yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bo ni/_/lag mthil bzhag nas sor mos dgab/_/rna ltag phyar nas mdzub mo ni/_/brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang /_/g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/_/dus ma yin 
[\[261a.3\]]par 'chi sogs bzlog_/lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang /_/sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las/_/mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor ni/_/sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya/_/oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni swA hA/_de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi/_/gung gnyis nang du gshibs bsgreng ba/_/
[\[261a.4\]]mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o/_o~M dI pa ta lo tsa na swA hA/_de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis/_/rtse sprad sbrengs pa bdug spos so/_/oM d+hU pa d+ha ta swA hA/_rting sprad so so rtsengs sar dgug_/byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya/_o~M d+ha le be t+ya swA hA/_rting sprad sor mo gyen du 
[\[261a.5\]]bgrod/_/zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya/_/o~M nai bi d+yi pro k+Sha taM swA hA/_lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad sprad/_/mthe bong gyen du yan pa ni/_/na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/o~M b+hA sa ra Ni swA hA/_snyim pa kha phye bteg pa'i tshul/_/ro ma stsal pa'i phyag rgya'o/_/
[\[261a.6\]]o~M A~M krU~M hrIH_sa ka la g+ha na pa ri wa re naM/_pa ri ke ra a a/_a pa ta raM te/_a ba ta raM te/_a pa ta ra~M tu/_da sha di ka lo ka pA la/_sa pa ri wa re b+h+yaHi daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu khA daM tu/_pi ban+tu/_ya thai ba~M ya the Sh+TaM/_dzaHhU~M baM hoH/_saM tr-i b+hA sarba satwA ni/_shAn+tiM ku ru/_puSh+TiM ku ru/_
[\[261a.7\]]ba sha~M ku ru/_A ba ra Na ku ru gup+ti/_ka ro ta kurbAn+nyu/_hU~M hU~M phaT/_Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya/_A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/_oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+yA nud pan+na twA ta o~M AHhU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M hrI dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/_longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la/_/chu gtsang rtag tu 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]sbyin par bya/_/oM AHhrIHlo ke shwa ra hu nu smr-i ti ka rA ya swA hA/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rnams la sra ra zas/_/ci phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal/_/rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs/_/lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang /_/'byung po [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kun brtson 'gyur/_/sems kyi lcags 
[\[261b.2\]]kyu ldan bya ste/_/nyon mongs sems la rab drangs te/_/lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i/_/kun slong byang chub rin chen gyi/_/las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed/_/mdzad pa rgya che kun grub 'gyur/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i 
[\[261b.3\]]rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/_/nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/_/'khor gyi tshogs dang btsas pa zhig_/mchod pa'i bkod 
[\[261b.4\]]pa chen po dang /_/bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis/_/bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas/_/bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang /_/phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig 'khod/_/pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol/_/mgon po yon tan kun 
[\[261b.5\]]gyi rgyal/_/ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso/_/thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal/_/'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/_/mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku/_/gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la/_/blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can/_/sku yi gsang ba 
[\[261b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab/_/nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas/_/tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung /_/gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo/_/ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo/_/bsam yas bsam du 
[\[261b.7\]]med bsam pas/_/bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang /_/thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i/_/ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa/_/kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi/_/sgron ma de ring bshad du gsol/_/byis rnams mun 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa'i 'obs su ltung /_/nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyis skrag_/rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs/_/nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la/_/shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis/_/bag chags 
[\[262a.2\]]bcas pa gtan spong ba'i/_/thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas/_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas/_/nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas/_/shes rab 
[\[262a.3\]]snying rjer 'brel ba yi/_/sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma rnams/_/bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di/_/nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni/_/legs so byang chub sems dpa' che/_/dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so/_/rtse gcig gus dang bcas pa yi/_/sems kyis 
[\[262a.4\]]legs nyon yid la zung /_/nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su/_/shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/_/gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/_/shar ram lho yi sgo gtod bya/_/dkar po ser po dmar po dang /_/ljang gu'i 
[\[262a.5\]]tshon gyis bri bar bya/_/dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/_/dkar po'i lte ba 'tsham bar dmar/_/mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o/_/gser dngul zangs sam sa nyid la/_/bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra/_/kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la/_/shin tu gtsang 
[\[262a.6\]]mar bkrus nas kyang /_/ga pur gur gum cu gang dang /_/gla rtsi gi'u wang chu yis bkang /_/bya gri seng gri ha sa der/_/ka ri kar ni de ba ko/_/nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang /_/gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang /_/man shel yin te rin chen lnga/_/bum par 
[\[262a.7\]]stsal nas ras dkar gyis/_/mgul ba bcings nas kha rgyan yang /_/dri zhim shing lo me tog gzhag_/me tog phreng dang bcas pa de/_/pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang /_/rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas/_/dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas/_/'jig 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]rten dbang gis gang ba yi/_/sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/_/sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas/_/dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te/_/legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur/_/rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi/_/lha mo tshogs dang glu len 
[\[262b.2\]]dang /_/bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur/_/de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi/_/'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis/_/shing chen yongs su smin pa las/_/bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin/_/rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par 
[\[262b.3\]]bya/_/skar ma la sogs 'bab pa'am/_/tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar/_/sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya/_/lha la yang yang bskor bar bya/_/las rnams gang dang gang la yang /_/lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya/_/de dang de ni las rnams la/_/ci bde bar yang 
[\[262b.4\]]sbyar bar bya/_/phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags/_/lhog pa 'brum bu la sogs la/_/mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis sbyar/_/gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste/_/byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/_/don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bkru/_/shes 
[\[262b.5\]]rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos/_/klu nad ha la ha las sel/_/tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste/_/mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed/_/ha ri chen po bdug spos te/_/gdong bcu gcig pas glo bur sel/_/seng ge sgras ni mdze nad sel/_/rnal 'byor yo byad 
[\[262b.6\]]'dod pas ni/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru/_/bkra shis rol mo du ma dang /_/gtsang sbra gos gsar ldan pa yis/_/snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru/_/myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang /_/'dod yon kun grub sngags phreng ni/_/gang dang gang yang 
[\[262b.7\]]sbyar bar 'gyur/_/phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe/_/mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug_/sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas/_/zla ba sos nas mar blangs te/_/zos sam lus la byugs pa yis/_/nad 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/ldong ros gi'u wang cha mnyam pas/_/sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla/_/chus sprus dpral bar thig le ni/_/khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub/_/chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na/_/nad dang bgegs 
[\[263a.2\]]rnams dag par 'gyur/_/bse 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug_/dgra dpung phyogs su bstan na ni/_/dgra g.yul shin tu nyes par 'gyur/_/bal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas/_/bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad/_/sku yi drung du 
[\[263a.3\]]bsregs pas ni/_/mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad/_/skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po/_/sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun/_/zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni/_/nad pa la btags rims nad zhi/_/sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig_/
[\[263a.4\]]mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas/_/mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon/_/drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed/_/gal te des kyang ma sos na/_/mdud re brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas/_/zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te/_/blangs te btags 
[\[263a.5\]]na nges par grol/_/sdug bsngal nad pa yun [{]rings [,]ring [}]gdungs/_/khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas/_/'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras/_/sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad grangs te/_/gong ltar bsgrubs pa'i skud pa yang /_/lus la btags na grol bar 
[\[263a.6\]]nges/_/mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang /_/byad stems drag po bzlog pa la/_/sku la spos dang me tog mchod/_/bi nA ya yi gzugs mdun du/_/bra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming bsreg_/sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad/_/mdud ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags/_/
[\[263a.7\]]zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol/_/mdud pa re re'i bar du ni/_/sngags re brjod cing bcang bar bya/_/bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong /_/rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o/_/brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni/_/tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/_/mdud re sngags re brgya 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]rtsa brgyad/_/mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa/_/zhag gcig lon dgrol lus btags na/_/las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub/_/gang zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas/_/las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing /_/dus dus bkra mi shis byung na/_/
[\[263b.2\]]gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis/_/brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod/_/dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya/_/gnyis pas bi nA ya ka bkru/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas/_/rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya/_/bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub/_/ci ltar 
[\[263b.3\]]sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir/_/byi la'i mgo rus thal ba dang /_/sa bzang chu gtsang sbrus pa'i sa/_/byi la yi ni gzugs byas te/_/sku yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang /_/khro zhal g.yon par srad bus gdags/_/rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag brab/_/
[\[263b.4\]]gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis/_/dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du gtub/_/dum bu re re sngags re dang /_/dong gi nang du dor bar bya/_/de dag gnod pa gtan du sel/_/mig nad sna tshogs ma rungs la/_/'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags/_/sbrang 
[\[263b.5\]]dkar khye'u 'tsho nu zhor bcas/_/bu btsas gsar pa'i bud med dang /_/khyi phag dag gis ma mthong byas/_/thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags/_/sngags stong bzlas nas sbyar ba des/_/mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye/_/mig nad thams cad sel bar 
[\[263b.6\]]byed/_/mig rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus/_/ga bur gu gul cha mnyam bskol/_/khyor gang bldag par 'gyur ba de/_/rtsa ba'i zhal gdangs sngags stong bzlas/_/bkrol nas ril bu byas mid na/_/ha la ha 
[\[263b.7\]]la'i dug 'joms 'gyur/_/glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni/_/mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun/_/stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul/_/dpral bar thig le byas gyur na/_/lha klu 'byung po mi rnams dga'/_/khyo shug mi mthun brtags pa la/_/dur 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pa'i mjug sgro sku'i mdun du/_/stong bzlas lag tu blangs na 'dum/_/chu skam pa 'am char med na/_/ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la/_/cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du/_/stong brjod chur skyes char chen 'bebs/_/gang zhig char che ring 
[\[264a.2\]]'dod ni/_/'gog par snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing /_/sku yi mdun du rtag par ni/_/a ka ru nag bdug pa sogs/_/mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing /_/brgyad nas nya bar sngags stong brjod/_/mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dri zhim 
[\[264a.3\]]dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la/_/rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog bzhi/_/bla re yol ba dkar po yi/_/dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te/_/ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chu dang /_/bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya/_/ba mdog ser 
[\[264a.4\]]skya'i mar gyi ni/_/sgron me'i phreng bas mchod par bya/_/man shi ri ka ku shu dang /_/pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang /_/rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang /_/nya rkun nag po'i smyu gu dang /_/ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang /_/ku ba nas dang gi'u wang dang /_/gur 
[\[264a.5\]]gum dmar dang ser po dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs/_/de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang /_/ga bur stsal nas re re'i tshad/_/sngags ni stong phrag re re'i grangs/_/sku yi mdun du brjod par bya/_/de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas/_/sngags 
[\[264a.6\]]khrir bcas te nya la ni/_/zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal/_/sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni/_/mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab/_/'khar ba'i thur mas mig tu stsal/_/ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'dzag_/sprin dkar sprin dmar g.yos pa dang /_/klad pa 
[\[264a.7\]]na dang mig nad dang /_/glo bur long dang thibs pa sel/_/nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nad/_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur/_/gsum pa gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/_/bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad byang /_/lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal/_/drug 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]pas rmi ngan byad stems sel/_/bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med/_/bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob/_/gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur/_/bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu/_/lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams/_/drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha/_/bdun 
[\[264b.2\]]pas nag po chen po 'grub/_/brgyad pas ma mo dgus gter mthong /_/bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur/_/bcu gcig lha mo'i khang par phyin/_/bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim/_/bcu gsum klu yi khang par phyin/_/bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas/_/
[\[264b.3\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste/_/bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges/_/bcu bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang /_/rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med/_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs/_/bcu dgu rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur/_/nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis/_/
[\[264b.4\]]lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur/_/nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin/_/mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/_/lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang /_/dam chos nyan dang zhing spyod 'gyur/_/mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di/_/
[\[264b.5\]]sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang /_/de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/_/sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis/_/bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i/_/'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyon/_/ga bur gla rtsi gi'u wang dang /_/gur gum dzA ti li shi dang /_/ka tan la dang sug 
[\[264b.6\]]smel dang /_/tsan+dan dkar dang pad+ma dang /_/gser gyi me tog ut+pal sngo/_/re re la yang sngags stong bzla/_/sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig sbru/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal/_/dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste/_/tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/_/nyin re sngags 
[\[264b.7\]]stong brjod par bya/_/mchod pa rgya cher mchod par bya/_/bstod dang gsol ba gdab par bya/_/dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang /_/[{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla/_/de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste/_/dgos pa gang dang gang la yang /_/lha ni de dang de dag 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]sbyar/_/gang la bgegs kyis gnod gyur nas/_/pad+ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun/_/'go ba'i nad yams bsal ba dang /_/ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas/_/gos la sogs pa bdug par bya/_/gzhan dag dga' bar 'dod pas ni/_/yid 
[\[265a.2\]]bzhin nor bu'i phreng sngags kyis/_/mig gi steng du byug par bya/_/rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa/_/pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na/_/rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags kyis/_/dpral bar thig le bya ba'o/_/mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni/_/seng ge sgra yi phreng 
[\[265a.3\]]sngags kyis/_/lus la reg pa bde bar byug_/long du zhugs pa'i nad la ni/_/ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus/_/rang gi khong du btung bar bya/_/byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/_/don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug_/dug nad sel la mgrin 
[\[265a.4\]]sngon te/_/sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni/_/gdong bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar/_/rgyal srid thob par byed pa ni/_/mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung ngo /_/de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/_/'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang /_/lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis/_/nyin gcig 
[\[265a.5\]]nas ni nyin bdun bar/_/glo bur ba yi rims rnams dang /_/rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims/_/brtun byed la sogs rims rigs dang /_/glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon/_/nad drag po ni ji snyed dang /_/dug rigs rims dang lba ba dang /_/'bras dang 
[\[265a.6\]]lhog pa me dbal dang /_/shu ba rngo dang 'brum bu'i rigs/_/phol mig me dbal bal ldog sogs/_/mngon du gang dang gang snang la/_/sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni/_/sku zhal dbus la btags nas ni/_/mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod/_/tshes 
[\[265a.7\]]gcig nas ni tshes brgyad bar/_/gsol ba yang ni gdab byas nas/_/tshes dgu'i snga dro dgrol bar bya/_/bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/_/dri bzang byugs pas nad rnams sel/_/cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni/_/sna nad ru rta 'bru mar byug_/yang na gre bar sngags 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]bcas gdags/_/byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la/_/'bru mar ram ni srad bu bya/_/dud 'gro la ni chu nyid dam/_/yang na srang bu bya ba ste/_/rtsi mar dag gis mchog tu 'gyur/_/sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang /_/sku byad mtshan dpe ldan pa ni/_/
[\[265b.2\]]me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/_/gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/dang po skye mched drug ldan sems/_/thun mong rigs can sra ba'i khams/_/gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni/_/thun mong kun du zhugs pa'i rigs/_/gsum pa rigs 
[\[265b.3\]]pa'i rtags ldan pa/_/rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/_/bzhi pa lhag sems mthun ldan zhing /_/gsang sngags sngon du gyur ba yi/_/lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems/_/drug pa bdag gzhan dbyer med sems/_/bdun pa chos rnams 
[\[265b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sems/_/brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems/_/dgu pa rten 'brel zab snang sems/_/bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems/_/bcu gcig mtshan bral snang ba'i sems/_/bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems/_/bcu gsum lhag par 
[\[265b.5\]]'byung ba'i sems/_/bcu bzhi shes bya mthar thug sems/_/rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang /_/rtag dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i/_/gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs/_/sems rtogs gyur nas sangs rgyas chos/_/rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad/_/
[\[265b.6\]]'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i ri yi bar/_/spros pas lha 'bum phrag dge kun slong sems/_/dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling /_/thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba 
[\[265b.7\]]zhes bya ba las sku la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/_/rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/_/shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa yi/_/nya na ka zhes la sogs pa/_/drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]gcig tu/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/_/oM kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha/_/mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad pa/_/bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog_/'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhi ba chags bral 
[\[266a.2\]]'od gsal ba/_/rgyun chad med pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul/_/skye rga na 'chi las sgrol zhing /_/rnam dag bsgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal/_/sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang /_/sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs/_/rgyun mi 'chad du sku 'byung ba/_/
[\[266a.3\]]thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/_/de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab/_/dbang phyug chen po mchog gi lha/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/_/'gro la thugs brtse'i slad du ni/_/rig sngags bla na med pa gsung /_/sngags de 
[\[266a.4\]]myur du 'grub pa dang /_/skongs dang ngag la sel ba'i phyir/_/me yi las la brten pa'i phyir/_/sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol/_/de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang /_/mchod pa'i char chen phab 
[\[266a.5\]]pa ste/_/thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/_/de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab/_/'gro ba'i gnyen gcig 'dren pa'i gtso/_/sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'di/_/nan tan du ni bka' stsal to/_/sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas/_/
[\[266a.6\]]dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/_/'bras phye ba mar 'bru bzang rnams/_/shing rtsi shi 'am brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bsgrags pas nad yams gnod pa zhi/_/nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btung /_/nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur/_/yang na 
[\[266a.7\]]'bru men phye ma 'am/_/sa 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te/_/srad bus khro ba'i zhal btags nas/_/rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/_/ral gris gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya/_/brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams/_/yang na dug gis gzugs 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]brnyan btum/_/dug khrag nim pa'i shing la bsreg_/drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs kyis ni/_/tshar bcad pa yi dbang du 'gyur/_/'byung po drag po zhen pa la/_/gu gul yungs kar de ltar bsreg_/bal po se'u lcug ma la/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi 
[\[266b.2\]]zho mar sbag_/sku yi mdun du bsregs pas ni/_/'go ba'i nad yams 'chad par 'gyur/_/gu gul dkar po nyi shu gcig_/bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs/_/zho mar sbrang rtsi lung tang shing /_/nyi shu rtsa gcig sku mdun 
[\[266b.3\]]bsreg_/sa chen rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyed 'gyur/_/gang gi bsod nams rgyas 'dod na/_/dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la/_/gru bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya/_/dri bzang shing la khru gang brtsig_/many+dzu sha ka 
[\[266b.4\]]yungs kar sbrang /_/'o ma zho mar a ka ru/_/tsan+dan dkar po dmar po dang /_/dri zhim mtho gang tshad kyi shing /_/'bru bzang tshad dang bcas pa dag_/dang por sngags stong bzlas nas kyang /_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis/_/tshe ring nad med 
[\[266b.5\]]rgyal srid 'thob/_/stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'grub/_/khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te/_/'bum gyis gzugs khams mngon du gyur/_/sa yas rgyal sras kun mthong zhing /_/mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur/_/bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong 
[\[266b.6\]]zhing /_/zhing khams du ma spyod par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la/_/ci srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/_/brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyor/_/sngags dang lha la sems brtan bya/_/nad yams drag po bsal ba la/_/gtso bor 'bras 
[\[266b.7\]]bu gsum bsreg go/_/gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba la/_/gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/_/rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/_/phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la/_/dUr ba yungs kar mchog tu bshad/_/'bru rnams gang dang 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]gang 'dod la/_/'bru rig de nyid sbyin sreg bya/_/char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni/_/tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang /_/mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang /_/dbang po lag gi sbyin sreg ni/_/ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur/_/gal te bcad par 
[\[267a.2\]]'dod pas ni/_/thal ba de dang yungs kar gyis/_/nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi/_/sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya/_/yungs kar zho mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/'bras yos kyis ni byis pa sos/_/gdon nam rims las 'jigs pa dang /_/khyim 
[\[267a.3\]]bsrung bar ni 'dod pa yis/_/pad+ma dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya/_/sems bzang gnyugs ring 'dod pas ni/_/tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya/_/phran tshegs yams nad sel ba la/_/lo ma tsam gyi sbyin sreg bya/_/phyugs nad sel 
[\[267a.4\]]bar 'dod pa'i tshe/_/'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg_/nad dang gdon bcas sel ba la/_/mngar gsum 'bru bzang ga pur bcas/_/dUr ba dkar po'i yams shing rnams/_/bud shing 'o ma can rnams ni/_/me tog bzang po'i shing la bsreg_/
[\[267a.5\]]gdon nad zhi bar 'dod pas ni/_/'bras bu gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg_/gdon phran la ni mngar gsum dang /_/dUr ba dkar po bsregs pas zhi/_/rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngan gang /_/'bras phye mar sngags sel bar byed/_/gos dang snod 
[\[267a.6\]]bcad rdzas dang lus/_/gzhan grib ngan pas gos pa la/_/'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang /_/me tog dkar po bsreg par bya/_/ting lo byid kyi me tog bsreg_/mig nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/ma su li ma rtsa bar bcas/_/bsreg 
[\[267a.7\]]na rna ba'i nad sel 'gyur/_/tsan+dan gla rtsi ba mar bsregs/_/sna yi nad rnams thams cad sel/_/mu zi gu gul ri lu bsregs/_/so dang lce yi nad sel 'gyur/_/so naM dza dang ka ku ra/_/bsregs pas ske nad 'joms par byed/_/sbrang rtsi tsan+dan sha ka 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]ra/_/bsregs pas glo nad sel bar byed/_/'bras bu gsum dang zho sha lnga/_/bsregs pas snying nad sel bar byed/_/'u su sbrang dang byi dang ka/_/bsregs pas mchin pa'i nad sel 'gyur/_/me tog kha dog lnga bsregs na/_/pho ba 
[\[267b.2\]]la sogs nang grol nad/_/ma lus thams cad zhi bar byed/_/lus mdzes pa yang thob par 'gyur/_/nor 'dod pas ni seng ldeng mer/_/ba ser zho dang mar bsreg bya/_/gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i me tog dang /_/
[\[267b.3\]]srad bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/_/shing mdog de dang mthun pa yi/_/dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya/_/rnyed 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/_/pri yang ku dang ka ling ka/_/pad+ma'i ze ba yal sdong la/_/bsregs cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/_/gter gyi longs 
[\[267b.4\]]spyod rgyas par 'gyur/_/'bras dang myu gu'i 'bras bu sogs/_/bsreg na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur/_/dan Dod pa la 'bras bu gsum/_/brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel/_/'bras yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang /_/spri ka dza ti me tog 
[\[267b.5\]]dkar/_/ba dkar 'o ma zho mar bcas/_/bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel/_/de 'bum grangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob/_/mngar gsum bil ba'i 'bras bu la/_/'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur/_/sngags mthu rgyas pa'i don 
[\[267b.6\]]du ni/_/nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni/_/yungs kar dkar po sbrang bcas la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/_/gang gis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas/_/dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis/_/yungs kar rgyal ba'i yungs kar bcas/_/rgya sran 
[\[267b.7\]]drug tu bsreg par bya/_/gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang 'dod na/_/mya ngan med pa'i yam shing la/_/'bras bu gsum dang gur gum ni/_/stong phrag gcig tu bsreg par bya/_/gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed pa la/_/'bras bu gsum pa'i shing la 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ni/_/'bras bu gsum dang gu gul la/_/stong phrag gnyis su bsreg par bya/_/lha rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas/_/a rur yi shing sa ra la/_/'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi la/_/sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang 'gyur/_/bud 
[\[268a.2\]]med dbang du 'dod pas ni/_/til dang 'bras sogs phub ma la/_/'bras dang rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad/_/bsregs pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur/_/byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni/_/pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg bya/_/las rnams gang dang gang la 
[\[268a.3\]]yang /_/de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyor/_/zhi ba zhi ba'i yid kyis te/_/skal bzang blo ni rgyas pa la/_/chags dang 'dun sems ldan pas ni/_/dbang du 'gyur la the tshom med/_/khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni/_/drag po'i las su 
[\[268a.4\]]'gyur ba yod/_/brtan po dal 'byor ldan pa'i blo/_/rgyun rtag gsal ba yod gyur pas/_/ci ltar bsam pa de 'grub kyi/_/gzhan du yang ni de ltar min/_/mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni/_/dngos gang gsal bar blta ba ltar/_/bla ma dang ni 
[\[268a.5\]]bral gyur na/_/sngags kyi byin brlabs snang ba med/_/lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang /_/rnam pa kun du bla ma la/_/smod pa 'bad de spang bar bya/_/smad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro/_/bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang /_/ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag 
[\[268a.6\]]rgya mchod/_/o~M ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/_bsang gtor dang ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so/_/o~M dz+wA la dz+wA lA na lArka swA hA/_/sbar ba'i sngags so/_/na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA NAM/_o~M ag+na ye A dI pya a bi sha ma hA shri ye ha bya ka bya ba ha nA 
[\[268a.7\]]ya swA hA/_/mchod mar gyi sngags so/_/o~M sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ye swA hA/_/til gyi sngags so/_/o~M sarba saM pA de swA hA/_/zho dang zan dam pa'i 'o/_/o~M badzra b+ha smiM ku ru ku ru swA hA/_/ut+pa la lo/_/o~M badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/_'bras kyi 'o/_/o~M badzra a 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]pra ti ha ta badzra swA hA/_ku sha'o/_/o~M badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/_lag pan gyi'o/_/o~M badzra mA le puSh+pa ye swA hA/_mngar gsum dang dkar gyi'o/_/o~M badzra ma hA be gA ya swA hA/_nas kyi'o/_/o~M ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/_/sran ma ma sha'i 'o/_/o~M badzra g+hasma ri swA hA/_gro'o/_o~M 
[\[268b.2\]]badzra yadz+nyA ya swA hA/_u dum bA ra'o/_/o~M ti ti pri mi swA hA/_/byang chub shing ngo /_/o~M badzrA r+thA ya swA hA/_/n+ya gro d+ha'o/_/o~M badzra naM kA ya swA hA/_a mra'i'o/_/o~M AHhrIHhU~M/_thams cad du bsang ba'o/_/chus ni dag par byed pa dang /_/rdul sogs mun pa zhi bar 
[\[268b.3\]]byed/_/zhi ba chu yi dkyil 'khor bar/_/dkar po zlum po kho na'o/_/sas ni rtswa shing 'bru me tog_/skyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed/_/rgyas pa'i sa yi dkyil 'khor ltar/_/ser po gru bzhi pa na'o/_/rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang /_/dbang du byas nas g.yo bar 
[\[268b.4\]]byed/_/dbang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ltar/_/zla gam dmar po'i kha dog go/_/mes ni smin cing sreg pa dang /_/drag shul gyis ni yal bar byed/_/drag po gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor/_/nang dmar rgyab ni nag por bya/_/mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni/_/mun pa'i 
[\[268b.5\]]sgrib pa zhi bar byed/_/zhi la shar du bltas pa ste/_/dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po'o/_/nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/_/dngos po rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba/_/gos ni ser ram ljang gu shis/_/nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni/_/dbang du dngos 
[\[268b.6\]]po 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang /_/gos kyang dmar ser rab tu shis/_/nyi ma lhor 'gro'i dus su ni/_/shin tu grang ba'i chu yis ni/_/rtswa sogs dngos rnams bsad nas kyang /_/des dang 'thor dang dengs pa dang /_/skabs dang g.yar 
[\[268b.7\]]dang dub ba dang /_/rab tu g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur/_/mngon spyod lho yi phyogs bltas nas/_/gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya/_/tsam pa ka dang pu ti ka/_/lag skyes pad+ma dkar po dang /_/ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams/_/chu gtsang dang bar bcas pa dag_/
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]zhi ba'i las la mchod par bya/_/many+dzu nA ga bi sha ri/_/su mu le dang a spras dang /_/gser mdog chen po chu dung dang /_/tsi'u le ser dang pad+ma ser/_/chu bo chen po chur bcas pa/_/rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o/_/mu tsi na dang man du dmar/_/
[\[269a.2\]]lo yi che dang nya sha rnams/_/sin d+hu ra dang pad+ma dmar/_/ku mu da rigs dmar po rnams/_/lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa ste/_/dbang gi las la mchod par bya/_/ut+pal k+She pa la ka dang /_/ud khye pa dang ma mi shi/_/dzu mod sbyin la mgo bo dang /_/phag rna daN+Dota 
[\[269a.3\]]pa la rnams/_/khron pa'i chu dang lhan cig tu/_/mngon spyod las la mchod par bya/_/sA lu dkar po zan dang zho/_/pri ka spos ni zhi ba la/_/sA lu dmar po'i zan 'o ma/_/tsan+dan dmar po dbang la 'o/_/gro dang ma sa bser ba'i zan/_/hu lu ka ni rgyas pa la'o/_/
[\[269a.4\]]nas dang bra bo'i zan gu gul/_/btsos pa'i sha dang lhan cig ste/_/dwag po'i las de zhal zas dang /_/bdug spos bye brag shes par bya/_/rtsi mar dang ni a ba se'i/_/sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni/_/zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis/_/yang na pad dkar sdong bu'o/_/
[\[269a.5\]]til lam shin tu dngas ma dang /_/sa ri ha yi sdong bu ni/_/rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis/_/yang na ba yi lag gi cha/_/na ke la yi mar dang ni/_/pad+ma dmar po'i mar dang ni/_/dbang gi las la shin tu shis/_/yang na ba ya ma ri'o/_/yungs dang tsi la mar dang ni/_/
[\[269a.6\]]tsi tra'i sdong bu mar me ni/_/yang na gso ma'i shun pa yis/_/mdog dmar dal zhing gsal ba ni/_/gangs ri'i rtse ltar dkar 'bar ba/_/bar bre smra gul spos dkar dri/_/zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/_/mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la/_/nyi ma thal ka'i ri 
[\[269a.7\]]rtse 'dra/_/shib sgra ma li ka la'i dri/_/dbang gi las 'grub the tshom med/_/mdog ser mig g.yo dngas pa la/_/nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar/_/lha pa sgra tsam pa ka yi dri/_/rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tshom med/_/le brgan mdog ldan 'khyim zhing smug_/hur 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]sgra rul dri bro ba dang /_/nags kyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/_/mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan grub pa'i/_/drang srong rigs la dpag med kyang /_/me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi/_/sbyin sreg las la spang bar bya/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i ting 
[\[269b.2\]]'dzin can/_/bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya/_/gnya' na ka dang sa bi ki/_/tuk+Shu se'u mya s+ye tro dang /_/lto ba yid skyes khro bo dang /_/dmar po mr-i ta cho ma li/_/b+hi su ya ki bcu gnyis po/_/phan 'dogs la sogs las la sbyar/_/zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thal 
[\[269b.3\]]bas ni/_/'byung po phra mo zhi bar byed/_/dbang gi thal bas 'byung po 'ching /_/rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed/_/ri bo'i rtse la gtor bar bya/_/drag pos 'byung po sel bar bya/_/lam gyi gzhung du gtor bar bya/_/zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang /_/ra ba 
[\[269b.4\]]skyed mos tshal du gtor/_/dag par byed pas chu bo ltar/_/rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang /_/gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar/_/sbyin sreg gis ni lha mnyes shing /_/sngags bsgrub sngags kyi las rnams 'grub/_/drang srong tshogs rnams thams cad dang /_/dri za'i 
[\[269b.5\]]tshogs rnams thams cad dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/_/sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas/_/rnal 'byor grogs byed bsrung ba dang /_/skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing /_/nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang /_/bsam pa bzhin du 'grub 
[\[269b.6\]]par 'gyur/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las me la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/_/rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba/_/mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni/_/
[\[269b.7\]]'gro don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig_/'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas/_/phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/_/mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod/_/phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la/_/mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis/_/'di skad tshig ni gsol 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ba 'debs/_/o~M mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/chos kyi longs spyod ji snyed pa/_/rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal/_/gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo/_/'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang /_/
[\[270a.2\]]sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku/_/bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam/_/phyogs chos byang chub sum cu bdun/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa/_/chos rnams lhun grub sku phyag 'tshal/_/rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la/_/
[\[270a.3\]]thugs rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung nas/_/zhing khams rgya mtsho spyod mdzad pa'i/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/_/sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgya'i rim/_/sna tshogs kyis ni don mdzad phyir/_/theg pa kun las khyad par du/_/sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags/_/
[\[270a.4\]]nan tan sgrub pa smos ci dgos/_/sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang /_/nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi/_/sgrib rnams 'byang bas khyad par 'phags/_/dbul po rigs dang dman pa yang /_/zhugs ma thag nas bde ldan zhing /_/cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni/_/
[\[270a.5\]]dpag med 'byung bas khyad par 'phags/_/mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod/_/'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can/_/'gro ba 'dren gtso dad dpon gyi/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/_/sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/_/
[\[270a.6\]]'gro la sna tshogs phan don du/_/ci ltar 'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/_/pad+ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas/_/tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/_/'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs/_/dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas/_/'gro la 
[\[270a.7\]]phan phyir zhus pa ni/_/legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che/_/shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so/_/sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas/_/khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad/_/khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/_/legs par zung la rgya cher spros/_/ras sam gro ga shing shun 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gang /_/'jam zhing nag ris med pa la/_/gur gum gi'u wang sen rtsi dang /_/tsan+dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri/_/pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud bcas/_/'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya/_/d+ha ra d+ha ra dang po ste/_/gnyis par d+hi ri d+hi ri spro/_/gsum pa d+hu ru d+ha ru ste/_/iT+Te biT+Te bzhi lnga pa/_/tsa 
[\[270b.2\]]le tsa le gnyis bri'o/_/pra tsa le gnyis drug par ro/_/ku su me dang ku su ma/_/bdun pa bris te brgyad pa la/_/ba le i li mi li bri/_o~M mi tsi ti dza lam dang /_/swA hA ra bcas pa dbus su'o/_/phyag 'tshal bcas sngags mtha' mar bri/_/rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhar 
[\[270b.3\]]dmigs nas/_/gtsang ma'i mchod pas mchod bya ste/_/sngags stong brjod nas lus la gdags/_/'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/nad dang yams dang gdon rnams dang /_/'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges/_/rig sngags bzlog na khyad par du/_/rdo rje dkar po 
[\[270b.4\]]rtse lnga la/_/'od kyi ra ba zlum po yi/_/ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri/_/rwa rnams la ni hU~M gnyis par/_/rig sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri/_/lte bar o~M hrIHswA hA'i bar/_/bdag nyid bsrung zhes bri bar bya/_/mu khyud dang por bri bar bya/_/gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngags so/_/
[\[270b.5\]]gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/_/gsum par pad+ma gar dbang gi/_/sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya/_/gal te nad yams bzlog pa la/_/'dab brgyad pad+ma mu khyud gsum/_/sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la/_/mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags/_/gsum par 
[\[270b.6\]]rten 'brel sngags bris nas/_/lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni/_/nad rims dang ni lhog 'brum sogs/_/rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur/_/de nas tshig de thos ma thag_/lha min bu mo nad bdag mo/_/sa tu de bi zhes bya ba/_/bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te/_/
[\[270b.7\]]bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig tu/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/_/rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig po/_/mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa/_/gal te 'brum nad byung na ni/_/bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]dam bcas 'di ni dran par bya/_/tre ba la bya'i ka ka ba ni ta/_/su ma ya bi lA sa ka ka ra ni/_/ki shun pany+tsa tra li he na yi/_/ke na ka ta tsa ra Ni/_/ya mi rnan da ma na tsa/_/ya mi bar nad bur dwa/_/dwa tsa pid tra tsit+t+ra nad dam/_/sa stu de wi me b+ha ba/_/lha mos de skad gsol ma thag_/
[\[271a.2\]]mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/_/o~M o~M b+ha bita bit+ti mi ti/_ga tsan+d+ra ka ra ni/_a mu ka s+ya ka s+ya/_lo hi ta ga~M d+ha pa rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/_byin brlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni/_/rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/_/o~M ha na se rU pa d+ha ri swA hA/_srad bu mnyams dkar po la/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig 
[\[271a.3\]]mdud par bya/_/bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang /_/lus sam mgul du gdags par bya/_/kraM hi ti ka ti ga tra tha pra gshig_/ta thA yo thA tsa la he hu~M hU~M phaT/_sran ma rdog po re re la/_/brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi/_/'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig_/dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs/_/
[\[271a.4\]]yams nad kun dang 'brum nag nad/_/shin tu gdug pa kun sel 'gyur/_/de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo/_/dpal phreng mas ni 'di skad gsol/_/bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa/_/rims nad kun dang bral bar 'gyur/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_/na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_
[\[271a.5\]]ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ri Ni kA ya/_na mo badzra mA ra bi dza yA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_o~M badzre badzre/_ma ha badzre/_sarba b+hI ra thA/_ha na ha na badzra/_sarba dz+wa ra pra shra ma na ye swA hA/_mi skra mi rus sle tres dang /_/gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang /_/shing kun gla rtsi 'khor lo ni/_/rtsibs phyed 
[\[271a.6\]]phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri/_/mtshams bzhir bris te dbus su ming /_/sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la/_/gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags/_/bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs/_/nad rims thams cad sel ba dang /_/rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de nas spyan ras gzigs 
[\[271a.7\]]dbang gis/_/'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/_/rang 'byung can gyi ras la ni/_/sen rtsi'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/_/mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/_/rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon skor du/_/hrIHg+hi wa shiM ku ru hrIH/_/mu khyud dang por mgon po ni/_/pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o/_/gnyis pa ut+pal 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]dmar po phreng /_/gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu gcig_/dbus su ba~M yig hrIHra bcas bri/_/lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na/_/'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang /_/bgegs kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas/_/rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste/_/dbus su spyan ras 
[\[271b.2\]]gzigs dbang mgon/_/pad+ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o/_/rwa rnams kun la hU~M yig ni/_/bgegs ming ud tsa ta yis bskor/_/mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/_/ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o/_/gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags/_/gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la/_/de rgyab me 
[\[271b.3\]]yi phung po bri/_/gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas/_/sred med bu ltar mthu che ba/_/gdug pa can yang 'thor byed na/_/phran tshegs dbyer ba smos ci dgos/_/gang la ser sna rnams chags shing /_/longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na/_/phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir/_/skyob 
[\[271b.4\]]pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/_/rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la/_/gtsang ldan ras bzang blangs nas kyang /_/dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug_/legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste/_/gur gum dang ni gla rtsi yis/_/pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug bri/_/phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste/_/
[\[271b.5\]]mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/_/mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gaM/_/o~M dang badzra da ke hU~M/_/yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya/_/mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags/_/gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/_/gsum pa ut+pal phreng ba ste/_/yang tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas/_/gsol 
[\[271b.6\]]btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel/_/bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/_/de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/_/phyogs bzhir hrIHni mtshams su drang /_/dbus su khye'u yi gzigs shig bri/_/phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/_/sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya/_/mtshams bzhir 
[\[271b.7\]]o~M dang a ma ra/_/dzI wa na tI ye swA hAs bskor/_/mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/_/pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags/_/gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/_/gsum par ut+pal dmar po'i phreng /_/'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang /_/phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod/_/
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na/_/bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med/_/bsrung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang /_/bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni/_/smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri/_/lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri/_/gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'/_/glo bur yi mug 
[\[272a.2\]]skye 'gyur na/_/pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa yi/_/dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri/_/'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa/_/gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor/_/mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs/_/don yod zhags pa'i sngags bri'o/_/gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba bri/_/de'i rgyab 
[\[272a.3\]]'od kyi phreng ba bri/_/rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab/_/nad sel tshe ring bsod nams 'phel/_/gang zhig shes rab 'dod pas ni/_/dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni/_/tri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor/_/o~M dang kA la de ka la/_/ma ni swA hA zhes pa bri/_/de rgyab mu khyud 
[\[272a.4\]]'khor ba la/_/mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags bri/_/de rgyab 'od kyi ra ba bri/_/gang gis 'di 'chang mchod pa la/_/nad dang gnod pa kun bral te/_/dug dang rims nad 'joms pa dang /_/shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/yul du lo thog nyams pa dang /_/thog 'brug ser ba rgod pa 
[\[272a.5\]]dang /_/klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste/_/de bas la sbyor ba bshad par bya/_/shing kun dkar po mnyams pa/_/nyams dga'i sbyor ba nyi rim la/_/rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/_/mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya/_/grwa rnams la ni hU~M yig la/_/o~M dang dzi ni ti ti te/_/hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis 
[\[272a.6\]]bskor/_/mu khyud dang po mgon po che/_/gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags phreng bri/_/gnyis par thugs rje chen po mgon/_/mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor/_/gsum par rdo rje phreng ba dang /_/me yi 'od dang ldan par bri/_/phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis/_/klu yi rgyal po mthu ldan 
[\[272a.7\]]rnams/_/'khor dang bcas te lus skams 'gyur/_/gang gi khyim du gdod pa dang /_/ma he rta sogs yams nad can/_/bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni/_/brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon/_/ko bi da ri'i shing la ni/_/khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi/_/gas grugs chag sogs med 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa la/_/shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams/_/shing de la ni rta babs gzugs/_/'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi/_/brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni/_/rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste/_/gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po'o/_/gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser/_/bzhi par pad+ma dkar 
[\[272b.2\]]po'o/_/g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dmar/_/gnyis pa ut+pal sngon po'o/_/gsum par nor bu bzhi rgya gram/_/nang khang du ni pad+ma bya/_/'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o/_/lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la/_/o~M dang pi shA tsi par+Na/_/sha ba ri sarba byA d+hi/_/pra sha ma ni swA hA zhes/_/baMHyig la ni 
[\[272b.3\]]bskor bar bri/_/mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/_/gdong bcu gcig gi sngags bri'o/_/gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi/_/rtsa ba'i phreng sngags bri bar bya/_/rgya skyegs dang ni mtshal yin te/_/de la shing spyin byug par bya/_/mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni/_/bdun stong 
[\[272b.4\]]re re brjod byas nas/_/sgo gong la gdags byung 'jug tshe/_/'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la/_/rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i/_/'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus/_/myur du sel bar mnan pa dang /_/bzlog dang bcing bar mdzod 
[\[272b.5\]]ces brjod/_/phyugs bdag chen pos skyong ba ltar/_/glang po rta bong ma he'i tshogs/_/brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med/_/shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/_/dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la/_/khyad par du ni skyob pa yi/_/phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par 
[\[272b.6\]]gyis/_/yung bas ras sam shing la ni/_/pad dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang /_/ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya/_/de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor/_/dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/_/gnyis pa seng ge sgra yi sngags/_/gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags/_/de rgyab me yi ra ba bri/_/'di la gsol 
[\[272b.7\]]ba btab nas ni/_/g.yul ngor khyer te zhugs pa gang /_/dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te/_/rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/longs spyod phyir ni byang bltas bri/_/dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste/_/g.yul bzlog pa ni lhor bltas bri/_/lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri/_/dkar 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]ser dmar dang sngo ba yi/_/dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya/_/'dzum dang rngam dang dgod dang khro/_/bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi/_/sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang /_/lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang /_/snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang /_/rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya/_/
[\[273a.2\]]kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan/_/kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni/_/sngags kyis yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs/_/sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags su dmigs/_/gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang /_/rig pa'i lha mo'i 
[\[273a.3\]]tshogs rnams dang /_/'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang /_/khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang /_/'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan rnams/_/ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'i/_/grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni/_/tshul bzhin 
[\[273a.4\]]du ni bsgrub pa la/_/brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang /_/the tshom du ni mi bya'o/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba las phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi/_/rig pa 'dzin pa'i 
[\[273a.5\]]drang srong mchog/_/mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che/_/nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba/_/drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog_/'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la/_/sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol/_/o~M 'od zer du ma ther zug gi/_/srid 
[\[273a.6\]]'dam stug po sel byed rgyal/_/yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/_/gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos/_/bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal/_/skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[273a.7\]]skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam bzhag pa/_/ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal/_/ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs/_/mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/_/sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas/_/lha yi gong bu'i ril bu ni/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]yi/_/dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi/_/thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad ba'i/_/mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol/_/'gro rnams ma rig 'dam la zhen/_/srid pa'i thag pas rgya gram bcings/_/'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs/_/nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs/_/ngan 
[\[273b.2\]]rtog log lam g.yang sar ltung /_/bag med ser sna'i dug gis myos/_/sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyas/_/bag chags 'thug bo'i ri bos mnan/_/mgon po khyod ni thugs rjes ngal ba med/_/nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir/_/shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du 
[\[273b.3\]]gsol/_/de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje/_/thugs rje thugs dpal mnga' ba yi/_/thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu bcas/_/khyad par gsung 'di bka' stsal to/_/mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes/_/'das dang ma 'ongs 
[\[273b.4\]]don shes dang /_/mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa/_/dngos dang rtags dang cha mthun gyis/_/rnam pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag tu 'gyur/_/phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang /_/bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang /_/gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang /_/dga' mgur 
[\[273b.5\]]gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no/_/rnam pa brgyad kyis dper bya yis/_/longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang /_/tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang /_/chu la mi 'bying mkha' la 'gro/_/sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba/_/zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs/_/dngos po gang dang 
[\[273b.6\]]gang bsgrub rnams/_/ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyi/_/gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu ni/_/mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang /_/rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur/_/nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras/_/ma mos dbang du byed 
[\[273b.7\]]gyur na/_/'byung po sha za lha min mi/_/ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu/_/dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can/_/sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos/_/dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis/_/khyad par ril bus 'di bsgrub bya/_/gi'u wang dang ni lig 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bu mig_/ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yi/_/ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/_/snod gtsang nang du gzhag par bya/_/sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na/_/sngan chad ma mthong snang ba'am/_/sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs/_/yid 
[\[274a.2\]]'ong mngon du byung ba sogs/_/mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe/_/ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug_/bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na/_/du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur/_/dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang /_/snang 
[\[274a.3\]]ba dang 'od gzugs can dang /_/'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang /_/longs spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te/_/shi 'phos nas ni dga' ldan gnas su skye/_/dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang /_/'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing /_/thos pa 'dzin cing sgyu rtsal mkhas/_/
[\[274a.4\]]shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du/_/lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni/_/'khor la gzhon nu'i rigs su skye/_/yang na mi yi rgyal po'am/_/glang po nyid du skye bar 'gyur/_/'bar ba lus la bskus na blta/_/rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog_/bskal par gnas 
[\[274a.5\]]te 'dod dgur spyod/_/'jig rten kun du thogs med rgyu/_/mkha' ldings 'og chu bran 'gro/_/sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang /_/dbang por gnas te rgyal por gnas/_/sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod/_/'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig 
[\[274a.6\]]rten khams/_/gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye/_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis/_/bdag nyid yid du 'ong 'dod phas/_/gur gum ga pur gla rtsi dang /_/gi'u wang bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas/_/brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang /_/sngags 
[\[274a.7\]]stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis/_/ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/_/re re la yang stong stong brjod/_/rlung dang nyi mas ma reg pa/_/bskams nas snod gtsang gzhag par bya/_/ril bu tsam cig mur na yang /_/rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis/_/mthong na bu bzhin 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gzigs pas na/_/tha mal skyo bo smos ci dgos/_/nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang /_/bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur/_/ga pur gur gum gi'u wang dang /_/tsan+da na gnad brda dang /_/gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du/_/re re sngags stong bzlas nas su/_/brdungs 
[\[274b.2\]]te ril bu byas pa da ga_/g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya/_/bdun nas nya yi bar du ni/_/sngags bzlas pa dang mchod pa bya/_/bdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel/_/mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang /_/rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang /_/blon po la sogs dbang 
[\[274b.3\]]du 'gyur/_/khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong /_/gdams pa thams cad don yod 'gyur/_/spyi bor btags na byad stems dang /_/g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur/_/gal te phye mas bdugs pas kyang /_/sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te/_/kun 
[\[274b.4\]]gyi mthong dang dga' ba dang /_/gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod/_/ga bur gla rtsi gur gum dang /_/tsan+dan gla rtsi ka ko la/_/spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang /_/ut+pal sngo dang tsan+dan dmar/_/re re la yang stong stong bzlas/_/cha mnyam phye ma gi'u wang bcas/_/ril 
[\[274b.5\]]bu tsa na ka tshad bya/_/grib skams byas nas lus la 'chang /_/gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob/_/kra ku la yi thang chu dang /_/ldong ros bed dang ut+pal sngo/_/rgya mtsho lbu ba gi'u wang dang /_/yungs dang skyer pa gur gum dang /_/ga bur dang ni gla rtsi 
[\[274b.6\]]gsum/_/re re la yang sngags stong bzla/_/de nas sku yi mgul btags te/_/stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya/_/mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar/_/so nad la ni ka ka ru/_/rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste/_/ut+pal mu tig mig nad la/_/gre ba'i nad la 
[\[274b.7\]]ba sha ka/_/glo nad la ni ba le ka/_/sha ka ra yi thang dang sbyar/_/rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar/_/mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang /_/bad kan la ni sga dang sbyar/_/mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs/_/ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa/_/skrangs nad rnams la thug 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]po che/_/bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la/_/gu gul dang bcas bdug par bya/_/ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni/_/nam yang brjod par mi nus so/_/gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i/_/ril bus bgegs tshogs sel 
[\[275a.2\]]bar byed/_/ke su rtsa dang sde'u gsher dang /_/ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum/_/ser po mu zi phye ma rnams/_/sbrang rtsi dang bcas ril bu bya/_/pad+ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas/_/zos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te/_/nad dang gdon dang dgras mi 
[\[275a.3\]]tshugs/_/'dod rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/_/ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra/_/skyu ru ra dang ti la til/_/mnyam byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni/_/ril bu byas la mig la byug_/klu dang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]khang pa dang /_/sa 'og thams cad mthong 
[\[275a.4\]]bar nges/_/byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce/_/nyin gcig spos por nang du gzhug_/gnyis pa ra 'o gsum dang 'byung /_/bzhi pa ril bu tshil chen btso/_/lnga pa sbrang rtsi nang du ste/_/drug pa dngul chu'i nang du bzhag_/bdun pa rigs ngan 
[\[275a.5\]]thod par ni/_/byi la'i khrag gis bsku la gzhag_/skams nas bya dang spyang ku'i sha/_/lhan cig rang gi khar bcug na/_/de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/_/gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med/_/ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang /_/dza ti lo ma 
[\[275a.6\]]sa bon bcas/_/ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yis/_/bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges/_/ban+du ma dang kir ma dang /_/ma ka ri dang su mi tam/_/bra pan ta ma'i ril bu ni/_/nyi zla gzas bzung dus su mid/_/shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste/_/
[\[275a.7\]]thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos/_/gi'u wang swa hA tsi na dang /_/sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya/_/sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na/_/'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur/_/gi'u wang sug pa phye ma dang /_/ba ra swA ta ha su ri/_/a ra 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas/_/ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzla/_/mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes/_/gzhan yang nad 'don byed pa yi/_/ril bu chen po bshad par bya/_/rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la/_/kan d+ha na gu li dang ni/_/ru Ni a pa 
[\[275b.2\]]ya ba ni/_/i pa ya na ta ga ra/_/gan d+ha ga dang pri yang ku/_/'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang /_/biSh+Nu ka Ti de bzhin du/_/so ma ra tsa un na ti/_/re re la yang sngags phreng dang /_/brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/_/de nas brdungs te sbrang 
[\[275b.3\]]dang bcas/_/byis pa la ni dpung par te/_/bu 'dod mo la mgul bar gdags/_/'di btags pa yi de ma thag_/'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol/_/ba mar shu dag ba lcir bcas/_/lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yi/_/ril bu a mra'i 
[\[275b.4\]]'bras bu tsam/_/sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de/_/phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod nas/_/snga bar mid pas shes rab 'phel/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[275b.5\]]o~M shud+d+he mr-i taM/_ba la bar+d+ha ni swA hA/_srod dang tho rangs dge sbyong dang /_/dal smra gsong po dul bag can/_/khrus la dga' zhing dri bzang bsten/_/spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med/_/rtag tu bsngags brjod brtse sems can/_/spyan ras gzigs nyid la 
[\[275b.6\]]cher dang /_/gdung bag gdong la mchi ma can/_/lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i/_/skyes mchog de la rab dge zhing /_/'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang /_/'byung ba la sogs smos ci dgos/_/rtag par rang gi yid la ni/_/snying po gsang 
[\[275b.7\]]sngags bcang bar bya/_/nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i/_/lha yang rang la nye bar byed/_/rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba/_/khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang /_/sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de/_/kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni/_/lnga tsam gyis ni de grub 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]yin/_/las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni/_/bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /_/brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs/_/de ma thag tu chu yin te/_/cung zad ba ni mar gyis bya/_/brtan par gyur pa ka ra ste/_/ches brtan pa la srad bu yin/_/
[\[276a.2\]]sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de/_/ril bus ring du skyong byed yin/_/sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'o/_/mdun du rtsom na de dag rnams/_/de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag_/rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang /_/pad dkar rin chen snying po dang /_/pad 
[\[276a.3\]]spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang /_/ye shes dbang phyug pad dbang phyug_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/_/rang rang sde dpung sder bcas pa/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/_/'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas/_/mchod pa'i 
[\[276a.4\]]tshogs rnams bkram byas te/_/rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi/_/mchod pa nam mkha' gtos par bkang /_/rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang /_/sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis/_/sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar/_/bkod pa 
[\[276a.5\]]mtha' yas bsham bya ste/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/_/mgon gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la/_/yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod/_/spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog brtan che/_/'jig 
[\[276a.6\]]rten dbang po dbang phyug che/_/pad+ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che/_/rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso/_/blo gros chen po sems dpa' che/_/pad+ma 'chang dang pad+ma dpa'/_/pad+ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/pad+ma las 
[\[276a.7\]]byung dam pa'i yid/_/pad+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po/_/pad+ma'i rdo rje pad+ma'i sku/_/khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snang ba kun chen thabs po che/_/che mnyam dga' ba dgongs pa che/_/dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal/_/bde ba chen po khyod 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]phyag 'tshal/_/bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po/_/rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/_/bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che/_/pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos mnga' don mnga' pad+ma rgyal/_/dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin/_/rmad 'byung 
[\[276b.2\]]chen ldan chos rab 'chang /_/chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'/_/rin chen sems dpa' chos sems dpa'/_/dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'/_/kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag 
[\[276b.3\]]'tshal/_/'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo mchog_/rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che/_/'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don/_/'jig rten mgon po phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jig rten yi ge kha dog che/_/yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog_/
[\[276b.4\]]yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs/_/yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/_/pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag_/legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin ba'o/_/sangs rgyas tshogs de sangs rgyas chos/_/sangs rgyas che khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshad med che sku 
[\[276b.5\]]sangs rgyas sku/_/gzugs bzang 'chang ldan rdo rje gzugs/_/gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba/_/snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtso mgon rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal/_/chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa/_/tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug 
[\[276b.6\]]mgon/_/tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/cher gsal gtso bo snang pa mchog_/'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad/_/snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon/_/snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che/_/chos kyi 
[\[276b.7\]]spyan te gzigs pa che/_/ting 'dzin chen po ye shes mtsho/_/rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso/_/mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas sras/_/rgyal thabs mnyes pa khyu mchog che/_/sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal lo/_/drag po 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]chen po rtul chen po/_/ha la chen po seng ge sgra/_/mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/_/ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang /_/'chang la nad med bgegs med de/_/dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong /_/
[\[277a.2\]]yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'/_/de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams/_/rang rang stan la mngon par 'khod/_/de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos/_/bdud rigs thams cad mog por gyur/_/de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis/_/byang chub 
[\[277a.3\]]sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la/_/rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid/_/nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/_/kun du bzang po'i spyod yul can/_/dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba/_/sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i/_/rigs ni rigs chen thams cad 
[\[277a.4\]]pa'o/_/lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni/_/rgyun mi chad du sbyor mod kyang /_/rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan mthus/_/sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi/_/lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam/_/mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas/_/mkha' mnyam 
[\[277a.5\]]sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che/_/sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa/_/mtshan ma phra ba la sogs pa'i/_/mngon shes 'jig rten gsal ma thongs/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste/_/brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o/_/dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam
