[\[277a.6\]]spyod/_/sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang /_/zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang /_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam/_/bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang /_/rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog_/mtshan med ting 
[\[277a.7\]]'dzin la gnas nas/_/rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang /_/rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang /_/nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'/_/rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la/_/rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa/_/mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan cing /_/sems 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]kyi snang ba du mar sgyur/_/dngos rnams spros spang bsdu spyod pa/_/rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis/_/chos sku kun snang kun du 'od/_/bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan/_/yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che/_/mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin/_/zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa/_/'du 
[\[277b.2\]]'bral med pa'i bde chen sa/_/de ltar drug ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/sa chen bla med mthar gnas so/_/ngo bo spros med chos sems pa/_/gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go/_/sems can sems snyoms byang sems 'dzin/_/nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so/_/sems 
[\[277b.3\]]can mi gtong tshul khrims bsrung /_/sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum/_/rang gis sngags bsgrub gzhan gyis sngags/_/bar mi gcod dang 'gro ba la/_/byams pa bsgrub dang snying rje bsgrub/_/grub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o/_/dben pa bsten dang 'du 'dzi spong /_/thos pa 
[\[277b.4\]]bsam zhing de don spyod/_/phyi rol sngags spong zhe sdang skyung /_/de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga'o/_/dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang /_/phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang /_/spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang /_/theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang /_/sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang /_/dge 
[\[277b.5\]]spyod brtson dang drug pa'o/_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg mchod gtor brtson/_/phyi rol dka' thub gdung med dang /_/snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang /_/bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha/_/'gro ba mi bslu chos mi 'byed/_/theg dman mi len pa dang bdun/_/nyan thos rang rgyal 
[\[277b.6\]]blo ldan dang /_/rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med/_/lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang /_/dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang /_/ser sna med dang gtong la dga'/_/gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yengs dang /_/gzi brjid dbang che'i lus thob dang /_/grags kun blo 
[\[277b.7\]]ldan brgyad por blta/_/skur pa med cing bden par smra/_/bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste/_/brgyad pa de yang bsgrub pa'i rgyu/_/rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid/_/gang zhig lcags kyus bzung bas gnyis re nas/_/klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems/_/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu/_/rtag par 'chang na gnas sgyur byed par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/_/blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa/_/legs so legs so sems dpa' che/_/gang dag de dag de bzhin du/_/
[\[278a.2\]]bde 'dod rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_/des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das/_/gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang /_/des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang /_/dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon/_/sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon/_/gdul 
[\[278a.3\]]dka' dag la rgyun [{]rings so[,]ring ngo [}]/_/skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod/_/gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di yod/_/bri dang bklag dang mchod pa dang /_/rim gro ched du gsal byed dang /_/bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor skye/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[278a.4\]]stsal pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dag dang /_rig pa'i lha mo dang /_khro bo du ma dang /_nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang /_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_
[\[278a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/_sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[278a.6\]]dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di 
[\[278a.7\]]ta chen po so ma shrI b+ha bya zhes bya ba dang /_bod kyi lots+tsha ba kyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]{D682}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+yA mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal 
[\[278b.2\]]lo/_/thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das po ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang /_ta ma la dang /_tsam pa ka dang /_mya ngan med pa dang /_a 
[\[278b.3\]]ti muk+ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang /_sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu 
[\[278b.4\]]stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags 
[\[278b.5\]]pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces 
[\[278b.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/_gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/_'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[278b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/_gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang /_dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yang 'dus so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtog par bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang /_
[\[279a.2\]]dbang phyug chen po dang /_tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod rten du 
[\[279a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gis dge 
[\[279a.4\]]ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/_sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/_'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/_dam pa'i chos la smod pa/_mnar med pa la gzhol ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub 
[\[279a.5\]]sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag 
[\[279a.6\]]cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/rims nyin gcig pa'am/_nyin gnyis pa'am/_nyin gsum pa'am/_nyin bzhi pa'am/_de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru ba'am/_tshad pa'am/_lag pa na ba'am/_rkang pa na ba'am/_mgo na ba'am/_
[\[279a.7\]]ha la ha la yis btags pa'am/_mdze'am/_rkang shu'am/_'brum bu phra mo'am/_lhog pa'am/_'bras sam/_bye'u 'bras sam/_g.yan pa'am/_mtshan bar rdol ba'am/_'brum bu'am/_brjed byed dam/_khyab par na ba'am/_gsod pa'am/_'ching 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]ba'am/_brdeg pa'am/_bsdigs pa'am/_mi snyan par brjod pa'am/_mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/_sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/_rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/_/sngar nyid nas dag pa'i 
[\[279b.2\]]sems dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang /_rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang /_mchod par byed/_gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang /_don 
[\[279b.3\]]'dzin par byed pa/_'chang bar byed pa/_klog par byed pa/_'dri bar byed pa/_'drir 'jug par byed pa/_kun chub par byed pa/_sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa'am/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par 
[\[279b.4\]]byed/_sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang /_dor ba med pa/_gzugs med pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/_yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/_sgyu med pa/_gos pa med pa/_mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/_phung po lnga dang bral ba'i 
[\[279b.5\]]sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/_/ji snyed po tir bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/_/bcom 
[\[279b.6\]]ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/_phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa'am/_rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/_gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/_gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas 
[\[279b.7\]]shes par bya'o/_/de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gang la la'i skyes bus tsan+dan nam/_ga bur ram/_gur gum mam/_gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rngo ba'am/_sa la gzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na/_de la 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]tsan+dan nam/_ga bur ram/_gur gum mam/_gla rtsi gnur ba'am brgya dpas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig 
[\[280a.2\]]gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang /_snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das dmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la'ang ngo /_/gang dang 
[\[280a.3\]]gang du skyes pa de dang de ru tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do/_/gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dge slong 
[\[280a.4\]]ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_de las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te/_lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod 
[\[280a.5\]]par yongs su bzlas na/_de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o/_/nyi shu po gang zhe na/_gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang /_las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/snum zhing yid 
[\[280a.6\]]du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro/_/skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/_/nor yod pa yang rkun pos khyer bar mi nus so/_/mes mi 'tshig go/_/chu yis mi 'khyer ro/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[280a.7\]]yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/_/de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu'am thal ba la yongs 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]su bsngags te/_phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/_/sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dgra yis 'jigs pa 'byung ba yang 
[\[280b.2\]]myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/mi yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_/mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa drag po'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur 
[\[280b.3\]]ro/_/lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor 
[\[280b.4\]]'thob ste/_brgyad po gang zhe na/_'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/mthong ba 'khrul pa med do/_/lag pa g.yob pa med do/_/bshang ba med 
[\[280b.5\]]do/_/gci ba med do/_/rlung gi rnam pa med do/_/shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang 
[\[280b.6\]]dang gang du smon lam btab pa de de dang de ru skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/_/chang dang sha dang btsong dang sgog skya dang /_bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du bsrung bar 'dod pas 
[\[280b.7\]]de rnams spang bar bya'o/_/don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par byas la mnyan du gzhug par bya'o/_/slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]sems dpa' yin no/_/sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/_/shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/_de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob 
[\[281a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang /_sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[281a.3\]]'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/_gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus 
[\[281a.4\]]na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gson cig_/
[\[281a.5\]]sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang rnam par thar pa'i don 
[\[281a.6\]]gyi phyir yang ngo /_/na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/_sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/_na maHpra t+ye ka bud d+hAR+Ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yo\u0f85 tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yat+pan+ne b+h+yaH/_na ma s+samyak+ga tA nAM/_na maHsaM mya k+p+ra t+yut+pan+nA nAM/_na maHsha ra dwa tI pu trA ya/_ma hA ma ta ye/_na maHAr+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo ma hA bo d+hi 
[\[281a.7\]]satwa sa~M g+he b+h+yaH/_na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shaM len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaH/_sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/_ar+ha d+b+h+yaH/_samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/_na maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa bi na rdi te shwa ra rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHsiM ha bi krA Di ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHsu pra 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]tiSh+Thi te ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHsa man+ta ra smyu t+ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi pa sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkra kuts+tshA n+dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHkA sh+ya pA ya 
[\[281b.2\]]ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAr+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_oM sha me sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba satwAM sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/_namaHsu ba ri kIt+ti ta nA ma d+he yA ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_namaHsa man+ta wa b+hA sa 
[\[281b.3\]]bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na ma in+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo rat+na tra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo\u0f85 pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bikrAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/_na mo bud d+hA ya/_na mo d+har+m+mA ya/_namaHsa~M g+hA ya/_na mo\u0f85 tI tA 
[\[281b.4\]]nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+ne b+h+yo bud+d+he b+h+ya b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_smr-i ti bar+b+ha ni/_ma ti bar+d+ha ni/_ga ti bar+d+ha ni/_d+h+r-i ti bar+d+ha ni/_pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/_pra hi b+hA na bar+d+ha ni/_d+h+yA na bar+d+ha ni/_shA ma tha bar+d+ha ni/_bi pa sh+ya na bar+d+ha ni/_sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+har+m+ma bar+d+ha ni/_sa ka la bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma pa ri pU ra NA ya swA hA/_na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/_
[\[281b.5\]]na ma Ar+yA wa lo ki te shwa rwa ya bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA sa twA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_na mo ma hA s+thA ma bra p+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma hA satwA ya/_ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/_e b+h+yo na ma skr-i tA i dmAr+yA wa lo ki te shwa ra mu khot+gir+N+NaM/_a mo g+ha pA shwa rA dza nA ma hr-i da yi ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA Shi taM mahA tAM 
[\[281b.6\]]baR+Shan+ma d+he a ha mi dA nI mA bat+ta yi Sh+ya mi/_sid+b+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dAH/_sarba kAr+yA Ni sarba b+ha yo b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ban+tu/_ta d+ya thA/_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma ra ma ra/_mi ri mi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka/_sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu 
[\[281b.7\]]ru/_tsi ri tsi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_mi ri mi ri/_ma hA pad+ma ha sta/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/_bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/_bo d+ha bo d+ha/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Na/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/_ka ra 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/_bi tsa la bi tsa la/_pra tsa la pra tsa la/_e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_ti ri ti ri/_tu ru tu ru/_e h+ye hi 
[\[282a.2\]]ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA pa shu ba ti be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ma ra ma ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_hA hA hI hI hU hU/_oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri 
[\[282a.3\]]d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ra sa ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_na ra na ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+hA Sha b+hA Sha/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_b+ha ga wAn+sau mA di t+ya/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_
[\[282a.4\]]brah+men+d+ra/_bA yu/_ag+ni/_d+ha na dA/_r-i Shi de ba ga NA b+h+yar+ts+tsi ta tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_sa nat+ku mA ra/_ru dra/_bA sa ba/_piTh+Nu/_d+ha na dA/_bA yu/_ag+ni/_r-i Shi/_nA ya ka_/bi nA ya ka_/ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha 
[\[282a.5\]]ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_tha ra tha ra/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_pa ra pa ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man tA wa lo ki ta/_pi lo ki ta/_lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_tre b+hu ba ne shwa ra/_sarba 
[\[282a.6\]]gu Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/_a wa lo ki te shwa ra/_mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_ra k+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa/_sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/_sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH/_sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaH/_sarbo gra he b+h+yaH/_sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/_sarba bi She b+h+yaH/_sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/_
[\[282a.7\]]e pa~M/_baM d+ha ban+d+ha na/_tA Da na/_tardza na/_rA dza/_taska ra/_ag+ni/_ud ka_/bi Sha sha s+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka_/ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_in+d+ri ya/_ba la/_bo d+h+yaM ga_/tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka_/ta pa ta pa/_tam 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]ta ma/_da ma da ma/_sha ma sha ma/_ma sam sa/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA ta mo\u0f85n+d+ha ka ri/_bi d+ha ma na/_ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/ma la ma la/_mi li mi li/_mu lu mu lu/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_
[\[282b.2\]]Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e Ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_ma ha b+hu ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka_/ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ba ra ba ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ma ra ma ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ki Ti 
[\[282b.3\]]ki Ti/_ku Tu ku Tu/_ma Ta ma Ta/_ma hA bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si ta/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/_rat+na mu ku Ta/_mA lA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nya shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA mu ku Ta/_ma hA ad+b+hu ta ka ma lA laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/_d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha pra kam+p+ya/_ba hu satwA san+ta ti pa 
[\[282b.4\]]ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sarba kar+m+mA wa ra Na bi shwa d+ha ka_/sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka_/sarba satwA shA ba ri pU ra ki_/sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/_a mo g+hA ya swA hA/_a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/_a dzi tA ya swA hA/_
[\[282b.5\]]a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/_mA ra sai n+ya pra mar+d+da nA ya swA hA/_a b+ha yA ya swA hA/_a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/_dza yA ya swA hA/_bi dza yA ya swA hA/_dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/_ba ra dA ya swA hA/_ba ra pra dA ya 
[\[282b.6\]]swA hA/_a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/_i dany+tsa me kar+m+ma ku ru na maHstu te swA hA/_o~M ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M dza ya hU~M phaT swA hA/_oM dzra dzriM dzuM swA hA/_o~M hU~M dza ya swA hA/_o~M hrIHs+t+rai lo kya bi dza yA mo g+ha pA shA pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/_o~M pa su pa ti 
[\[282b.7\]]swA hA/_o~M A ro lika swA hA/_o~M ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/_o~M A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhu~M phaT swA hA/_ni ya tA ni ya ta/_bi da nI yA shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wAn karma No\u0f85 she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/_o~M pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/_o~M bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+hA ya swA hA/_bklags pas 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/_/dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/a ga ru'i bdug spos dang /_thal ba dang /_chu dang /_yungs 
[\[283a.2\]]kar dang seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo /_/rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/_/nad thams cad la mar ram/_mar nag gam/_chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/_/lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon 
[\[283a.3\]]chas gcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/_/lto na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa'am/_'jim bag gam/_chus kyang bya'o/_/mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/_/so'i nad la ka ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/_/mtshams bcing ba la 
[\[283a.4\]]ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no/_/thams cad du srung skud dam/_chu'am thal bas bya'o/_/gza' 
[\[283a.5\]]thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/_/rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/_/sbrul dang /_srin bu dang /_ba spu byi ba dang /_lhog pa dang /_gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o/_/mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/_rgya skyegs 
[\[283a.6\]]kyi chu'am/_sbrang rtsi'am/_shing mngar gyis bya'o/_/rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o/_/yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas 
[\[283a.7\]]gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/_/de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams cad bsrung ba yin no/_/nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang /_yams rnams zhi ba yin no/_/phyag rgya tsan+dan gyi 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas na khyim bsrung ba'o/_/pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gi sems can thams cad kyi bsrung ba'o/_/tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang /_'byung po dang rgyu skar 
[\[283b.2\]]thams cad las bsrung ba'o/_/rgyal ba dang /_rnam par rgyal ba dang /_gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /_na gu li dang /_dri'i na gu li dang /_d+ha ra ni dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang /_dbang po'i lag pa dang /_dri'i pri yang ku dang /_ta ka ra dang /_
[\[283b.3\]]'khor lo dang /_'khor lo chen po dang /_rnam par gnon pa dang /_so ma rA dzi dang /_su nat+ta zhes bya ba ste/_de dag gang yang rung ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/_/byis pa 
[\[283b.4\]]rnams kyi ni mgul du'o/_/bud med rnams kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do/_/g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro/_/nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no/_/dug dang mes mi tshugs 
[\[283b.5\]]so/_/dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus rengs par byed do/_/ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do/_/'phags pa 
[\[283b.6\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do/_/de nas bsgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[283b.7\]]dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/_/lha bzo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/_dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/_/nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /_khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/_/a ga 
[\[284a.2\]]ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa'am/_dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o/_/de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid 
[\[284a.3\]]bris pa bltas te de mthong bas dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/ji srid du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/ldong ros sam mig sman la yongs su bzlas te mig la bskus na de nas mi snang 
[\[284a.4\]]bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/yang dag par rmongs pa med pa'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob bo/_/sgrub pa po gang 'dod pa de 'dis byed do zhes bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang 
[\[284a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[284a.6\]]dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[284a.7\]]rgya gar gyi mkhan po a mo g+ha badzra dang /_bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen grags pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]{D683}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da yaM ma hA yA na nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 
[\[284b.2\]]'tshal lo/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[284b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dkon mchog gsum 
[\[284b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 
[\[284b.5\]]dbang phyug gi kha nas brjod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su smras pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bgyi ba da ltar bdag gis bshad par bgyi'o/_/bdag gis sngags kyi tshig dang dgos pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig_/bdag 
[\[284b.6\]]'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig_/ta d+ya thA/_oM tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ma ra ma ra/_mi ri mi ri/_mu ru mu ru/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_tsi ri tsi ri/_bi ri bi ri/_pi ri pi ri/_
[\[284b.7\]]mi ri mi ri/_ma hA pad+ma hasta/_ka la ka la/_ki li ki li/_ku lu ku lu/_ma hA shud d+ha satwa/_bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/_bo d+ha bo d+ha/_bo d+hi bo d+hi/_bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/_ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/_ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]ru ku ru/_ma hAs+thA ma prA p+ta/_tsa la tsa la/_sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/_pi tsa la bi tsa la/_e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/_b+ha ra b+ha ra/_b+hi ri b+hi ri/_b+hu ru b+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_ti ri ti ri/_tu ru 
[\[285a.2\]]tu ru/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ras ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_pa ra pa ra/_bar ba ra/_ma ra ma ra/_la ra la ra/_
[\[285a.3\]]ha ra ha ra/_ha hA hi hI hu hU/_oM ka ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_sa ras ra/_tsa ra tsa ra/_na ra na ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti 
[\[285a.4\]]maN+Di ta sha rI raM/_dz+wa la dz+wa la/_ta pa ta pa/_b+hA sa b+hA sa/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/_b+ha ga wan so ma/_A dit+ya/_ya ma/_ba ru Na/_ku be ra/_brah+men+d+ra/_bA yu/_ag+ni/_d+han da/_de ba/_r-i Shi ga Na a b+h+yar tsi ta 
[\[285a.5\]]tsa ra Na/_su ru su ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_mu ru mu ru/_g+hu ru g+hu ru/_sa nad ku mA ra/_ru dra/_bAs ba/_piTh+Nu d+han da/_bA yu/_ag+ni/_r-i Shi/_nA ya ka/_bi nA ya ka ba hu pi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/_d+ha ra 
[\[285a.6\]]d+ha ra/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hu ru d+hu ru/_ta ra ta ra/_tha ra tha ra/_g+ha ra g+ha ra/_ya ra ya ra/_la ra la ra/_ha ra ha ra/_pa ra pa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ba ra ba ra/_ba ra dA ya ka_/sa man+ta a wa lo ki ti/_bi lo ki ti/_
[\[285a.7\]]lo ke shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/_sarba gu Na sam a laM kr-i ta/_a wa lo ki te shwa ra/_mu hu mu hu/_mu ru mu ru/_mu ya mu ya/_muny+tsa muny+tsa/_shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/_bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gdon thams cad dang /_
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gnod pa thams cad dang /_nad 'go ba thams cad dang /_'khrug pa thams cad dang /_dug thams cad dang /_nad thams cad las srungs shig_/srungs shig_/de bzhin du bsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_rdeg pa dang /_
[\[285b.2\]]spyo ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_dug dang /_mtshon las yongs su thar bar gyur cig_/ka Na ka Na/_ki Ni ki Ni/_ku Nu ku Nu/_tsa ra tsa ra/_tsi ri tsi ri/_tsu ru tsu ru/_in dri ya/_ba la/_bo 
[\[285b.3\]]d+h+yaM ga_/tsa tur Ar+ya sa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka_/ta pa ta pa/_ta ma ta ma/_da ma da ma/_sa ma sam/_d+ha ma d+ha ma/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/ma hA ta mo/_an d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na/_Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka_/ma la ma la/_mi 
[\[285b.4\]]li mi li/_mu lu mu lu/_Ta Ta Ta Ta/_Tha Tha Tha Tha/_Ti Ti Ti Ti/_Tu Tu Tu Tu/_Thi Thi Thi Thi/_Thu Thu Thu Thu/_e Ne ye tsar+m+ma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/_e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka_/I shwa ra/_ma he shwa ra/_ma hA b+hU ta ga Na saM 
[\[285b.5\]]b+hany+dza ka_/ka ra ka ra/_ki ri ki ri/_ku ru ku ru/_pa ra pa ra/_ha ra ha ra/_ba ra ba ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ka Ta ka Ta/_ki Ti ki Ti/_ku Tu ku Tu/_ma Ta ma Ta/_ma hA bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni 
[\[285b.6\]]bA si na/_ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta yadz+nyA+e u pa pI ta/_ra t+na mu ku Ta/_mA yA d+ha ra/_sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA ma ku Ta/_ma hA ad b+hu ta/_ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/_d+h+yA na/_sa mA d+hi/_bi mok+Sha/_a pra kam+p+ya/_
[\[285b.7\]]ba hu satwa san ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka_/ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka_/sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka_/sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka_/sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na mastu te swA hA/_a mo g+hA ya swA hA/_
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/_a dzi tA ya swA hA/_a pA rA dzi tA ya swA hA/_a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/_a mi tA b+ha su tA ya swA hA/_mA ra sain+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/_a b+ha yA ya swA hA/_a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/_
[\[286a.2\]]dza yA ya swA hA/_bi dza yA ya swA hA/_dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/_ba ra dA ya swA hA/_ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/_a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/_id ny+tsa me karma ku ru na ma stu te swA hA/_oM ra Na ra Na hUM phaT/_oM dza ya hUM phaT/_
[\[286a.3\]]oM dzra dzriM dzu hUM swA hA/_oM hUM dza ya swA hA/_oM hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhUM phaT swA hA/_gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs bum pa la bzlas pas mi bgegs kyis brlams pa'am/_'dre 
[\[286a.4\]]gdon gyis zin pa'am/_byad 'og tu chud pa'am/_bud med byur ngad cing bu med pa'am/_bu mi 'tsho ba la sogs pa la phan par bya ba'i phyir cho ga bya na/_'bab chu'i 'gram mam/_shing gcig pa'i drung ngam/_lam 
[\[286a.5\]]gyi bzhi mdo'am/_khang stong la sogs pa'i dbus nas dkyil 'khor gyis blang bar bya ste/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/_sgo bzhi la/_nub phyogs sam/_byang phyogs kyi sgo btod pa cig tshon rtsi dkar po sna gcig gis bris 
[\[286a.6\]]te/_dbus su yang pad ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa cig bris la/_gser dngul lam zangs kyi bum pa ma zhum pa/_mi 'jig pa'am/_kham pa'i bum pas ra pa so btang ba'i nag po dang ra ri med pa gcig spos chus 
[\[286a.7\]]bkang ste/_rin po che sna lnga/_sman sna lnga/_'bru sna lnga blugs la/_mgul ras dkar po sar pa kha tshar ma bcad pa dang /_me tog gi phreng bas bcings te/_khar shug pa'am/_thang shing gi mgo lcogs bcug la 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]me tog dang 'bras bus brgyan pa gcig pad ma'i steng du bzhag la/_gzungs klog pa nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bsgyur te/_bum pa de yang rin chen rdzing bu bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsams la/_chu de'i nang nas pad 
[\[286b.2\]]ma dkar po cig byung bar bsams te/_pad ma de la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yi ge dkar po bsams te/_yi ge de las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tu gyur par bsams la mchod pa dang /_bstod 
[\[286b.3\]]pa byas te/_gang bsgrubs pa'i dngos po grub par gyur cig ces gsol ba btab pas/_a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs mang pos bum pa de la lan bcu gsum du tshig gzhan mi smra bar bzlas te/_bum pa de'i chus de'i spyi bo nas blugs na 
[\[286b.4\]]bgegs dang gdon la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de la gos dang bcas par spyi bo nas blugs la/_blugs pa'i tshe yang gzungs klog pa dang /_klog par bya ba gnyis kas kyang lus phyi nang gnyi sa dag pa dang /_'dre 
[\[286b.5\]]gdon las thar bar sems rtse gcig tu sems shing bklag go/_/gos gsher ba de yang yugs dor ba'i thabs su bor la/_gos dkar po sar pa gon te/_spos dang /_me tog la sogs pas lus brgyan pa de nyid lan cig 
[\[286b.6\]]bklags pas lus bsrungs te bkra shis kyang bklag go/_/dkyil 'khor de'i kho ra khor yug tu 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyang so so'i ming smos te spyan drangs la mchod nas/_las gang bsgrub pa de grub par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas/_
[\[286b.7\]]mchod pa rnam pa lnga pa gcig gis mchod la/_'byung po phal rnams la yang gtor ma rgya cher sbyin no/_/bdag srung ba dang /_mtshams bcad pa yang a mo g+ha pA sha'i gzungs de nyid kyis tshul bzhin du byas na/_de yang tshes brgyad la bya ba'i 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]rigs so/_/cho ga 'dis bgegs kyis brlams pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_mi tha mal pa la byas na yang phyis bgegs dang /_byad stems kyis mi tshugs/_nad 
[\[287a.2\]]'go bas mi thebs/_dpal che zhing bsams so cog 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rin po che sna lnga la gser byi ru/_mu tig_/dung /_shel/_sman lnga la/_sing ha/_byA g+h+ri/_gi ri kirni/_sa ha/_sa ha de ba/_'bru 
[\[287a.3\]]sna lnga la/_nas so ba/_'bras so ba/_til/_gro/_mon sran/_ma sha'o/_/'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//
[\[287a.4\]]oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha wA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya wa da ta/_te ShA ny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM bA dI ma hA shra ma Na ye swA hA//_//

[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]{D684}]@#/_rgya gar skad du/_nA rA ya na pa'i pr-its+tsh+wa Ar+ya mahA mAyA bidza ya bA hi nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_sred med kyi bus zhus pa 'phags pa sgyu ma chen mo rnam par rgyal ba thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems 
[\[287b.2\]]dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das gser gyi rwa zhes bya ba'i ri bo'i rtse na rnam thos bu'i khang pa na bzhugs te/_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye 
[\[287b.3\]]chen po dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang chu skyes ma la sogs pa mang po rnams kyis bstod par byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos rnams grangs bstan bar mdzad do/_de nas lha ma yin rnams kyis bcom pa pham pa kun tu nyams ba gzi brjid kyi stobs dman pa'i srid med kyi 
[\[287b.4\]]bu gang de bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar 'ongs so/_nye bar 'ongs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos mngon par btun nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/_mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas de nyid du gsol ba/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams 
[\[287b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa sems can thams cad la rjes su brtse ba can/_chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang srin po la sogs pa rnams sam mi rnams kyang rung ste/_g.yul 'khrugs pa'i tshe mtshon cha chen po ltung ba'am nye bar 'tsho 
[\[287b.6\]]ba'am rtsod pa thams cad las thams cad du rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur pa de lta bu bstan par mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_sred med kyi bu sgyu ma 'chang ba khyed/_sred med kyi bu sgyu ma dang ldan pa/_stobs chen po mchis pa g.yo sgyu 
[\[287b.7\]]mang pos sems can rnams slu bar byed pa khyed 'dir 'jigs nas g.yul du rnam par rgyal ba 'dri zhing yongs su 'dri bar byed pa ci yin/_sred med bus 'di skad gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i lha ma yi gyi dbang bos lha ma yin gyi sgyus 'dir bdag bcom 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]ste lha rnams 'ga' zhig ni 'chi bar gyur/_'ga' zhig ni pham bar gyur/_'ga' zhig ni bcoms par gyur lags so/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can rnams g.yul du rnam par rgyal bar byed par 'gyur pa/_lha ma yin rnams pham par byed 
[\[288a.2\]]par 'gyur ba/_lha ma yin gyi dregs pa snyil bar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_sred med kyi bu/_sngon byung 'das ba'i dus su ma ga ng+hA ro hi ta'i ri la rin chen dpal zhes bya ba'i rgyal po byung ngo /_de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin 
[\[288a.3\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba lha dang ni rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dbang phyug ces bya ba byung ngo /_
[\[288a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad dbang phyug de'i zhal snga nas sgyu ma chen po rnam par rgyal ba thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams bdag gis legs par mnos te 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang kun chub pa dang rjes su yi rang par byas te gzhan rnams la'ang rgya cher 
[\[288a.5\]]yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/sred med kyi bu gzungs 'di'i mthus nam du'ang dgra'i 'jigs pa med pa dang mi 'phrod pa'i 'jigs pa med pa dang chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa'ang 'byung ba med par lo stong phrag brgya'i par du chos bzhin gyi rgyal srid byas nas/_slad mar yang grong 
[\[288a.6\]]khyer dang grong khyer gzhan dang skyed mos tshal rnams su gzungs kyi mthus ltad mo bzhin du bde bar rgyu bar byed do/_skye ba brjes nas mA ng+hA hA zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bo rin po che bdun dang yang dag par ldan pa/_'jig rten gsum 
[\[288a.7\]]po mtha' dag la bka'i lung bsgyur ba byung ngo /_sngon du sbyin ba'i pha rol du phyin pa ma nyams pas sems cad thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du phan 'dogs par byed ba'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa'i skal ba can nor gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed pa/_sems 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]can thams cad bde bar byed pa/_thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa byung ngo /_sred med kyi bu/_de ltar gzungs 'di'i mthus bskal pa brgya phrag mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_gang yang lha dang klu dang 
[\[288b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang rig 'dzin dang mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams bka' bzhin du gnas par byed de/_de rnams bka' las phyir phyogs par mi byed do/_bskal ba stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams 
[\[288b.3\]]su sngon du phyogs par byas te phyi nas skye ba gcig tu mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa las thar ba'i klu'i dbang po yang dag par gnas pa bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i dgra bcom pa lha'i 
[\[288b.4\]]bla mar gyur to/_sred med kyi bu/_de'i phyir sgyu ma chen mo rnam par rgyal ba thob bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig rnams khyed kyis zungs shig_/tad+ya thA/_nam s+t+r+ya ng+hA nu ga ta pra ti Sh+Shi te b+h+yaH_sarba bud+ng+hA bo ng+hi satA+e b+h+yaH_sarba mu drA man+t+ra pa 
[\[288b.5\]]de b+h+yaHoM mA ye ma hA mA lA ng+hA ra Ni i yaM sA mahA mA yA man+te Na ma hA mA lA rA pe Na/_b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa ye bi rU ng+ha kaM tsin+ta sarba duSh+Ta satwA stAn+t+rA/_ma ya maya/_mo ha ya mo ha ya/_mu r+ts+tshA pa ya mu r+ts+tshA ba ya/_mA ra ta mA ra ya/_bi 
[\[288b.6\]]ng+tAM sa ya bi ng+tAM sa ya/_ma ra ma ra/_ma hA mA ye a la la la la ma hA mA yA dzA la sa ha sra mu khis ha sra shi re sa ha sra g+hu dze dz+wa li ta ne tre sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya gar+b+b+he/_a si ng+ha nuHba ra shu bA sha to ma ra ka na ya sha k+ti mu buN+Di ha ste mung+gar tsakra ha ste e h+ye hi b+ha ga ba ti/_sarba ta thA ga ta 
[\[288b.7\]]sa t+ye na de bar+Shi ga Na sa t+ye na ma hA mA lA bi dza yA bA hi ni/_sma ra sma ra sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na rU pe Na/_ga ts+tsha ga ts+tsha sarbA ba ra Na k+Sha yaM ka ri ba ra si n+ya bi drA ba Ni mo ha la mo ha ya maM ma sarba sa twA NA b+hany+tsa sarba du Sh+DA r+sha/_rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwA ny+tsa sak+sha b+ha yo ba dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/_oM ma hA mA yA ng+hA ra Ni ye 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]swA hA/_oM ma hI maN+Da lA ng+hiSh+Tha nA ng+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/_oM badzra ng+ha ra ban+di ta pU dzi tA yai swA hA/_oM pad+ma yA Ni bri yA ya swA hA/_oM sarba de ba na ma skr-i te swA hA/_oM mA tr-i ga Na ban+di ta pU dzi tA yai swA hA/_oM dza ye swA hA/_oM dza ye swA hA/_oM bi dza ye swA hA/_oM swA hA/_oM a bi ng+hi 
[\[289a.2\]]te swA hA/_oM a ba rwa dzi te swA hA/_oM mo ha nI ya swA hA/_oM sta m+b+h+ra nA ye swA hA/_oM dzam+b+ha nI ye swA hA/_oM dza yan+ti ye swA hA/_oM b+ha ma NI ye swA hA/_oM b+h+ra ma NI ye swA hA/_oM sarbA su rad ma nI ye swA hA/_oM ma hA kA la ban+di ta bU dzi tA yai swA hA/_oM kA ma ru pi NI ye swA hA/_
[\[289a.3\]]o mA yA rA k+Sha sI ye swA hA/_oM rar swA hA/_oM rU rU hU~M hU~M phaT he dza ye mA yA b+ha ga ba ti ma hA mA yA bi dza ya bA hi nI gr-i h+Na sh+Shi g+h+ra mA bi la mA swa ma ma sarba sa twA nA ny+tsa sarba kA R+Y+YaM ku ru ku ru huM huM phaT phaT swA hA/_sred med kyi bu/_'di ltar sgyu ma chen mo rnam par rgyal ba thob par 
[\[289a.4\]]byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams zungs shig klogs shig gzhan rnams la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig_/sred med kyi bu/_de nas g.yul 'gyed pa de'i tshe dmag dpung gnyis kyi bar du gnas lnga rnams su gzungs 'di'i 'khor lo 
[\[289a.5\]]shing rta'i dbyibs su sbyar bar bya'o/_/sred med kyi bu/_gang gi tshe gnyis ka'i nang gi dbus su pha rol gyi dpung gi spyi bor shing rta'i dbus der sgyu ma chen mo rnam par rgyal ba thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i gzugs dang brgya stong phrag du ma'i phyag 
[\[289a.6\]]dang ldan pa spyan gsum pa dmar nag 'bar ba'i zhal bzhi rnams kyis pha rol gyi dmag dpung za bar byed pa bzhin du bsam par bya'o/_/rang nyid 'khor los sgyur ba'i rnam par byas nas gdugs la gzungs gur gum gyis bri bar byas te rgyal bo dang pha rol gyi dmag dpung 
[\[289a.7\]]rang bzhin gcig pa sgyu ma lta bus rab tu sgrib par byed cing snying bo du mas rgyal bor 'gyur ro/_/sred med kyi bu/_pha rol gyi dmag dpung rnams bcoms shing pham ste kha cig ni brgyal nas sa gzhi la ltung bar smra'o/_/sred med kyi bu/_de ltar ltung ba'ang ji ltar mi dge ba 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]bcu'i las kyi lam gyi chad pas drang bar bya ba ste/_de rnams kyi 'tsho ba la bar du gcod pa'i 'bras bu can ni ma yin no/_/sred med kyi bu/_bsngags par 'os pa'i gzungs kyi mthu ni de lta ba'o/_/sred med kyi bu/_yang gang zhig gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di 
[\[289b.2\]]rnams gtsang bar byas pas sam gtsang bar ma byas pas kyang rung /_bsnyung bar byas pas sam bsnyung bar ma byas pas kyang rung nyi ma so so la lan gsum du rjod par byed pa de nyid ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang sdig pa'i phung bo zad par byas nas bsod nams kyi phung po thob 
[\[289b.3\]]cing skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/sems can thams cad kun tu khyab pa'i nor la nye bar longs spyod cing dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' ste mi dge ba log par ltung ba rnams la ni ma yin no/_/sred med kyi bu/_yang gang zhing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'am 
[\[289b.4\]]dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma'am rgyal bo'am rgyal bo'i bu'am bram ze'ang rung gzungs 'di 'dzin par byed pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na dam pa'i chos kyi snang can du 'gyur zhing tshig pa'am thal bar gyur ba la'ang skyes pa'am bud med gang la la 
[\[289b.5\]]zhig gis reg par bgyid pa de nyid nges par skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sred med kyi bus byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la kye ma'o zhes ngo mtshar bar byas nas dung dang 'khor lo dang dbyug pa dang me tog gi phreng ba rnams bzhag ste stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[289b.6\]]lan gsum du bskor zhing phyag byas te rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa/_e ma lha dang lha min 'jig rten gyi/_/gtso bo mchog gyur bla na med pa ste/_/zhi ba zhi bar gyur ba legs 
[\[289b.7\]]bzung nas/_/'jig rten 'das la phyag 'tshal bstod par bgyi/_/chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/_/byung ba'i chos ni rab tu ston/_/chos dang chos min rnam par grol/_/chos bden khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/de nas sred med kyi bus 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la rab tu btud nas bcom ldan 'das khyed ni bdag gi bya ba bdag go zhes byas nas song bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa 'di thos pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang

[\[290a.3\]]sred med kyi bus zhus pa'i 'phags pa sgyu ma chen po rnam par rgyal ba thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//'di ni sngar bod du bsgyur bar ma grags pa'i gzungs rig byed kyi lo rgyus la brten pa'i log rtog sel byed khyad par du 'phags pa ste rab byung 
[\[290a.4\]]bcu gsum pa'i dngos po'i lor/_rje btsun bla ma dpal rig pa 'dzin pa gang gis ne gA la'i yul nas rgya dpe btsal te bsgyur dgos pa'i bka' lung rta zam brgyud pheb par brten lo re'i khums zla'i yar tshes bzang par mdo smad sde dge'i mnga' ris dpal spungs dgon

[\[290a.7\]]tad+ya thA/_oM a ri ba ri bi bA ra/_sha ba ri/_sharba ri/_mA ri/_mA ma Ti/_Ti Ta mA mA ma Ti/_mA bi Sha mA/_ban+na ga phuH_phuH_sha ba rI ye/_phuHphuH_ku mA ra/
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]sha ba rI ye/_phuHphuH_ki rA ta/_sha ba rI ye/_phuHphuH_ThaHTha/_swA hA/_oM sha ba ri/_sha ba ri/_ma hA sha ba ri/_bin+b+ha barba ta/_bA si ni/_ka tha ya ti/_sarba nA gA nAM bA su ki shA/_ba tso ya thA/_nA 
[\[290b.2\]]mA hi n+sa nU/_ban+na gaH_i dan+d+ri Sh+TA sa ma yaM nA gA rdzU nI ya kaM_oM baM nA sa rA dzA naM/_nA sA rdzA no/_dz+nyA ba ya ti/_phuHpuH/_ThaHThaHswA hA/_oM a Ti ma Ti ma hA bi d+ye yi na te bi bya rU bi ni ha na ha na sarba bi ShA na de'i sU tra gats+tshi/_ga ti rU 
[\[290b.3\]]baM/_phuHphuH_ThaHThaHswA hA/_oM sU tre bAr+b+te su ti She swA hA/_i h+ye maM kA sh+ya bo dz+nyA ba oM ti/_a na ku li na ku li ma hA na ku li sar+b+ba s+ya mu khaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_bi Sha b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha phuHphuH_ThaHThaHswA hA/_oM ka dru nA gA nAM/_mA 
[\[290b.4\]]te ma hA bA she saM ha ra sarba bi ShA r+tha de bi b+hA ta/_swA ba ra dzang+ga mA nra phuHphuH_ThaHThaHswA hA/_oM na gu li na ku li ma hA na su li ha ra bi ShaM/_aSh+TAn+tshaM/_nA ga ta dz+nya naM/_na bA naM/_g+ho Na sA nAM/_Sho Da shA nAM/_tsi N+Shi kA nAM/_oM ka bi 
[\[290b.5\]]sha ti byan+ta rA NAM hu/_A ha ra bi Shi b+ha k+Sha la bi ShaM hrIH_k+She maM ka ri hUM phaT/_oM kruM saH_oM bA suM ki/_oM a na n+ta/_oM tik+Shaka/_oM ka rke Ta ka_oM pad+ma/_oM ma hA pad+ma/_oM shA kha pA la/_oM
